1b1(rgyud): drug slad du/  mAng
1b2(rgyud):
1b3(rgyud):
2a1(rgyud): tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad ba ngag gis thos pa
2a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig dang mkhyen
2b1(rgyud): pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
2b2(rgyud): rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis khams gsum du dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ 
2b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi thams cad mkhyen/ ba'i ye shes dang ldan
2b4(rgyud): pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag
2b5(rgyud): rgyu thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thugs su chud pa sna tshogs kyi bya ba mdzad de/ sems can
3a1(rgyud): gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi ra ba thams cad yongs skyong ba'i phrin lnga/ 
3a2(rgyud): mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba/ rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa/ sku dang / 
3a3(rgyud): gsung dang / thugs thams ca de rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa thamasacad bzhugs shing bsdigs
3a4(rgyud): pabastod pa/ nor bu chen po da nga / rin po ches smras pa/ kha dog sna chu gas pa'i dril bu btags
3a5(rgyud): pa/ kha dog sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ rnga ma dang / dra ba dang / dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyong/ 
3a6(rgyud): pa rnams kyis nye bar mdzes par byas pa'i 'dod pa'i khams thams cad kyi gzhon 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i rgyal/ 
3b1(rgyud): po'i gnas na/ byang chub sems dngapa 'bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
3b2(rgyud): sems dpa' tshon po lag na rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / 
3b3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu
3b4(rgyud): tshur drang / byang chub sems dang / 'a sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal dang // byang chub sems dpa' sems
3b5(rgyud): dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po
3b6(rgyud): namakha'i mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag
3b7(rgyud): la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag brgyad dang thabs gcig ste/ yongs su bskor cing
4a1(rgyud): / mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ thog mar dge ba/ byar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ga/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po/ 6/ 
4a2(rgyud): 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongs su byang ba dang / chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba
4a3(rgyud): rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i tshul ri yang dag par ston to// 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas ngo mi 'ang lta s+ho/ 
4a4(rgyud): chub sems dpa'o gnas so// 'od chags kyi mang rnam par dag dra'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa
4a5(rgyud): gnas so// reg pa rnam par dag pa' gnas dedo ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'age nas so// sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par
4a6(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas do ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gnas so// thams cad la dbang phyugadang dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas don
4a7(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gan no/ dag
4b1(rgyud): ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems drapa'i gnas so// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 
4b2(rgyud): bsnyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// rgyan rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 
4b3(rgyud): yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas don 'odi lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub
4b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i gonas so// lus bde ba rnam pa dar dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sa mas dpa'i gnas so// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i/ 
4b5(rgyud): gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de/ ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 
4b6(rgyud): dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas
4b7(rgyud): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag par/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
4b8(rgyud): yongs su dag pa'o// badz+ra hUM/ lag na rdo rje su la las chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i gnas sgrub pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
5a1(rgyud): tshul 'di lan gcig thos na yang de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du shes bya'i sgrib pa thams cad dang / chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / 
5a2(rgyud): chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnams su nams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur ro// sdig pa yang byang ma thag tu/ 
5a3(rgyud): sdug bsngal med par byang bar 'gyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa 'am/ nyin re zhing klog pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos
5a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pas/ chos thams cad la dbang phyug du 'gyur ro//  chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / 
5a5(rgyud): mchog tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshe bcu drug gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid
5a6(rgyud): 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad pa
5a7(rgyud): rje dbyings mtha' dag gi sems dpa'i mchog/ khams gsum po mtha' dag na 'jig rten gsum po ma lus pa las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams ma lus
5a8(rgyud): shing lus pa med pa 'dul bar spyod pa/ don thams cad grub pa lag na rdo rje mtha' yas pa thams cad pa dam tshig chen po pa rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can
5b1(rgyud): chen po du mas g.yog byas pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te thog ma'i rdo rje
5b2(rgyud): chen po gser nas rang gi snying khar stod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing bde ba chen po rdo rje den yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smras so// 
5b3(rgyud): hUMde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams gsum thams cad
5b4(rgyud): nas rjes su mnyes par byas te bkug nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bcug ste dam tshig gis bcings nas dbang
5b5(rgyud): du byas te dngos grub thams cad grub bo// de nas pa com ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis bde ba chen po'i snyoms pa'i phyag rgya bcings nas
5b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pas bzhugs so// de nas phyag na rdo rje gsong ba chen po'i dam
5b7(rgyud): tshig 'byung ba dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlobs pa'i ye shes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje dbyings kyi byin
5b8(rgyud): gyis brlabs chen po zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// de nyid dang po dam tshig
6a1(rgyud): che/ rdo rje byin rlabs zhes bya'o// gru bzhir bzhi zhing sgo bzhi dang // khyams rnams kyis ni yongs bskor ba// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// 'od zer 'bur
6a2(rgyud): bar 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor gyi ni grwa rnams dang // sgo khyud kyi ni mtshams rnams su// zla ba phyed la rab gnas pa'i// rin chen kun gyis nye bar mdzes// rtse mo sna
6a3(rgyud): tshetshogs pa dan ni// dril bu mchog btags rlung gis bskyod// me tog chun 'phyang me long spras// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad
6a4(rgyud): dang mnyam pa ru// rdo rje thig gis thig gdab pa// rdo rje/ 'khor lo zhes byar bshad// de yi dbus su tsi ri dgas par// sangs rgyas sku ni bzhag bya ste// 'dzum bcas
6a5(rgyud): zla ba'i mdog can la// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mtsho ga/ rdo rje phreng sogs kyis spras shing // sna tshogs 'bar ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs
6a6(rgyud): par ni// lugs ma 'am mngon par 'dus byas pa'o// rang gi snying po kun bzlas te// de tshe dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// snying po nyid kyis
6a7(rgyud): yang dag dgod// rdo rje shugs kyis rgal nas ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad yang dag bsdus// bzhag gam yang na bri bar bya// phyogs rnams kun tu ston pa'o// mdun du rdo rje sems
6a8(rgyud): dpa' ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbu rgyan can// rdo rje mtshon ni gsor bar brtson// dmar s+yang gi tu nges par dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni g.yas logs su// rdo rje kI li kI li ni// yan
6b1(rgyud): lag kun gyis yongs 'khyud pa// rdo rje can gzugs nyi ma'i 'od// rgyab tu rdo rje 'dod pa ni// chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan thogs// sngo skya'i mdog can ci rigs par// blo dang ldan pas bzhag
6b2(rgyud): par bya// g.yon du rdo rje bstims pa ni// bsnyems pa'i rdo rje gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje bsnyems pa gnyis 'dzin pa// btso ma'i gser dang 'dra ba dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni mtshams rnams/ 
6b3(rgyud): me tog la sogs kyis mtshan cing // thal mo spyi bor legs 'jog pa'i// mchod pa chen po bzhag par bya// phyi'i dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su// lha mo'i tshogs rnams
6b4(rgyud): dgod par bya// sgo yi dbus ni thams cad du// gzugangs mtshan la sogs bsdus pa dgod// sangs rgya das dkyil 'khor can brgyad ni// rdo rje 'dzin sogs bri
6b5(rgyud): bar bya// rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad du// sangs rgyas N+Di rje 'dzin gyis bskor// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gan/ sa rnams// 'dod pa'i dbang phyug bri bya ste// mdun du
6b6(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum rgyal lo// 'dod pa tshangs pa zhi byed mchog/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'jug pa la sogs pa'i chog rgyas par 'byung ste// de la dang po nyid du ji skad
6b7(rgyud): bshad pa'i cho ga 'dis zhugs pa'i slob dpon ni rdo rje chen po'i slob dpon dang dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon dang / dam tshig thams cad shes pa dang / chos thams cad
6b8(rgyud): rig pa dang / las thams cad sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad grub pa dang / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dbang bskur ba thams cad
7a1(rgyud): thob pa dang / thams cad shes pa dang ldan pa dang / mchod pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad 'di'i dbang du 'gyur
7a2(rgyud): ba dang 'grub par 'gyur ba dang 'di'i phyag rgya thams cad kyang rang nyid kyis bcings pas 'grub par 'gyuraro// dam tshig thams cad kyi lam la nyes pa dang bcas kyang nyams par ma
7a3(rgyud): 'gyur zhing byin gyis brlabs par rtog par 'gyuraro// ma brlabs par yang thams cad shes par 'gyuraro// mchod pa la sogs pa'i bya ba thams cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// mdor bsdus na che
7a4(rgyud): 'di nyid la dngos grub kyi mchog ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa de lta bur sangs rgyas nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyi du 'thob par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom
7a5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' 'di'i snying la bzhugs shing don yod pa'i phyir bkug cing dam tshig gis bcing / sa la dbang du byas te rjesu mnyes pas bdag nyid slob dpon
7a6(rgyud): du gyur nas 'jug cing bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la dang po'i rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/ snying po lan gcig brjod nas/ dkyil 'khor chen po
7a7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o// de nas rdo rje rnam par sgeg pa'i phyag rgyas bzlas brjod lan cig byas la phyag byas nas gos dmar po gyon la me tog gi phreng ba thogs te gdong dris byug pa dang / rdo rje thal mos
7a8(rgyud): rdo rje'i gar byed cing bskor bas snying khar me tog thogs te bdag nyid 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas kyang rnam par sgeg pa dang / bskor bas gdung cing snying po yang bzlas brjod bya'o// de
7b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das la rdo rje'i lta bas bltas te/ de bzhin du 'dug nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrub pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid dgyes pas mthong ba stsol
7b2(rgyud): par 'gyur zhing sprin ma bskyed la sku thams cad dam yan lag rnams bskyod cing kha dog dmar por 'gyuro// 'od zer gyi rang bzhin gyi zhal lam sku thams cad ston par 'gyuraro// 
7b3(rgyud): 'phrul dpag tu med pa yang ston par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das bdag nyid mthong ba stsol 'am dngos grub mchog kyang stsol bar 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te nyin re zhing dngos
7b4(rgyud): grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyuraro// gang du zhugs pa tsa ma nyid kyis mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par 'gyur// / dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa
7b5(rgyud): thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / bya ba tham/ sa cad bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes sgrub pa/ ra mdzad do// de nas de yang dag par mchod de rdo rje ming gis
7b6(rgyud): dbang bskur zhing dpa' bo'i rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la mnos la/ snying po bzlas nas bcom ldan 'das mthong ba stsol nas rang nyid kyis stsol cig ces brjod la rang gis blang bar
7b7(rgyud): bya'o// de nas skad cig de nyid la dngos grub mchog yid la 'dod pa 'grub par 'gyur// yang na bdag nyid kyis zla ba drug gis yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub mchog 'grub par 'gyur
7b8(rgyud): zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungaso// de nas ming gi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// de nas byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa byas nas yang ji ltar 'dod pa'i
8a1(rgyud): tshogs bsgrubs la 'byung bar bya zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i gsang ba sgrub pa lan cig bya'o// de nas slob ma gzhug par bya ste/ de la dang por rdo rje slob dpon gyis dang / 
8a2(rgyud): po'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcangs la 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas de bzhin du phyag byas la snying pos ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i tshig dang bcom ldan 'das sgrub pas phyag
8a3(rgyud): rgya chen pos bsgrub par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsgrubs pas mtshan ma de nyid 'byung ste/ shes nas phyag rgya chen po nyid 'grub par 'gyuraro// dngos grub thams cad kyang 'grub
8a4(rgyud): par 'gyur te/ zhugs pa 'dis ni rdo rje slob dpon bdaganyid de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas de ba bzhin du rdo rje brang ba la sogs pa byas nas rdo rje slob ma la tsha
8a5(rgyud): ga rgyas pa 'di bzhin du byas te phyag rgya bcing ba yang bsla ba par bya'o// gang yang de bzhin gshegs/ pa thams cad la sogs pa'i dam tshig la mos pa de
8a6(rgyud): rnams la yang rang gi lhag pa'i lha'i 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / de bzhin du yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas lha gzhan dag la dang
8a7(rgyud): pa rnams la de bzhin du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas de bzhin du 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas ji ltar zhugs pa rnams zas dang / ro bcung dang / gnas pa la sogs pa
8a8(rgyud): thams cad kyis yang dag par tshim par byas la/ ji ltar shes pa'i gar dang / glu dang dgod pa dang / bu dang / bu mo dang / mdza' bshes dang / nye du dang / gnyen mtshams dang / 
8b1(rgyud): bcas pas kyang mchod par bya'o// de la 'dir ni snod dang snod ma yin pa brtag par mi bya ste/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig 'di dang
8b2(rgyud): 'dod pa'i bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i rdo rje'i sbyor bas rdo rje chos kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa yin pa'i phyir dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de nas cho ga 'byung ste/ 
8b3(rgyud): zla ba nya nas brtsams nas phyag na rdo rje'i spyan sngar rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ ji ltar spro bar ma gyur par dang por byin gyis brlabs pa la sogs pa byas la rdo rje tshig gis
8b4(rgyud): brjod cing ji srid zla ba cig gi bar de srid du bzlas brjod byas na sngon du bsnyen pa byas par 'gyuraro// de nas brtsams dan phyag na rdo rje'i bka' ji lta ba bzhin du dngos grub thams
8b5(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas ras bris 'dri ba 'am 'drir gzhug par 'dod na dang por rdo rje bri ba'i phyag rgyas bris la/ de'i 'og tu ni ci bder bya'o// dkyil 'khor
8b6(rgyud): thams cad du yang de nyid kyis dang por brtsam par bya ste/ dbusu bcom ldan 'das cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du bri zhing dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis sems dpa' chen po brgyad bri bar bya'o/ 
8b7(rgyud): de nas zla ba nya nas brtsams te phyag rgya chen po bcings la/ de bzhin du sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshul ltar bzlas na zla ba nya ba'i mtshan me thog thag ji lta ba bzhin du skyo ba ma gyur pas phyag rgya
8b8(rgyud): ma bkrol bar bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas nang par bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal 'dzum zhing zla ba dang mnyam pa'i mdangs can mthong bstsol cing sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa
9a1(rgyud): nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub mchog rnams stsol bar 'gyuraro// cho ga gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad
9a2(rgyud): kyis yongasu bskor ba dang / phyogs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad bri bar bya'o// de na de bzhin du bsgrubs pas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa dngos grub
9a3(rgyud): thams cad 'grub bo// ras la bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje snyems pa dang bcas par bris la/ de'i spyan sngar dang po'i phyag rgya chen pos gnas nas bzlas brjod 'bum byas te/ 'bum rdzogs/ 
9a4(rgyud): na phyag na rdo rje nyid thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa dpa' bo gcig pa bris nas yang mthar 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de nas bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa'i las rnams dkyil/ 
9a5(rgyud): 'khor du zhugs pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ba ni 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjesu mnyes pa/ ra bya ba la ni 'dod chags la sogs pa bde ba thams cad
9a6(rgyud): phul bso// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po mnyes par bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'khyud cing 'o byed paso// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rjesu mnyes par bya ba la ni dpag tu med pa'i bzlas
9a7(rgyud): paso// rdo rjes thams cad rjesu mnyes par bya ba la ni rang gi snying po bzlas paso// gzhan srung ba/ lha la sogs pa sems can thams cad rjes chags par bya ba la ni thams cad du 'bum
9a8(rgyud): bzlas paso// bdag srung ba la ni yungs kar la lan gcig bzlas paso// gzhan srung ba la ni rdo rje bskor bso// thams cad srung ba la ni yid kyis lan gcig/ mtshams dang / phyogs dang / 
9b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad bcing ba la ni lta ba'am yungs kar la sogs pa'o// sems can thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni drugs mi 'byin par bzlas pa'o// sems can thams cad rmugs par byag/ 
9b2(rgyud): la ni rdo rje 'chir bso// sems can thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni mig btsum nas bzlas paso// thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje dral bso// sems can thams cad rgyas gdab pa lan rdo rje mkha'
9b3(rgyud): 'gro ma'i phyag rgya so// snying thams cad 'dren cing 'byin pa la ni yid kyis bzlas paso// sems can thams cad za ba la ni ljang cing myur bas zlos paso// thams cad bsreg par bya ba la ni rdo rje 'jigs
9b4(rgyud): byed kyi phyag rgya so// nor thams cad dgug pa la ni gser gyi zlas paso// nor dang 'bru thams cad dgug pa la ni rje rnal 'byor ma'i phyag rgya so// thams cad rje su chags par bya
9b5(rgyud): ba la ni pi wang rdung ba dang bcas pa'i ka ka la'i glu len pa sa bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad 'bigs pa dang rjes chags par bya ba la ni rdo rje mnga'i phyag rgyaso// thams cad
9b6(rgyud): chags par bya ba la ni phyogs thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes paso// sdug pa'i 'ching ba brtan par bya ba la ni snying brtan pos nges par 'chir ba so// ma rungs pa rab tu sgrub pa la
9b7(rgyud): ni rdo rje snyen paso// rgyun thams cad dbrog pa la ni 'bar ba'i lta bas dbrog paso// thams cad yid tshim pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur snying khar bzhag paso// mun pa snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje kha shar du
9b8(rgyud): bltas te bskor bso// lus bde bar bya ba la ni rang gi mtshan gyi bzlas paso// gzugs thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gzugs kyi mchog gi phyag rgyaso// sgra thams cad thos par bya
10a1(rgyud): la rdo rje pi wang giso// dri zhim po sna tshogs pa'i phyir ni sna'i dbugs 'byin pa'i klu yiso// zas dang / skom thams cad dang / bcud thams cad spo ba lan rdo rje sngo bar bya'o// 
10a2(rgyud): dbab pa thams cad la ni mnyam pa'i thal mo dang / se gol dang / glu'i bzlas paso// thams cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni bdag nyid gar byed cing bzlas paso// thams cad glu len
10a3(rgyud): du gzhug pa la ni lce bskyod cing bzlas paso// thams cad smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje mchu yiso// thams cad babs nas lan ston pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pas// gdon thams cad las thar
10a4(rgyud): par bya ba la ni rdo rje myug gu'i phyag rgyaso// gdon thams cad 'gyungan du gzhug pa la ni tshogs kyi bdag po rab tu da dga' ba'i khro bos bzlaso// rims thams cad 'dzin du gzhun
10a5(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje'i rims kyi gdon gyiso// rims thams cad bas/ la ba la ni rdo rje'i lta bas bsal bso// dug tha/ mas cad sbar ba la ni rdo rje lta ba'i dug giso// dug thams cad
10a6(rgyud): gzhig pa la ni rma bya'i chun poso// dug thams cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje bdud rtsi'i phyag rgyaso// bdud la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad brlag pa la ni 'khrugs pas dpag tu med par bzlas
10a7(rgyud): paso/ mkha' 'gro ma'i gdon thams cad las grol bar bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po gsor ba'i phyag rgyaso// phyag rgya thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'phen pas// 'kha' 'gro ma thams cad dgug pa
10a8(rgyud): dang gzhug pa dang / gdul ba la ni rdo rje kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya 'dzin paso// ma mo thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / dam tshig dang snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa dang / 
10b1(rgyud): gsang ba gzhig pa la rdo rje khro bo'i yi ge phaT kyiso// ma mo dang mkha' 'gro ma thams cad mngag gzhug par bya ba la ni ma mo'i gnasu khros pas bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// bdud thams cad kyi stobs
10b2(rgyud): gzhom pa la ni rdo rje drag po'i ha ha zhes bya ba'i gang rgyangs kyiso// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje la yongasu bzlas la 'pha // 'thab pa thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni
10b3(rgyud): rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi phyag rgyas// thams cad bcing ba la ni gos la mdud pa'o// thams cad grol ba la ni yi ge mu yiso// ro langs dang 'khrul 'khor thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'jigs
10b4(rgyud): byed kyiso// lcags skrag thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje khab long giso// me yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje me shel gyis// chu med par chu yang dag par bskyed pa la ni rdo rje
10b5(rgyud): chu shel gyiso// nam mkha' las zas dang / skom dang / gos dang / rgyan thams cad la sogs pa yo byad mang / po 'byung ba la ni na mkha'al lta zhing bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// 
10b6(rgyud): nam mkha' la sangs rgyas kyi sku la sogs pa gzugs thams cad ston pa la ni sangs rgyas rjesu dran la na mkhar lta zhing bzlas paso// nam mkha' la yi ges 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da
10b7(rgyud): ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo ba bden par ston pa la ni yi ge a bris la bzlas brjod 'bum byas paso// pra se na thams cad las 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i lung bsgo
10b8(rgyud): babaden par ston pa la ni rdo rje pras na thams cad dbab paso// de bzhin du mig gis bden pa thams cad mthong ba la ni rang gi mig la bzlas pa 'bum byas paso// rna bas thos par bya ba la
11a1(rgyud): ni rang gi rna ba la bzlas pa 'bum byas so// snas bsnam par bya ba la ni sna la bzlas pas so// lces rang nyid smra ba la ni lce la bzlas pas so// lus kyis reg par bya ba la ni
11a2(rgyud): lus la bzlas pas so// yid kyis shes par bya ba la ni yid la 'bum bzlas pas so// rmad du byung ba thams cad bstan pa la ni sangs rgyas kyi sku bsgrubs pas so// sgyu ma thams cad
11a3(rgyud): bstan pa la ni rma bya'i sgo'i chun po la 'bum bzlas so// thams cad g.yog par bya ba la ni zhi ba'i gnas su 'bum bzlas pas so// thams cad la lan ldon par bya ba la ni// rdo rje hUM
11a4(rgyud): mdzad kyi rdo rjes so// rdzu 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi phyag rgyas so// cho 'phrul thams cadadang bstan pa la ni rdo rje ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so// rang
11a5(rgyud): gi lus la sogs pa dngos po thams cad las sangs rgya sa dang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba 'i dngos po thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rdzu 'phrul rnam
11a6(rgyud): par 'phrul pas so// lha thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje bskor bas so// klu thams cad rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni klu'i rgyal po'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o// gnod sbyin thams cad mngag
11a7(rgyud): gzhug par bya ba la ni rdo rje bka' bsgo bas so// 'byung po thams cad gdul ba la ni lha chen po mnan nas khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// ser ba thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje
11a8(rgyud): srid srung gi phyag rgyas so// glog 'bab pa thams cad bzlog pa la ni rdo rje khro gnyer can gyi phyag rgyas so// char 'bab pa la ni klu'i mtshor bzlas brjod bya'o// char bcad pa la ni dri ma med
11b1(rgyud): pa'i chu'i sbyin lugs bya'o// sprin bskyed pa la ni klu bris nas bdug pas bdug par bya'o// sprin pa shig pa la ni rdo rje namakha'i spyan gyis so// chu med pa'i phyogasu shin tu bsil ba'i chu'i tshigs
11b2(rgyud): rtag tu 'byung ba la ni rdo rje klu'i phyag rgyas so// gter thams cad shes par bya ba la ni snod du chu blugs par bya'o// gter thams cad brko bA la ni rdo rje mdzor gyi so// gter thams cad rnyed pa la ni
11b3(rgyud): rdorje nor gyis so// rgyal srid thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya so// sa'i bdag por bya ba la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgyaso// dkyil 'khor thams
11b4(rgyud): cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya so// phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gis phyag rgyas so// dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rab tu dga' ba'i
11b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i phyag rgyas so// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje snyoms pa'i lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas so// ma grub pa thams cad grub par ston pa la ni rdo rje grub pa'i phyag
11b6(rgyud): rgyas so// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyas so// rdo rje thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog gis phyag rgyaso// byang chub sems dpa'
11b7(rgyud): thams cad sgrub pa la ni thugs kyi rdo rjes so// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid sgrub pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen pos so// sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas so// 
11b8(rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig thams cad kyi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// 
12a1(rgyud): / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par sgrub pa zhes bya
12a2(rgyud): ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gsungs te/ rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// don gcig pa nyid kyi phyir don gyi
12a3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid kyi phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// thams cad la
12a4(rgyud): rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyi phyir thams cad mnyam pa nyid ma dngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni byang chub chen po'o// lag na rdo rje gang la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po
12a5(rgyud): 'di dag nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad la spyod kyang byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par
12a6(rgyud): 'das par 'gyuraro// de nas de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pa'i don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing bzhin 'dzum pa dang bcas te/ 
12a7(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di gsungaso// aHde nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'dus par mdzad nas bcom ldan
12a8(rgyud): 'das kyi phyogs thams cad du rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs pa dang / sems dpa' chen po brgyad phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyogs brgyad du bzhad pa
12b1(rgyud): chen pos pazhad cing bzhugaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams dang kyis rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis sto pa zhes bya ba
12b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kho na nyid rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig chen po 'di gsung so// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du phyi'i
12b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbusu mig gsum gyi 'khor lo bris nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zad kar sna tshogs pad+ma rab tu gnas pa'i de 'khor lo'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
12b4(rgyud): brtag pa chen po sa la sogs pa las byas pa bzhi'o// de'i phyogs thams cad dus la sogs pa las byas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa brgyad bzhag gam bri bar bya'o// de nas
12b5(rgyud): tshon gyi thig le rnams kyi dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo la bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bcas pa bri bar bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi
12b6(rgyud): dang / mtshams rnams byang chub sems dpa' brgyad ji lta ba bzhin bzhag nas bum pa gang ba bzhi sgra rnamasu dgod par bya'o// byang chub kyi mtshan ma rnams bzhog par bya ste/ shar nas brtsams
12b7(rgyud): te ne'u sing sa dang bcas pa'i dum bu dang / ro drug gis yongasu gang zhing dbyig dang / gser dang / rin po che dang / gos la sogs pas yongasu bkang ba'i snod dang / 'jam zhing shin tu bde
12b8(rgyud): ba'i stan dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dgod do// de nas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs dgang de// de nas de bzhin du gos gyon la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcing
13a1(rgyud): nas zhugs na/ bdag nyid slob dpon med par yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs par 'gyuraro// de nas brtsams te de bzhin gshegs
13a2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rtog pa dang / dngos grub thams cad la mi tshugs pa dang / mi sod pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba 'thob par 'gyuraro// de nas slob ma yang de bzhin du gzhug/ zhugs nas
13a3(rgyud): rdo rje rtse lnga pa byin la rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba yang sbyin par bya'o// de nas dam tshig 'di dag bya bar bsgo bar bya'o// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bstan pa thams cad srung ba'i phyir// rnam
13a4(rgyud): par mi rtog sbyor ba yis// ci bder ba ni thams cad kyis zhes bya'o// de nas mtshan ma bzhi 'byor pa ji lta bas skal pa ji lta ba bzhin du sbyin par bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i dkyil
13a5(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa ni ras ris la bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad 'bum pa dang bcas shing de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin par bya'o// 
13a6(rgyud): gzhan thams cad ni dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bya'o// de nas de bzhin du sems dpa' mchog sgrub pa dang / dngos grub mchog rnams kyang de bzhin no// gzhan yang ras la bcom ldan
13a7(rgyud): 'das dpa' bo gcig pu bris te/ 'di'i mdun du rdo rje'i tshig gis bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas ye shes kyi khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pas mtshan mo thog thag bzlas na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
13a8(rgyud): pa 'thob cing dngos grub thob pa'i byang chub sems dpar 'gyur la/ de nas de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa tsam nyid kyis las rnam
13b1(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa la ni ji snyed pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i bde ba thams cad phul ba so// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
13b2(rgyud): thams cad mchod pa la ni bdag phul bso// dkon mchog gsum mchod pa la ni me tog la sogs pa la bzlas paso// sems can thams cad mchod pa la ni thams cad la byams pa'i
13b3(rgyud): bzlas paso// chos thams cad bsdu ba la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshig bzhi po gdon paso// bdud thams cad 'dul ba la ni brtan zhing nges pa'i bzlas paso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
13b4(rgyud): cad kyi dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rkyen thams cad dbul zhing rang nyid bcings paso// chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rjeHpad+ma la lta bso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na
13b5(rgyud): nyid dngos grub thob pa la ni rdo rje las kyi mchog gi so// sangs rgyas nyid rab tu thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyi de kho na nyid kyi phyag rgya chen pos so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod
13b6(rgyud): ba'i dmachog gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'o rgyal po rdzog so// / de nas ma rus pa thams cad 'dul
13b7(rgyud): bde bzhin gshegs pa shAHthub pas kyang yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par rgyal ba bsdu ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di gsungs te/ 'dod chags kyi
13b8(rgyud): rnam pa med pa nyid kyis zhe sdang gi sus pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi smos pa med pa nyid kyi gti mug gi smos pa med pa nyid do// gti mug gi smos pa med pa nyid kyis chos thams cad kyi smos pa med
14a1(rgyud): pa nyid do// chos thams cad byi smos pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa smos pa med pa nyid du rig par bya'o// lag na rdo rje gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ 
14a2(rgyud): pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / skom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang ngan song du skye bar mi 'gyur ro// 
14a3(rgyud): myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos nyid 'di'i don rgya cher ston cing / 'jig rten gsum/ 
14a4(rgyud): las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bcings la/ khro gnyer dang bcas shing sprin ma bteg te 'bar bar blta ba lA pad+ma'i gdong khro zhing dgod de/ 
14a5(rgyud): mche ba gcig nas rkang pa g.yas pa bskum pa'i tshul gnas pas gnas nas/ rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// hUM de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis 'jig
14a6(rgyud): rten gsum po thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po rnams yang dag par bkug ste ltung bar mdzad nas dkyil 'khor du bcug nas rnam par rgyal
14a7(rgyud): bar mdzad bcings te dbang du byas nas btul zhing rjes su btul te bslangs nas yang dam tshig gis bcings nas 'jig rten gsum gyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po chung ma dang bcas pa
14a8(rgyud): zhabs gnyis su pa banas mnon pa mdzad do// de nas de rnams kyis 'jig rten gsum po thams cad du sgra chen po bsgrags te/ kye rdo rje 'chang chen po yongs su slob par mdzad cig / bdag cag
14b1(rgyud): rnams ma gzir cig/ 'dir khyod la bdag skyabs su mchi'o// dam tshig dang bka' bsgo ba yang sgrub par bgyi'o// ma mo thams cad kyang btul zhing dam la rtags nas dkyil 'khor yang rnam par
14b2(rgyud): ba shig ste/ phyag rgya thams cad dang / dam tshig kyang dral zhing rnam par bshig pa dang / gdon thams cad kyang bzlog cing nad thams cad dang / rims thams cad dang / gnod pa dang / dug dang / ngan
14b3(rgyud): 'gro rnams dral cing rnam par bshig pas sgra chen po sgrogs shing 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs par byed pa'i tshig rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das nyid la skyabs su song ngo // // bcom
14b4(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis kyang zhal rnam par bzhad pas de rnams dkyil 'khor du bcug ste/ dam tshig gis bcings nas rdo rje rin chen gyis dbang bskur nas rang gi mtshan ma rnams rdo/ 
14b5(rgyud): rjes byin gyis brlabs te rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba yang rjes su stsal nas sems can ma lus pa'i don du phyi'i rje/ 'i rigs su rab tu bzhag go// de nas rdo rje khro ba'i rdo rje las
14b6(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje dang 'dra ba'i dngos po'i bdag nyid can kha dog dang / rgyan dang / mtshon cha rnam pa sna tshogs pa bsnams pa rnam par 'gyur ba'i rdo rje'i mche ba gtsigs pa/ tshems kyis sgros gnon pa/ 
14b7(rgyud): smin ma mi bzad cing khro gnyer bsnyer ba/ spyan dang / dbu skra dang / ag tsom 'bar ba/ zhal 'jigs pa/ rdo rje lcags kyu dang / zhags pa dang / mtshon cha mda' dang / dbyig pa dang / ral gri
14b8(rgyud): dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / gri rings dang / chu gri phyag na bsnams pa/ khro bo chen po hUM mdzad las phyung ste/ bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhugs so// lha la
15a1(rgyud): sogs pa de rnams kyang rang gi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs nas phyi'i dkyil 'khor du bzhag go// gdon la sogs pa de dag kyang dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol na gan so// 
15a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs rje chen po'i thabs kyi khro bo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas khams gsum po mtha' dag las rnam
15a3(rgyud): par rgyal ba rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba// 'dul
15a4(rgyud): ba chen po 'dul byed pa'o// dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor ba yis // phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang gis 'kho da ra lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dag dang mtshungs// de yi
15a5(rgyud): dbus su khro bo che// phyag na rdo rje bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas phra/ nga la sogs pas spras// ud po la sngon po'i mdog 'dra ba// zhal ni cung zad mche ba gtsigs// khros bcas bzhad
15a6(rgyud): pa'i zhal mnga' ba// g.yon brkyang ba yis logs bzhugs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad bsdus pa'o// g.yon gyi zhabs kyis legs mnan pa// de yi bya ba dbang phyug che// g.yas ni dka' thub bzlog pa yi// nu
15a7(rgyud): ma'i steng du rab tu 'jog/ 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// sa sogs bcas pa'i khams rnams kyis// khro bo kun tu bzhag par bya// 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od ldan pa// 'khor lo de'ang
15a8(rgyud): mkhas pa yis// 'bar phreng 'khrigs pa'i 'od can bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs rnams so// khro bo'i mtshan ma bzhi po ni// gzhu dang mnga' dang ral gri dang // 'khor lo de
15b1(rgyud): bzhin rtse gsum sbed // sgo rnams kun tu bri bar bya// phyi ro la gnas pa'i gdon rnams mi/ sna tshogs gtor mas bkang ba dang // bdang sngon po dril btags shing // tshe mo kha dog sna tshogs pa'o// de nas 'drir lagru
15b2(rgyud): pa la ni yan lag thams cad ras sngon bzung gis g.yogs shing khros pas rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang bcas par 'dzin par gyur pas zhugs na bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon du byin gyis
15b3(rgyud): rlob par mdzad do// de nas brtsams te sdig pa las rnam par grol zhing mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / mu stegs thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang / phan 'dogs nus shing thams cad las rgyal ba
15b4(rgyud): dang / dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas skyob ma de bzhin du bcug la snying po byin te dkyil 'khor thams cad du'ang bya'o// de nas rdo rje rnon po rtse bzhi pa 'pha
15b5(rgyud): ba byin la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas// rje brtul zhugs sbyin par bya// 'di ni gdug pa 'dul byed pa'i// phyag na rdo rdo rje ste// ma rungs pa thams cad
15b6(rgyud): 'dul ba la// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de nas de bzhin du bya'o// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa ni ras la bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i dbang phyug byas la// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi
15b7(rgyud): gas kyang sems dpa' chen po thams cad bya'o// phyogs thams cad du ni lha la sogs pa dang / ma mo rnams bri bar bya ste/ de nas sgrub pa chen po la yang de bzhin te/ de bzhin du dngos grub mchog
15b8(rgyud): rnams la ni ras la bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba bzhin du byas nas de'i mdun du lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings te bzlas brjod 'bum bya'o// de nas yi ge hUM tsam gyis 'jig rten dang 'jig
16a1(rgyud): rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// ma bsgrubs par yang las thams cad dang / de bzhin du thams cad rjes su chags par yang bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / 
16a2(rgyud): bcing ba dang / dgrol ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / lkugs par bya ba dang / rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid med par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / ltung ba dang / bdeg pa dang
16a3(rgyud): bsad pa dang / gso bar bya ba la sogs pa'ang lan cig bzlas pas byed par 'gyur ro// thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo mthar byed kyis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni khro bo'i lta ba'i
16a4(rgyud): bzlas pas so// thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje khros pas/ gzhig par bya'o// thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje dang khros pas phyogs der brdeg par bya'o// gdon
16a5(rgyud): thams cad dbug pa la ni rdo rje phra mo 'bigs byed kyis so// thams cad kyi snying 'byin pa la ni khros pa'i yid kyis dbyung bar bya'o// gdug pa thams cad tshar bcad pa la ni khros
16a6(rgyud): pas rdo rje bskor bar bya'o// gdug cing khros pa dag pa la ni khros pas lcags phye'i sbyin sreg gos so// bdud thams cad brlag pa la ni rang gi sa bon gyi sbyin sreg gis so// gnod sbyin thams cad bskrad
16a7(rgyud): pa la ni he ha zhes dgod cing bzlas pas so// klu thams cad gdon pa la ni rdo rjes la rdebs shing bzlas pas so// lha rnams ltung bar bya ba la ni/ lha mo rdo rje lhung byed kyis so// lha'i bdag po thams
16a8(rgyud): cad dbang du bya ba dang / 'dul ba dang / bsnun pa dang / gsod pa dang / dul bar bya ba la ni snyed pa gsum po gdul bar byed pas so// rnam thos sras rjes su 'brang bar bya ba la ni rnam thos sras mnan nas
16b1(rgyud): khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// lus ngan po mnan nas dpal dbrog pa la ni rdo rje skyes bus so// 'dod pa'i lha dbang du bya ba la ni 'dod pa'i lha'i mdun du khros pas bzlas brjod bya'o// tshangs pa ltung / 
16b2(rgyud): bar bya ba la ni rdo rje rab tu dga' ba'i phyag rgyas so// khyab 'jug gzhig pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo dral bas so// dbang phyug chen po 'dul ba la ni rdo rje tri shul dral bas so// ma mo thams cad bsang
16b3(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i tshogs kyi srin mos so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / chos dang / gsang ba'i ngongos grub rnam par gtor zhing rnam par 'jig pa la ni rdo rje khri/ 
16b4(rgyud): bo'i gdug pa'i dam tshig 'jigs par byed pas so// ri dang / shing dang / khyim dang / gtsug lag khang dang / grong khyer dang / mchod rten dang / lha'i khang pa dang / skyes pa
16b5(rgyud): dang / bud med dang / glang po dang bcas pa'i rta la sogs/ pa thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i lta bas mig la reg pas so// ltung ba thams cad bslang ba la ni
16b6(rgyud): khro bo bslang bas so// thams cad spo ba la ni rdo rje khros pa'i rnal 'byor mas so// thams cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur dang dbrog pas so// 'jigs pa thams cad bskyed pa la ni rdo rje
16b7(rgyud): khro bo'i lta bas so// dpung thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gnod sbyin mos so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / gnon pa dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / long bar bya ba dang / rgyas
16b8(rgyud): gdab pa dang / bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo ma rungs pa'i srin mos so// rgyal po la sogs pa mi chen po thams cad bsad pa la ni dong ka'i shing la rang gi khrag gi sbyin sreg byas pas so// lha thams/ 
17a1(rgyud): cad gzhig pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan phur bus btab pas so// lha'i bdag po thams cad sreg pa la ni lha thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi yam shing gis so// 8
17a2(rgyud): gi khrag gi rgyun 'bab pas sa thams cad nub par bya ba la ni rdo rje khro bo sa 'og gi phyag rgyas so// khams gsum thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas so// 'jig rten gsum po
17a3(rgyud): thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog gi rdo rje'i khro bos so// khams gsum thams cad dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 
17a4(rgyud): nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so// khams gsum po thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba/ dang / dgug pa dang / gzhugs pa dang / bcing ba dang / rgyas
17a5(rgyud): gdab pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gnon par bya ba dang / sgrub pa la ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dam tshig gi khro bos so// bde pa chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen
17a6(rgyud): po las khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob
17a7(rgyud): pas yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di gsungs te/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam
17a8(rgyud): par dag pa nyid kyis kyang 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid kyis 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// chos
17b1(rgyud): thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na sems can thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// shes pa thams cad rnam par dag pas 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par
17b2(rgyud): 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / skom pa de 'dod chags dang dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+mo
17b3(rgyud): lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / blo bur gyi nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
17b4(rgyud): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub se dmas dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dang dang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid yang rgya chen por ston cing
17b5(rgyud): bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul le/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed/ pas 'dod chags la sogs pa'i dri mas mi gos pa la lta zhing 'gro ba thams cad kyi phyir pad+ma'i gzugs
17b6(rgyud): sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// hI de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis pad+ma chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i gzugs brnyan thams cad/ bcom ldan
17b7(rgyud): 'das dang 'dra ba'i pad+mas mtshan ma'i gzugs can nges pas byung nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi rim pa dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs par gyur to// 
17b8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug chos thams cad la gzigs pa'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs nas
18a1(rgyud): / 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba'i nang du gnyis pa ni zur bzhi pa las de bzhin du sgo dang mtshams su
18a2(rgyud): bcas pa bri'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul du thig bzhi thig btab pa la tshon dmar pos pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri bar bya'o// de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das dgod par bya'o// de'i
18a3(rgyud): mdun du bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po chags pa sku mdog dmar po pad+ma'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ pad+ma chen po dang / mda' dang gzhu bsnams pa/ g.yas su bcom ldan 'das pad+ma chen po'i gtum
18a4(rgyud): po dbang phyug dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs 'dzin pa gzha dag par bya'o// rgyab tu pad+ma chen po khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog nag po gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du pad+ma
18a5(rgyud): chen po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa sku mdog dkar po bzhag par bya'o// g.yas kyi mtsha/ mas su pad+ma chen po sa 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mtsham
18a6(rgyud): gnyis par pad+ma chen po rgya mtsho chu lha'i gzugs 'dzin pa bzhag par bya'o// gsum par pad+ma chen po nyi ma'i gzugs can gzhog par bya'o// bzhi par pad+ma chen po rlung gi gzugs 'dzin
18a7(rgyud): pa bzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams rnams su// shrI hI gI d+hi la mo bzhi gzhag par bya ste/ thams cad kyang g.yas na rang gi mtshan ma 'dzin pa/ g.yon pa pad+ma 'dzin par
18a8(rgyud): byaste/ sgo rnams su ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ bud med kyi gzugs dang / sbrul gyi gzugs
18b1(rgyud): dang / phag gi gzugs dang / pad+ma'i gzugs bya'o// de nas gos dkar po bgos te/ gos dkar pos gdong g.yogs la pad+ma chen po'i phyag rgya chen po me tog dang bcas par bcings te zhugs la
18b2(rgyud): me tog dor bar bya ste/ gang du babs pa de des bsgrubs par bya'o// de nas pad+ma blangs la pad+ma'i ming gi dbang bskur bar dbang bskur la 'di skad ces brjod par bya zhing pad+ma'i 'dab ma la blta
18b3(rgyud): bar bya ste/ ji ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ tshon gyis nyes pas mi gos te/ 'dam gyi nang na dag pa ltar// 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs de bzhin// de ltar chos rnams bsgom na ni// blo ldan nyon
18b4(rgyud): mongs bcas gyur kyang // nyon mongs kun las rnam grol nas// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob 'gyur// zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di la gzigs pas de bzhin gsheg
18b5(rgyud): pa thams cad dbang phyug nyid thob par 'gyur te/ de nas/ bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug ces mtshan btags so// de nas brtsams te bdag nyid kyi dngos po
18b6(rgyud): thams cad shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / so shing dngos grub thams cad byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du rjes su myong bar 'gyur zhing myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'thob par 'gyur te/ slob ma
18b7(rgyud): gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no// ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa la ni de bzhin du ras kyi ri mo gnyis kyis dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas ma bsgrubs kyang
18b8(rgyud): thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni pad+ma la lan stong bzlas te sbyin par bya'o// thams cad bsad pa la ni pad+ma chen po'i khro bo'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad rmongs par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen
19a1(rgyud): po phag gis so// nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po rnam par gzigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgyas so// sa thams cad kyi bdag por bya ba la ni/ 
19a2(rgyud): sa la dkyil mo dkrungs bcas pas bzlas brjod 'bum byas nas mthar mtshan mo thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o// chu thams cad dbab pa la ni klu bris nas de'i steng du 'dug nas bzlas brjod 'bum
19a3(rgyud): bya'o// thams cad snang bar bya ba la ni mun par nyi ma chen po'i 'od kyis so// rlung thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po rlung gi mchog gis// 
19a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogaso// / 
19a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams/ gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba las byung ba ye shes
19a6(rgyud): kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa la ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// nor sbyin pa ni ra ba thams
19a7(rgyud): cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ro// zang zing sbyin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur/ 
19a8(rgyud): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum pa dang bcas te rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po ches dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba 'ching zhing don yod pa 'ang
19b1(rgyud): nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// b+h+rUM de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi rin po che de la thams cad dbang bcun
19b2(rgyud): ba la sogs pa yo byad dang gter thams cad byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs nyid kyis zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
19b3(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa nor bu rin po che'i dam tshig
19b4(rgyud): ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khorar ni dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du byas pa'i nang du ri na po che zur brgyad pa/ rin po che'i ka ba brgyad la gnas pa/ 
19b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul las rin po che'i lcug mas yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje rin che'i ra bcog dang / ma~M/ tog gi phreng / ba dan dang / gdugs dang / rnga yab kyis
19b6(rgyud): nye bar mdzes par bya'o// de'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das rta'i khro la bzhugs pa dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba rang nyid 'ching bar mdzad tsang zhal rnam par bzhad cing margad kyi mdog can gzhag par
19b7(rgyud): bya'o// de'i mdun du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i rin po che zhes bya ba'i rdo rje rin po che'i cod pan 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// g.yas su rin
19b8(rgyud): po che chen po'i nor sbyin pa dbyig gi gter 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// rgyab tu chos chen po'i rin po che'i glegs bam 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// g.yon du rin po che chen po ro myang ba zas
20a1(rgyud): dang skom thams cad 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// mtshams rnams su mchod pa'i lha mo rnams rin po che'i gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / rnga dang / srog shing rnams
20a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol gyi mtshams su bum pa gang pa rnams so// sgo rnams su dbang bskur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma rnams gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol du ni gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan
20a3(rgyud): dang / ba dan dang / bla re rnams kyis kun tu khyab par byas so// de nas de bzhin tu rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas zhugs nas/ de nas btsams te nor thams cad 'grub pa la sogs pa'i
20a4(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas zhugs na/ ngos kyang dbang bskur ba'i phreng ba bcings te rin po che blangs nas rin po che'i ming gi dbang bskur bas ni bskur la sbyin pa
20a5(rgyud): thams cad phul nas slar dbyung bar bya'o// slob ma gzhu ga pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yang de bzhin no// rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin
20a6(rgyud): no// de nas ma bsgrubs par dbang bskur ba thams cad 'thob pa la ni rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng bas so// bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa la ni nyin re zhing nyi ma 'char kar
20a7(rgyud): bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byas so// chos thams cad kyi don shes pa la ni dri ma med pa'i nam mkha' la blta zhing bzlas brjod bya'o// zas dang skom thams cad sogs pa dang / ro thams cad
20a8(rgyud): thob par bya ba la ni na mkha' las yid la 'dod pa bzhin du nyin re zhing bcom ldan 'das kyi bzlas brjod stong byas pas so// shin tu mthon po thob par bya ba la ni gdugs bzung nas bzlas brjod
20b1(rgyud): 'bum bya'o// rnam par rgyal ba chen po thob pa la ni rin chen rgyal mtshan mchog gis so// grags pa dang snyan pa chen po mchog dang ming thob par bya ba la ni nyin re zhing kha thams cad du bltas nas bzlas
20b2(rgyud): pabya'o// bdag po chen po thob pa la ni rin po che'i srog shing gi phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i
20b3(rgyud): dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
20b4(rgyud): kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rtags pa sa yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab
20b5(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin ga shegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ro// de bani
20b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni chos thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa ni ting nge 'dzin
20b7(rgyud): thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni lus dang / ngag dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/ 
20b8(rgyud): su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bog pa dang / sgom pa des dngogra thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 
21a1(rgyud): shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rje rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
21a2(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pas don gyi gnas 'di
21a3(rgyud): rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rjes zhing rdo rjes pa'i phyag rgya thams cad dngos grub kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs so// a/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin
21a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa sems can thams da bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya thams cad kyis rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa
21a5(rgyud): thams cad la sogs pa dngos grub mchog gi rgyus rgyas pa dab bo// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khu tshur gyis yang sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje thams cad las phyag rgya
21a6(rgyud): chen po la sogs pa phyag rgya thams cad kyi dam tshig sems dpa' phyung nas kyang dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis gzhugs par gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa
21a7(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen na
21a8(rgyud): gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor dang po'i sbyor bas bris la nang du rdo rje'i thig gi 'khor lo bri'o// de bzhin du de'i dbus su dkyil 'khor brgyad par thig btab la/ dbus su bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
21b1(rgyud): khu tshur phyag gnyis dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings pa zhal rnam par bzhad pa gzhago// de'i mdun du rdo rje sku'i mchog ces bya ba rdo rje bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o// g.yas su rdo rje ljags zhes bya ba rdo/ 
21b2(rgyud): sgo'i mchog 'dzin pa'o// rgyab tu ting nge 'dzin rdo rje zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin pa'o// g.yon du rdo rje rdo rje zhes bya ba bsnyems par 'dzin pa'o// shar lha'i mtshams su phyag rgya'i khu chur zhes bya ba dang / 
21b3(rgyud): gnyis pa la ni nor gyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / gsum pa la ni chos kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / bzhi pa la ni las kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba dang / rang gi phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang 'dzin par bya'o// 
21b4(rgyud): sgo rnams su ni rdo rje bsnyems ma la sogs pa'i phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams bri bar bya'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya yongasu bzung la rang nyid zhugs nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi slob dpon
21b5(rgyud): tu 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad don/ yod par 'thob par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya thams cad kyi/ ye shes kyi dbang phyug tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
21b6(rgyud): byang chub tu myur bar mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// der zhugs nas phyag rgya bcing ba bcom ldan 'das la bslab pa bya zhing rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur bas bskur la 'di skad brjod par
21b7(rgyud): bya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan lta bur sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun zhes bya bar bsgrags// dam tshig dngos grub kun ster ba'o// slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no// phyag rgya thams
21b8(rgyud): cad kyi dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams kyang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs pa'i las rnams kyang de bzhin no// phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba sgrub pa la ni snying khar rdo rje'i khu tshur
22a1(rgyud): kyis so 'phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdorje chen po'i khu tshur gyis so// dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa lan rdo rje 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sems camams su chags par byub la ni chags
22a2(rgyud): pa chen po'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bsdam par bya ba la ni rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi khu
22a3(rgyud): tshur gyis so// thams cad lkugs par bya ba la ni rdo rje zhal zhal gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad btsir ba la ni rdo rje bsdam pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad bsad pa la ni rdo rje khro bo'i khu tshur gyis// thams
22a4(rgyud): cad bza' ba la ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi khu tshur gyis so// thams ca du gzhig pa la ni rdo rje nges par 'tshir ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad dral ba la ni rdo rje dral ba'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad
22a5(rgyud): dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// thams/ cad gar byed du gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi khu tshur gyi/ sa so// thams cad smrar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje brdung ba'i khu
22a6(rgyud): tshur gyis so// thams cad rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje dmigs pa'i khu tshur gyis so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad lkugs pa dang / 'phye bor bya ba la ni rdo rje chen po'i phye ba'i khu tshur gyis so// 
22a7(rgyud): phyag rgyas thams cad dgrol ba la ni rdo rje thar pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag
22a8(rgyud): rgya dbye ba la ni hUM mdzad kyi rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad rdo rjer bya ba la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje ma
22b1(rgyud): me'i lu dur gyis so// thams cad bye mar bya ba la na rdo rje bzang po'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad rnam par gzhig pa lan rdo rje gdug pa'i khwa chung gyis so// thams cad gcig pa dang / rnam par gnos/ 
22b2(rgyud): pa la ni dbang po'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// chu'i nang du gnas shing 'chags pa la ni rdo rje gnon pa'i khu tshur gyiso// gzugs mang por ston pa la ni rdo rje sna tshogs pa rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so// mi snang ba'i dngos grub
22b3(rgyud): la ni mi snang ba'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba'i dngos po rnams 'byung ba la ni na mkha'i khu tshur gyis so// na mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje bsdams pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rig pa 'dzin
22b4(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje ral gri'i khu tshur gyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje la ngas kyi khu tshur gyis so// thams cad mkhyen pa grub pa la ni rdo
22b5(rgyud): ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so// nor thams cad kyi dngos grub la ni/ rdo rje nor gyi khu tshur gyis so// phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag/ po nyid la ni rdo rje phyag rgya'i khu tshur gyis so// las thams cad
22b6(rgyud): kyi dngos grub la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi khu tshur gyis so// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub pa la ni rdo rje 'dzin pa'i khu tshur gyis so// rang nyid 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar gyi dngos grub rnams ston
22b7(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje lcags kyu mchog gi khu tshur gyis so// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid la ni rdo rje bsnyems pa'i khu tshur gyis so// sangs rgyas nyid la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i khu tshur gyis so// bde ba
22b8(rgyud): chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
23a1(rgyud): chos thams cad smos pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i/ 
23a2(rgyud): tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
23a3(rgyud): yongs su dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di rgya cher ston zhing bzhin 'dzum bzhin du ral gri des de bzhin
23a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di gsungs so// a de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus
23a5(rgyud): pa mdzad nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis bzhug so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa chos thams ca/ da ngo bo nyid med pas spros pa med pa'i ral gri zhes bya ba'i ting nge
23a6(rgyud): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta bu'i nang du 'khor lo bris la/ a la sogs pa'i yi ge 'phreng
23a7(rgyud): ba go rims bzhin du bri bar bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor brgyad pa'i tshul gyis thig btab la de'i lte ba la bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nu gzhon nu'i cha lugs 'chang zhing 'dzum
23a8(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa na mkha'i mdog can phyag bzhi dang / ral gris de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs par bzhag par bya'o// de'i mdun la sogs par de bzhin gshegs pa'i
23b1(rgyud): / sru mas bzhag par bya'o// bya'i mtshams rnams su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzhi lung ji ltar rdzob pa bzhin du gzhag par bya'o//  rnams sa ni mtshan ma bzhi gnag par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ ra grI/ 
23b2(rgyud): dang mdung dang / lhung bzed dang / glegs bam rnams so// de nas ral gri dang / glegs bam gyi phyag rgya de bzhin du chos kyi slob dpon du byin gyis brlab po// de nas ral gri blangs te ral gri'i mi
23b3(rgyud): gi dbang bskur bas dbang bskur la chos 'di bshad par bya ste/ ral gri 'di ni rtag zung la// shes rab tshul ni dkar smra zhing // na mkha' sangs rgyas sbyor ba yis// 'debs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur
23b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas bstan pasrung phyir dang / sems can mang po srung ra ba'i phyir// 'dis bsad sdig par mi 'gyur zhing // bso ngang nams dag kyang thob par 'gyur// slob ma rnams la'ang de/ 
23b5(rgyud): bzhin te// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs/ pa'i dngos grub rnams kyis myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
23b6(rgyud): rgya bar 'gyur ro// chos kyi dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa'ang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs par yang de bzhin du las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ba ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni thams cad na mkha'/ 
23b7(rgyud): bsgoms pas so// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni mtshan ma dang bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin bsgoms paso// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa la ni smon pa med pa bsgoms pas so// 
23b8(rgyud): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i chos kyi ye shes 'thob pa la ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas so// nyon mongs pa thams cad gcod pa la ni chos bsgoms pas so// yi ge thams
24a1(rgyud): cad kyi nges pa'i tshig gi ye shes la ni spros pa med pa'i ye shes bsgoms pas so// gnas thams cad du yi ges chos kyi bya ba mthong ba la ni/ a la sogs pa'i yi ge'i ngo bo nyid
24a2(rgyud): bsgoms pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub pa thob pa la ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig rtog pa'i rgyal po las 'khor lo chen po ltar
24a3(rgyud): yi ge bskor ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus pa'i de bzhin
24a4(rgyud): gshegs pas yang 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa
24a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// don gyi mnya/ ma pa nyid la 'jug pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sem/ sa dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo 'jug par 'gyur ro// chos thams
24a6(rgyud): cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyur ro// thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug par 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub
24a7(rgyud): sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chos nyid kyi don 'di rgya cher ston cing bzhin rab tu 'dzum nas rdo rje 'khor lo bskor zhing rdo rje 'khor lo thams cad la 'jug pa'i dam
24a8(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po can khams gsum tu gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor
24b1(rgyud): thams cad du zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dam tshig gi sems dpa' rnams nges par byung nas dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du bzhug so// 
24b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje khro bo 'khor lo thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad
24b3(rgyud): du 'jug pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba bzhin du byas te/ nang gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje 'khor lo bris la/ dbus su rdo rje'i
24b4(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor ba bzhag par bya'o// phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rnam pa thams cadu du dkyil 'khor dang po'i tshul du gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i
24b5(rgyud): mtshams rnams su rdo rje'i rig kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bri bar/ bya'o// sgo rnams su mtshan ma bzhi gzhag par bya/ ste/ 'di lta ste/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sku dang / rdo rje khro bo'i
24b6(rgyud): sku dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi sku dang / nam mkha'i snying po'i sku rnams so// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du dkyil 'khor thams cad du sangs rgyas nyid dang / rdo rje
24b7(rgyud): 'dzin pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor lo blangs la 'khor lo'i ming gi dbang bskur ba ni gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi thig btab pa'i rigs rnams su 'jug par bya'o// slob
24b8(rgyud): ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa yang de bzhin no// ma bsgrubs par yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los gter rang gi khar
25a1(rgyud): bcug la bzhag par bya'o// dkyil 'khor chen por 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor lo chen pos so// de bzhin du phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
25a2(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas so// de bzhin du dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni dam tshig chen po'i la lo// las kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi 'khor los so// de bzhin du
25a3(rgyud): rjes su chags par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / don thob pa dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bcad pa dang / 'jug pa dang / mchod pa dang / gdug pa 'dul ba'i las rnams la ni sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi
25a4(rgyud): phyag rgya g.yon na 'khor lo dang byas pa rnams kyis so// bde ba ni ngan po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba
25a5(rgyud): rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// // de nas brtse/ ma ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lam/ chod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa snod kyis mchod pa thams cad
25a6(rgyud): kyi mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// sems can gyi khams
25a7(rgyud): thams cad yongs su skyob pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o/ 
25a8(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems pa dang / sgom pa dang / mchod
25b1(rgyud): pa byed pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mamakha'i mdzod don de nyid rgyu cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing las
25b2(rgyud): thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di skyeso// oM de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis na mkha' thams cad las mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa/ na mkha'i khams ma lus
25b3(rgyud): par spros par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' na mkha'i mdzod mchod
25b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ti nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje'i mchod pa'i mchog don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di
25b5(rgyud): gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor ji lta ba de bzhin du nang du rin pa cha'i ka ba brgyad byas la/ dbus su bcom ldan 'ad/ sa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa/ zhal 'dzum pa/ sku dang yun
25b6(rgyud): lag zla ba'i mdog la sogs pa'i kha dog lnga pa'i mdog can gzhag par bya'o// de'i phyogs thams cad du dam tshig sems dpa' rnams gzhag par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ phyag na rdo rje dang / 'jig rten
25b7(rgyud): dbang phyug la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' brgyad po// byang chub kyi sems dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang bskur ba dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa dang / stong pa nyid smra ba dang / dkyil 'khor 'dri
25b8(rgyud): ba dang / mchod pa thams cad dang / sems can rnams yongs su skyob pa ni bla na med pa'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa phyag na 'dzin pa'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du gzhag go// phyi'i mtshams rnams su
26a1(rgyud): ni me tog la sogs pa rnams dang / sgo rnams su ni dbyig dang / gser dang / mu tig dang / rin po che ste mtshan ma bzhi bzhag par bya'o// de nas de bzhin du rdo rje thams cad kyis mchod pa
26a2(rgyud): thams cad 'thob par 'gyur ro// zhugs nas sna tshogs rdo rje spangs la/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i ming gi dbang bskur nas mchod pa rnam pa bzhi bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi las thams cad dang / phyag
26a3(rgyud): bya ba dang / ngag dang / yid dang / sems kyis chos kyi dbyings su spros pas mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa thams cad kyis mchod par bya zhing / rdo rje dang phyag rgyas mchod pa gcig tu byas pa'o// slob
26a4(rgyud): ma rnams kyi gzhug pa'i las kyang de bzhin no// las kyi da dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sgrub pa dang / dngos grub dag kyidang de bzhin no// de nas ma bsgrubs par yang byang chub kyi sems
26a5(rgyud): kyi mchod pa la ni rang gi snying khar rdo rje bsgoms pas so// ti 'dzin gyi mchod pa la ni thams cad dag par bsgoms pas so// dbang bskur ba'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje dbang bskur ba
26a6(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis so// phyag rgya'i mchod pa la ni rdo rje thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyis so// stong pa nyid kyi mchod pa ni/ a la sogs pa'i yi ge lung bstan pas so// dkyil 'khor gyi mchod pa la ni 'khor lo
26a7(rgyud): sna tshogs kyis so// mchod pa thams cad la ni sna tshogs rdo rjes so// gdug pa 'dul ba'i mchod pa la ni khro bos so// me tog la sogs pa dor ba la ni bzlas pas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i
26a8(rgyud): dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las sna tshogs rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
26b1(rgyud): pa gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus pas yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa sems can thams cad 'dul ba ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// 
26b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid do// sems can thams cad dul ba nyid pas khro bdul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas khro ba chos nyid do// sems can
26b3(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje nyid bas khro ba rdo rje nyid do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa don de
26b4(rgyud): nyid rgya cher ston te bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag/ rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi rdo rje khro ba'i gdam zhes bya ba snying po 'dis so// ha de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis
26b5(rgyud): gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i sems dpa' rnams baH/ ma ldan 'das rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi thugs las byung ste/ dang po'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du bzhugs so// de nas byang chub
26b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs thams cad kyis 'dul ba khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas gdug pa thams cad 'dul zhing byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i gnod/ 
26b7(rgyud): sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// phyi'i dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de ya nang rim nyid du ni// dkyil 'khor bzang po gru bzhi pa// sgo bzhi pa la thig bzhir ldan// 
26b8(rgyud): mtshon sna lnga yi rnam par bri// ka ba brgyad ni mdun gnas par// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// de yi dbus su ci rigs par// rdo rje gnod sbyin gzhag bya ste// rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa dang // 
27a1(rgyud): / 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// 'jig byed kha dog sngo ba dang // ha ha zhes bzhad gsal ba'i zhal// de yi kun tu gnod sbyin ni// shin tu 'jigs pa gzhag par bya// de nyid dang / 
27a2(rgyud): po la sogs mchog/ phyag na rdo rje sogs mtshan 'chang // phyi yi dkyil 'khor mtshams su ni// mche ba'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// sgo yi gnas ni thams cad du// rdo rje'i mtshan ma gzhag par bya// de nas 'jug
27a3(rgyud): pa la sogs pa byung ste// rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang // ha ha zhes bzhad pa dang bcas pas/ zhugs nas gdug pa thams cad 'dul nus shing myur du rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// de nas
27a4(rgyud): zhugs nas rdo rje mche ba blangs la rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur la rdo rjes rdo rje gnod sbyin nyid bsnun no// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi zhal nas ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// 
27a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad srung ba po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje gtum po ra bdag grub pa yin no// zhes shes par bya'o// de nas phyag
27a6(rgyud): rgya thams cad bcing bar bya zhing bsgrub par bya'o// de nas mchod pa la de bzhin du yang dag par tshim par byas nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig brjod la slar dbyung
27a7(rgyud): bar bya'o// de bzhin du phyag rgya bcing ba la sogs pa cho ga rgyas pa ni dang po la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad du bya'o// phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor ro// sgrub pa dang dngos grub rnams/ 
27a8(rgyud): kyang de bzhin te/ ma bsgrubs par yang dang po ci lta ba bzhin no// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgyas so// sems can thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro bas ha ha zhes
27b1(rgyud): dgod cing zlos pas so// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba las lhung bar bya ba la ni chos gos dang / snam sbyar gyi sbyin sreg gis so// dbang bskur ba thams cad dbrog pa/ 
27b2(rgyud): la ni khams thams cad kyi phyi ma'i sbyin sreg gis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad bcad pa la ni gzugs bstan byas nas gtubs pas so// ma rungs
27b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje bzung nas 'jug par bya'o// mchod pa thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni khros nas bzlas brjod bya'o// thams cad skrag par bya ba la
27b4(rgyud): ni 'jigs byed kyi lta bas blta bar bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po las rdo rje dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// 
27b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams/ cad kyi mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas yang chos thams/ cad kyis mchog ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
27b6(rgyud): tshul 'di bshad do// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos
27b7(rgyud): nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams cad las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs
27b8(rgyud): ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas don yod pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces/ 
28a1(rgyud): bya ba'i snying po 'di smras so// hUM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad thugs las byung ste/ dam tshig/ 
28a2(rgyud): gi de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs par gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la nges par btud de dam tshig chen po'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsung so// 
28a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po bris la dkyil 'khor gyi gnas brgyad du rdo rje khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor so sor gzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje dam tshig
28a4(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje na gyi slob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la ste/ mas par zhugs nas dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
28a5(rgyud): tshul du phyi'i dkyil 'khor bris la/ de'i dbus su rdo rje 'khoralo bris nas/ 'khor lo'i gnas rnams su dkyil 'a/ khor chen po la sogs pa bri bar bya'o// thams cad kyang dkyil
28a6(rgyud): 'khor brgyad pa'i thig gis btab cing sems dpa' chen po gzhag par bya'o// phyi'i dkyil 'khor du phyi rol gyi rdo rje rigs ji ltar rjes su 'thun par bri bar bya'o// sgo rnams su ni rigs rnam pa bzhi'i mtshan ma
28a7(rgyud): rnams gzhag par bya'o// de nas dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyi rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga thams cad rgyas par bya'o// dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i de kho na nyid dam tshig
28a8(rgyud): ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las bde ba thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
28b1(rgyud): rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang sems can thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams
28b2(rgyud): tsang kyi'ang bzhin yin pas sems can thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po can no// thams cad rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i sring po can no// ga rnams cad
