28b3(rgyud): rab tu 'byung bas sems can thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no// de nas phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs
28b4(rgyud): rnams kyis ca co'i sgra phyung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje dbang phyug chen po rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// tri de nas dkyil 'khor
28b5(rgyud): bshad par bya ste/ kun nas zlum pa thig gsum pa dkyil 'khor chen po sgra bzhi pa mtshams rnams su mdu gsum pa bri bar bya'o// de'i dbus su dbang phyug chen po hrI
28b6(rgyud): bapar bya'o// de'i logs thams cad du tshogs brgyad po bri bar bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ nag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug dang / dril chen dang / gar gyi dbang phyug rnams su'o// mtshams su ni
28b7(rgyud): thod pa bzang po dang / gtum po'i dbang phyug dang / lag na kha T+wAM ga dang / ba lang rna ba'i dbang phyug dang ngo // thig gi mtshams su ni ma mo'i tshogs thams cad gnas ji lta ba bzhin du bri bar bya/ 
28b8(rgyud): sgo rnams su dbyig pa'i dbang phyug dang / mgo'i dbang phyug dang / dril rna ba dang / drag po chen po'o// phyi rol tu ni 'byung po rnams dang / yi ge rnams bri bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon thal ba gtsang
29a1(rgyud): mas lus bskus zhing gos gtsang ma bgos te/ mdung che gsum gyis mtshan ma gzhag par bya'o// zhugs nas pang snying po bzlas par bya'o// de nas slob ma de bzhin du bcugs/ 
29a2(rgyud): lag par mdung rtse gsum pa byin la chos bshad par bya'o// sems can kun la phan phyir dang // bstan pa thams cad srung phyir dang // 'dod kun bdag po nyid phyir dang // drag po'i las la gnas
29a3(rgyud): par gyis// de nas phyag rgya'i ye shes bslabs te gter ma sbyin par bya'o// de nas brtsams te/ 'jigs pa med par dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyis bde ba dang / yid
29a4(rgyud): bde ba dang / thams cad rjes su myong nas drag po'i 'jig rten du mchod par 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor chen po zhi ba'o// mdung thung gis mtshan ma zhes bya ba'o// de nas ma mo thams cad
29a5(rgyud): kyis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ dang po mgrin cig/ tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bsad pa dang / sgrub pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po
29a6(rgyud): 'di phul lo// b+h+yo/ de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshad par bya'o// zur bzhi pa/ byang gi sgo can gyi dkyil 'khor thig btab la/ dbus su nag po gar byed bzhin pa gzhag par bya'o// de'i phyogs dang
29a7(rgyud): mtshams thams cad du ma mo brgyad bri bar bya'o// 'di lta ste/ drag mo dang / tshangs pa mo dang / khyab 'jug mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / nag mo dang / nag mo chen mo dang / za ba mo dang / srin mo'o// dkyil
29a8(rgyud): 'khor gyi phyi'i mtshams rnams su ni drag po'i mkha' 'gro ma bzhi bri bar bya ste/ zhi ba mo dang / be ru N+ya dang / gtum mo dang / 'jigs byed ma rnams so// de rnams kyi mtshan ma ni mdung rtse gsum pa
29b1(rgyud): dang / phreng ba dang / 'khor lo dang / dril bu dang / thod pa khrag dang bcas pa dang / 'khar sil dang / mche ba dang / kha T+wAM ga'o// sgo srung rnams kyi ni thod pa dang / rus pa'i lu gu rgyud dang / bya rgod dang / 
29b2(rgyud): byi la'o// de nas phyag rgya'i slob dpon chos spyod pa/ gtsang ba/ gos gtsang ma bgos pa thams cad za ba 'am/ thams cad spyad pa la yang sman pa med de/ zhi ba'i pho nya'i phyag rgyas zhugs la snying po
29b3(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi dbus nas b+h+yo chen po thos par 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon ma gtogs pa gzhan thams cad ji ltar 'ongs pa zhugs par 'gyur zhing 'thob par 'gyur te/ 
29b4(rgyud): gdug pa'i dam tshig ni ma gtogs so// de nas slob ma la dag na me tog thogs pas ras kyis mig bkab lan dag po chen po'i phyag rgyas bcug ste/ rnam par dam tshig chen
29b5(rgyud): po b+h+yo zhes bya ba dang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas skrag nas me tog 'dor ro// de nas gang du lhung ba de lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub par bya'o// gal te lhung bar ma gyur na yang 'dor du bzhug/ 
29b6(rgyud): des ni 'jigs par byed par nus shing rnal 'byor yang so sor 'thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gdong g.yogs bkrol la dkyil 'khor bstan par bya'o// gdug pa la sogs pa'i phyag rgyas
29b7(rgyud): mchod nas snying po dang rang rang gi mtshan ma sbyin par bya'o// de nas dam tshig bstan par bya ste/ sems can thams cad rgyas gdab cing // dam tshig sdang rnams bza' bar bya// sngags rnams bstan
29b8(rgyud): par mi bya ste// dam tshig rnal 'byor grub ster bya'o// drag po'i dam tshig mdung rtse dang // ma mo rnams kyi rgyas 'debs par// gal te 'das na khyod kyi snying // rtag tu 'jig par byed par 'gyur/ 
30a1(rgyud): de nas brtsams te gang sha chen po za ba ni de ring po mi thogs par rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur ro// gang za bar mi 'gyur ba de'i rnal 'byor med do// gal te dam tshig las 'das par ma gyur na/ 
30a2(rgyud): tshogs thams cad kyis kyang mi gsod par 'gyur ro// phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya'i gar dang mchod pa byas nas gtor ma sbyin zhing bza' ba dang / btung ba dang / longs spyod la
30a3(rgyud): sogs pas tshim par byas nas phyir byung bar bya'o// dngos grub thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sbrang rtsir byed pa la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis bcom ldan
30a4(rgyud): 'das la phyag 'tshal te mgrin gcig tu rang gi kho nasnying po 'dri phul lo// / de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor bshang por bya ste/ zur bzhi pa dang sgro bzhi par// phyi yi kyi
30a5(rgyud): 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du dkyil 'khor ni// gzhu yi dbyib/ sa can bri bar bya// de yi dbus su ming po ni// mchog/ gsum dag ni bzhag bya ste// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal byed dang / 
30a6(rgyud): don kun grub byed ces bya ba'o// go cha ya lad bgos pa dang // de bzhin thod pa mtshan ma 'dzin// lha yi gos dang phreng ba 'chang // cung zad dgod cing khro ba dang // seng ge'i khri la 'dug pa dang // 'od kyi dkyil
30a7(rgyud): 'khor gyis mdzad pa'o// dngos grub kun ster dag pa ste// gsum ni srid gsum dag dang mtshungs// sgo dang mtshams ni thams cad du// tshogs la sogs pa legs par bzhag/ sgrub dang 'phel
30a8(rgyud): chen gnod sbyin dang // gtum dang khro mchog gsod pa'o// phyi rol ba dan rtse mo la// dril bu'i phreng bcas thams cad du// bum pa gang ba rol mchog bcas// 'byung po ma lus gtor mar bcas
30b1(rgyud): klu rnams glu ru len pa dang // rol mo rdung bar byed pa dang // de bzhin slob dpon gar byed pas// phyag rgya kun gyis 'jug par bya// zhugs nas spun la dad pa yis// yang dang yang du gdung bya zhing // me tog
30b2(rgyud): kun gyis mchod pa yis// sgrub dang de nyid dag kyang brjod// 'jig rten gsum po srong gsum mchog/ ngan song gsum mchod gsum rnam gsum// legs ldan sbas pas grub pa ni// dngos grub kun
30b3(rgyud): la rtag tu'o// de nas snying po lan cig brjod cing phyag rgya thams cad kyi g.yas pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyur byas la dgug par bya'o// de nas dril bu dang bcas pa'i phreng ba rnams g.yo'o// thams
30b4(rgyud): cad phab nas de bzhin du gzhug par bya'o// de nas dmachog 'a de brjod par bya ste/ gal te dam tshig 'das gyur na// pa gsod 'gro ba gang yin dang // ma gsod pa yi 'gro ba
30b5(rgyud): gang // 'gro ba der ni 'gro bar 'gyur// rtag tu dam pa bsten par bya// dam pa min pa yongs su spang // gzhan la de nyid bstan mi bya// rtag tu ming po gsum po sgrub// 'di ni dam
30b6(rgyud): tshig go// de nas glu dang / gar dang / rol mo dang / dgod pa dang / dga' ba dang / za ba dang / mgu bas me la rtse bya'o// phyag rgya dang gar gyi rol mo'i mchod pa yang byas la/ slob dpon gyis kyang
30b7(rgyud): phyag rgya de dang bcas pas byung ba dang / 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i ye shes brjod par bya'o// de nas brtsams te dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / 'byor pa thams
30b8(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di phul lo// hUM de nas 'di'i dkyil 'khor
31a1(rgyud): / bshad par bya ste/ dkyil 'khor kun nas zlum par thig btab la thig bzhi la 'khor lo bzhi pa byas la/ dkyil 'khor de rnams su sgo bzhir lta ba'i lha mo bzhi'i gzugs brnyan
31a2(rgyud): bzhag par bya ste/ 'di lta ste/ dga' ba ni shar du lta ba/ mnga' dang gzhu thogs pa la brtson pa/ sgeg ma mdog dmar ba'o// gsong ma lho phyogs su lta ba/ lag na gri dang phug thogs pa/ mdog nag
31a3(rgyud): la lag sa nub tu lta ba/ lag na gser gyi gter rdzogs pa/ gser gyi mdog can no// grub pa mo// zhib mo zhes bya ba byang du lta ba/ lag na gr-i dang / shaka thogs pa/ mdog dkar mo'o/ 
31a4(rgyud): rol gyi sgo bzhir mtshan ma dgod pa bzhag par bya'o// de na/ des slob dpon dril bu dkrol zhing lag pa g.yon pa khan+ta dag dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas snying po bzla
31a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// de nas phyag rgya dang gar gyi mchod pa btab parabya'o// de nas yid la 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams ca ster bar 'gyur ro// thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ro// 
31a6(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa dang / 'di ni nor rnams kyang bskyed par 'gyur ro// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i thams cad kyis mnyes par byed pa dang / gter
31a7(rgyud): thams cad 'byin pa dang / dngos grub thams cad sgrub nus par 'gyur ro// slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin no// de rnams kyang 'di dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// 
31a8(rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las phyi rol gyi rdo rje'i rigs kyi rtog pa rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' ya/ 
31b1(rgyud): mu med pas mthar thug cing mu med pa'i chos dang ldan pas yang cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pa byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya gshes
31b2(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu
31b3(rgyud): med pa nyid pas rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas las
31b4(rgyud): thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin no// gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'tshang ba dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / 
31b5(rgyud): sgom pa de sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mthar thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te sgrib pa thams cang zad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'am rdo rje 'dzin par
31b6(rgyud): myur du 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du grub par bya ba'i phyir lag na rdo rje la/ legs so zhes
31b7(rgyud): bya ba byin no// sems can chen po legs so legs// bde ba chen po legs so legs// theg pa chen po legs so legs// blo gros chen po legs so legs// cho ga 'di ni legs par smras// sangs
31b8(rgyud): rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje'i mdo 'di'i byin gyis brlabs// cho ga'i rgyal po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams cad
32a1(rgyud): kyis de dag mi song mi tshugs so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dngos grub dam pa thams cad kyang // sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs 'thob par 'gyur/ 
32a2(rgyud): de skad gsungs nas gsang grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par bstod// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi rtog pa
32a3(rgyud): rgyal po chen po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po a tsar+ya shrad d+hA ka ra barma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur
32a4(rgyud): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// de nas btso/ ma ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs/ pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos
32a5(rgyud): thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ rdo rje chos nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dpal mchog dang po thog ma dang tha ma dang
32a6(rgyud): dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chen
32a7(rgyud): po rnams kyi bde bachen po'i dngos grub dam pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po'i dngos
32a8(rgyud): grub dam pa ni bdud chen po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms par byed pa'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa'i dngos grub
32b1(rgyud): dam pa ni/ khams gsum pa thams cad dbang phyug chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi ngos grub dam pa ni sems
32b2(rgyud): can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu de phyir/ 'khor ba la yang ma chags shing / brtson 'grus chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis sems can gyi
32b3(rgyud): khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po'i dngos grub dam par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
32b4(rgyud): cisrid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// ji srid mtshungs med sems can don// ma dang na mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang / 
32b5(rgyud): ye shes gnas su bsgrubs pas ni// chos kun rnam paradag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongasu dag par 'gyur// chags la sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag
32b6(rgyud): bar yang // 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyar phyir// 'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'bul// ji ltar pad+ma rab dmar ba// 'dam gyi nyes pas mi gos pas// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro phan
32b7(rgyud): rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bde ba chen po nor che la// khams gsum dbang phyug thos pas na// sems can don rnams bstan par byed// nang par langs nas dpal mchog
32b8(rgyud): dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgra chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yis bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad
33a1(rgyud): kyang thob par 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang
33a2(rgyud): 'grub ste/ rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po thams cad dam/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ro// bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dpal mchog dang po las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
33a3(rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa'i
33a4(rgyud): rdo rje gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyal po chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thug das kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i don yod cing bstan pa'i cho ga phyag rgya btang
33a5(rgyud): pa'i sku gsung thugs thams cad kyis rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po thams cad la rab tu zhun/ sa nas chos nyid rtogs pa'i ye shes la rab tu zhugs nas/ de
33a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs pa'i phrin las kyis dus gsum du 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus par spros pa las kyi mtha' can de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad chen po// zla ba phyed pa
33a7(rgyud): dum la rab tu gnas pa'i rdo rje rin po che rnams kyi 'od zer sna tshogs pa rnam par 'bar ba'i 'od kyis gsal ba gser gyi dril bu btags pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i ba dan rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyos
33a8(rgyud): bar mdzes par byas pas/ me tog gi phreng ba sna tshogs pa dang / na bza' dang / me long dang / mu tig gi phreng ba rab tu 'phyang bas mdzes shing rgyan pa/ sna tshogs pa'i kha khyer la gnas pa mchog tu gyur
33b1(rgyud): pa'i lha'i bu mo dgod pa dang / sgeg pa dang / gar dang / glu yis rab tu rgyan pa dang / bstod pas sad par byed la/ bde ba chen po rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas gzhal yas khang pa la bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan
33b2(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad dang dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / thams cad
33b3(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams cad mchog tu gyur pa// khams gsum thams cad 'dul bar mdzad pa/ thams cad dbang du byed pa po 'byin pa pa 'dod pa thams cad pa/ rgya che ba'i dngas grub kyi
33b4(rgyud): gathams cad pa/ rtag pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la gos/ la ba btab pa/ ci srid srid pa'i bar gnas pa// de srid/ sems can don mchog mdzod// sems can khams ni mtha' yas
33b5(rgyud): dang rgyal sras srid par 'dod pa'i phyir// srid pa'i skyon na/ sa 'joms phyir dang // bde ba chen po 'phel bya'i phyir/ gsang ba'i rtog pa mchog gsung ba'i// rjes su gnang par
33b6(rgyud): bdag la stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad sgrib pa med pa nyid la lhag par dgongs nas/ gdul bya thams cad thugs rje chen po'i sna tshogs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
33b7(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang / thams cad yongs su bskyang ba dang / phan pa dang / bde/ 
33b8(rgyud): ba dang / dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang / ye shes dang / las dang / mchog gi dngos grub kyi rgyur 'gyur ba'i bar du de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad nyid dang / rdo rje 'chang chen
34a1(rgyud): po thob pa mchog gi dngos grub kyi don bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dngango po de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis sku'i phreng
34a2(rgyud): ba'i cod pan gyis dbang bskur bas yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i bde ba chen po mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa dngos grub thams cad thob par bya ba'i
34a3(rgyud): phyir/ sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrungs bcas te sku drang por srang ste/ g.yon pa snyems pa'i tshul du mdzad nas g.yas pa rdo rje gsor bas rang gi thugs khar dang po'i rdo rje mchog gi sbyor ba 'dzin cing
34a4(rgyud): bde ba chen po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'di nyid/ kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs las 'byung ngo // oM ma hA sa badz+ra satwa dz+ra/ hUM baM ho su ra ta s+t+waM/ de nas byung ba tsam gyis de
34a5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su bzung ba rnams slar yang nga byang chub chen po mngon par rtogs nas de rnams kyis bzhad
34a6(rgyud): pa chen po mngon par mdzad do// 'jig rten gyi khams thang g.yos pa dang shin tu g.yos pas yongasu dag par gyur te// khams gsum rgyas par spros pa thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor chen por gyur to// 
34a7(rgyud): gang gi sems can thams cad bde ba dang yid bde ba thob par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing / thogs pa med pa las mngon par 'byung bar rdo rje
34a8(rgyud): chen po phyag ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba rnam par gnon par mdzad nas de'i sku thams cad las dngos grub thams cad dang bde ba dang / 
34b1(rgyud): yid bde bster brtag tu rjes su 'brel ba can ltar cig spyod pa bde ba chen pordo rje dang tshig gi sems dpa' rnams phyung nas phyogs thams cad du phung ste mdun du rdo rje gsang ba yid las byung ba g.yas/ 
34b2(rgyud): su rdo rje kI li kI li/ rgyab tu 'dod ba'i rdo rje g.yon du rjerje bskyengs pa'o// mtshams rnams su mchod pa'i lha mo rnams so// phyi rol gyi kha khyer 'tsham su lnga'i bu mo rnams sa// sgo srung ba rnams ni de rtse lcags
34b3(rgyud): kyu dang / zhags pa dang / lcags sgrog dang / dril bu 'dzin pa'o// phyi rol tu rdo rje blo srung kyi tshogs dang po nya dang bran rnams so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu chur
34b4(rgyud): bsis te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub rdo rjernaMs bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sems par zhugs nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rdorje 'chang chen po la gsol pa
34b5(rgyud): btab ste/ sems can kun la bde don du/ rgyal ba chen po 'byung ba ste// chags bral de rnams chags ldan yang / rang gi btsun me'ang gsol mdzad pas// de phyir bdag gi
34b6(rgyud): khyed la gsol// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i rtog pa'i dngos grub ste// 'dul ba mchog ni bshad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bde ba chen po/ 
34b7(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub 'dul ba rdo rje 'dod pa'i mchog ces bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rdo rje chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di gsungs so// de nas
34b8(rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// bde ba chen po rdo rje mchog/ dam tshig dam pa'i ming can yin// dkyil 'khor gnas ni 'dul byas la// de dbus cho ga bzhin du ni// phyag rgya
35a1(rgyud): / chen po mnyam gzhag nas// der ni dkyil 'khor bsgrub par bya// gsar zhing legs par bsgril ba dang // mdud pa dag ni med pa yi// thig skud dmar pos thig btab nas// tshon/ 
35a2(rgyud): gyi phye mas bri bar bya// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo khyud bzhis ni mdzes pa dang / kha khyer gyis ni yongs su bskor// mtshams su lha yi bu mos mdzes// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams
35a3(rgyud): dang sgro dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// zla ba phyed la gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen 'od zer 'bar// rlung gis spyod pa'i dril bu mchog/ ba dan sna tshogs mdzes pa yin// me long dra ba me tog phreng
35a4(rgyud): ldan pa'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor bri// de yi nang du 'khor lo ni// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa dang 'dra ba// rdo rje thig gis yod sa bskor ba'i// rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri// de dbus cho ga
35a5(rgyud): bzhin du ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// blugs sam yang na byas pa 'am// brdungs sam yang na bris pa yi// sa// bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba'i 'od zer
35a6(rgyud): dmar pos khyab// sangs rgyas phreng bas rnam par mdzes// sku la tshon gyis yang dag byugs// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrungs gos bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ sa ma ya
35a7(rgyud): s+t+waM zhes brjod nas// snying khar rnam par dgod par bya// de yi logs ni thams cad du// sems dpa' chen po rnams bris te// tshon nam yang na rdul tshon gyis// go rims ci bzhin bri bar bya// 
35a8(rgyud): mdun du sku mdog dmar po ni// rdo rje mtshon cha la brtson pa// g.yas su dag pa'i dkar ba ste// legs par 'khyud pa'i rdo rje can// rgyab tu sku mdog ser po ste// chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan 'dzin// 
35b1(rgyud): g.yon du zlam dag sngon po ste/ phyag gnyis skems pa 'dzin la sogs/ mchod pa'i spod rnams 'dzin pa'o// chod pa'i rnam bri bar bya// sgeg mo bshang ma thum dang // dkar ma lnga yi bu ma ma tshogs/ 
35b2(rgyud): rdo sngags kyi gags pa dang / dzin lcags sgrog dril bu snyams// na pa'i po rnams la ni//  srung bzhi po dgod par bya// de nas de dag gi stong po rnams ni 'di yin te/ hUM badz+ra ng+ka hrI na ma shes
35b3(rgyud): kro l-i le g+ha d+ha rbA dz+dza/ dUd+haSh+Ta badz+ra ga Ni hU~M/ rdo rje bran no// de nas mchod pa'i lha mo rnams kyi ni/ hUMs d+hA ra badz+rI hUM/ hUM badz+re me g+he hUM/ hUM shwa ra badz+ra dz+raM/ hUM badz+ra she ri hrIM/ de nas lha'i bu mo rnams kyin/ 
35b4(rgyud): badz+ra lA s+ye/ ma hA ba ra badz+ri Ni/ oM badz+ra gI te badz+ra/ oM NI te bar+d+hade nas sgo srung rnams kyi ni/ dz+dza A kA shrI pra ti ha ra/ ts+tshadzA pA sha ga na/ ba badz+ra s+phoT+Ta drA hwA/ a badz+rA g+h+nA Ta ts+tshed/ de ltar/ 
35b5(rgyud): lha mo'i dkyil 'khor du/ bud med grags pa nyid ni 'god// bkod na de dag rnams kyis ni// byin gyis brlabs pa nyid/ du 'gyur// de nas phyag rdo rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor kun gyi
35b6(rgyud): bris byas nas// bum pa gang ba ji snyed dang // me tog la sogs kun gyis mchod// dril bu btags pa'i ba dan rnams// mtshams rnams su ni gzhag par bya// lcug ma dang bcas bum pa rnams// sku
35b7(rgyud): yi phyi rol dag tu bzhag/ rdo rje dang bcas gzhi dang // bcug mo yongasu bzlas nas ni// dri chus gang ba'i bum pa ste// phyag na rdo rje'i mdun bzhag bya// de la 'di ltar bde ba chen po'i dam tshig gi
35b8(rgyud): bdud rtsi'i chu byin gyis brlab pa'i snying po ni/ oM ma hA su kha badz+ra sa ma ya/ a b+hi ga dzaHhUM baM ho// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla'o// chu 'di gtor ba 'am 'thungs na sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu
36a1(rgyud): / byang ba dang / bde ba thams cad rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin no// de nas rang gi dam tshig rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang la sogs pa bsgrub par bya'o// dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod nas
36a2(rgyud): dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcings nas skad cig gis dbang du 'gyur ro// phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag ste// de bzhin g.yas su mdzub lcags kyus// dgug pa 'di ni lan gcig gis// 'grub
36a3(rgyud): par rab tu gzhug par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa/ a a ti shI g+h+r-i su kha badz+ra gu h+ye sa ma ya ma nu sma ra prA nu sma ra pra b+hU ta sa ma ya s+t+waM hri da ya/ su to Sh+yo maM b+ha wa/ su po Sh+yo me b+ha wa/ a nu rak+to me b+ha/ 
36a4(rgyud): ba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+ha ga bA a na ti na da na sid d+h+ya~M tu me man+t+ra pa dai/ da dzaHhUM baM hoHde nas rtag tu bcom ldan 'das// dkyil da'akhor du ni rang nyid byin// dgug cing bcug gnas brtan
36a5(rgyud): pa dang / dbang du 'gyur zhing 'grub pa yin// rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul du ma rnams mthong ba 'am/ yang na bcom ldan 'das rang nyid kyis mthong bar 'gyur// de nas rang nyid
36a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin kun gyi slob dpon ni phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa/ dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ las thams cad nus pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// 'jug pa'i cho
36a7(rgyud): ga 'di yis rdo rje slob dpon rang nyid ci snyed pa'i dris byugs shing bsgos pa rgyan dang bcas pa'i me tog gi phreng bas lus shin tu rgyan pa/ gos dmar po gnyis bsgos pas rang nyid kyi
36a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la bstod cing rdo rje dang bcas pa'i rdo rje bsnyems pas rang nyid 'jug par bya'o// bstod pa ni drug ldan la sogs pa glu yis bya'o// 'dod chags la sogs bde kun yid khyod ni
36b1(rgyud): kun tus bdag la bde ba la stsol cig/ rdo rje sems dgongs myur du bdag bstan mdzod// bdag dgyes mdzad dang bde mchog grub la 'dud de nas rab tu zhugs nas dgongs su gsol bar bya ste/ thog
36b2(rgyud): mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba chen// kun tu bzang po khyod yin te// rdo rje bsnyems bdag khyab bdag yin// sems kyi sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin// de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje
36b3(rgyud): 'dzin kun mchog dam tshig dngos grub can// rdo rje sems bdag de grub mdzod// de nas bcom ldan de nyid kyis// rdo rje slob dpon byin rlabs gyur// de sngar ma byung ba'i so sor rang rig pa'i bde ba
36b4(rgyud): gnyis ka la skye bar 'gyur ro// phra mo dbab par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das grub par gyur to// zhes shes dpar bya'o// de nas de bzhin du 'dug la ci 'dod pa'i bzlas
36b5(rgyud): brjod bya'o// de nas de bzhin du 'dug la rang gi bsod nams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thong par 'gyur ro// de nas brtsams te sems dpa' chen po
36b6(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhing mthong bar 'gyur ro// de rnams kyis kyang de la dngos grub thams cad rtsol bar mdzad do// phyag rgya thams cad kyang bdag rang nyid kyis bcings nas las thams cad
36b7(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// dam tshig thams cad kyang 'di la bstan par 'gyur ro// yid kyi 'dod pa'i las rnams kyang byed pa yin no// bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad nyams su myong zhing gzhan gyis mi
36b8(rgyud): thub pa dang mi sod pas lo gcig 'das nas sangs rgyas nyid la sogs pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thob pa yin no// de nas sems can thams cad zhugs pa'i don du brtag par bya ba yin no// 
37a1(rgyud): slob dpon pa nyid sngam bzhin du lus la brgyan nas rab tu bde ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rab tu bcug te/ de bzhin du de kho na nyid chen po bskul bas yang dag par bskul la
37a2(rgyud): dgug par bya la 'di skad ces brjod do// srid pa'i bde ba rnam dag phyir// sngar gyi srid pa la khyod dga'// 'dod pa kun gyi dngos grub che// 'gro ba kun la'ang 'grub par gyis// de nas mchod pa byas la/ 
37a3(rgyud): rang gi lhag pa'i lha gang yin pa de'i dam tshig phyag rgya me tog dang bcas pa gzhugs par bya ste/ bcug nas rna bar 'di skad ces brjod par bya'o// chags bral nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dod
37a4(rgyud): chags chen po bde ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' sbas pa yin// 'dod chags bral ba lta bu yi// sdug bsngal gzhan ni// rang bzhin med// de bas sems can chags bla'o// slar yang
37a5(rgyud): yid ni ma byed cig/ de nas me tog la sogs pa snying po 'dis 'dor du gzhug go// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa pra ti gr-ih+Na sa ma ya s+t+waM/ de nas gang du babs pa de ni de'i lha yin no// de nas de
37a6(rgyud): kho na nyid chen por brjod par bya'o// gang 'dod pa'i snying po byin la sgrub tu bcug la rang nyid lhag pa'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur nas de'i mtshan ma lag pa gnyis su byin te/ de'i rigs kyi ming
37a7(rgyud): gi dbang bskur la snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta At+ma ko haM badz+ra d+ha ra sa mu khe b+ha a b+hi'i tAM/ a b+hi Shiny+tsA maM gr-ih+Na sid+ha badz+ra te a mo g+ha sid+hi s+t+waM/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pa
37a8(rgyud): bslab par bya'o// de nas ci 'dod pa'i mchod pa byas shing byed du bcug nas ci 'dod pa bza' ba dang btung bas slob ma rnams tshim par byas la phyag rgya dang phyag rgya'i lan dang gar dang rgod pa byed
37b1(rgyud): rudu bcug cing rang nyid kyis kyang bya'o// de nas thams cad bkrung nas 'di skad brjod par bya ste/ thog mtha' rgyu yi 'gro ba 'di// dga' bas mchog la rag lus te// sems dpa' chen po rdo rjer 'gyur/ 
37b2(rgyud): slar yang gshegs par mdzad du gsol// de nas snyim pa'i me tog dor nas dbyung bar bya'o// dkyil 'khor yang rang nyid kyi phyags la rdul tshon de dag gi rol bu byas la bzhag na las thams cad
37b3(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas bde ba chen po rdo rje dam tshig gi bdud rtsi'i tshul de yang bcug na tshe 'phel ba la sogs pa'i las thams cad dgongs pa yin no// de nyid kyis dbang bskur na yang
37b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba thob pa dang mchog gi dang / das grub kyang thob par 'gyur ro// gal te sku bri ba'i ri dmo mkhan ma rnyed na rang rang gi phyag mtshan gyi phyag rgya
37b5(rgyud): rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o// gal te de yang mi shes na// phyag mtshan bzhag par bya'o// phyag rgya'i tshe ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod pa thogs
37b6(rgyud): pa med pa myur du 'grub pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'i dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rnam par gnon par mdzad nas rdo rje 'chang chen pos 'di gsungs so// bde ba chen po rab
37b7(rgyud): bsgrubs dang // 'dod pa chen po rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub pa ni// brtag par myur du bshad par bya// ci srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// de srid sems can gnon par bya// mya
37b8(rgyud): ngan 'das pa byang chub sgrib// de nyid kyi ni dam tshig rnams// ji srid pa la gnas pa ni// de srid sems can don nyid byed// thams cad dag pa'i mchog chos can// ci ltar sems can kun gyi
38a1(rgyud): don/ dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub pa// de phyir sbyin tshogs pha rol phyin// byang chub spyod pa mchog gi min// de bzhin gshegs ni 'dul min la// sems can kun rnams don
38a2(rgyud): mdzad pa// 'di ni dngos grub rab sgrub na// dus kun tu ni thams cad mdzad// de nas sgrub 'di bshad bya ste// dngos grub shin tu brtag pa yin// gang gis srid pa 'di nyid du// shin tu brtags
38a3(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thob// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs kyang // dam tshig rnam par spangs pa 'am/ bsod nams med kyang thams cad du/ srid pa 'di la myur du 'grub// gal te dngos grub sgrub 'don
38a4(rgyud): rtag tu yul dang ldan gyur na// gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas ni// rang rang phyag rgyas 'grub par 'gyur/ drug ldan la sogs snyan pa'i glu// chags pa kun kyang phyir 'dod par// bzlas
38a5(rgyud): pa'i don ni ci nus pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub par bya// 'di yis 'dod pa'i kun dbang phyug/ ci 'dod 'ong ngo // mkha' la rgyu// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug grub// rga shi
38a6(rgyud): med cing gtso bor 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyis mchod byas la// rang gzhan kun gyis bsnyen bskur zhing // rdo rje 'chang chen dang me tshungs shing // don yod kun spyod pa yin no// bde ba chen po rdo
38a7(rgyud): grub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad rab tu ster ba'i rdo rje 'chang byang chub sems dpa' yin na// gal te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
38a8(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa des/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pa ras ris la bri bar bya'o// gzhad pa dang bcas pa
38b1(rgyud): dngos po thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor ba'o// de'i mdun du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas/ rdo rje'i tshig gis stong phrag bzlas par bya'o// 
38b2(rgyud): 'bum rdzogs pa na mtshan phyed na bdud kyi tshogs rnams 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom par bcom par bya'o// de nas tho rangs kyi dus su de bzhin gshegs pa
38b3(rgyud): thams cad nyid dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po nyid mngon par 'dod nas nges lugs ma 'am/ 'dus byas pa 'am/ brdungs pa 'am/ ras rim
38b4(rgyud): la sogs par legs par bris pa'i phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje'i nga dkyil 'khor bzhin du sngar grub pa la sku gzugs kyi khyad par ci ltar thob pa rdo rje sems dpa'i sgrub pa bsha// 
38b5(rgyud): zla ba drug gis rdo rje 'chang chen po'i dngos grub chen po 'grub po// gal te rdo rje 'chang chen po dgug na bde ba chen po rdo rje lcags kyus dgug cing ci 'dod pa bsgrub par bya'o// 
38b6(rgyud): zla ba gcig bzlas nas thams cad gsol bar bya'o// gal te rang gi phyag rgyas bdag nyid sgrub na rang gi lha'i phyag rgya chen po bcings te bsgoms pas bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin no zhes
38b7(rgyud): bsgoms la bsgrub par bya'o// de ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i bzlas pas bdag nyid bsgrub par bya'o// yang dang yang du sgom zhing bzlas pa de srid bdag gis bya'o// ci srid rdo rje 'chang nyid zla ba/ 
38b8(rgyud): byed bzlas nas thob par 'gyur ro// de nas 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug sgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du rang yid du 'ong ba dang bcas par rab tu zhugs te phyag rgya bcings la de srid bzlas par
39a1(rgyud): bya'o// ci srid bdag 'dod pa rnams kyis dbang phyug dang khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang khams gsum pa ma lus pa'i/ 
39a2(rgyud): rdo rje'i rgyun gyi rang bzhin thams cad grub pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes rnam par rol par mdzad nas ma bsgrubs pa'i phyag rgya'i las kyi rgyun rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa 'di gsungs so// ma bsgrubs pa'i
39a3(rgyud): snying po'i las rnams 'di lta ste bdag nyid srung ba ni bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba'i gtsug tor gyis so// thams cad srung ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i mdzod smras so// phyogs thams cad
39a4(rgyud): dang 'tshams dang dkyil 'khor bcings pa ni/ bde ba chen dpe rdo rje gsang ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas so// bdud thams cad kyi stobs gzhom pa ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba mi
39a5(rgyud): bskyod pas so// tshe 'phel bar bya ba ni bde ba chen po rdo rje ga sang ba'i bdud rtsis so// gzugs chen po phun sum tshogs pa ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i gzugs
39a6(rgyud): can gyis so// gzi brjid dang na tshod shin tu bzang po rab tu 'phel ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i bcud kyis len gyis so// stobs dang mdog 'phel ba la ni/ bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang
39a7(rgyud): ba'i mthu yis so// dbang bskur ba thams cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gcod pan gyis so// nor thams cad thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug gis so// rgyal srid thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i
39a8(rgyud): rgyal po'i phyag rgyas so// sa ma lus pa thob pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rtsal gyis so// thams cad dbab pa dang g.yo bar byas pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dus gsum bden pa nyid du slar gzhug
39b1(rgyud): pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi don du gzhug pas so// pra se na thams cad grub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pra se na dbab pas so// gdon thams cad las thar pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i
39b2(rgyud): rengs pas so// thams cad gnyid log par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gnyid kyis so// thams cad rgyas gdab pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro mas so// thams
39b3(rgyud): cad du gsang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba mthar byed kyis so// thams cad bsgyel ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i hUM mdzad kyis so// thams cad bslang ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gis bslang ba'o// thams
39b4(rgyud): cad bcing ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba bcing bas so// thams cad/ ngar bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i yi ge muso// 'phra men dam thams cad las thar bar bya ba la dang sngon gyi gnas
39b5(rgyud): skabs rjes su sbyin pa la ni gsang ba chen po he ru ka'i rdo rjes// ma mo'i gdon thams cad las thar bar bya ba la ni rdorjegasang ba'i drag mos so// 'bru men ma thams cad kyis
39b6(rgyud): rgyas btab pa la dang / thar par bya ba la dang / snying zos pa las snying gzhan 'byung bar 'jug pa dang / sha~M ba gso ba la ni dam tshig chen po gsang ba'i he ru ka'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag
39b7(rgyud): rgyas so// gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rjes so// rims thams cad zhi ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'bar ba'i lta bas so// drug thams cad gzhig pa dang / bza' ba
39b8(rgyud): dang / 'bab pa dang / 'chi ba gos pa la ni gsang ba chen po rdo rje nor bu'i phyag rgyas so// dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba la ni/ rdo rje gsang ba'i drug
40a1(rgyud): med pas so// gshed byed thams cad dang / byad dang ro langs dang / b+hur dang / gnod sbyin mo rnams kyi gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sbyin sreg gis so// rtsod pa thams cad dang / 
40a2(rgyud): 'thab pa dang / 'thab mo dang / rtsod pa gzhig pa la rdo rje gsang ba'i zhal rab tu gdangs pas so// yams dang / 'tshe ba thams cad dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i zhi
40a3(rgyud): bas so// gzhan gyi dpung thams cad rengs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / lkugs par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / gsad pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i
40a4(rgyud): gshed byed kyis so// 'thab mo thams cad las rgyal ba thob pa dal ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi dpung rgyan gyis so// gdug pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdo rje legs
40a5(rgyud): pas so// bgegs thams cad zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i/ thabs sbyor gyis so// dgra bo thams cad rnam par gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam par 'thor bas so// bdud kyi stobs
40a6(rgyud): thams cad gzhom pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rab tu 'dul bas so// sprin bskyed pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin chen pos so// char dbab pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bsdigs mdzub kyis so// thog dbab pa dang / 
40a7(rgyud): klog dang / rlung dang / chur zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i sprin srung gis so// sprin dang / mun pa dang / khug sna zhi bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ba chen po'i spyan gyis so// klu thams cad dgug
40a8(rgyud): pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgyas so// klu thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni gsang ba thams cad kyi nor bu'i phyag rgyas so// klu thams cad rjesu 'brang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'dul bas so// 
40b1(rgyud): klu thams cad 'byin pa lan rdo rje gsang ba'i klu 'don pas so// sa ma lus pa g.yo zhing 'phrul bar bya ba lan rdo rje gsang ba'i thar pas so// mu med par chu'i phung po char bsil zhing dri ma med par bskyang
40b2(rgyud): pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje kwa'i phyag rgyas so// mun par nyi ma'i snang ba chen po bsgreng ba la ni rdo rje nyi ma'i phyag rgyas so// rlung thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje drung thams cad kyis so// namakha' la gzugs
40b3(rgyud): thams cad kun tu ston pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'dzin pas so// namakha' las dngos po thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i 'byung bas so// namakha' la rang gi bdag nyid kyi dngos po kun tu
40b4(rgyud): bstan par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyis so// nam/ mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la/ sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'jig
40b5(rgyud): rten gyi khams thams cad bstan pa la nani rdo rje gsang ba'i rnam pa ra 'phrul pas so// na mkha'i shing thams cad lo ma dang / me tog dang / 'bras bu thams cad 'byung ba la ni rdo rje
40b6(rgyud): gsang ba'i dus kyi phyag rgyas so// sa'i cha thams cad la 'bras bu'i cha thams cad smin par 'gyur ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gshol gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad las lha'i kha zas dang / btung ba
40b7(rgyud): dang gos dang / rgyan dang / gnas sar pa dang / bu mo gzhon nu 'byung ba dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / bran po dang / bran mo thams cad 'byung bar bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam
40b8(rgyud): tshig gi bsod nams kyi chu bos so// g.yul du dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa bstan ste g.yul 'gyed pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i sdom pas so// sgyu ma thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje/ 
41a1(rgyud): / bde mchog gis so// bde mchog gi bya ba thams cad la ni rdo rje sgyu ma'i bya bas so// rmad du byung ba dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan pa la ni rdo rje rmad du byung ba'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam/ 
41a2(rgyud): par 'phrul pas so// lan thams cad gdab par bya ba la ni rdo rje lan bstan pas so// me rengs par bya ba la ni rdo rje shin tu grang bas so// chu 'bab par bya ba la ni rdo rje zla ba'i chu shel gyiso// 
41a3(rgyud): dgon pa dang / grong dang / nags dang / chu bo dang / rdzing bu dang / skyes mos tshal dang / zas dang / skom dang / gtsug lag khang sprul pa la ni rdo rje grub pas so// chu'i steng du bzhag pa dang / bdag nyid
41a4(rgyud): gzugs mang po'i dngos po ston pa dang / mi snang ba dang / namakha nga' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi phyag rgyas so// lha la sogs pa thams cad mngag gzhug
41a5(rgyud): par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bka' bsgo bas so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i nga / bang gis so// mi rgyu ba thams cad drang ba dang / dbab pa
41a6(rgyud): dang / bden par slar gzhug pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i dngos grub chen po'i phyag rgyas so// gzugs brnyan thams cad dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dgod par bya ba dang / gar byed du gzhug pa
41a7(rgyud): dang / rol par bya ba dang / bsgo ba thams cad dang byed du gzhug pa dang thams cad khyer te 'ong ba dang / las thams cad byed du gzhug pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje'i dam tshig sgrub pas so// 
41a8(rgyud): thams cad rjes su chags par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje yid las byung bas so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rtser gzhugs pa la ni rdo rje ki li ki li'i gsang bas so// thams cad brtan
41b1(rgyud): bar bya ba la ni rdo rje chu srin gyi phyag rgyas so// thams cad dang bar bya ba la ni rdo rje bsnyems pas so// rmi lam ngan pa bzlog pa la ni rdo rje dag gis so// gzhan dag gis rang 'dod pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bya ba
41b2(rgyud): la ni rdo rje rmi lam mthong bas so// rmi lam ngan pa thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje bsregs lugs kyis so// rmi lam bzang ba thams cad sgrub pa brtan par bya ba la ni rdo rje lam grub pas so// nad dang
41b3(rgyud): gnod pa thams cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje sman gyis so// rims thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje bcud kyis len gyis so// dus ma yin par 'chi ba gzhig pa la ni rdo rje dUr bas so// dmyal ba la sogs
41b4(rgyud): pa'i ngan 'gro thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje sdig pa dral bas so// sku thams cad sgrub pa la rdo rje sku'i mchog gis so// gsung thams cad sgrub pa la ni rang gi lce 'das pa dang ma
41b5(rgyud): 'ongs pa dang da ltar gyi dngos po thams cad bden par ston pa 'i rdo rje gsang ba'i ljags kyi mchog gis so// thugs thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje thugs thams cad bskyed pa'o// 
41b6(rgyud): rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ni rab tu dag pa'i rdo rjes so// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'jug pa la ni rdo rje 'khor los so// phyag rgya thams cad bcings pa'i dngos grub la ni rdo rje gsang
41b7(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya chen pos so// thams cad dam tshig thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// las thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pas so// dngos grub thams
41b8(rgyud): cad la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i bde ba chen po'i grub pas so// phun sum tshogs pa thams cad la ni rdo rje ltung ba las gdon pa'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob pa la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi
42a1(rgyud): / phyag rgyas so// thams cad kyi mchod pa bya ba nyid la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i gar gyis so// rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje bde ba chen po'i rdo rjes so// sems dpa' chen po
42a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa las rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa la ni rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba'i mchog gi bde ba chen pos so// rdo rje
42a3(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad dngos grub dam pa la ni bde ba chen po gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas so// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje gsang ba'i mchod pa'i
42a4(rgyud): cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje'ing dam tshig gi sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa gsang ba 'i chos can rnam par snang mdzad chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
42a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi khu tshur yongs su 'dzin pas/ de bzhin gshe/ gas pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo byin gyis rlob pa'i rdza/ rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang
42a6(rgyud): gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab po// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas nyid// dam pa'i rigs ni bskyed du gsol// 
42a7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bde ba chen po mi phyed pa'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi sku dang gsung dang
42a8(rgyud): thugs rdo rje rdo rje thams cad la rab tu zhugs nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid mnyam par spros nas/ bde ba chen po rdo rje phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di gsungs so// oM d+hIHde nas 'di ni gsungs tsam
42b1(rgyud): gyis/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos gyur te// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa kun// kun nas 'dus shing bstan par gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// thams cad grub phyir kun nas bzhugs// gzhang / 
42b2(rgyud): pa chen po'i khyad par gyis// rmang byung chen po rab tu bzhad// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin du rdo rje la snyoms par bzhugs te// bde ba chen po'i dam
42b3(rgyud): tshig rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba'i gsungs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// ji ltar chos kyis bris nas ni// rgyal ba g.yon du bsnyems 'dzin pa// dam tshig mchog gi mchog bkod nas/ sa ma
42b4(rgyud): ya ste zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa sras dang bcas/ rdo rje mtshon cha la sogs bzung // byang chub sems dpa' se dmas dpa' che// me tog la sogs spyir thal sbyar// de la
42b5(rgyud): 'jug la sogs pa yi// cho ga rgyas pa'i khyad par ni 'di yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ba'iphyag rgya dang / rdo rje glu 'dis 'jug por bya'o// rdo rje sems
42b6(rgyud): dpa' bsdus pa yis// rdo rjen chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glur blangs pas// rdo rje'i las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas rab tu zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi gzungs bde ba
42b7(rgyud): chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus dgug par bya'o// oM badz+ra d+ha ra su ra ma hA su khe sar+b+ba hA rarma pa ma ta ya/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA dz+nyA na maM mu drA pra dzaHhUM baM ho/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dzin
42b8(rgyud): pa dang bcas pa yang dag par byon par 'gyur ro// yid bde ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung ngo // cho 'phrul du ma dag mthong ba yin no// de nas cho ga rgyas pa dang / sgrub pa dang / yid kyi 'dod pa'i
43a1(rgyud): / dngos grub thams cad dang / don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du dam pa grub pa yin no// de bzhin du bya'o// de nas ma bsgrubs par lan gcig bzlas pas las rnams byed par 'gyur/ 
43a2(rgyud): thams cad srung ba la ni rdo rje gtsug tor gyis so// sems can thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni rdo rje mdzod spu'o// chos nyid thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje chos nyid kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
43a3(rgyud): kyis mchod pa'i dngos grub ni rdo rje mchod pas so// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba la ni khro bos so// byang chub kyi spyod pa ma lus par rdzogs par bya pA la ni rdo rje spyod pa'i phyag rgyas so// bdud thams cad
43a4(rgyud): gzhom pa la ni bdud thams cad 'joms par byed pas so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du bya ba la ni rdo rje ye shes kyi khu tshur gyis so// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba las/ 
43a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe gas pa don yod cing thogs pa med pa'i bka' bstan pa/ de
43a6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje chen po thabs bde ba chen po'i khro bo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab po// bde ba chen
43a7(rgyud): bo rab sgrub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// gdug pa thams cad gzhom pa'i phyir// rang gis sprul mdzod rdo rje 'dzin// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams
43a8(rgyud): cad kyi bka' rdo rje'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje khro bo 'di gsungs so// hUM rak+ta dz+wA la mA le prA ti la ya/ ag+ni pra ba ti te/ ma hA su ra ta badz+ra kro d+ha dzaHhUM phaT/ de nas 'di gsungs pa
43b1(rgyud): tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje'i rdo rje las kun nas 'od zer gamar po 'bar ba'i snying po can smin ma 'gyur zhing khro gnyer bsdus pa/ s+pha ra ser zhing spyan 'bar ba rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pas
43b2(rgyud): mchu'i spos rnam par gnon pa'i zhal mnga' ba/ dbu sa gyen du 'bar ba/ rdo rje dang gzhu la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du bzhugs pas so// 
43b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang khams gsum pa'i gdug pa thams cad 'dul bar mdzad nas rdo rje dam tshig chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gang ba phyir// de la dang po/ 
43b4(rgyud): khros pa bzhag/ slar tod b+hA ba hU zhes zlos// ud pal sngon po'i 'od 'bar ba// rdo rje bsnyems pa 'dzin pa'i mchog// mche bcung zang gtsigs pa'i zhal// khro dang bcas pa
43b5(rgyud): bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje skyil mo klungs kyis gzhugs// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dkyil 'khor chen po/ 'i tshul gyis no// thams cad du ni khro bo bri// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo
43b6(rgyud): khro bo'i phyag rgya chen pos dang por slob dpon gyis 'jug par bya ste/ slob ma rnams kyang de bzhin no// slob dpon zhugs nas khros pas lcags kyu de nyid kyis dgug par bya'o//  sur ta badz+ra kro d+ha/ ya/ 
43b7(rgyud): ya te/ ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa dzaHsarba badz+ra gu la ne tra pra be sha ya hUM/ sar+b+ba mu drA ga Na ban+d+ha ya baM/ sarba ma yaM bi shwa kuru ho/ sarba karma Ne tra satwa ya a/ de nas rdo rje'i rigs thams cad bcom ldan 'das
43b8(rgyud): dang bcas pa byon zhing grub pa yin no// slob dpon dang / slob ma rnams la dgyes pa dang / khro bo 'bab pa'i mtshan yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyuraro// gzhan yang cung zad 'byung ba yin na de grub par/ 
44a1(rgyud): / dngos grub dang mchog rgyas pa yang de bzhin du'o// gal te ma grub na lan gcig bzla'o// khams gsum pa ma lus pa las rgyal bar bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgyas so// sems can/ 
44a2(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad 'dul ba la ni rdo rje khro bo'i gsang bas so// 'jig rten gsum pa las rnam par rgyal ba la ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgyas so// thams cad dgug pa dang / 
44a3(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / gzhog pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa dang / bsgyel ba dang / bsad par bya ba la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje
44a4(rgyud): khro bos so// thams cad lhung bar bya ba la ni rdo rje khro mo'i khro bso// thams cad dbab pa la ni rdo rje 'bebs pa'i khro bos so// thams cad nges par gnon pa la ni rdo rje gang rgyangs kyis so// 
44a5(rgyud): las thams cad nye bar dgod pa la ni bde ba chen po rdo rje dam chi ga gi khro bos so// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i gsang ba las/ rab tu dga' ba las byung ba rdo rje gsang ba rnam par rgyal ba'i
44a6(rgyud): dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don yod cing thogs pa med pa thams cad dag pa'i chos sgrib pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
44a7(rgyud): kyis rdo rje'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bden pa chen po rab grub dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir/ 
44a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// mchog chen khyod kyis bskyed par mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen pos chos thams cad la gzigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas
44b1(rgyud): bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma ma zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di gsungs so// oM tsA ba hoH'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal nas pad+ma'i mdog gi mdangs can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/ 
44b2(rgyud): gyi 'od lta bu pad+ma'i mdangs la sogs pa yongs su 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba dang / ral pa'i cod pan dang / na bza' dmar po 'chang ba dang / pad+ma chen po'i sems dpa'
44b3(rgyud): narnams byung nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das zhal rab tu bzhad pas rdo rje g.yon pas pad+ma 'dzin cing de bzhin du rdo rje snyems pas dkyil mo dkrungs kyis
44b4(rgyud): bzhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni/ dkyil 'khor chen po thams cad thig gdab po// rdo rje 'jig rten dbang phyug gzhag/ 'dra'i mtshan
44b5(rgyud): ma'i tshogs rnams bri// de na rdo rje pad+mas zhugs la mdzub mo'i/ lcags kyu gnyis kyis dgug pa'o// oM hI ba ho// au hri ma hA su kha badz+ra A lo ke shwa ra ya me/ A A haM pra be sha
44b6(rgyud): d+hi d+hi me b+ha ba sid+d+him+me mu dA pa deHdzaHhUM baM ho/ de nas bcom ldan 'das spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug byon te mchog thams cad stsol bar 'gyur ro// snang ba'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// cho ga rgyas pa/ 
44b7(rgyud): thams cad dang / sgrub pa dang / dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// ma bsgrub kyang lan gcig bzlas pa las thams cad byed do// sgrib pa thams cad rnam par spyang ba la ni pad+ma chen pos so// thams
44b8(rgyud): cad srung ba la na pad+ma'i gtsug tor gyis so// thams cad rjes su chags pa la ni pad+ma la bltas so// thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa la ni pad+ma kha 'byed pas so// bud med thams cad dbang du bya
45a1(rgyud): ba la ni pad+ma chen po 'dod chags kyis so// skyes pa thams cad dbang du bya ba la ni pad+ma chen po'i dbang phyug gis so// rmi lam gdab pa la ni pad+ma chen po dmar pos so// bcom ldan
45a2(rgyud): 'das kyi mchog thob par bya ba la ni rdo rje gsang ba'i pad+ma rmongs pa med pas so// bde ba chen po pad+ma gsang ba las/ bde ba chen po pad+ma'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das khams
45a3(rgyud): gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug de bzhin gshegs pas bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs po'i rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
45a4(rgyud): nas rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// nor bu chen po'i rigs mchog ni// mgrin sbyor phyir ni bskyed par
45a5(rgyud): mdzod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham/ sa cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dam tshig rab tu bzhag pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon par mdzad nas bde ba chen
45a6(rgyud): po'i rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i rigs sngags 'di gsungs so// oM la ti d+ha b+haN+Da Ta te dzA/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje las nor bu rin po
45a7(rgyud): che rab tu phyung nas phyag g.yon pa la rab tu gnas so// nor bu rin po che dag pa de yang mar gang rnyog pa med pa'i mdog can rdo rje rin po che rang gi 'od zer gyis dbang bskur ba can nor bu rin po che'i mda'
45a8(rgyud): la sogs pa'i mtshan ma yongs su bsnams pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis zhugs so// de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bya// rdo rje rin
45b1(rgyud): chen bdag po gzhag/ nor bu'i rigs ni chen po bri// rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgyas zhugs te/ de bzhin du mdzub mo gnyis kyis rdo rje ljags kyus dgug par bya'o// oM ma hA sa? kha badz+ra bi b+hU te ra ya b+ha ga bA ra ya
45b2(rgyud): kaR+Sha ya gi ra ba sarba ta thA ga ta a gr-i sa tra sa ma be nA nA ma b+her ma tra be tre pa Da Da swA hA// de nas bcom ldan 'das namakha'i snying po'i nor bu thams cad dang bcas pa byon pa yin no// spyi bo nas spu ltung ba'i
45b3(rgyud): mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la dbang bskur ba la ni zhes shes par bya'o// de nas slob ma rnams gzhug par bya ste cho ga rgyas pa thams cad de bzhin du bya'o// de nas ma
45b4(rgyud): bsgrubs pa'i las rnams lan cig bzlas pas 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje ni po che'i myug gus so// don thams cad thob pa la ni rdo rje rin
45b5(rgyud): chen gyi rgyal mtshan gyis rtse mos so// bsam pa thams cad yod/ sa su rdzogs par bya ba la ni rdo rje nor bu chen po'i mtshan/ ma'i phyag rgyas so// gter chen po thob par bya ba la ni rdo
45b6(rgyud): rin chen gyis 'og gi phyag rgyas so// rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas so// de bzhin
45b7(rgyud): gshegs pa'i dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni rdo rje rin chen gyi dbang bskur ba dam pa'i phreng bas so// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por dbang bskur ba thob pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i
45b8(rgyud): mchog gi rdo rje rin chen gyi cod pan gyi phreng bas so// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba la bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi nor bu'i rigs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rigs thams
46a1(rgyud): cad bsdus pa'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i ye shes thob pas sems can thams cad gzhug pa'i 'khor lo rdo rje phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// thog
46a2(rgyud): ma tha ma med pa'i bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la gsol ba btab bo// bde ba chen po rab grub pa// chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// bde ba chen po don gyi phyir// 'gro rnams ci bder bzhugs su
46a3(rgyud): gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad pas rnam par rgyal ba 'gro ba kun 'dul ba/ dam tshig thams cad dang dngos grub thams cad stsol ba rdo rje 'chang chen po ston pa po// sgrub pa po// stobs
46a4(rgyud): dang pha rol gnon pa/ thogs pa med pa thams cad la rjes su ston pas don yod par grub pa dam tshig rdo rje 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i rnam par gnon pa mdzad nas bde ba chen po dngos grub
46a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i don yod pa mtshungs pa med/ pa'i thams cad kyi snying po 'di gsungs so// ho AHhUM/ hrI tAM/ de nas 'di gsungs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
46a6(rgyud): pa thams cad la sogs pa 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po der yang dag par gnas te/ dkyil 'khor gcig nyid du 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
46a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'chang chen pos sems can thams cad rjes su gzhug pa bde ba chen po'i rdo rje'i dam tshig gsang ba gsungs pa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad kun tu bri/ 
46a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po dang por ni// de yi dbus su brtag par bya// de yi dbus su rigs rnams kyis// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar bya// phyi yi mtshams kyi mtha' ma ru// phyi yi dkyil 'khor tshogs
46b1(rgyud): rnams bri// sgo rnams kun tu 'jug par ni// rang gi phyag rgyar rab tu gnas// dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga sdud cing // rdo rje shugs kyis 'jug par bya// cho ga rgyas pa thams cad dang // dngos grub thams cad/ 
46b2(rgyud): dang las thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas lha la sogs pa dam tshig sems dpa' thams cad bcom ldan 'das las rang rang gi rjes su gnang ba gnos nas sems can thams cad la bde ba'i don
46b3(rgyud): yod pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang chen po'i zhabs la phyag byas nas rang rang gi gsang ba'i snying po 'di rnams phul lo// de nas 'jig rten gsum pos gsol pa/ oM b+hU dz+dza/ de nas dkyil 'khor
46b4(rgyud): bri ba ni// zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// phyi yi dkyil 'khor ma ga yin no// de yi dbus su dngos grub phyir// gzhu yis ral kar ldan zhing // mnga' dang tsa shi ga thogs bri// sbrang
46b5(rgyud): rtsir byed dang rgyal bar byed// sgrub pa thams cad sgrub pa po// rtse gsum mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yis// dbus mo lha nga btsugs byas te// zhugs nas dam tshig bcings nas ni/ 
46b6(rgyud): yang dag dgug pa nyid du bya// oM b+hAr b+hA ba swA hA// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad kun gyis yongs bskor ba// dngos grub kun ston 'ongs pa la// ci ltar rnyed pa'i gtor ma sbyin// slob
46b7(rgyud): dpon gyi ni 'jug pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// dam tshig mchog ni de nyid dang // gsang ba'i de nyid brjod par bya// gal te ma brtags ma smras dang // 'on te 'di skad bshad pa'i/ 
46b8(rgyud): chosasa'adir ni kun tu ma spyad na// rtse gsum gyis ni khyed snying 'joms// snying stobs rdul dang mun pa ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// ming po gsum po 'di dag ste// nam yang brnyas par
47a1(rgyud): mi bya'o// gang zhig 'di dag la brnyas pas// yang dang yang du rab bzhugs nas// dkyil 'khor mchod pa byed pa de// dngos grub thams cad thob pa ni// phyag rgya dag kyang bstan byas nas// de/ 
47a2(rgyud): yis gar gyi mchod pa bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po yi// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i lha mo rnams kyis rang gi phyag rgya phul lo// hrIHhUM shrI b+h+yo/ dkyil 'khor thams cad bya ba ni// 
47a3(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// ka ba chen po bzhi dang bcas// glu chad bzhi yis rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor bzhi po bri bar bya// sgo ru mngon phyogs
47a4(rgyud): bzhi po ni// snying po dang bcas gzhag par bya// dga' mo lag na mtsho dran cha thogs// dngos grub bya ba snyems dang bcas// de nas dang po dkyil 'khor du// de bzhin kun nas 'jug par bya// sring mo
47a5(rgyud): rang gi phyag rgya yis// go rims ci bzhin 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas 'jug pa la sogs kyis// cho ga bzhin du mchod byas// nas// gsang ba de nyid rab grub pas// dgug pa yang dag bya
47a6(rgyud): ba yin// oM ka li ma niri he pro ta la/ me b+h+r-i rak+Sha si pa rastA ma ya he bi ho ba/ ba rA he bed+ye s+thA ma ya swA hA/ sid+d+hi kai sid+d+hi stA ma a he/ phye ga rgya 'di rnams kyis so// hrIHhUM shrI b+h+yo// de nas thams cad 'bab
47a7(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// babs nas gzhug par bya'o// de nas de bzhin phyag rgya bcings pa bslabs la mna' bsgrags nas gsang ba brjod par bya'o// sems can don la gang zhugs pa// gang du dkyil 'khor ston pa
47a8(rgyud): rnams 'gal te gsang ba mi srung na// khyod kyis de dag gsang ba yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // de bzhin zas dang skom dang ro// chos kyis rten pas bde ba dang // chos min pas ni sdug bsngal te/ 
47b1(rgyud): phyag rgya gar gyi mchod pa yis// ci 'dod par ni mchod par bya// ci snyed pa dang ci 'dod bzhin// yul rnams la ni bsten par bya// de nas sgyu ma yin thams cad kyis rang gi snying po phul lo// oM sarbam hA
47b2(rgyud): tsakr-i pra brda ya da rA ya be hUM phaT/ zur bzhi pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// khru gang tsam du brkos byas nas// gyen du kha bltas sgo bri bar// bde mchog la sogs bri bar bya/ 'khor lorab tu zhugs byas la/ yang dag
47b3(rgyud): dgug par dgug par bya// me tog la sogs gtor ma bya// sha la sogs pa'i gtor ma byas/ oM biSh+Ti tsakra A na ya/ shaM brtsi ma tsi ta traM su ra a d+hi bi ho sho haM/ sar+b+ba mA yA k+ShI taM d+ha ba me sing d+hA hra hA sAhA/ 
47b4(rgyud): de nas yid kyi 'dod pa'i sgyu ma thams cad grub pa yin no// slob ma gzhug pa yang de bzhin du bya'o// de nas klu rigs bzhis snying po phul lo// phu de nas dkyil 'khor bri ba ni// zla
47b5(rgyud): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sbrul gyi thig gis kun tu bri// klu yig dengs ka'i btsum mos 'khyud// mtshams kyi char ni madz+dza/ gartse 'dud// de yi dbus su sa 'dzin pa// klu yi rgyal po
47b6(rgyud): she Sha bri// shes rab can gyis klu chen gyi// rigs rnams thams cad bri bar bya// de nas sa 'dzin shugs kyis ni// khros shing drug pas 'jug par bya// dkyil 'khor der ni rab zhugs nas// gdengs
47b7(rgyud): ka'i phyag rgya dgug par bya// oM hrI a nI la dza ba be ga pri thi b+hin+na d+ha ra she Sha Na/ A ya hi/ phu sarba nA ga ku la A na ya hUM phu/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya phu/ sar+b+ba sA d+ha ya phuHphuHphuHphuH// de nas klu thams
47b8(rgyud): cad pu zhes bya ba zlos shing dkyil 'khor du zhugs na babs par 'gyur zhing 'thob bo// de nas slob dpon gyis ri me'i phyag rgyas drug med par bya'o// de nas brtsams te thams cad zos na yang bdud rtsi
48a1(rgyud): bzhin du 'ju bar byed do// 'di rnams lhan cig tu gar byed pa dang / dug thams cad sreg pa dang / 'jig pa dang / za ba nus par 'gyur ro// de nas ci 'dod pa'i dam tshig sbyin par bya ste/ 'dod / 
48a2(rgyud): chags zhe sdang gti mug ste// 'di dag 'jig rten dug gsum mo// gal te bden las 'das gyur na// 'chi ba'i 'jig rten 'di rtag nas// gal te dngos grub thob 'dod na/ glog brnyas par yang mi bya
48a3(rgyud): zhing // ser ba bzlog par mi bya'o// sbrul ni gang yang bsad mi bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las bde ba chen po'i dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje gsang ba la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// 
48a4(rgyud): de nas rdo rje chen po yi// ri rab ri yi rtse mo na// rdo rje rin chen 'od gsal bas// dri med gzi brjid mdzes pa la// zur bzhi pa lnga sgo bzhi pa/ sgro khyud kyis ni rnam par mdzes// kha khyer rnams
48a5(rgyud): la gnas pa'o// rdo rje la mo tshogs kyis mchod// zla ba phyed la/ gnas pa yi// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis mdzes// rlung gi/ sa bskyod pa'i ngar bzangs kyis// ba dan dril bu'i sgra sgrogs
48a6(rgyud): pa/ dra ba me long me tog gi/ phreng ba chen po btags pas rgya na// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje kun gyi mngon 'dus byas// rdo rje sems dpa' gnas chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi nges bsten pa// 
48a7(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa mchog/ rdo rje 'chang ba kun gyi gnas// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// nor bu chen po mchog ces bya// rdo rje chen po'i khang pa na// bde ba chen po bzhugs nas yin// thog
48a8(rgyud): mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje bsnyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ sems can kun gyi sems gang yin// brtan phyir sems
48b1(rgyud): dpar bshud ba yin// mnyam par gzhag pas ting 'dzin te// nges pa'i phyir ni rdo rjer 'gyur// sems dpa' byin rlabs sbyor ba yis// slar yang rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// de nyid rtag pa bcom ldan 'das/ 
48b2(rgyud): byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'gro yin// rang sems so sor rtogs sogs na// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// bdud ni sangs rgyas rdo rje can// rdo rje 'chang chen de nyid yin// de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i
48b3(rgyud): rigs 'di nyid rdo rje rigs chen po// de nyid pad+ma'i rigs dag pa// de nyid nor bu'i rigs dam pa// de nyid 'dod chags bral ba yis// 'dod dang thar pa nyid yin te// dus su srid gsum mchog gsum dang / 
48b4(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// mi g.yo thams ca da mchog de nyid// brtan zhing snying po nor bu che// rgyu ba sem sa kyi 'du byed thabs// thams cad byed pa thams cad nyid// 
48b5(rgyud): dang po'i sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems/ dpa' bde rab stsol// sems dpa'i skyil mo grangs bcas nas// pad+ma'i lte bar zhugs pa yin// btsun mo'i
48b6(rgyud): tshogs bcas sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyi bskor// bde ba chen po rab grub dang // chags pa chen po rnam dag phyir// ma lus gdul bya'i don dang ni// dngos grub thams cad rab grub
48b7(rgyud): phyir bdag nyid la sogs sems dpa' che// dngos grub thams cad rab grub phyir// dam tshig chen po dam tshig rnams// rgyal bas kyang ni srung bar mdzad// snyems bcas rdo rje gsor ba dang // rdo rje
48b8(rgyud): bsnyems bcas yang dag ldan// phyag rgya thams cad rnam dag dang // rdo rje sems dpa' mchog grub phyir// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la// ye shes phyag rgyar yang dag
49a1(rgyud): / ldan snying po chen por dam pa yin// gang gi bsod nams mi ldan dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma lus zhugs// don yod thogs med nyid mchog gi/ dngos grub thams cad rnyed mi/ 
49a2(rgyud): dka' 'a bde ba chen po rdo rje che// gsang ba'i mchog de dam tshig bstan// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa yin// rtog pa thams cad myur 'grub byed// thog mtha' med par dang po 'byung // bsod nams thams
49a3(rgyud): cad cher mtho ba// gzi can rnams dang bde mchog dang // 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// rjes su chags pa sgom pa zhes// ci bzhin ye shes rab 'jug pa// nye ba'i snying po bcas snying po// bskal
49a4(rgyud): thob bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// hUM de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa rnams// nye bar 'dzin pa mdzad nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad skyed par mdzad// sna
49a5(rgyud): tshogs 'gro ba kun bskyed nas// gtso bos dngos grub dris rgyu/ ra pas// ci ltar skad cig gis 'di 'grub// sems/ dpa' chen po myur du smos// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ 
49a6(rgyud): thog mar dkyil 'khor byin rlabs ni// rdo rje kun mchog dam tshig ni// cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs nas ni// de nas phan chad sems can 'byung // ji bzhin las kyi rjes 'gro ba// rtag par sdig pa kun spyod dang / 
49a7(rgyud): ngan sems dang ni le lo can// da ni skyes pa gsum gzigs nas// 'jig rten gtso bo rnams kyis gzigs// bcom ldan ci ltar 'o na ni// byis pa dge ba kun tu bskyed// de rnams kyi ni tshig gsan nas/ 
49a8(rgyud): tshig ni 'di skang gsus pa yin/ rje rje 'dzin kur byed pa pos// las kyi 'chi ba ltos gyur pa// de yi ga de thos nas ni// sras bcas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// thugs rje chen pos 'di skang gsungs/ 
49b1(rgyud): bde ba chen po rab grub dang // shin tu chags pa rnam dag phyir// kun mchog cho ga rgyas pa yis// snying po 'di ni bshad du gsol// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// dngos grub thams cad stsol ba yin// rtog/ 
49b2(rgyud): bkun gyi bde ba che// rdo rje gsang ba dang po mchog/ gzhan yang snying po bstan pa dang // dkyil 'khor la sogs cho ga che// sna tshogs phyi ma'i rgyud dang bcas// dngos grub thams cad rab grub byed/ 
49b3(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad khams chen po// phra rab rdul rnams dang mnyam pa// snying po chen po 'di nyid kyis// grub pa'i bden pa dam par 'gyur// de nas bde gshegs de rnams ni// de yi tshig
49b4(rgyud): mchog gsan gyur nas// dang po'i dkyil 'khor grub stsol pa/ de tshe de la gsol ba btab// chags pa dang bral 'dul ra ba'i phyir// chags bral bstan par bya ba 'am// 'dod chags
49b5(rgyud): thams cad rnam dag phyir// nyid kyi thugs kyis cho ga gsungs / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i glu chen po ga sung zhing dkyil 'khor rtags par mdzad do// thams cad
49b6(rgyud): rjes su chags pa bde ba dam pa'i thugs// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod no rab du byung ba yin// rab tu dga' ba 'gro ba kun gyi bde chen po// brtan mtho di ring bdag la myur 'grub mngon phyogs mdzod// 
49b7(rgyud): ces bya ba'i dkyil 'khor klu len cing brtags par mdzad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i sbyor ba yis// dang po'i dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// phyag na rdo rje thams cad du// rdo rje la mo la sogs
49b8(rgyud): tshogs 'ji ltar cho ga bzhin du ni// brgyan par bya te rab 'jug bya// g.yon du bu mo rdo rje 'dzin// bsdus te rnal 'byor bca' bar bya// rdo rje dang bcas snyems pa yi// phyag rgya mchog gi rang nyid
50a1(rgyud): 'jug dkyil 'khor re ru zhugs nas kyang // lan gsum du ni bskor bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i mdun 'dug ste// de nyid gsang ba'ang brjod par bya// dums su kha badz+ra sarba rma su ba ho// sa/ 
50a2(rgyud): ma ya s+t+waM a nu rak+to me b+ha ba/ su to Sh+yo me b+ha ba/ dr-i D+ho me b+ha ba/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha b+ha ga bI/ a na di ni d+he na swA hA// ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa sa ma ya gu h+ye sa ma ya sid+d+him+me pra yats+tsha oM ha ha ha ha a/ de nas rab tu dga'
50a3(rgyud): bas rdo rje lha mo dga' ba'i gtam bya'o// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti sa ma ya ke maT/ badz+ra kI li kI li he// hUM sma ra badz+re Na be d+ha tsU dra shu badz+ra Ni hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdun du nye bar 'dug te/ de bzhin
50a4(rgyud): du bcom ldan 'das bdag la 'grub par mdzod gcig ces bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba brjod par bya'o// myur du tham ngas cad rjes chags par// kI li kI las thams cad nus/ 
50a5(rgyud): thams cad rjes su chags dran dang // rtag tu legs par mnyes/ gyur pa dag/ oM ma hA su kha sid+d+ha badz+ra satwA dzaHhUM baM ha~MHsid+d+ha sa ma sa s+t+waM sid+d+hi hUM/ de nas chen po'i rdo rje chus dbang
50a6(rgyud): bskur zhing 'thungs la rdo rje rtse lnga pa bzung ste/ bdag rdo rje sems dpa' yin zhes rang gi ming brjod pa la snga ma bzhin du gar gyis mchod pas mchod pa bya ste ci ltar rnyed pa'i yul dang ldan pas slob
50a7(rgyud): ma dang / lhan cig mchod pa byas nas byung bar bya'o// slob ma gzhug par bya zhing rang nyid kyang der zhugs pas dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje slob dpon thams cad
50a8(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi bdag po dam tshig thams cad shes pa thams cad la tshar gcod pa dang phan 'dogs par nus pa// dngos grub thams cad phun sum tshogs pa'i ye shes kyi las byed/ 
50b1(rgyud): pa/ rang nyid 'jug pa tsam nyid kyis slob dpon ma yin pa dang dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs par skad cig nyid kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis rlob par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bcom
50b2(rgyud): ldan 'das nyid nges par rang nyi rang gi ma tshig gi rdo rje slob dpon du gyur nas 'jug par mdzad do// las thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas par mdzad pa yin no// snying po 'do'i byin rlabs kyis dkyil
50b3(rgyud): 'khor du ma zhugs na yang dkyil 'khor thams cad du zhugs pa dang / thams cad kyi sleb dpon du 'gyur ro// lan gcig bzlas pas mi sod pa dang / mi tshugs pa dang / thams cad du sna tshog
50b4(rgyud): pa'i yi ge rnams kyis mthong ba dang / thos pa dang / rig pa dang shes pa yin no// rdo rje 'chang chen po dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ma lus par mdzad
50b5(rgyud): nas dngos grub thams cad de la stsol ba yin no// yongs su sbyang ba dang rten pa'i don du ma yin no// bgegs byed/ pa rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ba ma yin no// 
50b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang chen shin tu brtan zhing shin tu dgyes pa rjesu chags pa shin rgyas pa dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes
50b7(rgyud): thams cad las thams cad gdon mi za ba'i grub pas myur du grub par mdzad pa yin no// 'on kyang gang gis bris sam 'drir bcug gam/ lan gcig brjod pa 'am/ 'dzin pa des ma
50b8(rgyud): bsgrubs shing dkyil 'khor du ma zhugs na yang tshe 'di nyid la ci ltar mngon par 'dod pa'i mchog gi dngos grub thams cad grub pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ don yod cing thogs
51a1(rgyud): pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po bdag po'i bdag dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang bar chad byed par mi nus so// thams cad rjes
51a2(rgyud): chags pa nyid kyi phyir ro// sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyang rjes su chags pa las byung ba yin no// 'dod pa brtan pas rje su chags te/ de mi 'dod pa ji ltar mchog gi bde ba chen po la sogs pa'i go 'phang
51a3(rgyud): thams cad tu 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar thogs pa med pa'i bcom ldan 'das chags pa chen po'i bde ba chen pos gsung so// grub na bde ba chen po ni// rdo rje chags pas skad cig ster// grub pa'i dam
51a4(rgyud): tshig 'di yin ste// 'di ni kun gyis 'da' bar dka'// sdig pa chen po byed pa 'am// de bzhin dkyil 'khor ma mthong ba lan gcig bzlas pas sdig sbyangs pas// mchog grub pas
51a5(rgyud): ni grub par 'gyur// rtog par gsungs pa 'am 'dod pa yi// sa 'gazugs brnyan rjesu dran bsgoms na// snying po/ yang na glegs bam du// thams cad nyid phyir bdag po grub
51a6(rgyud): gang la gzugs brnyan med pa dang // glegs bam med par 'gyur na yang // yi ge hUM ni thams cad du// bris te bdag grub bsgrub par bya// zhes bya ba don yod pa'i thogs pa med pa'i dngos
51a7(rgyud): grub can rdo rje 'chang chen pos gsungs so// de nas rtog pa'i rgyal po 'di'i// las kun sgrub par 'dod na ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig btab nas// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri bar bya// dang po'i/ 
51a8(rgyud): rdo rjes zhugs nas ni// brjod par bya ste// chags pa che las thogs pa che// thogs pa che las bde ba che// bde ba che las rdo rje brtan// rdo rje las ni phyag rgya 'byung sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// 
51b1(rgyud): gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya thams cad bshad pa ste// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang la sogs// yang dag
51b2(rgyud): bsdus par gyur nas ni// mnyam pa'i 'jig rten grub par 'gyur// ci ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya yis// bka' ni 'da' bar dka' ba ste// de bzhin rgyal ba kun gyis ni// phyag rgya 'da' bar nus
51b3(rgyud): pa min// sangs rgyas nyid dam rdo rje 'chang // de ltar bskal pa bye ba yis// thob min ci ltar phyag rgya mchog/ bsdus pa tshe 'di nyid la thob// ci ltar gdul ba'i 'jig rten ni// de bzhin dngos po
51b4(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub mas cad byed pa mchog/ de bzhin cho ga rgyas pa dang / dngos grub thams cad gdon mi za'o// de nas dang po'i dkyil
51b5(rgyud): 'khor gyi gsang ba'i dam tshig 'di yin te// sor mo thams cad kun sbyar nas// rdo rje thal mo zhes brjod do// sor mo nang du bcings pa las// rdo rje bsdams pa dag tu
51b6(rgyud): bshad rdo rje bsdams pa'i nang du ni// mdzub mo mthe bong yang dag sbyar// g.yas pa yi ni mthe bong ste// bcug ste btsir ba'i lcags kyu 'dzin// mda' lnga bsdus pa bcings pa nang du gnas
51b7(rgyud): mthe bong bsnyams pa'i mtha' rdo rje// dang po'i bde ba dam pa bstan// 'theb mdzub rtse sbyar dbus ma'i rtse// mig 'bras ltar sbyar 'dzin pa'o// dbus ma'i rdo rje'i 'og tu ni// mthe bong gis
51b8(rgyud): mnan btsir bar bya'o// rdo rje 'dren ma dang 'dra ba// srin lag mthe chung kha phye ba// bskor nas pus mor bzhag pa ni// dang po rdo rje las byung ba'o// gyen du gtor dang thur du blugs// mthe bong
52a1(rgyud): sbyar nas bskor ba dang // rab tu rkyang zhing byug pa dang // bskor zhing spyi bor gnas pa dang // bskor nas snying khar bzhag pa dang // yongs su bskor zhing dgod pa'o// kha las gyen du
52a2(rgyud): 'byung ba dang // de bzhin gar gyis bskor ba dang // mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyi dang // g.yon pa'i mdzub mo g.yas kyis bzung // mdzub mo'i mthe bo bcing ba dang // mthe bong mtha' ma'i nang du
52a3(rgyud): bzhag/ khu tshur gyi phyag rgya rnams so// de nas don yod cing thogs pa med pa 'di rnams kho na'i las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba mchog tu gsang ba bla na med cing bla ma'i las kyi tshogs sgrub par byed pa de
52a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pa'i bdag gis kyang gnon par mi nus so// de la bde ba chen po'i rdo rje dbus ma'i las rdo rje sen mo'i rtse mo'i mchu la sogs par
52a5(rgyud): gzhag pa dang // 'khor la rab tu bskor ba dang / rdo rje nor bu dang / ci ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub kun tu byed pa rnams kyis rdo rje 'chang chen po dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub
52a6(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams dang // rdo rje rin po che dang / mchog gi dngos grub bo// rdo rje 'dren mas ni mig 'bras kyi las so// g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i mig gis bltas pas thams cad rjes su chags
52a7(rgyud): pas so// mig 'bras tshur 'dran pas ni dgug pa'o// gzhug pas thams cad gzhug pa'o// bcir bas 'ching ba'o// btsums pa med pas dbang du bya ba'o// rdo rje ki li ki li las dbus ma la
52a8(rgyud): btsum pa na dang / 'khyud pa dang / rol pa dang / dbus ma dang mthe bo'i rtse mor bde bar rdeg pas mthong ba dang / rol pa dang / btsir ba rnams kyis thams cad la rol pa ste/ rgyu ba dang mi
52b1(rgyud): rgyu ba thams cad du lha'i gzugs kyis bud med rnams 'byung ba yin no// ci sring 'di rnams dang rol cing rdo rje sems dpa'i btsun mo la yang rol par byed do// rdo rje chu srin mas btsir ba dang / 
52b2(rgyud): gyen du bteg pa dang / myang ba dang / drung du 'gro ba dang / myur du za ba rnams kyis brtan pa'i chags pas bcing ba dang / thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang / chu'i nang du gnas pa dang // 
52b3(rgyud): 'chag pa dang / thams cad zab grub pa'o// rdo rje bskor bas g.yo zhing g.yo ba dang / lhod par byed pa dang btsir ba dang / dbus ma phan tshun lhan cig dgug pa dang / mgyog par dbu
52b4(rgyud): ma'i rdo rje dral pa rnams kyis khro bo thams cad 'bar ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / thams cad la rgyal btab pa dang / ltung ba dang / gsad pa rnams myur du 'grub po// the bo rje
52b5(rgyud): rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod na 'chang chen pos kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// de bzhin dri lce'i bu mo rnams kyis mthe bo rdo rje'i nang du zhugs pa'i
52b6(rgyud): las rnams kyis lha'i bu mo thams cad kyang bkug nas rol pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad nye bar sbyar ba'o// rdo rje lcags kyu ma la sogs pa'i nang gi khu tshur gyis las rnams kyi yid
52b7(rgyud): kyis 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad do// de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi rgyud ni rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag chen pos dngos grub dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes dang / las kyi dngos grub grub pa
52b8(rgyud): don yod pas grub pa myur du thams cad kyi bdag nyid bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs pas yid kyi 'dod pa grub pa'o// rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sems mi g.yo bar byed pas las
