78a5(rgyud): tu srung ba dang / yongasu bskyang ba dang / zhi ba dang / bde le gas su bya ba dang / tshe 'phel bar bya ba la ni rdo rje/ gar gyi sems dpa'i tshul gtsug tor gyi phyag rgyas/ 
78a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad mtshams dang phyogs dang / dam tshig dang / dngos grub bcing zhing srung ba ni rdo rje gar gyi so sor 'brang ba chen pos so// nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / 
78a7(rgyud): slar bzlos pa dang / rtag pa can pa dang / khyab 'jug gi rigs thams cad gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyis nad med pas so// gdung ba thams cad dang / gnod byed dang / nad dang / 
78a8(rgyud): mya ngan dang / sdug bsngal thams cad gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyis sdug bsngal nye bar zhi ba'o// dug dang sbyar ba'i dug la sogs nye bar thar pa dang / dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / 
78b1(rgyud): bza' ba dang / bdud rtsir bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi nye ba'i drug gis so// gdon thams cad dbab pa dang / bcing ba dang / dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug pa dang / rab tu gdul ba dang / spang ba la/ 
78b2(rgyud): nirdo rje gar gyi gdon las thar pa'o// thams cad la bcing ba dang / thar pa dang / dral ba dang / ltung ba dang / ldang ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje chen po'i khro bos so// mkha' 'gro ma thams
78b3(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya gzhig pa dang / gdon las thar bar bya ba dang / shi ba bslang ba dang / tshe mngon par 'phel ba dang / shin tu srung ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya'i lan gyis so// sgrib pa
78b4(rgyud): thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa da dang / bltas ngan pa dang / byur gzhig pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi zhi bas so// thams cad dbab pa dang / 
78b5(rgyud): bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / thams cad pa den par smrar gzhug pa dang / pra sen thams cad sgrub pa la ni rdo rje gar gyis thams cad 'bebs pa'i
78b6(rgyud): phyag rgya so// thad rgyas gdab pa dang / bsad pa dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / slar gso ba la ni don yod grub pa'i rdo rje gar gyis mkha' 'gro ma chen mos so// thams
78b7(rgyud): cad rengs par bya ba dang / rmongs par bya ba dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / bsad pa dang / bza' bar bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gdug pa'i srin pos so// gzhan gyi dpung
78b8(rgyud): thams cad skrag par bya ba dang / gzhig par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / ltung bar bya ba dang / bsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi gshed byed kyis so// khro bo thams cad
79a1(rgyud): bsal ba dang / bzhin ras dang bar bya ba dang / brtsod pa las rgyal ba dang / 'jigs pa las thar pa dang / g.yul 'gyed pa la sogs pa'i rgyal ba sgrub pa
79a2(rgyud): la ni rdo rje gar gyi rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan gyis so// sprin thams cad yang dag par bzung zhing mi g.yo bar bya ba dang / char chen po dbab pa dang / rlung dang / char dang / klog
79a3(rgyud): dang / ser ba bzlog pa dang / dro ba dang / grang ba gsal ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dbang po'i rdo rjes so// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya thams cad shin tu grub pa la ni rdo
79a4(rgyud): rje gar gyi 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis so// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba thams cad rje su chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / rtse ba dang / las thams cad la nges
79a5(rgyud): par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi dngos grub thams cad kyis// lha thams cad dbab pa dang / klu thams cad dbang du bya ba dang / gnod sbyin dang / 'byung po dang / ma mo
79a6(rgyud): thams cad las la nges par sbyar ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi rdo rje glu'i mchog gis so// rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo thams cad rab tu dbrog pa dang / lha dang
79a7(rgyud): lha ma yin gyi bud med thams cad rtse ba dang / 'jig rten gsum ma lus pa las rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug thams cad las rgyal ba dang / dbang phyug chen po thams
79a8(rgyud): cad dbrog pa la ni rdo rje gar gyi skyes bu byed pa chen pos so// mchod pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / thams cad rdo rjer bya ba dang / bdud la sogs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa
79b1(rgyud): dang / phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi myur du grub par bya ba la ni rdo rje gar gyi don yod cing
79b2(rgyud): thegs pa med pa myur ba'i las sna tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis so// de nas phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// nyin re dang po lan gcig ni// phyag rgyas thams cad rab
79b3(rgyud): sgrub byed// snying mchog lan gcig bzlas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po rab sgrub bya// de yis rje la nye snying po// las rnams kun la nges sbyar bas// don yod grub pas las rnams ni// kun
79b4(rgyud): la shin tu grub par 'gyur// phyag rgya thams cad rab tu ngan rlob// phyag na rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// dkyil 'khord dag kyang mthong ba la// ma bshad pa la'ang rab grub
79b5(rgyud): 'gyur rtog 'dir 'jig pa yod min te// 'khor lo ma/ de la brgya byin la// gang phyir bdag la byin rlob pas// rang sras rgyu ni 'gyur ba yin// sdig pa chen
79b6(rgyud): po byed pa la'ang // bsam pa shes nas sbyin par bya// 'di dag bcings tsam nyid dug byed// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i
79b7(rgyud): rgyal po bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi cho ga rgyas pa'i rtog pa'o// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// 'byin pa byed pa bde ba che// bde chen can du bstan phyir dang / 
79b8(rgyud): sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// khams kun dang mnyam pad pa med// kun gyi bdag nyid la zhugs te// mnyam pa'i dngos grub mchog spros nas// de bzhin gshegs
80a1(rgyud): pa'i rigs byung ngo // mtha' yas pa yi zhing thams cad// 'jig rten kun gyi khams bcas pas// de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// til gyi gang bu bzhin myur gang / 
80a2(rgyud): 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// sems can kun mdun yang dag bzhugs// sems can thams cad ma dag pas// rang rig las kyis dag ma gyur// de tshe sems can khams rnams
80a3(rgyud): ni// rang bzhin gyis ni gso dka' phyir// rang gi las ni sbyang don du// btang snyoms chen po mdzad pa yin// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// sems dpa' chen po bde ba che// byang chub
80a4(rgyud): chen por thugs brtan pas// skad cig gis ni yang dag bsku dal// sems can la phan bsod nams tshogs// byang chub sems ni brtan pa dag/ sems can khams
80a5(rgyud): ni rgud 'gyur bas// shin tu btang snyoms ma mdzad cig/ de nas sangs rgyas gis gsungs pa// sku gsung / thugs kyi rdo rje can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi
80a6(rgyud): thabs/ byang chub sems mchog khyod smros shig/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// de tshe kun nas byin gyis brlabs// bde ba chen po rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yin// khams
80a7(rgyud): gsum 'khor ba'i rgya khyon gyi// 'khor lo chen po gdod nas byung // de yis khams gsum gnas pa yis// sems can thams cad yang dag bsgrubs// sangs rgyas kun sogs
80a8(rgyud): dngos grub la// de tshe dag pa 'grub par 'gyur// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad la// 'dus nas gsol ba 'debs mdzad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che// sangs rgyas kun
80b1(rgyud): mchog bshad du gsol// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs la yang dag gnas// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje la// yang dag spros te 'dri gsungs// oM b+hA khaM/ de
80b2(rgyud): nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// bdud bcom la sogs mdzad nas ni// byang chub snying por byin gyis brlabs// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin/ 
80b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog gsungs pa// sems can la ni bde don phyir// rtog pa kun gyi bde ba che// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// dkyil 'khor
80b4(rgyud): chen po'i phyi rol mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo yang dag bri// 'tshe dar lo lte bar sangs rgyas nyid// 'dzum pa'i tshems ni mi snang ba// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM sid+d+ha mAM zhes
80b5(rgyud): brjod dgod// mdun du bdud las rnam par rgyal// mdzadapa'i sangs rgyas yang dag bri// g.yasu byang chub sems dpa' yi// nor chen pos ni dbang bskur ba/ 
80b6(rgyud): rgyab du byang chub sems dpa' dang // mnyam du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// g.yon du log par rnam dregs pa// sdig pa bsdus pa 'byin pa'o// de nas 'di rnams kyi snying po ni// badz+ra
80b7(rgyud): satwa/ badz+ra rat+na/ badz+ra d+harma/ badz+ra karma/ de nas phyag rgya rnams te/ satwa badz+ra raHbadz+ra rat+na/ bad+ma badz+re pad ma/ bi shwa badz+ri/ mtshams kyi char ni rdo rje dang / rin chen sdong bu nor bu
80b8(rgyud): dri'o// mtshams rnamasu ni lha mo ste// lha kyu la sogs sgo rnams su// de bzhin snga ma ci lta bar// 'khor lo de ni rtag par bya// mchod pa'i thal mo snying kar bcings// g.yon du
81a1(rgyud): de bzhin bskor bar bya// me tog dang bcas phyag rgya 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi dam tshig rim// me tog bcas te snying kar bcing // bsam pa g.yos pas gdud par
81a2(rgyud): bya mgon la mgo bos phyag byas la// bskor ba lan gsum byas nas ni// zhugs nas me tog dor bar bya// shin tu gsang ba yang dag dgug/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa
81a3(rgyud): thams cad mnyes par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / bsgrub par bya ba'i snying po 'di yin te/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sarba d+harma NA/ a d+ya nuta pan na twA ta/ de nas cho ga
81a4(rgyud): ji bzhin du// ston la me tog sil ma dor// sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub phyir// 'gro ba'i mgon la de nyid ba rjod// de yis kun nas sangs rgyas ni// thams cad
81a5(rgyud): 'dus pa nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mi dmigs sbyor ba yis// / dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// nga/ kyil 'khor der zhugs pa la ni// dngos grub thams
81a6(rgyud): cad 'grub par 'gyur// dga' ba la sogs mtshan ma mchog/ sna tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas de bzhin cho ga ni// rgyas pas slob ma mchog tu zhugs// mchod pa'i
81a7(rgyud): thal mos 'khor lo che// mchod nas slar ni dbyung bar bya// sgrub pa byas nas dngos grub kyang // cho ga ci bzhin rab bshad bya// ras la bcom ldan bdud la sogs// rnam par rgyal ba
81a8(rgyud): mnyes par bri// sgrub 'di lan gcig tsam gyis ni// de 'dra'i sgrub pas 'grub par 'gyur// sku gzugs sogs mdun yang dag par// ye shes khu tshur yongs bzung la// rdo rje'i tshig
81b1(rgyud): gi cho ga bzhin// bzlas brjod stong phrag brgya bya'o// mdor na 'bum ni rdzogs pa na// ci 'dod dngos grub thams cad dang // tshe mchog 'di la sangs rgyas nyid// thob 'gyur 'di la the tshom
81b2(rgyud): med/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ni// phyag rgya gang rung gcig bcings nas// bdag ni sangs rgyas yin bsgoms na// phyag rgya chen po'i dngos
81b3(rgyud): grub che// brtan par myur du thob par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig sgrub pa'i rgyud ni// snying khar rdo rje gzugs bzhag ste// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod la// bzlas brjod 'bum gyis bsgrub nas
81b4(rgyud): ni/ dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud ni/ bdud las nga rgyal ba'i mchog bcings te// chos kyi 'khor lo rab
81b5(rgyud): tu bskor// mtshungs med sems can don byas la// las kyi phyag rgya rtag tu 'grub ces bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
81b6(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas ma bsgrubs dngos grub mchog/ las rnams rab 'byams dag pa ste// sdig pa kun sel sna tshogs pa// go rims
81b7(rgyud): bzhin du rab bshad bya// 'di lta ste/ nad thams cad dang / mya ngan dang / gnod pa dang / gnod byed dang / dug thams cad dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gshed byed dang / g.yeng
81b8(rgyud): byed dang / ro langs dang / sngags dang / sman dang / bgegs dang / log 'dren dang / sdig pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / rims dang / gdon dang
82a1(rgyud): mkha' 'gro ma dang / nye bar 'tshe ba dang / 'go ba'i nad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bshig
82a2(rgyud): pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal 'phrog par byed pas so// tshe dang lang tsho dang / gzugs dang / kha dog dang / gzi byin chen po dang / mdangs dang / stobs dang // 
82a3(rgyud): spro ba dang / brtson 'grus dang / dpal dang / skal pa bzang po dang / bsod nams dang / ming dang / snyan pa dang / grags pa dang / dran pa dang / blo gros dang / brtan pa dang / 
82a4(rgyud): rtog pa dang / stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / phung po dang / 'du byed dang / sku dngag gsung dang / thugs 'phel ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde
82a5(rgyud): ba chen pos so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / ye
82a6(rgyud): shes dang / stobs dang / thabs dang / rdo rje dang / sgrub pa dang / gzungs dang / sa dang / spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang / chos dang / 
82a7(rgyud): las dang / sna tshogs pa'i bya ba dang / sems can gyi don dang / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa'i don dang / sku dang / gsung dang thugs grub pa la ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub
82a8(rgyud): thams cad kyis so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sems bskyed pa/ kun tu bzang po'i cho ga spyod pa rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi
82b1(rgyud): don dang 'pho ba dang / skye ba'i sa dang / gzhon nu'i rol pa ston pa dang / mngon par byung ba dang / dka' ba spyod pa ston pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad
82b2(rgyud): 'dul ba dang / byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / mu stegs thams cad tshar gcod pa dang / 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / 
82b3(rgyud): lha las babs pa dang / 'dus pa chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang / gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba dang / 'dul ba la rab tu bzhag pa dang / ngan 'gro thams cad las 'don pa dang / 
82b4(rgyud): mdo sde thams cad ston par mdzad pa dang / rtog pa tham das cad byin gyis brlabs pa dang / dngos grub thams cang sbyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
82b5(rgyud): sku dang / gsung dang / thugs las dmigs pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul sgrub pa la ni de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi sna tshogs kyi rdo rjes so// ci ltar
82b6(rgyud): phyag rgya 'di dag gis// byang chub sems la mngon ston pa// de ltar byang chub spyod tshegs kyis// byang chub dam pa thob mi 'gyur// don yod bsod nams dam pa yis// las kyi rab
82b7(rgyud): 'byam sgrub byed pa// cho ga ma grub pa rnams grub// sangs rgyas chos ni rab ster byed// rnam pa kun tu dang ldan pa'i// sems can kun la sbyin par bya// dkyil 'khor dag tu ma zhugs
82b8(rgyud): pa/ skad cig gis ni sbyor bar byed// dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje rtog pa rgyas pa'o// de nas
83a1(rgyud): sna tshogs las chen po// khyab bdag rdo rje 'dzin chen po// gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ sems can kun la rjes ston mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bskyed
83a2(rgyud): cing / gang phyir nyes byas kyis gdug pa'i// rang gi rang sems spyod pa yis// zhi bas sems can kun gyi don// gdul bar rab tu sgrub mi nus// sangs rgyas kun gyis bsgrub bya ba'i// 'gro
83a3(rgyud): pa 'di dag thams cad yin// gang tshe bde gshegs sems can don// dam pa mdzad par mi spyod pa// de tshe nyid kyis dngos po kun// gtso bos rdo rje gsol ba btab// sems can thams cad
83a4(rgyud): 'dul mdzad pa// bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab/ u tiSh+Tha sa ma ya kro d+ha ni sum+b+ha dz+wa la badz+ra hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// phyag na rdo rje rang nyid gtso/ 
83a5(rgyud): sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// slar byung nas ni mdun na gnas// khro chen rgyal po'i sku yis ni// sems dpa'i skyil dkrungs kyis lags bzhugs// 'bar ba'i
83a6(rgyud): phreng 'od kyis gsal ba// sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhan 'dra ba// g.yon pa'i rdo rje snyams pa che// drag tu gsor bas bskyod mdzad cing // 'bar ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba// rnam par 'phos/ 
83a7(rgyud): pas sreg pa yang // 'bar ba chen pos gsod pa ni// bskal pa'i me yi phung po 'dra// dang po'i rdo rje khro gnyer bcas// rdo rje mchog 'dzin pas gsungs pa// de la rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar// 
83a8(rgyud): 'bar ba zhes bya'i snying po 'di yin te/ hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// sdig pa kun gyi bud shing zad// 'jig rten khams kyi 'jig rten gsum// thams cad g.yos zhing 'dul bar
83b1(rgyud): 'gyur/ lha chen la sogs lha rnams ni// g.yo ba med cing mongs par 'gyur// rdo rje 'bar ba 'khrugs pa kun// de bzhin 'jig pa lta bur 'gyur// nyan thos dang ni rang rgyal rnams/ 
83b2(rgyud): ngan 'das par nye bar 'gro// lha la sogs pa'i sring gsum kun// de tshe kun tu rmongs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub yang bstan mdzad// sems
83b3(rgyud): dpa' kun gyi thabs chen po// dam pa yang ni thug su chud// de nas rdo rje 'bar ba'i mchog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// rdo rje mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// zhal ras khro dang bcas
83b4(rgyud): pa yin// g.yon brkyang bas ni legs par bzhugs// spyan re 'bar 'jig su rung ba ste// dbu skra gyen du brjes shing g.yo// kun nas 'khyil cing 'bar ba che// rdo rje gsang ba'i
83b5(rgyud): rnal 'byor che// mkha' 'gro'i tshogs kyi yul can rnams/ phyung nas kun tu 'gro ba rnams// thams cad du ni 'bar bar 'khrug/ rlung bskyod bskal pa'i ma lta bur/ 
83b6(rgyud): 'bar po'i phreng ba kun tu 'khrugs// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus na// sangs rgyas thams cad sras bcas pa// yang dag zhugs pa legs bskul te// 'jig rten thams cad yongs
83b7(rgyud): su bskor// bkug nas sems can kun don dang // brtan pa thams cad 'grub pa'i phyir// 'jig rten gsum dag de rnams dang // rgyu dang mi rgyu'i sems med byas// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal
83b8(rgyud): bos/ kun mchog lha yi dbang po ni// de rnams la ni thugs rje yis// 'chi ba slar gso brtan por gsungs// oM ut+tiSh+Tha ma hA d+ha pa ti badz+rA Ni shI g+h+raM ud thA pa ya hUM// rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba
84a1(rgyud): thams cad bslang ba'o// de nas sa gsum blang ba na// thams cad du ni shi ba gso// sangs rgyas dpa' bos btul gyur cing / rdo rje can gyis kyang rjes btul// de nas rdo rje 'dzin khro bas/ 
84a2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i rdo rje gsor byed cing // nga yi dam tshig la gnas zhes// sna tshogs pa la bka' rab bsgo// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ 'di su zhig lags/ bcom ldan sku ni zhi ba la// gnod sbyin
84a3(rgyud): gzugs can gang lags gsungs// khyed kyi dam tshig ci 'dra ba// zhus pa bde ba'i tshig tu gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas rnam grol ba// gdod skyes
84a4(rgyud): rdo rje gnod sbyin che// dkon mchog gsum dang de bzhin du// nga la skyabs su 'gro bar gyis// 'jig rten gsu dam gyis 'di thos nas// tshogs bdag tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas
84a5(rgyud): bskal pa'i me dpung lta bu yi// 'bar ba'i mtshon gyis 'thab pa ro brtsams// de rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis ni sangs rgyas rigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin
84a6(rgyud): shes ma yin// bdag cag 'jig rten gsum po gcig/ gnod sbyin sgo bas ci zhig bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin khros nas// khro gnyer dpral bar bsdus te gan// gnas de nas khro
84a7(rgyud): gnyer thams cad ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rjes su spyod// g.yon pa snyems pa rgya bcas pas// smin ma spyan bsdus pas rgod cing // nam mkha' khyab pa'i dbyangs kyis ni// rtag tu khros
84a8(rgyud): bcas pas smras so// de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i nye ba'i snying po// sems can mi lus rgyal ba la ni 'di yin te// hi/ de nas snying po 'di phyung bas// nges brgyal bcu cig
84b1(rgyud): bcings pa dang // dam tshig brtan pa 'dzin du bcug/ rdo rje ming gi dbang bskur nas// lag na rdo rje 'dzin mchog byas// rdo rje mang ni bin nas su// 'jig rten gsum po ting 'dzin bzhag// de nas / 
84b2(rgyud): rje chen po mchog/ mgon po yis ni gsol btab pa// sems can kun la rjes ston pas// rtog pa 'di ni bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po'i
84b3(rgyud): phyi rol tu// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo yang dag bri// de yi dbus su bzhag bya ba// sngon po 'bar ba gzugs bzang ba// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// zhal ni khro dang bcas pas bzhad// 
84b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i skyil krungs kyis legs bzhugs// bste mas bcos shes cher 'bar ba la// 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrugs pa yi// rdo rje gsor ba mdzad la brtson// de yi
84b5(rgyud): ngos ni thams cad du// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma yi gzug/ sa// rdo rje mtshon cha mdud chen dang // ral gri zhags/ kha mtshon 'dzin pa// mtshams su mda' dang kha Ta ga/ 'khor
84b6(rgyud): lo ba dan sna tshogs 'dzin// rdo rje'i rigs ni sna tshogs pa// 'bar ba'i 'khor los yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor dgod par bya ba ni// thig bdun gyis ni yang dag tu// dang po
84b7(rgyud): rdo rje phyag rgya gdab// gnyis pa sngags kyi lha mo ste// gsum pa rdo rje rgyal po ni// rdo rje lha mos yang dag bskor// rdo rje chen mo sgeg mo che// bzhi pa glu mkhan ma la sogs// rgyal rigs
84b8(rgyud): gsol ka bran rnams kyis// khre bi rnams ni lnga pa las// drug par rdo rje po nya mchog/ gnod sbyin srin po king ka ra// dbang phyug dam pa drag po sogs// gtum po chen po 'dul
85a1(rgyud): bar mdzad// phyi yi dkyil 'khor dbyibs rnams// mdor na ming po gsum la sogs// lha la sogs pa'i tshogs thams cad// legs par 'bri 'am bzhag par bya/ 
85a2(rgyud): mtshamasu lha mo rab bshad pa// de rnams kyi ni sgo dbus su'ang // lcags kyu la sogs de bzhin du// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// go rims dag ni ci bzhin du// cho ga rgyas pa ci
85a3(rgyud): bzhin bya// khros pas rdo rje gsor ba dang // khro gnyer 'dzum dang bcas pas mdud// de nas khro zhing slob dpon che// rdo rje can mchog rab zhugs la// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis bsdigs mdzub// hUM/ 
85a4(rgyud): mdzad rab tu sbyar bar bya// snyems dang bcas pas rgyas gad pa nyid// de bzhin khro bas gdul ba la// rdo rje 'chang chen rgyas pa yis// gdug pa nyid la rab tu dgyes// de
85a5(rgyud): nas me tog blangs nas ni// khros pas bdag po che la gto/ ra// rdo rje 'bar ba'i lcags kyu ches// yang dag pa/ ra yang dgug par bya// oM ma hA badz+ra dz+wa la yA na lArka ya/ 
85a6(rgyud): hi dzaHsarba badz+ra ku la pra be sha ya hUM/ sarba mu dzA gA nAn ban d+ha na traT/ sarba sa ma yaM sA d+ha ya phaT/ sarba duSh+TAn ta ha ba tsa b+ha ku ru ma hA kro d+ha ag+ni badz+re Na hUM phaT/ a a a a/ de nas
85a7(rgyud): bcom ldan khro bo yis// rgyal po bstan pa che byon 'gyur// rdo rje rigs la sogs pa kun// dngos grub thams cad gsol bar mdzad// de nas hUM mdzad la sogs sgras// mtshan ma rnams
85a8(rgyud): kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// gal te slob ma la sogs la// snying khar dbab pa phra ba skyed// de nas rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis// phyag rgyas slob ma gzhug par bya// bcug nas dang po'i sems dpa'
85b1(rgyud): yi/ rang gi snying po brjod par ba// d+hu d+hu badz+ra pra ha ra Ni phaT/ hU badz+ra shu la yA gr-in tI ta/ ma ta/ sar+b+ba badz+ra ko le ts+tshin+da haM/ oM badz+ra a ma la pa she maT/ rdo rje 'gugs pa dang / rdo rje mdung dang / 
85b2(rgyud): rje ral gri dang / rdo rje zhags pa ste/ rdo rje khro bo'i srung ba'o// de nas 'di rnams kyi phyag rgya rdo rje don yid thogs pa med pa shin tu grub pa// stobs dang pha rol gnon pa rnams sems can mngon
85b3(rgyud): par rgyas gdab pa nus pa rnams bskul bar bya'o// oM badz+ra gu h+ye sid+d+ha pa ra ma yo ge shwa ri hi/ hUM badz+ra tsaN+Da ho kha nA ga ma hA badz+ra ka pA la ya ma ku ste/ ru lu ru luNI hUM badz+ra nA rA ya ni dzi/ hUM
85b4(rgyud): badz+ra pa Ta ke dza~M/ rdo rje khro bo'i mkha' 'gro ma lan gcig pa zlas te dgod pa 'am/ bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'dus de kho na nyid kyi snying pos gzhugs su gsol na dngos
85b5(rgyud): grub thams cad la don yod pa'i dngos grub 'grub par 'gyuraro// de nas dam tshig brjod par bya ste/ sem/ sa can rnams la bde phyir dang / bstan pa thams cad
85b6(rgyud): 'grub pa'i phyir// gdug pa 'dul ba bsod nams ni// 'gyur zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs// de nas bcom ldan 'das hUM mdzad kyis phyag rgya dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo sbyar bar
85b7(rgyud): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad dang / bdud thams cad dang / 'jig rten gsum po thams cad yang dag par 'dul ba nyid du byin gyis rlob par mdzad do// 
85b8(rgyud): de nas dbang bskur ba rgyas pa la sogs pa de bzhin du byas la rdo rje khro bo'i las bzhi pa bslab par bya ste/ phyag rgya rnams kyis sems can rnams rgyas gdab pa dang / phyag rgya gzhig
86a1(rgyud): dang / bsad pa dang / slar 'tsho bar bya'o// gang la phyag rgya sbyar ba ni 'chi bar 'gyur ba de ni gdug pa yin par shes par bya'o// de nas 'tsho bar byed pa'i phyag rgyas
86a2(rgyud): 'tshe bar byas la shin tu srung ba rab tu sbyar ba byas na shin tu srung ba yin pa'i phyir/ gdug pa rnams slar yang gnod par mi byed do// de nas brtsams te slob ma bzang // dkyil 'khor tshegs ni/ 
86a3(rgyud): kun gyis kyang // mi tshugs pa dang mi sod par// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// de nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ste// ci bzhin sku ni dge 'dun du// rdo rje gsor zhing dang por ni// bzlas brjod stong
86a4(rgyud): phrag brgya bya'o// 'bum tshang nas ni sems dpa' che// rdo rje se mas dpa' dang mnyam mchog/ rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ma chog/ rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// gdug pa rnams
86a5(rgyud): ni rjes 'dul zhing // sangs rgyas kun la rab mchod par// 'jig rten gsum du legs snang zhing // cis kyang nga 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// de nas de kho na nyid kyi snying
86a6(rgyud): po sgrub pa ni// 'greng ngam yang na 'dug pa 'am// 'gro ba 'ang nyal bar byed pa na// ci ltar de ltar 'bum bzlas na// tshe 'di nyid la 'grub par 'gyur// 'di yis 'dod pa'i dbang
86a7(rgyud): phyug kun// 'dod pa tsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // dngos grub kun gyis dbang phyug grub// rgas dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// 'gro ba rnams kyis mchod pa dang // rang gi nye du rnams// 
86a8(rgyud): kyis brten// gdug pa thams cad rjes 'dul zhing // gang la 'jigs pa med par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das khro bo'i rgyal po chen pos gsung so// de nas phyag rgya'i dam pa sgrub pa
86b1(rgyud): yin la/ ci bzhin dus su phyag rgya bcing // bdag nyid nye bar bsregs nas ni// srid 'di nyid du khro chen po'i// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig sgrub pa ni// 
86b2(rgyud): bdag ni thams cad bsad bya zhes// brjod mi phyag na rdo rje yis// dam tshig phyag rgya bcings nas ni// bzlas na rdo rje 'dzin 'grub 'gyur// de nas las rnams sgrub pa ni// las rnams dam
86b3(rgyud): pa sgrub pa ni// rnam pa bzhir ni rab byed cing // thams cad bde ba'i phyir zos na// rdo rje las nyid thob par 'gyur// sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas dngos grub sgrub pa ni// 
86b4(rgyud): rdo rje khro mchog rgyal po yi// las kyi rgyun ni dam pa rnams/ go rims bzhin du bshad par bya// 'di lta ste/ thams cad sreg pa dang / bskrad pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 
86b5(rgyud): rengs pa dang / gnyid log par bya ba dang / rgyas gdab pa da nga/ rmongs pa dang / gzhig pa dang / bcing ba dang / gzir ba dang / dral ba dang / rdeg pa dang / 'bar ba da
86b6(rgyud): bsgyel ba dang / gtso ba dang / bcad pa dang / dbug pa dang / phye mar bya ba dang / gtor ba dang / rnam par gzhom pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / gdon gyis zin du gzhug pa dang / 
86b7(rgyud): sbyong bar bya ba dang / gsad par bya ba la ni rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis so// thams cad 'dug par bya ba dang / nges par bkod pa dang / bskyod pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / glu len du
86b8(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / brgyal du gzhug pa dang / rtser gzhug pa dang / ha ha zhes dgod du gzhug pa dang / 'khor ba dang / drang ba dang / 'od du gzhug pa dang / sgom pa dang / nub par
87a1(rgyud): / bya ba dang / dbyung ba dang / 'phang ba dang / nye bar ldog pa bya ba dang / bskur ba dang / ngaro 'don par bya ba dang / ngur gzhug par bya ba dang / rang nyid brdeg par bya ba
87a2(rgyud): dang 'ching bar bya ba dang / skra 'bal bar bya ba dang / zhe 'gras par bya ba dang / gos pa shu ba dang / khro ba 'bar bar bya ba la ni khro bo'i gdan gyi phyag rgya so// thams cad dgug
87a3(rgyud): pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dbab pa dang / pra sen sgrub pa dang / bden pa smra bar brjod pa dang / sgyu ma ston cing lan ston pa ston pa dang / dus tshigs kyi 'khor lo yongasu bzlog
87a4(rgyud): pa dang / dus ma yin par shing las me tog 'bras bu smin par byed par ston pa dang / 'bru thams cad yang / dag par ston pa dang / rims dang / sbyar ba'i dug
87a5(rgyud): dang / gdon dang / dug dang / mkha' 'gro ma las thar pabya dang / g.yul 'gyed pa thams cad las tharapar bya ba dang / gzhan gyi dpung gzhom pa dang / phyogs
87a6(rgyud): dang / mtshams dang / dkyil 'khor bcing ba dang / shin tu srung ba dang / yongasu skyob par bya ba dang / thar par bya ba dang / bslang ba dang / dbang du bya ba la ni khro bo chen po sna
87a7(rgyud): tshogs grub pas so// lha la sogs thams cad ltung bar bya ba dang / klu gdon par bya ba dang / gnod sbyin rje'u 'brang bar bya dang / srin po skrag pa dang / mkha' 'gro ma la sogs
87a8(rgyud): pa'i gdon thams cad dang / bdud kyi dpung thams cad gzhom pa dang / ma mo rnams gdul ba dang / gdug pa'i tshogs rnam par gtor ba dang / gdug pa rnams tshar gcod pa
87b1(rgyud): dang / 'dum pa dang / 'jigs pa med par yang dag par bskyed pa dang / nor bu bzang po dbang du bya ba/ nor sbyin las nor bu thams cad dbrog pa dang / rnam thos sras mnan nas dpal
87b2(rgyud): drang ba dang / lha'i bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad dang brtse 'jo bya ba dang / brgya byin mnan nas bde tsigs ma dbrog pa dang / skye ma byed tshar bcad pa dang / tshangs pa ltung bar bya ba dang / 
87b3(rgyud): khyab 'jug 'dul ba dang / dbang phyug chen po las rnam par rgyal ba dang / 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mnan nas dga' ba mo dbrog pa dang / rdo rje sgrub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'
87b4(rgyud): sgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa/ ru bya ba dang / dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / da/ dam tshig gi bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / sgrub pa
87b5(rgyud): la ni rdo rje khro bo chen po rgyal po dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// zhes kyang gsungs so// lan gcig bzlas pas mchog grub pa// thog ma'i rtsa snying bzang lan gcig/ 
87b6(rgyud): de yi 'og tu khro gnyer gyis// bsgrub bya thams cad grub pa yin// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje me dang nyi ma ltar rab tu 'bar ba'i rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// 
87b7(rgyud): de nas ting 'dzin thams cad ni// rnam dag mchog gi chos nyid las// spyan ras gzigs dbang chen po ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gtso chen yin// gdug pa thams cad 'dul don du// rang
87b8(rgyud): rigs rin po che ni bskyed// sangs rgyas kun gyi khro bo che// thabs med pas ni thabs yin no// 'dod chags la sogs kun bsags pas// ma dag sems can khams dag ni// de rnams
88a1(rgyud): la ni rab spyod par// skyes bu mchog ni rnam par mkhyen// mchog tu mi 'dul ba nyid kyis// sangs rgyas kyang ni mnga' mi mdzad// 'jig rten kun na 'jig rten mchog/ rang
88a2(rgyud): snying bzang ba la snyoms zhugs// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje
88a3(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ gang la gzigs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thams cad kyi thugs su chud par gyur pa'o// bsnyems
88a4(rgyud): pas pad+ma g.yos pa ni// gzung ste 'dab ma 'byed mdzad pa das// ci nus pa yi ting 'dzin gyi// rang bzhin gyis da ni gzigs par mdzad// ci ltar pad+ma dmar po 'di/ 
88a5(rgyud): tshon gyi nyes pas mi gos pa// gnas kyi nyes pa sna tshogs pa'i// khams gsum pa ni de bzhin dag/ 'di la gzigs pa la sogs pas// rgyal ba rnams ni
88a6(rgyud): dbang por 'gyur// de yis rdo rje sems dpa' ni// spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gyur// de bas sgom pa'i snying po 'di// dag par bsgoms pas sgom par ni// rdo rje 'chang ba chen
88a7(rgyud): po ni// pad+ma chen po 'chang bar 'gyur// gser sbyangs ro yi dbang po ste// rgyal po chen po dang mnyam pa// bsnyems pa g.yon pa'i pang mchog gis// tshul gyi 'dul ba mdzad pa na/ 
88a8(rgyud): pad+ma'i rigs mchog ston pa'i phyir// rgyal po rnams kyis gsol ba btab// de nas thams cad 'dul mdzad cing // shin tu dkar ba'i chos 'dzin pa// rdo rje chos te rang rgyal po// 'jin
88b1(rgyud): rten dbang pos bka' stsal pa// phyi ni dkyil 'khor chen po la// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bri// de yid dbus su spyan 'dzum pa// 'jig rten dbang phyug dgod par bya// gser sbyangs lta bu'i pad+ma
88b2(rgyud): ni/ g.yon bsnyems tshul gyis gzigs mdzad pa// rgyal mtshan kun gyis rnam par spras// sangs rgyas sku mchog spyi bor bzhugs// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku ni brgyad po
88b3(rgyud): bri/ rang gi 'dzin pa pad+ma che'i// ting nge 'dzin la rnam par gzigs// 'jig rten dbang po'i gzugs legs// sangs rgyas la sogs rigs kyi lha// zhi ba sred med bu tshangs pa// 'dod pa'i
88b4(rgyud): gzugs ni pad+ma can// spyi bor 'tsher zhing mgrin 'degs/ pa// rta mgrin lcags kyu bcings nas ni// chos kyi/ tshigs gis spyan drang bya// de nas pad+ma'i snying po ni// sa
88b5(rgyud): ta thA ga ta pad+ma dzaM/ hUM badz+ra pad+ma he pad+ma/ pad+ma baM/ ho par+tha ni rA dza/ de nas mtshams rnamasu ni/ hUM pad+me tsaN+Da sh+tsarahUM/ he ma hA bai shwa pad+mA tsur Ne sid+d+ha hUM/ marba hrI/ pad+ma
88b6(rgyud): pad+mo hUM a ho pad+ma a shwa/ kra ma kra ma hUM dzaHdkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul gyis ni// cho ga rgyas par byas nas ni// pad+ma chen po me tog bcas// ma yengs yid kyis phyag bya'o// dkyil
88b7(rgyud): 'khor zhugs nas ting nge 'dzin// las byung gzugs 'di brjod par bya// oM bi sho d+ha ya/ ma nu sa ni shud+d+ha ma hA satwa/ d+hA tu sa ma ya satwa/ rA ga dI paM tsa ye/ tsit+taM ma sar+b+ba d+ha me Sh+ya brdzi
88b8(rgyud): Ni tsit+ta me sar+b+ba d+ha maM sh+ya dzi ni/ gzungs kyi phyag rgya gsan nas ni// dgyes pas pad+ma 'dzin pa ni// de nas mdzub mo lcags kyu bcing // chos kyi tshig gi legs spyan drangs// oM sarba ta
89a1(rgyud): thA ga ta a ba lo ke shwa ra pad+ma ham+b+ha/ ya hi shrIg+h+raM ma me badz+ra mu drA a gri sh+ya sa be sa ma yer ba d+ha bi shi ki mi/ dzaHhUM ba hoHsho d+ha ya sarba sA d+ha ya pa ma ma/ ma hA badz+ra d+ha rar+dz+dza/ 
89a2(rgyud): de nas 'jig rten 'dzin par rang nyid byon// 'jig rten kun mchog grub 'gyur ba'i// ting 'dzin cho ga nges par mdzad// de nas de bzhin slob ma rnams// gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni// dngos
89a3(rgyud): grub thams cad sbyin pa yis// ye shes dag ni bslab par bya// ting 'dzin snying po 'di yi ni// sgrub pa chen po gdod nas 'byung // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug nyid// go rims bzhin
89a4(rgyud): du bshad par bya// bud med rnams kyi nang zhugs pa 'am/ gdug pa kun gyi nang / chud pa 'am/ gang yang rung ba dar 'dug nas ni// pad+ma chen po yongasu bzung // dus dang
89a5(rgyud): stobs ni ci bzhin du// nye rings ci nus bsgrub par bya// ga 'di yis tshe 'di la// myur du mchog ni grub para'agyur// 'dod chags kun gyis bde myur bar// 'dod/ 
89a6(rgyud): patsam gyis 'gro 'ong lding // 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug rgya la// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' nyid// phyag na rdo rje nyid dang ni// dngos grub
89a7(rgyud): kun gyi mtha' yas mchog/ tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya sgrub pa ni// phyag rgya bcings te ting 'dzin gnas// dngos grub chen po nyid thob po// dam tshig dam tshig
89a8(rgyud): mchog gis te// las kyi las mchog phyag rgya so// sgrub pa chen po'i cho ga'i rgyud de// de nas dngos grub ma grub pa'i// ting 'dzin las ni 'dres pa dag/ dang po'i ting 'dzin grub pa ni// go
89b1(rgyud): rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// 'di lta ste/ sgrib pa thams cad dang / sdig pa thams cad dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / lhas ngan pa dang / yams dang / 'tshe ba dang / nad 'gro ba dang / nyon
89b2(rgyud): mongs pa dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa dang / rtsod pa dang / 'thab pa dang / byis pa'i gdon dang / dmu rgod dang / nyon mongs pa dang / ngal ba dang / sdug
89b3(rgyud): bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / dbul ba dang / rgyags pa dang / reg na mi bde ba dang / skal ba ngan pa dang / nad med pa ma yin pa dang / nor brlag pa rnams la ni pad+ma chen po zhi bas// 
89b4(rgyud): rlung dang / 'khris pa dang / khrag dang / bad kan dang / 2dus pa dang / ma zhu ba dang / rims dang / sbyar ba'i dag dang / dug dang / mdze dang / 'brum bu phra mo dang / g.yan
89b5(rgyud): pa dang / rkang shu dang / sman dang / chu'i dmu rdzing dang / mtshan par rdol ba dang / sha bkra dang / zad byed dang / khra gzad pa dang / khu ba zad pa dang / nad thams cad dang / 
89b6(rgyud): gnod pa dang / gnod byed dang / gdon dang / 'phra men rnams gso ba la ni pad+ma chen po sman gyi phyag rgya 'dzin pas so// thams cad rdo rjer byas pa dang / chos dang / go cha dang / gtsug tor
89b7(rgyud): gtsug pud dang / mtshams dang / phyogs dang / dkyil 'khor dang / sa dang / na mkha' dang / rdo rje'i gdan dang / khang pa chen po dang / rdo rje ra ba dang / me 'bar ba dang / thal ba'i ra ba dang / 
89b8(rgyud): rdo rje dang / ri bong don yod pa la sogs pa dang / srad pus yongs su bskor ba dang / phur bus gdab pa dang / zas dang / btung ba dang / gos dang / rgyan dang / phyag rgya dang / srung ba la ni
90a1(rgyud): / pad+ma chen po thams cad srung bas so// tshe thams cad dang / stobs dang / kha dog dang / gzi brjid dang / mdangs dang / lang tshe dang / brtson 'grus dang / spro ba dang / nad
90a2(rgyud): med pa dang / dpal dang / skal ba bzang po dang / nor dang / 'bru dang / dbang phyug dang / 'byor pa dang / dngos grub dang / bla dang / rnyed pa dang / bkra shis pa dang / ming dang / grags
90a3(rgyud): pa dang / snyan pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dam pa 'grub pa ni/ pad+ma chen po mchog grub pas so// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las chos thams cad sgrib
90a4(rgyud): pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdo rje'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mi 'gyur na mkha' che// tha ma das cad dbang bskur kun gyi don// kun dbang rin chen
90a5(rgyud): thams cad 'dzin// ting nge 'dzin gyis rab byin rlab// bad ga po chen po rab sad mdzad// chos rnams la ni rnam gzigs pas// kun don dbang phyug gdod nas byung // 
90a6(rgyud): nyi zla dang ni gza' skar can// nam mkha' nyid du 'gyur ba yin// de nas rin chen ting 'dzin ni// nges par rdo rje can du brjod// de nas na mkha' rdo rje nyid// ljang sngon bai DUr+ya mnyam mdangs// 
90a7(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rnams dge ba// nam mkha'i snying po yang dag gyur// de nas bcom ldan thog ma nyid// mdzod spu kun gyi gnas na bzhugs// ting nge 'dzin la rnam gzigs pas// 'jig rten
90a8(rgyud): dbang phyug bdag po nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad sras dang // de bzhin rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ rdo rje rin chen de yos ni// kun rig kun gyi dbang bskur phyir// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs bya'i phyir// kun
90b1(rgyud): mchog kun la dbang bskur nas// shis pa brjod pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarba badz+ra satwa a d+hi pa ti tra a b+hi liSh+Ti b+hir+N+Na ba sa/ de nas bzang pos 'di gsungs shing // legs par shis brjod dbang / 
90b2(rgyud): bskur bas// rdo rje rin chen che de las// chos kyi gtso bor byung bar gyur// byung nas 'gro ba thams cad ni// ci rogs par ni kun dbang bskur// rdo rje kun gyis dbang bskur nas// slar yang
90b3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor tshul gyis bzhugs// bde gshegs kun gyi byin rlabs pa// rdo rje rin chen bla na med// shin tu dbang phyug chen po'i mchog/ dngos grub gsol ba'i rtog pa gsungs// dkyil
90b4(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i phyi rol ni// na mkha'i 'khor lo na mkha'i mdog / nyi ma zla ba skar ma dang // gza' rnams kyis ni rgyan pa bri// de dbus na mkha'i snying po ni// bdag nyid thams
90b5(rgyud): cad dgyes par bzhag/ dag pa'i bai DUr+ya mdog 'dra// 'od zer 'bar ba sna tshogs 'khrug/ g.yon pa rin chen thugs kar bston// g.yas pas nor chen rab stsol
90b6(rgyud): bde yi ngos su sems dpa' mchog/ bzhi po gzugs bcas dam pa yin// dbang bskur ba dang gter nyid dang // nor bu chen po bla med dang // 'byor pa dpal ni phun sum tshogs// 
90b7(rgyud): rang nyid mtshan mas mchod pa ni// de la de dag gi snying po 'di yin te// badz+ra satwa dzaHbadz+ra rat+na hUM/ badz+ra d+har+m+ma baM/ badz+ra kar+m+ma ho// de nas gzungs rnams kyi snying po ba shade/ oM pra ti badz+ro phaT/ oM badz+ra pra
90b8(rgyud): ti hi hrI/ oM tsin+d+ra ma Ni hoHoM badz+ra ma hA ma ho haM/ dkyil 'khor chen po'i khu tshur gyis// cho ga rgyas pa tsa bzhin bri// nor bu'i khu tshur gyis bzhugs pa// mkha' skyes las ni
91a1(rgyud): mgos phyag bya// bzhugs nas na mkha' mkhas pa yi// dam tshig dam pa brjod par bya// khyed ni na mkha' las byung ba'i// thams cad kyis ni lnga pa yin// oM i sid+d+hi b+hud+d+ha
91a2(rgyud): ba sid+d+ha swa/ sid+d+hi ma hA rat+na/ ba ba To Ta tAM/ 'di ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// mkha' snying dngos grub thams cad dang // phun tshogs kun la shin tu ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// ces
91a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin chen bla na med pas gsungs so// de nas nor bu khu tshur can gyi ljags kyus dgug par bya'o// oM b+hu rA ya hi dzA/ b+ha ba pra bi sha hUM swA/ gr-ih+Na baM ba ba Ta Ta sid+d+ha ho traM/ 
91a4(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan myur du ni// byon nas dngos grub thams cad ni// 'byor pa shin tu g.yo ba la// don ni rab tu/ 'grub par 'gyur// de nas slob ma phyag rgya ni// me tog
91a5(rgyud): bcas pa mchog gis gzhug/ bcug nas de nyid mtsho ga snying po// bden pa lan gcig brjod du gzhug/ de nas 'byor pa'i mchog brtag pa// dpal gyi phun tshegs
91a6(rgyud): mchod pa che// 'jig rten mchog gi dngos grub rnams// bde bar gshegs pa bzhin du 'thob// de nas de phyir grub pa bshad// rdo rje rin chen rgyal mchog gis// dpag med zlos pas
91a7(rgyud): bsgrub bya zhing // 'di yis skyes mchog 'di nyid la// 'dod chags 'gro dang 'ong bar 'gyur// rin chen kun gyi dbang phyug rgyal// rga dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur// dngos grub kyi dam
91a8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyang de bzhin no// phyag rgya sgrub pa ni dga' ba nyid kyiso// dam tshig gi phyag rgya sgrub pa ni dam tshig gi khu tshur gyis so// de bzhin du las sgrub pa ni// dngos grub bla na
91b1(rgyud): med pa yin no// phyag rgya chen po sgrub pa nyid de'i rgyud do// de nas de phyir las rnams kyi// rab 'byam rgyun ni dam pa dang // dngos grub chen po kun bsgrubs pa// go rims ji bzhin rab bshad
91b2(rgyud): bya ba 'di lta ste/ 'byor pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa'o// bsag pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa

92a3(rgyud): tshogs pas so// mchod pa thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dbrog pa dang / bsag pa dang / len pa dang / 'dren pa dang / 'gugs pa
92a4(rgyud): dang / gtod pa dang / gzhig pa dang / 'phen pa dang / 'degs pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / rdeg pa dang / sbyang ba dang / rnyed pa dang / nyo ba dang / btsong ba dang / kun
92a5(rgyud): tu dgod pa dang / nye bar dgod pa dang / brtan par bya ba dang / rdo rjer bya ba dang / 'byor pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / 'byor pa thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa la ni rdo rje
92a6(rgyud): rin chen gyi mchod pa sgrubs pas so// zhes kyang gsungs so// sems can thams cad bde don du// rdo rje sems dpa' nor che ba// rang gi rgyal mchog lan gcig sgrub// yi ge tra ni
92a7(rgyud): sbyar bar bya// dpal mchog dang po rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa rdo rje rin chen gyi rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// / de nas rgyal ba rdo rje
92a8(rgyud): 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum po khams gsum pa// 'jig rten gsum bdag thams cad la// 'jig rten gsum mchog 'dul mdzad pa// cho ga bzhin du sgom 'gyur zhing // sems can/ 
92b1(rgyud): don phyir cho gas bzhugs// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu rnam par gnas pa yin// mi mnyam pa yis rten gyur na// dug nyid du ni nye bar 'gro// bdud rtsi nyid kyis brten gyur na// bdud
92b2(rgyud): rtsi nyid du'ang 'gyur ba yin// 'dod chags tshangs pa mchog 'byin pa// zhe sdang drag po'i ting 'dzin gyis// gti mug khyab 'jug brtan mdzad nas// 'jig rten gsum po byin gyis brlab
92b3(rgyud): 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// rtag tu gnas pas srid gsum gnas// chos kyi rten nas gsum mchog ste// chos min rten pas ngan song gsum// 'dod chags sbrang rtsir byed par bshad/ 
92b4(rgyud): zhe sdang rgyal bar byed par bshad// gti mug don ni sgrub byed ces// kun tu gsang ba'i ming yin no// nga ni 'ag rten gcig pu nyid// 'jig rten gsum du rab tu bshad/ 
92b5(rgyud): nga ni 'dod pa gcig pu nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung yin// de nas gsum po 'di yis mchog/ sbyang phyir/ rdo rje sbyang 'dzin pa// gzugs ni gsum po 'di dag nyid// 
92b6(rgyud): bdag nyid kho na 'byung ba yin// gang phyir 'jig rten 'di dag ni// rtag tu yang ni 'di skad smra// tshangs sogs kyis 'dul yang dag pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub snod ma yin// de rnams sbyang
92b7(rgyud): phyir bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje 'chang chen rang nyid ni// gzugs ni gsum pa 'di mdzad nas// phyis ni sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// de nas tshangs pa la sogs lha// 'jig rten gsum
92b8(rgyud): mchog dbang phyug chen// dkyil 'khor der ni gsang snying po'o// rang gi rang grub phyir rab phul// oM b+hAr b+hu baHswaHzur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// sgo srung bzhis ni rab srung ba/ 
93a1(rgyud): kha khyer gyis ni legs bskor ba// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang ma nyid dang ni// dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs can la// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal nyid byed// sgrub
93a2(rgyud): pa thams cad sgrub pa ni// go rims dag ni ci bzhin du// legs par bri 'am bzhag par bya// dbus mo gnyis kyis zhugs la der// rtse gsum dam tshig gis mtshan pas// zhugs
93a3(rgyud): te dam tshig bcings nas ni// yang dag par na dgug par bya// oM b+hur+N+Na baHswaHswasti na maHswA hA// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// thams cad thams cad kyis bskor ba// thams cad
93a4(rgyud): grub phyir 'ongs pa la// de snyed pa yi gtor ma sbyin// cho slob dpon rab tu zhugs pa yi// slob ma thams cadagazhug par bya// de nyid gsang ba brjod nas ni// dam
93a5(rgyud): tshig mchog ni sbyin par bya// gal te khyod kyis rtse gsu/ ma bcag/ snying po snod min la smra sa ma// ji skad smras pa'i chos rnams ni// gal te 'dir ni ma spyad dam// snying
93a6(rgyud): stobs rdul dang mun pa nyid// tshangs pa drag po g.yung drung ste// ming po gsum po 'di nyid ni// nam yang brnyas par mi bya'o// gang zhig 'di rnams sgom pa slob// yang dang yang du zhug
93a7(rgyud): nas ni// dkyil 'khor mchod par byed pa dang // dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// rang gis phyag rgya bslabs nas ni// de la gar gyi mchod pa dang // 'dod yon dam pa lnga rnams kyis/ 
93a8(rgyud): rtag tu dkyil 'khor mchod par bya// 'jig rten gsum 'byin pa'i rgyud do// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sems can kun rje ston mdzad pa// 'jig rten gsum phyung ngon
93b1(rgyud): grub tu// slar yang sring mo rnams 'byin mdzad// kun tu chags dang zhe sdang rmongs// brtan par byed pa'i rgyu yin no// dga' dang phra dog bud med ni// rab tu grags pa'i grub kun ster// gang
93b2(rgyud): zhig 'jig rten kun tu bshad// tshogs kun gyis mchod lha mo rnams// zhi dang 'jigs ma de bzhin gser// grub pa dang ni zhi bar bshad// phyi rol sems can phan phyir dang // rtog
93b3(rgyud): don khong du chud bya'i phyir// de rnams kyi ni snying po dang // dkyil 'khor de bzhin dam tshig bshad// hi hUM shrI sh+ya/ dkyil 'khor chen po bzhi pa ni// srad bu gsum gyi dkyil 'khor bya/

93b6(rgyud): nas dang po'i dkyil 'khor du// kun nas de bzhin bzhugs nas ni// sring mo rnams kyis rang gi rgyus// go rims dag ni ci bzhin du// zhugs nas de bzhin cho ga bya// spos la
93b7(rgyud): sogs pas mchod par bya// de nyid gsang ba rab sgrub pas// kun nas dgug pa dag tu bya// oM suM b+ha ga ra tISh+Tha ma ya hI b+hU/ rak+Sha sa mA tiSh+Tha ma ya hAM b+hur b+hA baH/ ba ra hA a
93b8(rgyud): mir+yA tA ma ya swA hA// sid+d+hi ke sid+d+hi sa ma ya hi I mA m+bo mu drA b+hi/ hrIM hUM shrI b+h+yo// de nas lus ni thams cad kyis// de bzhin du ni legs bzhugs la// de nas phyag rgya bcings brtan te/ 
94a1(rgyud): gsang ba mchog 'di brjod par bya// gal te gsang nyid ma bsrungs na// gang zhig sems can don bzhugs dang // gang yang dkyil 'khor sgrub byed pa// de rnams khyed/ 
94a2(rgyud): kyis bsad par 'gyur// chos dang ldan la bdud rtsi nyid// chos min pas ni dug pas lhag/ ci snyed pa dang dus ci bzhin// yul rnams nye bar bsten pa dang // phyag rgya gar gyi bshad pa yis// 
94a3(rgyud): ci bde bar ni rtag tu mchod// sring mo bzhi'i rgyud // / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// sgrub padag ni rab sgrub nyid// 
94a4(rgyud): 'dod chags sogs drug gzhig phyir dang // kun nas pa dadung rtsi nyid bya'i phyir// zhe sdang las byung klu yi ni// da dkyil 'khor dam pa 'byung bar 'gyur// de la snying po 'di/ 
94a5(rgyud): yin te// phu zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// srad bu thams cad yang dag bri// sgo khyud klu yi gdengs ka mchog/ mtshams kyi rtse mchog mjug ma mdung // de yi dbus su
94a6(rgyud): klu rgyal ni// mtha' yas gdengs ka bcas pa ni// klu yi rigs ni brgyad po dag/ shes rab can gyis kun tu bri// de nas khros dang zhugs nas ni// klu 'dzin pa yi shugs kyis ni/ 
94a7(rgyud): zhugs nas dkyil 'khor de nyid du// sbrul gyi gdangs kas dgug par bya// oM hrI a nI la dza ba beg pri thi b+hin dA ri She sha ya hi phu// sar+b+ba nA ga ku lA n+yA na phu/ sa ma ya pra be sha ya pra/ 
94a8(rgyud): sar+b+ba na sA d+ha ya phu/ ta ta sar+b+ba nA ga pu tra ka phu/ de ltar byas na legs par bzhugs shing dga' bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon gyis dug med par bsam par bya'o// de nas
94b1(rgyud): brtsams te dug thams cad zos pas kyang bdud rtsir 'gyur ro// nor rgyas pa rtse bar byed do// dug thams cad sbar ba dang gzhig pa nus par 'gyuraro// de nas mna'i snying po sbyin par bya ste// 'dod
94b2(rgyud): chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams// 'jig rten na ni 'di gsum dug/ gal te bden pa las 'das nas// 'di dag gis ni rtag gsod 'gyur// khyed kyi glog la brnyas mi bya// ser ba bzlog
94b3(rgyud): par mi bya zhing // gal te dngos grub la dga' na// ci nas sbrul ni bsad mi bya// klu'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog/ 
94b4(rgyud): sems can kun la bde ba'i phyir// gdon gyi dkyil 'kho dar bsdu ba yin// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug rnams da nyes byas kyi ni dug nyid 'gyur// gdon dang rims dang sdig
94b5(rgyud): pa dang // dmyal bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// de nas gdu ga pa'i snying po ni// haM zur bzhi pa la sgo bzhi par// gdon gyi dkyil 'khor kun tu bri// de'i dbus dang por
94b6(rgyud): gdon la sogs// cho ga rgyas pa dgod par bya// de nas bshad pa bzhin zhugs nas// dgod cing myur du dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje 'dzin pa zhugs nas ni// khros pas rkang pa g.yon pas mnye
94b7(rgyud): de nas gdon dang rims sdig kun// dmyal ba thams cad rtag tu ni// sdig pa chen po byed pa yang // rdo rjes rab tu 'jigs par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// / 
94b8(rgyud): sdug bsngal thams cad 'don pa'i rgyud do// // de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yis// sems can kun don rab sgrub phyir// dkyil 'khor thams cad
95a1(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// de la snying po 'di yin te// oM AHhUM hrIHtra/ de nas 'di ni gsungs tsam gyis// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// gzugs kun gyis ni kun mchog ni/ 
95a2(rgyud): dbang phyug dam pa mdzad pa yin/ gsang ba chen po lnga yis ni// gang tshe 'dul bar ma gyur pa// de tshe sna tshogs cher mdzad pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dam pa yin// dam pa yang dag bshad bya ste// 
95a3(rgyud): kun mchog sna tshogs rnam par rgyal// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas ni// de yi dbus su cho ga bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' rab bzhag la// rdo rje
95a4(rgyud): lha me tshogs dkyil 'khor// de yi ngos ni thams cad du// kun mchog bdag po sku rnams so// rdo rje mchog pa/ ces mtshan ma ni// rang gi rigs kyis bskor ba bzhag/ 
95a5(rgyud): rgyal po rdo rje sred med bu'i// gzugs 'dzin 'khor lo rna ma par bri// khyab bdag rdo rje can rdo rje// gtum dang nga rdo rje mdung bsnams pa// rdo rje pad 'byung pad+ma 'byung // 
95a6(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa tshangs pa'i gzugs// nam mkha'i snying po 'dod pa'i gzugs// rdo rje dang bcas me tog mtshon// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mtshams rnams su// rigs kyi lha mo bri bar bya// rdo
95a7(rgyud): rje dpal mo dkar mo dang // rdo rje sgrol ma mkha' rdo rje// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi bdag po 'di rnams kyi snying po bshad par bya ste// oM badz+ra nA rA ya Na ts+tshin+da pra ti ha na badz+ra tsakre Na ho/ b+ha
95a8(rgyud): ga b+haM badz+ra ta thA ga ta/ dzaHhUM be hoHbadz+ra d+ha ra taM/ badz+ra ta thA ga ta hUM badz+ra kro d+ha ma hA yo gi nI ga Ne shwa ra/ ma hA badz+ra ku lo gra pa ne ho/ b+ha ga bAM badz+ra tsan+de shwa rA ya/ ha ha ha ha hrIHbadz+ra pad+mo b+ha ba
95b1(rgyud): to/ b+ha ga baM badz+ra lo ke shwa re/ ma hA pra me sid d+ha/ oM b+hur b+hA baHAHsista na ma swAhA/ he badz+ra ku su mA yung+ga/ sarba kA ma me sA d+hA ya hoHb+ha ga baM badz+rA A kA sha gar+b+ha/ ba ba Ta Ta twaM/ badz+ra a
95b2(rgyud): kA sha gar+b+ha a she Sha mu / na mo ye nas d+he na/ b+ha ga ba te br-idz+nyA pA ra mi tra yu d+hA/ ts+tshin+d+ha badz+ra Ni tsikri Na te na sa t+yen pA pa kAn/ e d+hi/ shrI shwa ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA// badz+ra pa ra mi/ oM badz+ra ga
95b3(rgyud): rim hA bid+yA trai le kya bi dza ye shwa ri badz+ra kro d+ha ag+ni sa ma ye// badz+ra d+ha ri na me stu s+t+re/ tad+ya thA/ oM hi li mi li/ le li lA li badz+ra mA ka ye swAhA// badz+rA sa ma ya/ na mo ye na sA d+ha na b+ha ga
95b4(rgyud): ba te/ bud+d+ha bud+d+hi bud+d+ha d+ha ra/ badz+ra d+har+m+ma pra yo ge na/ te nas t+ye na sid+d+ha maM/ oM tA re tud+d+he re tu re swA hA// badz+ra d+ha mo tA/ oM kA ma badz+rI Ni sid+d+hi sid+d+ha bi shud+d+ha sa d+hu ba ha/ ga gnod+ha
95b5(rgyud): be yo ge na sid d+ha maM pa ra ma ka re/ tad+ya thA/ ga gan dzi hUM da d+he/ sar+b+ba ma b+hi prA ya pi ri pA ra na swAhA// phyi yi la 'khor gnas rnams su// rdo rje 'dzin pa rab spyod
95b6(rgyud): gnasapa/ lha dbang dang ni ma mo nyid// 'jig rten skyong rnams dgod par bya// tshigs kyi dbang phyug rdo rje yi// rol mo che bcu rdung byed pa// phyi'i dkyil 'khor kha khyer la// sgo dang mtshams/ 
95b7(rgyud): su'ang 'di bri'o// sgo rnams kun tu 'jug pa ni// rang gi phyag rgyas rab tu gzhug/ dkyil 'khor dam pa lnga par ni// dang po'i sbyor bas 'jug par bya'o// de nas dbus su 'dug nas ni// 
95b8(rgyud): dang po lcags kyu che ba nyid// snying po 'di ni brjod byed cing // 'gugs pa 'di ni brjod par bya// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa sid+d+hi hU~M/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA no/ sa ma ya A kaR+Sha ya dzaHbadz+ra
96a1(rgyud): ku la dI pad ma ye tra pra be sha ya hUM/ sar+b+ba lo ke shwa raM pra be sha ya sa ma ya ban+d+ha na baM/ sa ma ya sar+b+ba rat+na dI paM ma hA ma Ni rA dzA nA~M ba shI ku ru ho hUM aHhA/ 
96a2(rgyud): hrIHtAM/ de nas gsang ba chen po yi// snying po bzang po 'di brjod pas// rdo rje 'chang chen rgyal po ni// 'khor lo thams cad dang bcas pas// bkug cing rab tu bcug pa dang // bden
96a3(rgyud): pas bcings te dbang du byas// dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog thams cad// dngos grub kun gyi sgrub par 'gyur// de nas go rims ci bzhin du// dkyil 'khor thams cad sgrub pa/ 
96a4(rgyud): dang // dngos grub de rnams nyid kyang ni// thams cad kyang ni bsgrub par bya// bde ba thams cad mi 'gyur/ gnas// bde ba chen po zhes brjod do// rdo rje 'di ni sgrub
96a5(rgyud): la sogs// 'di ni tshe 'dir 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar sna tshogs pa'i don sbyang ba'i don gyis cho ga 'gro ba dpag tu med pa 'dul ba mtha' med cing sna tshogs
96a6(rgyud): pas mnyam pa med cing phul du byung ba de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i rigs thams cad 'dzin pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa rgyal ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
96a7(rgyud): srid pa'i bde ba'i mchog byed pa gsungs pa yin no// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyal po las rtog pa thams cad kyi rgyud phyi ma'i rtsa ba'i rgyud kun gyis mchog dbang phyug dam pa'i
96a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs so// // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// dam tshig mchog gi sgrub pa dang // bde ba chen po'i gzhal yas khang // dngos grub/ 
96b1(rgyud): kun gyi lus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs mchog chen po yi// rin chen rgyal ba sogs kyi rgyan// bde ba chen po'i chags pa che// glu dang rol mo rjes chags pa// bla med dga' ba chen po yi/ 
96b2(rgyud): mchod pa kun gyis rab tu mchod// dpa' ba chen po dpal gyi gnas// rang gi bzhugs gnas mchog de la// rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po mchog/ mi 'gyur mchog tu yang dag
96b3(rgyud): bzhugs// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag rang nyid// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ kun tu bzang po 'khor ba dang // byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dngos grub chen po kun
96b4(rgyud): gyi mchog/ rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ kun mno dag chags pa chen po yi// dngos grub dbang phyug rjes grub pa// glu dang rol mo thog mtha' med// mchog ni
96b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs// hUM/ de nas 'di ni gsung tsam gyis// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin pa ni// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// phyag rgya'i lha mo byung bar gyur// rtag tu
96b6(rgyud): chags dang dngos grub che// rnam rgyal dbang phyug lhag pa'i lha// phyag rgya dam pa bzhi pa ste// sems dpas byin gyis brlabs pa'i sku// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin te// kun mchog
96b7(rgyud): so sor rtog pa dang // dngos grub kun gyis bde ba'i mchog/ kun mchog rnam rgyal mthong ba dang // thams cad dbang phyug mchod pa che// dngos grub rnams dang phun tshogs dang // dga' ba dag
96b8(rgyud): dang bdag po rnams// rdo rje lha mo thog mtha' med// rdo rje sems dpa' sku yi mchog/ ces bya'o// de nas mchog tu gsang ba'i mi rnams ni dga' ba chen po dpal don yod dga' ba'i dam/ 
97a1(rgyud): tshig 'dod pa'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje ki li ki li dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig
97a2(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje ma dang / dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod la chags pa'i dam tshig rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma'o// 'di rnams gsang ba'i mtshan dag ni// mkhas pas
97a3(rgyud): gang zhig dad pas brjod// de ni phyag rgya thams cad kyi// dngos po kun bdag bdag por 'gyur// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu gsang bas gsung ba yin no// de
97a4(rgyud): nas 'di sgrub bshad bya ba// dngos grub shin tu brtag pa ste// sdig pa che las dga' ba dang // sgrub pa gang zhig dam grub kyang // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// de
97a5(rgyud): dag kyang ni myur du 'grub// nyin re 'am ni zla re 'am// de ba/ zhin lo ni re re la// ci mngon mngon 'dod bsgrub par bya// / ci rnyed pa dang ci bde bas// ras la bcom ldan bri bar
97a6(rgyud): byang kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug ste// gang zhig bris par gyur na ni// mchog tu rtag pa'i thar pa thob// bzhad pa dang bcas zla ba'i 'od// sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'od 'bar ba// sangs
97a7(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur sogs// sna tshogs rgyan dang na bza' ldan// sems dpa'i skyil mo krungs kyis bzhugs// rdo rje bsnyems pa'i mchog 'chang ba// g.yon pa dril bu mchog
97a8(rgyud): bsnyems pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu brtag/ de yi legs na bzhugs pa rnams// de yi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor brten// rab tu dga' ba bde ba'i sku// gsang ba chen po dgod par bya/ 
97b1(rgyud): dang po pad+ma ltar dkar dmar// gzhan ni pa la sha ltar dkar// gzhan ni ud pal 'dab ltar sngo// rdo rje snyems ma ser po 'dzin// dang po dang ni gnyis pa dag/ g.yas kyi logs la brten pa
97b2(rgyud): ste/ gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa dag/ g.yon gyi logasu bzhi pa yin// rdo rje ki li ki la ma// dbus kyi rang lha dgyes par spro// de yi logs la rdo rje che// mda' ni gsor ba la
97b3(rgyud): brtson pa// snyems pa'i phyag gis yongs 'khyud pa'i// chu srin rgyal mtshan bsgreng dang bcas// de yi logs na bzhad dang bcas// mchod pas bdag po la lta ba// sangs rgyas rin chen
97b4(rgyud): dbang bskur mtshan// thams cad spyan gyi phyag rgya gzigs // rang la bdag gi thugs btang ba// zur du blta zhi da bzhugs pa'o// ras ris 'di ni mthong ba yis// rtag pa
97b5(rgyud): bsod nams thob par 'gyur// mchod pa dang ni brtag pa yis// mchog tu dga' ba'i thar pa thob// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de
97b6(rgyud): ltar mchog tu dga' ba rab tu 'dod pa ni// mchog tu dga' ba dam pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gsal zhing rgyal ba'i ras ris chen po 'di// thams cad gzigs rnams mchod pa
97b7(rgyud): chen po'i dpal 'dis rol// 'khor lo da ni brtag byas nas// mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rnam par dben pa'i khang par ram// yang na skyed mos tshal sogs// de bzhin
97b8(rgyud): gshegs mchog chen po yi// ras ris rgyal po sogs kyis rgyan// dril bu dang bcas yid dga' ba'i// bla res phul bas mchog gyur pa'i// rdo rje glu yi mchod tshogs dang // glu/ 
98a1(rgyud): dang rol mos rnam 'phrul pa// me tog spos sogs rab sbyor ba// mar me'i sbyor bas yang dag mchod// khang pa gsum rtsegs dkyil 'khor du// mchog gi gsang ba bsrub
98a2(rgyud): par bya / yang na bdag nyid kho na mchog/ rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgom bya// de nas 'khor lor ma zhugs kyang // rang nyid kyis ni rtag zhugs nas// rdo rje kun 'chang slob dpon ni// 
98a3(rgyud): dngos grub kun la grub par 'gyur// rang nyid khrus byas dri zhim bsgos// ci rnyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs// phreng bcas kha ni dri zhim pa// rdo rje
98a4(rgyud): sems dpa'i sbyor ba yis// me tog spos dang dri snod bcas da// rdo rje glu ni 'di dag gis// gar byed grong khyer 'jug par bya// de la mchog tu gsang ba'i dpal dam tshig
98a5(rgyud): gsum 'jug la mchog tu gsang ba'i klu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te// dngos grub kun gyi ba de ba nyams dga' ba'i// thar pa'i grong du bcom ldan
98a6(rgyud): bde chen 'jug/ mchog tu bde ba dam pa'i dngos grub kyis// dzaHhUM baM hor rab tu grub par mdzod// rab tu zhugs te g.yon pa yis// rdo rje mig gis mgon la 'dud// g.yon pa
98a7(rgyud): bsnyems pa cung zad bzhad// bstod cing mdzes pa'i mig gis btsums pa de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa dpal dam tshig gsum gyi phyag 'tshal ba'i me tog gi sil ma dor ba'i
98a8(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba rdo rje klu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yin te/ mchog tu bde ba'i sems ni rol par ldan// sgeg pa'i phyag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'dud// waM hUM ba / 
98b1(rgyud): hi hi hi hiH/ mgon po snyim pa'i me tog bzhes su gsol// de nas me tog sil ma dor// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bas// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dang // ldan pa'i 'od gsal sbyar
98b2(rgyud): par bya// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur ba'i mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa mchog tu grub pa 'di yon
98b3(rgyud): te/ oM sangs rgyas kun ldan rin chen mchog gis rgyan// lha yi cod pan dang bcas khyod la 'dud// rdo rje 'chang bdag rin chen dbang bskur bas// sems dpa' sa ma ya s+t+waM hA// de nyid
98b4(rgyud): kyis ni rdo rje bzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya// dam tshig gis ni phyag rgya cher// byin gyis brlabs nas snying po bzlas// rdo rje la sogs thob bzung bas/ 
98b5(rgyud): sems dpa' gnyis pa 'dra// rdo rje thams cad 'dzin rgyu la po// rdo rje can gyis byin gyis brlabs// 'gyurazhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig
98b6(rgyud): gsum gyis bdag la byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgrub pa gcig pu'i cho ga mchog tu grub pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de nas 'dir grub bshad bya ba// dngos grub
98b7(rgyud): shin tu brtag pa yang // gang gis sgrub pa dam pa dang // sdig chen byed pa rnams kyang // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa bzhin// ma sgrub rnams kyang grub par 'gyur// lugs ma 'am ni
98b8(rgyud): brdungs pa 'am// 'dus byas pa 'am bris pa 'am// dang po'i sems dpa' bzhugs gsol nas// de yi mdun du cho ga bzhin// rtag tu rdo rje dril 'chang zhing // dngos grub mchog ni bsgrub
99a1(rgyud): par bya// thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin rlab sogs sgrub rnams so// de la ci ltar mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams
99a2(rgyud): cad dgug pa'i rgyud ni 'di yin te/ rang lhag lha yi sbyor ba las// thams cad dgug pa'i sbyor ba las// yan lag mchog gi rol bcas pas// gar bya zhing ni dgug par bya// de nas de
99a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te// dza mchog dang po'i rdo rje 'chang ba rdo rje sems dpa' bde rtogs rab tu
99a4(rgyud): dga' ba khyod bdag sangs rgyas so sor rtogs// hUM mchog ga rdo rje las ni mchog tu zad med srid pa mi 'gyur// bde dang yid bde dam tshig bdag la de grub mdzod// bam
99a5(rgyud): mchog bdag gi sku 'dzin rnal 'byor thams cad rnam rgyal ba sgreng ba rab mchog dag pa bde bar 'gyur ba'i pad+ma 'i rgyal po kye/ ho rab mchog gi ni mchog gi dngos grub
99a6(rgyud): dam pa thams cad dbang phyug dam par bdag gyur cig/ rtag par bdag 'phel na mkha'i snying po khyod// hu lu hu lu'i sgrub pas dbab par mdzod// dam tshig chen pos yang dag dgug
99a7(rgyud): pa khyod// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dam tshig ste// rab tu dga' ba mchog dang po// de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad kyi mchod
99a8(rgyud): pa chen po'i cho ga ji ltar yin// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du// mchod pa kun mchog sku rnams kyis// rol mo'i rnam 'phrul gyis rjes mchod// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
99b1(rgyud): thams cad kyis mchog gi dngos grub kyi mchod pa chen po'i cho ga'i mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa ni 'di yin te// thams cad rjes chags pa bde ba dam pa'i
99b2(rgyud): thugs/ rdo rje sems dpa' khyod ni rab tu dga' ba yin// bde ba chen po gsal mthong bdag la brtan gyur cig/ myur du so sor mkhyen nas rab tu 'dod pa bsgrubs// de la mchog tu
99b3(rgyud): gsang ba dam pa'i dpal// dam tshig gsum gyi dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs kyis sgrub pa chen po ci ltar yin// rang lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du// phyag rgya kun gyis byin rlabs
99b4(rgyud): pas// de nyid chen po'i mchog gis ni// rang nyid bsgrubs te snying po bzla// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub byin gyis brlabs pa'i
99b5(rgyud): gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dam tshig gi rdo rje'i glu'i mchod pa / mchog tu grub pa ni 'di yin te/ oM na mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog
99b6(rgyud): sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// kun mchog dngos grub chen po ste// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// mi
99b7(rgyud): 'gyur mchog tu bdag grub mdzod// nyes pa mi mnga' rtag pa khyod// 'dod chags kyis ni rjes chags pa// 'dod pa chen po dga' ba che// bcom ldan de nyid kyis grub mdzod// 
99b8(rgyud): shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdong nas grol ba de bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// dngos grub chen po kun/ 
100a1(rgyud): gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po phyag rgya'i mchog/ grub pa'i rdo rje cher bstod pas// rdo rje bsnyems bdag bdag mdzod cig/ dpal mchog dang po'i bcom ldan khyod// gang gis
100a2(rgyud): don dang glu yis bstod// de ni dngos grub kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po nyid grub 'gyur// zhes bya ba mchog gi de kho na nyid kyis mchog tu gsang ba'i glu chen po mchog tu grub pa bcom
100a3(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// dngos grub cho ga 'di ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag rtogs// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug nyid ni rab sgrub pa'o// kun nas
100a4(rgyud): 'od zer ston sogs dang // so sor ston pa'i rmad byung rnams/ rdo rje'i tshig gis rang lha las// ngo mtshar gyur rnams mthong bar gyur// rtog pa kun gyis sna tshogs che// dngos
100a5(rgyud): grub dbang phyug bde rnams kyis// myur du rang gi byin rlabs pa sa// rdo rje slob dpon gyis thob bo zhes bya ba bcom lda na 'das rdo rje sems dpa' mchog dang pos gsungs so// 
100a6(rgyud): de la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gi lha thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab pa'i sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud ci ltar yin/ rang lha rnal 'byor ci bzhin du// lha kun
100a7(rgyud): bdag nyid sku rnams kyis// rang lha rnal 'byor bdag nyid kyis// rang lhag lha nyid bsgrub par bya// de nas mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum gyi kun mchog dngos grub chen
100a8(rgyud): po'i dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba dam pa bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba bde ba dam pa dang
100b1(rgyud): yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rjes sgrub pa ni 'di yin te/ rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du// rdo rje kun mchog sku rnams kyis// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// 
100b2(rgyud): nyid kyis rjes chags 'gyur// rang lha'i sbyor ba ci bzhin du// dbyangs kyi rtsa ba rnams sad pas// glu dang rol mo'i cho ga ni// dril bu nyid kyis rjesu brjod// rang lha'i sbyor ba ji bzhin du// sna tshog
100b3(rgyud): phyag rgya'i bdag po mchog/ glu dang rol me'i cho ga ni// dam tshig gis ni rjes bsgrub bya// de yi rtog pa thams cad la// rdo rje 'bebs pa rab sad pas// rang gi lha yi dam tshig ni// thams cad/ 
100b4(rgyud): bzhi 'gyur 'grub par 'gyur// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal// dam tshig gsum gyi glu chen po dang / rol da mo'i cho ga mchog tu gsang ba mchog tu grub pa bcom
100b5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas de rjes ga/ nas ji bzhin// ji snyed pa ni tso bde bas// me tog spos kyis mchod nas ni// khang pa 'am skyes mos tshal
100b6(rgyud): sogs su// bdag nyid ci 'dod rab bsgrubs nas// ci snyed rgyan dang gos dang ldan// sna tshogs gos kyis yang dag klubs// me tog phreng bcas kha dri zhim// lugs ma 'am ni
100b7(rgyud): brdungs pa 'am// 'dus pa 'am ni ri mor bri// dang po'i 'khor lo de mdun du// cho ga bzhin du bzhugs gsol nas// rang lha'i rnal 'byor ci bzhin du// rdo rje dril bu rab sad pas/ 
100b8(rgyud): thams cad dgug dang mchod pa che// bdag byin rlab sogs bsgrub par bya// sngon du lan gcig bsgrubs byas nas// de nas de rjes ci 'dod pa// ci 'dod ci spyod ci smras pa// thams
101a1(rgyud): cad bza' zhing thams cad byed// langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am// rab tu dgod dam smra ba 'am// ci bzhin de bzhin de dang der// ci 'dod par ni ci bzhin bzhag/ gsang
101a2(rgyud): ba mchog gi 'khor len// me tog sogs kyis mchod nas ni// ci bzhin du ni rjes bsgrub bya// 'dis ni 'dod pa kun dbang phyug/ 'gro dang 'ong dang 'dod na 'phur// dngos grub kun gyi
101a3(rgyud): dbang phyug 'grub// rga shi med pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' grub chen po// phyag rgya kun gyis dbang phyug bdag/ rdo rje kun 'dzin rgyal ba ni// rdo rje mtshon cha thams cad 'dzin
101a4(rgyud): mi thub pa dang mi sod cing // thams cad byed cing kun gyi rte da na// sems can kun gyi rgyal po che// tshar gtsang/ rjesu bzung bar nus// kun mchog rje su chags pa che// 
101a5(rgyud): 'dod pa grub pa bde ba mchog/ kun las rnam rgyal grub 'a gyur te// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa yin// dngos grub chen po kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug chen po'i
101a6(rgyud): go 'phang nas// rgyal po rdo rje kun 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'grub 'gyur// de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+ma'i ra ba che// mchog tu gsang ba grub pa'i bla na
101a7(rgyud): med pa'i dngos grub stsol// mchog gi rgyal mtshan sgreng bas gang zhig rjesu bsten pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub dbang phyug chen po nyid des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das
101a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// dpal mchog dang po las gsang ba chen po dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum dang dngos grub thams cad dgug pa dang mchod pa chen po dang bdag la
101b1(rgyud): byin gyis brlab pa la sogs pa'i sgrub pa'i tshi ga rgyas pa'o// // gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa dang / sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes brten pa// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gi gnas// thams
101b2(rgyud): cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// rdo rje snyems tshul bdag po'i bdag/ 'di ni
101b3(rgyud): rang byung bcom ldan 'das// lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// ces bya ba grub par 'gyuraro// de ltar mchog tu rjes chags dga' ba pad+mar che// mchog tu bsngags pa bla na med pa'i dngos
101b4(rgyud): grub stsol// mchog gi rgyal mtshan sgreng ba gang zhig rjes bsten pa ste// mchog gi dngos grub bde ba chen po de nyid des nyams myong ba// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das
101b5(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// dpal mchog dang po las dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor thams cad kyi dbang phyug de
101b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal rang gi dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor mchog tu gsang ba yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
101b7(rgyud): kyi dam tshig chen po'i slob ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rjesu bzung ba bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de la dang po kho nar re shig de bzhin gshegs
101b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i sngags 'di lan gcig brjod pas sems bskyed du bcug ste/ oM sarba yo ga tsit+taM ung pA da yA mi/ 'di brjod pa tsam gyis de
102a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi 'brang zhing phyir mi ldog pa dang / bdud thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'i phyag rgya byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
102a2(rgyud): nyid du yang rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba yang gsungaso// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// mchog tu bskyed par byas nas ni// snying khar rdo rje rab bzhag nas// su ra ta sa ma ya s+t+waM ho// snying
102a3(rgyud): po rdo rje ci der sgrub// 'di yis rdo rje bskul ba na// 'dod po kun las 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid bskul bas myur du ni// byang chub sems ni rab bla na med pa// kun mchog dngos
102a4(rgyud): grub chen po'i phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'gyur//  zhes bya ba'i mchog bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems// dpas gsung so// gar byas spyi bor thal mo sbyar// gos
102a5(rgyud): kyis gdong ni g.yogs pa rnams// ci 'dod dang dngos grub 'dod pa yis// slob ma thams cad gzhug par bya// ci 'dod dngos grub sems dpa' yis// slob ma me tog
102a6(rgyud): dor du gzhug/ phyag rgya gang la de bcas pa'o// de de'i lha mo bsgrub par bya// de nas gdong g.yogs dkrol byas la// rnam pa kun gyi yon blangs nas// sangs rgyas rin chen dbang
102a7(rgyud): bskur gyis// dam tshig gsum ni gsal bar sbyin// de la rdo rje chen po mna'i chus dbang bskur de 'di ltar brjod par bya'o// 'di ni khyod kyi dmyal ba'i chu// dam tshig 'das na sreg
102a8(rgyud): par byed// dam tshig bsrungs na dngos grub ni// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu 'dis 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// gal te dkyil 'khor mthong smras// skye bo 'dus pa'i nang na gnas// dang
102b1(rgyud): pa med pas bzhad gang spod// zhes bya bas mna' bsgag go// de la sangs rgyas kyi rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i cho ga ni 'di yin te// rdo rje chu yis dbang bskur nas de bzhin gshegs pa
102b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi sku'i mchog dbang bskur ba'i gnasu bzhag ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA sa ma ya a d+hi pa ti s+t+waM a b+hi Shany+tsa mi ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis rdo rje lag tu sbyin
102b3(rgyud): par bya'o// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje 'chang gi rdo rje ste// rdo rje 'chang gi brtul zhugs che// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub
102b4(rgyud): mchog gi sems chen po yongasu mi spang bar rtag tu sgrub pa shin tu gsang ba de 'di yin te// oM badz+ra karma bA d+hi d+hi[:]shrI badz+ra nA ma sid d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM b+hur b+hu baHswaHgang la rdo rje'i
102b5(rgyud): ming btags pa de la kye'i sgra dang por sbyar bar bya'o// de'i ming de yang ci srid byang chub snying po'i mthar thug pa'i bar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa yi yang ming du 'gyur ro// de
102b6(rgyud): la mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i dpal dam tshig gsum sbyin pa ni 'di yin te/ thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// 
102b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems tshul bdag pa'i bdag/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po'i skyes bu mchog gi de kho na nyid kyi gsang ba lnga'i de kho na nyid bshad par byas nas rdo rje sbyin par bya'o// 'di bcos
102b8(rgyud): srid pa'i bdag po dam pa kun gyi mchog/ dbang phyug gi dam pa de bzhin gshegs pa de nyid chos kyi mchog gi bka' yang dag par stsol bar mdzad pa ni/ srid pa'i rang bzhin gyi ni
103a1(rgyud): dag rang bzhin gyis ni srid bral byas// rang bzhin dag pa'i sems dpa' mchog/ srid pa'i mchog ni mdzad pa yin// mchog tu gsang ba'i chos nyid 'bebs pa ni dril
103a2(rgyud): bu'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa bya ba 'am/ lha sgrub pa dkrol bar bya'o// de nas chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid rab tu sad pa'i phab pa rnams kyis sgrib pa thams
103a3(rgyud): cad rnam par dag par byed pa yin no// rdo rje thams cad 'bebs par byed pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / rab tu dang bar byed pa zhes bya ba sgrub par 'gyuraro// 
103a4(rgyud): de nas srid pa dag pa'i thabs kyi mchog rtog pa thams cad dkyi gsang ba chen po dam tshig la rtag tu bsten par bya'o zhes bya ba'o// de la 'di ni deng khyod kyi// srid bde shin
103a5(rgyud): tu gyur pa ni// sdug bsngal chen po dag bya'i phyir// shin tu bde ba dam pa'i thabs// dam tshig 'di ni rtag tu bskyed// 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la// ci 'dod
103a6(rgyud): par ni rten bzhin du// rang gi lha yi sbyor ba yis// bdag dang gzhan la mchod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i theg pa chen po'i yang chen po
103a7(rgyud): dam tshig gi sbyor ba ni bcom ldan 'das dam tshig go// 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis kyang // 'da' ba ru ni mi mdzad pas// phyag rgya dam tshig ces ni bsgrags// yid kyi sku ni brtan
103a8(rgyud): phyir ro// zhes bya ba mchog tugs pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// de la 'di brjod par bya ste/ ci sring 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'itshe/ 
103b1(rgyud): cisring ma tshungs med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// gsang ba dam pa dam tshig thabs// bsod nams byin gyis brlabs bsgrub pa// rtag tu dngos grub kun dbang phyug
103b2(rgyud): sems can don ni byed pa yin// dam tshig 'dis ni bdag sgrub cing // ci bde bar ni sgrub byed pa// nyes pa spyad kyang sdig kun gyis// rnam pa kun tu gnod mi 'gyur// 'dod pa chen po sgrub
103b3(rgyud): par 'gyur// kun bdag dam tshig dbang phyug dang // thams cad rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// kun mchog dbang phyug dam pa'o// las kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyis// ma lus bsgrubs pas 'grub
103b4(rgyud): par 'gyur// bdag gzhan thams cad rgyas btab pas// ya dang na bsgrub bya kun la yang // don yod mchog tu grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor thams cad rjes sgrub byed// dpal
103b5(rgyud): ldan sdug bsngal kun 'phrog byed// dam tshig 'di ni 'da' bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba ba com ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// rdo rje
103b6(rgyud): la sogs thob 'dzin pas// dngos po kun gyi bde ba kun// phab pas rdo rje slob ma yis// dkyil 'khor du ni nyamasu myong // de nas thams cad gzengs bstod pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi
103b7(rgyud): bdag nyid dngos// rdo rje'i ming gis dbang bskur bas// de bzhin gshegs ni lung bstan bya// de la de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi lung bstan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa'i cho ga 'di yin te/ 
103b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bstan pa che// gzengs bstod pa yis gang lung bstan// de ni sangs rgyas thams cad nyid// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba'o// oM 'di ni ngas khyod lung bstan te// 
104a1(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// srid pa'i ngan 'gro las khyod bton// he badz+ra nA maHta thA ga ta sid d+ha sa ma ya ste b+hur khru ba
104a2(rgyud): swa gang la gzengs bstod pa 'di dang / phyag rgya chen pos lung bstan mchog tu gsang ba'i cho gas byas pa de la rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'o de bzhin gshegs pa thams
104a3(rgyud): cad dang / rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon rnams dang / mgrin gcig
104a4(rgyud): tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub lung ba snyan par mdzad do// 'di lta ste/ gzengs bstod pa 'di nyid kyi phyag rgya chen pod/ mchog tu gsang ba dam
104a5(rgyud): ba'i dngos grub kyi byin gyis brlabs pa 'di dang / sngags kyi stobs las dad par bya'o// de nas ci lta ba bzhin du zhugs pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
104a6(rgyud): cad 'dus pa la sogs pa'i dbugs dbyung ba sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'chang dang bcas pa ji
104a7(rgyud): snyed pa byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad rang gi dam tshig la rjesu chags pa 'dir dgug pa dang / rab tu zhugs pa dang / dbang du
104a8(rgyud): bya ba dang / sgrub pa dang / rjesu sgrub pa rnams kyis rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad bstan par 'gyur ba nyid kyis 'di brtan par 'gyur ba chos kyi dbyings thams cad kun tu khyab pa nyid kyis
104b1(rgyud): kun tu zhugs pa/ namakha'i khams thams cad kyis rgya che ba nyid kyis 'dir rab tu bzhugs zhing / legs par rab tu bzhugs pa gang yin pa de dang de dag de bzhin gshegs pa
104b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig la rag las pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la lhag par dmigs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon de bzhin
104b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad 'di yin no zhes bya ba byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang gi dam tshig gi slob dpon gyis/ dam tshig gis mgrin gcig tu khyed/ 
104b4(rgyud): rnams las dbugs dbyung ba mdzad pa yin to// dad parabya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba'i dbugs dbyung ba 'di yin te/ gsang
104b5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// mthong ba dang ni zhugs pas kya nga // sdig pa kun las nges grol zhing // khyed rnams 'dir ni legs par gnas// bde chen theg pa 'di
104b6(rgyud): las ni// slar 'chi ba ni yod min te// mi tshugs pa dang mi sod pas// cis kyang mi 'dzegs rol bar gyis// srid pa'i sdug bsngal ldog pa ni// srid pa shin tu grub pa'i phyir// ston pa/ 
104b7(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa khyod// srid pa shin tu grub pa yin// dam tshig sdom pa grub pa 'di// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya// sangs rgyas kun gyis 'thun par gsungs// dam pa brtag
