130b7(rgyud): myong ba yin no// rdo rje thal mos mdzub mo bcings la khro gnyer thur du bzhag par bya zhing me stag tu myur du 'phro zhing g.yo ba ni rdo rje khro gnyer ro// thams cad sreg par byed pa dang / 
130b8(rgyud): thams cad 'dul bar byed pa dang / rab tu 'dul bar byed pa ni khro gnyer gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje thal mes legs par bskor bar g.yon pa'i mdzub mo lcags kyu ste dgug pa dang
131a1(rgyud): gzhug pa dang sgrub pa thams cad la don yod pa'o// rdo rjepad+ma dbus mnyam pa'i kha 'bus kyi mdzad do// dza pad+ma ni thams cad gcod par byed pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa na
131a2(rgyud): mthe dong dang mdzub mo'i gdu bus g.yas pa'i hUM gis mdzub mos bzung ste thams cad dgug pa dang / gzhug pa dang / mchog tu grub pa'o// rdo rje hU~M mdzad las byung ba ni g.yas
131a3(rgyud): pa'i mdzub mos g.yon pa'i yi ge hUM bzung ba ste gzhur rgyud 'dren pa zhes bya ba thams cad rje su chags par byed pa dang 'bigs par byed pa'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las rdo rje hUM mdzad/ 
131a4(rgyud): kyi mchog go// rdo rje bsdams pa'i g.yon pa'i rdo rje khwatshur g.yas pa'i rtse gsum gyis mtshan pas yongs su bzung ba ste/ thams cad dral bar byed pa'o// 
131a5(rgyud): mdzad kyi g.yas pa'i khu tshur gyi mthe'u chung yang dag par brkyang ba g.yon lag pa'i steng du bzhag pa ni kha T+wAM ga gleng ba ste/ gdug pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
131a6(rgyud): phye zhing dral bar byed pa dang / rgyas 'debs pa dang / gsod pa dang / za ba la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad g.yas pas 'khor lo bzung ba'i tshul gyis stod cing dor ba ste/ 
131a7(rgyud): thams cad gcod pa dang / gcod par byed pa'o// rdo rje chen po'i khro bo'i rdo rje'o// g.yas pa'i rdo rje 'bebs pa dang / sbyor ba spro zhing g.yo ba'i 'dab ma can gyi ba dan gsum pa'o// 
131a8(rgyud): rdo rje bsdams pa'i mthe bong dang mdzub mo gnyis kyi rdo rje las byung ba'i srin lag mnyam par sbyar zhi mthe'u chung kha phye'o// dpal thams cad byed pa dang / rnam par rgyal bar byed/ 
131b1(rgyud): pa dang / gdug pa thams cad 'joms par byed pa dang / thams cad 'bebs par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// rdo rje'i rigs thams cad kyi ni// rdo rje rdul
131b2(rgyud): mo mnyam byas la// mdzub mo gnyis kyis ngar dbyangs bcing // mthe bong srin lag rdo rje ni// yongasu bskor te dbang bskur ro// 'bar ba'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa phyag nas bzung bar bya'o// ci 'byor
131b3(rgyud): pas slob dpon la yon phul te dngos grub thams cad kyi mchog phun sum tshogs pa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// 
131b4(rgyud): rdorje phyag rgya rdo rje ti rin ti r-i las byung ba ste/ don yodathams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bzhi ni dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo rnams so// de nas
131b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi las kyi dam tshig ni rdo rje khu tshur ga/ yon pas snyems pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / g.ya sa pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rdo rje gser ba ste 'dis thams cad
131b6(rgyud): brgyal ba dang / 'bar ba dang / sreg pa dang / ltung ba dang / rgyas btab pa dang / bsad pa dang / slong ba dang / khams gsum las rnam par rgyal ba dang / brtan pa dang / g.yo ba
131b7(rgyud): thams cad la nges par sbyor ba dang / dngos grub dang / mchog thams cad sgrub pa'o// de nas las kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur bsdigs mdzub dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo ni khro ba'i khu tshuro// 
131b8(rgyud): de dag gi las dam tshig phyag rgya'o// mdzub mo'i sor mo gnyis kyis thams cad dgug pa'o// snying kar cig shos dang g.yas pas gdug pa thams cad gcod pa'o// 'khrig ma'i
132a1(rgyud): mdud pas g.yas pa'i khro bo 'gugs pas thams cad dgug pa dang rab tu gzhug pa'o// bstod pa dang bcas pa'i 'da' 'phangs pa'o// de bzhin du rdo rje rtse gsum/ 
132a2(rgyud): pa la sogs pa'i rdo rje gar gyi sbyor bas rang gi phyag rgya gyen du 'phang ba'o// las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya gnyis su byas la rdo rje thal mo rnams kyi las kyi phyag rgya ste/ rdo rje gar gyi sbyor
132a3(rgyud): bas rang gi dam tshig gi phyag rgya steng du dor ba ste thams cad las rgyas gdab pa dang / sgrub pa dang / gsod pa dang / 'bebs pa dang / 'tsho bar byed pa ni rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa'o// 
132a4(rgyud): de nas ngag gi phyag rgya ni sprin gyi sgra sgrogs pa'i hUM yi ge hUM dpra ba'i sgra dang bcas pa khro zhing gsal ba'i khro bo'i rdo rje ngag go/ sgrub pa'i don bsgrub par bya'o// de nas ma
132a5(rgyud): grub na las kyi phyag rgya bcing ba'o// sgrub pa ni de bzhin phyag rgya chen po lan gcig tu bya'o// las la je/ sa par sbyor ba khro gnyer gyis// rdo rje hUM mdzad las
132a6(rgyud): byung ba'o// ske tshe dang bcas pa'i til mar rnon po'i sreg ni g.yas paso// de nyid kyis btang ba'o// de nyid kyis thams cad 'ching ba'o// g.yo ba med pa nyid do// gnyid log pa
132a7(rgyud): bstan pa'o// khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba'i bsdigs mdzub bo// phyag rgya glong par gyur pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis yang dag par sbyar nas phye ba'o// de dag nyid kyis gdu bu bcing ba'o// mche
132a8(rgyud): bas btsir ba'o// de nas dral ba'o// g.yas pas brdeg pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis 'bar ba'o// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo g.yon pa ltung ba'i tshul lo// mdzub mo gnyis kyi
132b1(rgyud): 'bar bar phye ba'o// gcod pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis sor mo sbar ba'i rtse mo gcod pa'o// lag pa gnyis drag tu gnya ba'o// thams cad du sor mo thams cad dor ba'o// gcig car du
132b2(rgyud): phyag rgya dgrol ba'o// drang zhing g.yo bas bsdigs mdzub bo// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo gdengs ka bskyod pas bsdigs mdzub bo// g.yas pa'i mdzub mo mche bas bzung ba'o// ngu ba dang / 
132b3(rgyud): dgod pa dang / rgyug pa la sogs pas bstan pa'o// mdzub mo gnyis kyis se gol rdebs pa'o// g.yon pa'i steng du g.yas pa nye bar bzhag pa'o// sa la rab tu bzhag pa'o// bskyod
132b4(rgyud): par bya'o// gar bya'o// 'byin pa'o// brlab par bya'o// \u0f7fmas cad du brlab par bya'o// ha har dgod pa'o// bskor ba'i dgug par bya'o// drang bar bya'o// btang bar
132b5(rgyud): bya'o// yongasu bskor nas nub par bya'o// de nas dor ba'o// myur du dor ba'o// de bzhin du kun nas 'dren pa'o//  bzhin du gyen du drang ba'o// rang nyid kyi nga ro bya'o// bdag
132b6(rgyud): nyid la brdeg par bya'o// snying kar brdeg par sbyin par bya'o// rang nyid kyis rang gi sra 'bral bar bya'o// sdang bar sdom pa'o// rang gi gos stong par bya'o// khro bas de bzhin du 'bar ba ston
132b7(rgyud): pa'o/ g.yas pas mdzub mo lcags kyu'o// de nyid kyi rab tu gzhug pa'o// g.yas pa'i se gol lo// g.yon pa'i se gol lo// lce reg pa ni mdzub mo gnyis kyis so// yan lag la ba
132b8(rgyud): spu g.yas su bskor bskor bas 'khyil ba'o// ltung ba la sogs pa byed pa'o// dus su sgom pa'o// khro bo'i lta bas shing drung rnams la yid kyis 'dod pa'o// de bzhin du sa la'o// lta ba
133a1(rgyud): smin ma'o// sa'o// phu'o// phyag rgyas brdeg pa'o// rgyal mtshan sbeng ba'o// khro bo dang bcas pa'i 'jigs byed kyi lta ba so// 'dzum pa med pas lta bso// de bzhin du 'ab
133a2(rgyud): ba 'ching bas so// phyag rgya bskor ba'o// gtsug tor las mdzub mo'i rdo rje bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du snying kar ro// phyag rgya de dgrol ba'o// phyag rgya zur du bslang ba'o// mdzub mo'i rtse mo
133a3(rgyud): brtan par sbyar ba'o// lta bas steng nas 'og tu ltung ba'o// 'og nas gyen du 'dren pa'o// yi ge hUM khros pa'o// 'jigs byed kyi lta bas so// rdo rje kha T+wAM ga dral ba khro bas so// rdo rje snying khar
133a4(rgyud): sgom pa'o// rdo rje rtse gsum dral ba'o// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhig par bya'o// yi ga~M hU~M gis so// hi'o// yas su dbugs dbyung ba'o// de nyid kyi dong rtse gsor ba'o// 
133a5(rgyud): khro bo'i lta ba de bzhin du'o// khu tshur g.yas pas mnanate g.yon pas so// bzung nas dgug pa'o//  gsor ba ni gnyis kyis so// g.yon pa'i dril bu dral ba'o// 
133a6(rgyud): de bzhin du rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yas pa'i khu tshur g.yon pa'i rdo rje khro bos mnan te mthe'u chung gi gdu bu bkrol ba'i khu tshur gyis 'phrog par bya'o// g.yas pa'i dril bu dral ba'o// tshogs dang
133a7(rgyud): bral ba ltung ba ni yid kyis so// 'khor lo dral ba'o// rtse gsum dral ba'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyi g.yon pa g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis mnan te bzhin du gdu bu bkrol bas 'phrog par
133a8(rgyud): bya'o// rdo rje dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'chang chen po rjesu dran pas mdun du bsgrub par bya'o// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do// de
133b1(rgyud): nas 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud ni pad+ma chen po rdo rje thal mo kha sbub pa dbu ma dang mthe bong dang / mthe'u chung kha phye ba'i 'dab ma bzhi pa chos nyid thams cad
133b2(rgyud): thob pa dang / thams cad rjesu chags par byed pa'o// phyag rgya chen po rnams ni de bzhin no// dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje pad+ma bshad pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs kyis rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o// 
133b3(rgyud): de la pad+ma de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni nang gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i pad+ma dbang par gyen du kha phye ba lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ming can gyi phyag rgya pad+ma'i
133b4(rgyud): spyan zhes bya'o// rdo rje pad+ma chen po'i rdo rje pad+ma snying khar rdo rje pacing ba rdo rje pad+ma'i chags pa zhes bya'o// pad+ma chen po'i bdag po mdzub mo mnyam pa 'og tu kha lta ba dbang par bzung
133b5(rgyud): ba pad+ma'i sgrol ma zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma chen po 'i ba dan rin po che gnyis bzung zhing nges pad+ma sbyin pa/ 'o// 'di rnams kyi chos nyid thams cad las thob pa dang
133b6(rgyud): thams cad rjesu chags pa dang srid pa'i sdug bsngal gyi tshogs thams cad las sgrol ba dang / bsam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa shin tu grub pa zhes bya'o// rdo rje gsum dral ba'o// 
133b7(rgyud): de nas pad+ma lha'i bdag po rnams kyi phyi rol gyi bsdams pa las byung ba'o// de la don yod rgyal po ni 'og tu mdzub mo gnyis kyi kha 'bus pa khro gnyer la bzhag par bya ste/ pad+mo'i
133b8(rgyud): khre gnyer gyi spyan no// rdo rje bsdams pa kha gyen du 'bar ba ni mgrin sngon gyi'o// g.yon pa'i mdzub mo bkug pa mthe bos yongs su bzung ste/ dung gi dpyi dag sa pa'i mthe bong sgreng pa
134a1(rgyud): bteg ste/ mthe'u chung mnyam pa'i kha 'bus pa'i pad ma dang / sor mo lhag pa yang dag par brkyang ba'i 'khor lo ni pad+ma'i khyab 'jug ma'o// pad+ma las byung ba'i mdzub
134a2(rgyud): mo gnyis bkug pa'i lcags kyu dang sor mo lhag ma kha phye ba'i pad+ma las byung ba'i zhes bya'o// rta mgrin gyi ni mdzub mo gnyis shin tu sbyar ba'i lcags kyu rkeng ma'i kha shin tu rab tu brkyang ba'i/ 
134a3(rgyud): srin lag gi rtse mo dang / mthe'u chung dang gnyis rab tu brkyang ba so sor phye la g.yon g.yo zhing bzung ba ni pad+ma'i lcags kyu zhes bya'o// 'di rnams kyis dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / las
134a4(rgyud): thams cad dang / grol ba thams cad dang / dgug pa tham/ sa cad kyi dngos grub don yod pa'o// de bzhin gsheg/ das pa'i sku mchog gi ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya bshad pa'o// 
134a5(rgyud): de nas las kyi phyag ni kha T+wAM ga bcings nas pad+ma'i rigs tha mas cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya ji lta ba bzhin du gzung nga bas so// ngag gi ting nge 'dzin gyis bzungs dgug pa ni
134a6(rgyud): chos kyi ngag gis bzlas pa'i don shes pa'o// pad+ma chen po bcings nas yid kyi sbyin bsreg bya'o// sems kyis zhi bar bya'o// dngos po bsrung bar bya'o// rnam par sbyang bar bya'o// zhes bya ba/ 
134a7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya'o// las thams cad pa'i phyag rgya'i tshogs so// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi phyag rgya'i rgyud do// de nas na mkha'i snying po'i phyag rgya chen po de bzhin no// dam
134a8(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya rdo rje rin chen te mthe bong dang mdzub mo'i sor mo bzhi ni rtse mo mnyams nas 'og tu rab tu bsdus ste/ dbang bskur ba'i rdo rje thal mos dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa'o// 
134b1(rgyud): des ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur ba'o// rdo rje de nyid snying kar ro// gyen du kha blta ba'o// de nyid khu tshur ro// khu tshur spyi bor bzhag la me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa dbul bar bya'o// 'di
134b2(rgyud): nyid dbus su bzhag nas las kyi phyag rgyar bzung ba'o// dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi rin po che'i gter gyi mchod pa thob pa'i don du yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
134b3(rgyud): las kyi dam tshig ni gsal ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// g.yon pa'i khu tshur snying khar spong nas g.yas pa nor sbyin pa bkrol ba'o// nor bu'i khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'i nyid kyis// snying
134b4(rgyud): po'i ngag klu'i rgyal pos bzla ba ste bka' bsgo zhing de bzhin du las la nye bar sbyor ba'o// gal te ma grub na dang rang bskur bar gnas pa'i rdo rje rin chen gyis na mkhar las
134b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi bka' bsre ba'o// chos kyi phyag rgya thams/ cad kyi tshogs ni 'da'o// don yod thogs med glu/ ba pa dang // las kyi tshogs ni sgrub pa dang // ngag gi
134b6(rgyud): phyag rgya'i bka' bsgo ba// thams cad myur du na mkha' las byung // zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'o// 
134b7(rgyud): de nas phyi'i rgyud ni phyag rgya chen po ni g.yon par kham por dang g.yas na mnga' stong pa'o// de rnams kyi dam tshig ni 'jug pa la bya ste/ lag pa gnyis kyi mthe bo dang mthe'u chung gi/ 
134b8(rgyud): gdu bus lu gu rgyud bcing bar byas la mdzub mo dang dbus ma dang / srin lag ma nyams te rtse gsum pas mtshan pa ni ming po rnams kyi'o// ji lta ba bzhin du bzung bas lha mo
135a1(rgyud): rnams kyi'i// rdo rje bsdams pa'i dbus ma dang srin lag gis sor mo'i rtse mo bzhi la mdzub mo dang mthe'u chung bzhi'i rtse mo 'dus pa ni lha mo rnams kyis 'da' bar dka'
135a2(rgyud): ba'i dam tshig go/ sring mo bzhi'i dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// gang gi tshe dkyil 'khor gyi brtag par ma nus na de'i tshe 'di bcings te bltas na dkyil 'khor brtag pa dang mthong ba dang
135a3(rgyud): mchod pa ci dgar 'grub par 'gyur ro// gdengs ka can gyi dbang po rnams kyi ni mthe bong bcings nas phyi rol tu kha bltas pa'o sor mo gdengs ka sgreng ba ste/ klu thams cad dgug pa dang / 
135a4(rgyud): gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbang du bya ba'i dam chi dag ste/ gal te 'da' bar byed na 'chi bar 'gyur ro// lto 'phye lag pa ste thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// dbus
135a5(rgyud): ma grin lag bzhi'i 'dud pa legs par byed pa'i sbyor ba sa nye bar stod cing bsdus la mthe chung gnyis kyi rtse mo gnyis kyis brdeg par bya ste/ nye bar 'phel ba dug
135a6(rgyud): thams cad 'bar ba'o// kun nas bsdus na dug thams cad 'ching ba'o// 'di nyid kyis dug thams cad bza' ba dang 'pho ba dang dug med par bya'o// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rdo rje khu
135a7(rgyud): tshur gyis bzung ba'i rdo rjes khros nas myur du gzhig par bya'o// phyi'i phyag rgya'i rgyud do// de nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mchog dbang phyug dam pa sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya ni/ rdo rje thal mo
135a8(rgyud): mnyam gzhag nas// ba dan gsum ni yongs su bzung // rdo rje khyab 'jug ces bya ba// dor na thams cad gcod par byed// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas nyon mongs pa'i dgra thams cad kyi
135b1(rgyud): mgo rnams bcad nas mchog tu byung ba thams cad grub pa'o// mthe'u chung mthe bong dang spel ba'i/ lag gnyis steng dang 'og tu ni// dbus ma gsum gyi rtse gsum mtshan// rdo rje 'dzin
135b2(rgyud): mashes sgrub pa'o// rdo rje dam tshig phyag rgya rdo rje gtum pa'i dbang phyug sa zhes bya ba don yod pa'i dam tshig go// rdo rje bad+ma mnyam gzhag nas// gang der ji bzhin de bzhin du// shin
135b3(rgyud): thob dka' sangs rgyas kyang // sgrub pa bzlas pas sgrub par byed// rdo rje chos nyid ces bya ba'i phyag rgya sgrol ma'o// mdzub mo bsdams pa'i phyi rol dgug/ mthe bong rdo rje bka' pa ste// rdo rje chen
135b4(rgyud): po'i nor bu ster// zhes bya ba ni rdo rje nor bu zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas thams cad kyi dbang phyug dam pas bsgrub das pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi tshogs kyi phyag rgya'i rgyung
135b5(rgyud): ni 'di yin te// de la dang po re shig dang po'i dngos grub brgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i phyag rgya chen po spyong 'gyur te/ ji lta ba bzhin
135b6(rgyud): dudam tshig phyag rgya mtshan rnams kyis lag pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa dag gi rdo rje chen po'i sbyor ba las thams cad kyi dngos grub tu sgrub par byed pa'i stong pa nyid du 'gyur te/ rdo rje
135b7(rgyud): bsdams pa'i nang du bcings pas so// de ltar na rang gi mtshan gyi khu tshur rdo rje gar las byung ba'i phyag rgya stong dang po'i las kyi tshogs brgya sgrub par byed pa'i rdo rje las byed pa
135b8(rgyud): gsum mo// de ltar lag pa g.yas pa dang / g.yon pa'i gcig shes kyis las thams cad rab tu sgrub par byed pa'i las kyi phyag rgya stong bzhi pa'o// de ltar ma lus pa'i phyag rgya
136a1(rgyud): bcing ba ni lag pa gcig gis phyag rgya thams cad bcing ba rab tu sgrub pa'o// de ltar 'gro ba don kun tu// 'khor dang dam tshig las dang bcas// kun mchog dbang
136a2(rgyud): byug dam pa ni// rdo rje sems dpas sgrub par mdzad// de ltar gsang ba rgya chen rmad du byung // mchog tu 'gro ba thams cad sbyong byed pa// mchog dang po yi bla ma bla na med// gsal ba'i rgyud
136a3(rgyud): ni nga yis yang dag shad// dpal mchog dang po'i rtog pa'i rgyal po las rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud do// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// gsang ba kun gyi bdag brtan pas// de nyid
136a4(rgyud): phyag rgya'i rgyud chen po// mtshon cha dam pa 'di gsungaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa'i rtog pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rtog pa'i tshogs mchog tu
136a5(rgyud): mkhas shing phra ba/ rgya che la zab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad med pa/ gsal zhing mnyam pa med pa/ bla na med pa'i bla ma mthar thug pa med pa'i dngos grub kyi
136a6(rgyud): gsang ba sgrub pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub pa po don yod cing thogs pa med pa bshad par bya'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu
136a7(rgyud): gsang bas gsungs so// ma mchu so rnams kyi bzung la dga' ba chen pos dang po'i rdo rje'i lta bas lta zhing byed pa dag gis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi
136a8(rgyud): tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// bde ba chen po'i gsang ba chen po'i rdo rje rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen pos dgod cing brtan pa'o/ 
136b1(rgyud): rdo rje lta bu'i byed pa dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// khro gnyer dang bcas
136b2(rgyud): pa khro bo'i rdo rje lta ba dang bcas pa'i byed pa dag dang / sna'i dbugs chen po'i yi ge hU~M gis rdo rje thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ rdo rje nyi ma ltar me 'bar ba'i lta ba'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag
136b3(rgyud): rgya'o// de bas cung zad 'dzum pas dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje lta ba'i byed pa rnams kyis mchu mnyam pa'i ting nge 'dzin rdo rje la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las
136b4(rgyud): kyi ye shes kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa ste/ pad+ma ne dan po'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// snyems pa dang / bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis phra bar 'dzum pa'i lta ba'i
136b5(rgyud): byed pa rnams dang / bzhin 'dzum pa dang bzhad pas na mkha 'al dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs sgrub pa ra byed pa ste/ rdo rje chen po ni nor bu'i spyan zhes bya ba'i phyag
136b6(rgyud): rgya'o// don yod thogs med grub pa dang / bden pa'i bdag nyid 'jigs pa med// sangs rgyas kun dang bdag nyid kyang // gsang ba'i phyag rgya legs grub stsol// dkyil 'khor du na ma
136b7(rgyud): zhugs kyang // de nas de phyir mchog dang po// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ dang po shin tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste// mchog gi mchog ni
136b8(rgyud): dang po dang // mchog tu gsang ba dam pa ste// 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya la sogs tshogs// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa yin// rdo rje 'chang chen slob dpon ni// mchog tu dang zhing rab
137a1(rgyud): dga' bsal snying po la sogs rnams med kyang // myur du thams cad sgrub par byed// snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs pa// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste// dngos grub thams
137a2(rgyud): cad rab sgrub pas// ma grub rnams kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gang zhig grub par ma gyur dang // bsod nams phun tshogs mi ldan na// bdag nyid dam ni rdo rje sems// bsgrubs na de ni myur du
137a3(rgyud): 'grub 'gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ snying po sogs dang nye snying pos// sgrub pa byas kyang ma grub na// mdzum pa'i phyag rgyas bsgrub par bya// de phyir gsang ba'i btsum mo 'di/ 
137a4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' rab dga' byed// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' dab che// dgyes pa de yis myur du 'grub// de nyid che na po 'di grub pa// dam pa mchog gi bdag nyid ni// gsang
137a5(rgyud): ba mchog tu bsod nams ldan// so so'i skye bo la brjod mi na// de nyid grub pa'i rjes 'brang ba'i// rdo rje sems dpa'i grub pa gang // gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// 
137a6(rgyud): de bzhin gzhan la sbyin mi bya// gang gis grub par ma gyur na// de la de nyid sbyin par bya// de nyid 'dzum pas myur du ni// bdag byin rlabs pas 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid chen po dag
137a7(rgyud): pa 'di/ rdo rje can gyi mtshon cha mchog/ phyag rgya'i rgyud ni bla med pa// mchog tu gsang ba bshad pa yin// de nyid dang po'i rjes 'brang ba'i// rdo rje slob dpon kun mchog la// gal te
137a8(rgyud): dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gzhan rnams la yang de bzhin sbyin// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni gcig pu 'di// bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na// bdud la sogs pa rnams kyis ni// mi thub pa
137b1(rgyud): dang mo sod 'gyur// de la rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dngos grub kun gsol ba// kun gsol kun byed thams cad du// bka' bsgo ba kun grub par 'gyur// dpal mchog dang
137b2(rgyud): gsang ba'i bla ma dam pa'i dpal rang gi dam tshig gi bla na med pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i cho ga'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i mchog
137b3(rgyud): dang po mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab la mtha' med cing shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med pa/ bla na med pa/ don yod cing thogs/ 
137b4(rgyud): pa med pa'i mchog de kho na nyid kyi snying po mchog tu gsang ba de'i snying po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba thams ca/ dad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs
137b5(rgyud): pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'i dam pa bla na med pa'i gsang ba dang / rab tu dga' ba thams cad dang / bde ba dang yid
137b6(rgyud): bde ba'i dngos grub kyi mchog sgrub par byed pa dang / mchog gi phyag rgya'i rgyud bshad par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// tsum pa nas 'khyud pa la
137b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i bcom ldan 'das mchog dang rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya thams cad ni dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dga' ba'i dam tshig rnal 'byor zhes bya ba te thams cad
137b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor zhes bya bar gang brjod pa'o// de dag dang gang la nye bar sbyor ba de dang der bcom ldan 'das ni/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha/ 
138a1(rgyud): byin rlabs mchog ni rtags mdzad nas// rdo rje sems dpa' myur du 'grub// tsum pa na 'khyung pa la sogs pa'i rig bya'i rgya btab pa tsam gyis kyang ma lus shing lus pa med/ 
138a2(rgyud): padang lhag ma med pa thams cad kyi mchog dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa grub par byed pa yin no// zhes bya ba
138a3(rgyud): shin tu mchog tu gsang ba'i phyag rgya'o// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing g.yo ba'i mig gi zur gyis lta ba'i phyag rgya ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dga' ba chen po'i rdo rje
138a4(rgyud): don yod pa'i mnga' zhes bya bas rgyas btab pas thams cad rjesu chags pa dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / dngos grub mchog la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad
138a5(rgyud): kyi las kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// / 'dzum zhing cung zad phye ba'i mig gi lta ba ni mche/ ga tu dga' ba'i dpal rdo rje spyan zhes bya'i phyag rgya thams
138a6(rgyud): cad sgrub par byed pa ste 'dis lta zhing btung bar bya'o// 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu dga' ba chen po dpal rdo rje don yod dga' ba'i bcud kyis len gyi mchog gi dngos grub
138a7(rgyud): ces bya ba'i phyag rgya ste tshe zad pa thams cad kyang 'dis rdo rje sems dpa'i na tshod gzhon pa dang / nang med pa dang / gzugs dang / stobs dang / gzi brjid kyi stobs dang / spro ba dang / 
138a8(rgyud): dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad dang / dpal dang bskal pa bzang po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / shin tu bde ba thams cad dang / yid bde ba dang / dngos grub kyi mchog thob pa ste/ 
138b1(rgyud): ji srid dngos grub kyi mchog thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub ste/ bcom ldan 'das yum gyi rgyas btab pa tsam gyis skad cig ma gcig gis grub pa'o// snyems pa
138b2(rgyud): dang bcas pa'i g.yon pa'i mig dgod cing bstod pa ni/ bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dpal don yod pa'i dga' ba'i rgyal mtshan mchog gi dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya
138b3(rgyud): sde/ 'dis rgyas btab pas thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar byed pa dang / phyag byed du bcug pa dang / rab tu sgrub par byed pa dang / ji bzhin ji srid mchog thams cad grub
138b4(rgyud): cing dngos grub chen po'i dbang phyug nyid rab tu sgrub par byed pa de'o// sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i lta ba dang / 'dzum pa dang gsong zhing phyag 'tshal ba dang ldan pa ni bcom ldan
138b5(rgyud): 'das kyi phyag rgya phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya ste/ dga' ba chen po dpal don yod pa'i dbang phyug gi ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rdo rje sems dpa' la
138b6(rgyud): sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos grub thams cad la rgyas btab pas 'dud par gyur nas dngos grub thams cad la sogs pa'i dngos grub kyi las kyi tshogs kyi mchog gi dam pa'i
138b7(rgyud): dngos grub kyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// rnam par 'phrul pa dang sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum pa'i zhal nyid ni bcom ldan 'das mchog dang po rdo rje sems dpa'i dga' ba chen po'i dpal
138b8(rgyud): rdo rje don yod dga' ba yis rnam par 'phrul pa brtson pa zhes bya ba mchog tu gsang ba'i rdo rje 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin thams cad kyi slob dpon mchog
139a1(rgyud): dang po'i glu ni/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po ni// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin kun rgyal po ste// mi 'gyur mchog ni 'grub par 'gyur// rnam
139a2(rgyud): 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i sgeg pa'i 'dzum pa'i phyag rgya rgyas btab pa tsam gyis thams cad kyis thams cad kyi dngos grub chen po'i bdag po nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad las
139a3(rgyud): kyi tshogs yid kyi 'dod pa rnams 'grub par byed do// sarba ku ru ya thA su khaM zhes bya ba brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba theg pa chen po'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal
139a4(rgyud): po bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa tha/ mas cad kyi theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa'i
139a5(rgyud): gsang ba'i rdo rje byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba 'di rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa la sogs pa ma lus shing lus pa med
139a6(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid thob pa'i ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las tshegs rnams
139a7(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'o// rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas pa'i 'dzum zhing smin ma'i khro gnyer rdo rje lta ba'i phyag rgya ni bcom ldan 'das kyi khro bo ki li ki la zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste/ 'dis rgyas
139a8(rgyud): btab pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad rjesu chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du bya ba dang / 'bebs pa dang / gzhug pa
139b1(rgyud): dang gar dang / klu dang / rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa dang / bden dag thams cad dang / grol ba dang / bra dbab pa thams cad sgrub pa dang / sgyu ma thams cad dang / rmang du thung
139b2(rgyud): pa thams cad so sor ston pa dang / sna tshogs pa'i gzugs thams cad kyis bya ba ston pa dang / thams cad la rgyas btab pa dang / gnod pa dang / gdul ba dang / bsod pa dang
139b3(rgyud): thams cad phyir 'dren pa dang / thams cad sgrub pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa gzhom du med pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs rnams sgrub par byed pa'o// 
139b4(rgyud): thams cad dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis/ thams cad ma nyam pa nyid kyi gzugs/ sna tshogs pa yi bya ba/ dal// rab tu 'jug pa'i mchod pa byin gyis brlal
139b5(rgyud): pad+ma zhes bya ba'i ni/ bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan pa/ sa gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi phyag rgya ste/ thams cang rnam par sbyang ba dang / srung ba dang / yongasu spyong ba dang
139b6(rgyud): rims thams cad dang / dug dang / sbyar ba'i dug dang / gdon dang / nad dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i phyag rgya nye bar zhi ba dang / shi ba yang dag par gso ba dang / dbang phyug
139b7(rgyud): thams cad thob pa dang / gzugs sna tshogs pa'i bya ba thams cad la rab tu 'jug pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub mtha' yas pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzi
139b8(rgyud): gyis rab tu byed pa'o// nam mkha' phra bar bskyod pa dag gis rol zhing rnal 'byor thams cad kyis rje su chags par bya ste/ 'di la bcom ldan 'das na mkha'i snying po'i rdo rje byin gyis
140a1(rgyud): brlab pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ste// 'dis rgyas btab pas bcom ldan 'das rjesu chags shing dgas pa dang / brtan par rjes chags nas na mkha' thams cad kyi
140a2(rgyud): bdag nyid kun gyi dngos po nyid kyi phyir bsam pa thams cad yong su rdzogs pa dang / mchog gi dngos grub la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs yid la 'dod pa rnams sgrub
140a3(rgyud): par byed pa'o// zhes bya ba yang gsungaso// mchog dang po ni mchog nyid du// gsang ba dam pa gsungs pa yin// mig sogs phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa
140a4(rgyud): yin// rdo rje kun 'dzin slob dpon gyis// tsum pa na dang 'a/ khyud sogs kyis// thams cad rnal 'byor rjes sgrub ste // myur du kun la rgyas gdab bya// snying po phyag rgya sngags/ 
140a5(rgyud): rigs pa'i// sgrub pa 'di ni rmad byung ste// grub pa med pa rnams la yang // dngos grub thams cad rab sgrub byed// gang la dngos grub med gyur dang // bsod nams phun
140a6(rgyud): tshegs med pa yang // bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ma// rgyas gdab myur du 'grub par 'gyur// gal te rdo rje sems dpa' mchog/ snying po la sogs nye snying pos// bsgrub bya grub par
140a7(rgyud): ma gyur na// tsum pa sogs kyis rgyas gdab bya// gang phyir gsang ba'i phyag rgya ni// dngos grub kun gyi bde dam pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa mchog/ de yis myur du 'grub par 'gyur// 
140a8(rgyud): de nyid chen po 'di grub pa// mchog gi bdag nyid dam pa ste// mchog tu gsang ba bsod nams ldan// so so'i skye bo la brjod min// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes
140b1(rgyud): bzang la// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sbyin te gzhan la sbyin mi bya// phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di 'ba' zhig gis// bdag nyid gang la yod gyur na// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyi
140b2(rgyud): mi grub pa dang song mi 'gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog dngos grub kun grol ba// thams cad mdzad cing thams cad mkhyen// thams cad sgrub par mdzad pa yin// zhes/ 
140b3(rgyud): bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud phyag rgya bcu pa rdzogs so// 
140b4(rgyud): de nas mchog tu mkhas shing phra la zab cing rgya che ba bas/ dam gyis mi khyab pa shin tu mtha' yas pa tshad med cing gzhal du med cing brjod kyis mi lang zhing rab tu khyab
140b5(rgyud): pa mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyung bshad pa 'o// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das mchog tu grub pa'o rdo rjes gsungaso// de la phyag rgya bcu ni bdag nyid
140b6(rgyud): thams cad bskyed par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'i bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'o// sngon du dang po'i dngos grub thams cad mchog la
140b7(rgyud): sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad kyi las kyi tshogs myur du sgrub par byed pa ste/ de la 'di ni sku'i phyag rgya ste ba dan gsum pa dang / kha T+wAM ga'i phyag rgya bcings nas g.yon pa dril bu
140b8(rgyud): dang bcas shing g.yas pa bslang ba'i tshul du byed pa ste/ sgeg pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mo la sogs pa dkrol ba'i gar gyis rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug ma bstod pa ste/ thams cad
141a1(rgyud): kyi mchog dngos grub chen po dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgyas dga' ba chen po'i dpal rdo rje don yod pa'i dgyes pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi rnal 'byor gyi
141a2(rgyud): dbang phyug ma zhes bya ba ste/ des rdo rje snyems ma yongasu btang bar byas na dngos grub bzhir 'gyur ro// rdo rje snyems ma de nyid kyis rgyas btab na thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub chen po'i
141a3(rgyud): dbang phyug chen po'i bdag nyid mi 'gyur ba'i mchog go// mnga' gsor bas rgyas btab na rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang rjesu chags par byed na bud med gzhan rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ rdo rje ki
141a4(rgyud): li ki las rgyas btab na lha dang lha ma yin gyi bud med tha/ mas cad rol par byed cing ma grub na yang thams cad / sgrub par nus pa yin no// chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan sgreng
141a5(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya 'dis thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba dang ga sod pa'o// rdo rje 'dod pa'i dbang phyug mas yongasu da gad cing phreng ba dor ba'i sngags dang phyag rgyas btab pa
141a6(rgyud): tsam gyis 'dod pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug thob pa'o// mchog tu gsang ba'i ras ris kyi phyag rgya ci lta bzhin du brjod par bya'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje dran yod pa'i dam tshig gi mchod
141a7(rgyud): pas rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad thob pa mi bzad pa'o// rdo rje stong pa'i phyag rgyas srid pa gsum thams cad bskyod pa dang rab tu byed pa'o// rdo rje hUM mdzad kyis
141a8(rgyud): phyag rgya dang rkang pas lha'i gzugs brnyan mnan cing rgyas btab nas bsdigs mdzub byas te// lha la sogs pa'i sems can de dang de ring por mi thogs par rgyas btab pas bka'
141b1(rgyud): bsgo ba thams cad dang las rnams byed par 'gyur ro// stan mthon po la skyil krungs phyed pas 'dug ste rkang pa g.yon pas rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan yang mnan nas rdo rje gsor zhing rje
141b2(rgyud): rje sems dpa' mnan nas/ dngos grub yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang phun gsum tshogs pa rnams nyam su myong na lha la sogs pa'i sems can rnams lta smos kyang ci dgos/ g.yon
141b3(rgyud): pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis rang gi rtags bzung nas g.yas pa rdo rje la sogs pa bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / yid la 'dod pa'i lha'i bu mo thams cad la rgyas 'debs shing stobs
141b4(rgyud): kyis rol bar byed pa 'am/ sgrub par byed pa ste rdo rje sem das dpa'i phyag rgya chen po'o// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya ni bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig lngas byung ba ni
141b5(rgyud): bcu snying khar sen mo 'drud pa'o// lcags kyu bdag pa'o// // g.yon pa'i lcags kyu la zhags pa de gzhug pa'i lcags kyu'i rtse mo btsir ba'o// phan tshun sems brung
141b6(rgyud): pa'i snying kar byas pa'o// lce mnyam par byin pa'o// snying kar rdo rje bston par rab tu bzhag pa'o// rdo rjes byab pa'o// rtse ba'i phyag rgya yang ngo // 'di rnams kyi dngos grub dang / phun
141b7(rgyud): sum tshogs pa dang / bde ba dang / phyag rgya dang / dam tshig dang / dkyil 'khor dang / chos dang / ye shes dang las dang / bde ba chen po thams cad kyi dngos grub rnams don
141b8(rgyud): yod par thob par 'gyur ro// de nas gsang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje bsdams pa las byung ba'i las bcu ni dbus ma'i lcags kyu so// kha sbyor gyi nang du rdo rje sor mo rnams thams cad
142a1(rgyud): kyi las so// mthe bo rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthil gnyis su byud pa'o// mdzub mo rdo rje de nyid kyi lcags kyu gnyis so// dbus ma'i rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtsom
142a2(rgyud): bcing bar bya'o// srin lag gi rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis sor mo'i rtse mo dag gi rol mo'o// mthe'u chung gi rdo rje'o// de nyid kyis mthe bo gnyis kyi sen mo btsir ba'o// 'di rnams kyis btab
142a3(rgyud): pas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa dang / rjes su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / dgug pa dang / rol pa dang / chags pas bcing ba dang / 
142a4(rgyud): thams cad smar gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dgod du gzhug pa dang / gsod pa'o// de nas las kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje gar gyi
142a5(rgyud): mchod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad dang / bu mo gzhon nu ma thams cad brtan par rjesu chags pa ni rdo rje lta bas so// rab tu dga' ba'i sgrub pa ni ma mchu nang
142a6(rgyud): du g.yo bar byed pas myang ba dang btung ba'o// chags pa brtan zhing ltung ba ni dbugs ring por gtong bas so// de nas las 'dod pa thams cad kyis dbang phyug thob pa ni dpung pa
142a7(rgyud): gnyis bstod paso// thams cad kyis mchod par 'gyur ba ni snying kar gzhug paso// yod pa thams cad rnyed pa la ni mig dgug paso// 'dod pa'i chags pa bskyed pa ni
142a8(rgyud): dbus dang bcas pa'i smin pa'i gdong gis lta bso// thams cad 'bebs pa'i cho ga ni rang gi snying phra bar bskyod pa'i las rnams kyis so// 'dod pa'i chags pa bsad pa
142b1(rgyud): ni dbugs btang bas rang nyid ldang bar byed paso// 'dod pa thams cad kyi rjesu spyod pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad kyi byed ni bka' bsgo bas so// de rnams rdo rje sems
142b2(rgyud): dpa' la sog pa'i brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dngos po thams cad la yang nye bar spyod na den yod grub pas skad cig nyid kyis brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba'i dngos grub kyis rgyas btab na 'grub par
142b3(rgyud): 'gyuro zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// de nas las kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje snyems pa'i phyag rgyas thams cad sgrub pa'o// rdo rje mtshon chams thams cad las
142b4(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba dang rjesu chags pa'o// rdo rje ki li dki las rab tu dga' ba'i reg bya dang / dngos grub thams cad bde bas grub pa'o// rgyal mtshan sgreng bas
142b5(rgyud): 'thab mo thams cad las rnam par rgyalo// rdo rje 'dre da pa'i dbang phyug mas bdag po chen po nyid do// dus kyis mchod pas mchod par 'gyur ba nyid do// rdo
142b6(rgyud): rje gsor bas thams cad 'dul ba'o// rdo rje dor bas thams cad gsod pa dang / thams cad 'phrog pa'o// g.yon pa snyems shing g.yas pa'i rdo rje khu tshur gyis las rnams kyi/ 
142b7(rgyud): sgyu ma dang / rdzu 'phrul thams cad dang / so sor ston pa dang / rmugs pa dang / rengs pa dang / gnyid log tu gzhug pa dang / bskor ba dang / bskrad pa dang / 'bru dang / ltung ba
142b8(rgyud): 'pho ba dang / dbang du byed pa la sogs pa'i las thams cad sgrub par byed pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo las byung ba'o// rdo rje sku mchog gi
143a1(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad do// mdzub mo gnyis kyi lcags kyus dngos grub thams cad do// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyis bdud thams cad la sogs pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i de nyid kyis mthe
143a2(rgyud): bo'i rdo rjes btab pas thams cad rnyed pa'o// de nyid kyi mthe bo gnyis bcug pa'i gtsug tor rdo rjes thams cad srung ba'i mthe bo rdo rje nang du bcug pa de nyid kyis rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i sems
143a3(rgyud): can thams cad rjes chags pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang du byed pa sgrub pa'o// mthe'u chung rdo rje sor mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis mdzub mo gnyis kyis legs par bzung bas mthe bo ni dpal dgug pa dang
143a4(rgyud): du byed pa'o// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi rgyal mo de nyid kyis nor tha mas cad dang dpal dbrog pa'o// de nyid kyi dbus ma da gnyis kyis srin lag gnyis kyi rtse mo yongasu btsir bas bdud
143a5(rgyud): la sogs pa'i gdon las grol ba dang / dbang du byas nas las thams cad la sbyor ba'o// rab tu dga'/ ba'i rdo rjes yul thams cad kyi mchog sgrub pa'o// de nas
143a6(rgyud): gsang ba'i phyag rgya rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje las byung ba'o// sems dpa' mnan nas rdo rje lha mo rol tu gzhug pa'o// de yang rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje chen pos rgyas btab pas so// rdo rje dang
143a7(rgyud): bcas pa'i rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rjeso// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chags pa dang bral ba'i 'khor los so// mdzub mo dang / dbus ma dang / srin lag gi 'khor lo spang
143a8(rgyud): bar byas pab mthe bo dang mthe'u chung mnyams la dral bar bya ste/ rab tu dga' ba'i rdo rje sgrub pa de kho na nyid kyis rgyas btab cing sgrub par 'gyuraro// btsir bas 'dod pa thams cad rab tu
143b1(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'o// mdzub mo lcags kyus 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba dgug pa'o// mdzub mo phrag dog la sogs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rab tu zhi ba'o// rtag tu bskyod pas
143b2(rgyud): rab tu dga' ba 'bebs shing de nas sgrub pa'o// skye gnas g.yo bas bud med dang skyes pa dag gi rab tu dga' ba la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'dod pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po shin tu
143b3(rgyud): mtha' yas pa'o// kha sbyor btsir bas ji srid 'tshe'i bar du 'dus pa dang bral ba yang ngo // rtags kyi sen mo g.yon pa'i mthil brud pas shin tu brtan pa'i 'dod pa la chags pa nyid du 'gyur
143b4(rgyud): ro gzhan gyi 'dod pa la mi lta zhing gzhan la mi 'gro ba dar shin tu bde ba de yid bde ba ster ba'i bud medaHmas cad 'grub par 'gyuraro// skye gnas kyis sen mo brung
143b5(rgyud): pas skyes bu rnamaso// de nas thams cad kyi bdag nyid kyi ga sang ba'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ de la lus thams cad kyi phyag rgya ni rdo rje khu tshur gnyis kyis 'khyud la ma mchu so rnams
143b6(rgyud): kyis bzung ste// rmongs pas bde ba ster du gzhug sgrub pas rab tu dga' ba'i dngos grub kyi rdo rje sems dpa' shin tu 'grub par 'gyuraro// mchog dang po'i dngos grub kyis su ra ta s+t+waM zhes
143b7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la brjod cing de kho na nyid bskul bas grub par 'gyur ro// rab tu dga' ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad sgrub pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa'i gsang ba khu tshur ni thams cad
143b8(rgyud): sgrub pa'o// bde ba chen po rdo rje las byung ba'i rdo rje chen po'i lta bas thams cad grub pa'o// smin ma gyen du bteg pas ltung ba slong ba'o// rang gi ma mchu nang du myang bas skal ba
144a1(rgyud): bzang po chen po sgrub pa'o// rang gi lce bstod pas rang nyid kyis bden pa thams cad dang de kho na nyid gsang zhing mi slu bar smra ba'o// rang gi lus la 'debs pas gzugs
144a2(rgyud): thams cad yongasu bsgyur ba ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' 'am sangs rgyas yang 'gyur ba yin no// rang gi bdag nyid rdo rje bsgoms pas na mkha' la 'gro ba'o// de nas dang po las thams cad
144a3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya bcu ni rdo rje thal mo kha T+wAM gas so// dngos grub thams cad rdo rje khu tshur dag gis so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur dag gis dngos grub thams cad do// thams cad gsod
144a4(rgyud): pa ni khro bo'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad sbyar ba ni pad+ma'i khu tshur dag giso// nor thams cad dbrog pa ni nor bu'i khu tshur gyis so// thams cad 'bebs pa ni thams
144a5(rgyud): cad 'bebs pa'i khu tshur gyiso// thams cad gar byed dru ga zhug pa ni kha T+wAM ga gtor ba'i khu tshur dag giso// thams cad slar gzhug pa ni mdzub mo mnyam pa'i lce'i
144a6(rgyud): khu tshur dag giso// thams cad bskyod pa ni brtan po'i khu tshur dag gis so// thams cad gzhug cing don yod par sgrub pa ni rdo rje lcags kyu'i khu tshur gyis so// de nas rdo rje khu tshur gnyis
144a7(rgyud): kyis ci 'dod pa'i lag pa'i sor mo'i phyag rgya bcu ste/ don yod cing thogs pa med par skad cig mas myur du grub par byed pa 'di lta ste/ pi wang dang / gling bu dang / rdza rnga dang / mu kuH
144a8(rgyud): dang cha lang dang / rnga bo che dang / rnga zlum dang / rnga pa Ta ha dang / guny+dza dang / ti mi li ste/ 'di rnams kyis rgyas btab na thams cad du rje su chags pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang / 
144b1(rgyud): 'bebs pa dang / rims dang / dug dang / sbyar dug dang / gdon las grol ba dang / gsod pa dang / 'thab mo las rnam par rgyal ba dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad thob pa
144b2(rgyud): na no nas bya ba gsu so// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag phyir// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yin// phyag rgya rtog pa rab tu brtags// rdo rje slob dpan srab ma mchog/ de nyid dang pa'i rjes bcwas
144b3(rgyud): la rtogs pa tsam gyis skad cig gis// don yod kun grub bde bar gsol zhes bya'o// dpal mchog dang po las mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzog so// 
144b4(rgyud): de nas mchog tu mkhas shing mtha' las 'das pa chang med cing gzhal du med pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa/ dmachog gi dngos grub chen po'i bdag nyid la sogs pa'i
144b5(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad kyis las kyi tshogs mchog tu dam pa grub pa zhes bya ba rdo rje gar las byung ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi phyag rgya stong bshad par bya'o// zhes bya/ 
144b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung so// phyag rgya chen po mnyam gzhag nas sgeg bcas mdzub sogs bkrol ba yis// las kyi phyag rgya chen po rgya// thams cad gar gyis bsgrub
144b7(rgyud): par bya// bde ba chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i lcags kyus khyad par du las kyi bcing ba ste rgya phrag dang po mchog tu bsgrubs te rdo rje dam tshig lha mo rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa
144b8(rgyud): bcings nas ni// kha sbyor nang du gsal ba ste// mchog dang po yi gsang chen gyis// las kyi phyag rgya brgya bzhin yin zhes bya ba rdo rje lha mo gsang ba thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje gar gyi
145a1(rgyud): mchod pa che'i// thal mos spyi bor bzung nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya grub pas na// dbang po rnams dang sbyar bar bya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchod pa chen po'i lha mo
145a2(rgyud): rnams kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje snyems mas gar bya zhing // sgeg bcas mthe chung sogs bkrol bas// de nyid bcings nas gar bya zhing // phyi ma 'di ni 'byung ba yin// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams
145a3(rgyud): cad kyi las don yod pa'i dam tshig grub pa'i dbang phyug chen po'i mchog gi phyag rgya brgya'o// rdo rje thal mo mnyam gzhag nas// thams cad kyis ni bsgrub par bya// mchog dang po yi
145a4(rgyud): las chen po'i// phyag rgya mchog ni gzhan yin no// zhes bya ba rgyal mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya/ mda' lnga bsdu rnas pa bcings nas ni// las kyi phyag rgya bde ba brgya// rab
145a5(rgyud): tu dga' mchog ma bkrol bar// bde ba nyid du mngon par sbyar// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi mchog tu gas nga ba'i 'dod pa ma'i phyag rgya'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
145a6(rgyud): yis// ji bzhin phyag rgya mchog sbyor bas// las kyi phyag rgya sna tshogs brgya// mchog dang po ni rab tu brtag/ ces bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje lha mo'i
145a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// rdo rje lha mo'i kha T+wAM ga/ lus kun gyi ni gar bya zhing // rdo rje gar mchog glu brang zhing // dang po'i phyag rgya chen po zhes bya ba'o// ji ltar gong du brgya gsungs pa// rol
145a8(rgyud): mi mchog gi phyag rgya'i tshogs// rol mo brdung zhing glu len pa// phyag rgya kun gyi gsal ba brgya// zhes bya ba rdo rje thams cad kyi lha'i bu mo'i tshogs kyis phyag bya ste phyag rgya stong
145b1(rgyud): mchog tu grub pa'o// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i mtha' ltar grangs med pa'i// phyag rgya'i rgyal mo grub mchog ster// kun mchog
145b2(rgyud): dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mchog grub phyir// na mkha' kun gyi go skabs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni rab tu zhugs// dam pa mchog tu grub par byed// mchog gi/ 
145b3(rgyud): dam pa rgyud chen po// dam pa mchog gi dngos grub ster// rdo rje slob dpon slob ma mchog/ de nyid dad pa'i rjes 'brangs la// phyag rgya kun gyi tshul 'di ni// bstan par bya ste gzhan la min
145b4(rgyud): de ltar mchog tu mi 'gyur dam pa'i dngos grub bde ba yi nga // mchog tu rnam dag rdo rje bde grub mtha' yas 'bras bur ldan// dpal mchog dang po'i gsal ba'i de nyid
145b5(rgyud): mchog gi sku'i tshulo// mchog tu rtag pa'i tshul 'di yod/ su mthar thug pa'o// dpal mchog dang po las dam pa/ mchog tu grub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'i rgyud rdzog so// 
145b6(rgyud): de nas sems dpa' chen po kun// rdo rje 'dzin dang bcas pa'i mchog/ rdo rje 'chang chen gtso bo no// mgon la bde gshegs rnams kyis gsol// kun mchog na mkha' chen po yi// dngos
145b7(rgyud): grub dbang phyug rab grub phyir// rtog pa thams cad kun bsdus pa'i// de nyid sems dpa' chen pos gsungs// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams la// rtog pa'i don 'di gang brjod pa// 
145b8(rgyud): gang gis rgyud 'di phyi ma la// dang po'i gnas mchog ji ltar lags// de bzhin rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rab dga' nyid dang bzang ba nyid// rdo rje snyems bdag ji ltar lags// sems
146a1(rgyud): dang sems dpa'i ting 'dzin dang // de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje 'chang chen nyid dang ni// byang chub spyod pa ji ltar lags// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// byang chub
146a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas ji ltar lags// rdo rje gtum mo thar byed nyid// phyag na rdo rje ji ltar lags// ji ltar dang po'i rigs byung dang // 'dod pa thar pa ji ltar lags// ji ltar mgon pa rnam gsu
146a3(rgyud): dang khyod ni ji ltar thams cad nyid// dang po'i snying po ji ltar lags// de tsa nye snying ji ltar lags// bde chen rdo rje chen po yi// don yod dam tshig ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor
146a4(rgyud): zhes bya ji skad gsungs// de yi rnam smin ji lta bu// thig ga dadab pa dang brtag pa yis// dngos grub ji ltar gsungs dpa lags// gsang ba lnga yi de bde ba// ji ltar gyur pa ji
146a5(rgyud): lta bu dkyil 'khor bdag po rnams dang ni// rigs rnams gsal ba ji ltar lags// thams cad dbang bskur/ de nyid dang // phyag mtshan tshogs kyi de nyid dang // thams
146a6(rgyud): cad dgug gzhug mchod pa che// bdag byin rlabs sogs sgrub pa che// de ni de nyid gsang ba dang // don yod pa ni mchog nyid de// mi 'gyur dam pa grub pa'i phyir// thams cad bdag cag
146a7(rgyud): rnams la gsungs// zhes bya ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mchog gi mdo gsungaso// de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// rtog pa kun gyi bdag po ni// the tshom
146a8(rgyud): tshogs rnams gsan nas su// 'di yi lan ni gsungs pa yin// de la rtog pa'i don gyi rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na// rnam rtog med pa'i chos rnams las// sems can don ni yongs brtags
146b1(rgyud): pas// des na rtogs par gsungs pa ste// rtog pa yong su dag phyir ro// de nas rgyud phyi ma ji ltar yin zhe na// rgyud ni rgyun zhes bya bar bshad// phyi ma sngar dang yang dag byung // de nyid gsang
146b2(rgyud): ba'i gsang ba dang // phyi ma dang bcas rgyud du 'dod// de la dang po gnas zhes bya ba'i rgyud ji ltar yin zhe na/ na mkha' kun la rab tu gnas// rdo rje kun mchog rang bzhin mchog
146b3(rgyud): bde ba chen po dga' ba che// grong khyer dar ni mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bya ba bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' rtog pa thams cad kyi rtog pa'i de kho na nyid ces bya ba 'di gsungs so// 
146b4(rgyud): de la thog ma tha ma med pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' ji ltar yin/ zhe na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir// thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// rdo rje
146b5(rgyud): sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das de gang yin zhe na/ dkon mchog dngos grub chen yi// dbang phyug chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa
146b6(rgyud): kun gyi rgyal// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ de la bcom ldan 'das dga' ba chen po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ nyes pa med cing shin tu rtag/ 'dod chags kun gyis rjes chags
146b7(rgyud): pa// de nyid 'di yis gsang ba 'di// 'dod chags chen po'i dga' ba che// de la ci kun tu bzang po nyid ji ltar yin zhe na/ shin tu dag pa kun gyi mchog/ gdod nas grol ba de
146b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// byang chub sems dpa'i cho ga mchog/ de la rdo rje snyems pa'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das ji ltar yin zhe na/ kun mchog
147a1(rgyud): dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i phyag rgya'i mchog/ rdo rje dbang phyug cher bstod pas// rdo rje sems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das
147a2(rgyud): mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// mchog dang po yi de nyid 'di// rdo rje sems dpa' gang gang brjod// dngos grub kun gyi 'byor pa rnams// de la thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes bya ba
147a3(rgyud): mchog gi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de nas de'i 'og tu las kyi bya bas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi mchog nyid du bshad par bya'o// bcom ldan
147a4(rgyud): 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungaso// de la bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyis sems can ji ltar yin zhe na/ bsam gyis mi khyab rgya che ba// thab dngos kun bde mi 'gyur ba// 
147a5(rgyud): thams cad khyab cing dri ma med// byang chub sems ni bdag/ brtan pa// de nas 'di las khyad par ni// sems nyid brtan pa nyid sems pas// ting 'dzin de la mnyam
147a6(rgyud): par gzhag/ rnam shes las ni rdo rje kun// rdo rje las ni 'dzin gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin ji ltar yin zhe na/ sems dpa'i byin rlabs sbyor ba ni// bdag la byin rlabs mchog
147a7(rgyud): sgrub pa// nyin re sgrub par byed na des// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid thob 'gyur// de la bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa ji ltar yin zhe na/ snying stobs rdul dang mun pas kyang // gang
147a8(rgyud): phyir sems can don gyur pas// de phyir nga ni kun tu bzang // byang chub spyod pa'i rjes 'jug pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das bdud nyid dang 'dul bas rgyal ba ji ltar yin zhe na/ 
147b1(rgyud): sems nyid kho na bdud nyid de// sems nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'o// rang sems gdul bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag ni bdud nyid gyur pa yin// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das mngon
147b2(rgyud): bapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang sangs rgyas yin zhe na/ rang sems so sor rtog pa'i phyir// byang chub sems mchog rdo rje nyid// de phyir de nyid sangs rgyas nyid// bdag byin rlabs mchog
147b3(rgyud): grub phyir ro// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje yin zhe na/ mi phyed so sor rtogs pa dang // gdug pa thams cad nges par gnon// sangs rgyas kun dngos rdo rje ste// byang chub
147b4(rgyud): sems ni brtan pa bdag/ kun tu bzang po'i lag tu ni// mtshon cha de ni rgyal bas byin// brtan pa thams cad grub pa'i phyir// des na phyag na rdo rje nges// de la ji ltar
147b5(rgyud): dang po'i rigs las byung ba shes brgyud zhe na/ shes rab pa rol phyin pa yum// yab ni thabs la mkhas pa ste/ rdo rje sems dpa' gdul ba'i phyir// rigs rnams rab tu
147b6(rgyud): byung ba'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das 'dod pa thar pa yin zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni chags pa che// dngos grub thams cad rjes chags phyir// dngos grub thams cad mi 'gyur
147b7(rgyud): bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjod pa'o// de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gsum yin zhe na/ bdag ni dus gsum mtha' yas phyir// nga ni srid gsum gdul bya'i phyir// gsum
147b8(rgyud): mchog 'jig rten gsum kun phyir// 'jig rten gsum nga khams gsum nga // de la ji ltar bcom ldan 'das thams cad nyid yin zhe na/ nga nyid brtan pa thams cad bde// bsod
148a1(rgyud): nams kun mchog che ba'i phyir// g.yo ba sems kyis 'dus byas phyir// sgyu ma thams cad nga yin no// zhes bya ba rang gi las kyi bya ba'i de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// 
148a2(rgyud): de la ji ltar dang po'i glu byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ srid pa shin tu grub pa yi// dbang phyug chen po mchog grub phyir// gzi can sems can don mdzad phyir// bskal pa thog mar bcom
148a3(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis gsungs// de nas gang yin zhe na/ 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// rab tu dga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ gsang ba'i phyir ni snying po brjod// yi ge hUM ni mi 'gyur
148a4(rgyud): mchog / de nas nye ba'i snying po yi// de kho na nyid shes pa ni// de nyid gsang zhing gsang ba dang // snying po rab tu brjod dpar bya// snying po'i rjes sgrub par 'grub// nye ba'i snying po
148a5(rgyud): nyid du brjod// de la ji ltar bde ba chen po'i rdo rje don yod/ pa dam tshig gi bshad pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ dngos grub kun gyi mi 'gyur bde// bde ba chen po zhes brjed// 
148a6(rgyud): rdo rje de nyid don yod grub// dam tshig 'da' bar dka' ba'o// zhes bya ba'i mchog gi dam pa'i glu bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi don shes
148a7(rgyud): pa yin zhe na/ ji ltar gnas dang 'khor lo dang // ji ltar dgod par 'gro ba dang // 'khor dang bcas pa dgod pa gang // de 'dra'i 'khor lo mchog gis sprul// de nas rnam par shes pa ni/ 
148a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems sogs lha rnams kyis// 'khor lo mngon sum mthong ba yis// rtag pa'i bsod nams ci 'dra ba// phyir na bris na'ang de bzhin no// de nas thig gdab pa'i cho ga ni// shes rab
148b1(rgyud): can gyis dkyil 'khor bris// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid dmigs la// shar dang nub dang byang dang lhor// thig bzhi btab pas dkyil 'khor brgyad// rdo rje thig gis yongs bskor bar// ka ba
148b2(rgyud): brgyad kyis nyer mdzes shing // sgo bzhi rta babs kha khyer dang // dra ba dra phyed la sogs rgyan// der bdag po yi don shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta bu zhe na/ nam mkha' skye ba mtshan ldan phyir/ 
148b3(rgyud): thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ sems dpa' rdo rje che rang bzhin// dpal mchog dang po zhes byar brjod// de nas bcom ldan 'das gang zhe na/ kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug
148b4(rgyud): chen po lhag pa'i lha// rdo rje 'dzin pa kun gyi rgyal// rab tudaga' ba mi 'gyur mchog/ ces bcom ldan 'das/ rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungaso// de nas spyan ras gzigs dbang
148b5(rgyud): gis// pad+ma rA ga dang mtshungs pa// thams cad dag pa bla na med// rdo rje sems dpa' rang bdag nyid// spyan ras ga zigs kyi dbang phyug nyid// de nas pad+ma'i rigs kyi de kho na
148b6(rgyud): nyid ni/ rdo rje chos ni rab grub phyir// sems can thams cad rnam dag phyir// pad+ma chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// ting 'dzin ye shes kun nas bsdus zhes bya'o// de la ji ltar na mkha'i
148b7(rgyud): snying po yin zhe na/ thams cad na mkha'i bcom ldan 'das// sems can bsod nams mthong zhing che// na mkha'i snying po sems dpa' dang // de nas nor bu'i rigs kyis ni// dbang bskur ba
148b8(rgyud): dang gter dang ni// rdo rje rgyal mtshan mchod pa che// nor bu chen po'i rigs grub pa// bsam pa thams cad yongs rdzogs pa'o// zhes bya ba dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi de kho na nyid chen po
149a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rdo rje rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba shes pa ni// sangs rgyas rin chen rdo rje byed// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje la// spyan ras gzigs la
149a2(rgyud): rdo rje sku// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa'o// de nas mchog dang po'i phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid do// kun mchog dngos grub chen po yi// dbang phyug chen po'i mtshon cha che// gsang ba lnga yi de nyid che// 
149a3(rgyud): rdo rje rtse lnga zhes brjod do// de nas rigs thams cad kyi phyag mtshan de kho na nyid zhes pa ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas nyid// sna tshogs bya ba rdo rje can// 'jig rten dbang phyug rdo rje chos/ 
149a4(rgyud): nor bu nor bu bsags pa'o// zhes bya ba dbang bskur ba tha dmas cad kyi phyag mtshan gyi de kho na nyid bcom ldan 'a dngas rdo rje sems dpas gsungs// de la ji ltar thams
149a5(rgyud): cad dgug pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// rdo rje lcags kyu dril bcas pas// bkug te de nas rjes bsgrub pa// dri bu nyid kyi bya ba yin/ 
149a6(rgyud): ji ltar mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// rab tu dga' bas mchod nas ni// glu dang rol mos rnams 'phrul pas// mchod de slar yang rnal
149a7(rgyud): 'byor mchod// de la ji ltar dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid yin zhe na/ rtog pa kun gyi gsang chen gyi// phyag rgya kun gyi legs byin
149a8(rgyud): rlabs/ dam tshig chen po 'di nyid kyis// rang nyid bsgrubs nas snying po bzlas// thog mtha' med pa'i sems dpa' ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' ba che// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid
149b1(rgyud): rdo rje sems pa'i bdag po'i bdag/ ces bya ba'i mchog dang po'i skyes bu'o// de la ji ltar rang lhag pa'i lha thams cad kyi sgrub pa chen po'i rgyud yin ne na/ ban pa dang ni g.yo ba dang / 
149b2(rgyud): rtog pa kun las bsgrub bya gang // rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// de dag thams cad bsgrub par bya// de nas thams cad rjesu sgrub pa'i rgyud ni// rdo rje dril bu 'dzin gyur nas/ 
149b3(rgyud): dril bus rab sad cing // rtog pa thams cad rjes sgrub pas// mchog dang la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// de la ji ltar 'bad pa med pa thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud yin zhe na/ 
149b4(rgyud): bsrub bya ci 'dod bsgrubs nas ni// phyi nas ji ltar 'dod pa yi// ci 'dod spyod pa la spyod cing // thams cad byed cing thams cad bza'// langs pa 'am ni 'dug pa 'am/ 
149b5(rgyud): gang dang de ru 'chag pa 'am// dgod pa dang ni smra ba 'am// gang der ci bzhin de bzhin no// dbang po gang dang gang / lam 'gyur// de dang de yi ngo bor bya// mnyam par
149b6(rgyud): gzhag nas rnal 'byor gyis// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bya// de nyid rnal 'byor 'di yis ni// thams cad nyid ni bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas kun dngos thams cad ni// rtag tu mthong
149b7(rgyud): zhing grub par 'gyur// dam tshig chen po de nyid ni// mkhas pa gang zhig dad pas klog/ de ni sdig kun dang bral bas// dngos grub kun gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// zhes bya ba dam tshig chen
149b8(rgyud): po'i de kho na nyid do// de ltar dpal mchog dang po'i cho ga ma nyams mchog gi bla ma gsal// mchog tu gsang ba sgrub pa'i cho ga bde mchog myur du grub phyir gsol// rdo rje mchog
150a1(rgyud): 'dzin dang bcas bde gshegs sras bcas rnams kyis byin rlabs pa/ bde chen dam pa rdo rje 'dzin pa dga' chen mchog gis de gsung so// dpal mchog dang po las
150a2(rgyud): mchog tu gsang ba'i cho ga/ de nas ston pa rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' ltar thug med kun tu 'gro// sangs rgyas kun gyis bston nas ni// rtog pa'i mthar thug don gsungaso// bdag gi snying po
150a3(rgyud): dang 'di mchog chen po'o// bde chen mchog gi mchog dang rjesu chags pa che// kun mchog sems dpa' rnams kyi rtag tu 'byung gnas ni/ kun mchog 'byor pa'i dbang phyug gso ba
150a4(rgyud): yin mtha' yas pa dang thog med mthar thug med pa ni// mchod bya chen po thams cad rnams kyi tshul chen po// nam mkha' dang mtshungs mchog gi dngos 'phel gsol/ 
150a5(rgyud): de ni sus kyang mthar thug byed par nus pa min// sems can rnams ni dman la zhen cing nyung la dga'// dad pa med/ cing bsgrub byed la ma sbyangs pa// rtag tu rjesu chags
150a6(rgyud): bral la chags pa// de rnams la ni phan phyir 'di ni mthar thug pa'o// gang gi khyim na 'di gnas gang gis rab tu sgrub pa 'am// yang na ji bzhin gsungs pa rtag tu 'dir sgrub byed// 
150a7(rgyud): so sor nyamasu myong ba'i mthu yis thams cad du// bdud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// rdo rje 'chang sogs sku ni gang gis sgrub byed pa// gzugs brnyan la sogs
150a8(rgyud): thams cad 'dir ni ji bzhin gsungs// des ni thams cad so sor nyams myong nus par ldan// bdud kyi la sogs rnams kyis de ni gnod mi nus// gang zhig rdo rje la sogs gzug
150b1(rgyud): brnyan la sogs pa// ji ltar 'dod pa 'di dag thams cad sgrub par byed// rab tu 'dod pas yi ge hUM las bris nas ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub de yis ster zhing thob par 'gyur// rgyal po rnams
150b2(rgyud): kyis rnam par sbyangs par mdzad pa ni// gang la don kun dag phyir mdzad par mi 'gyur min// 'dir ni bgegs byed bdud rnams kyang ni yod ma yin// rtogs pas dngos grub 'phel zhing
150b3(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa yin// nga ni bdud nyid mi 'gyur brtan med nyid mi 'gyur// brtan pa nyid phyir nga ni brtan par mdzad pa yin// rtag pa 'di ni mchog chen gang gis sgrub byed pa// de la
150b4(rgyud): ni dngos grub myur du sgrub par byed// dngos grub chen po laHdmas cad du rjes chags shing shin tu mnyes pa dang /  shin tu brtan pa dang / shin tu rgyas pa dang / rtag tu
150b5(rgyud): rgya che bar 'gyur ba yin no// gang zhig mchog gi rgyal po 'i snying po sgrub byed pa/ rgyal ba thams cad dgyes shing rgyal ba dgyes par mdzad// de dag grags pa
150b6(rgyud): chen po thob nas bde ba'ang thob// de phyir 'di la dad cing gus par bya ba yin// de nas rgyal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das la leg so zhes bya ba byin te/ yab mchog sangs
150b7(rgyud): rgyas sras ni legaso legs// sras mchog sangs rgyas sras ni legaso legs// rdo rje mchog ni rdo rje 'byung ba legs// dam pa'i chos kyi bdag nyid legs legs// sangs rgyas
150b8(rgyud): rnams kyis yang dag byin brlabs pa// rtag tu mi 'gyur don yod grub pa mchis// ji ltar dang po'i grub pa de bzhin du// phyi nas kyang ni de bzhin grub par 'gyur// de ltar ngag chen
151a1(rgyud): gsungs nas ni// sras dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yi// gsung la rjesu yi rang mdzad// dpal mchog dang po las rtog pa'i rgyal po
151a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog rdzogs so// / thugs dam sa'i snying po tho ling du rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta mkhas pa chen po man+ta ka la sha dang / sgra sgyur gyi lo tsA ba lha btsan po dge/ 
151a3(rgyud): slong bla ma zhi ba'i 'od kyi zhal mnga' nas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ le ts+tsha chen po rin chen bzang po yi// dpal mchog dang po'i rgyud 'di bsgyur ba la// bar bar dpe ma rnyed
151a4(rgyud): pas ma 'gyur nas/ bdag gis 'bad pas dpe btsal re/ dad pas bsgyur/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yA pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA na ya sha ta pany+tsa sha ka/ bod skad du/ 'phags
151a5(rgyud): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul brgya lnga bcu pa/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus
151a6(rgyud): gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mkhyen pa'i bye brag rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che thams cad kyi cod pan gyis
151a7(rgyud): khams gsum du dbang bcu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa/ rnal 'byor can chen po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin
151a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid thug su chud pa sna tshogs kyis/ bya ba mdzad de me lus pa na sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa rnams kyis
151b1(rgyud): re ba thams cad yongasu bskang ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa khams gsum gyi mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs pa sku dang gsung dang thugs
151b2(rgyud): thams cad rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa lha'i rgyal po gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi gnas/ 'dod pa'i khams thams cad na/ nor bu rin po che chen pos rab tu spras pa dang / ba ngan
151b3(rgyud): kha dog sna tshogs dril bu brgyus pa rlung gis bskyod pa dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / rgyan phreng dang / chun 'phyang dang / zla ba lta bus mdzes par byas pa/ de bzhin
151b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs pa/ shes pa bstod pa nu/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang / thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems
151b5(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje dang / spyan ras gzi/ gas dbang phyug dang / na mkha'i snying po dang / rngo/ rje'i khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed
151b6(rgyud): ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dang / de dag la sogs
151b7(rgyud): pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgya dang thabs gcig ste/ yongasu bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul chos thams cad kyi ngo
151b8(rgyud): po nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo zhes bya ba/ thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po// tshig 'bru bzang po// ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu byang ba/ yang
152a1(rgyud): dag par ston te/ 'di ltar rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// 'dod chags kyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i
152a2(rgyud): gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sdug pa'i 'ching ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas
152a3(rgyud): de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// thams cad la dbang phyug dang / dbang rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lta ba rnam par
152a4(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dang / 'i gnaso// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sred pa rnam
152a5(rgyud): par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// snyems pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// rgyan
152a6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// yid tshim par byed pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// 
152a7(rgyud): snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lus bde ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// gzugs/ 
152a8(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas
152b1(rgyud): de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas de ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub
152b2(rgyud): sems dpa'i gan so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa la
152b3(rgyud): lag na rdo rje su la la chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i sgo sgrub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di lan cig zos na yang / de byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du sgrib pa
152b4(rgyud): thams cad dang / chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / rjes kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po bsags kyang sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan seng du rnams kyang skye bar mi 'gyur/ 
152b5(rgyud): sdig pa yang byas ma thag tu sdug bsngal med par byang b.ra'agyur ro// su zhig 'dzin pa dang / nyin re bzhin klog/ pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed
152b6(rgyud): pa de tshe 'di nyid la chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin thob pas/ chos thams cad la dbang bar 'gyur// chos thams cad la dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / mchog tu
152b7(rgyud): dga' ba myong bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshes bcu drug gis de bzhin gshegs pa 'am// rdo rje 'dzin thob par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje de bzhin
152b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad pa/ theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa dkyil 'khor thams cad la/ rdo rje 'dzin mtha' dag gi sems can gyi mchog khams gsum ma lus pa dag na/ 
153a1(rgyud): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las rnam par rgyal ba/ sems can gyi khams lus med pa/ don thams cad grub pa/ dam tshig chen po la rdo rje gsang ba'i sems can
153a2(rgyud): du mas g.yog byas pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi don 'di ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing lag pa g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings te/ thog ma'i rdo rje chen po gsor nas/ rang gi snying
153a3(rgyud): khar bstod pa'i tshul gyis 'dzin cing / bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya rang gi de kho na nyid kyi snying po 'di smoso// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam
153a4(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyis yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bsgrub pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
153a5(rgyud): pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ rdo rje sra ba nyid kyi phyir/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o// don gcig pa'i phyir don gyi mnyam pa nyid
153a6(rgyud): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o// ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o// thams cad
153a7(rgyud): la rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ni/ byang chub chen po'o// lag na rdo rje su la la chos mngon par sgrub pa bzhi po 'di dag nyan pa
153a8(rgyud): dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de sdig pa thams cad spyod kyang / byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du ngan song thams cad las yang dag par 'das par 'gyuraro// myur du bla
153b1(rgyud): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes kyi khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pa/ don gnas 'di nyid rje cher
153b2(rgyud): ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi snying po 'di rab tu smras// a de nas ma rungs pa thams cad 'dul ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
153b3(rgyud): pa shAkya thub pas kyang / yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi rnam par rgyal ba bsdus pa zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub pa 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa
153b4(rgyud): med pa nyid kyis/ zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid do// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid do// gti mug gi spros pa med pa nyid kyis chos
153b5(rgyud): thams cad spros pa med pa nyid do// chos thams cad kyi spros pa med pa nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// lag na rdo rje su la la shes
153b6(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa des 'dul ba'i dbang gis khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can thams cad bsad kyang
153b7(rgyud): ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje chos
153b8(rgyud): 'di'i don rgya chen po ston te/ 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas khro gnyer dang bcas shing smin ma bteg ste/ 'bar bar lha la pad+ma'i
154a1(rgyud): gdong khro zhing dgod de/ mche ba gtsigs nas rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang ba'i tshul du gnas pas gnas nas/ dz+ra sngun bya ba'i snying po 'di smoso// de nas bcom ldan
154a2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ngo bo nyid dag pa'i chos nyid thob pas/ yang chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi
154a3(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// dri ma thams cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig
154a4(rgyud): rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// chos tha/ dmas cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na sems ca dan thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur// shes pa thams
154a5(rgyud): cad rnam par dag pas/ 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa
154a6(rgyud): dang 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de 'dod chags dang / dri ma thams cad kyi nang na 'dug kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi nyes pa rnams dang / dri ma rnams dang / glo bur gyi
154a7(rgyud): nyon mongs pa rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur te/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
154a8(rgyud): spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug don gyi gnas 'di nyid rgya cher ston cing / bzhin rab tu 'dzum dmul te/ pad+ma'i 'dab ma kha 'byed pas/ 'dod chags la sogs dri mas mi gos pa la
154b1(rgyud): lta zhing / pad+ma gzugs sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smras// hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang pos yang // de bzhin gshegs pa
154b2(rgyud): thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad de/ dbang bskur ba sbyin pa ni khams gsum thams cad kyi rgyal srid
154b3(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro// nor sbyin pa ni re ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs par 'gyuraro// chos sbyin pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// zang zing gi sbyin pa ni lus dang ngag dang / sems
154b4(rgyud): kyi bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sem/ sa dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po bzhin rab tu 'dzum te/ rang gi mgo la rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba'i phreng
154b5(rgyud): ba 'ching zhing don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ dbang bskur ba thams cad kyi dam tshig rin po che zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// trAM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
154b6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'dzin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
154b7(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni de bzhin
154b8(rgyud): gshegs pa nyid du 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni/ chos thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug
155a1(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya yong su 'dzin pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pa ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / 
155a2(rgyud): sems thams cad rdo rje rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyuraro// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / lung 'bogs pa dang
155a3(rgyud): sgom pa des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / shes pa thams cad dang / dgos pa thams cad dang / lus dang / ngag dang / sems thams cad rdo rjer
155a4(rgyud): rdo rje'i dngos grub dam pa thob nas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa dar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dar 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
155a5(rgyud): chen po rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin pas/ don gnas 'di rgya cher ston te/ de ba zhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje sra ba'i dngos grub thams cad
155a6(rgyud): kyi mchog ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras// AHde nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas/ yang 'khor lo ltar yi ge bskor ba zhes bya ba/ shes
155a7(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ ngo bo nyid med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'o// smon pa med pa
155a8(rgyud): tshul gyis/ chos thams cad smon pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'jam
155b1(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa don 'di nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum bzhin du/ bdag gi ral gri des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'debs shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
155b2(rgyud): phyin pa'i snying po'i mchog 'di smraso// A/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor der 'dus pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo chen po la 'jug pa
155b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyuraro// don gyi
155b4(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' se/ mas dpa' chen po'i 'khor lo la 'jug par 'gyuraro// // chos thams cad kyis mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ 
155b5(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo la 'jug par bya'o// chos tham sa cad mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa ni/ 'khor lo tha/ mas cad la 'jug par 'gyuraro// de nas byang chub sem
155b6(rgyud): dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing / bzhin 'dzum nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo bskur zhing / rdo rje 'khor lo
155b7(rgyud): thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i snod kyi/ mchod pa
155b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod
156a1(rgyud): pa'i cho ga rgya che ba'o// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu skyob pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// dam pa'i chos yongasu
156a2(rgyud): 'dzin pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yi ger 'dri ba dang / yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog
156a3(rgyud): pa dang / brjod pa dang / ston pa dang / nyan pa dang / sems dpa' dang / sgom pa dang / mchod pa byed pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de
156a4(rgyud): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i mdzod don de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzumazhing las thams cad don yod pa'i dam tshig zhes bya
156a5(rgyud): ba'i snying po 'di smras// oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad 'dul nu sa pa/ yang ye shes kyi khu tshur yongasu 'dzin pa/ 
156a6(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'dul ba shes pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ khro bo mnyam pa
156a7(rgyud): nyid do// sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas/ khro bo 'dul ba nyid do// sems can thams cad chos nyid pas/ khro bo chos nyid do// sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas/ 
156a8(rgyud): khro bo rdo rje nyid/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ don
156b1(rgyud): de nyid rgya cher ston te/ bzhin rab tu 'dzum zhing rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya dang / rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gzugs kyi khro bo'i gad mo zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di smraso// ha de nas bcom ldan
156b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/ chos thams cad kyi mchog ces bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha
156b3(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// thams cad don nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don nyid do// thams cad chos nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chos nyid do// thams
156b4(rgyud): cad las nyid pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la dag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ byang chub sems
156b5(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyi don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ don yod pa thams cad kyi dam
