156b6(rgyud): tshig ces bya ba'i snying po 'di smras// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyis yang / sems can byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba
156b7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po thams cad kyi rang bzhin yin pas/ sems can thams cad ni de bzhi/ 
156b8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snying po can no// thams cad snying rje'i snying pos dbang bskur ba nyid pas/ sems can thams cad ni rdo rje'i snying po can no// ngag thams cad rab tu byung bas/ sems can
157a1(rgyud): thams cad ni chos kyi snying po can no// sems can thams cad kyi bya ba byed pa la sbyor bas/ sems can thams cad ni las kyi snying po can no// de nas pha rol gyi rdo rje rigs
157a2(rgyud): rnams kyis ca co'i sgra byung nas chos nyid kyi don rgya cher ston cing / snying po phul te/ de nas rdo rje'i dbang phyug chen pos rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phu lo// tri/ de nas ma mo thams cad kyis
157a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ mgrin gcig tu thams cad dgug pa dang / gzung ba dang / gzhig pa dang / sgrub pa'i dam chog ces bya ba rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phul lo// 
157a4(rgyud): b+h+yo/ de nas sbrang rtsi byed la sogs pa ming po gsum gyis pa/ com ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di smras// sA de nas sring mo bzhis bcom ldan
157a5(rgyud): ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal te/ rang gi de kho na'i snying po 'di phu lo// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shegs pa mtha' yas la mthar thug cing mu med pa'i
157a6(rgyud): chos dang ldan pas yang / cho ga 'di mthar thug par byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi mthar thug pas byin gyi brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba/ shes
157a7(rgyud): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bshad de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' yas pa nyid pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' yas pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha
157a8(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa mu med pa nyid pas/ rdo rje thams cad mu med pa nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa du ma nyid pas// chos thams cad du ma nyid do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
157b1(rgyud): mthar thug pa med pa nyid pas/ chos thams cad mthar thug pa med pa nyid yin// su la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa
157b2(rgyud): dang / ston pa dang / brjod pa dang / bsgom pa des sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thug pa med pa'i mthar phyin te/ sgrib pa thams cad zad nas de bzhin gshegs pa
157b3(rgyud): 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di don yod pa dang / thogs pa med par myur du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ 
157b4(rgyud): lag na rdo rje la leg so zhes bya ba byin no// sems can che na po legaso legs/ bde ba chen po legaso legs 8/ theg pa chen po legaso legs/ blo gros chen po legs
157b5(rgyud): legs/ cho ga 'di ni legs par spras/ sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin kun gyis// 'bras bu yod pa 'dul ba'i/ mchog/ rdo rje mdo sde byin gyis brlabs// cho ga'i rgyal
157b6(rgyud): po bla na med// gang rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa ni// bdud la sogs pa thams cad kyis// de dag mi song mi tshugaso// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // dngos grub dam pa thams
157b7(rgyud): cad kyang kha sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa bzhin// ring por mi thogs thob par 'gyur// de skad gsungs nas sngags grub phyir// rdo rje can gyis bshad pa la// kun mchog sangs
157b8(rgyud): rgyas mkhas bcas pa// thams cad kyis ni mngon par stod// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
158a1(rgyud): gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa chos thams cad spros pa med pas yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mchog dang / 
158a2(rgyud): po thog ma dang tha ma dang dbus med pa'i dam pa 'di gsung so// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis 'dod chags chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
158a3(rgyud): kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bde ba chen po dngos grub dam pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos
158a4(rgyud): grub chen po grub pa dam par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po dngos grub dam pa ni/ bdud chen
158a5(rgyud): po'i stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub dam pa ra 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud chen po'i stobs rab tu 'joms pa dngos grub
158a6(rgyud): dam pa ni khams gsum pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi khams gsum thams cad kyi dbang phyug chen po'i
158a7(rgyud): dngos grub dam pa ni ma lus pa na/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongasu sbyong bar 'dod pa'i rgyu'i phyir/ 'khor ba la yang chags shing / brtson 'grus che ba'i byang chub
158a8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma lus pa na/ sems can gyi khams lus pa med pa yongasu skyab pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu
158b1(rgyud): shin tu bde ba chen po dngos grub dam par 'gyuraro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnasu ni// mkhas mchog 'dug par gyur pa'i tshe// de srid mtshungs med sems can don// mya
158b2(rgyud): ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes rab pha rol phyin thabs dang // ye shes gnasu bsgrubs pas na// chos kun rnam par dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongasu dag par gyur// chags la
158b3(rgyud): sogs pas 'dul na ni// 'khor ba'i bar du rtag par yang // 'jig rten sdig byed de sbyang phyir// 'khor ba srid du bdag nyid 'bul// ji ltar pad+ma rab 'bar yang // tshon gyi nyes pas
158b4(rgyud): mi gos pa// de bzhin gnas pa'i nyes pa yis// 'gro pa/ na rnams la mi gos so// 'dod chags chen po rnam par dag/ bde ba che zhing nor che la// khams gsum
158b5(rgyud): dbang phyug thob pas na// sems can don rnams brtan pa ra byed// lag na rdo rje su la la nang par langs nas mchog dang po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
158b6(rgyud): gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re zhing / 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / sgom pa de yid bde ba dang / bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin
158b7(rgyud): gshegs pa rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig dngos grub kyi mchog kyang tshe 'di la thob par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog kyang grub te/ rdo rje 'dzin
158b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi chen po 'am/ de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuraro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje la bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba pa'i bdag po shes rab
159a1(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i sngags kyi tshig ni nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di rnam so// oM byang chub kyi sems rdo rje/ oM kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa/ oM yid bzhin gyi nor bu/ oM
159a2(rgyud): 'gog pa med pa/ oM skye ba bzlog pa/ oM rnam par shes pa thams cad/ oM 'dod chags dang bral ba'i chos nyid chen po/ oM brtson 'grus kyi go cha/ oM kun tu 'gro ba/ oM rdo rje sra ba'i
159a3(rgyud): sems hUM phaT oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad/ oM ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa/ oM chos nyid shes pa rnam par dag pa/ oM las rnam par sbyong ba/ hUM oM nges par gnod mdzes rdo rje
159a4(rgyud): b+hu mi 'dod pa la 'dod chags pa/ oM spong ba'i rdo rje can/ oM hUM thams cad 'dul ba/ oM hrIHoM a zhes bya ba'i so// oM shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ A baM hUM oM a
159a5(rgyud): oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i mchog/ oM bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung rnam parang/ ga pa/ oM de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs / 
159a6(rgyud): rje aHoM a sdig pa 'ching ba/ thams cad chongs shig/ ngan song gi rgyud thams cad las thar par gyis shig/ oM dam tshig thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM traT/ sdig pa gzhom pa'i phyag rgya dang
159a7(rgyud): sngags te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ dngos grub dmar rdo rje 'dzin chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs par 'gyuraro// lag na rdo rje 'di ni sems can dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
159a8(rgyud): bskyed pa rnams kyis mnyan pa 'am/ yi ger 'dri ba 'am/ yi ger brir gzhug pa 'am/ klag pa 'am/ 'chang ba 'am/ sgom pa 'am/ bsti stang du bya ba 'am/ ro mor bya ba 'am/ 
159b1(rgyud): mchod par mi nus// gang dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tha na yi ge 'bru gcig tsam thos na yang sems can de dag ni gzhan na sangs rgyas mang
159b2(rgyud): po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa yin na mtha' dag rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ lag na rdo rje gang la la dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig gang ga'i klung brgyad cu'i bye ma la bkur sti ma byas pa dang / 
159b3(rgyud): bla mar ma byas pa dang / bsti stang ma byas pa dang / mchod par ma byas pa de dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos par mi nuso// chos kyi rnam
159b4(rgyud): grangs 'di gang la spyod pa'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du 'gyur ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang gi lus la thogs sam/ glegs bam la bris te/ spyod pa'i gang zag de
159b5(rgyud): phyag bya ba'i gnas su 'gyur ro// de bskal pa bye ba mang por skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// de la bdud sdig to can par chad byed par mi 'gyuraro// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / lha
159b6(rgyud): gzhan rnams kyang de la srung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang / sba ba'i phyir rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyuraro// yang ba ma spangs pas 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
159b7(rgyud): dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du 'dod pa de dang der skye'o// de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs
159b8(rgyud): 'di phan yon mang mod kyis ngas phyogs tsam zhig brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang / thams cad
160a1(rgyud): dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
160a2(rgyud): 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa tshul lnga bcu pa rdzogs so// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maN+Da a le kA ra nA ma ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan
160a3(rgyud): ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// bla ma dang 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das/ 
160a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang / nor bu dang /  rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs shing khyad
160a5(rgyud): par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin
160a6(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyed pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
160a7(rgyud): cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thugasu chud cing las sna tshogs mdzad pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi re ba thams cad
160a8(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
160b1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bsten cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang ldan pa/ kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ rlung gis bskyod pa'i ngar gyi
160b2(rgyud): 'phan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs shing nye bar mdzes pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad legs par yongasu dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi khang bzang 'od mtha'
160b3(rgyud): yas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gtsug lag khang la me tog gi 'khri shing mchog gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa'i sprin
160b4(rgyud): nam mkha'i khams yongasu khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sang sa rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi
160b5(rgyud): snying po 'od gsal ba'i gzhal med khang / de bzhin gsheg/ sa pa'i gnas rdo rje snying po'i rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ de bzhin
160b6(rgyud): gshegs pa mi 'khrungs mi 'gog 'gog par mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ chos kyi dbyings kyi
160b7(rgyud): snying po'i khang bzang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sa chen po'i dam pa la bzhugaso// de la sangs rgyas kyi
160b8(rgyud): zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor zhing mdun du bdar te chos
161a1(rgyud): ston par mdzad pa ni thog mar dge ba bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge ba/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yong su rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu
161a2(rgyud): dkar ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul yongasu dag pa'i sgo ston par mdzad do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyi su med pa mnyam
161a3(rgyud): pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa'/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam par rgyal ba'i dam tshig 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po// chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis rnam
161a4(rgyud): par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya ma/ tshe ltar zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i// ye shes thob pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje na mkha'
161a5(rgyud): lta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku/ sku rin po che chos kyi sku/ sprul pa'i sku/ chos mnyam ba nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems/ don yod pa/ yongasu
161a6(rgyud): bsdus pa/ dge ba 'phel ba rgyal po chen po snang ba'i tog bzhad pa po// chos dang ldan pa/ shes rab kyi 'khor lo// skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ srung ba po// gnod sbyin
161a7(rgyud): can mtshams sbyor ba/ yang dag pa'i gter/ gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo can/ ye shes can/ khyab 'jug chen po// sku dang gsung dang / 
161a8(rgyud): thugs rdo rje/ na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis yongasu bgrod pa/ rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes
161b1(rgyud): sems dpa' namakha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa/ rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po che
161b2(rgyud): dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig na mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
161b3(rgyud): kyi bdag nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi dag pa na mkha' la khyab pa po// gzugs thams cad yongasu mthong ba'i ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa
161b4(rgyud): sems can 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog dang ldan pa/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med
161b5(rgyud): pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi brgyu da pa/ rin chen tog de 'od byed pa// 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon// don yod pa ni las kun byed// 
161b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin
161b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyisu med pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjesu thob pa/ de bzhin
161b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyis med cing mnyam pa nyid
162a1(rgyud): dmigs pa'i ye shes yongasu mthar phyin pa la gnas pa/ stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa// smon pa med pa dang / 
162a2(rgyud): tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
162a3(rgyud): phyug nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnams la rnam par gnas so// de nas rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 
162a4(rgyud): 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu
162a5(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i zhal ras kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rjes gol brdabs te/ 
162a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsdus pa chen po'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ bud+d+ha sa mA dza AHhAHoM hUM badz+ra sa mA dzaHde nas de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa
162a7(rgyud): thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud rab 'byam rgya mtsho sprin khyab par mthong ngo // de nas yang 'jam dpal
162a8(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo gros
162b1(rgyud): kyis ye shes yongasu bskyod de gnas thams cad du rnam par gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor
162b2(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs
162b3(rgyud): pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod de ngas bshad par byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ b+ha/ 
162b4(rgyud): de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin gshegs// de bzhin gshegs pa'o/ dad dpag med// don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs// 
162b5(rgyud): gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhugs te/ zhugs pa tsam gyis de
162b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba chen po thams cad kyi phyir byin gyis brlabs par mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi po
162b7(rgyud): rnams las chos kyi dbyings dang na mkha'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul dbyangs gcig gis ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par
162b8(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas so// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// dga' ba rnam
163a1(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// 'dod chags
163a2(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// gti
163a3(rgyud): mug rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// mi khom
163a4(rgyud): pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar bya/ ngang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// yid sim pa rnam par da/ dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
163a5(rgyud): dpa'i gan so// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin du/ de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lus rnam/ par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub
163a6(rgyud): sems dpa'i gnaso// ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// yid rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems
163a7(rgyud): dpa'i gnaso// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems da
163a8(rgyud): gnaso// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// 
163b1(rgyud): reg rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i
163b2(rgyud): gnaso// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
163b3(rgyud): dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'dren pa po// sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ thams
163b4(rgyud): cad gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba stan pa rdzi ba med pa/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i snying pos bka' stsal pa/ b+h+rUM/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin
163b5(rgyud): bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po 'di lan cig tsam yang thos na de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa/ 'i bar du sgrib pa thams cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa
163b6(rgyud): sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po thams cad nye bar bsags kyang nam kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa ngan song rnamasu skye bar mi 'gyuraro// gzhan yang sdig pa
163b7(rgyud): rnams byas na yang sdug bsngal med cing zad par 'gyur ro// gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa dang / ston pa dang / rgyun ma chad par yid la byed pa de ni skye ba 'di nyid la
163b8(rgyud): chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyuraro// chos thams cad la dga' zhing mgu la rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyuraro// 
164a1(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po sde ba bcu drug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid pa thob par 'gyuraro// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
164a2(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par sgrub pa 'di ston par mdzad do// 
164a3(rgyud): rdorje mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po rdo rje lta bur sra ba dang / don gcig pa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rang bzhin
164a4(rgyud): rnam par dag pas chos nyid mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa nyid kyis las thams cad mnyam
164a5(rgyud): pa nyid mngon par byang chub pas byang chub chen po ste// / 'jam dpal gang la las chos kyi gnas bzhi po// // 'di thos nas nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / 
164a6(rgyud): sgom par byed na ji srid byang chub snying po la thug gi bar du sdig pa thams cad yang dag par ldan pa yang sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag pa
164a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par byang chub par 'gyuraro// aM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos thams cad
164a8(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nges par bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags kyi spros pa
164b1(rgyud): med pa'o// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'o// gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir/ gti mug gi spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir/ 
164b2(rgyud): chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gang la la
164b3(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na des 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas khams gsum du skyes pa'i sems can rnams bsad pa
164b4(rgyud): gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro bar mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyuraro// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag
164b5(rgyud): ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas sla ra yang chos thams cad rnam par gzigs pa'i dab phyag ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu
164b6(rgyud): phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten gyi 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir yul thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yino// 'jig rten gyi zhe sdang thams cad
164b7(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yin// 'jig rten gyi chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid yino// 'jig
164b8(rgyud): rten du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa yin no// 'jig rten gyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i
165a1(rgyud): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid yin// 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di thos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la
165a2(rgyud): sgom par byed na/ de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi rkyen glo bur ba'i dri ma gos par mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
165a3(rgyud): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyuraro// hrI/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum thams cad pa'i bdag po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung
165a4(rgyud): gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi rgyal po yongasu thob par
165a5(rgyud): 'gyuraro// don gyi sbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzog sa par 'gyuraro// chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad/ mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// zang zing gi sbyin pas
165a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi lus dang / ngag dang / yid bde ba thob par 'gyuraro// tAM de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa zad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'a
165a7(rgyud): ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
165a8(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongasu gzung
165b1(rgyud): bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongasu gzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung bas sku dang
165b2(rgyud): gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom
165b3(rgyud): par byed na/ des dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad dang sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpas mchog
165b4(rgyud): gi dngos grub thams cad so sor yongasu thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyuraro// u
165b5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge yo ngasu bsgyur ba zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
165b6(rgyud): pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin med pa sbyor ba'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med par nye bar bzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan
165b7(rgyud): mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad rang bzhin
165b8(rgyud): gyis 'od gsal ba'o// AHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus pa'i khong du chud pa de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'dus pa chen por 'jug
166a1(rgyud): pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dus par 'jug par
166a2(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyis
166a3(rgyud): 'dus par 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / las mnyam pa nyid la zhugs par 'dus pa thams cad du 'jug par 'gyuraro// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
166a4(rgyud): mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs pas sla rar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
166a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas/ pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu skyob
166a6(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu bzung bas de bzhin gshogs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / 
166a7(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa mngon du 'gro ba'i las kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams
166a8(rgyud): cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i nus pa de bzhin gshegs pa slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye
166b1(rgyud): shes snying po zhes bya ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can 'dul ba nyid pas
166b2(rgyud): khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems
166b3(rgyud): can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ haHde nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi
166b4(rgyud): mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pa des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid dang / 
166b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i don nyid dang / chos nyid thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid
166b6(rgyud): dang thams cad kyi bya ba nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bya ba nyid du rig par bya'o// hrI/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang de
166b7(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag
166b8(rgyud): nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi snying po dang / rdo rje'i dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas
167a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad rin po che'i phung po dang / ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas
167a2(rgyud): sems can thams cad las kyi snying pa'o// hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i chos la mi gnas pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang chos
167a3(rgyud): thams cad yongasu mi gnas pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtha' med pa'i phyir/ 
167a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mtha' med pa dang / de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mu med pa dang / 
167a5(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa cig pa nyid kyi phyir chos tham sa cad gcig pa nyid dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad
167a6(rgyud): yongasu mi gnas par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di thos nas nyan par byed 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na de ni dag cing
167a7(rgyud): mthar byed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la nges par gnas nas sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par
167a8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// b+h+yoHde nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba
167b1(rgyud): chen po rdo rje don yod pas dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang tha ma dang / dbus las grol ba pa'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa bya
167b2(rgyud): chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin
167b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub
167b4(rgyud): pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par/ 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rna/ mas kyi bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu
167b5(rgyud): grub pas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gis dbang phyug mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sem sa dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum mtha' dag
167b6(rgyud): gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongasu skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po
167b7(rgyud): mchog tu grub par 'gyur te/ sraM de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnasu ni// mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa// de srid mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da'
167b8(rgyud): byed par nus// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i thabs// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyis 'grub// las ni thams cad rnam dag pas// srid pa dag par 'gyur phyiro// chags sogs rab
168a1(rgyud): ldan 'jig rten ni// kun nas srid par sdig byed pa// de dag rnam par sbyang don du// de rnams 'dod chags chen po 'dzin// ji ltar pad+ma legs dmar ba// dmar po'i skyon gyis ma
168a2(rgyud): gos ltar// bag chags skyon gyis srid pa ru// rtag tu 'gro phan gos mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa// bde ba chen po nor chen po// khams gsum dbang phyug thob na su
168a3(rgyud): de dag don ni brtan par byed/ ha/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid re bzhin du nang par langs te/ gang 'don pa dang / 
168a4(rgyud): nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / brjod par byed na des pa/ de ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyurazhing bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig gi dngos grub/ 
168a5(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'di nyid la thob par 'gyuraro// hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzha na nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga
168a6(rgyud): po 'di dag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste/ 'di lta ste/ oM na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+ra/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dra tsArI d+hi/ oM tsin+d+ra ma Ni oM a ni
168a7(rgyud): d+heHoM dzat+ti b+hi b+ha te/ oM dzA ti pa ri wa ra te/ ma hA rA gA d+harma te/ oM bIR+Ya ka wa tse/ oM sarba gA mi ni/ oM badz+ra Ti TuHka wa tsi te hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga te/ oM swa b+ha bi shud+d+he
168a8(rgyud): oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM kar+m+ma bi sho d+ha ni hUM/ oM ni suM b+ha badz+ri hUM phaT/ oM kar+m+ma rA ge/ oM badz+ra hUM badz+re/ oM sarba d+harma NI/ oM hrIHoM a kA ro mu khe/ oM pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta
168b1(rgyud): hA ya tsU oM aM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gre/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya a gre/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bAka badz+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+re A oM s+pho Ta ya sarba A pa ya big+h+nA ni pra mok+Sha ya saH/ 
168b2(rgyud): a pa ya ga ti b+h+yaHsarba sa ma ya badz+ra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dang bral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngag so// de brjod pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje
168b3(rgyud): 'dzin pa 'am/ de de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rnal du grag par mi 'gyur zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba
168b4(rgyud): ma bskrun pa'i sems can gyis bri ba dang / bklag pa dang / brjod pa dang / rim gro bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yin
168b5(rgyud): no// gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di chung ngu na/ yi ge gcig yang thos nas/ sems can de sangs rgyas
168b6(rgyud): mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par rig par bya na slar yang mtha' dag ma lus par rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang ga'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi
168b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas na des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nus// sa'i khams gang na
168b8(rgyud): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spyod pa de mchod rten du gyur pa ste phyag bya ba'i gnaso// gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yid la bzung ba 'am/ gleg bam du bris par gyur na de bskal pa/ 
169a1(rgyud): bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// de la bdud sdig to can gyis bar du mi gcod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang gzhan yang lha rnams
169a2(rgyud): kyi phyi bzhin rjesu 'brangs te/ de la srung ba dang sgrub pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur zhing tshul ma yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
169a3(rgyud): kyis dgongs par 'gyuraro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu
169a4(rgyud): phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po ngon par rtogs
169a5(rgyud): par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gas/ nga ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rjed byings kyi dbang phyug dam pa 'khor los bsgyur ba chen
169a6(rgyud): po bzhis yongasu bskor ba rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di phyung // mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas ma skyes pa'o// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i phyir chos
169a7(rgyud): thams cad stong pa nyid do// spros pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas rnam par dag pa'o// thams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams
169a8(rgyud): cad chos kyi dbyings yongasu rgyas pa'o// AHb+h+rUM dzAM hI/ hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas sangs rgyas
169b1(rgyud): kyi yul thams cad shin tu gsal bas snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang thabs gcig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
169b2(rgyud): slar yang bsdu bas byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
169b3(rgyud): pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan zhes bya ba bshad par byas nyon cig/ de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig bshad par
169b4(rgyud): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal dpa/ 'jal dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
169b5(rgyud): thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po chen po la rdo rje byin gyis brlabs byos shig/ de nas yang 'jam dpal
169b6(rgyud): gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar zhugs te/ byin gyis brlabs
169b7(rgyud): nas de las 'thon te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas// rje
169b8(rgyud): rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil la
170a1(rgyud): chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// kyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdorje myong po gas chen po// de bzhin gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ 
170a2(rgyud): po dang mtshungs pa// khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang // gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang
170a3(rgyud): bzhin grong // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par mdzad// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// grwa yi ma ni thams cad dang // sgo 'gram dang ni
170a4(rgyud): mtshams rnams// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// nang gi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi phyi rol tu bya ba// da dkyil 'khor yang ni rnam pa bdun// sgo khyud du ni rin chen ni/ 
170a5(rgyud): mchog tu rmad byung bzhag par bya// rdo rje srad bu dag dang ldan/ ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar rgyan// rdo rje ka ba'i mdun pa zhag pa// bum pa la sogs dag gis spras// tshad mdzes
170a6(rgyud): pa yi snying po che// rdo rje 'khor lo sogs pas rgyan// ra ba ra ba chen po ni// ri bo gnyis kyi phyi rol du// sngags pas kun nas yongs bskor ba// khyad par ji bzhin bri bar bya// nang gi dkyil
170a7(rgyud): 'khor dag ni rnam bzhir bya// gru bzhi pa dang zlum po dang // gru gsum rnam pa las byung dang // zla ba phyed pa'i tshul 'dra ba// dkyil 'khor yang ni bzhi pa'o// de yi nang gi cha la ni// pad+ma la/ 
170a8(rgyud): ma brgyad pa bri// de ltar shos rab chen po yi// slob dpon rdo rje 'byung bas bri// de yi rjesu lha rnams kyi// go roms ji bzhin bri bar bya// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang // gaH/ 
170b1(rgyud): brjid dra ba rnam par rgyal// dam tshig mchog gi rnam pa bzhi// slar yang 'dab ma'i mtshams bri// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru// mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa
170b2(rgyud): bzhi/ rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri// mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya// der ni rdo rje sems dpa' sogs// kun mtshogs yi dbang phyug rnams// rdo rje slob
170b3(rgyud): dpon stobs po che// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// rdo rje rin chen sogs gang ba'i// rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor yin// rdo rje chos sogs gsang ba yi// dkyil 'khor tshe/ 
170b4(rgyud): dpag med pa'i 'od// rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// rdo rje shugs kyis so/ dang nas ni// dkyil 'khor gsum pa bri bar bya// rnam
170b5(rgyud): gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khomader ni bri ba yin// rdo rje snying po rgyal po che// khyab pa dag gsang ba'i dbang phyug gtso// 'dod pa'i don kun
170b6(rgyud): grub pa'i phyir// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad blo// byams pa bdag nyid chen po dang // na mkha'i snying po grags chen po// kun tu bzang po nyid dag dang / 
170b7(rgyud): phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// kun nas 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni rigs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med// sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel// de/ 
170b8(rgyud): nang sa yi snying po mchog/ na mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod dam pa// lag na rin chen bla na med// mi phan pa kun 'joms pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya// dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che// dkyil
171a1(rgyud): 'khor 'di dag bri bar bya// 'khor lo dan dor nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste// shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rnams bzhin du dgod // 'khor lo mdzes pa'i/ 
171a2(rgyud): dge legs ris// rdo rje dpal be'u pad ces bya// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje pad+mas rnam par rgyan// lhung bzed dang ni mkhar bsil dang // chos gos kyang ni khyad par du// 'di dag shAkya
171a3(rgyud): seng ge yi// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// de rnams blo ldan brtan par bri// byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin
171a4(rgyud): te// pad+ma ud pa la nyid dang ni// spyi blugs lpags pa'i ga yang gzhi dang // dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis// ma myos pa ru bri bar bya// slar yang lho ru song nas ni// phyag na rdo rje/ 
171a5(rgyud): bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yi// phyag rgya 'bad pas bri bar bya// rdo rje paT+Ti sha dang ni// dril bur/ ba tu mdzes pa dang // dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang // dbyug
171a6(rgyud): pa rdo rjes mtshan pa dang // ljags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang // 'di dag dpa' bo'i phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor nub du song nas ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo gros kyi// gsang ba'i chos ni dam
171a7(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri// ud pal 'khor lo rdo rje dang // ral gri yang ni khyad par du// thod pa dang ni dgra sta dang // rma bya dang ni seng ge nyid// phyag rgya 'di rnams brtson
171a8(rgyud): 'grus che// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i grwa ni legs gnas par// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi yi 'khor lo'i grwa ru no// rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid
171b1(rgyud): chen pa 'byu ba ma// mtshad pa 'di dag kyi bar bya// bya ya dkyil 'khor ga rnams// gzugs du zhes bya sogs// gzugs sa de bzhin nga na// lung bar dun rong du du// ga dang / 
171b2(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings dang ni// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// skye yi nang ni thams cad du// ske spong ba ni dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gzhan par+ya// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// 
171b3(rgyud): go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi// yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// namakha'i spyan zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas ston zhes bya ba dang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma dang // phyag rgya kun dang yang
171b4(rgyud): dag ldan// ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig ma// thams cang shar du dgod par bya// de nas blo gros ldan pa yi// byang gi phyogasu song nas ni// gos dkar las gnas
171b5(rgyud): sgrol ma che// khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma// khyad pa ra du ni dpal bdun dang // mnga' bdun dang ni dbyangs can ma// de la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran mo
171b6(rgyud): yang dag ldan// de bzhin po nya po nya mo// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri// rdo rje shugs kyi song ba ni// lho yi phyogasu rab phyin la// mA ma ki dang lcags sgrog dang // khab rtse rdo rje mtshan
171b7(rgyud): mchog dang // de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogasu song nas ni// der ni phyin nas shes ldan gyis// sgra gcan spobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin 'dam bu mnga' rgyu dang // lha mo
171b8(rgyud): ba'i 'od zer 'dra// lha mo nye ba'i sgra can ma// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang // 'gugs byed po nya lnga dang ldan// grwa yi cher bri bya ba// rdo rje mdung rtse zhes bya
172a1(rgyud): sogs zhe yi nang ni thams cad du// ske snang ba ni rnam par bri// gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che// de bzhin ral pa gcig ma mchog/ rdo rje dregs ma lha mo 'o// rdo rje gats+tsha
172a2(rgyud): yang dag bri// de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni// thams cad las ni mthon nas su// shar gyi cha ni thams cad du// sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis// khro chen gzhan gyis mi thub pa// 
172a3(rgyud): de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang // khams gsum rnam rgyal snying po ni// mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor// de ltar bris nas sngags pa yis// de nas byang gi char song ste// rta
172a4(rgyud): mgrin khro bo chen po dang // skar ma'i spyan ni khyad par du'o// khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// khro bo blo lnga na brtson 'grus che// pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang // 
172a5(rgyud): ma mo stong gis yongs bskor bar// 'jig rten mgon rgya sa bka' stsal to// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lho yi phyogs su song nas ni// der ni phyin te brtson chen
172a6(rgyud): po// khro bo chen po stobs po che// rdo rje mtshan pas legs mtshan pa// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// khro bo zla ba'i thig le dang // de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang // sgra gcan
172a7(rgyud): khro bo stobs po che// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang // rdo rje sa 'og sa 'og dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mog can dang // rkang pas bsnun pa rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes
172a8(rgyud): 'gro dang // bran dang po nya khro bo ni// stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor// de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogs su phyin nas ni// der ni song ste brtson chen po// gshin
172b1(rgyud): rjem par byed ces bya ba// gdong drug pa la lag drug pa// khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bgyi// khro bo'i gtso bo stong phrag ni// bdun dag gis ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad
172b2(rgyud): du// khro bo gtum po thams cad bri// de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas su// rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyal ba nyan
172b3(rgyud): zos bri bar bya// de yi phyi ru tshangs sogs lha// dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri// dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang // gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten
172b4(rgyud): skyong // rgyal chen rigs ni bzhi po dang // de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum dang // mtha' bral rnams dang dga' ldan dang // 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang // tshangs// 
172b5(rgyud): pa mdun na 'don pa rnams// tshangs chen rnams dang / 'od/ chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od// gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge
172b6(rgyud): rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin meng rnams dang / bsod nams skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nem
172b7(rgyud): snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag pa'i gnas rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtsham su dgod par bya'o// de nas dbang ldan du
172b8(rgyud): dbang ldan dang / dbang por dbang po dang / mar me'i lha dang / gshin rjer gshin rje dang / bden bral du bden bral dang / chur chu lha dang / rlung du rlung lha dang / lus ngan du lus
173a1(rgyud): ngan rnams dang / phyi rol gyi shar phyogasu khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya// lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed kyi spyar gyi phyag rgya chen po na/ 
173a2(rgyud): par bya'o// nub du khro ba'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshod kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// byang du rnamagrin gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod par bya'o// phyi rol du rab dag gi nang du
173a3(rgyud): mtsha chen po bdun dgod par bya'o// de'i phyi rol du 'gro ba lnga po bzhag par bya'o// de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa/ skye bzhi pa dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang me tog gi chun po dang / gdugs pa
173a4(rgyud): rgyal mtshan dang ba dan slong ba/ dra ba dang / dra ba byed pas daklubs pa/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du dbus su ri'i rgyal po lhun po'i
173a5(rgyud): tshad du dpag tshad brgya stong phrag du mar rgyas pa de'i steng du rdza rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam par bsams nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad
173a6(rgyud): kyis cho gas mchod la mnyes par byas te/ mchod pa dang dbang bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pas spro ba dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa byas pas na mkha'i gnasu de bzhin
173a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par bsams nas sprin drangs te bcug la bcings nas dam tshig la rnam par bzhag ste/ de bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs
173a8(rgyud): pa thams pa dang rdo rje sems dpa'i sku mdog nyid rnam par snang mdzad yin no snyam du sems pa sgom par bya'o// de nas steng rje dang byams pa'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi/ 
173b1(rgyud): khams mtha' las 'das pa thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho sprin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rim pa mchog gis rdo rje sems
173b2(rgyud): dpa' hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i sgra brjod cing bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag byas la bzlas pa byas te/ dam
173b3(rgyud): tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas bcug ste bcings la dmachog la bzhag pa byas nas se gol gyi sbyor ba dang kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag
173b4(rgyud): rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying po 'di bzhis rol pa dang / bcas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang ba de dag mtshungs so snyam du bsam par bya'o// de la de'i snying po
173b5(rgyud): bzhi po ni/ a A/ aM aH/ bdag byin gyis brlabs pa/ la sogs pa byas nas brjod la/ de bzhin gshe// gas pa thams cad dang / bdag mtshungs pa yin no zhes
173b6(rgyud): nga rgyal bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas snying po 'dis sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ 
173b7(rgyud): b+huM traM hrIHhUM/ badz+ra sa mA dzaHA gats+tsha a gats+tshan+tu sarba ta thA ga ta sarba bo d+hi satwa pa ri br-i ti pra t+ye ka ri ha te swA hA// oM badz+ra sa mA dzaHA gats+tsha a gats+tsha sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra yo gi shwa ra satwa na yeHsahA
173b8(rgyud): a haHa haHde nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa
174a1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyung dang / gzungs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas byon par 'gyu'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag/ 
174a2(rgyud): nyid rnam par bsgoms nas ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa gton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan par byas nas sgo bzhi po rnams kyis rdo rje lcags
174a3(rgyud): kyu la sogs pa las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhugs par byas te/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badz+ra badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHa
174a4(rgyud): d+hi tiSh+Than+tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA maN+Da laM/ de nas gsang dba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchodadenas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba
174a5(rgyud): gdab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol ba 'debs lag sa kyis mchod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
174a6(rgyud): cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams cad srul du gsol/ ji ltar bdag gis de bzhin
174a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste/ byin gyis brlab pa
174a8(rgyud): bgyi'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' yongasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyan chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga rgyas
174b1(rgyud): par 'gyur ba ni de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sngags 'dis phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas sngags 'dis snyan gsan dbab par bya ste/ 
174b2(rgyud): sam sa ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya badz+ra a d+hiSh+ThA na maM ku ru mA/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ sa ma ye Shu me a d+hi tiSh+ThAn+tu sarba bud+d+ha mAM pra be sha yan+tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+rA maN+Da la a laM kA ro maH
174b3(rgyud): badz+ra maN+Da le pra ti ba la yan+d+ra ma stu dzam pra yats+tshan+tu/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal mor me tog dkar po'i phreng ba sngags 'dis btags nas nang du me tog bzhi dang / ser mo'i rtsemo
174b4(rgyud): me tog re re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug/ das par bya'o// hU~Mdz+dza hri/ kr-i shu dz+ra ba ka pro khri dz+dza haM/ aM a d+hi toSh+Tha me/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa mA ya satwa pra
174b5(rgyud): shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcis/ la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i gling khyer chos kyi dbyings na mkha'i khams
174b6(rgyud): rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o// sngags ni/ sa ma yo haM/ sa ma ya sto sa ma ya hUM/ gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid de'i lhar/ 
174b7(rgyud): byin par bya'o// de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o// sa ma yo haM sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya hUM/ na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya ta Ta ta Ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badz+ra hUM/ bi kr-i ta/ 
174b8(rgyud): bid+yA dz+dzang+ga bu dran da ma ka/ ha si ta la mr-i da ra/ ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+tsa muny+tsa/ aT+TaT+TA ha sa dar bi da ra/ badz+ra badz+ra/ badz+red ga ta/ badz+ra netra/ badz+ra shro tra/ badz+ra g+ha Na/ 
175a1(rgyud): daT+Ta kiny+tsi rA yA si pra bi sha badz+ra pA Ni hr-id ya mA bi ma bi sha g+hur+Na g+har+N+Na/ pAr+N+Na pUr+Na/ g+huR+ShA pa ya g+hAR+ShA pa ya/ b+hU ma ya b+hU ma ya/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ a be sha ya/ dza lpa dzal+la/ 
175a2(rgyud): dzalpA ya dza lA ya/ la g+hu la g+hu/ sarba ta thA ga ta dzA ka ra pra ba ra/ d+har+m+ma la b+ha/ bi dza ya he he badz+ra dzi kA ra hA kr-i te swA hA/ dbab pa'i dam tshig go/ de ltar babs nas kye khyod kyis gang dge/ 
175a3(rgyud): ba'am mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes 'dri'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong ngo zhes smra bar 'gyuraro// 
175a4(rgyud): de nas slob dpon gyis de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa/ thams cad kyis rdo rje'i rang bzhin du yongasu bzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil/ 
175a5(rgyud): 'khor grwa bzhi pa byas la de'i dbus su kha dog thams ca/ da kyis pad+ma chen po mdab ma brgyad pa yid du 'ong / ba 'am seng ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la
175a6(rgyud): dar gyi bgo ba dang / me tog dang / bdug pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod la khyad par du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang reg dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang // 
175a7(rgyud): ba dan dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dang / gar dang / klu rnams kyis legs par mchod nas cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
175a8(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la rab tu bzhag pa rigs dang rjesu 'thun pa'i ming du byas nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+reSh+Ta
175b1(rgyud): khas b+hi Shiny+tsa oM badz+ra satwa a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra rat+na a bi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgrin pa dang / snying kha dang / 
175b2(rgyud): ba dang / rkeng pa nas rje ngar gyi bar du/ yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la/ rang gi lha'i gzugs kyis sbyor bas byin gyis brlab par bya'o// de nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams bslab par byas te/ de la rdo/ 
175b3(rgyud): rje'i gnas tshigs rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs po thams cad nges par
175b4(rgyud): 'joms par 'gyuraro// ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas kyi rig pa la/ 'jug pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa/ de'i dngos po yongasu shes pa la 'jug par 'gyuraro// hUM/ 
175b5(rgyud): mngon par 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba thams cad du gyur pa'i sems nges par rig par 'gyuraro// oM 'dod chags
175b6(rgyud): kyi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar rdo rje'i gnas 'dod chags pa dang bral bar 'gyuraro// ha zhe sdang gis mtha' zhi ba'i phyir byams pa'i mtha'i rdo rje'i gnas
175b7(rgyud): te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis skyon thams cad kun tu 'dral bar 'gyu ro// mai gti mug gi mtha' zhi ba'i phyir shes rab kyi sgron ma rdo rje'i mtha' ste/ rdo rje'i mtha' 'dis mun pa bsal
175b8(rgyud): bar byed par 'gyuraro// ra sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang sems can gyi rang bzhin
176a1(rgyud): rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// hrIH/ sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems can nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin
176a2(rgyud): gyis 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// aHsangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su
176a3(rgyud): 'jug pa'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rje su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// oM/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjesu
176a4(rgyud): rtogs par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin rjesu rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur// aMHbdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis
176a5(rgyud): las thams cad rjesu rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / la sa thams cad las yongasu 'das pa'i don du 'gyuraro// hUM/ ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung
176a6(rgyud): te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sgra ji bzhin pa thams cad rjesu rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rje su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// ba chos thams cad ma
176a7(rgyud): skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'chi 'phro med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyuraro// me chos thams
176a8(rgyud): cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis 'gog pa med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyuraro// khar 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa/ bdag
176b1(rgyud): gi de nyid rab rtogs te// bdag gis de nyid rab brtags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang // phun sum tshogs pa thams/ 
176b2(rgyud): cad dang // gter thams cad dang // 'khor lo thams cad dang // rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri dang / yid bzhin nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud len rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / 
176b3(rgyud): rkang 'og dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin nyid dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / byang chub
176b4(rgyud): sems dpa'i sa rnams des myur du 'grub par 'gyur// yid ni rtse gcig gyur pa yin// sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms nas ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
176b5(rgyud): par// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par bya// sbyor ba de yi bka' drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs ma/ nyam med 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
176b6(rgyud): par / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i// kun tu bzang po phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// lo ni phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// kun tu bzang po 'dra
176b7(rgyud): bar 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag par sgom// rgyal po'i dbang bskur nyid dam ni// yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// 
176b8(rgyud): de nas rang gis brtan por sgom// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang // thob na dngos grub gzhan ci smos// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya gang // de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i sbyar bas
177a1(rgyud): de bsgoms pas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur// de lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom pa phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes nyid yin no// 'khor lo sgyur
177a2(rgyud): ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyis// dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi brjid dra ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du
177a3(rgyud): bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i rgyal po thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gtsug tor ye
177a4(rgyud): shes thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// de ni yang dang yang du sgom// chos kyi rgyal po rnam rgyal nyid// mdor bsdus
177a5(rgyud): pa ni thob par 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yi// / dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya// legs par// rab gnas 'od zer can// dngos grub ye shes thob
177a6(rgyud): par 'gyur// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyangs mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog
177a7(rgyud): de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// rang byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rnal
177a8(rgyud): 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs rgyas ye shes dri ma med// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi dam tshig
177b1(rgyud): shes kyi phyag rgya rnam so// da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam par spyod pa'i phyir chos thams
177b2(rgyud): cad kyi sgor shes par bya'o// a zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad par bya'o// oM A a~M a a pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad
177b3(rgyud): kyi skye ste don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par blta bar bya'o// oM pa na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang / gzugs dang / 
177b4(rgyud): shes rab dang chos dang bcas pa yongasu shes pa'i dbang du 'gyur ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor ba// shad do// oM nr-i/ da zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang / zhi ba'i
177b5(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa yong su rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod do// oM dr-iHsa zhes bya ba ni thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing
177b6(rgyud): yongasu nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la sogs pa don dam pa'i
177b7(rgyud): bden pa la gnas te mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhago// oM sru/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyis rjesu 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa'i phyir
177b8(rgyud): chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par lta'o// oM taM/ ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par bgrod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o// oM kaM/ ma
178a1(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu nyid dran pa med cing snying rje che bu dang shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad do// oM maM/ ga zhes bya
178a2(rgyud): ba ni zab mo la spyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ga/ dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang / rga ba dang 'chi ba las yongasu rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir/ chos
178a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dza d+ha zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyingasu mi phyed pa'i rdo rje yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+ha/ sha
178a4(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong yongasu rdzogs pa'i/ phyir chos thams cad kyi sbyor blta bar bya'o// oM shaM/ Sha zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang chos kyi bdag
178a5(rgyud): med pa na mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang ba zhon gyi 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cadasgor rnam par gzhag/ oM Sha kA zhes bya ba ni g.yo ba
178a6(rgyud): med pas mi bzad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM k+ShaM/ nga zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi'ang yul ma yin
178a7(rgyud): ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dza tha zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la mkhos pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad
178a8(rgyud): kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM thaM D+ha zhes bya ba ni sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas/ zad pa'i ye shes mi skye zhing mthar thug pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad
178b1(rgyud): kyi sgor bshad do// oM D+hi dzA zhes bya ba ni myur du 'chi ba med pa rjesu dmigs pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+nyeHka zhes bya ba ni lus rnam par
178b2(rgyud): spyod pa ni 'dod chags dang bral bas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kaM A zhes
178b3(rgyud): bya ba ni sems rnam par spyod pa ni nyes pa dang rmongs pa dang / bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams/ 
178b4(rgyud): cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM AM zhes bya ba ni ngag rnam par spyod pa ni ngag gis spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor
178b5(rgyud): blta bar bya'o// oM baM tsha zhes bya ba ni grib ma ma da migs shing rang bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir tshe/ sa thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM che/ g+ha
178b6(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres po ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyis su med par gyur pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM g+ha Ta zhes bya ba
178b7(rgyud): ni ca tso dang bral ba'i rdo rje snying po 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM TaM/ pha zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu ba gangos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang
178b8(rgyud): ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM pheM Da zhes bya ba ni dgra chen po las grol ba'i na mkha' las 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob
179a1(rgyud): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// ma la Sha zhes bya ba ni tshe sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM kha u
179a2(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag go/ oM AMHya zhes bya ba ni rgyun tu byed pa ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du
179a3(rgyud): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la nye bar gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM yo ta zhes bya ba ni de kho na nyid ni spros pa thams cad rnam
179a4(rgyud): par spangs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag/ oM taM/ hu zhes bya ba ni ma skyes pa chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos
179a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM hUM hrI zhes bya ba/ ni yongasu bzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod pa spangs pa'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir/ chos thams
179a6(rgyud): cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM hriHkun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ka kha ga g+hA
179a7(rgyud): rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i mtshan nyid bzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gnas// oM tsa tshwa dza dz+ha nya/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi
179a8(rgyud): slo'o// oM Ta ta DA DA Na/ sgom chos thams cad gnyisu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM ti thad d+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres
179b1(rgyud): pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag/ oM pa pha ba b+h+ra ma/ byang chub ni chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ya ra
179b2(rgyud): la wa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i ni blo bur pa thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen pas/ 
179b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyis yongasu thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM sha ShA sa ha/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
179b4(rgyud): shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgro rnam par nges pa'o// de nas rig pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas
179b5(rgyud): par gyur pa ni/ sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni/ phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas// ri ra chen po gru bzhi pa// rin chen kun gyis rnam par rgyan// 
179b6(rgyud): de yi steng du rdo rje che// de yi steng du pad+ma bzhag/ 'dab ma brgyad pa cher bkra ba// rnal 'byor ston zhes rnam par bshad// sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che// 'od zer gsal
179b7(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor can// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// yongasu rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis// rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas
179b8(rgyud): kun dang mtshungs// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni// bskal mthar yang ni de gnas 'gyur// b+ha go chen po rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzang ba
180a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// sems can kun la thams cad du// ga
180a2(rgyud): tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms nas// de tshe dngos grub lag na gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos// gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa// gang tshe ye shes mthong ba ni// de yi
180a3(rgyud): tshe na dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa// sna tshogs las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang tshe rnal 'byor pa bsgoms na// sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur// de
180a4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po yaM shes so// 'khor lo sgyur ba rgyal po che// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug ni// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgoms
180a5(rgyud): nas ni// mnyam med 'khor lo bsgyur ba mtshungs// ga brjid phreng ba phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam bar bzhag pa sgom// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrugs
180a6(rgyud): shing mdzes// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas no// rang bzhin gzi brjid phreng bar 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag rgya
180a7(rgyud): chen po bsgoms na ni// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis// sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal ba'i gtsug tor rgya// ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis
180a8(rgyud): 'khrugs/ zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba yis// mnyam med gsal ba'i gtsug tor mtshungs// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag/ 
180b1(rgyud): pas sgomargyal ba'i gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// kun tu bzang po dam
180b2(rgyud): pa'i gzugs// mnyam med rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od // 
180b3(rgyud): gtsug ter lnga ldan stobs po che// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// de yi don du bsgoms nas ni// 'gro ba thams cad
180b4(rgyud): 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje cha gas pa'i phyag rgya che// leg par mnyam par gzhag pa sa skom// skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na// bud med
180b5(rgyud): gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legs so ba ni rab gsol bas// bud med thams cad tshim par
180b6(rgyud): byed 'byang chub sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dpral ba'i phyogs su gnas pa sgom// de yi dar zong
180b7(rgyud): dbang bskur thob// rdo rje gzi brjid phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying khar gnas pa bsgom par bya// kun mkhyen ye shes ster bar byed// rin
180b8(rgyud): chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub pa dam pas rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhed pas phyag rgyache/ 
181a1(rgyud): legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rdo rje bzhad pa ltar gyur te// de ni skye dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes so// pad+ma yin
181a2(rgyud): pad+ma che/ dag pa'i chos ni mnyam gzhag pas// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// shes rab ye shes rdo rje rno// bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang // 
181a3(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa// stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// dam pa'i don du bsgom bya ste// mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mtshungs// rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che// legs
181a4(rgyud): par mnyam par gzhog bsgoms nas// chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog rtse// mdor bsdus nas ni de yi bskorado// rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms
181a5(rgyud): nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yi// ldem po'i ngag ni dri yis 'chad// chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms na ni/ 
181a6(rgyud): kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba byams pa che// rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje srung ba dang
181a7(rgyud): mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che// khro ba chen po stabs po che// dam pa'i don gyi bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya che/ 
181a8(rgyud): lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// sgeg mos mngon par dga' ba ster// phreng ba
181b1(rgyud): yang ni dbang bsgyur ba// glu mas mdzes pa'i sgra dbyangs byed// gar mas rdzu 'phrul thob par 'gyur// dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te// me tog byang chub yan lag nyid// sgron mas mtha' das
181b2(rgyud): gsal ba'o// bdug pa bdug pa dag la brtson// lcags kyus dbang phyug 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang po'ang 'ching 'gyur na// 
181b3(rgyud): gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos// lcags sgrogs gis ni 'phrog byed dang // tshangs sogs dbang phyug chen po'ang 'ching // 'bebs pas thams cad 'bebs 'gyur na// 
181b4(rgyud): dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi ni sbyor ba yi das// chos kyi yi ge dang ldan pa'i// phyag rgya'i ye shes dang bcas pas// de dag thams cad myur du 'grub// 
181b5(rgyud): 'di yi sbyor ba shes par bya'o// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par bya// spyi gtsug nas ni rkang pa'i bar// mi ge yis ni yongs gang bar// gzugs brnyan gcig
181b6(rgyud): gis go 'phang gyur// sems ni rtsi gcig 'gyur bar bsam// sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni// dbang chen gyis ni gnas zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas// 
181b7(rgyud): dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya// dbang chen dag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen dag gi las su bshad// chu ni zlum par shes par bya// bar ma'i 'dab mas rnam par mtshan
181b8(rgyud): zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan// zhi ba'i don du de bshad de// me ni gru gsum shes par bya// gzhi mdo yi ni gnas bshad// dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+ma rA ga 'dra
182a1(rgyud): ba'i 'od mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyibs// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// sre
182a2(rgyud): dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar// nag po yang ni khyad par du// dang po'i dkyil 'khor nas sbyangs te// tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang po rdo rje rab tu bzhag/ de yi rjesu rin chen te/ 
182a3(rgyud): pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad// phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye shes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
182a4(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang ga nyi suM med pas yongasu dag pas chos thams cad dernam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas btab pa'o// rtag
182a5(rgyud): pa dang chad pas yongasu dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang mtha' med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// zad pa'i sgo dang zod pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i
182a6(rgyud): mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams
182a7(rgyud): cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mig lnga las yang dag por 'das pas chos thams cad na mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sems can
182a8(rgyud): thams cad na mkha'i khams thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyir chos thams cad na mkha'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings yongs su
182b1(rgyud): khyab pas chos thams cad dbyer mi byed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag
182b2(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo nyid med pas chos thams
182b3(rgyud): cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab po'o// 'tshe ba med pa'i chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams cad mi
182b4(rgyud): rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang / rga ba dang / 'chi ba'i mtha' dang ldan pas chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 
182b5(rgyud): sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi mi'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas bta pa'o// gdod ma nas yongasu dag pas chos thams
182b6(rgyud): cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 
182b7(rgyud): spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas chos thams cad mtshon ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// re ba thams cad las rnam par grol bas chos thams cad smon
182b8(rgyud): pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// phung po lnga yongs
183a1(rgyud): 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o// rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i/ 
183a2(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// don dam pa'i bden pas yongasu khyab pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad
183a3(rgyud): bden pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tshe ba rnam por mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// shin tu gdon mi za bar gnas pa'i phyir/ 
183a4(rgyud): chos thams cad 'khrug pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas bla tab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bas/ dad pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyis phyag
