183a5(rgyud): rgyas rgyas pa'o// mi rnams kyi gzhi gzhi med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab po// byed pa pos byas pa'i
183a6(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma byung ba'i phyir// chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang
183a7(rgyud): bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas pa'o// 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas
183a8(rgyud): rgyas pa'o// rnam par spyod pa kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam par lta ba
183b1(rgyud): med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gnas yongasu bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa
183b2(rgyud): mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mngon par 'du byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos
183b3(rgyud): thams cad las kyi rnam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas
183b4(rgyud): rgyas btab pa'o// nam mkha' dang khyad par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas pa detab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams
183b5(rgyud): cad gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag
183b6(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa
183b7(rgyud): nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden
183b8(rgyud): ba bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// lha'i rjesu byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dog pa'i phyir/ 
184a1(rgyud): chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams
184a2(rgyud): cad dam tshig thams cad rjesu sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad
184a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gas
184a4(rgyud): sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyag rgya'i phyag/ rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag/ rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas
184a5(rgyud): rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas bta pa dang / ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas pa tab pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag
184a6(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
184a7(rgyud): phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
184a8(rgyud): pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya'o// muH'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi chog/ de bzhin gshegs
184b1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yong su rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kyi phyag
184b2(rgyud): rgya'i tshig rnams la 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i bcom ldan 'das rnams dang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang byang chub kyang byung ba yin no// a aM a
184b3(rgyud): AMHsngags pas phyag rgya 'di rgyas btab na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o// hUM myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par 'gyur/ 
184b4(rgyud): khaM de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po'i phyag rgya'i ye shes su gyur pa'i/ snying gi dbus su rtag tu sgom// zla
184b5(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// pad+ma'i phreng ba 'a// khrigs pa'i 'od// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// / 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'ang// de yi steng du
184b6(rgyud): rtag sgom pa// yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// kha ba ba mo'i 'od 'dra 'od// dpa' bo kun da zla ltor dkar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i
184b7(rgyud): chos kyi rang bzhin sku// kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa gnas kyi gsang // ra sa ya na dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig mkha' 'drar shes par bya// thig
184b8(rgyud): le nangs rnam par spras// gsang ba chen po mchog tu mdzes// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du rdo rje che// rtse mo lnga dang yang dag ldan// de yi steng du sgron ma che// 'bar ba'i
185a1(rgyud): phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi steng du rtag bsams pa// yi ge mchog gi go 'ang ngo // man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// gzhan du na ni nga mi smra// sangs rgyas
185a2(rgyud): mkhas pa thams cad kyi// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di gsungs so// rnam par grol ba gsum thob pas// thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min// lce ni rkan las sbyar bas bya// sna yi rtse mor yi
185a3(rgyud): ge hUM// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go 'phang tshig gis ni// shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgom// snang ba med cing spros med pa// shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya// 
185a4(rgyud): khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam bya bsam gtan gcig bya ste// mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhin du// kun tu 'bar ba dang ldan pa// mgrin pa 'bad pas
185a5(rgyud): bcu ma nas ni// dkar po ser po sngon po 'od// dmar po yang ni thams cad du// 'bar ba 'di dag 'bad pa yis/ sgrub po dam pas mtshon par bya// snying khar gsal bar
185a6(rgyud): byas nas su// de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song // gnas de la ni 'thon nas kyang // dbang po thams cad dga' bar 'gyur// de la 'thon nas 'jig rten ni// mtshungs par kun nas thams
185a7(rgyud): cad du// slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni// de ni 'jug pa rab tu bsam// yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni// rang nyid 'khor lo sgyur lta bu// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// legs
185a8(rgyud): par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang // mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// ji snyed bud med yon tan dang // ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni// bkug
185b1(rgyud): nas bcug ste bcings nas su// dbang du bya skye bsgrub par bya// de rnams lhan cig yongs bsten nas// sngags pa mchog gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na// shes rab
185b2(rgyud): pha rol phyin pa che// zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa ni// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa sgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub che// de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mchog ni rtag par shes par
185b3(rgyud): bya ba bar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste// stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed// 
185b4(rgyud): sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis// pha rol phyin pa thams cadathob// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// rdo rje sa dmas dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// de nyid 'di ni bcud kyis
185b5(rgyud): lenapa gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ theg chen ma chog tu yid 'ong ba// stong nyid sgom pa'i bdag nyid can// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang
185b6(rgyud): gis rtag tu sgom byed na// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yon tan mchog las skyes par 'gyur// bud med gang zhig sngo bsangs ma// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// lus ngag
185b7(rgyud): yid kyi sbyor ba yis// yongs reg A ling gtsum pas// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med kha dog ljang ku gang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par rgyan// de tshe de ni sngags
185b8(rgyud): pas bsten// mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs// bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i 'dab ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang lhan cig sngags pas bsdad// dam pa'i dngos grub
186a1(rgyud): thob par 'gyuraro// bud med gang zhig kha dog dmar// ut+pal yi rgyan 'chang ma// sngags pas de dang lhan cig gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs 'gyur// bud
186a2(rgyud): med in dra nI la mtshungs// gsang ba rdo rje rnal 'byor gyis// sngags pa cho ga shes pas bsten// rig 'dzin rnams kyi stobs chen 'gyur// gsang chen mar ka ta mtshungs// gang gis
186a3(rgyud): rtag tu bsten pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med pad+ma rA ga 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms
186a4(rgyud): 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bu sgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyisu med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang gis rtag tu sgom pa ni// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun
186a5(rgyud): dang mtshungs// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// mchog gi gnas kyis bsgoms pa ni// rnal 'byor mchog gi mi ring bar// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyur// yang dag spong
186a6(rgyud): ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgo// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms/ 'jug pas// mnyam med 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshungs// so sor yang dag rig pa bzhi// 
186a7(rgyud): shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// zhen med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom
186a8(rgyud): par bya dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// 
186b1(rgyud): rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni gnas bzhi po// tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni// rdo rje sbyor bar bdag bsgoms na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub// sbyor ba'i
186b2(rgyud): bdag nyid dbang po lnga// dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga// shin tu mnyam
186b3(rgyud): gzhazhug bsgoms na ni// 'khor lo sbyar ba brtson 'grus che// stabs 'dzin lta bu nyid du 'gyur// byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// gsang sngags bsgoms pas skom na ni// rtog pa'i
186b4(rgyud): ye shes sbyar ba yis// khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi lam/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa// de ni bsgoms patsam
186b5(rgyud): gyis ni// 'jig rten shes las rab tu 'da'// rjesu dran ba rnam pa drug/ bdag nyid rtse gcig gis bsgoms na// sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru// sngags pa dug mi
186b6(rgyud): ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgoms// sgom pa'i rnam 'byor de nyid kyis// bsod nams ye shes yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol
186b7(rgyud): phyin bcu yongs su rdzogs// stobs rnams dang ni dbang rnams dang // sa rnams kun ni nges bskyed nas// myur du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// bud med nu ma shin tu bsnun// rjes
186b8(rgyud): ngar rjes ngar de bzhin du// mchu yis mchu ni yongasu bzung // 'bad pas dam du A ling ga/ rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su// byang chub sems ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje ye shes
187a1(rgyud): brtson 'grus che// rdo rje dbyingasu bdag bstan pas// rnam pa sna tshogs ka ngan// rnal 'byor shis pa de bsten bya// sngar bzhin thams cad byas nas su// bud med rnams
187a2(rgyud): kyi dam tshig sgrub// rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi nyer nas bsnun// ling ga myur du gang bar 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis// stobs chen sangs
187a3(rgyud): rgyas rab tu grub// gsang ba 'di ni dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gsang ba 'di yi sbyar ba yis// yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chos su
187a4(rgyud): grags pa gang yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni// dngos/ grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa// ma 'dres pa yi tshe/ des bco brgyad// sangs rgyas chos grags pa ste// de rnams
187a5(rgyud): sgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni// gzugs me da pa yi rtag par yang // 'gog pa'i snyoms par
187a6(rgyud): 'jug ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chub phyogs ni sum bcu bdun// chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba// de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i slob
187a7(rgyud): pa'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing // sbyor ba thams cad thams cad du'o// de nas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'jig rten
187a8(rgyud): 'das pa'i lam// ye shes rin chen rab rnyed dka'// mchod dang dbang bskur byin rlabs pas// rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// zhu zhing gsol ba btab pa dang // bdag nyid dbul
187b1(rgyud): de bzhin no// sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang bzhin// de bzhin yongasu bsngo ba dang // byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad par du ni dus kun du'o// thog ma bar dang phyi ma reng du// ji lta bzhin
187b2(rgyud): du rjes bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ 'di la the tshom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyis spo ba ni// brtan pa'i snying po legs par bshad// snying nyid de bzhin nyid
187b3(rgyud): las byung // rdo rje sems dpar de bshed do// 'gro ba thams cad bkug nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod ye shes dag pa ste// rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces bshad// 
187b4(rgyud): rje chags pas chags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur// 'gro ba ma lus lus med pa// de yi sems ni chag par bshad// chos rnams kun ni rang bzhin gyis// 
187b5(rgyud): rnam par dben zhing gnyis su med// gang tshe dag pa'i bdaganyid mthong // de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad// rdo rje/ sems dpa' bzhi po yis// ming dang brda ni sbyar ba'o// 
187b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso// 
187b7(rgyud): rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te// rnyog pa med cing yi ge med// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// nam mkha'
187b8(rgyud): mdzod ni mdzod chen po// chos rnams thams cad legs gnas pa// yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che// rdo rje tog ni bla na med// ye shes snang ba rin chen che// yongasu skye ba yongasu blta// 
188a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes su bshad// chos kyi bdag med las byung ba// gnyis med pa'i ye shes mchog/ chos nyid dam pa bas
188a2(rgyud): dri med rdo rje chos zhes rab tu grags// rdo rje blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes dri med mchog/ zag med shes rab chen po pa// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas rnams kyi
188a3(rgyud): 'khor lo// gnyis su med las byung bar mtshan// yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming // rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad// dgongs pa'i skad ni smras pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyis ni
188a4(rgyud): bshad pa de// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzlas pa che// de ni rdo rjesapar bshad// sems can kun gyi don la sbyar/ de sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gdod nas dag pa'i
188a5(rgyud): rnal 'byor che// den rdo rje las su bshad // bla na med pa'i bya/ sa pa che// bsrung ba'i bya ba gang ma med// dag ba'i chos ni btsun chen po// rdo rje srung ba zhes su grags
188a6(rgyud): shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// nyon mongs thams cad za ba che// de ni gnod sbyin chen por brjod// lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing
188a7(rgyud): yi ge bral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad// rdo rje ye shes rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che// thog ma tham med zhi ba// rig pa mchog
188a8(rgyud): ces bya bar bshad// de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par mchod nas grur brangs
188b1(rgyud): pa.oM sarba bud+d+ha pa ra me shwa ra bud+d+ha shud+d+ha/ la li ho su b+ha ga sur ta ma hA ma hA a d+hi ma hA bud+d+ha bud+d+ha/ yo gI shwa ra ta thA tA b+hA bi tA ta ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs
188b2(rgyud): pa/ sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tshal lo// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos// gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' skyob pa po// rdo rje can kun la phyag 'tshal// de
188b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa rnams kyi stobs po che// hUM gi yi
188b4(rgyud): ge ma lus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang // shin tu dngasu mya ngan 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon pa bzang po// rdo rje ye shes dri ma med// rnam par dag ba
188b5(rgyud): mchog dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed// rnal 'byoradabang phyug rnams kyi mchog/ dus gsum bsam pa dbang gyur pa// sems can rnams pa pan don du// khyab pa
188b6(rgyud): khyod la phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje snying po rgyan las dkyil 'khor chen po yong su rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus
188b7(rgyud): par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje'i snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i
188b8(rgyud): don du zhu ba zhus pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste/ rdo rje snying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgrib pa'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi'o// 
189a1(rgyud): babs panas na rnam ma //  khyud rdzog zugs 'arnyan dang // b+hag tu dang ni rab tu mdzes// da la l+ya de yid ma ma// la la gnyi na
189a2(rgyud): gnas kyims brgyad pa dang bcu drug cibs// rnam par dbye ba legs par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang ga ni// lta ba'i gnas su legs brtag pa// parda chen po 'angs
189a3(rgyud): brgyad pa// ge sar bltams pas rab tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus sa ni// khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug ce// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can rnam la
189a4(rgyud): brtse bas// de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni// de bzhin gsheg/ das pa brgyad rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can// gtsug tor dkar po nub tu ste// gzi brjid
189a5(rgyud): phung po lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par gsal bar bri// mer ni steng du dgod/ par bya// steng 'gro chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal ba
189a6(rgyud): chen po gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa yi// rnal 'byor ldan pa 'di dag bri// mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub du 'od dpag med
189a7(rgyud): par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub pa'i ming // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la sten pa'o// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla ba'i/ 
189a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor rnams// 'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o// phreng ba rnam par dgod bya 'o// rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas
189b1(rgyud): dgod par bya// rdo rje gdug pa la sogs bri// de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje ljags kyu la sogs pa// sgo srung 'bad pas bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// kun tu
189b2(rgyud): bzang sogs rims bzhin bri// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang // pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang // khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin po nya pho nya ma// rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor
189b3(rgyud): ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi rol rdo yi ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas bri// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba rgyal po bri// tshangs pa
189b4(rgyud): khyab 'jug dbang chen ming // dbang po la sogs lha tha/ mas cad// ma mo kun dang sring mo rnams// rgyal chen rnams dang klu dang bcas// de bzhin lha rnams thams cad
189b5(rgyud): dang / brtson 'grus chen po na mkha' lding // 'bad pa yi sa ni bri bar bya// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas su// khyad par du ni mchod par bya// me tog bdug spos rol
189b6(rgyud): mo dang // de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs// phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis// mchod pa kun
189b7(rgyud): gyis thams cad nas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad zhug/ yongasu dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni
189b8(rgyud): bskyed nas su// byang chub bslab pa rjes spyod pa// cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur
190a1(rgyud): ba ni de nas sbyin// seng ge'i khri yi steng du ni// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen che// bla bre rgya che 'bar ba dang // de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni// 
190a2(rgyud): mkhas pa yis ni bzhag par bya// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs ras las yang dag sprul// g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas// 'bad pa yis ni bzhag par bya// rin chen
190a3(rgyud): sman kun gyis gang ba'i// bum pa legs par bzhag byas te// rdo rje chu sogs dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gi dbang bskur bya// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni slar
190a4(rgyud): yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa ni// sna tshogs las kyi dbang
190a5(rgyud): bskur sbyin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi sgron ma'i sbyin// de ltar slob ma dbang bskur ba// khyad par
190a6(rgyud): du ni dbang bskur ba// khyad par du ni sngags pas byas// de la dam tshig cho ga yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyin par bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya zhing // sgrub po kun la smad mi bya// 
190a7(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rigs pa thams cad la// smad par mi bya blang mi bya// de la mngon par dag
190a8(rgyud): ba spangs// sdig pa thams cad rnam spang zhing // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang ston mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'dod pas bcom ldan sems dpa'
190b1(rgyud): ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad chags las 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs// 
190b2(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam chom rkun dang // dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam tshig shes nas su// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshe mi bya// khyod kyis
190b3(rgyud): ser sna mi bya ste// phra dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya// byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde// chang gi btung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spangs// thams cad
190b4(rgyud): mkhyen pa yongs mi dor// rtag tu srog chags bsad mi dbya// sems can rnams la snying rje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par sgom// sems can rnams la phan pa ni// 
190b5(rgyud): yang dang yang du yongasu bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// dam tshig 'di nyid 'di dag ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de
190b6(rgyud): nas phyag rgya rjes bcings pa// go rims bzhin du bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul bzhin du// thal mo
190b7(rgyud): legs par bsdams par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// pad+ma'i thal mo zhes su bsgrags// sems dpa' mchog ni legs brkyang ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod// re re'i
190b8(rgyud): mtshams su nges bcings pa// de ni rdo rje thal mor brtags// sor mo thams cad nges bsdams pa// rdo rje bsdams pas legs bcings pa// sor mo brkyang ste steng du bstan// sangs rgyas
191a1(rgyud): byang chub rab gsol byed// khu tshur nang du byas nas ni// gnyis ka sbyar bas yongasasu brtag/ 'khor lo sgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad// sangs
191a2(rgyud): rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// dam tshig phyag rgya 'di yin no// ming med nang bcug khu tshur gyis// kun gyi gtso mor yongasu brtag/ rdo rje'i rnam par legs par sbyar// rdo rje chen po zhes su
191a3(rgyud): bsgrags// mthe'u chung srin lag khu tshur las// gung mo legs par bskyangs nas su// mdzub mos mthe bong yongasu sbyar// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar
191a4(rgyud): ba ni gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar// gung mo gnyis ni brtag par bya// gzi brjid phreng ba phyag rgya che// gzi brjid phreng ba
191a5(rgyud): nyid gsol byed// de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags// de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba// rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin gshegs// khu tshur snying po ldan
191a6(rgyud): byas pas// gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te// thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro ba zhes su bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa yongasu sbyar// dam tshig kun gyi
191a7(rgyud): 'byung gnas te// gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu gnas// mthe'u chung dang ni mthe bong btung // lcags kyu mda' yi sbyor ba yis// legaso ba ni sbyar bar bya// gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse/ 
191a8(rgyud): bye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu ma~M pad+ma lta bus bskum// ram tshwa 'i chos
191b1(rgyud): ni 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i 'khor lo 'dra// kha ru phye ma'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya ni// gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos
191b2(rgyud): yongs sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya// mche ba gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su bshad// khu tshur bcangs pa khu tshur gyis// rdo rje thal mo snying la
191b3(rgyud): bzhag/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhes su grags// yongasu sgyur ba spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje phreng ba zhes su brjod// thal mo sbyar ba gdong du sgrol// rdo rje glu mar rjes su bsgrags// 'gyed cing 'dud pa'i
191b4(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// de ni rdo rje gar mar bshad// pad+ma'i thal mo// gdong du dbye// spyi bor yongasu sbyar la bzhag/ snying kha/ ra mthe bo gnyis po las// gdong ni legs par brkyang bar
191b5(rgyud): bya/ lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du bzhag/ sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad// dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis/ 
191b6(rgyud): dri yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni// ro yi phyag rgya zhes su bsgrags// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// reg pa reg pa zhes su bshad// mthe'u chung gnyis ni yongs
191b7(rgyud): su sbyar ba mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/ bzhi pa rdo rje dril bu zhes// rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag/ 
191b8(rgyud): phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgya// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/ thal mo yongasu sbyar la bsdams// mdzub mo gnyis po bskums nas ni// rin po che yi rnam par bcing // kun tu bzang po
192a1(rgyud): blo ldan gyis// de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum// sems kyi byams pa bsgoms nas su// mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni// ral gri'i rnam pa brtag pa ste// 'di ni na mkha'i
192a2(rgyud): snying po yi// phyag rgyar sangs rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri'i mtshon ma yi// rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni rnam 'gog par// thams cad kyis ni yongasu brjod// 
192a3(rgyud): gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang // pad+ma'i lta bur rnam par brtag/ pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis// de nyid me tog zum tshul dang // ud pa la rnam pa ltar mdzes pa/ 
192a4(rgyud): 'di ni pad ma sgrol ba'i rgya// pad+ma'i mgon po zhes su grag/ das// mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dang 'a dadra bar legs par brtag/ 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// kha
192a5(rgyud): yi phyogs su rab tu brtag/ pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi// khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar// rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che// dpal gyi snying po rin chen ldan// yid bzhin nor bu'i
192a6(rgyud): rnam pa bzung // thal mo legs par rab tu brkyang // mi bzang blo gros phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtag/ gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen rdo rje snying khar bzhag/ nam
192a7(rgyud): mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// na mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed// rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mthe chung mthe bong nges par bcing // lag pa gnyis ni nges par brtag/ blo gros rgya
192a8(rgyud): mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du sgreng // mdzu lo gnyis po sbyar bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya// rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshur nang du byas nas su// mdzub mo gnyis/ 
192b1(rgyud): po rtse mo sbyar// 'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste// rdo rje ral gri zhes su brtag/ de nyid shAkya ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o// gshin rje mthar byed mdung rtser 'gyur// 
192b2(rgyud): mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag/ mdzub mo bskum par byas nas ni// gung mo'i steng du yongasu bzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam pa rab ldan pas// gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// de nyid ral
192b3(rgyud): grir byas pa ni// skra can gyi ru rab tu bshad// khu tshur thams cad nges bcings te// mdzub mo gcig ni bskum par bya// 'di ni nye ba'i skra can brgyar// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bka'
192b4(rgyud): stsal to// rdo rje bsdams pa steng bcings te// dbu ma gnyis dani rnam par spang // mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya// ma/ the chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i// 
192b5(rgyud): phyag rgya don kun sgrub byed yin// mdzub mo mthe bong bsdam sa pa ni// mA ma kIr ni yongasu bshad// mdzub mo lcags sgrog rnam pa las// gung mo'i dbu ma rdo rjer bya// 
192b6(rgyud): 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya// rdo rje lta bur yongasu bshad// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// khro bo gzegs mar rnam par bshad// mchog gi rtse mo rtse gcig bya// rdo rje rtse mo nyid kyir bshad// 
192b7(rgyud): lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis legs par brkyang bar bya// sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibasu bya// bskul byed lha mor yongasu bshad// thal mo yongasu sbyar ba las// mdzub mo
192b8(rgyud): dang ni mthe bong dag/ mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas spyan gyir rnam par bshad// bkra shis kyi ni skyil krungs bca'// rnal 'byor rig pas lus srang ste// lag gnyis
193a1(rgyud): lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba// bsam gtan phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya// sangs rgyas kun gyi don mdzad pa'i// mi bskyod pa yi sa la reg/ rin chen
193a2(rgyud): tog gi mchog sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od dpag med// ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// mi 'jigs pa ni med pa sbyin// blo ldan rnal
193a3(rgyud): 'byor skyil krung gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mnyam par gzhag pas phyag rgya kun// 'tshang ba 'am ni 'ching du gzhug/ 'jig rten pa yi phyag rgya la// lag pa gcig ni
193a4(rgyud): rab brkyang ste// dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa// mthe bong mthe chung mnan par bya// lha yi dbang po'i rdo rjer gyu da ra// lag pa g.yas pas bteg par bya// me yi oM
193a5(rgyud): yig lag pa dag/ mthe bong gung mo nyid la bzhag/ gshi na rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// de nyid khyab mjug 'khor lo ste// 'khor lo'i yi ge
193a6(rgyud): dgod par bya// lag pa gcig gis thod pa ni// ma mo rnams kyir yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis sgreng ral gri ni// srin po'i bdag nyid chen po'i 'o// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni/ 
193a7(rgyud): chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang // rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyi rab tu brtag/ dbu ma
193a8(rgyud): gcig pu legs brkyang ba// dbyug ze'i phyag rgya rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngan bdag nyid chen po'o// mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa yi ni
193b1(rgyud): legs par bshad// drag po'i gsal shing shes bya ste// lha mo'i paT+Ti se ru brjod// tshogs bdag gi ni sna ru bshad// zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni/ 
193b2(rgyud): lag pa gnyis kyis bstan par bya// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya// dpa' bo kun gyi rab tu gnas// dri za rnams kyi
193b3(rgyud): phyag rgya ni// glu len lta bur rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdza rnga'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir// don chen pos ni rab tu brtags
193b4(rgyud): ting ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis// dri za rnams kyi rab tu ba skyugs// pi wang sgreng ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbyangs can dgyir ni rnam par bshad// rtag tu dun du b+hi sgrog pa// reg
193b5(rgyud): pa 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod// lag gnyis gdengs ka 'i tshul byas pa// klu rnams kyir ni legs par bsha // gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyed dang 'dud
193b6(rgyud): pa'i de bzhin no// lag pa zhags pa'i nges bcings pa// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs// 
193b7(rgyud): las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa yis// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni// rin chen yang dang yang du bsam// rnam par rtog med gdod nas zhi// chos
193b8(rgyud): dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong pa mkha' 'drar shes nas su// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing // rmi lam lta bur rab tu gnas// dri
194a1(rgyud): za'i grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tsho ba'i 'jig rten yang dang yang // mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal// mi rtag sdug bsngal spong bar
194a2(rgyud): srid pa thams cad mdor sdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yi// sgyu ma smig rgyu brag cha dang // sru ba chu yi chu bur dang // gzugs brnyan lta bur
194a3(rgyud): 'jig rten ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad 'gal me'i 'khor ltar// zo chun khyud mi ji bzhin du// gar gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra bar// zla ba gnyis dang mtshungs par
194a4(rgyud): bltang rtag tu glog gi phreng ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra dang ma datshungs par bshad// 'khor ba shin tu brlang ba deste// rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing
194a5(rgyud): rtogs nas ni// sgom pa'i stobs kyi rang bzhin gyis// sem sa ni legs sgrub rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med
194a6(rgyud): pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshig gsum ni brtags pa'o// phyag rgya sngags dang lha nyid dang // de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas// bdag nyid sbyor ba'i
194a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas// de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal to// phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang ba ste// 
194a8(rgyud): dngos po med pa'i tshogs rnams la// dngos po'i de nyid nyid du bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang dngos po yin// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// rnal
194b1(rgyud): 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde// rtog ge med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med// stong pa na mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems// gang tshe de ltar nyid 'gyur ba// de tshe phyag rgya
194b2(rgyud): rnams dang sngags// lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min cing // rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis med sngags
194b3(rgyud): dang phyag rgyar brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
194b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los sgyu dar ba chen po rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol
194b5(rgyud): ba btab pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig
194b6(rgyud): nye bar gsan nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas byon te dga' ldan gyi gnasu bzhugs nas dga' ldan gyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs la mngon par gzigs
194b7(rgyud): te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar gnas nas nye bar 'khod de/ bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par gyur te/ 
194b8(rgyud): bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs
195a1(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsung so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma dza a kaR+Sha ma sa
195a2(rgyud): ta thA ga tAn hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te/ chos kyi dbyings spros nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i
195a3(rgyud): 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab pa'i rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams bkang ste/ na mkha'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu ltar 'dzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to// de nas
195a4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkra dag cing bcug ste bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/ de nyi da kyi thugs khar rab tu bzhag par gyur to// de nas
195a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyisu med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs/ te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs par
195a6(rgyud): mdzad do// oM tsit+ta pra ti pe d+haM kA ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs khar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul
195a7(rgyud): pa'i sku las chos sku rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par 'byung ste spros par mdzad do// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/ de bzhin
195a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa na mkha' ltar gdod nas zhi ba de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas
195b1(rgyud): nas sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang / 'chi bas rnam par khyab par 'jig rten la gzigs nas slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub kyi
195b2(rgyud): sems nye bar bskyed pa bstan pa/ oM b+ho d+hi tsit+te ud pA da yA mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de'i thugs khar sems
195b3(rgyud): 'od gsal ba de yongasu rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar rnam par bzhag go/ legs par rnam par dag pa'i
195b4(rgyud): nam mkha'i ltar dri ma med pa/ spros pa thams cad spangs pa me long lta bur brtan par byas nas gnas te byang / chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do// oM dzA
195b5(rgyud): na rasmi bi sr-i dzaHhUM/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor las rnam par phyung ngo // de phyung nas kyang chos kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du
195b6(rgyud): zhugs te/ shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ri bo'i rtse mo bsnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dris te/ 
195b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar rje su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu rab tu gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
195b8(rgyud): / chen pos sngags 'di byin gyis brlabaso// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra pa ra da b+hu ya pany+tsa mu d+ha/ slar yang sngags 'dis spros pa/ oM s+pha ra badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsduso// oM sa ha ra badz+ra/ 
196a1(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod pa/ oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
196a2(rgyud): pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs mnyam pa nyid mnyes pas sngags
196a3(rgyud): 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin
196a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gzi dgas nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab par mdzad// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga tasta thA a ha ma pi/ de nas bcom
196a5(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku semasas can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku bdag nyid sems can gyi khams
196a6(rgyud): thams cad du nges par bstan to// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis mthong nas lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pas bcom ldan 'das
196a7(rgyud): mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra bsgrag so// de nas tshangs pas gsol ba btab te/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas de dang nges 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te gang gis slar ldog
196a8(rgyud): pa med pa nyid du gyur to// 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin de las bzhengs nas sangs rgyas kyi bya
196b1(rgyud): chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de thugs kha las rdo rje phyung ste nyid kyi phyag du bzhag par gyur to// de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten
196b2(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te mtshan
196b3(rgyud): nyid thams cad yongasu rdzogs par rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar dang phreng bas dbang bskur ba zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so// 
196b4(rgyud): de nas thugs kha nas phyung nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la ba rten te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sna dang / rgyab dang drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje
196b5(rgyud): chos dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa bya nga chub sems dpa' chen po'i phreng ba rnam par gan so// de bzhin du sgeg mo la sogs pa rnams dang / 
196b6(rgyud): bdug pa la sogs pa khyad par du nges par bskyed cing gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa'i lha rnams bskyed de 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal
196b7(rgyud): pa de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying po zhesu gsungs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me
196b8(rgyud): tog phreng bas brgyan// sgo logs dang ni rig byed dang // rta babs kyis ni so sor spras// de yi dbus su khri chen po// kun nas yongasu gru bzhi pa// de yi steng du pad chen po// ge sar ldan zhing
197a1(rgyud): rab mdzes pa// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni drung kun tu// sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nye
197a2(rgyud): 'khor du/ 'khor los sgyur ba la sogs bri// phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// kha dog ser po gzi brjid che// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams
197a3(rgyud): cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan// brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par
197a4(rgyud): snang mdzad kyi slar yang chu'i lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po pa ka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas
197a5(rgyud): na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes su brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya// ri mo rnam pa sna tshogs pas// sgo dang sgo logs brtag par bya// rta ba
197a6(rgyud): rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen pos// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// 'dab ma brgyad kyi ka ba la// dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan
197a7(rgyud): pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar po mchog/ kha ba bzho ltar dkar gsal// shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od// kun da zla ba ltar dkar bstan// zla ba'i dkyil
197a8(rgyud): 'khor dbum men par// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// thams cad za ba ltar dkar zhing // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// mtshan ma sna tshogs pa/ 
197b1(rgyud): pa 'dra tha ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// 
197b2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos mo lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa/ 
197b3(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs// rdo rje gzi brjid ces su brjod// gru gsum rnam pa nyid du bya// shing rta'i rnam pa dang mtshungs shing // 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o// kha dog
197b4(rgyud): dmar po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba// rtag/ tu pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs pa// 
197b5(rgyud): shing rta'i snying khar bzhag par bya// bal po se'u'i me tog mtshungs// ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad+ma pad+ma rAH/ mtshungs// sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dag 'bar// bzang po
197b6(rgyud): 'tshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyegs bcud dang 'dra bar gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras// khro bo dang ni mngag pa dag/ mkhas pa yis ni dgod
197b7(rgyud): par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa// 'od zer dmar po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha
197b8(rgyud): can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus// phreng ba dmar po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya// dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar
198a1(rgyud): pa'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang
198a2(rgyud): rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rlung gi khams dang 'dra bas na// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad/ 
198a3(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// a ta si yi me tog 'dra// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de yi dbus su pad chen po// bai DUr+ya'i 'od dang 'dra// shin tu
198a4(rgyud): gnag pa'i mig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par/ gnas// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas dang 'a bo rab 'bar ba// rgyal po 'khyil ba 'bar ba'i gzi/ 
198a5(rgyud): mtshan mo nag mo lta bur gnas// ud pa la sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul// stong pa na mkha' lta bur gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras rnams
198a6(rgyud): bri khro bo rnams dang mngag pa dang // de bzhin po nya pho nya mo// thams cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsdams// kha dog nag
198a7(rgyud): po thams cad du// gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna tshogs legs 'bar ba// bla re rgyas pa mnyam pa ni// kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi/ 
198a8(rgyud): mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lte bu// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// bris nas shes rab can gyis sgom// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na// rdo rje
198b1(rgyud): snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis slar yang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das
198b2(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol/ de
198b3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gnas gsan nas sgrub pa'i thabs kyi cho ga mchog tu gsang ba chen
198b4(rgyud): po bka' stsal pa/ sgeg mo sogs pas mchod pa kun// yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gi rtag tu bsgom par bya/ 
198b5(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ge yang dag ldan// 'dod pa ster ba'i sku rubya// sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ge'i phreng ba de bzhin te/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
198b6(rgyud): par sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// hUM/ sngags pas snying khar son pa sgom// gsang sngags dge ba brjod nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// dung gi
198b7(rgyud): sgra ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba// pad+mo rnal 'byor dbang phyug go/ dus min sprin gyi hUM gi sgra// tsa Ta tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gis// sgra ru de
198b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs rnams gsungs// nor bu las kyi rigs kyi yang // rnga chen snga ru rab tu bshad// pi wang gling bu de bzhin glu// gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni// rdza rnga'i ngar swa hUM gi sgra// spyi yi
199a1(rgyud): nyid du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun las rnam par sbyar// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang // de nas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad/ 
199a2(rgyud): dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// de rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam bya
199a3(rgyud): bsam// lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag pa'i phyag rgya rab nges pa'i// phyag rgya'ang snying khar son shes bya// rang gi rigs rimacho ga yis// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing / 
199a4(rgyud): sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsal ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas tha mas cad du// kun nas ba spu'i rtse dag nas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng dge bas// gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes
199a5(rgyud): su bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa yis// gsang snga/ gas sgrub pa brtsam par bya// mchod dang byin rlabs dbang bskur mchog/ spro la sogs rim thams cad du// 
199a6(rgyud): sbyor ba'i bzlas pa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying kha mgrin pa mchu lce min// rkan dang spyi bo nyid ma yin// nang min phyi dang gnyis par min// chos ni 'ba' shig/ 
199a7(rgyud): kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'di ni bcom ldan rnal 'byor che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad/ 
199a8(rgyud): de nas rjesu mdor bsdus te// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya// dri ma med cing legs par gnas// de la yi ge rnam par dgod// tshig gi phreng ba ma chad pa
199b1(rgyud): mu tig phreng ba ltar rgyus pa// char sprin gyi ni me 'dra'i 'od// de tshe thams cad gsal bar byed// lha yi lus ni snang byed cing // ji lta ji lta yi ge'i phreng // mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa
199b2(rgyud): de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus// lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// mthu stobs lha dbang thams cad ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug las chen lhag/ bzlas pa'i de nyid mchog 'di ni// sangs
199b3(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi bsngags pa'o// ji ltar rnam par sems ni sgom pa yi// de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u
199b4(rgyud): lo// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor/ gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa// mnyam
199b5(rgyud): med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can// thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar ma dzad// yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin
199b6(rgyud): mdzad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can// yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha la 'ang tshad med de// dpe ni nam mkha' dang yang bskrun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha'
199b7(rgyud): yas mnyam med de pe dang bral ba rnams// sems can khams la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri med thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa
199b8(rgyud): 'gag pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don grub rab tu brtson pa mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // chang med tshad dang bral ba shin tu/ 
200a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi gan
200a2(rgyud): 'gags par yong mi 'gyur// e ma'o shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu
200a3(rgyud): dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon po dus gsum sgrib pa med pa rab mkhyen pas// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la gsol// 'di de sangs rgyas thams
200a4(rgyud): cad kyi// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste// lan cig tsam zhes brjod pas kyang // gsang sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// 
200a5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod nas// rab yangs da ngos grub stsol gyur te// bskal par gnas shingabaskal par bskul// lus ni g.yo ba med pa ru// bdag
200a6(rgyud): nyid brtan par byas pa yis// mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med// don yod rgyal ba thams cad du// dngul
200a7(rgyud): chu bcud len de nyid dang // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// dngos grub yid kyi ma lus la// rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// 
200a8(rgyud): yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// mchog tu dge ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes
200b1(rgyud): bya ba rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ 
200b2(rgyud): tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// smyung bar gnas pa'i cho ga med// ji ltar bshad pa cho gas bslab pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung
200b3(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog sil ma bkram la bdug spos kyis bdug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa
200b4(rgyud): byas te/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa ba sha/ rdegs te/ oM sarba pA pa ta kA yi kA bA kr-it+ta ka ma na sot+ta pu ta rA ga dwe Sha mo ha ma mA na mA na biSh+Te na ya da
200b5(rgyud): kr-i taM tr-i ka li ka hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ sarba pA paM swA Ta yA mi swA hA// oM sarba pA paM pra ti de sha yA mi swA hA/ de'i rjes thogs la bdag nyid kyis dngos po dbul
200b6(rgyud): bar bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta nAn At+ma b+ha ba nir yA ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ pra ti gr-ih+Nan+tu mAM sA hA// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsod nams la rje su yi
200b7(rgyud): rang ba ni// oM sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha rAn a nu mo da yA mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags kyis bya ste/ 
200b8(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta/ b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra/ sa ma yaM/ ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta/ ut+pA da yA mi swAhA/ de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog can zla ba'i
201a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tsho gas yongasu rdzogs pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po seng ge'i khril
201a2(rgyud): steng du bdag nyid bsam par bya'o// oM shud+d+ho he/ sngags 'dis bdag yongasu dag par byas te/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba ta thA ga tAHswa b+hA ba bi shud+d+ho ha~M/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid
201a3(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings yangs pa 'od gsal ba'i snang bar shin tu gnas par bya ste/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko he/ de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyan pa
201a4(rgyud): 'jig rten thams cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhi dan gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi skur bdag/ nyid sngags 'dis gnas par bya ste/ oM pra b+he shwa ro
201a5(rgyud): de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen por spros nas bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do// zhes nga rgyal ba skyed la bdag skye dgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du
201a6(rgyud): byas la chos kyi dbyings rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bar lhan cig gnas par byas te nye bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa bsam par bya ste/ yi ge la rjesu gzhol
201a7(rgyud): ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya zhing / nyi ma re rer stong phrag brgyad dam stong phrag re bzlas te ji srid mtshan ma thob pa de srid du'o// tsan ngan dang / ga pur
201a8(rgyud): dang dgur gum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor byas te nye bar 'kho ba thams cad kyis mchod pa cho 'phrul gyi zla ba 'am/ sa ga'i nya gang ba la mar gyi mar me stong
201b1(rgyud): phrag brgyad sngar la rdo rje skyil dkrung gis gnas te sna ma'i me tog gam me tog pad+mas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mchod rten mchod de ji srid 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa
201b2(rgyud): ma thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// de nas sreg blugs 'bum phrag gcig dgang bar byas
201b3(rgyud): pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyuraro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa chen po
201b4(rgyud): byed par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba de'i tshad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod brten byas la mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas
201b5(rgyud): pa'am yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa 'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis mchod rten nyi ma re re la
201b6(rgyud): re re ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// tha ma'i mchod rten 'bar ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig/ 
201b7(rgyud): rten skyong ba la sogs nas ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi ros kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams me tog gi char 'bebs par 'gyuraro// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin
201b8(rgyud): dang 'dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang bstod par byed cing ji srid a pa ci mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can dmyal ba
202a1(rgyud): thams cad bsil bar 'gyuraro// yi dgas rnams kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems rnams la
202a2(rgyud): gdung bar mi 'gyuraro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyuraro// de'i rjes la lus ngang pa gser gyi mdog lta bu dang / lo brgyad
202a3(rgyud): gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang / tshe dang / stobs dang / shugs dang / dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang / 'jig
202a4(rgyud): rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba ltar che ba/ dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bsto// da cing steng du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por
202a5(rgyud): 'gyur ba dang / steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po rig pa' dzin pa brgya stong phrag du mas yongasu bskor ba dang / 
202a6(rgyud): phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyi legs par mchod cing grub
202a7(rgyud): pa thams cad 'od kyis ltung bar 'gyuraro// brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i stan phyed ster bar 'gyuraro// gzi brjid dang / gzugs dang / dpa' bas rig pa
202a8(rgyud): 'dzin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang so sor thob par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad 'dul ba la mkhas par 'gyuraro// phyi
202b1(rgyud): ma'i mthar tshe byin gyis brlab ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed par mthong bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston par 'gyur ro// mchod pa'i sprin thams
202b2(rgyud): cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byams pa dang / 'jam dpal dang mtshungs par 'gyuraro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i
202b3(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par byas te/ pi wang ngam ldong ros pad+ma'i snod du bzhag
202b4(rgyud): la ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du bzladas par bya'o// sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur/ da pa dang / mi snang ba dang / rig pa thams cad 'dzin pa nyid// 
202b5(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma stong shar ba'i kha dogadang lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par ska li zhing 'khyil ba dang / gdu gu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas
202b6(rgyud): yongasu bskor cing rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub pa thams cad kyis yongasu bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mtha' gnas pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyuraro// 
202b7(rgyud): rig pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyuraro// mchod phyir thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyur ro// 'khor los khyab 'jug du 'gyuraro// grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i
202b8(rgyud): sa bzung ste sa srung gi bu byas la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyuraro// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshungs par 'gyuraro// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
203a1(rgyud): gyi zla ba'i steng 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gang gis mtshan mar bzung ste/ des de'i longs spyod la spyod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul chu'am
203a2(rgyud): bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyuraro// gal te ma grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o// bdun byas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ 
203a3(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor lo bsgyur bas bka' stsal pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo lhun po'i tshad tsam gyi ri bo yang hUM zhes brjod pas lhung ba dang / rgya mtsho skems pa dang / ljon pa drung
203a4(rgyud): nas 'byin pa dang / bum pa na mkha' la phan pa dang / glang po che rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde ma dngon par 'joms par byed pa dang / bar snang na gnas
203a5(rgyud): pa thams cad ltung bar byed pa'o// sems can thams cad 'bebs par byed do// sgrub pa po las gang dang ga sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thams cad byed do// yang na zla ba/ 
203a6(rgyud): gcig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgoms na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyur ro// 
203a7(rgyud): na mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do// me 'bar ba dang glog 'gyu ba la sogs pa ston par byed// gcig tu gyur na mang por 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo
203a8(rgyud): bar byed// sgrub pa pos bye ba phrag bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / chos gos dang / stong g.yogs dang mkhar bsil las/ 
203b1(rgyud): gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba dang / sprul pa du ma byed pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang / skad
203b2(rgyud): cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye bar gnas par byed// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang
203b3(rgyud): byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mthe'i tshad kyi mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig byas te/ rma med pa'i ral gri blangs la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spong/ 
203b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyis mchod de brgyad pa 'am/ bcu bzhi pa 'am/ nya gang ba la skyil dkrung bcas te ji srid dudal gri 'bar ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de'i rjes thogs
203b5(rgyud): nyid la rnga bo che rnams kyi sgra grago// steng nas me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyuraro// lhan cig pa ji snyed pa dang bcas pa steng du 'gro'o// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad
203b6(rgyud): kyis mchod par 'gyuraro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po'i 'khor lo sgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i chos gos dang can 'chang ba 'dod
203b7(rgyud): dgur rgyu ba skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par spyod pa dang / rga shi med pa dang nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin
203b8(rgyud): thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du mchod pa'i char 'bebs pa dang / bskal ba chen po stong phrag du 'tsho bar 'gyur// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo 'am
204a1(rgyud): pa Ti sa blangs te 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang dpal gyi sgor song ste/ nim pa'i lo mtsha ba'i mar khu la btab pa 'bum phrag gcig bsreg
204a2(rgyud): blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'byed par 'gyuraro// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyuraro// gal te ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam gsum
204a3(rgyud): du bsregs blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhin du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar byed de/ kye skyes bu dpa' bo 'jug tu gsol
204a4(rgyud): zhes smra'o// de nas grogs dang bcas nas 'jug par bya'o// // ral gri'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin/ gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ro// sa 'og gi/ 
204a5(rgyud): rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po// gsang sngags grub pa gzhan dngalha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyug/ 
204a6(rgyud): sa 'og thams cad kyi bdag po// lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo hU~M zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis brlag par byed
204a7(rgyud): pa/ khyab 'jug kyang hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis brlag par byed na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci zhig dgos/ sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang / bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum
204a8(rgyud): phrag sum cu byas te/ mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o// thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la tha mar me tog can gyi lcags la
204b1(rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang tsam pa bzung ba la cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed pa skyil dkrung bcas te/ ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de bcangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i
204b2(rgyud): 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyuraro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa/ bskal pa bye ba brgya
204b3(rgyud): stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'tsho ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis gnon pa dang / mchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gi mchod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas stong
204b4(rgyud): phrag mthong bar 'gyuraro// de rnams la nyi ma re re zhing mtsho du pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par byed do// sgrub pa de'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrag/ 
204b5(rgyud): drug bcu byas te/ sngon du bsnyen pa byas la bye ba bzlas/ pa'o// de nas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i ro blangs la khrus byas nas nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis
204b6(rgyud): mchod de ji srid ma langs pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o// langs nas dngul chu dang bcud len dang mi snang ba la sogs pa thams cad nges ster bar byed do// gal te mi ster na ji
204b7(rgyud): srid la las lce ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas mtshon rnon pos de bcad par bya'o// de bzung bas nyi ma stong gi gzi brjid can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi
204b8(rgyud): rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor can/ tshe bskal pa bye ba brgya stong phrag drug cu 'tshe ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / ri bo
205a1(rgyud): lhun po bye ba phrag stong skul ba dang / gling stong phrag 'phen pa dang / rgya mtsho stong phrag skems pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong phrag bsdigs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab
205a2(rgyud): 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang / skra li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis lon pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyi rnam par brgyan pa ste/ sreg
205a3(rgyud): pa'i bskal pa na 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du 'gro zhing rga ba dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// / 
205a4(rgyud): de bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dpag bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang / nor gyi char pa dang / nam kha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang / rin po che
205a5(rgyud): chen po'i lag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang / sems can gyi re ba thams cad rjesu 'gengs pa dang / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang / rin po che thams
205a6(rgyud): cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o// de la 'di lta ste/ 'khor lo rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang / rta rin po
205a7(rgyud): che dang / bsnyen bkur ba rin po che'o// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po las pad+ma sor drug pa'i tshad byas pa pad+ma de lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tu skyil
205a8(rgyud): dkrung bcas te/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas thun mtshams gsum mam bzhir grangs mi bzung bar bzlas par bya'o// zla ba drug yongasu rdzogs pa dang pad+ma 'bum
205b1(rgyud): brag bdun bsregs blugs bya'o// zla ba nya nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la skyil mo dkrung bcas nas mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// tho
205b2(rgyud): rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyuraro// sgra li zhing 'khyil pa dang lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshungs
205b3(rgyud): pa rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma'i 'khor can/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor ba/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mngag gzhug
205b4(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skad cig tsam dgyis rnam par rgyu ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mchod par 'gyuraro// 
205b5(rgyud): de bzhin du ud pa la'i sgrub pa dang / tsan dan dmar po pad+ma'i sgrub pa yang ngo // sgrub pa gzhan yang bsgrub par bya ba ni shel dang / pad+ma rA ga dang / mu tig gi 'bras bu
205b6(rgyud): 'am rin po che yongasu rtog par byed pa pos yongasu brtags pa na bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsam byas te/ gang yang rung ba'i grangs mi bzung / 
205b7(rgyud): bar ji srid bdag yongasu dag par mthong ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de'i rje su mngar gsum gyis sbags pa'i pad+ma 'bum dang / sna ma'i me tog 'bum phrag gsum dang / a
205b8(rgyud): ga ru'i yam shing 'bum dang / tsan dan gyi yam shing 'bum phrag gsum dang / til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang / zho zan 'bum dang / mar gyi bsregs blugs stong
206a1(rgyud): phrag gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i bsregs blugs 'bum phrag gcig byas la/ sbyin sreg yongasu rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes bco lnga la bsgrub par bya'o// 
206a2(rgyud): skyil mo dkrung bcas ste/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la ji srid nor bu rin po che 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu sdong du 'gro bar
206a3(rgyud): 'gyuraro// ska li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa/ 
206a4(rgyud): rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi bla ma 'khor los bsku dar ba chen por 'gyuraro// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhes
206a5(rgyud): brjod do// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bskur bar byed do// skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can bskor nas slar de nyid du 'ong
206a6(rgyud): bar 'gyuraro// gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon par rdzogs par byas te lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mngon par rdzogs
206a7(rgyud): par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang shing lham dang / mu tig gi phreng ba yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i cho gas bsgrub par bya'o// thams cad
206a8(rgyud): du 'grub par 'gyuraro// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong byas te/ 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o// yongasu rdzogs pa dang / me tog can gyi lcags sam
206b1(rgyud): lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam mo// 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thog thag khri'i steng du lag pa bkab la ji srid
206b2(rgyud): bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po nyi ma bye ba brgya phrag dang rje su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid dang
206b3(rgyud): ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ lha ma yin rnams skrag
206b4(rgyud): ba dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang / sems can tham sa cad de'i ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los
206b5(rgyud): bsgyur ba chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa tha mas cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
206b6(rgyud): yongasu rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa
206b7(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po ka k+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar
206b8(rgyud): ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi kak+Sha pu Ta bka' stsal pa/ de nas
207a1(rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjesu skyob// gsang sngags ka kA sbyar zhes bya// gsang chen mchog tu rmad du byung // gru bzhi pa la tshad mdzes pa// kun nas yongs
207a2(rgyud): su bzang zhing dag/ re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa// mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dang po'i phreng bzang gnyis la ni// a sogs blo gros ldan pas dgod// ka sogs lhag ma'i re mig
207a3(rgyud): la/ sngags pas mdo ru bsdus te bri// sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun// go rims bzhin du dgod par bya// re mig stong pa dag la ni// k+Sha yig dang ni rdo rje bri// rim pa de dag bkod nas ni// rang sde'i
207a4(rgyud): 'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyangs la de'i rjes su// yi/ dge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// ka tsa Ta ta pa ya shA/ dag cing chu yi dkyil 'khor ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub
207a5(rgyud): par byed// pad+ma'i rigs kyi lha'i nyid do// don kun grub parayang dag ldan// me yi dkyil 'khor zhes su bshad// 'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od // kha tsha tha za par / 
207a6(rgyud): dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// ga dza Da da ba la sA// dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs ldan// dbyar gyi sprin ltar shin tu 'jigs// g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha wa hA// steng 'gros dngos grub byed
207a7(rgyud): par brjod// slar yang nga nya Na na ma// chos kun dbang du byed par mchog/ thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa// de na de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu// khyad par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// 
207a8(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gnyis// ma ning yi ge bzhi po spong // ra r-I lo l-I zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags// de dak+Sh+Na/ yi ge ru yang bshad// dbang du byed pa'i sde
207b1(rgyud): tshan kun// thig le sna gtsug zla phyed ces// sna ldan gyi ni phreng zhes bshad// sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis// yi ger brjod pa de bzhin zhing // gsal byed ces gyis gsal ba'o// de
207b2(rgyud): bzhin ya ra la brlung // me dang dbang ldan bdag po ste// 'byung ba chen po'i khams rnamaso// rlung me bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad// mnyam dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas// thams cad nyid kyi
207b3(rgyud): lam zhes bya// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chos kun las ni gton nas ster// stong pa mtshan
207b4(rgyud): med smon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phra dang po khams dang skye mched rnams// mkhas pa yis/  ni shes par bya// da ni sngags kyi ka kA'i sbyor ba las// 
207b5(rgyud): rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang // phral ba bshad par bya'o// yi ge rnams kyis byang chub dpyod// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs
207b6(rgyud): rnams kyis ni bsdus pa bshad// mtshan nyid kyang ni rab bshad bya// dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la nges par sangs rgyas nyid// ster
207b7(rgyud): ba nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung // thog mar dbyangs ni thig ler ldan// rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas// 
207b8(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng can rab zhi pa// rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas// zla ba'i dbus su bsgom bya ba// kun gyi ye shes 'od po che// kun tu 'gro ba rab tu thob// thams cad du yang rnyed
208a1(rgyud): par dka'// de ni gdod nas gnas rtag pa// yi ge med cing dbyer med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu bshad// dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ gnyis pa'i sgra dang
208a2(rgyud): yang dag ldan// de ni shin tu ring por shes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// usma rnams kyi rnam pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa zhes su bsgrags// dbyangs
208a3(rgyud): dang yi ge khyad par can// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya sogs ldan pa// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags
208a4(rgyud): kyi de nyid 'di bshad bya// thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra ba po ru bshad// zhi ba'i dbyangs kyis kun nas mnan// gsum pa'i ming ni yid ces bya// rgyu
208a5(rgyud): med pas te cung zad pa// bzhi pa yis ni gsal bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang ldan pa la// de yi steng du thi ga le gnas// chos kun na mkha' dang mtshungs par// 
208a6(rgyud): yang dang yang du bshad pa yin// de ni lnga par shes par bya// yi ge lnga pa stobs po che// yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso// mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid
208a7(rgyud): pa'i bdag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po srid gsum las rab grol byed pas// yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/ mngon shes drug kyang rab tu ster byed dri ma med// 
208a8(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste// mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags// byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste// brtan pa'i sems dpar rab byung ba// chos kun gyi ni de bzhin nyid// 
208b1(rgyud): gang bsgrags de ni thams cad du// me yi sa bon dang ldan pa// dpyad pa yi ni steng du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan zhesu bshad// chos rnams kun/ 
208b2(rgyud): gyis byed pa ni// med pa nyid du 'ang bshad pa'o// me yi sa bon yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi spyi bo ru// mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med// de nyid bcom ldan rnal
208b3(rgyud): 'byor ni// sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags// sde lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang dngos med rab
208b4(rgyud): rtogs byed// me yi sa bon rab tu ldan// 'khor lo'i dadabus su rab tu gnas// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par spras// 
208b5(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba ye shes che// rnam par rgyal ba 'i nor ster byed// gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'// sgyu ma'i chos la rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal
208b6(rgyud): 'byor ni// gdugs dkar shes su bshad pa'o// brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// spyi bor thig
208b7(rgyud): le mnan pa'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ye shes che// mA ma ki ru de bsgragaso// lnga yi dbyings dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar
208b8(rgyud): mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig pa thams cad rengs byed de// rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba// sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// phyag na rdo rje sto
209a1(rgyud): chen dang // gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che// yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbus su spyod pa bzhag/ tha mar sna tshogs zhes bya
209a2(rgyud): sbyar sku gsum du ni rnam par sgom// tha ma'i sde tshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o// de nyid
209a3(rgyud): bcom ldan mgon po ni// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro bo stobs po che// de nyid rab tu grags pa'o// 'di kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyu ni rab tu spangs pa'o// dbyangs
209a4(rgyud): lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad do// gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po'o// me dang rab tu ldan pa dang // bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// gzi brjid
209a5(rgyud): phung po stobs po che// de nyid gang dang ma sbyar ba// sgrom ma zhes su rab tu grags// bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // shes rab pha rol phyin par nges// thig le lhan
209a6(rgyud): cig yang dag ldan// sgra dang ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang // me nyid dang ni yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyi yang dag mnan// khams gsum
209a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan zhes bya bar// spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi rjes nyid la ni me// dgu pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// gsum pa'i
209a8(rgyud): dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi// sde tshan dang po'i dang po ste// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// 'jig rten mgon po thub pa che// ye shes rgya che bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub
209b1(rgyud): rab gsol byed// sde tshan lnga pa rin chen mchog/ bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa ste// 'og tu me yi yan lag ldan// khro gnyer can zhes rab tu grags// dbang chen yi ge dag pa la/ 
209b2(rgyud): thig le sgra yi rnam par rgyan// sangs rgyas rgyan zhes rnam grags pa// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// nam mkha'i spyan zhes brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i
