209b3(rgyud): chos la rab gnas nas// gsod pa'i don du rab tu gsal// mA ma kI zhes bya ba'i ming // rig pa mchog tu gsang ba ste// rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos rnams kyis// dri ma med pa
209b4(rgyud): stsol ba byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang chen sa bon ya dang dag ldan// 'gro ba'i rdo rje rengs byed na// gdug pa
209b5(rgyud): gzhan kun smos ci dgos rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar bya/ sa pa// rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro// 'gro ba tha mas cad skong byed na/ gdug sems can gzhan smos ci
209b6(rgyud): dgos// de nyid me dang ldan pas na// dbang dang dgug pa'i las rnams dang // bgegs dang dgra rnams zhi ba ni// khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed// don dam bden pa'i byin gyis
209b7(rgyud): brlabs// rnam par snang mdzad gnas las byung // gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'joms pa ni// me dang ldan pa nyid kyis bya// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis
209b8(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis grangs pas// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// ti si man da ra la sogs// de yi phye mar rlog par nges// rdo rje la gnas 'khor
210a1(rgyud): lo yi// dbus nas 'gro kun rengs par byed// gnas nas bskyod par byas pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugs su gnas nas ni// mi g.yo
210a2(rgyud): ba yi snying khar son// chos kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni// bdag gi bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rlung gi sa bon rin po che// spyod pa'i steng du yang dag ldan// me las byung ba me la
210a3(rgyud): gnas/ 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang // sa yi yi ge steng du mnan// sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni// drug pa'i sgra yi steng du gnas// 'og tu me yi// 
210a4(rgyud): sa bon ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ste// sa ga sum thams cad 'bar bar byed// me yi phyogasu gnas nas ni// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams cad sgom// rlung
210a5(rgyud): lha me lha yang dag sbyor// rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o// / rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che// de nyid kho na pa sgrub par bya// dbang chen mi ni sbyor ba las// 'khor
210a6(rgyud): lo sgyur ba'i go 'phang gnas// ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya// yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don// rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgyas nyid// rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum tshogs/ 
210a7(rgyud): skye ba 'di las 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad la// sbyor ba'i dbye ba rnam par gnas// tshig dang ngag gi tshad rnams dang // ting nge
210a8(rgyud): 'dzin rnams thams cad du// slob dpon man ngag shes bya ste// gzhan du bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje snying po'i rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje ka kA'i sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan
210b1(rgyud): pa ste/ rgyas par slob dpon gyis mngon par dpyad par bya'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
210b2(rgyud): phyug la gsung ngag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la/ 'brug
210b3(rgyud): gi sgra mtha' yas pa'i legs par bsgrags pa na mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yongasu rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
210b4(rgyud): gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor yongs su rtogs pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po
210b5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor che// zlum po kun nas/ bzang po ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas// 
210b6(rgyud): de yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad la ge sar can// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang nyid// bdag gi dngos grub bsgom par bya// ngag gi dbang phyug
210b7(rgyud): 'od chen po// snying khar zla ba dang pad+ma// de yi steng du dung brtag bya// dung gi dbus su lce yin te/ rdo rje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o// de yi steng du rin chen pa // yang na sangs rgyas gzugs
210b8(rgyud): brnyan yang // 'bar zhing rkan gyi mthar khyab pa// bdud rtsi'i rgyun ni rab 'bab pa// pa yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas// bdud rtsi'i theg pa 'dzag pa ni// 
211a1(rgyud): go rims bzhin du bsam par bya// zla ba phyed dang zla ba gcig/ yang na zla ba bzhi 'am ni// zla ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya// 
211a2(rgyud): skyil dkrung kyi ni nyer gnas te// dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi dbyings ni mtha' dag tu// thams cad du ni yongasu gang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// chos
211a3(rgyud): dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'i// ji snyed rig pa thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyis// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de rnams
211a4(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid kyis// lus kyi 'khor lo la 'judag bsam// dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam// pad+ma de'i khams la yang dag rten// pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las
211a5(rgyud): sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams// mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te// de las kyang ni ji ltar gyur// slar yang lce ru son pa dang // yi ge mchog tu dge ba'o// lce yi yi
211a6(rgyud): ge tsher 'bar ba// gcig nas cig tu rdo rje'i tshul// kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i ngag ni dam pa'i don// skra yis nam mkha' kun gang bar// sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te bzla// 
211a7(rgyud): de bzhin du ni snying khar sgra// lce la 'od zer nges 'phros nas// mchu 'am so las rab bkra ba'i// gal te 'od zer mthong na ni// de tshe grub par rnam par shes// grub pa'i ngag ni dam
211a8(rgyud): pa'i don// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yis// ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po mchog/ rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa'i rang // 'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs/ 
211b1(rgyud): pa rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha// yi ge mchog tu phra ba yis// a yi yi ge mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam par bkra ba nyi ma bzhin// rang gi sde pa'i mthar thug mtshungs// yi ge yi ger yongs su
211b2(rgyud): gzhol// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni// 'bar zhing thig le dang mtshungs shing // snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa// de yi 'bar ba rab phra ba// ji srid rkan gyi bar du son// slar
211b3(rgyud): yang yi ge thams cad ni// yang dang yang du gsal byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dang // yang dang yang du rnam par 'don// 'jig rten kun tu de song ste// chos dbyings mnyam dang
211b4(rgyud): mi mnyam pa// yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba// rang gis 'gro ba rnam byas te// slar yang 'ongs nas rang gan das su// 'jug pa ru ni yongasu brtag/ de nas sgra dang yi
211b5(rgyud): ge ni blte bar song ste yongasu gnas// lte ba ru ni pad+ma ma chog/ pad+mar rdo rje dri med mdzes// de yi steng du dung chen po// rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas// de las 'bar ba'i rnam
211b6(rgyud): pa'i sgra 'brang gi gnas nas yongasu byung // slar yang mgrin par song nas su// rdo rje lce la yang dag reg/ 'gram pa sbyar ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med// kha
211b7(rgyud): ba ba zho ltar dkar 'od// bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra// rdo rje lce ni mtha' dag rnams// yang dang yang du gsal bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyi rtsar son te// slar yang snying kha
211b8(rgyud): nyid du song // thig le las ni gug skyed gyur// gu skyed ri mo ring po can// cha shas rnam bzhi 'dus pa las// de ni yi ger rnam par shes// yi ge las ni skra skye zhing // sgra las na/ 
212a1(rgyud): da de las dbyangs// dbyangs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur// yi ge las ni cha shas tshogs// tshig rkang dang ni ngag du 'gyur// tshig rkang las ni tshig bcad dang // de bzhin
212a2(rgyud): du ni gA thA dang // phreng 'dzin rgyun chags de bzhin te// 'di ltar sngags dang rig sngags dang // rang gi snying por rab tu 'gyur// de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor che// blo gros ldan pas brtan
212a3(rgyud): byas te// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya// bzlas pa 'di yis sbyor ba yi// thams cad du ni brtan par bya// yid bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub bo// 
212a4(rgyud): rmad byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'i// yang dag lha ni gzha na pa yi// ngag 'grub thams cad skyo ba rnams kyi// yi dge cig pa gsang chen po// ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog
212a5(rgyud): tu dge sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rang snying zla bar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de las
212a6(rgyud): bstan bcos thams cad ni// nges par gdon pa nyid du bya// ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'dis// thams cad mkhyen pa thob par byed// bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing // de
212a7(rgyud): nyid kyang ni 'chad par byed// sems can kun gyis thams cad du// dngos po cung zad gang bsams pa// de dag thams cad rnam shes te// skad cig tsam la smra bar byed// rdo rje snying po
212a8(rgyud): rgyan ces bya ba las ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
212b1(rgyud): thugs mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du
212b2(rgyud): gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gis de dag gis gsol ba btab pa/ nye bar gsan nas de de bzhino zhes bka' stsal nas/ de bzhin gsheg/ 
212b3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i
212b4(rgyud): thabs// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad rnam par bri// yang na ba cu drug rtsibs kyang bri// lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod// 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// mtha'
212b5(rgyud): ru rin chen rnam pa bdun// mkhas pa yis ni spel bar bya// de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni// 'khor lo sgyur ba stobs po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// chos kyi
212b6(rgyud): dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ de yi phyag rgya bgrang las 'das// skad cig ma ni nyid la 'thon// 'gro ba thams cad snang byas nas// sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gzhug/ 'khor
212b7(rgyud): le'i dngos grub gzi brjid che// 'khor los bsgyur bar bdag nyid 'gyur// chung dang tshe dang dbang phyug dang // rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang // kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// kun
212b8(rgyud): gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras// rga dang 'chi ba med thob cing // nges par 'khor los bsgyur dang mtshungs// gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che// de bzhin dngul dang shel nyid dang / 
213a1(rgyud): / me tog can gyis lcags kyang rung // rang gi lag gis bzung nas su// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// 'khor los bsdu
213a2(rgyud): ba gzi brjid che// mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par brgyan// de ltar bdag nyid bsgoms nas ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// de la de'i sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni// oM sarba ta/ 
213a3(rgyud): thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki ta/ mur+t+ti tsakra wan+ti dz+wa la dz+wa la d+hu na bi d+hu na tA sa ra ya mA ra ya/ uts+tsha Ta ya ha na b+hany+dzi pro khi ni kuN+Da la ni a ba rA dzi tAs+yA d+ha ri Ni/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i/ 
213a4(rgyud): sngags so// oM oM a pa rA dzi ta d+hi ka swA hA/ snying po'o// na maHsan+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti ha ta shA sa na a ba ra da dzi ta d+hi ka swA hA// mchog gi snying po'o// 'khor los
213a5(rgyud): bskur bar rab grub ster// sangs rgyas nyid ni thob nas ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// yang na dbang phyur gdam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad ster byed na// dngos
213a6(rgyud): grub gzhan lta spros ci dgos// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// na mkha' la ni yongasu sgom// gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs
213a7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad thob par 'gyur// gnyis su med 'byung sems kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad 'byung ba// de ni me yir shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de
213a8(rgyud): yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor los bsgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun// 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus
213b1(rgyud): gnas par// nyi ma re re'i bkra shis sgom// gzi brjid phung po sku chen po// sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan 'chang ba// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs dpa' bo ni// snang ba shar ba lta bur gnas// de yi
213b2(rgyud): phyag rgya rtag tu bsam// na mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// 'od zer phreng bas rnam par khyab// de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer sgom// sangs rgyas byang
213b3(rgyud): chub rab sgrub byed// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad
213b4(rgyud): nyid dag dang // rdo rje can kun nyid dang ni// gzi brjid mtsho ngag kun thob gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni// oM ta thA
213b5(rgyud): ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki te murti te/ te dzo rA si dz+wA la dz+wa la d+ha ka d+ha ka/ d+hA ra d+ha ra/ bi b+ha bi b+ha/ hUM hUM phaT phaT sA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngagaso// oM te dzo rA si sAhA/ snying po'o oM
213b6(rgyud): dz+wa la te dzo ra si hUM phaT swA hA// nye ba'i snying po'o// dge pa'i gsang sngags 'di rnams kyis// nyi ma'i ye shes rab tu gsal// kun tu 'gro ba 'grub par bya// rig pa 'dzin pa nyid
213b7(rgyud): thob 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs po che// gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing / 
213b8(rgyud): gtsug tor steng na 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya// kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM AHhUM/ gsang sngags rtse mo dam pa 'di// bsgoms btsam
214a1(rgyud): gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur// kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya
214a2(rgyud): legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor byed// 'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis// rnam pa bcu gnyis yongasu gnas/ 
214a3(rgyud): rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba// bya ba'i don du dag pa ste// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// na mkha'i khrugs na gnas pa ste// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par
214a4(rgyud): mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba da ni// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung ba// 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi
214a5(rgyud): sngags su gyur pa ni// oM d+hu na sa twa ya ts+tshin+da tsakra Na/ bar+d+hahUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchogs kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'char// skad cig tsam gyis
214a6(rgyud): thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni stobs ldan byed// chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thab so// chos kyi 'khor lo'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas sku gzugs legs 'bar ba// rnal 'byor sbyor
214a7(rgyud): ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// nyon mongs rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// snying nas rdo rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de yi snying la rdo rje me// dri ma med pa skyes par
214a8(rgyud): 'gyur// nyon mongs rtag rgyu yongs zad kyi// dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed// bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bden pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni oM kle sha oM sha ni
214b1(rgyud): d+hu baT/ 'din nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags// drag cing drag po'i gzhan gnon pa'o// sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed na// dngos grub gzhan la smos ci dgos// nyon mongs rdo rje srub pa'i thabs so// 
214b2(rgyud): dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs pa che// bdud bzhi las ni nas rgyal ba// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// bden pa bzhi yi khu chu
214b3(rgyud): che// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid// khu tshur sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan nyid do// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom par bya// rang nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes// ba
214b4(rgyud): dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes par// rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra b.ra'agyur// de la sngags su gyur pa ni// oM bi dza ye hAHde bzhin/ 
214b5(rgyud): gshegs pa'i khu tshur che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba/ sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms na ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thob// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
214b6(rgyud): khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// dngos grub las byung 'od gsal ba// gdod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su'o// rdo rje'i
214b7(rgyud): rdo rje'i bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig rten thams cad kyi// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du ni// 'jig rten kun gyi thams cad du// kun nas phun sum
214b8(rgyud): tshogs pa kun// bkug nas gus pas sbyin par bya// sngags ni oM dz+wa la dz+wa la dI pya dI pya ud ga toSh+NI Sha d+hu na d+hu na hUM/ snying 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes bya bar// sangs rgyas dpa' bo
215a1(rgyud): / kun gyi gsungs// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// sangs rgyas
215a2(rgyud): rang bzhin phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// tshud skyob gdugs dkar chen po na// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ 
215a3(rgyud): zla ba'i kha dog cher 'bar zhing // chu'i dkyil 'khor rnam dag pa// dri med pun da ri kar gnas// ri mo bdun gyis yongasu gang // bcud len lta bur bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba/ 
215a4(rgyud): yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams ca dad yongs rdzogs pa// 'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che// sngags ni oM ma ma ma ma hA ni// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam
215a5(rgyud): gyis ni/ ye shes tshe dang stobs mgyogs 'gro// dpa' gro// thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed/ dka' min// gdugs dkar po yi sgrub thabs// zla ba'i
215a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas par// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs ral gri ni// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos// nam
215a7(rgyud): mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang ba// bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor gcig tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge 'khor lo tshe// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// 
215a8(rgyud): sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags ni oM dz+wa la dz+wa loSh+NI Sho dz+wa la dz+wa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha da ma da ma dru ma dru ma da ha da ha na hUM/ rgyal bI gtsug tor ral gri che/ 
215b1(rgyud): shes rab ye shes dri ma med// sngags pas kun nas bsgoms nas ni// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab po// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba
215b2(rgyud): phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// seng ge'i khri yi steng du bsam// yang ni rdo rje'i gdan la gnas// kun tu gtsug tor cher 'bar ba// snying khar yongasu bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni
215b3(rgyud): yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// kun tu gtsug tor stobs po che// skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur te// rdo
215b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra ba/ d+ha hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso// sangs rgyas dathams cad dbang bskur byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bskum
215b5(rgyud): na// de ni kun gyi dbang bskuro// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i/ rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad / gtsug tor gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rim par phye ba yongasu rdzog so// 
215b6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rjernal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub
215b7(rgyud): sems dpa' rnams kyi gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa rgyas/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsal ba btab pa'i
215b8(rgyud): tshig gsan nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bka' stsal ba/ shes
216a1(rgyud): ye shes rdo rje che// snying khar yongasu bsgoms nas su// ral gri 'bar ba gzi brjid che// mtha' klas pa la rnam par gnas// 'jam dbyangs zhes bya bsgom par bya// 
216a2(rgyud): gur gum gyi ni rnam pa 'dra// gtsug na zur phud lnga ldan pa// gzhon nu byas pa'i gzugs can ni// mtha' yas rgyas pa'i rlabs che ba'i// rnam par 'phro ba lta bur gnas// ud pa la
216a3(rgyud): sngon po phyag na bsnams// dpa' chen dang ni me las 'khrungs// ye shes chen po gzi brjid che// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// sangs rgyas kun bdag shes rab mchog/ nyon mongs
216a4(rgyud): thams cad zad par byed// rdo rje kun bdag bkod pa po// kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don// dbyer med mchog tu da gsang ba po// rig pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di// zhal
216a5(rgyud): drug pa la phyag drug mchog/ mngon shes drug ldan yi ge drug/ rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya dam pa stobs po che// gzi brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang / 
216a6(rgyud): kun nas yongasu gsal ba po// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// na mkha'i khrums na rnam par gnas// yang na phyag gnyis shes par bya// ting 'dzin gnas sdig pa bcom// dpa' bo/ 
216a7(rgyud): pad+ma la gnas pa// zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che// rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes phra// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'bar// gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes bsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol/ 
216a8(rgyud): byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// de'i sngags ni/ oM bA kye daM na maHgsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang // gsang chen gyi ni dam
216b1(rgyud): par bzhed// rnam thar gsum gyi sgo mar gnas// pha rol phyin drug rab tu gsal// rang nyid shes rab yin shes// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te// sangs/ 
216b2(rgyud): rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor las// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ ston zla lta bur cher gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog/ stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis
216b3(rgyud): ni shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra zhing // dbang phyug thams cad mdun na gnas// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang // byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// 
216b4(rgyud): dbang phyug kun dang bde ba che// chos rnams kun gyi yon te na mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun tu 'gro ba thob 'grub na// dngos
216b5(rgyud): grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // rkang pas spyod pa de nyid mchog/ ril bu dang ni mi snang ba// thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur// dpal ldan
216b6(rgyud): 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni// chos kyi dung gi mchog las 'khrungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// 
216b7(rgyud): bsams pa'i phun sum tshegs kun gyis// sangs rgyas kun tu brtan 'gro na// gzhan pa'i lha lta smos ci dgos// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// snying khar pad+ma chen po la// zla ba'i
216b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yongasu gnas// 'jig rten dbang phyug dpa' bo che// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ chos kyi dbyings las
217a1(rgyud): yang dag byung // chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug lces// de la gnas pa dge bsgom// rang bzhin gyis ni 'di kun dag/ gdod nas ma skyes ma
217a2(rgyud): byung ba// gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni// snying khar yongasu bsgom par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lo tshe// kun tu rnam par 'gro ba yi// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs shing zhi/ 
217a3(rgyud): ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus dpa' bo che// 'od dpag med pa ldan pa'i bdag/ ston ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal// kun tu na mkha' yongs gang ba// gsang sngags sbyor
217a4(rgyud): bdag bsgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa// pad+ma'i lus kyi yang dengag gang // kun tu pad+ma rnams la ni// khams gsum rnam par
217a5(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sku// khyad par du dag dgang bar bya// 'gro ba ba rten dang g.yo ba kun// snang dang mi snang dngos po ni// yang dang yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sems
217a6(rgyud): la ni// stobs po ches ni dgang bar bya// rtsa don dbyibs ni 'di bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba// kun nas yongasu bsdus nas ni// sngags pa'i mdun du bzhag par bya// de
217a7(rgyud): nas sngags pas de ma thag/ slar yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po// bcom ldan rnal
217a8(rgyud): 'byor can grub na// dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing // rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams dang // rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang // rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster 'gyur// rig pa
217b1(rgyud): 'dzin dang 'khor lo can// sa dang pha rol phyin sogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni oM A ro li ka/ gsang sngags dpal/ 
217b2(rgyud): ldan mchog 'di ni// rang nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal// longs spyod thams cad bkug nas ni// skad cig tsam gyis rnam par ster// pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yi// bdag nyid 'jig rten dab
217b3(rgyud): phyug sgrub// 'jig rten gsum gyis rgyal rnams ni// srid pa bkug nas rnam par ster// 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thab so// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs// me yi dkyil 'khor
217b4(rgyud): dge ba ste// de yi dbus su bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor rlung dang / rab mtshungs pa// de yi dbus su de 'dra bsam// nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// 
217b5(rgyud): 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// tshangs pa 'i yul sa thams cad du// kun nas yongasu gsal bar byed
217b6(rgyud): hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa// zar ma yini me tog 'dra// 'bar ba dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'jigs// bskal pa'i
217b7(rgyud): mi dang 'dra bar gnas// zhal bzhi pa las mche ba bzhi// 'jigs pa'i dus kyi thal ba dra// dzA gi yi ge bzhi dang ldan// sprin 'khrugs pa dang rab tu 'dra// rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba// rnal 'byor
217b8(rgyud): pas ni rtag tu sgom// sngags kyi tshig ni// oM sum b+ha ni sam b+ha ni hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-id+ha d+hu/ gr-id+ha pa ya gr-id+ha pa ya dz+ra/ a na ya haM b+ha ga wAn/ 'drir dza tsu phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun
218a1(rgyud): mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs byed na// bud med gzhan lta spros ci dgos// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs// chung ma dang bcas/ 
218a2(rgyud): phyag rgyar bcas// de dag thams cad 'gugs byed na// sdug bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje'i gzugs rnyan snying khar sen// dbang po gnyis
218a3(rgyud): nin mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyi sngon du sgrub// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdo rje can 'grub 'gyur// rgyal po thams cad sbyin 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci
218a4(rgyud): dgos// sngags ni 'di oM Tak+ki dz+dza dzaHgsang sngags 'di/ yi sbyor ba yis// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// lod sa spyong ji snyed thams cad rnams// de snyed thams cad rnam
218a5(rgyud): par ster// rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o// dbang chen dkyil 'amal gnas pa'i// byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku/ snying khar rtsa zhing gzugs brnyan 'od// rdo rje 'bar ba'i
218a6(rgyud): phreng ba ldan// 'jig rten khams ni 'byam klas pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni// rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin dge/ gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar ba// 
218a7(rgyud): ral pa'i bor tshugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten che// dung dang kun da zla 'od bzang // bsgoms nas sems can thams cad la// brtan pa'i don du dbang bskur bya// yang na
218a8(rgyud): sems can thams cad la// bu gcig lta bur rnam par spro// bsgoms pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// gnyis med ma rgyal ba las rgyal// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // gnas sogs dbyi bas rnam
218b1(rgyud): par dbye/ byams pas kun tu rnam par spro// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar// shin tu dri ma med par gnas// ri rab lta bur brtan pa'i sems
218b2(rgyud): 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// de ltar sems ni brtan byas nas// mnyam med sems can kun dang mnyam// bdag nyid byams pa yin no zhes// dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin pa// cung
218b3(rgyud): zad yi zhing 'khyil ba'i sku// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen sems ni rnam dag pas// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom par bya// 'di'i gsang sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa ni// a
218b4(rgyud): a dzi tan+d+ha ya sarba satwa sa ya nu ga ta swA hA// gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// / chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab// byams pa'i
218b5(rgyud): thugs ni yid du'o// dang po'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// / sgrub pa'i thabs mchog bsgom par bya// oM mai tre/ ya tri/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis kyang // dga' ldan du
218b6(rgyud): ni gnas par 'gyur// sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag/ rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs// byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// 'di ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur// byams pa'i
218b7(rgyud): sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur// de mdun chos ni legs mnyan nas// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // dbang dang ting 'dzin thob nas ni// de ni byang chub sems
218b8(rgyud): dpar 'gyur// mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni// byams pa'i yid kyis thob par 'gyur// byams pa'i sgrub pa'i thab so// rang gi lus ni thams cad ni// na mkha' mtshungs pa
219a1(rgyud): nyid du skom// chos bdag med pas bskyed nas kyang // rang nyid na mkha'i snying por 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyar ba yis// mkha' mtshungs dpe las rnam par 'das// 
219a2(rgyud): nam mkha'i 'od zer gyur pa yis// rang gi sems can sems la spro// kun gyi sems las spros nas ni// slar yang rim gyis bsdu bar bya// na mkhar sa many+dza rA blta// rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya// 
219a3(rgyud): rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chen kha dog 'od po che// rgyan rnams kun gyis lus brgyan pa// lag na rin chen stobs po che// rin chen sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// na mkha'i
219a4(rgyud): dam pa 'grub pa yin// oM A ka sha gar+b+hA ya swA hA// na mkha'i snying po stobs po che// bcom ldan rnal 'byora'agrub par 'gyur// rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni// 
219a5(rgyud): ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos// dpa' bo sangs rgyas tha mas cad kyis// dngos grub ji snyed bka' stsal pa// rna mkha' snying po bsgrubs pa yis// de dag thams cad
219a6(rgyud): myur du ster// na mkha'i snying po sgrub pa'i thab so// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yis// kun tu bzang po'i 'od bzang ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// 
219a7(rgyud): sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dngos grub mchog ni theb par 'gyur// rang gi lus ni ji snyed pa'i// rang gi phra rab rdul rnams kyis// de dag thams cad mtshungs par bya// sangs rgyas
219a8(rgyud): sku yi sku nyid du// yang na ba spu'i khung rnams su// rang gi 'khor los yongs bskor nas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te// bdag ni kun tu bzang po zhes// yi ge lnga pa zhes bshad/ 
219b1(rgyud): 'di yi sngags chen bzla bar bya// yang na 'dir ni lha gzhan gyis// rtag tu sngags gyur pa'o// oM sa dzi kA ya swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po che gas zhing // gdod nas dag cing rang 'byung ba/ 
219b2(rgyud): grub pa gsang sngags 'di yis ni// de yi shes rab dri med cing // gzugs mdzes pa ni de dang mtshungs// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba// kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyuraro// kun tu
219b3(rgyud): bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// sgrib pa thams cad rnam sel ba// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang sngags
219b4(rgyud): 'di yi sbyor ba dang // bcud kyi len gyis bde blag tu// ring dpe nyid du mi thogs par// sgrib pa rnam sel mtshungs dpar 'gyur// oM sarba ni wa ra Na biSh+ka ma b+hi swAhA// oM nA
219b5(rgyud): sa ra ya swAhA// gtso bo gsang sngags 'di 'dzin la// rnamapar sel bar grags pa ste// thams cad sgom pa'isbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun gyi thams cad du// gdod nas
219b6(rgyud): skye med rang bzhin gyis// gdod nas dag cing 'gyur ba med// de ltar chos 'di shes nas ni// lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas// rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i// rjes rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub
219b7(rgyud): bya ud pa la sngon po'i 'dab ma ltar// gsal ba'i rnam par gnas pa'o// me yis yongasu bskor ba yis// phyag rgya ral gri gzi brjid che// yang nas yang du sems byed cing // dngos
219b8(rgyud): grub 'di ni gzi brjid che// rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni// mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/ thams cad nas ni stsol ba nyid// rnam par sel ba sgrub pa'i thab so// dbang
220a1(rgyud): chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rdo rje yi ni dbus na bzhugs// gser gyi mdog can sku chen po// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// snying khar dri yi phyag rgya gnas// mkha' snying
220a2(rgyud): zhes byar bdag nyid sgom// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// rang gi gsang sngags brjod par bya// mkha' snying zhes byar bdag bsgoms nas// sngags kyi yi ge mchog bde 'di// oM k+Shi ha rA
220a3(rgyud): sAhA bsam yas sngags mchog 'di yis ni// dngos grub thams cad rab gsal mdzad// sa yo snying po zhes grags pa// dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor pas// sa'i snying po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// thang
220a4(rgyud): pa med cing 'khrul pa med// zad med mchog gi shes rab can// / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// shes ba rdo rje'i bdag nyid dge/ blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba// 'bad/ 
220a5(rgyud): pa yis ni bsgom par bya// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs// rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu gsal// 
220a6(rgyud): sngags ni oM a kA ya ma ti swA hA// sngags kyi yi ge gsang ba 'di// thams cad blo gros gsal bar byed// ye shes mi zad 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub
220a7(rgyud): kun gyi mchog ces bya// shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta spos ci dgas// blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub thabs// kun nas shes rab/ 
220a8(rgyud): chen po can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten par// gser gyis kha dog gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtag tu bsam// re ba thams cad
220b1(rgyud): rdzogs par mdzad// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba// na mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes// lus ngag yid kyi thams cad du// thams cad rig pas brtan par bya// shin tu dri med byang chub sems// 
220b2(rgyud): rang snying me long lta bur bsam// de nas yi ge'i tshig bkod de// mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag/ mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang // yid
220b3(rgyud): bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing // de bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gis// nye bar 'khro ba thams cad 'bab// 'jig rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji snyed
220b4(rgyud): yod pa de dag kun// 'dir ni skad cig tsam nyid la// dngos dgrub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// oM ga ga na gnyu ga da swA hA// nam mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che// nor gyi rgyun gyi rab
220b5(rgyud): 'bebs pa// na mkha'i mdzod ni stobs po che// skad cig ma la byed par 'gyur// nam mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rin chen phung po
220b6(rgyud): char rab 'bebs// rin chen gzi brjid mchog tu rol// lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya// lag na rin chen phyag brkyang ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom
220b7(rgyud): par bya 'badag nyid rin chen zhes bya dang // rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzod// thams cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid// pri yang sku mdog sngo bsangs 'od// dbang chen dang ni me las byung / 
220b8(rgyud): phyag na rin chen cher gsal ba// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// oM rat+na pA Nir muHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// rab tu 'bad de bsgrubs nas ni// 'gro ba kun gyi
221a1(rgyud): lag tu ni// rin chen thams cad rab stsol byed// lag na rin po che bsgrub pa'i thab so// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems// bdud rtsi chu yis rab gang ba// stong gsum
221a2(rgyud): zhes ni bsam par bya// pad+ma gcig gi steng na gnas// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// chu lha yi ni gzugs na mchog/ de steng du yang gsang chen po// me yi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin// de yi// 
221a3(rgyud): steng du brtson 'grus che// rtse mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung // de yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa 'od gsal ba// de steng rtag tu bsam pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che// rgya
221a4(rgyud): mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs dba'i 'od// dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ rgyan rnams ka/ dan gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi lag na phyag rgya che// rdo rje
221a5(rgyud): steng du rab tu grags// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang / nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che// slar yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya// sngags ni oM
221a6(rgyud): sa ga ra ma ti sa ra swA hA// sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste// shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs nas ni// shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs// rang nyid
221a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs// thub rten 'jig rten dbang phyug rgya la// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la
221a8(rgyud): gnas pa'i// ud pal sngon po 'dab 'dra'i 'od// rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// ji snyed sa stengs mtha' dag tu// khyab la sdug cing mtho ba yis// 
221b1(rgyud): sra zhing snying po rnam dag pa'i// mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa'i// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni// chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa// bsam yas sa ni yang dag brnyes// in dra nI la mtshungs
221b2(rgyud): pa'i 'od// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// yi ge mchog ni steng du 'bar// thugs kyi rdo rje cher gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin// sngags ni oM badz+ra gar+b+ha hUM/ 'di ni sngags
221b3(rgyud): mchog gtso bo ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// ye shes yangs pa stsol mdzad cing // rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun// sangs rgyas nyid kyang stsol mdzad na// dngos grub gzhan lta/ 
221b4(rgyud): smos ci dgos// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya bsgrub par byed// bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// rdo rje snying po bzhin du gzhan/ 
221b5(rgyud): bdag gi rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob// des na rnam pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje snying pos yang dag byung // rdo rje snying
221b6(rgyud): po mkha' rdo rje// sbyin pa byed pa de yis sgrub// rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thab so// dbang chen me las yang dag byung // nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i 'od// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas pa yi// nyi ma'i
221b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po// 'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas// pad+ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can// phyag rgya de yi snying khar gnas// rin chen sbyor bas
221b8(rgyud): bsgom par bya// rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur// sngags ni oM rat+na kA ra hI rat+na nad da swA hA// rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal po 'di// mchog rnams kyi ni sa yi phyug/ sbyor ba kun gyis
222a1(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i zab so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sring po rgyan gyi rgyud las sangs rgyas
222a2(rgyud): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang
222a3(rgyud): tha ma med pa dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo bcom ldan 'das bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo
222a4(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba che ni bos de skad ces gsol ba bta/ ba ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba/ de las ches gsang ba bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang drag bshad
222a5(rgyud): bya ba khro bo yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ rlung khams rab tu ga sel ba la// me ni dbus nas dbu su'o// de yi dbus su rdo rje che// 'od zer lnga yi phreng bas mdzes// de yi mdun du
222a6(rgyud): bya ba yang // mdung rtse 'bar ba chen po yi// de yi g.yas kyi gdan la ni// rdo rje chen po 'bar phreng can// g.yon nyid du ni be con can// rig pa'i phreng bas rnam par spras// rgyab tu ral gri'i
222a7(rgyud): phyag rgya ni// rin chen 'bar bas rnam par rgyan// phyi ngos rnams su rnam khros pa'i// khro bo thams cad dgod par bya// de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang // gsang chen mchog tu 'bar ba'o// gzhal
222a8(rgyud): du med cing grangs med mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis
222b1(rgyud): narnam par rgyan// de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni// dbyangs bdun pa ni bshad pa yin// he ruka dpal rdo rje che// 'jigs pa'i bskul ba can thal bas// sems dpa' sngon po 'bar ba'i bdag/ 'ab
222b2(rgyud): pame yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan gyis// char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'bar ba kun gyis rnam par rgyan// dur khrod ma bzhin
222b3(rgyud): shin tu yang // gsal ba'i sgra ldan stobs po che// rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba// thod pa'i cod pan steng du 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus mtshan gyis// rgod ma kha yi me ltar gnas// 
222b4(rgyud): smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// khro bo la sogs nyams dang ldan// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrug pa'i gdong // gar
222b5(rgyud): dang sdud par yang dag ldan// 'jig rten snang ba'i gar mdzad/ pa// phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan// gcig tu gyur// cing rnam pa mang // rnam mang zhal ldan de dag gi/ sngo ser
222b6(rgyud): la sogs tha dad ldan// zhabs kyang rnam padum ldan// sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor to// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che// shin tu gdug cing drag
222b7(rgyud): rnams la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes byar gnas// phyag drug zhabs drug snang ba can// zhal drug pa ste gsus po che// char sprin mchog 'dra cher gnas pa// dus mtha'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// 
222b8(rgyud): mdog chen rgyal po 'khyil ba 'dra// zar ma ya~M ni me tog mtshungs// khro bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // gshin rje'i mthar mdzad stobs po che// de la sngags kyang oM AHhUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma
223a1(rgyud): zan g+hu phaT/ oM hrISh+T+r-iH bi kr-i tA nan d+hu sarba sha dz+nyAn na shA ya stAm+b+ha ya hUM phaT/ sngags kyi rgyal po'i bdag nyid 'di// khyab bdag gdul dka' 'dul ba bo// gshin rje mthar
223a2(rgyud): mdzad khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren cing // dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rtag tu gdul dka' 'dul mdzad cing // rdo rje snang
223a3(rgyud): mdzad legs par 'dul// shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la// zhi ba'i nye bar mi sbyar te// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad// thugs rjes khro
223a4(rgyud): bo'i ngang tshul can// 'jig rten gsum kyang nges sreg mdzad/ dade bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog/ 
223a5(rgyud): gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed// gshin rje mthar byed kyi sgra kha pa'i thab so// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// bo gzegs ma zhes su grags// rin chen 'bar ba'i
223a6(rgyud): khro bo che// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra// ud pa la sngon po'i mdab ma bzhin// de yi kha dog rnam par gsal// drag po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od
223a7(rgyud): spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bsnyer// phyag drug pa la mchog tu 'bar// me yi khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ li khri'i mdog ltar shin tu dmar// de yis khro gnyer bsnyer ba yis// gdug pa
223a8(rgyud): 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// ma lus pa rnams thams cad du// son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des// 'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed
223b1(rgyud): na skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni oM ka Ni ka Ni dz+nyA phaT// khro bo 'di yi sngags 'dzin pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che// sa rnams thams cad sreg byed na// skye ba
223b2(rgyud): gzhan lta smos ci dgos// khro bo gzegs ma sgrub pa'i thab so// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug gyur// rta mgrin zhes
223b3(rgyud): bshad pa yin// rtag tu 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba// rgya skyegs mdog ltar dmar ba'o// chu dang gzi brjid can reg pa// me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan// 'dod ldan rnams la gdod
223b4(rgyud): pa 'byung // gdug pa can rnams gdug pa 'byung // zhi ba la yang zhi ba 'byung // stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyi sa sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bsam
223b5(rgyud): gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan// phyag bzhi pa la brtson 'gru/ sa che// seng ge ltar gnas mche ba bzhi// rta mgrin/ rgyal po chen po ni// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub
223b6(rgyud): par bya/ skad cig nyid la gnas nas ni// thams cad lhung ba bsgrub par bya// sngags ni oM a mr-i tod+b+ha bod b+ha be hUM phaT/ oM a mri tod b+ha ba hUM phaT/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor
223b7(rgyud): ba yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar// khro bo'i skyil dkrung byas nas ni// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu mnyes// pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po 'di// sa yi dbang phyug kun gyi mchog/ rta
223b8(rgyud): yi mgrin pa stobs po che// stobs kyi sbyor ba bsgrub par bya// dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang // mi dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams
224a1(rgyud): thams cad dgug par bya// rta mgrin gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor de// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur// khro bo mchog
224a2(rgyud): tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes khro ba'i dbang du song // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni// g.yo ba med par bsam par bya// slob
224a3(rgyud): dpon mi g.yo khro bo che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan// ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa gsang // thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ pr-i yang ku ru sngo ba'i gzugs// 'khrigs shing
224a4(rgyud): byis pa lta bur gnas// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// khro bo mang dag pa bran dang ni// pho nyas kyang ni rnam par rgyan// skye bo kun
224a5(rgyud): gyis yongasu gang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan snga na// bka lung yang ni yongasu stsol// sngags ni/ na maHsa man+ta badz+ra NAM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ tra ka tsA ma/ khro bo ga
224a6(rgyud): brjid chen po 'di// gzugs mang mda' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rlung dang me las yang dag byung // 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi
224a7(rgyud): brjid can// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhin no// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed// de la sogs pa mtha' yas
224a8(rgyud): mchog nam mkha'i khams kyis mtha' klas mchog/ khro bo'i phyag rgya rang byung ba// drag po thog ma tha ma med// rnam par 'phro ba bzhin du gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
224b1(rgyud): snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yong su rdzog so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan
224b2(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed
224b3(rgyud): par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi
224b4(rgyud): ga rta babs kyi ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag/  ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// de yi de dbus su pad chen po// lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes// nyi
224b5(rgyud): shu rtsa lnga'i 'dab ma ldan// rdo rje rin chen legs par rgyan/ de yi dbus su rtag bri ba// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sna tshogs las ni/ 
224b6(rgyud): 'bar rnams la// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri// shar gyi 'dab ma nas brtsams te// thog mtha' nyid kyang brtag par bya// phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs par// go rims// 
224b7(rgyud): bzhin du rnam par dgod// phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis// kha dog dbye ba thams cad du// rnam dbye mchog tu sna tshogs pa// chos nyid mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de las 'od zer bsam mi khyab// / 
224b8(rgyud): sngo ser la sogs dbye ba yis// shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'gro ba thams cad gsal bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi ni gzugs ji bzhin// shes rab
225a1(rgyud): / chen po gzugs chen po// 'bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rten// sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra// rgyan rnams
225a2(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rang gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs// du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan ma// shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni// sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad// kun nas sems can rnams kyi
225a3(rgyud): yum / sems can kun gyi thams cad du// thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab// sems kyi rgyun bzhin legs par bzhugs// zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab// dri ma med cing ngang gis stong // 
225a4(rgyud): namakha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// dngos dang dngos med rnam par/ spangs// thog ma tha ma med cing ni// chos rnams kun gyi/ dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bden
225a5(rgyud): ba gnyis la rnam par gnas// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don/ chos kyi sku ru de bshad// dbang po kun kyang rnam par shesas// sems dang thams cad thams cad du// yid kyi rnam
225a6(rgyud): shes zhes su bshad// shes rab blo dang blo gros dran// lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs mi mthun phyogs// rtag dang chad pa'i mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par
225a7(rgyud): spangs// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// rnam pa gnyisu de rab brtags// ji ltar bud shing la brtan nas// ma yi sa bon gnas pa dang // til la til mar ji bzhin no// bur shing ro bzhin rab tu
225a8(rgyud): brtag/ me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam// zho la mar sar ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yi ye shes srub// bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po 'byung // gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan las// ji bzhin gtsubs pas
225b1(rgyud): me 'byung ste// de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas// bsrubs pas yongasu brtag par bya// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la// yang nas yang du bsrub par bya// mun pa thams cad rnam sel
225b2(rgyud): ba'i nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhi bdag/ na mkha' dri ma med brten nas// nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin gnas// 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa// 'bar ba stong phrag gi ni snod// mun pa kun 'joms skar
225b3(rgyud): ma la// kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems// mkha' bzhin shin tu dri ma med// gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun// der
225b4(rgyud): gnas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa de'i 'od// shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms te// gas sngags 'di ni bsam par bya// rang bzhin gyis ni dag
225b5(rgyud): pa'i dngos// rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas// rang bzhi na gyis ni 'od gsal kun// gdod nas ma skyes rla ga pa med// yi ge de nyid de lta bu// gnas dang mi gnas
225b6(rgyud): rnam par spangs// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// mo d+hos / mo swahA/ oM shru rtaH
225b7(rgyud): ti bi dza ye swA hA Ta sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed// 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// de nyid 'khor los rnam par bsgyur// 'dis ni
225b8(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad dang // grub pa nyid ni byed par gnas// bstan bcos rab tu 'chang byed dang // shes bya thams cad khyad par du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun// dbang phyug
226a1(rgyud): dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// shes rab pha rol phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam// gser gyi mdog can
226a2(rgyud): 'bar ba can// zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya// sngags kyi yi ge rnam par rgyan// mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// sangs rgyas spyan
226a3(rgyud): zhes btags pa yis// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya// nyon cig sa rnams 'dod pa rnams// sngags ni oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sar+b+ba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swAhA/ 'di de mchog tu gsang
226a4(rgyud): ba ni/ rnal 'byor ma la mchod du bshad// dam chen yi ge'i da mthar thug pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu ster// chos dkyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du
226a5(rgyud): byed// dpung dang bcas pa myur bkug ste// bran du gyur nas nye ba ra gnas// phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che// rol cing g.ya ba'i zhal mnga' ba// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// 
226a6(rgyud): rol cing snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// 'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do// sangs rgyas spyan gyi
226a7(rgyud): phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thab so// chu yi dkyil 'khor dges pa na// bcud kyis len dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i mkha' la gnas// dkyil
226a8(rgyud): 'khor de yi dbusasu ni// lha mo mchog tu mdzes pa mo// 'dam bu 'da' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// grub ma ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma// rtag tu na mkha' bzhin
226b1(rgyud): du gnas sngags ni/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ka Ta ka Te swA hA// gos dkar mo yi phyag rgya che// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang
226b2(rgyud): mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya// dam pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan// zhi bar mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum
226b3(rgyud): sgrub par byed pa'i thabs// gos dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thab so// sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sgeg pa'i
226b4(rgyud): nyams kyis yongs gang ba// 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad ma/ thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can// rab tu 'bad de ba sgrub par bya// rol pa yi ni yi ges mchod// sngags ni/ oM
226b5(rgyud): tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya mtha' yas mchog/ sgrol mas legs par rnam par gnas gsang chen pa/ zhin du thams cad la// bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i
226b6(rgyud): mchog/ kun tu kun tu thams cad du// dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog/ phyag
226b7(rgyud): bzhi spyan ni gsum pa dang // ral pa'i cod pan dag gis brgyan// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis rgyan// brtson 'grus chen mo 'jigs sel ma// 
226b8(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rab tu 'bar ba'i me bzhin du// shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjid can// hUM gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra// sa gsum po ni 'khrug par mdzad// khro gnyer/ 
227a1(rgyud): can zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par rgyan// sngags ni/ oM b+ha ya nA sha ni/ trAs ni tra sa na trA sa yA/ b+h+r-i ku Ti ta Da be ta be ra Di shwe ta dzi Ti ni/ oM Tak+ka
227a2(rgyud): hUM dzaHswA hA/ gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// gsang sngags kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro ba kun kyang mgu byed na// gdug pa'i sems lta smos ci dgos// khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i
227a3(rgyud): thabaso na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje ldan// rdo rje'i phreng bas yongasu bskor// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris// der gnas rtag tu lha mo na// stobs/ 
227a4(rgyud): chen pr-i yang ku ltar ljang // phyag bzhi pa der bsam par bya// rgyan rnams kun gyi rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams cher rang zhi ba// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ma// sngags kyi
227a5(rgyud): yi ge phreng ba che// rdo rje'i dbus song rab tu gnas// khro bo hUM mdzadagang pa'i mtha'// dpa' ba'i nyams la sogs paraldan// lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed// dngos
227a6(rgyud): grub chen po rab stsol ma// skad cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kun// nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur// rdo rje'i rlung gi phreng ba che// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gnas// 'jigs pa chen po'i me
227a7(rgyud): ltar drag/ snang ba chen po stobs po che// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par rgyan// mtshan ni mA ma kI zhes bya// lha mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni aM/ 
227a8(rgyud): ku la d+hU tI ye na ma shakare shIts+tsha/ Shag+huD+D+h+ya g+huD+D+h+ya g+ha ta ya g+huT+Ta ni/ g+ha ta ya g+huT+Ti swA hA/ oM ku lan+d+ha ri/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha hUM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog/ gsang sngags kun gyis gsungs/ 
227b1(rgyud): pa yin pas gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed la// rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin// mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thab so// rlung / 
227b2(rgyud): gi dkyil 'khor drug po la// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor// de yi dbus snang ba che// zla ba'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyan// de spros pa las bdag nyid ni// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi/ 
227b3(rgyud): ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yin rgyun gyis brgyan// dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni// sa gsum po ni 'tshang bar mdzad// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bkug nas dbang du mdzad par gnas// 
227b4(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang // de yi thugs kar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi 'bar ba da lcags sgrog gi/ rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan// 
227b5(rgyud): nges par phyung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi ma nyam pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag tu// kun nas rnam par bkang nas kyang // bsgom bya rdo rje thams
227b6(rgyud): cad du// khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i zhal// lte ba 'phyang zhing sku che ba// mche ba bzhi yis rnam par rgyan// 'bar ba yin phreng ba gsal// gzugs mdzes drag po'i gzugs dang ldan// 
227b7(rgyud): sngags ni/ oM badz+ra shri kha lA ya d+hi pa ta ye/ ma hA ba lA ya/ ma hA bid+hA ra dzA ya te pra dzA li ta/ hastA ya na mo nI la kar+N+Na ya ki rA ta rU pa la bo da rA ya/ b+hU b+h+r-i ku TI mu khA ya/ mA dzA ra mu kha
227b8(rgyud): la tsa tur raT+Ta ka rA lA ya/ e h+ye haM a s+ya ra sha ri ra/ ma nu pra wi sh+ya shi ra gr-ih+Na/ gr-I ba gr-ih+Na/ has+t+ra pAM daM gr-ih+Na bi Sha/ A be shA ya/ ka~M pA ya kaM pA ya/ b+h+r-i ma b+h+ra mA ya/ maN+Da la ma d+h+ye/ 
228a1(rgyud): kurba bi kurba/ tsUr+d+ha tsUr+N+Na/ kun+d+ha kun+d+ha/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ marmA Ni ni kr-in+ta ya/ hr-i da ya/ ts+tshin+da/ ba la ba la/ kany+tsi rA ya si/ de ba nA ga/ yak+ShA/ rak+Sha sa/ pi shA tsa tsan+da ya/ sa ma
228a2(rgyud): ya ma nu sma ra/ dzA ti ma nu sma ra hA hA/ ni d+hi ni d+hi/ ni Shi ni Shi/ badz+ra shaM ka la/ adz+nyA pA ya ti swA hA// oM badz+ra ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra Ni hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kA li hUM phaT swA hA// gsang sngags 'di yi/ 
228a3(rgyud): sbyor ba yis// bcud kyis len ni bde ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs pa dang // gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs lha rnams dang // lha dang lha min lto 'phye che// 'jig
228a4(rgyud): rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang // rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni// / grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// thams cad gus pas sbyin par byed// 
228a5(rgyud): bud med gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya// rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gan sa par// pad+ma dmar pos rab tu gnas// phyag bzhi pa la
228a6(rgyud): du ma'i gzugs// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// zhi ba'i la sogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyis bdag skyes mchog
228a7(rgyud): rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu skem// sangs rgyas mtha' las yang dag 'byung // der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni// bskul byed ma zhes yongasu grags// sngags kyi phreng ba'i yi ge ni// 
228a8(rgyud): kun nas 'phro ba mu tig 'dra// na mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba// ji srid de yi spyod yul yang // de srid de yi 'od zer sgom// rnal 'byor ye shes kyis rab sprul// sngags ni/ 
228b1(rgyud): oM tsa le tsu le tsun+da swAhA// 'di yi sngags kyi mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas kun gyis mchod pa po// mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster// lha dang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yis sdig kun mdzad/ 
228b2(rgyud): byed cing // phun sum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas nyid kyang sbyin par mdzad// bskur byed ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa ni// 
228b3(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// sangs rgyas
228b4(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// 2 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmi dgas par mi 'gyuraro// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni
228b5(rgyud): gnyis med theg pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad la// bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags// rang bzhin nyid kyi/ de grub pa// nus pa yis ni rang bzhin gyis// 'jig rten gsu
228b6(rgyud): gyi bud med 'di// bkur bar bya bar 'os pa yin// ngan spong rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste// rnyed pa kun dang bde dang spro// thams cad bud med sgyu mas 'grub// rang gi ngo bo yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs
228b7(rgyud): sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'di// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// 
228b8(rgyud): kun la kun nas thams cad du// kun tu kun nas rang nyid kyis// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan dang g.yo// thams cad dngos po rang nyid 'gyur// sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang // bya
229a1(rgyud): chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// sa dang pha rol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du yang de bshad// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// thog ma
229a2(rgyud): tha ma med zhi ba// byang chub sangs rgyas bcom ldan de'o// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// ral gri ral gri
229a3(rgyud): 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni// 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// de nyid chags dang chags bral ba// 'dod dang thar pa ru yang
229a4(rgyud): 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// brtan pa thams cad de/ nyid de// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// g.yo ba kun nas sna
229a5(rgyud): tshegs pa// thams cad du ni de 'gyuraro// de la sogs pa sna tshog sa mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam kha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// dngos po kun tu de 'gyuraro// de
229a6(rgyud): nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhon gshegs// dpal ldan sgyu ma chen po 'chang // rnam snang rtag
229a7(rgyud): pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod// tshe dang ni chen 'byung stobs che// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog/ don yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang // 
229a8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' lta na sdug/ dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang // legs par mdzad pa de nyid yin// rin chen sgren ma de bzhin rtog/ rdo rje bzhad pa snang ba che// rdo rje chos dang rno ba che// rgyu dang smra
229b1(rgyud): mchog bdud rtsi dang // las dang go cha gnod sbyin che// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs pa kun// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' stobs po che// rdo rje hUM mdzad du mdzad dang // rta mgrin
229b2(rgyud): zhes ni rnam par grags// he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// mchog gi gshin rje gshin rje gshed// khro bo gzegs ma snang ba che// rdo rje me ni 'od chen po// gzugs rnams kyi ni mchog cig tu// ting nge 'dzin
229b3(rgyud): las dbang sgyur ma// shes rab pha rol phyin pa gtso// sa dang pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// tshangs pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi// dbang ni mchog du 'bar ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// 
229b4(rgyud): dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drug por gyur dpa dang // bsgom par bya ba rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom da ldan gcig pu ste// byang chub yan lag bdun brtags pa// 
229b5(rgyud): mtha' gcig yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i lam po che// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad brtags pa// stobs
229b6(rgyud): bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni// dgu la gnas
229b7(rgyud): par 'gyur ba dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis// sems can bsdu bas sdud pa dang // so so yang dag rig pa bzhi// de bzhi srung ba mi mnga' ba// skal chen po'i mi 'jigs pa// 
229b8(rgyud): mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis// tshad med pa yang de bzhin no// byang chub kyi ni skye mchog gtso// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// nyon mongs
230a1(rgyud): can gyi mi mthun phyogs// zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug dang // skye dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon
230a2(rgyud): mchog gi bdag nyid dbyangs bdag po// kun rdzob brjod pa thams cad dang // sgra rnams kyis ni spyod yul 'gyur// brjod du med cing spros pa bral// stong pa mkha' mnyam mtshungs pa med// tshig mtha'
230a3(rgyud): sgra yi rnam dgod pa// 'jig rten tha snyad tshul du gtogs// de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyi ni yongasu brtags// sku ni sprul pa nyid du 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dag
230a4(rgyud): brnyes// rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du// ye shes sku sogs yod dasu brtags// mtha' yas sku dang sku chen po// rin chen sku ni 'od byed pa// pad+ma'i sku ni snang ba che// thams cad sku ni las
230a5(rgyud): bzang byed// rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// byang chub sems ni 'od gsal ba// kun tu 'od kyi sa chen
230a6(rgyud): po/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya// zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba// gsum pa na mkha' 'od ces bya// mkha' bzhin legs par rab tu gnas// 
230a7(rgyud): rdo rje'i 'od mtha' gang zhig sa// bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba// bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje zhes ni yongasu bsgrags// lnga pa'i rin chen 'od ces bya// dbang bskur ba ni rab tu/ 
230a8(rgyud): gnas// drug pa pad+mo 'chang zhes bya// pang bzhin rab tu rnam par snang // rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ bdag gi med cing yongs bzung med// bdun pa las kyi sa zhes bya// sangs
230b1(rgyud): rgyas phrin las mdzad pa che// brgyad pa dpe med pa zhes bya// dpe ni de la yod ma yin// dgu pa de ba dang bral zhes bya// dpe rnams thams cad rab 'jug pa// bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya// 
230b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas sa ni bla na med// bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya// sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba// bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa// rnal 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po ni
230b3(rgyud): 'di dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa// thams cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings
230b4(rgyud): mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las sngags kyi de kho na nyid do// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de
230b5(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po ba skor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba
230b6(rgyud): btab pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa
230b7(rgyud): nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag pa'i de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rjesu bcug nas bcom
230b8(rgyud): ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas mnyam par bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
231a1(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas ting 'dzin las gzhengs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam
231a2(rgyud): dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to// 
231a3(rgyud): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis stan las langs te// bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan
231a4(rgyud): sngar dbus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
231a5(rgyud): pa dang thabs kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas sems can rnams thabs chung ngus de bzhin gshegs pa
231a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka'
231a7(rgyud): stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod gang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig la rjesu zhugs pa ni 'jam dpal khyod legs leg so// de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig
231a8(rgyud): dang theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
231b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rjes byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor
231b2(rgyud): 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dam tshig chen po rdo rje mchog/ snying po chen po'i rgyan ces bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs
231b3(rgyud): bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rdo rje snying po yongs bcug pa// byang chub shing gis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje dkyil
231b4(rgyud): 'khor grwa rnams dang // sgo yi logs kyi mtshams nga rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje pad+ma tha mas cad du// las kyi rdo rje thams cad du// 'bar ba'i phreng ba
231b5(rgyud): 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dril bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan sgreng ba rlung bskyod pa'i// gos dang nga me tog chun pos spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// ral
231b6(rgyud): gri lta bur ud pa la// lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs rgyan// chu yis dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba// mu khyud bzhin du rnam par gnas// de la'ang sgo logs la sogs pa// mkhas
231b7(rgyud): pa yis ni spro bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba// 'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas// cha brgyad dang ni yongasu ldan// dkyil 'khor legs pa rnam par spras// rdo rje'i thig dang yongasu ldan// rdo rje'i
231b8(rgyud): 'khor lo cher 'bar ba// de yi dbus snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po zhes bshad// de yi steng du rdo rje che// rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dag gis
232a1(rgyud): rgyanadung dang kun da zla ba dkar// sangs rgyas kun gyi gdan du bshad// de yi steng du legs bzhugs pa// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum
232a2(rgyud): bcas pa// ting 'dzin ldan ni sdig pa bcom// rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par spras// sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rin chen chen po'i phreng ba ches// spras pa rnam par dgod par bya// 
232a3(rgyud): de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba// yi ge yi ni mchog gtso bo// sa yi steng dang ldan pa g.yas// mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig po// drug pa'i dbyangs kyi legs gsal ba// thig le nA ngas
232a4(rgyud): legs par rgyan// rten cing 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yis// / don can rab tu bskyed par bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor can// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// chos kyi sku ni/ 
232a5(rgyud): ye shes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs dbang
232a6(rgyud): gi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ bcon
232a7(rgyud): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do// dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa// me yi dkyil 'khor ye
232a8(rgyud): shes 'od// chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med// rdo rjes rnam gnon rlung dkyil 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las 'byung
232b1(rgyud): ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs/ 
232b2(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi snying po 'di nyid kyi thugs kha nas phyung ba'o// oM badz+ra satwa/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas
232b3(rgyud): rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams phyung ste/ rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te gsal bar gyur nas/ de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten
232b4(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnamasu gshegs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang
232b5(rgyud): par mdzad de/ sems can thams cad kyi don mngon par rdzo// gas nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub so// mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur
232b6(rgyud): gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa/ e ma ho rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas ye shes
232b7(rgyud): bla na med// snying po ye shes rnam dag pa// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems ni brtan bskyed de// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang // 
232b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to// de nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kha nas 'thon nas/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad
233a1(rgyud): rnam pa bzhis phye ste/ dkar po ser po/ dmar po/ ljang ku'i mdog du mngon par sprul nas/ rang gi sngags kyi yi ges zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te gnas par gyur to// 
233a2(rgyud): dgug pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rA dza/ rjesu chags pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rA ga/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs par mdzad pa'i ting 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra sa d+hu/ de bzhin
233a3(rgyud): du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi dkyil 'khor la dbang bskur ba ting 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra rat+na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra te dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam
233a4(rgyud): mkha' mdzod kyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ke tu/ de bzhin ga/ shegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ti 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ha sa/ de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med
233a5(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM ba dz+ra d+harma/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting 'a/ dzin ni/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i
233a6(rgyud): ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra he tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting 'dzin no/ oM badz+ra b+hA Sha/ de bzhin du rdo rje don yong po'i dkyil 'khor la/ las sna
233a7(rgyud): tshogs pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra kar+m+ma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra
233a8(rgyud): yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur bcangs pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra san+d+hi/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad/ de
233b1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje'i dbyings kyis byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs kha nas 'di phyu // oM badz+ra
233b2(rgyud): d+hA tu hUM/ rang gi rig pa mchog ni/ oM badz+ra d+hA tI shwa ri hUMHbadz+ri Ni/ de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes
233b3(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyi kyi thugs kha nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di phyung ba// oM a k+Sho b+h+yaHAHoM dz+nyA na muSh+Ti
233b4(rgyud): tsit+ta badz+ra Ni hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zer gyis de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshi dag gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyi rlob pa
233b5(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thu gas kha nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra rat+na saM b+ha ba trAM/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na gar b+ha ti hUM/ 
233b6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin
233b7(rgyud): la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs kha nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mi tA b+hU hrIHoM badz+ra d+hA ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gnon
233b8(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi
234a1(rgyud): rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a.aM/ oM badz+ra ma hA ba le hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad yul la rnam
234a2(rgyud): par gzigs shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ma hA dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
234a3(rgyud): cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
234a4(rgyud): kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spro das pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ra sa ma tA dzA dan bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs
234a5(rgyud): ba thams cad kyi snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong bar 'gyuraro// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kha nas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung // oM
234a6(rgyud): sar+b+ba d+harma sa ma ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs khar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis
234a7(rgyud): brlabs par mdzad nas/ dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod par mthong // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi thugs kha nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam
234a8(rgyud): pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung // oM sar+b+ba sa twa sa ma tA pra pany+tsa bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gsheg pa zad kyi thugs kha nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung ste slar yang de bzhin
234b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga na gnas nas bka' nod cing 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
234b2(rgyud): cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis rlob par byos shig/ de de bzhino zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas dkyil
234b3(rgyud): 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlobs te brtan par gyur nas rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha mo de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grwa rnams de bzhin du rnam par gnas
234b4(rgyud): sgo rnamasu ske srung ma rnams dang / mtshams rnam su gzugs dang / s+tha dang / dr-i dang / ro dang / reg bya rnams bshad// de dag gi sngagasu gyur pa ni/ oM badz+ra me g+he Ta~M Te/ 'khor
234b5(rgyud): lo'i mtshams gzhag par bya'o// oM swA ha badz+re Ni haM/ oM badz+ra sha rang badz+ra a aM/ oM badz+ri Ni kI li kI li hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i
234b6(rgyud): mchod pa phyi'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa dang / mtshams rnams dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas par dgod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM ma d+hu badz+ri/ 
234b7(rgyud): ni hUM/ g+hu g+h+r-i/ oM mnod b+ha ba badz+ri Ni hI/ oM badz+ra shi shi re he ho// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha mo'i mtshams rnamasu gzugs la sogs pa'i e badz+ra drA pe/ 
234b8(rgyud): oM badz+ra shak+She/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he/ oM badz+ra ra se/ oM badz+ra s+phar she/ mnyes par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' bde rdo rje'i snying po ni/ oM sa ma ya hoHsu ra ta s+thA/ 
235a1(rgyud): dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje'i snying po 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pas dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas dngos grub thams cad
235a2(rgyud): stsol bar mdzod// dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang // ji bzhin gnas sbyar ba nyid// kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin dge/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang / 
235a3(rgyud): oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan badz+ra a ku sha dzaHoM pra be sha hUM/ sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta/ oM sa ma ye ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wan/ oM tu Sh+yo hoHb+ha ga wan badz+ra A be sha aH'di dag ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi/ 
235a4(rgyud): sgo'i phrin la so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la byams dpa dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems
