235a5(rgyud): dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshad pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho gas slob ma bcug te dbang ba skur ba la sogs pa byas slob ma dang bcas pas thabs gcig
235a6(rgyud): tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la nye bar mkho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dang po kho nar re shig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig thams cad shes pa/ 
235a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos dngos grub thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa/ dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa/ rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu/ 
235a8(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya la bslab par bya'o// de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcing bar 'gyur ba ni skyil dkrung
235b1(rgyud): bcas nas dri la sogs pa rnams kyis phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu bsgrub par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pa byas te sor mo phan tshun bcings nas skyil dkrung kyi dbusu rdo rje bsdams pa
235b2(rgyud): bzhag pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi sbyor bso// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid de rked pa'i phyogasu bzung ba ni/ rdo rje sems
235b3(rgyud): dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ba ni rdo rje'i rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mnga' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mnga'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid las legs
235b4(rgyud): so ba sbyin pas rgyab du 'jog pa ni/ rdo rje legs pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni rdo rje rin chen gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje
235b5(rgyud): bsdams pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma/ 'i 'od kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar/ ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// kha'i thad du bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhad
235b6(rgyud): pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid kha'i thad du bskor ba na rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'khor lo ltar yongasu bskor ba ni rdo rje rgyu
235b7(rgyud): phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar sgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis spyi bo dang snying kha dang
235b8(rgyud): mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa 'gram pa gnyisu 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying khar bcangs pa ni rdo rje
236a1(rgyud): chur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sgeg mo dang / bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rol cing rnam par dgod pa dang / sgeg
236a2(rgyud): dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang // dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid// rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams// phyag rgya thams cad rab tu sbyar// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gar
236a3(rgyud): byed dam// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu sbyar// thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis// skyil dkrung sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// de phyir gnyis med rdo rje can// 
236a4(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku// sgeg pa'i sbyor ba'i rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi zhi ba spyan// snyems bcas rdo rje can gyi sa dgongs// sangs rgyas rnams dang rdo rje can// ting 'dzin dbye ba
236a5(rgyud): las shes bya// 'khrugs pa'i lta stangs khro rnams kyi// btsun/ mo rnams kyi rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // bsdigs spyod rnams kyis lta stangs te// chos rnams
236a6(rgyud): kun gyi rjes 'jug pa'i// shugs kyi lta stangs phyag rgya'o// tshogs dang po nya pho nya mo'i// lta stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// mchu yi phyag rgya yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba// 
236a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// mtshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan// rnam 'gyur med cing mtshungs med gnas// rol pa'i yi ge yang dag ldan// mchu
236a8(rgyud): yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can// khro bas su ni yongasu bsdams// 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad// mchu yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can// 'jig rten pa rnams mchu'i/ 
236b1(rgyud): phyag rgya rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu gnag dka'i 'dod chags dang // sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du// rol cing rnal 'byor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang // 
236b2(rgyud): mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya// lha mo pho nya tshogs kyi yang // de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ lta stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming // phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdu ba// skyob pa rnams kyi kun
236b3(rgyud): shes bya 'ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang // dbang po la sogs rab dbye dang // de dag phyag rgya sna tshogs mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che// tshad med yon tan
236b4(rgyud): 'byung ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sa ngas rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// rdo rje snying po rgya rgyud chen dpo las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i
236b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po yongasu rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yangade bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid dpung
236b6(rgyud): bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes
236b7(rgyud): par bya ba sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/ dar dang me tog chun pos rgyan// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+mo de bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// sangs rgyas
236b8(rgyud): sku gzugs yid 'ong ba// mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'bar ba mchog gis rgyan pa po// de sngags rtagasu shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o// de yi nye 'khor brgyad du ni// 
237a1(rgyud): 'gram du rtsibs brgyad pa yi yang // 'khor lo dag ni bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'bar ba bzhag/ 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus ni// pad+ma'i rgyal
237a2(rgyud): po rab tu gnas// sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni// ji ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgugs sogs cho ga'i
237a3(rgyud): sbyor ba ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhin no// dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun// cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
237a4(rgyud): yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags// gru bzhi pa da la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi
237a5(rgyud): nang du 'khor lo na// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa lta bu'o// de yid bus khro bo che// 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal yang // khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/ spyan gsal
237a6(rgyud): 'bar ba chen po pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// bka' bzlog dbang phyug chen po gnon// sangs rgyas
237a7(rgyud): phreng ba sogs pas spras// in dra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// zhal bzhi pa la thub par dka'// be con dang ni zhags par mdzod// dang po na ni rdo rjer bshad// 
237a8(rgyud): gnyis pa zhags pa bsdigs mdzub can// phyag gnyis khu tshur dam pa mchog/ khu tshur gnyis ni rab tu brtag/ mthe chung gnyis ni mnyam sbyar ba'o// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par spel// snying
237b1(rgyud): khar phyag rgya legs bzhag nas// bsdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad// 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya mchog tu thub par dka'// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 
237b2(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng bas mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams// cha rnams kun tu thams cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas
237b3(rgyud): par// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'// de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/ mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgod// de ltar khro ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad
237b4(rgyud): rnam par dkod nas nye bar 'khor ba'i mchod pa thams cad kyi des mchod par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam dpar rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen
237b5(rgyud): po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' po thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su bshad// grub bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog chun
237b6(rgyud): bos rgyun// de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni// chu zhes bya ba'i ming cano// de yi dbus pad chen po// mdab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// de yi lte ba'i dbusu ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba
237b7(rgyud): zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas sbas// sku
237b8(rgyud): rnams thams cad kun nas spro// mtha' yas rab 'byam rgya che ba'i// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la// de yi sngags yongs grags pa// sha Sha'i sde yi mtha' dge ba// kA yig den/ 
238a1(rgyud): ldan sngon byung ba// rgyu yi don du rab sgrub byed// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan// me yi sa bon gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dbang phyug
238a2(rgyud): zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang // bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad// dbyug gu'i ril ba spyi blugs bri// mdun du bgrang phreng pad+ma/ 
238a3(rgyud): yi rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhag/ de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs pa dgod par bya// 
238a4(rgyud): 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba// dkyil 'khor gyi ni rgyal po'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ gzhan ni rab tu bshad par bya// dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje
238a5(rgyud): rin chen zhes bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbusu rin chen che// yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar// de dbus rin chen
238a6(rgyud): pad+ma nirin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de dbus ma ra ka ta 'dra// rin chen rdo rje cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes// mdun du kun
238a7(rgyud): gyi dbang bskur gtso// rin chen de yi gtse bo mchog/ ga ya su pad+ma ra ga ste// rgyab tu in+d+ra nI la'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen g.yon// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs rin
238a8(rgyud): chen rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa bzhi ni// gnas rnams ni bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// de yi sngagasu yongs grags pa// bzhi pa'i sde yi dang
238b1(rgyud): po gang me yi sa bon gyis gsal byas// dbyangs kyis gnyis pas kun nas mnan// dbang bsgyur ba ni steng du gnas// de yi phyag rgya yang dag bshad// rin chen snyim pa rgyab bskums te// rin
238b2(rgyud): chen rnam pa legs 'byung ba// do ni rdo rje rin chen rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshang bya ba// glu bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis
238b3(rgyud): ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbusu zhal bzhi pa'i// 'khor lo bzhi ni yongs bskor ba'o// de yi dbus pad chen po'o// kha dog sna
238b4(rgyud): tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi dbus brtson chen po// rdo rje'i ga dazugs ni yongasu bri// rdo rje khur 'dzin mdzes pa ni// rgyan rnamadas kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// 
238b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas phreng bar rnam par mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang da ga bshad// bcu gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'// mya ngan 'das don legs gsal bya// sgeg sogs rig ma
238b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig le yongasu ldan// sna tshogs bkra ba mchog du 'bar// de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyi thams cad nas// kun nas
238b7(rgyud): yongasu bskor ba yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// las kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes 'khor lo che// 
238b8(rgyud): sngags kyi yi ges rnam par rgyan// de yi dbus pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'ja
239a1(rgyud): bcas pa sna tshogs gzugs can ral gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// ral gri'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// gsang sngags chen po yi ge lnga// de yi drung du legs par
239a2(rgyud): gnas dbyangs dang smra ba kun nas de'i// thugs kha ru ni yang dag gnas// phyi rol nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo gcig gis ni
239a3(rgyud): shin tu mdzes// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid// de la dkyil 'khor dbus ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sngon du bshad pa'i cho ga yis// mchod sogs tshe
239a4(rgyud): ga rgyas pa nyid// gzhug pa'i cho ga de bzhin du// ji ltar dkyi la 'khor 'dir mthong bzhin// shes rab ye shes dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu
239a5(rgyud): bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi ni/ mdzes par byas// thig bzhi yis ni yang dag ldan// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba// chos
239a6(rgyud): kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rten cing 'brel 'byung phreng ba ni// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo'i dbus brtson chen po// rdo rje'i rgyu ni stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams/ 
239a7(rgyud): kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog nag po gzi brjid che// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// rgyu yi don du so sor bskyed// dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan
239a8(rgyud): thig le phyi mos rnam par rgyan// yi ge chen po'i phreng ba can// 'khor lo gnyis kyis rnam par rgyan// de yi mdun du dung yin la// rgyab du zhags pa brjod par bya// rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che// 
239b1(rgyud): 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa thams cad rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// thog mar chos kyi
239b2(rgyud): 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thams cad yang dag 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor
239b3(rgyud): ba yis 'dakyil 'khor kun gyi thig gdab bo// de yi dkyil du snang ba che// mkha' bzhin shin tu 'od gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i mdzod// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu bzhugs// zla
239b4(rgyud): pa'i mdog can gzi brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa/ 'i mchog/ gzhon nu rab tu brjid pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas
239b5(rgyud): spras / rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyan par mdzad// 'di yi gsang snga gas gzi brjid che// dbyangs dgu pa la thig le dang // nA da yis ni rnam par rgyan// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa la// 
239b6(rgyud): thig le nA das rnam par rgyan// gtso bo de yi sngags pa yang // nam mkha'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sngags kyi phreng ba mchog ldan pa// ma lus pa
239b7(rgyud): yi sa rnams kun// thams cad nas ni nam mkha'i tshul// tog ni phyag rgyar gyur pa de'i// de bzhin du ni nges par bcing // de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// nam mkha' yi ni mdzod de la// 
239b8(rgyud): gal te bdag ni grub 'dod na// mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod// na mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil
240a1(rgyud): 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab po// dkyil 'khor de yid bus ni// khro ba'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// der yang rdo rje 'di yi mchog/ dkyil
240a2(rgyud): 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod// de yi dbu su gzi brjid che// rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// pad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus
240a3(rgyud): bdud rnams thams cad rab 'joms mdzad// de sngags yi ger gyur pa na// sha ba'i sde tshan mthar dge ba// rgyu yi don du legs gsal bya// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor// sngags
240a4(rgyud): kyi yi ge phreng ba che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje gnod sbyin de yi ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma thams cad gzhom
240a5(rgyud): bar bya/ rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// de na sa dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu ba shad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis
240a6(rgyud): ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbusu 'khor lo che// lcags kyu yis ni rnam par mdzes// dbusu bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal// lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// 
240a7(rgyud): rgyan rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdo rje lcags kyu khu tshur che// 'bar ba 'phro bas rnam par rgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi yi ges legs par sbyar// 
240a8(rgyud): sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa// byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par gnas// dbyangs drug pa yis legs par phye// zla phye thig les legs par rgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgyas legs par sbyar// 
240b1(rgyud): 'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu mchog tu dge/ dgugs pa la sogs thams cad la// 'gro ba 'dul ba yongasu bsdu// don yon
240b2(rgyud): rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang
240b3(rgyud): dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbu su ni// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// de yi dbusu gru gsum grags// lcags kyu mchog tu dge ba'o// de yi
240b4(rgyud): dbus sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che// phyag ba zhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa 'o// gzi brjid chen po dkar dang dmar// zhags pa lcags
240b5(rgyud): kyu 'dzin dge ba// de yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad// don yod 'bras bu stsol ba po// sde tshan gnyis pa'i ga sum pa ni// gnyis 'gyur nyid du rnam par gnas// de yi
240b6(rgyud): thig le mya ngan 'das// sngags kyi phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// ske skyong ba dang mchod pa yang // sbyor ba ji bzhin rnam par dgod
240b7(rgyud): de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad yongasu sgrub// rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa'
240b8(rgyud): bo thams cad kyis// rdo rje chags pa zhesu bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// thams
241a1(rgyud): cad dmar pos rab dregs pas// dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin// de yi dbus pang chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// de yi lte ba'i dbusu ni// rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya/ 
241a2(rgyud): pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum 'od kyi phreng ba can// de yi phyag rgya mchog tu ni// mdzes pa yis ni mnga' gzhur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis
241a3(rgyud): mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog 'gyur// de yi gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa// rdo rje chags pa mchog tu bde// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar thug pa// kA yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs/ 
241a4(rgyud): dgu pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi phreng bas yang dag rgyan// me tog mda' ni yongasu 'phen// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs
241a5(rgyud): rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed// rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'a khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag/ rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje legs pa zhes grags pa// gnyis
241a6(rgyud): su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yi dbus pad chen
241a7(rgyud): po ze 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// zla ba'i gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya// rdo rje legs pa stobs po che// dung dang kun dazla/ 
241a8(rgyud): ba dkar// kha ba ba zho'i 'od ltar mdzes// legaso stsol ba tshim par mdzad// ting 'dzin dbang mang po sgyur// rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa// de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs// sgo yi sbyong ba nyid
241b1(rgyud): kyang ni/ rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'bar// lha mi yi ge sngon gang de// sems can don ni rab sgrub byed// thig le gnyis dang yongs
241b2(rgyud): su ldan// legs stsol bas ni rnam par gnas// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab tu bskor// bdag nyid dag pas gzhug pa sogs// thams cad yongasu spyad
241b3(rgyud): par bya// rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje gzi brjid zhes grags// rdo rje nyi mas blo gros ldan// gru bzhi pa la
241b4(rgyud): sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig de bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri ba dar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba// rdo rje nyi ma 'od po che// rdo rje
241b5(rgyud): ma'i steng du ni// gru gsum rnam pa las byung ba// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// 'bar ba yi ni me lta bu// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ze 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes// de
241b6(rgyud): yi lte ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje gzi brjid stobs po che// bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgya skyegs khu tshur mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams
241b7(rgyud): kun gyi brgyan pa'o// de yi sngagasu yongs grags pa// kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'i nyid// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// sngags kyi phreng bas
241b8(rgyud): yongasu bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i mtshan ma ldan// de lha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje gzi brjid dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po/ 
242a1(rgyud): mchog yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming // bdag nyid chen po rdo rje rtog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig
242a2(rgyud): bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung // zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen rgyal mtshan yongs sgreng ba// de yi dbus
242a3(rgyud): sems dpa' che// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// zhal bzhi pa la gzi brjid che// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen char pa rab tu 'bebs// phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yi gsang
242a4(rgyud): sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po dang // me yi ngas rab tu gsal byas pa// tog gi phyag rgyas yongasu bskor// sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lta'i
242a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab ma nga bya// rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ 
242a6(rgyud): rje bzhad pa zhes grags pa// rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po
242a7(rgyud): bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// ston
242a8(rgyud): ka'i zla ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang
242b1(rgyud): sngags gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du bsgrub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab// rang ming rtogs pas mtshan pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams
242b2(rgyud): cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes
242b3(rgyud): par byas na thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// de yi steng du'ang pad+ma che// pad+ma me las yang dag byung // gru gsum mchog tu mdzes pa po// thor cog
242b4(rgyud): ngag gis rnam par rgyan// chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na// tham sa cad gzi brjid bdag nyid dge/ de yi mdog gi de nyi dad ni// 'phro ba'i ma ra ka ta 'dra// phyag bzhi pa la zhal
242b5(rgyud): bzhi pa rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od/ ji srid dag gi 'khor lo no// smra ba'i dbye bas rab tu
242b6(rgyud): gnas/ thams cad so sor gsal bar byed// sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung // de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil
242b7(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// de yi dbus go cha che// rin chen
242b8(rgyud): kun gyis rnam par rgyan// de yi dbusu brtson chen po// rdo rje srung bar yang dag bri// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// 
243a1(rgyud): thams cad srung ba mchog tu dge/ phyag rgya sngags dang yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po go 'phang mchog/ de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog
243a2(rgyud): mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod// steng du nA das brgyan par bya// kun nas kha dog du ma yis// yongasu bskor ba bsgom par bya// sngags kyi phreng ba yongasu ldan// glog gi phreng bas rnam par
243a3(rgyud): rgyan / de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru
243a4(rgyud): bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thi ga bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// khu tshur dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbusu ni// rdo rje pad+ma yang 'ong ba/ 
243a5(rgyud): gzi brjid chen po gser gyi mdog/ 'dab ma brgyad pa yid/ 'ong ba// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams
243a6(rgyud): kun gyis brgyan pa po// kun da dung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhon gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung dang thugs khu tshur// rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyisu med pa mchog gsang ba// 
243a7(rgyud): khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad// de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du med nyid stsol mdzad pa// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas
243a8(rgyud): rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku// 'di yi sngags la rnam par gnas// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur dkyil 'khor ro// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas
243b1(rgyud): mchog dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni// chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 
243b2(rgyud): de bzhin gru bzhi bris nas ni// sgo khyud la sogs rnam par spangs// rtse gsum snam bu nyid dang ni// dung dang pad+ma sogs pas rgyan// thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod// rtse gsum pa yi phyag
243b3(rgyud): rgyar ldan// khyu mchog la zhon mig gsum pa// stag gi lpags gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la// ral pa'i tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// de
243b4(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// phyag 'tshal ba ni de bri'o// de'i sngags ni// oM tra sa suM hUM phaT// gsang sngags 'di ni tshor gsang ba// bdag nyid chen po dbang
243b5(rgyud): phyug che'i/ dbang phyug chen po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// dkyil 'khor chen po de nyid la// dbang phyug chen po'i gan/ su nag po chen po gzhag par bya'o// lag pa stong gi gar
243b6(rgyud): byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi pa lag pa stong gis gnas pa'o// rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA kA la hUM b+h+yaHoM nan+di ke shA hUM b+h+yo// 'di bzlas na dngos
243b7(rgyud): grub thams cad byed do// dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi thig gdab bya// der ni pad+ma yang dag bri// pad+ma'i dbus
243b8(rgyud): su sbrang rtsi byed// la sogs mthar byed spun bri'o// gzhu yi phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin// sbrang rtsi byed dang rgyal bar byed// nyid kyi sgrub thabs de bzhin no// me tog mda' dang yongasu ldan// rang gi ming
244a1(rgyud): / ming rtogs mtshan ma can// sngags ni/ ma d+hu kr-itA se/ oM sA d+ha na sa/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'dod gzugs can// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// sbrang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i
244a2(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thab so// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa bris nas dbusu thig bzhi gang po// dbusu tum pu ru'o// shar gyis 'dab mar rgyal ba'o// lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o// nub tu mi thub pa'o// byang du
244a3(rgyud): gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor bris nas/ go rims ji lta ba bzhin du gsang sngags dgod par bya'o// oM tuM bu ru hAM/ oM dza ye hAM/ oM bi dza ye hAM/ oM a dzi te hA/ 
244a4(rgyud): oM a pa rA dza~M te traM/ dga' ba 'di dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rab sgrub stsol// 'di yi phyag rgya de nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag
244a5(rgyud): ba dgod par rab bshad bya// go rims ji lta ba bzhin du// tum bu ru ni mthe bor dgod// bsdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas// rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o// mi thub de
244a6(rgyud): bzhin ming med la// gzhan gyi mi thub mthe chung la// lag pa'i dbus yi ge oM// dgod bya de nyid lag pa'i rgyab// rdo rje phreng ba'i mthar thug tu// dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang
244a7(rgyud): rnam par dbye ba yang // phyag rgya kun spyod yongasu bsdu// so sor brtan par bya ba nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug dang rmongs la sogs// rengs byed la sogs go rims
244a8(rgyud): bzhin// las rnams dag ni thams cad du// sngags pas mnyam par bzhag ste bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas
244b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyi legs par mdzad de/ bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa/ byang
244b2(rgyud): chub sems ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa kun// dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang // legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ blo gros dag pa ye shes che// thams cad mkhyen
244b3(rgyud): pa kun rig mchog/ mchog gi dbang phyug dpa' ba che// theg ma tha ma med khyab pa// ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don// shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal// rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor che// rdo rje
244b4(rgyud): rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ mi bskyed pa dang mi zad ma dgon// chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa// rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi tha
244b5(rgyud): ma'i blang theg chen che ba'i mchog gi mchog/ dpa' bo ma chog tu dpa' ba'i mchog/ zab cing yangs la phra ba dang // thams cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'a
244b6(rgyud): lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po che// tshad skyob dkar po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las phul du byung // rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog
244b7(rgyud): gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa// rgyal ba rgyal ba mchog nyid dang // legs pa'i rgyal po bdag nyid che// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' chen// rdo rje rgyal po lcags kyu che// rdo rje
244b8(rgyud): chags pa mda' chen po// rdo rje legs pa legs grub mdzad// rdo rje rin chen che mchog mchog/ rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid mdzad// rgyal mtshan chen po rin chen tog/ rdo rje bzhad pa
245a1(rgyud): legs bzhad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma che// shes rab ye shes legs rno mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po// sems dpa' smra ba legs bzhad mdzad// sna
245a2(rgyud): tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rje srung ba legs srung mdzad// khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje mtshams sbyor mtshams sbyor sel// phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas kun khyod la// dang po'i rnal 'byor
245a3(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog/ legaso rdor can rnal 'byor che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dge/ snying po'i rgyan zhes mtshan gsol pa// 'di dag thams cad legs par gsungs// sangs rgyas
245a4(rgyud): rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes// gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang // sba bya shin tu re// da dka' ba// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo// brjod
245a5(rgyud): du med cing yi ge bral// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba 'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongasu rdzogasaso// / 
245a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la
245a7(rgyud): gsol ba btabo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la
245a8(rgyud): 'jug pa ye she rdo zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhug so// de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par zhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang
245b1(rgyud): phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas kyang de bzhin
245b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes kyi ting 'dzin gsal bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis thugs de las 'thon te/ sangs rgyas
245b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi yul chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas sems can thams cad kyi'ang shes rab dang ye/ 
245b4(rgyud): shes rnam par sbyangs te/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug/ cing rjesu mnyes par byas nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin
245b5(rgyud): legs par yongasu rdzogs par mdzad nas mngon par dbang ba skur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / bzhad pa dang / de da ga la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen
245b6(rgyud): po las rdo rje sems dpa' ting 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la yang rab tu gnas nas rnon po dang / rgyu dang smra ba'i sems dpa' rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de/ yongasu dag nas yang
245b7(rgyud): pad+mo'i sems dpa'i ting 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i las kyi bdag pos kyang sems can yongasu smin cing srung ba'i khro
245b8(rgyud): bos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongasu smin pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas
246a1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma ho zag med shes rab
246a2(rgyud): ni/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// shes rab shin tu dri med sems// sems dpa'i lusu bdag gyur to// dri med sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na// e ma he chos ni bsam
246a3(rgyud): med nyid// bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon nas byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug gi lusu mngon par sprul
246a4(rgyud): te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongasu bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyidama'i dkyil dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / byin gyis brlab
246a5(rgyud): pa dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdza rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces ga sol to// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las
246a6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mdor bstan pa'i chos kyi tshig bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal
246a7(rgyud): 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongasu zhu bar sems dpa' ni legs leg so// legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang ngas bshad // de nas bcom ldan
246a8(rgyud): 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
246b1(rgyud): bzhi ni ning gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rje su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde/ 
246b2(rgyud): ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rje su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjesu lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod
246b3(rgyud): cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos
246b4(rgyud): phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rje su lta zhing brtson 'grus shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan dbas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba
246b5(rgyud): rnam par bsal cing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byungapa'i rjesu lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i/ rje su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas pa'i
246b6(rgyud): rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang ngag dang sems dang / chos mnyam pa nyid kyis gnas// oM kAM/ oM
246b7(rgyud): tsa tAr smr-i t+ya bas+thA nA nA nAM/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa bskyed cing rtso lo// brtson 'grus
246b8(rgyud): me sems kyi mthu bskyed do// smon lam yang dag par 'debs// sdig to mi dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir/ 'dun pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams
247a1(rgyud): bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus brtso mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'deb so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing
247a2(rgyud): shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / sgom pa yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do// 'bado brtson 'grus rtso mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'deb so// chos tshad med pa thams
247a3(rgyud): cad don dam par tshad med par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'di bka' stsal to// oM samyaka pra hA Na sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta sa ma ta a d+hiSh+Thi ta a
247a4(rgyud): ra hUM/ yang dag par spong ba brjod pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhid ni mos pa'i ting 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu
247a5(rgyud): 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do// sems dang brtson 'gru sa dang / dpyod pa'i ting 'dzin spang ba'i 'du byed dang lda pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa sgom par byed do// shes rab kyi
247a6(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa'i don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo'i chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid do zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM ri d+hi pA da
247a7(rgyud): bApAr mi ta la ba pa ra hUM hUM/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga ni dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson
247a8(rgyud): 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang sgyur bas spros pa
247b1(rgyud): med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM in dri yA ba bo d+ha pradz+nye i sheny+dza nA man+ta nA pa ga ta ya aHhUM/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// stobs lnga ni dang
247b2(rgyud): pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobaso zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa
247b3(rgyud): nyid la gnas pa stobs thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tA ba la aHhUM hUM ba stobs 'phel ba zhes bya
247b4(rgyud): ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshangs pa'i gnas pa ba zhi ni byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms pa'o// oM brah+ma bi hA rA d+hiSh+ThA na kaM ma dz+ra k+Sha hUM trAM/ chos
247b5(rgyud): thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/ pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni spobs pa so// 
247b6(rgyud): sor yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams
247b7(rgyud): cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM pra ti sam+bi daHsA hUM/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa
247b8(rgyud): nyid de rjes dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjesu dran pa dang / chos rjes dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes dran pa dang / gtong ba rjesu dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjesu dran pa dang / lha rjes su
248a1(rgyud): dran pa dang / chos thams cad gcig tu rjes dran pa ni chos thams cad don dam pastong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par dpyod pas mnyam pa nyid
248a2(rgyud): kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting 'dzin la dbang sgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM sarba a nu smA ti nu hU~M saM pa dA di shi ts+tshad+d+ha hUM/ rje sa dran pa drug gi shes rab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran
248a3(rgyud): ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan
248a4(rgyud): lag dang shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lagadang / ting 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ byang chub
248a5(rgyud): kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to// oM sarba tA sa bo d+h+yaM ga sa ma tA su pra toShI te d+hU baM/ byang chub kyi yan
248a6(rgyud): lag bdun zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / 
248a7(rgyud): yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting 'dzin to// lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi
248a8(rgyud): sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so sor rig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye sheso// oM Ar+ya Sh+TaM ga mArga mA Ta/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha
248b1(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'o// ting 'dzin gsum ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// de la stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam pa dang / med
248b2(rgyud): pa'i rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pa thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin ces brjod do// de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge
248b3(rgyud): 'dzin gang zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa dang / shes pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / rnam par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med
248b4(rgyud): pa'i ting 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon pa med pa'i ting 'dzin gang zhe na// mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba/ de'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i
248b5(rgyud): ting 'dzin ces bya'o// chos thams cad rtogs nas smon par mi byed/ lha 'am lha las gzhan gang yang ru ba don du mi gnyer zhing 'phags par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ 
248b6(rgyud): dngos po thams cad la ting 'dzin thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis/ ting 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o// oM kha sa maHsarba d+harmA
248b7(rgyud): de la stobs bcu ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i skabs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang // khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog
248b8(rgyud): dang mchag ma yin pamakhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i skabs dang / kun nas nyan mongs pa'i gzhim khyen pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjesu dran pa mkhyen
249a1(rgyud): pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stob so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa'i
249a2(rgyud): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// oM da sha pa la sa ma tA thA/ stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyi
249a3(rgyud): gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar
249a4(rgyud): mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'a du shes las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams
249a5(rgyud): nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la/ mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' ya so// nam mkha' ma/ tha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni// 
249a6(rgyud): rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' ya so// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye
249a7(rgyud): bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod zhes cung zad med pa'i
249a8(rgyud): skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye
249b1(rgyud): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gos
249b2(rgyud): pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa/ bsam gtan med cing
249b3(rgyud): bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa med pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal to// oM san+ta b+ha dre sarba b+hA ba bi shud d+he d+hi She khaM/ gnas dang
249b4(rgyud): gnas pa yin pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha ro// rnal tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ dag gis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyaso zhes dam
249b5(rgyud): bcas na chos 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud ngam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i
249b6(rgyud): tshogs gzhan ci yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyuraro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rje su ma mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rje su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba
249b7(rgyud): thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnasu dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i
249b8(rgyud): 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya/ 
250a1(rgyud): bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas de la zag pa 'di rnams yongasu zad par ma gyur to zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud ngam/ 
250a2(rgyud): tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun pa zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi cho su bstan pa de dag la bsten na bar chad kyi
250a3(rgyud): chos mi 'gyuraro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyo ro// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par 'gyur bar brtan pa de dag la nan
250a4(rgyud): tan byas nas sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur rabar mi 'byung // zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs sus kyang
250a5(rgyud): rung ste/ 'jig rten chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyuraro// zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjesu mi mthong ba la sogs pa ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongasu spros te brjod par bya'o// 
250a6(rgyud): mi 'jigs pa ni ngar 'dzin pa'i phyir ro// chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid do zhes/ oM be sha ra d+ya sa ma tA prap+ta a A aM aHmthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms
250a7(rgyud): par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can
250a8(rgyud): bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongasu dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa
250b1(rgyud): med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang / bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsrubs te gnaso// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyomasu gnas te/ dran pa
250b2(rgyud): dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la phan pa dang ldan bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'i zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i
250b3(rgyud): bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrub te gnaso// de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba snga nas nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba/ 
250b4(rgyud): yang med/ btang snyoms pa dang / dran pa yongasu da dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te ga naso// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las
250b5(rgyud): yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes ying la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha'
250b6(rgyud): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha'
250b7(rgyud): yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye
250b8(rgyud): bar bsgrubs te gnaso// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med men skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// 
251a1(rgyud): de rnam pa thams cad 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gan so// rnam par thar pa brgyad po
251a2(rgyud): dang mnyam pa nyid rjes thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed/ dngos po med par rtogs pa mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyi su med par rtog so// 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
251a3(rgyud): dgu mnyam pa nyid do// oM a nan+taHbi mo Sha mu She shu/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis gnas pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la pha rol tu
251a4(rgyud): byin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
251a5(rgyud): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon la gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
251a6(rgyud): dang thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi
251a7(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
251a8(rgyud): las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste bstan pa'i rje su rtogs pa'i sbyor bso// oM sarba pA ra mi ta ar tha pa ri pA ra Ni/ oM pra hAM t+yaM/ 
251b1(rgyud): thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de las bcu po gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i sa dang / 'od byed pa
251b2(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros
251b3(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba dang / sa thams cad don gcig ste/ 'di ltar ye shes kyi don to// ye shes kyang ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ don yod pa/ 
251b4(rgyud): gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal brjod pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i don to// oM b+hu mi bi sho d+ha ni sanA datha pa ri pU ra Ni ba b+hU/ sa yongasu sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab
251b5(rgyud): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa ba cu gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang
251b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba nas skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa dang byang
251b7(rgyud): chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rnam par gnas pa dang / mi gnas pa dor ba ste don dam par gnas pa gcig yin pa'i phyir te/ 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o// oM sarba b+h+yaHbstan pa
251b8(rgyud): ga te hUM/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba
252a1(rgyud): dang yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dang
252a2(rgyud): ba'o// dbang ba dang mi dbang ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba/ dbang phyug thams cad la dbang rjesu thob pa/ chos thams cad dang legs par rab tu ldan pa'i phyir ro// oM
252a3(rgyud): sarba ba shi te dz+re tru hUM/ thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// 
252a4(rgyud): tsom mnga'o// dgengam pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par dam gzhag pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// ma rtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// mos pa yong su nyams
252a5(rgyud): pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// dgongs pa yong su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting 'dzin yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes rab yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par
252a6(rgyud): grol ba yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongasu nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'das pa'i dus la ma thogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/ ma 'ongs
252a7(rgyud): pa'i dus la ma chas mthod pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug// da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug/ sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba
252a8(rgyud): ste ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang // gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjesu 'brang // thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi
252b1(rgyud): rjesu 'bra // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong pa nyid la yang dag par rjes rtogs
252b2(rgyud): pa nyid kyi phyir na/ shes rab yongs dag pa'o// oM a we Ni ka bud+d+ha d+harma sa ma te aHbI ra dzA khaM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la skyes bu chen
252b3(rgyud): po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid de 'di yi phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa mu
252b4(rgyud): khyud dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing de
252b5(rgyud): yang 'di'i mtho ba ni dma' ba dang dma' ba ni mtho ba'o// phyag/ dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bu dra bas la/ khrel pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang / 
252b6(rgyud): zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi ri me'i phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o// phyag dang zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon sha chags pa nyid// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag
252b7(rgyud): dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang skyes nas zla ba lon pa'i byis pa bzhin du gzhon sha can dang kA tsa lin da ltar 'jam pa reg na bde ba'o// bdun mtho bar gyur te phyag gnyis
252b8(rgyud): dag dang zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / mgrin pa'i phyog cig go// sor mo ring ba ste 'di yi zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rims kyis ring ba nyid// rtings pa yangs pa ste 'dir
253a1(rgyud): rting pa che zhing zhabs kyi rjes mtsham par yangs par 'gyur ro// sku che zhing drang ba nyid de 'phye bo ma yin zhing / zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma yin/ legs par skyes
253a2(rgyud): pa rnam pa thams cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste mtho ba 'di yi srid rjesu mtshams pa'i zhing du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de 'di'i pus yong yo du mo 'ardzog pa cu ma ma da khyom pa su mas che mo zer
253a3(rgyud): du phyogs par 'gyur zhing / ba spu rnams g.yas phyogasu 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de rnams kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mngon par gsal bar byed do// byin pa ri
253a4(rgyud): dgas a na ya'i lta bu ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dgas e na ya rnams kyi lta bu'o// phyag ring zhing mdzes pa ste rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil
253a5(rgyud): ngag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o// 'doms kyi sba ba sbubasu nub pa ste/ sbubs kyis rab tu g.yogs pa gla nga po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyuraro// sku mdog gser 'dra
253a6(rgyud): bste 'di yi kha dog gser lta bur 'gyuro// lpags pa srab pa ste shin tu 'jam pa gser shog lhur 'jam pa'i lpags pa can du 'gyur zhing rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o// sA re re nas
253a7(rgyud): skyes pa ste/ 'do'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams re rer 'gyur// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod pa can te 'di'i smin ma dag gi dbus na ras srung lags pa lta bu dung bcag pa'i mdog can g.yas
253a8(rgyud): phyog su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ mdzod su nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gsal bar byed// sku stod seng ge lta bu ste/ 'di yi sku steng du yangs pa seng ge'i lta bu 'gyur/ 
253b1(rgyud): dpung mgo zlum pa ste/ yongasu zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'gyuraro// thal gong rgyas pa ste/ 'di yi nye bar rgyas par 'gyur zhing gser shog bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa cano// yan lag
253b2(rgyud): so so rnams ro rnams myong bar byed// ces pas na/ ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid de rtsa rnams yin la de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang / mkhris pa dang / bang kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma
253b3(rgyud): dkrugs pa nyid kyis phyir yang dag par gsol ba'o// shing n+ya gro da ltar chu zheng gab pa skyes bu chen po'i chu dang zheng dang mnyam pa'o// dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'gyur
253b4(rgyud): zhing / gtsug tor gdugs lta bus yas bkab pa gtsug to/ ra yang shin tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring bas te/ snyan gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos reg par byed cing / dbu
253b5(rgyud): sgra'i mthar thug par yang / dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khe/ bas pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs te 'khor stong phrag du mar dbyangs nang du ji lta phyi rol du'ang thos shing / bya ka la
253b6(rgyud): bing ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid du 'gyu ro// 'gram pa seng ge lta bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng ge'i bzhin du zlum por 'gyu ro// tshems dkar bas te dung dang kun da dang / zla ba'i kha dog can gyi
253b7(rgyud): tshems rnamaso// tshems mnyam pa ste/ ha cang dma' ba ma yin mtho ba ma yin mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi chos rnamasu 'gyur ro// tshems thags bzang ba ste/ tshems rnams par
253b8(rgyud): med pa'o// tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu nyi shu dang / steng du tshems nyi shu'o// spyan mthon mthing ste/ spyan dag gi sngon po gang yin pa de shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur te ri mo
254a1(rgyud): dmar mo rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir la/ gang dkar po yin pa de dkar po kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyuraro// rdzi ma pa'i lta bu ste spyan gyi rdzi ma rnams khyu mchog gi
254a2(rgyud): bzhin du gang 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang / gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa ma 'dzings pa legs par gzhol ba'o// sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de
254a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba/ 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad+ma rA ga'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis
254a4(rgyud): in dra nI la'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu/ tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig rnams/ da kyis dung dang kun da dang zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga'
254a5(rgyud): zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang / 'ga' zhig gis na mkha 'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig gis khru phyed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi
254a6(rgyud): tshad dam/ dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin mtha' yas pa rnamasu snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can dang / stong gsum gyi
254a7(rgyud): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongasu rgyas par mdzad pa dang / ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnams snang bar byed cing / chos kyi dbyings kyi
254a8(rgyud): mtha' thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa
254b1(rgyud): pa dang / stong gnyis dang / gsum dang / ji srid na mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'od dang / dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang / zang zing dang / don
254b2(rgyud): 'thun pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnaMs la phan 'dogs shing / phan btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
254b3(rgyud): sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam zhing mnyam pa ste/ lha rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya ba'i mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub
254b4(rgyud): pa ni ma yin no// byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir/ chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste// stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid cano// lha thams cad kyang
254b5(rgyud): stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o// lha thams cad dang / byang chub dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid du ga pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ na mkha'i mtshan nyid can/ 
254b6(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnam so// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga tra ba ra lak+ShA na sa ma tA d+harmA te AM/ mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol/ 
254b7(rgyud): tu phyin pa'o// dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni son ma zangs kyi mngag lta bur 'gyur te/ sen mo snum pa dang / sen mo mtho ba dang / sor mo rnams
254b8(rgyud): zlum par 'gyur ba dang / sor mi rnams rims kyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rba rnams mdud pa med pa dang / long bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs maM
255a1(rgyud): mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stobasu gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i skyabasu gshegs pa dang / g.yas phyog su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs
255a2(rgyud): pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rim gyis gshegs pa dang / che zhing yangs la yongasu gyur pa'i dbus mo'i lha nga can dang / mtshan yongasu rdzogs pa dang / goms pa snyoms pa dang / 
255a3(rgyud): sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dang pa dang / sku zhum pa med pa dang / sku chu ba med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / 
255a4(rgyud): gzigs pa yongasu dag cing mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / sku zlum pa dang / sku bskams phyin pa dang // sku ma stongs pa dang / sku skyed gzhu'i lag bcangs lta bu
255a5(rgyud): dang lte ba zab dang / lte ba mi g.yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogasu 'khyil ba dang / lte ba thogs pa med pa dang / yan lag dang / nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa dang / 
255a6(rgyud): lpags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang / sme ba med pa dang / sku brtan pa dang / phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / phyag gi ri mo mi yo
255a7(rgyud): pa dang / mchu bim pa lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / gnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i nga ro can dang / snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs dang / sgra phun sum tshogs
255a8(rgyud): pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs mtho ba dang / mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan gtsang ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / spyan mthon mchi
255b1(rgyud): dang rdzi ma gnag pa dang / smin ma stug pa dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma lta bu dang / smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spu nag pa dang / smin ma'i sra/ 
255b2(rgyud): phra ba dang / smin ma rjesu 'thun pa dang / kha dog ma nyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam med pa dang / snyan skyon dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams zhing skyon dang bral ba dang / yongasu
255b3(rgyud): rdzogs shing mtho la mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang dpral ba can dang / dbu shin tu rgyas pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra stug pa dang / dbu skra 'jam pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang / 
255b4(rgyud): dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbu skra snum pa dang / dbu skra ma 'khums pa dang / dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung khyil pas rgyan pa dang / rgyal mtshan yang dag par gnas
255b5(rgyud): pa dang / dpral bdung lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin
255b6(rgyud): gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa gsal byed dang gsal byang dang gsal byed ma yin pas mnyam pa nyid la legs par
255b7(rgyud): rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cad gsal byed med par mnyam pa nyid la rab tu legs par gnas pa mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad sgyu mchos dang ldan pa la legs par rab tu gnas
255b8(rgyud): par dus gsum gyi dpe byad mnyam pa nyid rdo rjen bu mnyam pa nyid thob pa stong pa nyid thob pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang // dpe byad mnyam pa nyid thob pa/ gnyis med pa'i don la yigs
256a1(rgyud): par yang dag par zhugs pa rnam so ces pa'o// oM a nu bAny+dzan sa ma tra su pra tiSh+Thi ta badz+ra dz+nyAn hUM la ya/ dpe byad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
256a2(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po can la leg so zhes bya ba rnams kyis
256a3(rgyud): mnyes par mdzad do// oM byang chub sems chen khyod leg so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sangs rgyas chos chen khyod leg so// tshad med ched du khyod leg so// shes rab dam pa'i
256a4(rgyud): ched du yang // mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// sangs rgya das snga mas ma gsungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'a/ dngas rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen pos lha rnams
256a5(rgyud): thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba bzhi yis dges par mdzad do// sangs rgyas kun khyod la phyag 'tshal// chos kyi/ sku yi mchog gi mchog/ gdong ma'i sngags kyi don nyid la// 
256a6(rgyud): rje ye shes stobs chen la// shin tu sgrib med zhi ba la// rdo rje chos rnams legs gnas pa// theg pa chen po'i go 'phang thob// thugs rje'i bdag nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dpa' bo che// 
256a7(rgyud): dbang phyug dam pa mchog gi mchog/ dam chos mchog tu 'gyur ba med// bde gshegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal ces pa'o// na mo stu te/ oM mA hUM na mo stu te swA hA// 'di ni brjod pa tsam
256a8(rgyud): zhig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o ces pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bas nas 'di skad ces gsung// 
256b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams
256b2(rgyud): slar yang 'dus par mdzad nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod kyi rigs thams cad kyi 'khor lo bskyed par
256b3(rgyud): mdzad du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gi de ma thag tu kho nar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa
256b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi bya chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ de nas 'di lasayang dag bshad// byang chub kyi dkyil 'khor bla na med// 
256b5(rgyud): rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// me ta ga phreng bas rnam rgyan pa// kun tu sna tshogs cha bzang ba/ 
256b6(rgyud): kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni// kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog gam grong khyer ni// me tog 'bras bus rnam rgyan pa// der gnas sngags pas
256b7(rgyud): dngos grub mchog/ gal te 'dod na yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// ri stengs rnamasu kun nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya/ 
256b8(rgyud): ma mo'i gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod lha yi gnas ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams// don dam par ni bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i skyed mos tshal kun dang // chu bo 'dus pa rnamasu yang // 
257a1(rgyud): phyag na pad+ma dpal bya ba// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' ba// rgyal po'i skyed tshal rnams ni// rdo rje rin chen de yi ni// rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub bya/ 
257a2(rgyud): rtags gcig pa dang ba glang gnas// chu klung 'dus pa rnamasu yang // sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lha rnams gnas
257a3(rgyud): mchog kun tu'o// nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par gzhag pa der// rtag pa bsod nams mchog gyur pa// bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya// phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas
257a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// shar lho nub dang byang rnams kyis// phyogasu dkyil 'khor thig pa rgyad pa'o// de yi phyi ru 'khor lo ni// kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar
257a5(rgyud): ba'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis mdzes ba ste/ sna tshogs gos dang me tog phreng // rnga yab so// gas kyis rnam rgyan pa// dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa
257a6(rgyud): yis/ sgo dang sgo khyud mtsham rnamasa'o// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// zla ba'i
257a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas par// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du bcom ldan 'khor lo can// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan// 'khor lo sgyur ba thams cad ni// sgeg par
257a8(rgyud): bcas pa kun bri bya// lho ru gtsug tor dkar po ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan// gtsug tor dkar po'i ngos su ni// rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri// byang du brtson 'grus chen po ni// 
257b1(rgyud): gzi brjid phung po stobs po che// sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pas kun nas bri bar bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyis ni// dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogasu// gtsug tor rgyal ba
257b2(rgyud): brtson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dang bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri bar bya// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// dbang ldan phyogasu 'phags pa gnas// me mtsham su ni cher
257b3(rgyud): 'phagason bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung ngu de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu gnas pa
257b4(rgyud): gsang zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor rnams ni// mchod pa rnams ni bzhag/ byas te// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// de bzhin gzug
257b5(rgyud): sgra la sogs dang // bdug pa la sogs gsang chen no// sgo sbyang ba ni bzhi yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'khor ba nas rnams// kun tu bzang po sogs rnams bri// de ltar
257b6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa sogs byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor mdo
257b7(rgyud): sum mthong ba las// snga ma rtag pa ji bzhin du// phyi nas de bzhin bri bar bya// bsod nams ji bzhin dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad tshon gyi rab brtag pa// rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bos/ 
257b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar 'gyur// rang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub// cho ga sman dang lhag pas kyang // 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma
258a1(rgyud): yin/ kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba// kun nas sna tshogs 'khor lo can// 'khor lo sgyur ba bdag nyid che'i// rin chen bdun gyi mchod pa che'ang // yongasu rdzogs pa
258a2(rgyud): zla ba ltar// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyis// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad byas pa'o// phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che// pad+ma'i rnam par brtag shes bya
258a3(rgyud): rin po che yi rin chen rnams// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rnam pa'o// dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam tshig rnams// dor bar byas pa de nyid ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub
258a4(rgyud): mi 'gyur// de phyir gsang ba thams cad kyi// dkyil 'a/ khor thams cad lta ba ni// gal te dngos grub mchoga'adod na// gdon mi za bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon
258a5(rgyud): phul nas// rje su rim pas bsgrub par bya// brtan pa'am ni g.yo ba yi// rdzas rnams ji snyed thams cad ste// rtse ba me tog 'bras bu sogs// bu mo legs par
258a6(rgyud): rgyan byas dang // 'dod pa'i chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya// grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag khang // kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gang la sbyin bya cung
258a7(rgyud): zad yod// 'tsho ba de ni sbyin par bya// bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// gsang ba dam pa rmad byung ba// mngon par
258a8(rgyud): dbang bskur de nas bya// 'dab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong la// slob ma bzhag nas yan lag kun// phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas// khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang // sa bon 'bras bu
258b1(rgyud): dud pa yi// bum pa rnams kyi dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dbang bskur las// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // gzhogs dang de bzhin rgyab du yang // sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun// cong / 
258b2(rgyud): ban mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar steng na gnas pa'o// rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// dpal ku
258b3(rgyud): gyi ni mngon mtho ba// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang // rta ni mchog tu 'bar ba 'am// seng ge'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba// dpal gyi sngags ni
258b4(rgyud): brjod byed cing // dpal gyi mngon mtho zhes bya ba'i// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba// bkra shis sam ni dpal be 'u// gang yang bris nas dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas
258b5(rgyud): dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rnam rgyal dbang bskur zhes pa shad// tsan dan chu dang bum pa che// gzhan gyis mi thub smra na blugs pa// kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni// rtag tu shes
258b6(rgyud): rab can gyis brtag/ gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas// phyag rgya gang dang gang bkod pa// de ni de dang de brtag bya// de rnams phyag rgya dam par bshad
258b7(rgyud): dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha de rnams ni yid du 'ong // sman gyi dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang // ga pur de bzhin gur gum/ 
258b8(rgyud): dang // a ga ru dang lha yi shing // tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// si hA b+hag+ni de bzhin mchog/ ku nas sa ha de ba dang // gi ri kar Na tshangs mchod sbyin// sman gyi dam pa rnamasu bshad// lhag
259a1(rgyud): / gnas kun gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas mchod pa rab 'jug cing // dang po rdo rje dbang bskur ba// shes rab thams cad rab 'jug byed// rin chen dam pa'i dam pa ni// gser la sog
259a2(rgyud): kyis thams cad nas// sman kun dang ni sa bon kun// 'bru rnams thams cad bzang po ni// sangs rgyas byin rlabs rnal 'byor las// dbang bskur don du rab brtag bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// 
259a3(rgyud): dbang bskur dam pa 'od 'bar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun nas sangs rgyas 'gyur// ces pa'o// dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud du ji ltar rnyed pa yongasu rdzog so// / rigs gzugs skal
259a4(rgyud): bzang mang thos blo 'byor sogs// phun tshogs ldan pa dpal da ldan chos rje yis// rgyud 'di bsgyur las cung zad ma rdzogs par// dpal ldan blo gros brtan pas rdzogs par
259a5(rgyud): bsgyur// rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra maN+Da a lang kA ra na ma ma hA tan+d+ha rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po// bla ma dang
259a6(rgyud): 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma la spyi bos gus par phyag 'tshalo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dang / nor bu dang
259a7(rgyud): rin po che dang / pad+ma dang / las kyis byin gyirlabs pa'i dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i cod pan khams
259a8(rgyud): gsum pa'i chos kyi rgyal por dbang bskur ba brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dam tshig gi ye shes rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ 
259b1(rgyud): cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid thug su chud cing / las sna tshogs mdzad pa/ ma lus shing lus pa med pa'o sems can
259b2(rgyud): gyi khams thams cad kyi ra ba thams cad yongasu rdzogs pa'i rdo rje'i las mdzad pa/ thugs rje chen po rnam par snang mdzad chen po rtag pa dus gsum du gnas pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de
259b3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis brten cing bsngags pa'i nor bu rin po che chen po dang ldan pa/ kho dog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i dril bu btags pa/ rlung gis bskyod
259b4(rgyud): pa'i dar gyi ba dan dang / me tog gi chun po dang / dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs shing nye bar mdzes pa/ chos kyi dpying ngas thams cad legs par yongasu dag pa/ chos kyi dbyings
259b5(rgyud): kyi khang bzang 'od mtha' yas pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi/ na pa'i gtsug lag khang me tog gi 'khri shing ma ga gi snying po'i rgyan gyis bkod pa 'jig rten gyi khams
259b6(rgyud): kyi rgyud rgya mtsho rab tu bkram pa sprin na mkha'i khams yongasu khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis brlabs pa/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'khrungs pa'i dbus/ rnam par snang
259b7(rgyud): mdzad kyi snying po gsal ba'i gzhal med khang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi
259b8(rgyud): 'khrung / mi 'gog/ 'gog par mi 'gyur ba'i yan lag gi spyod yul/ yang dag pa'i mtha' gsal ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul/ chos kyi
260a1(rgyud): dbyings kyi snying po'i khang bzang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sku/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi snying po sa chen po'i dam pa la
260a2(rgyud): bzhugaso// de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yongasu bskor zhing
260a3(rgyud): mdun du bdar te chos ston par mdzad// thog mar dge ba/ bar du dge ba/ tha mar dge pa/ don bzang po/ tshig 'bru bzang po/ ma 'dres pa/ yongasu rdzogs pa/ yongasu dag pa/ yongasu dkar
260a4(rgyud): ba/ chos thams cad kyi tshul rnam par dag pa'i sgo ston pa mdzad// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gsherigs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang thugs rdo rje gnyisu
260a5(rgyud): med pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes sems dpa' de bzhi/ na gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi nyi ma/ rnam/ par rgyal ba'i dam tshig gi 'byung gnas rdo rje snying po// chos
260a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid brnyes pa/ rgya mtsho ltar zab pa/ las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes thob pa/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje
260a7(rgyud): namakha' lta bu/ sku chen po rdo rje'i sku/ mtha' las 'das pa'i sku/ sku rin po che chos kyi sku/ sprul pa'i sku/ las mnyam pa nyid kyi sku/ byang chub kyi sems don yod pa/ yongasu bsdus pa
260a8(rgyud): dge ba 'phel ba/ rgyal po chen po snang ba tog/ bzhad pa po/ chos dang ldan pa/ shes rab 'khor lo// skad thams cad pa/ sna tshogs pa can/ srung ba po/ gnod sbyin can/ mtshams
260b1(rgyud): sbyor bar gtsug tor du gyur pa/ mchog ldan/ rdo rje can/ 'khor lo can/ ye shes cen/ khyab bdag chen po/ sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje na mkha'i dbyings thams cad du legs par bzhugs pa/ de
