260b2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par 'du bar byed pa/ rdo rje'i dbyings thams cad khong du chud pa'i ye shes sems dpa' na mkha'i khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul dang mnyam
260b3(rgyud): ba'i rdo rje'i byin rlabs kyi ye shes snying po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med pa'i rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba chen po'i dam tshig na mkha'i khams thams cad du spros pas de bzhin
260b4(rgyud): gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa mngon par byang chub par gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag de nyid kyi ngo bo rnam par dag pa de yis chos thams cad rang bzhin
260b5(rgyud): gyi dag pa/ nam mkha' thams cad la khyab pa po// gzugs thams cad yongasu mthong ba ye shes kyis ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can 'dul ba'i spyod pa mchog
260b6(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad don yod pa'i bka' lung mdzad pas sems can thams cad mnyam pa nyid bla na med pa'i las sna tshogs pa can/ rnam snang mi 'gyur mi bskyod
260b7(rgyud): pa/ rin chen rtog ste 'od byed pa// 'od dpag med pa rgyal ba'i mgon// don yod pa ni las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor/ 
260b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab la rab tu gnas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi so sor rtog pa'i ye shes gnyisu med pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin
261a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi bya ba bsgrub pa'i ye shes yang dag par rjesu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa/ chos thams cad
261a2(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gnyi su med cing mnyam pa nyid dmigs pa'i ye shes yongasu dag par mthar phyin pa/ stong pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang // 
261a3(rgyud): yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi po dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi yul du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mnyam pa nyid la dmigs
261a4(rgyud): par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po nyid la byin gyis brlabs nas/ phyogs dang mtshams rnamasu kun tu gnaso// de nas yang bcom
261a5(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gi dbang phyug gis 'jam da pal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams
261a6(rgyud): spyan drongs shig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad bka' stsal pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nu 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po rab tu dgyes pa'i zhal ras kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
261a7(rgyud): dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams spyan drang ba'i don du rdo rje se gol brdabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i snying po chen po 'di ched du brjod pa/ bud+d+ha sa mA dza AHhA oM hUM badz+ra sa mA dza/ 
261a8(rgyud): de nas de skad ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyis/ 'jig rten gyi me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud/ rab 'byam rgya mtsho
261b1(rgyud): sprin yang dag par mthong ngo // de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyis lhan cig yang dag par
261b2(rgyud): sbyar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje blo'i ye shes yongs su bskyed de/ gnas thams cad du rnam par gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin
261b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams dang / rdo rje
261b4(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ kye de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i snying po bdag la yod
261b5(rgyud): bdeng bshad par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ cad kyi byin gyis rlobs shig/ b+h+rUM de nas mi bskyod de bzhin gshegs pa dang / rin chen 'byung gnas de bzhin
261b6(rgyud): gshegs rade bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med// don yod grub pa de bzhin gshegs// gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang lhan cig de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
261b7(rgyud): thugs dpal gyi be'u la rab tu zhug so// zhugs pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor lo la bde ba thams cad yang dag par ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
261b8(rgyud): mdzad zhal bzhir gyur te/ zhal bzhi pa rnams kyis chos kyi dbyings dang rnam pa'i khams mtha' med pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos kyi tshul mngon par btags pa 'di nyid dbyeng
262a1(rgyud): kyi ched du brjod pa 'di lta ste/ rab tu dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang
262a2(rgyud): yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// dga' ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sred pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang
262a3(rgyud): yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// 'dod chags rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// zhe sdang rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang
262a4(rgyud): yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gan so// gti mu dag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/  byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// nga rgyal rnam par dag pa'i
262a5(rgyud): gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i ga na so// mi khom pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa/ de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// yid sim pa
262a6(rgyud): rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// snang ba rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// lus rnam par
262a7(rgyud): dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// ngag rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// yid rnam par dag pa'i
262a8(rgyud): gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// gzugs rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// sgra rnam par dag pa'i gnas
262b1(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// dri rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// ro rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni
262b2(rgyud): 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// reg pa rnam par dag pa'i gnas gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnas// dngos po thams cad rnam par dag pa'i gnas
262b3(rgyud): gang yin pa de ni 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i gnaso// de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa ste/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rnam par
262b4(rgyud): dag pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu dag pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ gsang sngags thams cad kyi dbang phyug gsang sngags thams
262b5(rgyud): cad kyi 'dren pa po// sngags thams cad kyi bla mar gyur pa/ tha mas cad gtsug tor 'khor los bsgyur ba/ bstan pa la brdzi ba med pa/ 'khor los bsgyur ba'i snying po
262b6(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ b+h+rUM/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos thams cad bsdus pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying po lan cig tsam yang thos na de'i byang chub kyi snying po la thug pa'i bar du/ sgrib
262b7(rgyud): pa thams cad chod pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa dang / las kyi sgrib pa chen po nye bar bsags kyang / nams kyang dmyal ba la sogs pa'i ngan song rnamasu lhung bar mi
262b8(rgyud): 'gyuraro// sdig pa rnams byas pa tsam na yang sdug bsngal med cing zad par 'gyuraro// gang gis 'di 'chang ba dang / nyi ma re re 'don pa dang / klog pa dang / rgyun ma chad par tshul bzhin yid
263a1(rgyud): la byed pa de ni/ skye ba 'di nyid la chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin so sor thob nas chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyuraro// chos thams cad dga' zhing mgu
263a2(rgyud): la rab tu dga' ba myong bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po skye ba bcu drug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid dam/ rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyu ro// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
263a3(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhi ba'i chos nyid mngon par byang chub pa mngon par sgrub pa 'di ston par
263a4(rgyud): mdzad// rdo rje bstan pa nyid kyis rdo rje mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzo/ dgas par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / don gcig/ dpa nyid kyis don mnyam pa nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub
263a5(rgyud): chen po dang / rang bzhin rnam par dag pas chos nyid mnyam pa/ nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po dang / rnam parartog pa dang / rnam par mi rtog pa nyid las thams cad mnyam pa
263a6(rgyud): nyid mngon par byang chub pa'i byang chub chen po ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las chos kyi gnas bzhi po 'di nyan par byed pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 'don pa dang / sgom par byed na ji srid byang chub snying
263a7(rgyud): po la gnas kyi bar du/ sdig pa thams cad la kun tu spyod pa thams cad kyang sdig pa thams cad las 'das par 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
263a8(rgyud): byang chub par 'gyuraro// aM de nas yang bcom ldan 'das bdug pa thams cad 'dul ba de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par rgyal bas bsdus pa
263b1(rgyud): zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags kyi spros pa med pa'i phyir 'dod chags spros pa med pa'o// zhe sdang gi spros pa med pa'i phyir zhe sdang spros pa med
263b2(rgyud): pa'o// gti mug gi spros pa med pa'i phyir gti mug spros pa med pa'o// chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med pa'i
263b3(rgyud): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spros pa med par rig par bya'o// 'jam dpal gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan pa dang 'dzin cing 'don la klog par byed na de 'dul
263b4(rgyud): ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas/ khams gsum du skyes pa'i se mas can rnams bsad par gyur kyang ngan song du 'gro ba da ra mi 'gyur zhing myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
263b5(rgyud): pa'i byang chub pa'i byang chub par 'gyuraro// hUM rade nas bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i chos nyid brnyes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa slar yang chos thams cad spyan ras
263b6(rgyud): gzigs dbang phyug ye shes kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na yul thams cad rnam
263b7(rgyud): par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyuraro// zhe sdang thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na sdig pa thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyuraro// chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'i
263b8(rgyud): chos 'jig rten na chos thams cad rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyuraro// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa
264a1(rgyud): nyid du 'jug par 'gyuraro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'jig rten na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa nyid du 'jug par 'gyuraro// 'jam dpa
264a2(rgyud): gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par byed na de 'dod pa thams cad kyi nang na gnas kyang pad+ma lta bur 'dod chags kyi skyon tho bur ba'i dri mas
264a3(rgyud): gos par mi 'gyur zhing / myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par 'gyur ro// hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das khams gsum pa thams cad kyi bdag
264a4(rgyud): po de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i 'byung gnas ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul
264a5(rgyud): bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur byin pas khams gsum po tha/ mas cad kyi rgyal srid yongasu thob par 'gyu ro// don gyisbyin pas thams cad kyi bsam pa yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// 
264a6(rgyud): chos kyi sbyin pas chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid thob par 'gyuraro// zang zing gi sbyin pas thams cad kyi lus dang ngag dang yid bde ba thob par 'gyuraro// dzA/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
264a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya mnyes pa thams cad kyi khu tshur 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad kyi ye shes phyag rgya
264a8(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i phyag rgya yongasu bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa
264b1(rgyud): thams cad nyid du 'gyur ba dang / gsung gi phyag rgya yongasu bzung bas chos thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur ba dang / thugs kyi phyag rgya yongasu bzung bas ting nge 'dzin thams cad thob pa'i don du 'gyur
264b2(rgyud): ba dang / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongasu gzung bas sku dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdo rje mchog tu 'grub pa'i don du 'gyur te/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan
264b3(rgyud): par byed/ 'dzin cing 'don la 'chad cing sgom par byed na/ de dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / ye shes thams cad dang / las thams cad dang / sku dang
264b4(rgyud): gsung dang thugs rdo rje sems dpa' mchog gi dngos grub thams cad so sor thob par 'gyur zhing myur du bla na me dad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs
264b5(rgyud): par byang chub par 'gyur ro// AHde nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa slar yang rdo rje'i yi ge'i 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i
264b6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa nye bar gzung ba'i phyir chos thams
264b7(rgyud): cad mtshan mas dben pa dang / smon pa las nye bar grol ba'i phyir chos thams cad smon pa med pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yong su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
264b8(rgyud): 'od gsal ba'o// oM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i nang du gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang 'khor lo chen por 'jug pa zhes bya ba
265a1(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ rdo rje mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / don mnyam pa
265a2(rgyud): nyid la zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la zhugs nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang / las
265a3(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid la zhugs pas 'khor lo thams cad du 'jug par 'gyuraro// hUM/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i snod de bzhin gshegs
265a4(rgyud): pa slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa tham/ sa cad kyi mchod pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul bka' stsal pa/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed/ 
265a5(rgyud): pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgya sa pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad yongasu skyor pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga
265a6(rgyud): rgyas pa dang / chos thams cad yongasu bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / 
265a7(rgyud): 'don pa dang / brjod pa dang / sgom pa sngon du 'gro ba'i las kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// oM de nas bcom ldan 'das gdug pa thams cad 'dul ba'i
265a8(rgyud): nus pas de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i ye shes snying po zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems can thams cad mnyam pa
265b1(rgyud): nyid pas khro ba mnyam pa nyid dang / sems can thams cad 'dul ba nyid pas khro ba 'dul ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad chos nyid nyid pas khro ba chos nyid nyid dang / sems can thams cad rdo rje nyid
265b2(rgyud): pas khro ba rdo rje nyid de/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i byang chub ste/ haHde nas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mnyam pa nyid la rab tu gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs
265b3(rgyud): pas slar yang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mchog ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa
265b4(rgyud): nyid dang / thams cad kyi don nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/  pa'i don nyid dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid pas shes nga rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid dang / thams cad
265b5(rgyud): las nyid pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las nyid du rig par/ bya'o// hrIHde nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/ pa thams cad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams
265b6(rgyud): cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po bdag nyid thams cad pas sems can thams cad
265b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po dang / rdo rje'i snying pos dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rdo rje'i snying po dang / rin po che thams cad kyi dbang bskur bas sems can thams cad rin po che'i snying / 
265b8(rgyud): po dang ngag thams cad la rab tu 'jug pas sems can thams cad chos kyi snying po dang / las thams cad byed pa'i sbyor bas sems can thams cad kyi snying po'o// hrI de nas bcom ldan 'das
266a1(rgyud): mtha' las 'das shing mu med pa'i mthar phyin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pas slar yang mu med cing mthar phyin pa'i chos dang / slar yang 'di'i rtog pa dang yongasu mthar thug pa byin gyis/ 
266a2(rgyud): brlab pa'i don du chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid yongasu mthar thug pas byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di bka' stsal pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
266a3(rgyud): pa mthar thug pa'i phyir chos thams cad yongasu mthar thug par 'gyur ba ste/ 'jam dpal gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par byed/ 'dzin cing 'don la sgom par
266a4(rgyud): byed na/ de ni dag cing mthar phyin pa'i byang chub sems dang / de'i spyod pa mthar phyin pa la gnas pa nyid kyis sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par grol bas de bzhin gshegs pa
266a5(rgyud): nyid dam rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid myur du thob par 'gyur ro// b+h+yoHde nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gsheg sa pa de bzhin gshegs pa thad kyi gsang ba'i chos nyid brnyes pa/ 
266a6(rgyud): chos thams cad spros pa med pas slar yang bde ba chen po rdo rje don yod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba rdo rje chos mnyam pa nyid shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo dam pa thog ma dang / tha ma dang / 
266a7(rgyud): dbus las grol ba'i mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'dod chags chen po mchog tu grub pas bde ba chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub
266a8(rgyud): sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bde ba chen po mchog tu grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen po mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po
266b1(rgyud): rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub mchog tu grub pas bdud sde chen po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bdud sde chen
266b2(rgyud): po rab tu 'joms pa mchog tu grub pas/ khams gsum po mtha' dag gi dbang phyug mchog tu 'grub par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag
266b3(rgyud): gi dbang phyug mchog tu grub pas ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can gyi khams yongasu skyob pa'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog shin tu bde ba chen po 'grub par
266b4(rgyud): 'gyuro/ sa/ de rgyu ci'i phyir zhe na/ ji srid 'khor ba'i gnasu ni/ mkhas pa mchog rnams gnas gyur pa// de srid mnyam med sems can don// mya ngan mi 'da' byed par nus// shes
266b5(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ye shes byin gyis brlabs kyi/ sa 'grub// las ni thams cad rnam dag pas// srid pa dag par 'gyur phyiro// chags sogs kyis 'dul 'jig
266b6(rgyud): rten ni kun nas srid par rtag sdig byed// de dag rnam par sbyang don du// srid pa'i bar du rang 'dul byed// ji ltar pad+ma legs dmar ba// tshon gyi skyon gyis ma gos ltar// bag chags skyon gyi srid pa
266b7(rgyud): ru rtag tu 'gro pan gos mi 'gyur// 'dod chags chen po rnam dag pa// bde ba chen po nor chen po// khams gsum dbang phyug thob nas su// de dag don ni brtag par byed// haH'jam dpal gang
266b8(rgyud): la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyin re bzhin du nang par sngar langs te/ gang 'don pa dang / nyan pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / brjod par byed pa des bde
267a1(rgyud): pa dang / yid bde ba thams cad thob par 'gyur zhing / bde ba chen po rnga rje don yong ba'i dam tshig gi dngos grub mchog tu gyur pa skye ba 'ang nyid la thob par gyu'o// hA/ de nas
267a2(rgyud): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal nyi shu rtsa lnga po 'di dag ni nges par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo ste/ 'di ltar oM
267a3(rgyud): na maHsarba bud+d+ha bo d+hi satwA nAM/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta badz+re/ oM sa man+ta b+ha dra tsar+ya bI/ oM tsin+d+ra ma Ni/ oM a ni ri d+hi/ oM dza t+ti b+hi b+ha te/ oM dza ti pa ri warte/ oM mahA rA ga d+harma te/ oM d+hi/  pa na/ mo sa rba gA mon/ oM
267a4(rgyud): badz+ra dr-i D+ha ka ba tsi te hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga te/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+he/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA dz+nyA na bi shud+d+he/ oM karma da shwa d+ha ne hUM phaT/ oM ni sum+b+ha badz+ri Ni hUM phaT/ oM karmar
267a5(rgyud): ge oM badz+ra hUM badz+re/ oM sarba dA ma NI/ oMtre oM a kA ro mu/ khe/ oM pradz+nyA pA ra mi te/ oM haHbe hUM/ oM A oM sar+thata thA ga ta kA ya a gre/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ bAka
267a6(rgyud): / sho d+ha ne/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+re a oM s+pho Ta ya sarba a pA ya ban+d+ha nA ni pra mo kA ya/ sarba a pA ya ga ti b+h+yaHsarba sa ma ya badz+ra hUM phaT/ sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya dang sngagaso// de brjod
267a7(rgyud): pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsang ba mchog gi dngos grub rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ma
267a8(rgyud): bskrun pa'i sems can rnams kyi rna lam du grag par mi 'gyur zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skrun pa'i sems can gyis bri ba dang / klag pa dang / brjod pa dang / rim gror bya ba dang / bla mar bya ba
267b1(rgyud): dang / rjed par bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar yang nus pa ma yino// gzhan du na gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di than yi ge gcig tsam yang thos nas sems
267b2(rgyud): can de sangs rgyas mang po la dge ba'i rtsa ba skrun par rig par bya na/ slar yang mtha' dag ma lus pa rdzogs pa lta ci smos/ 'jam dpal sems can gang la la gang ga'i klung gi bye ma brgyad cu snyed kyi
267b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig la phyag byas/ bla mar byas/ rjed par byas/ mchod par byas na des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul 'di nyan par nuso// gang du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod
267b4(rgyud): par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs de mchod rten du gyur par 'gyur te/ gang zag de yang phyag bya ba'i 'os 'gyu ro// gang chos kyi na ma grangs 'di yid la gzung ba 'am/ glegs bam du bris
267b5(rgyud): par gyur na de bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por skye ba dran par 'gyuraro// de la bdud sdig to can gyis bar/ du mi gcod do// rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams dang / gzhan
267b6(rgyud): yang lha rnams kyi phyi bzhin rjesu 'brangs te/ de srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed pa byed par 'gyur zhing / tshul ma yin pas dus byed par mi 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
267b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis dgongs par 'gyur ro// mdor na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang yid la 'dod pa de dang der skye bar 'gyuraro// 'jam dpal 'di lta bu'i phan yon mang po 'di ni shes rab kyi pha
267b8(rgyud): rol tu phyin pa'i tshul gyi sgo'i chos kyi rnam grang so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos rdo rje'i snying po thams cad kyi rgyan theg pa chen po'i mngon par rtogs pa de bzhin
268a1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug dam pa chen po 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bzhis yongasu bskor ba
268a2(rgyud): rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i snying po 'di phyung // mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod nas ma skyes pa'o// nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir chos thams cad stong pa nyid// spros pa thams
268a3(rgyud): cad spangs pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas yongasu dag pa'o// thams cad kyi sems gsal ba'i mtshan nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings yongasu dag pa'o// AHb+h+rUM traM hrIHhUM/ 
268a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje yi ge'i tshig 'di brjod pa tsam gyis chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klasadapa sangs rgyas kyi yul thams cad de snyed du shin tu gsal ba
268a5(rgyud): rgya chen po snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sgra yang bsdu bas byon na sa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i
268a6(rgyud): bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan zhes bya ba'i
268a7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya yis nyon cig/ de legs par nyon la rab tu yid la gyis shig dang bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos 'jam/ 
268a8(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab ye shes la zhugs la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i
268b1(rgyud): snying po chen po la byin gyis brlabs par byos shig/ de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin
268b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kar zhugs te/ byin gyis brlabs nas de las 'thon te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar rnam par gnaso// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
268b3(rgyud): pathams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung gnas/ rdo rje snying po'i rgyan byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rdo rje chen po snying po'i rgyan de bzhin gshegs pa
268b4(rgyud): thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa chen po padaka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil lakhor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje snying po gsang chen po// de bzhi/ 
268b5(rgyud): gshegs pa kun ldan dge/ rdo rje snying po dang mtshungs pa// khams rnams thams cad rnam par sprul// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdud rtsi dang // gzhan yang bcud len dang mtshungs pa/ 
268b6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // rdo rje kun gyi rang bzhin grong // gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi ni rnam par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog chun pos spras// 
268b7(rgyud): kA li na rnams thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyin mtshams rnams// rdo rje ni can rnams kyis smras// rdo rje'i thig rnams kyis smras pa'i// phyi ros dkyil 'khor cig gang ba bya// da ma phyi rol du bya ba/ 
268b8(rgyud): dkyil lalo bdud gyi yin 'ang/ khyang par nges pa bzhin du// sngags pas thunanas yongs par bya// de sa rnam pa zhi'i rnas pa dang // ji mang grong ri rnam pa 'dun/ sbyor ba bdun dang yongs
269a1(rgyud): dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// sgo dang sgo khyud rin chen ni// yang dag mtho ba legs par gnas// de yi grong gi nang du ni// rab zhugs 'khor lo 'dra ba ru// rdo rje thig gis yongasu bskor
269a2(rgyud): ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje ka mdun gnas rnams// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan pa'o// de ltar 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis// nang gi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa// tshad mdzes pa yi snying
269a3(rgyud): po che// rdo rje 'khor los rnam par rgyan// gru bzhi pa dang zlum pa nyid// gru gsum rnam par yang dag byung // zla phyed rnam pa dang mtshungs pa// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi slar yang // slob dpon rdo rje
269a4(rgyud): yang dag 'byung // shes rab chen pos rab brtag bya// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// pad+ma ra ga'i 'od mtshungs la// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan
269a5(rgyud): bzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// sangs// rgyas thams cad bsdus pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni ngos/ kun tu// shes rab can gyis bzhag bya ba// dam tshig
269a6(rgyud): mchog bzhi rnam bzhi ni// go rims bzhin du yang dag bri// rdo rje chen po seng ge'i khri// 'khor lo can gyi khyab bdag gzhag/ gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang // gzi brjid phung po skal pa
269a7(rgyud): che/ rnam par 'phro byed rnam rgyal nyid// de bzhin gtsug tor lnga po ni// sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad la// yongasu bskor nas snam bu la// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas
269a8(rgyud): ni/ dkyil 'khor dag ni bzhi po ru// mi bskyod la sogs rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bri// mi bskyod pa yi dkyil 'khor ni// zla 'od lta bu'i mdog tu bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sogs
269b1(rgyud): rgyal po// kun mchog sa yi dbang phyug rnams// rdo rje slob dpon stobs po che// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// rin chen 'byung gnas dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rin chen sogs kyis dgang / 
269b2(rgyud): chos sogs gsang ba yis// dkyil 'khor tshe dpag med pa'o// rdo rje las la sogs ldan pa// don yod grub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// gnyis pa 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis
269b3(rgyud): song nas ni// rnam gzigs la sogs sangs rgyas rnams// dkyil 'khor kun tu der ni bri// rdo rje snying po rgyal po che// khyab bdag gsang ba'i chos dbang phyug/ 'dod pa'i don kun grub pa'i phyir/ 
269b4(rgyud): 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// blo gros rgya mtsho mi zad blo// bya mas pa bdag nyid chen po dang // na mkha'i snying po grag sa chen po// kun tu bzang po nyid dag dang // phyag na rdo rje bdag
269b5(rgyud): nyid che/ kun nas 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// 'jam pa 'i dbyangs ni rigs kyi mchog/ sangs rgyas sras bzang dri ma med// sgrib pa thams cad nges par sel// de nas sa yi
269b6(rgyud): snying po mchog/ nam mkha'i mdzod ni mdzod dam pa// lag na rin chen bla na med// ngan song kun ni 'joms pa ni// dra ba can gyi 'od ces bya// dpa' bo 'di dag gsang ba che// dkyil 'khor 'di
269b7(rgyud): ngag bri bar bya// 'khor lo de ni dor nas ni// blo gros ldan pas phyir song ste// shar du sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya go rims bzhin du dgod// 'khor lo mdzes pa'i dge legs can// rdo rje
269b8(rgyud): dpal be'u pad ces bya// gtsug tor rnam pa sna tshogs pa// rdo rje pad+mas rnam par rgyan// lhung bzed dang ni 'khar sil dang // chos gos kyang ni khyad par du// shAkya seng ge ji srid par// sangs rgyas
270a1(rgyud): kun gyis rab tu gsungs// gang zhig dngos grub mchod 'dod pas// de rnams blo ldan brtan pas bri// byang du 'jig rten dbang phyug gi/ phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de bzhin te// pad+ma ung
270a2(rgyud): pal nyid dang ni// spyi blugs lpags pa'i g.yang gzhi dang // dbyug gu'i shing ni mkhas pa yis// ma myong ba ru bri bar bya// slar yang lho ru song nas ni// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid che// slob dpon bdag nyid chen po
270a3(rgyud): yis// phyag rgya 'bad pas bri bar bya// rdo rje paN+Di sha dang ni// dril bu rab tu mdzes pa dang // dbyug gu dang ni tho ba dang // dbyug pa rdo rje mtshon pa dang // lcags sgrog dang ni rtse gsum yang // 'di dag dpa'
270a4(rgyud): po'i phyag rgya'o// dkyil 'khor nub tu song nas ni// 'jam pa'i da dbyangs ni blo dang ldan// gsang ba'i chos ni dam pa'i mchog// brtson 'grus chen po'i phyag rgya bri// ud pal 'khor lo
270a5(rgyud): rdo rje dang / ral gri yang ni khyad par du// thod pa dang ni dgra sta nyi // rma bya dang ni seng ge nyid// phyag rgya 'di ni brtson 'grus che// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// 'khor lo'i grwa ni
270a6(rgyud): legs gnas par// rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs bri// phyi yi 'khor lo'i gA ru ni// rdo rje bdug pa zhes bya sogs// bdag nyid chen po 'bad pa yis// mchod pa 'di dag bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil
270a7(rgyud): 'khor grwa rnams// gzugs kyi rdo rje la sogs ming // gzugs sku de bzhin dri dang ni// khyad par du ni ro nyid dang // reg dang chos kyi dbyings dang ni// mkhas pa yis ni dgod par bya// sgo yi nang
270a8(rgyud): ni thams cad du// sgo skyong ba ni dgod par bya// de bzhin dkyil 'khor gnyis pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// go rims bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi// yum rnams 'bad pas bri bar bya// nam
270b1(rgyud): mkha'i spyan zhes bya ba ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba dang // shes rab pha rol phyin ma yang // phyag rgya kun dang yang dag ldan// ji srid de bzhin gshegs rig ma// thams cad shar du dgod par bya// de nas tho
270b2(rgyud): gros ldan pa yis// byang gi phyogasu song nas ni// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma che// khro gnyer can dang grags 'dzin ma// khyad par du ni dpal bdun dang // mda' bdun dang ni dbyangs can ma// de la sogs
270b3(rgyud): pa'i lha mo rnams// bran dang bran mor yang dag ldan// de bzhin po nya pho nya mo// gsang ba'i phyag rgya lhan cig bri// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// lho yi phyogasu rab phyin la// ma mA ki dang lcags sgrog
270b4(rgyud): dang 'khab rtse rdo rje'i mtshan ma mchog/ de ltar bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogasu song nas ni// der ni phyin nas shes da ldan gyis// sgra gcan stobs chen bri bar bya// de bzhin 'das
270b5(rgyud): bu 'dar rgyu dang // lha mo zla mdzes 'od zer 'dra// dkyil 'khor/ kun gyi mtshams rnams// de bzhin nye ba'i sgra can ma/ 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// rab bkra nor gyi blo gros dang // 
270b6(rgyud): 'gugs byed po nya lnga dang ldan// grwa yi char bri bar bya// rdo rje mdung rje zhes bya sogs// sgo yi nang ni thams cad du// sgo sbyong ba ni rnam par bri// gzhan gyis mi thub lha mo che// de bzhin ral pa gcig ma/ 
270b7(rgyud): mchog/ rdo rje dregs mo lha mche// rdo rje kum b+hi yang dag bri// de nas blo ldan dkyil 'khor ni// thams cad las ni 'phen nas// shar gyi cha ni thams cad du// sngags pa mnyam par gzhag pa yis/ 
270b8(rgyud): khro chen gzhan gyis mi grub pa// de bzhin mi g.yo zhes bya dang // khams gsum nas rgyal snying po ni// mnga' bdag brgya phrag lnga yis bskor// shar du bris nas sngags pa yis// de nas byang gi char
271a1(rgyud): / song ste rta mgrin khro bo chen po dang // skar ma'i spyan ni sprad par du'o// khro gnyer rim pa rnam bsgyings pa// khro bo zo ldan brtson 'grus che// pho nya bran rnams thams cad dang // 
271a2(rgyud): me stong gis yongs bskor bar// 'jig rten mgon gyis bka' stsal to// de nas blo gros ldan pa yis// lce yi phyogasu song nas su// der ni phyin te brtson chen po// khro bo chen po stobs po che// rdo
271a3(rgyud): mtshan pas legs mtshan pa// shes rab chen pos dgod par bya// khro bo zla ba'i thig le pa// de bzhin khro chen rdo rje 'chang // khro bo gzegs ma stobs po che// khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil pa dang // 
271a4(rgyud): 'og sa 'og dang // de bzhin 'jigs pa'i mig can dang // rkang dpas bsnun pa rdo rje mchog/ gsang dang rab gsang rjes 'gro dang // bran dang pho nya rjes 'gro ba// rjes 'gro can blo khwa
271a5(rgyud): bo ni stong phrag gsum dang phyed kyis bskor// de nas bris nas blo ldan gyis// nub kyi phyogasu phyin nas ni// der ni song ste brtson chen po// gshin rje mthar byed ces bya ba// 
271a6(rgyud): gdong drug pa la lag drug pa// khro bo yi ge bdun zhes bya// khro bo'i gtse bo stong phrag ni// bdun dag gi ni yongs bskor ba'o// dkyil 'khor cha ni thams cad du// khro bo gtum po thams cad
271a7(rgyud): bri// de nas blo ldan 'ongs nas su// rang rgyal rgyal ba thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor kun tu bri bar bya// de nas sngags pa 'ongs nas ni// rgyal ba nyan thos bri bar bya// de nas thams cad bris nas su/ 
271a8(rgyud): de rnams tshangs sogs lha de dag/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rnam par bri// dbang phyug che dang khyab 'jug dang // zla ba nyi ma zhes bya dang // gza' brgyad dang ni 'jig rten skyong // rgyal chen rigs
271b1(rgyud): ni bzhi po dang // de bzhin sum cu rtsa gsum nyid// 'thab bral rnams dang dga' ldan rnams// 'phrul dga' gzhan 'phrul dbang byed rnams// tshangs pa mdun na 'don pa rnams// tshangs chen rnams/ 
271b2(rgyud): dang / 'od chung rnams dang / tshad med 'od rnams dang / 'od gsal rnams dang / dge chung rnams dang / tshad med dge rnams dang / dge rgyas rnams dang / sprin med rnams dang / bsod nams
271b3(rgyud): skyes rnams dang / 'bras bu che ba rnams dang / mi che ba rnams dang / mi gdung ba rnams dang / gya nom snang ba rnams dang / shin tu mthong ba rnams dang / 'og min rnams dang / dag pa'i gnas pa
271b4(rgyud): rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi mtshamasu dgod par bya'o// // de nas dbang ldan du dbang ldan dang / dbang por dang// nga po dang / mer me lha dang / gshin rjer gshin rje dang / 
271b5(rgyud): bden bral du bden bral dang / chur chu lha dang / rlung du rlung lha dang / lus ngan du lus ngan rnams dang / phyi rol gyi shar phyogs khro bo gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya
271b6(rgyud): chen po dgod par bya'o// lhor rdo rje 'jigs byed can gyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// nub du khro bo'i rgyal po chen po gshin rje gshed kyi phyag rgya chen po dgod par bya'o// byang du rta mgrin
271b7(rgyud): gyi phyag rgya chen po rnam par dgod par bya'o// de lta bu'i gru bzhi pa/ sgo bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dar dang me tog gi chun po dang / sgo khyud dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan
271b8(rgyud): gleng ba/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas klubs pa/ de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris la bsgom par bya'o// de'i phyi rol du 'gro ba lnga po bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du dbusu ri'i rgyal po lhun po
272a1(rgyud): chad dpag cad brgya phrag du ma rnam par bsams nas/ de'i srung du rje seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das gzhag par bya'o// de ltar dkyil 'khor ma
272a2(rgyud): gyis bkod nas nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyi cho gas mchod nas/ nye bar zhugs te dgugs pa dang / gzhug pa dang / dam tshig gis bcings nas mnyes par byas te/ mchod pa dang / dbang
272a3(rgyud): bskur ba dang / byin gyis brlabs pa dang / spro ba dang / bsdu ba la sogs pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bsgom par bya'o// de bzhin du sgom pa las blang ste/ 
272a4(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni rnam par snang mdzad nga'o zhes bsgom par bya'o// de lta bu las langs nas de'i snyems pa 'chang zhing snying rje dang / 
272a5(rgyud): byams pa'i 'dren byed dang mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' las 'das pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams
272a6(rgyud): cad kyi sku'i sprin gyis kun nas bkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rab tu 'bab pas rdo rje sems dpa'i hUM mdzad kyi phyag rgya rang gi lus la zhugs nas phyogs thams cad hUM gi yi ge'i
272a7(rgyud): sgras rab tu bsgrag par bya'o// bsnun pa bzhis rol pa dang bcas pas phyag rgya la bzlas pa bya ste/ dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ cho ga bzhin du rdo rje slob dpon gyis bkug nas
272a8(rgyud): bcug ste bcings la dam tshig la bzhag par byas nas/ rdo rje se gol gyi sbyor ba dang / kun nas 'bebs pa'i phyag rgyas bdag nyid la dbab ste/ snying po 'di bzhis de bzhin
272b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungaso snyam du bsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni thams cad 'bebs pa'i snying po bzhi por 'gyuraro// a A aM aHbdag byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa byas nas
272b2(rgyud): slob dpon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bdag mtshungs pa yi no zhes nga rgyal bskyed par byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje lcags kyu'i se gol gtogs nas/ sangs
272b3(rgyud): rgyas thams cad spyan drang bar bya'o// de la snying po ni 'di yin te/ badz+ra sa ma dza/ a gats+tsha a gats+tshan+tu sarba ta thA ga ta/ sarba bo d+hi satwa pa ri bri ta/ pra t+ye kA ra ha te/ sa ha zhes so// oM badz+ra sa mA dzA/ a
272b4(rgyud): gats+tsha a gats+tsha/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra yo gI shwa raH/ satwa na yaHsa ha a haH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad da dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang bcas pa dkyil
272b5(rgyud): 'khor thams cad yong su rdzogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa tham/ sa cad kyi rigs dang / rgyud dang / gzungs rnams dang lhan cig dkyil 'khor du 'dus nas byon par 'gyuraro// 
272b6(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya chen po bdag nyid rnam par bsgoms nas ming brgya rtsa brgyad pa gton la cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du mchod pa byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs
272b7(rgyud): pa thams cad bstan par byas nas/ sgo bzhi po rnamasu rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pas las byas te/ las chen po dam pa'i phyag rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gzhug par bya'o// 
272b8(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ su ra ta badz+ra badz+ra satwa dzaHhUM baM hoHa d+hi tiSh+Tha tu/ sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA maN+Da laM zhes bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod pa byas nas
273a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba btab par bya ste/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bdag gsol pa 'debs lags kyis/ sangs rgyas dang / 
273a2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bdag la byin gyis brlab du gsol/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad du gsol/ bdag la dngos grub thams cad stsal du gsol/ ji ltar bdag
273a3(rgyud): gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams kyis dbyings kyi mthas klas pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul kun nas bkang ste byin gyis brlab par
273a4(rgyud): bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' yongs dasu rdzogs par bgyi'o// de nas 'dir rdo rje snying po'i rgyan tshe das kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor du slob ma gzhug pa'i cho ga
273a5(rgyud): rgyas par 'gyur ba ni/ de nas gos dmar po phrag par gzar te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo sbyar nas/ sngags 'dis snyan gsan dbab
273a6(rgyud): par bya ste/ sa ma ya ho/ sa ma ya ste/ sa ma ya badz+ra d+hiSh+ThA naM/ ku ru mAM/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ye Shu me a d+hi tiSh+Than+tu sarba bud+d+ha mAH/ pra be sha yan+ta/ pra ti pA la yan+tu/ pA dzany+dza me pra ya tsAn+da/ pra
273a7(rgyud): biSh+To smi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra maN+Da a lang ka re/ ma hA badz+ra maN+Da le pra ti ba la yan+tu man+ta dzany+tsa me pra yats+tsha yan+tu/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i thal mor me tog dkar po'i phreng ba 'dis
273a8(rgyud): btags na/ nang du me tog bzhi dang sor mo'i rtse mor me tog re re bcug la de nas sngags 'di brjod cing gzhug par bya'o// hUMd+ha hri/ kruM shu dz+nyA ba ka pro kha~M shrI dz+nyA dzA mAM/ a d+hi tiSh+Tha maM/ 
273b1(rgyud): sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya satwa pra bi shA mi/ de nas slob dpon gyis de'i gdong g.yogs bcings la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer chos kyi dbyings nas/ 
273b2(rgyud): mkha'i khams rab tu khyab pa'i sbyor bas de bcug la sngags 'dis me tog gtor bar bya'o// sngags ni/ sa ma yo haM/ sa ma ya sta/ sa ma ya hUM/ gang la me tog rnams lhung ba de nyid
273b3(rgyud): de'i lhar byin par bya'o// de nas cho ga bzhin du sngags 'dis dbab par bya'o// na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+ya ta Ta ta Ta/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ badz+ra hUM/ bi kr-i ta bi d+h+ya/ dzi hA dud+han+tu/ dA ma ka/ ha si ta la bo d+ha ra/ 
273b4(rgyud): ka ha ka ha/ tsu lu tsu lu/ muny+dza muny+tsa/ ar+thaT+TA ha sa da ra bi da da ra/ badz+ra badz+rong+ga ta badz+ra ne tra/ badz+ra sho tra/ badz+ra g+hANAbadz+ra daSh+Ta kiny+tsi rA ya si pra bi sha badz+ra pa Ne dza da ya mA bi sha/ 
273b5(rgyud): gur+d+ha gur+Na/ pUr+N+Na pUr+N+Na/ g+hUr+N+Na pa ya g+hAn+d+ha pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+hA ma ya/ pA ta ya mo Ta ya/ a be sha ya/ dzalpa dzalpa dzATA ya/ dzalpA ya/ la g+hu la g+hu/ sarba ta thA ga ta dzA ka ra/ pra
273b6(rgyud): ba ra/ d+harma lab+d+ha/ bi dza ya ha~M he badz+ra dz+ha kI ra hUM kr-i ta swA hA// dbab pa'i dmachi'o// de ltar phab nas kye/ khyod kyis gang dge ba 'am mi dge ba mthong ngam zhes dri'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
273b7(rgyud): 'am/ rdo rje 'dzin pa 'am/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba bdag gis 'di lta bu mthong zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de nas slob dpon de thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i rang bzhin
273b8(rgyud): du yongasu gzhag la mig bcings pa bkrol la dbang bskur ba'i don du dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa byas la/ de'i dbusu kha dog thams cad kyi pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa yid du 'ong ba 'am/ 
274a1(rgyud): / seng ge'i khri rang nyid kyis bris te/ de nas de la dar gyis bgo ba dang / me tog bdug pa la sogs pa rnams mchod la/ khyad par du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg
274a2(rgyud): bya dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pa nye bar 'kho ba dang / dung dang / rdza rnga dang / rnga bo che dang / dung la sogs pa dang / gar dang / glu rnams kyis legs par mchod
274a3(rgyud): nas/ cod pan lnga'i dbang bskur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje slob dpon gyi go 'phang la sngags 'dis gzhag par bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+roSh+NI Sha a bi Shiny+tsa oM badz+ra satwa a
274a4(rgyud): b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM rat+na a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM badz+ra pad+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ oM dbadz+ra badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ spyi bo dang / dpral ba dang / mgri na pa dang / snying kha dang / lte ba dang / rked pa nas rje mngar gyi
274a5(rgyud): bar du yi ge'i phyag rgya bkod la rang gi lha'i gzugs kyi sbyor bas blta bar bya'o// de de ltar dbang bskur nasarigs dang 'thun pa'i ming byas nas rdo rje'i tshig rnams bsas
274a6(rgyud): par bya'o// de la rdo rje'i gnas tshig rnams ni 'di dag ste/ rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa'i phyir rang gi lus rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta ba'i thibs po thams cad
274a7(rgyud): nges par 'joms par 'gyuro// rig pa la 'jug pa'i phyir ma rig pa rdo rje'i gnas te rdo rje'i gnas 'dis dmigs pa'i dngos po yongasu shes pa la 'jug par 'gyuraro// hUM/ mngon par
274a8(rgyud): 'du byed pa'i phyir mtshams med pa'i mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis lta bar gyur pa thams cad du nges par rig par 'gyuraro// e 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' mnyam
274b1(rgyud): pa nyid kyi phyir 'dod chags kyi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'dod chags 'dod chags dang bral ba'i cheng du 'jug// ha byams pa'i mtha' mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir zhe sdang gi mtha'
274b2(rgyud): rdo rje'i gnas te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di nyes pa thams cad gcod pa'i ched du 'jugro// me/ shes rab kyi sgron ma mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir gti mug gi mtha' rdo rje'i gnas te// rdo rje'i gnas
274b3(rgyud): 'dis mun pa gsal bar byed par 'gyuraro// ra sems can thams cad sems can gcig pa ste/ rdo rje gnas 'dis sems can mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems can gyi rang
274b4(rgyud): bzhin rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuro// hrI sems can thams ca du sems gcig pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis sems nges pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / sems rang bzhin gyis
274b5(rgyud): 'od gsal ba mngon par rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// a/ sangs rgyas thams cad sangs rgyas gcig pa ste// rje'i gnas 'dis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis
274b6(rgyud): rjesu 'jug pa'i don dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rje su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyur ro// aM/ chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'dis thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rjesu rtogs
274b7(rgyud): par 'jug pa'i don dang / rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin rje su rtogs pa'i don du 'gyuraro// AM/ bdud kyi las thams cad sangs rgyas kyi las te/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di las thams cad rjes su
274b8(rgyud): rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / las thams cad las yongasu 'das pa'i don du 'gyur// hUM ngag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di sgra ji bzhin pa thams/ 
275a1(rgyud): cad rjes rtogs pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / brjod pa las 'das pa'i chos rjes tshogs pa'i don du 'gyur// sgra chos thams cad ma skyes pa ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'ang
275a2(rgyud): 'chi 'pho med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i lam las 'da' ba'i don du 'gyuraro// ma/ chos thams cad ma byung ba ste/ rdo rje'i gnas 'di 'gog
275a3(rgyud): ba med pa la 'jug pa'i don dang / chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i don du 'gyur ro// khaM 'di la rnam gnas rnal 'byor pa// bdag gi de nyid rab rtogs te// bdag gis de nyid rab
275a4(rgyud): btags nas// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// de la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad dang / phun sum tshogs pa thams cad dang / gter thams cad dang / 
275a5(rgyud): 'khor lo thams cad dang / rdo rje thams cad dang / ral gri / nga / yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang / dngul chu dang / bcud len rnams dang / gyen du 'gro ba dang / rkang 'og dang / mi
275a6(rgyud): snang ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang / dbang phyug chen po nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams/ 
275a7(rgyud): des myur du 'grub par 'gyu ro// hUM/ yid ni rtse gcig 'gyur ba yis/ sangs rgyas rjes dran bsgoms nas ni// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas sku gzugs bsgom par
275a8(rgyud): bya sbyar ba de yi bka' drin gyis// sangs rgyas kun mtshungs mnyam med 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab gsal ba'i// kun tu bzang po
275b1(rgyud): phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// lo ni phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rgyal
275b2(rgyud): po'i dbang bskur nyid dam ni// yang na dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// de ni rang gis brtan por sgom// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug kyang // thob na dngos grub gzhan ci smos// rdo/ 
275b3(rgyud): rje las kyi phyag rgya gang // de bzhin nyid kyi 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i sbyor bas de bsgoms pas// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor brtan por 'gyur// de lta bu yi byang chub kyi sems kyi mchog sgom par phyag rgya chen
275b4(rgyud): po'i ye shes nyid yino// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag nyid kyi// dam pa'i don nyid thob par 'gyur// gzi
275b5(rgyud): brjid phung po phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang ba'i rgyal srid thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan ci zhig smos// gdugs dkar gtsug tor chen po ni// dam
275b6(rgyud): pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gtsug tor ye shes thob 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta ci zhig smos// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// de ni yang dang yang du skom// chos kyi rgyal bsring rnam rgyal
275b7(rgyud): nyid mdor bsdus pas ni thob par 'gyur// rnam rgyal gtsug tor phyag rgya yis// dam pa'i yi ge bsgom par bya// legs par rab gnas 'od zer can// dngos grub ye shes thob par 'gyur// 
275b8(rgyud): de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// gtsug tor rnams kyis legs bshad pa// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// 
276a1(rgyud): lhag pa'i lha ni gcig pu nyid// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// rang 'byung mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// rnal 'byor dbang phyug go 'phang mchog/ sangs
276a2(rgyud): rgyas ye shes dri ma med// bdag nyid chen po thob par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya rnam so// da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
276a3(rgyud): chos kyi yi ge'i rang bzhin gyi ye shes de la bslab par bya'o// zhes bya ba ni rnam par dpyod pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ste/ rnam par 'byed pa'i don du shes par bya'o// oM ba a/ zhes bya/ 
276a4(rgyud): ba ni chos thams cad ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo dar bshad// oM a A aM as pa zhes bya ba ni chos tha/ dmas cad kyi sgo ste don dam par chos thams cad kyi pha rol
276a5(rgyud): tu phyin pa thams cad yongasu rdzogs par lta bar bya'o// oM pa na zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad kyi ming dang gzugasadang shes rab dang / chos dang bcas pa la dbang bsgyur ba'i/ 
276a6(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad// oM na da zhes bya ba ni 'dul ba dang zhi ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongasu rdzogs par byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor brjod// oM deHsa zhes bya ba ni
276a7(rgyud): thogs pa med pa las yang dag par 'das shing yongasu nyon mongs pa dang rnam par spong ba dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i sgo nas phung po dang / khams dang skye mched la
276a8(rgyud): sogs don dam pa'i bden pa nye bar len pa/ mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhago/ oM sU/ ta zhes bya ba ni de bzhin nyid kyi rjesu 'gro ba'i chos kyi dbyings la 'jug/ 
276b1(rgyud): pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par lta'o// oM ta/ ka zhes bya ba ni las kyi rnam par smin pa dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bya'o// oM kaM ma zhes bya ba ni sgyu ma lta bu
276b2(rgyud): nyid dang dran pa med cing snying rje che ba dang shes rab rno ba las byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor gsal bar bshad// oM me/ ga zhes bya ba ni zab mo gting dpag dka' ba'i phyir chos
276b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM go/ dza zhes bya ba ni skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba las yongasu rgal ba'i rang bzhin mi phyed pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dza
276b4(rgyud): d+hA zhes bya ba ni chos kyi dbyings yongasu mi phyed pa'i rdo rje yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta b.rabya'o// oM d+haM/ sha zhes bya ba ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong
276b5(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya/ 'o// oM sha/ kho zhes bya ba ni gang zag dang chos kyi dang ga med pa na mkha' ltar gsal zhing chos thams cad rang
276b6(rgyud): bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag/ oM kha kA zhes bya ba ni/ g.yo ba rtse ba med pas mi zad pa'i ye shes so sor dmigs te chos thams cad yongs/ 
276b7(rgyud): su dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM k+SheHnga zhes bya ba ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thogs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM nga \u0f7f
276b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongasu sbyong ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// a thang rtsa zhes bya ba ni mthar phyin pa dang / mur
277a1(rgyud): thug pa med pa dang / sgrib pa thams cad rab tu spangs pas zad pa dang mi skye ba'i ye shes thob pa'i mchog tu byed pa'i chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad// oM d+hi dz+nyA zhes bya ba ni
277a2(rgyud): dri ma'i rnam par dmigs pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM dz+haiM/ lus rnam par 'byed pa ni 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mtha' nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs te
277a3(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i lus so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ke/ sems rnam par 'byed pa ni nyes pa dang rmongs pa dang bag la nyal ba rab tu spangs nas byang chub
277a4(rgyud): kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM aM/ ngag rnam par 'byed pa ni ngag gi spros pa chos kyi dbyings rnam
277a5(rgyud): par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// / oM baM/ tsha zhes bya ba ni grib ma mi dmigs shing ra/ nga bzhin gyis dang ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor
277a6(rgyud): blta bar bya'o// oM tshe/ g+ha zhes bya ba ni gcig tu 'dres pa ma dmigs pa'i don dam par gnyisu med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM g+haM/ Ta zhes bya ba ni tsa
277a7(rgyud): co dang bral ba dang rdo rje snyems pa 'dzin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad// oM Ta/ pa zhes bya ba ni chos thams cad dbu ba gdos pa lta bu'i tshul gyis gsang ba'i ye
277a8(rgyud): shes gsal ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor bshad do// oM pe Da zhes bya ba ni 'tshe ba las grol ba'i na mkha' la 'gro ba grub pas so sor thob pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
277b1(rgyud): blta bar bya'o// oM De Sha zhes bya ba ni tsha sgo mi dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// a Sha chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba ni chos thams cad kyi sgor
277b2(rgyud): rnam par gzhago/ oM u/ tshul bzhin ni nges par 'byung ba'i don du 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad la 'jug pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM yaM/ de kho na nyid
277b3(rgyud): ni spros pa thams cad rnam par spang ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor rnam par gzhag/ oM te/ ma skyes pa'i chos rnam par grol ba'i mtshan nyid kyi don yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
277b4(rgyud): bshad // oM huM yongasu gzung ba med pa ni 'thab pa dang rtsod dpa spang ba'i chos nyid yin pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo ra blta bar bya'o// oM hri/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa ni
277b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor/ blta bar bya'o// oM ka kha ga g+ha nga rang bzhin 'od bas/ la ba'i mtshan nyid bzung ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor
277b6(rgyud): gnaso// oM tsa tsha dza dzA nya/ snang ba ni gsal zhing 'bar ba'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM Ta Tha Da D+ha Na/ sgom pa ni chos thams cad kun tu sbyor ba dang bral ba yang dag par sdud pa'i
277b7(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad kyi sgo'o// oM ta tha da d+ha na/ gzhi med pa ni chos thams cad ma 'dres pa'i phyir thams cad kyi sgor rnam par bzhag/ oM pa pha ba b+ha ma/ byang chub ni chos thams cad dri ma
277b8(rgyud): med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi sgor blta bar bya'o// oM ya ra la wa mya ngan las 'das pa ni blo bur ba thams cad nges par dor ba'i mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings so sor thob cing
278a1(rgyud): / mngon par shes pa lnga dang ye shes mkhyen pas sangs rgyas kyis yongasu thob pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad kyi sgor bsdu bar bya'o// oM sha Sha sa ha/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog
278a2(rgyud): dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa rnam par 'byed par byed pa'o zhes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sgo rnam par nges pa'o// / 
278a3(rgyud): de nas rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas par gyur pa ni// sngon bzhin nges par byas nas ni// phyogs kun mnyam pa nyid bsgoms nas// ri rab chen po gru bzhi pa// rin chen kun gyis rnam
278a4(rgyud): par rgyan// de yi steng du rdo rje che// de yi steng du pad+ma gzhag/ ma dadab ma brgyad pa chos bkra ba// rnal 'byor gnas zhes rnam par bshad// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa/ 
278a5(rgyud): yongasu rdzogs par bdag nyid kyis// sangs rgyas thams cadanyid bsgoms na// de ni bskal pa'i mthar thug gnas/ sangs rgyas kun gyi phyag rgya che// 'od zer gsal ba'i dkyil
278a6(rgyud): 'khor can// rnal 'byor thams cad bsgom par bya// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// b+ha ga chen po rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor pa gnas mi bzad pa// sangs rgyas kun bdag
278a7(rgyud): bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs par 'gyur// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// sems can kun la thams cad du// gang tshe rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de tshe dngos grub lag
278a8(rgyud): na gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal chos// gdod nas dag cing ma 'dres pa// gang tshe ye shes mthong ba yi// de yi tshe na dag par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad mdor bsdus pa// rnal 'byor
278b1(rgyud): las kyi sbyor ba yis// gang tshe rnal 'byor pa sgom na// sna tshogs las ni byed par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes// 'khor los bsgyur ba rgyal po che/ 
278b2(rgyud): kun mchog sa yi dbang po ni// rdo rje sbyar bas bsgoms na ni// mnyam med 'khor les bsgyur ba mtshungs// gzi brjid phung po phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag par sgom// 'bar
278b3(rgyud): ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs shing mdzes// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms nas ni// rang nyid gzi brjid phung por 'gyur// gdugs dkar rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi// phyag
278b4(rgyud): rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// 'od zer gsal ba'i sbyor ba yis// sems can dag pa nyid du 'gyur// rnam par gsal da pa'i gtsug tor rgya// ral gri 'bar ba'i 'od kyis 'khrugs// 
278b5(rgyud): zag pa med pa'i sbyor ba yis// mnyam med gsal ba'i ga tsug tor mtshungs// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rgyal ba'i
278b6(rgyud): gtsug tor sbyor ba yis// de yi rnam pa'i spyod yul 'gyur// rdo rje dam tshig ye shes che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// kun tu bzang po'i sogs gzugs kyis// mnyam med
278b7(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// gtsug tor lnga ldan stobs po che// rdo
278b8(rgyud): rje'i sbyor bas bsgoms pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya che// don dam par ni bsgoms na ni// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed na// skye bo gzhan lta
279a1(rgyud): smos ci dgos// rdo rje chags pa'i phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam bzhag pas sgom// skye dgu thams cad chags 'gyur na// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rdo rje
279a2(rgyud): legs pa'i phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// legaso ba ni rab gsol bas// bud med thams cad tshim par byed// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// 
279a3(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen phyag rgya che// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrugs pa'i 'od// dpral ba'i phyogasu gnas pa sgom// de yis dar thong dbang bskur thob// rdo rje gzi brjid phyag rgya che// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
279a4(rgyud): mtshungs pa'i 'od// snying khar gnas pa bsgom par bya// ku na mkhyen ye shes ster bar byed// rin chen tog gi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom/ 
279a5(rgyud): sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa mchog/ sgrub po dam pas rdzog sa par byed// rdo rje bzhad pas phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// rdo rje gzhad pa ltar
279a6(rgyud): gyur te// de ni skye dgu dga' byed 'gyur// dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i ye sheso// / pad+ma pad chen pad+ma la// dag pa'i chos ni mnyam gzhag pas// dam pa'i don du bsgom par
279a7(rgyud): bya mnyam med rdo rje chos dang mtshungs// shes rab ye shes rdo rje no// bsgoms pas de ni rdo rje 'chang // shes rab pha rol phyin dag pa// stong nyid sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// dam pa'i don
279a8(rgyud): du bsgom bya te// mnyam med 'jam dbyangs dang ni mtshungs// rdo rje rgyu yi phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag sgoms nas// chos kyi 'khor lo kun mchog rtse// mdor bsdus nas ni
279b1(rgyud): de yis bskor// rdo rje smra ba phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pa'i nus pa yis// ldem po'i ngag ni de yis 'chang// chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// // rdo rje las
279b2(rgyud): kyi phyag rgya che// dam pa'i don du bsgoms na ni// kun nas kun nas rang nyid kyis// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// rdo rje srung ba byams pa che// rdo rje chos zhes grags pa ste// chos kyi sbyor bas bsgoms
279b3(rgyud): na ni// rdo rje srung ba dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtson 'grus che// khro bo chen po stobs po che// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin dang mtshungs 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur
279b4(rgyud): phyag rgya che// lus ngag yid kyi de bzhin du// rdo rje'i sbyor bas/ bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dzin par 'gyur// la das kyi phyag rgya'i ye sheso// // sgeg mos mngon par
279b5(rgyud): dga' ba ste// phreng ba yang ni dbang bskur ba// glu mas ma dzes pa'i sgra dbyangs byed// gar mas rdzu 'phrul thob/ par 'gyur// dri mas bzang po'i dri yin te// me tog byang chub
279b6(rgyud): yan lag nyid smon pas mtha' dag gsal ba'o// bdug pas bdug pa dag la brtson// lcags kyus dbang phyug dgugs byed na// skye bo gzhan la smos ci dgos// zhags pas dbang
279b7(rgyud): po 'ching 'gyur na// gdug pa'i sems can smos ci dgos// lcags sgrog gis ni 'phrog byed dang // tshangs so dbang phyug chen po'ang 'ching // 'bebs pas thams cad 'bebs
279b8(rgyud): 'gyur na// dman pa'i mi dag smos ci dgos// 'di nyid kyi sbyor ba yis// chos kyi yi ge mchog gi ni// phyag rgya'i ye shes rab sbyor bas// sbyar te myur du sgrub par bya// 'di yi sbyor/ 
280a1(rgyud): bshes par bya// phyag rgya'i 'khor lo khyad par du// spyi gtsug snying kha rkang pa'i bar// yi ge yis ni yongs gang bar// gzugs brnyan gcig gis go 'phang gyur/ 
280a2(rgyud): sems rtse gcig gyur bsam gtan gyi// sa la rab gnas pad+ma ni// dbang chen gyis ni gnas zhes bshad// dbang po gnyis ni mtshungs sbyor bas// dbang phyug kyang ni bsgrub par bya// dbang
280a3(rgyud): chen dag ni gru bzhi pa// dbang chen gyis ni las su bshad// chu ni zlum por shes par bya// pad+ma'i mtshan mas rnam par mtshan// zhi bar byed pa'i las dang ldan// zhi ba'i don du de
280a4(rgyud): bshad// me ni gru gsum shes par bya// sum mdo yi ni ga na su gnas// dbang du bya ba sgrub don du// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i 'od// mngon spyod la ni brtson 'grus che// rlung gi/ 
280a5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brjod bya ste// ral gri yi ni phyag rgya'i dbyib sa// dbyar gyi sprin dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// ser nga nga dkar dang de bzhin dmar// nag po yang ni khyad par du// 
280a6(rgyud): dang po'i dkyil 'khor tshul gyis ni// tha ma'i bar du rab tu brtag/ dang po rdo rje rab tu bzhag/ de yi rje su rin chen te// pad+ma dang ni las rnal 'byor// grub pa'i go 'phang rim par bshad/ 
280a7(rgyud): phyag rgya thams cad kyi ye sheso// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rtag pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bka' stsal pa/ gnyis dang gnyis su
280a8(rgyud): med pas yongasu dag pas chos thams cad rnam par grol ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rtag pa dang chad pa yong su dag pas chos thams cad zhi ba dang mtha' dang mtha' med pa'i phyag
280b1(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// zad pa'i sgo dang zad pa'i mtha' dang zad pa'i mur thug pa dang ldan pas chos thams cad zad pa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 
280b2(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid kyi mtha' rnam par dag pas chos thams cad la skur pa mi 'debs pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mig lnga las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad na mkha'i phyag rgyas rgyas
280b3(rgyud): btab pa'o// sems can na mkha'i dbyings nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad na mkha'i rang bzhin gyis phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyingasu yang dag par 'du ba nyid kyi phyir chos thams cad dbye
280b4(rgyud): mi phyed pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byang chub kyi sems dang tha mi dad pas chos thams cad byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos kyi dbyings mi phyid pa'i
280b5(rgyud): mtshan nyid yin pas chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// ngo bo nyid med pas chos tham sa cad stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba
280b6(rgyud): med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skad cig ma nyid pas chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang rga ba dang 'chi ba'i
280b7(rgyud): mtha' dang ldan pas chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' de bzhin nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab
280b8(rgyud): pa'o// gdod ma nas yongasu dag pas chos thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad chen po stong pa
281a1(rgyud): / nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// spros pa'i dmigs pa rnam par bral bas chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// re ba thams cad las rnam par
281a2(rgyud): grol bas chos thams cad smon pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyis na chos thams cad mi rtag pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// phung po
281a3(rgyud): lnga po yongasu 'dus pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ni chos thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyi bdag med pas chos thams cad bdag med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas
281a4(rgyud): btab pa'o// shin tu mi g.yo ba'i phyir chos thams cadad zhi ba'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// don dam pa'i bde ngan pa yang dag par 'du ba'i phyir chos thams cad bden pa'i phyag
281a5(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'tsho ba rnam par mi gnas pa'i phyirachos thams cad dri ma med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa/ 'o// mchog tu mthar phyin pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'khrug pa
281a6(rgyud): med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad ji lta ba bzhin gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 'jal ba'i dbang du byed pa dang dbang du
281a7(rgyud): bya ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad sgro 'dogs pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// byed pa pos byas pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'jig pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin
281a8(rgyud): gyis ma byung ba'i phyir chos thams cad 'byung ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'gog pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// 
281b1(rgyud): 'gag pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad gdod ma nas skye ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// rtog ge kun tu spyod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i phyag
281b2(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gzugs rnam par lta ba med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// gnas yongasu bcad pa'i phyir chos thams cad nye bar sbyar
281b3(rgyud): ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams cad nye bar mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad la rjesu sbyor ba med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mngon par 'du
281b4(rgyud): byed pa thams cad med pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi rna dam par smin pa med pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// skye ba dang / gnas pa las rnam par grol ba'i phyir chos tham
281b5(rgyud): cad 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// nam/ kha' dang khyad par med pa'i phyir chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtshan nyid gcig pa'i
281b6(rgyud): phyir gzugs dang tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang rnam par shes pa'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying po med pa'i phyir chos thams cad phung po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// snying
281b7(rgyud): po dang bcas pa med pa'i phyir/ chos thams cad khams dang skye mched kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku dang mnyam pa nyid thob pas chos thams cad khams dang skye mched
281b8(rgyud): kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu 'jig rten gyi lam rnam par dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// lha rje su byed pa'i
282a1(rgyud): phyir chos thams cad phyag rgya chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// mtha' gcig tu chos la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir chos thams cad chos kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad
282a2(rgyud): kyi las sna tshogs byed pa'i phyir chos thams cad las kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// thams cad dam tshig thams cad rjes su sgrub pa'i phyir chos thams cad dam tshig gi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o/ 
282a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu mi gnas pa'i phyir chos thams cad sangs rgyas kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// chos thams cad 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa/ 
282a4(rgyud): dang theg pa chen po'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / gsang sngags kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / phyagargya'i phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgyas
282a5(rgyud): rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / rdo rje ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang ye shes thams cad kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / 
282a6(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / me long lta bu'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / 
282a7(rgyud): so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / bya ba sgrub pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa dang / chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pa'i ye shes kyi phyag
282a8(rgyud): rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'o// ma/ 'jam dpal phyag rgya'i tshig 'di dag ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i ye shes kyi tshig de bzhin
282b1(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshig thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasu rdzogs par byed pa theg pa chen po'i tshig ste/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i
282b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyag rgya nyid kyi phyag rgya'i tshig gang gis/ phyag rgya'i tshig 'di rnams kyis kyang chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bskyed par byed do// sems can
282b3(rgyud): thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud la phyag rgyas rgyas btab pa'o// a aM oMHAM/ sngags pas phyag rgya 'di lta bus rgyas btab na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya yang dag par 'du'o// 
282b4(rgyud): hUM myur du ma skyes pa'i chos rnams la bzod pa thob par la/ gyuraro// khaMng de nas da ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams ca dad kyi sbyor ba thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po phyag rgya'i ye shes
282b5(rgyud): gyur pa ni snying gi dbus rtag bsgom bya/ pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi steng du rtag sgom
282b6(rgyud): pa// yi ge yi ni gtso bo mchog/ thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// kha ba ba mo'i 'od 'dra 'ong // dpa' bo kun da zla ltar dkar// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar 'od gsal// zhi ba'i chos kyi rang bzhin sku
282b7(rgyud): kun mkhyen ye shes kyis gang ba// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // ra sA ya na dang mtshungs mchog/ kha yig mkha' 'drar shes par bya// thig le nA ngas rnam par spras// gsang ba
282b8(rgyud): chen po mchog tu mdzes// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ de yi steng du 'od zer che// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// rdo rje rdo rje lta bur gnas// spyi bor rtse mo lnga dang ldan// de yi steng du
283a1(rgyud): rtag bsam pa// yi ge mchog gi go 'phang ngo // man ngag mchog las shes bya ste// gzhan du na ning mi smra// sangs rgyas mkhas pa thams cad kyi// mdor bsdus nas ni 'di/ 
283a2(rgyud): gsungaso/ rnam par grol ba gsum thob nas// thob 'gyur 'di ni gzhan du min// lce ni rkan la sbyar bar bya// sna yi rtse mor yig ge hUM// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// phyag rgya'i go
283a3(rgyud): 'phang tshig gis ni// shes rab ldan pas rang sems sgom// snang ba med cing spros med pa// shin tu mchog tu phrar shes bya// khyab bdag bsod nams ye shes dngos// bsam bya
283a4(rgyud): bsam gtan brtson bya ste// mig dang sgron ma'i 'od bzhi na du// ra yig 'bar ba dang ldan pa// mgrin pa 'ab rid pas gtsum nas ni// dkar po ser po sngon po'i 'od// 
283a5(rgyud): dmar po yang ni bdag gis spro// 'bar ba 'di dag 'bad/ pa yi// 'di dag yang dag nyer mtshon bya// snying khar/ gsal bar byas nas su// de bzhin thams cad spyi bor song
283a6(rgyud): gnas de las ni 'thon nas kyang // dbang po thams cad dgang bar byas// de las 'thon nas 'jig rten ni// mtshungs par kun nas thams cad du// slar yang de ru 'ongs nas ni// de ni
283a7(rgyud): 'jug par rab tu bsam// yid kyis de ltar bsgoms na ni// rang nyid 'khor los bsgyur lta bur// dbang po gnyis ni rab sbyor bas// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// 
283a8(rgyud): dbang po lngas ni dmigs nas yang // mi rnams lus ni dag par 'gyur// ji snyed bud med yon tan dang // ldan pa kun tu gnas pa ni// bkug nas bcug ste bcings nas su// dbang
283b1(rgyud): du bya ste bsgrub par bya// de rnams lhan cig yongs brten nas// sngags pa mchog gi dngos grub thob// gsang ba mchog tu dgyes pa na// shes rab pha rol phyin pa ste// zhi ba'i chos kyi rim pa
283b2(rgyud): mchog/ shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa sgom// rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub gang // de 'grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// mchog ni rtag par shes par bya// bar mas phun sum tshogs pa ste/ 
283b3(rgyud): stong pa nyid dang mtshan med mchog/ smon pa med pa zhes su grags// chos kun bdag med pa yi mchog/ kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs par byed// sa bcu yi ni stobs dag gis// pha rol phyin pa
283b4(rgyud): thams cad thob// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// de nyid 'di ni bcud dkyis len// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ theg chen
283b5(rgyud): mchog tu yid 'ong ba// stong nyid bsgoms pa bdag nyid can / gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ gang gis rtag tu sgom byed na// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// yon tan mchog
283b6(rgyud): las skyes par 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// bud med lus ngag yang sbyor bas// yongs reg a ling gtsum pas// mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bud med kha dog ljang ku dang // 
283b7(rgyud): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de tshe 'di ni sngags pas brten// mnyam med gsang ba'i ye shes mtshungs// bud med gang zhig kha dog dkar// pad+ma'i mngab ma 'dra ba'i 'od// de dang lhan cig
283b8(rgyud): sngags pas bsdad // dam pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur// bu mo gang zhig kha dog dmar// ut+pa la yi rgyan 'chang ma// sngags pas de dang lhan cig gnas// shes rab pha rol phyin mtshungs
284a1(rgyud): 'gyur 'bud med in+d+ra nI la mtshungs// gsang ba rdo rje rje sa sbyor// rig 'dzin rnams ni rgyal po ni// stobs chen grub pa de 'gyuraro// gsang chen ma ra ka ta mtshungs// gang gis
284a2(rgyud): rtag tu brten pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// myur du gsang ba'i dam par 'gyur// bud med pad+ma rA ga dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas
284a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin ma lta bur sgrub// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes mchog/ bsam pas rtag tu sgom pa ni// mnyam med sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs// dran pa nye bar
284a4(rgyud): gzhag pa bzhi// mchog gi gnas kyis bsgoms na ni// rnam 'byor mchog gi mo ring bar// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'gyu dar// yang dag spong ba rnam pa bzhi// legs par mnyam par
284a5(rgyud): gzhag pa sgom// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// ma nyam med 'jig rten dbang phyug mtshungs// so so yang da ga rig pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgoms na ni// 
284a6(rgyud): rdo rje sangs rgyas ting 'dzin mchog/ mnyam med 'jam pa'i mchog dang 'dra// mi 'jigs pa ni rnam pa bzhi// rdo rje'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug par/ 
284a7(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bu ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi ni rkang pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam gzhag sgom na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// tshangs pa yi ni gnas
284a8(rgyud): bzhi po// tshad med pa yi sems kyis ni// rdo rje sbyar bar bdag bsgoms na// rdo rje 'dzin pa lta bur 'grub// sbyor ba'i bdag nyid dbang po lnga// dam pa'i don gyis bsgoms na ni// dbang
284b1(rgyud): po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// mnyam med rdo rje sangs rgyas mtshungs// yid kyi stobs ni rnam pa lnga// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsgom na ni// 'khor los sgyur ba brtson 'grus che// stobs 'dzin
284b2(rgyud): lta bu nyid du 'gyur// byang chub yan lag rin chen bdun// gsang sngags sgom pas bsgoms na ni// rtog pa'i ye shes sbyor ba yis// khyab bdag chos kun 'dzin par 'gyur// 'phags pa'i
284b3(rgyud): yan lag brgyad kyi lam// kun mkhyen ye shes rdzogs byed pa// de ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten shes la rab tu 'da'// rjesu dran pa rnam pa drug/ bdag nyid rtse gcig gis
284b4(rgyud): bsgoms na// sngags pa rdo rje 'dzin pa ru// sngags pa dus mi ring bar 'gyur// stobs bcu po ni yang dag bsgom/ sa// sgom pa'i rnal 'byor de nyid kyis// bsod nams ye shes
284b5(rgyud): yongs rdzogs te// rtag tu stobs bcu'i dam par 'gyur// pha rol phyin bcu yongasu rdzogs// stobs rnams dang ning bang rnams dang // sa rnams kun gyis nges bskyed nas// myur
284b6(rgyud): du mtshan ma dag par 'gyur// rnam grol gos kyis bsgribs nas su// de yi nu ma shin tu bsnun// rje ngar gyis kyang de bzhin du// mchu yis mchu ni yongasu bzung // 'bad pas dam du a ling ga/ 
284b7(rgyud): byang chub sems ni sgom par bya// rdo rje ye shes brtson 'grus che// rdo rje dbyingasu bdag brtan pas// rnam pa sna tshogs ka ra na// rnal 'byor shes pa de brten bya// bud med rnams kyi dam tshig 'grub
284b8(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' mtshungs par 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi b+ha ga bsdun// ling ga myur du gang bar 'gyur// sbyor ba 'di ni mkhyen pa yis// stobs chen sangs rgyas rab tu grub// gsang ba 'din
285a1(rgyud): dam pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa'o// gsang ba 'di yi sbyor ba yis// yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ma 'dres pa'i// chosu grags pa gang
285a2(rgyud): yin pa// de rnams sgom byed gtso bo ni// dngos grub thams cad rab tshogs pa'o// ma 'dres pa yi chos bco brgyad// sangs rgyas chosu grags pa ste// de rnams sgom pa dang ldan pas// sangs rgyas
285a3(rgyud): byang chub rab lter byed// bsam gtan bzhi po thob nas ni// gzugs med pa yi rtag par yang // 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug ldan par// sangs rgyas byang chub sgrub pa po// byang chub phyogs
285a4(rgyud): ni sum cu bdun// chos ni mchog tu rmad byung ba// de rnams pa sgom pa dang ldan pas// byang chub sems dpa'i skyob dpa'o// sngags rnams thams cad rab 'grub cing // sbyor ba
285a5(rgyud): thams cad thams cad du'o// des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis/ sangs rgyas chos nyid bsgom par bya// 'jig rten 'dzi/ rten 'das pa'i las// ye shes rin chen rab rnyed dka'
285a6(rgyud): mchod dang dbang bskur byin brlabs pas// rnyed 'gyur gzhan du ma yin no// bshags dang gsol ba gdab pa dang // bdag nyid dbul ba de bzhin no// sangs rgyas sogs la yi rang zhing // de
285a7(rgyud): bzhin yongasu bsngo ba dang // byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// khyad par du ni dus kun du'o// thog ma bar dang phye ma red du// ji lta bzhin du rjes bsgoms pas// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ 
285a8(rgyud): 'di la the tsom yod ma yin// 'gro ba sems kyis spro ba ni// brtan pa'i snying por legs par bshad// stong nyid de bzhin nyid las byung // rdo rje sems dpar de bshad // 'gro ba thams cad bkug
285b1(rgyud): nasu sa sangs rgyas byang chub sbyar bar bya// don yod ye shes dag pa ste// rdo rje rgyal po mchog ces bshad// rdo rje chags pas chags gyur nas// rang bzhin gyis ni brtan par 'gyur// 'gro ba ma lus lus
