285b2(rgyud): med par// de yi sems ni chags par bshad// chos rnams kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// rnam par dben zhing gnyi su med// gang tshogs dag pa'i bdag nyid mthong // de tshe rdo rje legs par bshad// 
285b3(rgyud): sems dpa' bzhi po yis// ming dang brda' ni sbyar ba'o// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// sdom pa mchog tu dam pa'o// khams gsum pa yi rgyal srid che// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par
285b4(rgyud): byas pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin mchog gtso// rdo rje dbang bskur las byung ba// de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes te// ro dag pa med cing yi ge med// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gzi brjid
285b5(rgyud): mchog/ brtan pa rtag pa nyid du 'gyur// na mkha'i mdzod ni/ mdzod chen po// chos rnams thams cad dbang bsgyurapa// yid bzhin nor bu rdo rje che// rdo rje rtog ni bla na med// ye shes
285b6(rgyud): snang ba rin chen che// rmad du byung ba nges par mthong // de bzhin gshegs kun gsang ba ni// rdo rje bzhad pa zhes grags// chos kyi bdag med las byung ba// gnyisu med pa'i ye shes mchog
285b7(rgyud): chos nyid dam pa bsam du med// rdo rje chos zhes bya bar dran// rdo rje blo gros snang ba che// shes rab ye shes dri med mchog/ zag med shes rab chen po pa// de ni rdo rje rnon por bshad// sangs rgyas
285b8(rgyud): rnams kyi chos 'khor lo// gnyi su med las byung bar mtshon// yan lag bcu gnyis rten 'brel ming // rdo rje rgyu zhes nges par bshad// dgongs pa skad ni spros pa'i mchog/ yul rnams kyi ni
286a1(rgyud): bshad pa ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzlas pa che// de na rdo rje smra bar bshad// sems can kun gyi don la sbyar// sangs rgyas kun gyi mchod pa che// gdod nas dag pa'i rnal 'byor che// de ni rje
286a2(rgyud): lasu bshad// bla na med pa'i byams pa che// bsrung ba'i bya ba gong na med// dag ni chos ni brtson chen po// rdo rje bsrung ba zhesu grags// shes rab thabs kyi khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun dang rjes 'thun pa// 
286a3(rgyud): mongs thams cad za ba che// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin brjod// lus ngag yid ni yang dag sbyor// sgrib pa med cing yi ge bral// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // de ni rdo rje mtshams sbyor bshad// / 
286a4(rgyud): / rje ye shes rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun gyi stobs po che// thog ma tham med zhib rig pa mchog ces bya bar bshad// de nas ya dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
286a5(rgyud): cad kyi rdo rje'i glus de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad legs par/ mchod glur blangs pa/ oM sarba bud+d+ha pa ra me shwa ra bud+yA shud+d+ha la li ho su b+ha gaHsu ra ta// ma hA ma hA A di ma hA b+ho d+hi shu D+ha shuD+ha/ 
286a6(rgyud): yo gI shwa ra tA b+hA bi tAd ma ka ta thA ga ta/ byang chub sems bskyed las 'khrungs pa// sangs rgyas kun la phyag 'tsha lo// mchog gi dbang phyug dam pa'i chos// gdod nas zhi ba la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems
286a7(rgyud): dpa' skyob pa po// rdo rje can kun la phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje che// sangs rgyas byang chub la phyag 'tshal// mi dmigs go 'phang la gnas pa// mtha' las 'das pa la phyag 'tshal// 'dren pa
286a8(rgyud): rnams kyi stobs po che// hUM gi yi ge ma lus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa mtha' dag dang // shin tu yongasu mya ngan 'da'// 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon bzang po// rdo rje ye shes dri ma med// rnam par dag pa
286b1(rgyud): rdo rje mchog/ dngos grub thams cad rab gsol byed// rnal 'byor dbang phyug rnams kyi mgon// dus gsum bsam pa dbang bsgyur ba// sems can rnams la phan don du// 'byung ba khyod la
286b2(rgyud): phyag 'tshal 'dud// rdo rje snying po rgyan las dkyil 'khor chen po yongasu rdzog so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur nas/ de bzhin
286b3(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po rdo rje snying po'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i phyag rgya'i don ched du brjod pa// de nas
286b4(rgyud): yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// rje snying po zhes grags pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa 'o// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par
286b5(rgyud): mdzes// sgo khyud rdo rje'i gzugs brnyan dang // phyag rgya dang lnga na rab tu mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// 'khor lo gnyis ni rab tu gnas// rtsibs brgyad pa dang
286b6(rgyud): bcu drug rtsibs// rnam par dbye ba legs par brtag/ dbus kyi dkyil 'khor nang gi ni// lte ba'i gnas gnas legs brtags pa// pad+ma chen po 'dab brgyad pa// ge sar gtams pas
286b7(rgyud): rab tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni// khyab bdag rnal 'byor dbang phyug che// rnam par snang mdzad brtson chen po// sems can kun la rjes brtsibs// de yi nye 'khor kun tu ni// de bzhin
286b8(rgyud): gshegs brgyad rnams dgod// shar du dgod bya 'khor lo can// gtsug tor dkar po nub du gnas// gzi brjid phu jo lho ru'o// rnam par rgyal ba byang du gnas// dbang ldan rnam par bsal
287a1(rgyud): / pa bri/ mer ni steng 'gro dgod par bya// steng 'gro chen po bden bral du// rlung du rgyal ba chen po gnas// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rnal 'byor ldan pas 'di dag
287a2(rgyud): bri mi bskyod pa ni shar du dgod// lce ru rin chen 'byung ldan no// nub du 'od dpag med par 'gyur// byang du don yod grub pa'i ming // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten pa'o// dbang ldan phyogs nas
287a3(rgyud): brtsams nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs bri// thams cad zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas// 'khor rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la'o// phreng ba rnam par dgod bya ba// rang gi phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar/ 
287a4(rgyud): rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i// lha mo 'bad pas dgod par bya// rdo rje gdug pa la sogs bri// de bzhin gzugs kyi rdo rje sogs// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs pa// sgo srung 'bad pas/ 
287a5(rgyud): bri bar bya// phyi yi dkyil 'khor la gnas par// kun tu bza nga sogs rim bzhin bri// rang gi phyag rgya'i 'khor rnams dang // pho nya yi ni 'khor dag dang // khro bo rnams dang mngags
287a6(rgyud): pa dang // de bzhin pho nya pho nya ma// rgya mtsho yi ni dkyil 'khor ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsal ba'o// phyi ru phyi rol rdo rje'i ming // dkyil 'khor la ni 'bad pas bri// dbang ldan phyogs nas brtsams
287a7(rgyud): nas su// 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad po bri// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen ming // dbang po la sogs lha thams cad// ma mo kun dang sring mo rnams// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang klu// de bzhin
287a8(rgyud): lha rnams thams cad dang // brtson 'grus chen po na mkha' lding // 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas// khyad par du ni mchod par bya// me tog bdug sdes rol mo'i
287b1(rgyud): tshogs/ de bzhin bza' dang ston mo sogs// phreng ba'i rgyan ni sna tshogs kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi cho ga yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad
287b2(rgyud): nas// 'khor lo kun gyi cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// de nas slob ma thams cad gzhug/ yongasu dag pa khyad par du// byang chub sems ni bskyed nas su// byang chub
287b3(rgyud): bslab pa rjes spyod pa// cho ga shes pa'i sngags pas gzhug/ 'dren pa rnams la mchog tu gzhug/ rdo rje'i dbang bskur sbyor ba yis// dbang bskur ba ni de nas sbyin// seng ge'i khri yi steng du ni// dar dang me tog
287b4(rgyud): chun pos spras// dkar po'i gdugs dang rin chen che// bla re rgya che 'bar ba dang // de yi g.yas kyi drung du ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzhag par bya// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs dang // sna tshogs
287b5(rgyud): rab kyis rab mchod pa// g.yon gyi drung du thams cad nas// 'bad pa yis ni bzhag par bya// rin chen sman kun gyi/ sa gang ba'i// bum pa legs par bzhag byas te// rdo rje
287b6(rgyud): ming gi dbang bskur gyis// de la rang gi dbang bskur bya// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur ba// mkhas pa yis ni slar yang bya// kun gyi cod pan dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur/ 
287b7(rgyud): bya/ chos kyi cod pan dbang bskur dang // sangs rgyas kun gyi skyob pa ni// sna tshogs las kyi dbang bskur sbyin// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam mtshungs pa'o// chos kyi sku yi dbang bskur ba// sangs
287b8(rgyud): rgyas kun gyi sgrol ma sbyin// de lta slob ma dbang bskur ba// khyad par du ni sngags pas bya// de la dam tshig cho ga yis// sngags dang phyag rgyas sbyar bar bya// slob dpon brnyas par mi bya
288a1(rgyud): zhing sgrub po kun la smad mi bya// sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad la// 'da' bar mi bya smad mi bya// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang // grub mtha'i rigs pa thams cad la// spang / 
288a2(rgyud): par mi bya blang mi bya// de la mngon par dga' ba spangs// sdig pa thams cad rnam spangs shing // de bzhin bsod nams thams cad bsdu// bza' dang ston mo du ma la// bza' bar mi bya smad
288a3(rgyud): mi bya// 'das pas bcom ldan sems dpa' ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi sras bdag skyes// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// nam yang dor bar mi bya'o// sangs rgyas thams cad chags las
288a4(rgyud): 'khrungs// de bzhin zhe sdang rmongs las 'khrungs// mnyam da dang mi mnyam chos kun dang // dbu ma'i gnas la gnas nas su// de nyid dam tshig shes nas su// sangs
288a5(rgyud): / rgyas byang chub yong mi spong // lus can kun la 'tshe mi bya/ khyod kyis ser sna mi bya ste/ phra dog bya bar mi bya'o// dam pa'i chos ni spang mi bya// 
288a6(rgyud): byang chub sems ni mchog tu bde// chang gi btung ba spang bya ste// pha rol bud med rnam par spang // thams cad mkhyen pa yong mi dor// rtag tu srog chags gsad mi bya// sems// 
288a7(rgyud): can kun la snying rje dang // byams pa yang ni rnam par sgom// sems can rnams la phan pa ni// yang dang yang du yongs bsdu bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa// dam tshig de nyid
288a8(rgyud): 'di dag ni// slob ma rnams la rjes brtse bas// mkhas pa yis ni bstan par bya// de nas phyag rgya rjes bcing ba// go rims bzhin du bstan par bya// phyag rgya 'di dag khyad par gyis/ 
288b1(rgyud): mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// thal mo brtan par bsdam par bya// me tog zum pa'i tshul du mdzes// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// pad+ma'i thal mo zhesu bsgrags// rtse mo thams
288b2(rgyud): cad legs bskyang ba// pad+ma'i phyag rgya zhes su brjod// re re'i mtshams su nges bcing ba// de ni rdo rje thal mor brtags// sor mo thams cad nges bsdams pa// rdo rje bsdams pas legs
288b3(rgyud): bcings pa// sor mo rkyang ste steng du bstan/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// khu tshur nang du byas nas nis/ gnyis ka sbyor bas yongs su brtag/ 'khor les bsgyur sogs phyag rgya'o// 
288b4(rgyud): dam pa sbyin pa yin par bshad// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams ca cad kyi// dam tshig phyag rgya 'di yin no// ming med nang bcug khu tshur gyis// kun gyi rtse mor yongs su brtag
288b5(rgyud): rdo rje'i rnam pa legs par sbyar// rdo rje chen po zhes su bsgrag/ sa// mthe chung srin lag khu tshur las// gung mo leg sa par bskyang nas su// mdzub mos mthe bong yongs su
288b6(rgyud): sbyar ba 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid gsol byed// brkyang ba'i rtse mo sbyar ba ni// gdugs dkar zhes ni rab tu grags// srin lag dang ni mthe bong sbyar// gung mo gnyis ni brtag par bya// 
288b7(rgyud): gzi brjid phung po'i phyag rgya che// gzi brjid phung po nyid gsol byed// de nyid ral gri lta bur sbyar// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su grags// de nyid rgyal ba zhes bya ba// rdo rje ldan pa de bzhin
288b8(rgyud): gshegs// khu tshur snying po ldan byas pas// gtsug tor rnam pa'i 'byung gnas te// thub dka' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// steng du 'gro ba zhes su bshad// rdo rje bsdams pa
289a1(rgyud): yongs su sbyar// dam tshig kun gyi 'byung gnas te// gung mo'i rtse mo mchog tu sbyar// mthe chung dang ni mthe bong brkyang // lcags kyu mnga' yi sbyor ba yis// legs so
289a2(rgyud): pa ni sbyar bar bya// gung mo rdo rje rin chen rtse// phye ba gzi brjid mchog gi mchog/ rgyal mtshan gnas su nges par sbyar// bzhad pa'i gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// dbu ma
289a3(rgyud): pad+ma lta bur kum// ral gri 'dzin pa 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'khor lo sbyar ba'i 'khor los bsgyur// kha ru phye ma'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje smra ba nyid du 'gyur// las kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya che// 
289a4(rgyud): gar mtshungs rdo rje sna tshogs can// chos yongs sdud pa'isbyor ba yis// rdo rje srung bar brtag par bya// mche/ dab gnyis ni rnam par gtsigs// rdo rje gnod sbyin zhes su
289a5(rgyud): bshad khu tshur bcas pa khu tshur gyis// rdo rje thal mo snying khar bzhag/ rdo rje sgeg mo zhes su grags// yongasu sbyar ba spyi bor bzhag/ rdo rje phreng ba zhes su brjod// thal
289a6(rgyud): mo sbyar ba gdong du grol// rdo rje glu mar rjes su bsgrags// 'gyed cing 'dud pa'i sbyor ba yis// de ni rdo rje gar mar bshad// pad+ma'i thal mo gdong du dbye// spyi bor yongasu sbyar la
289a7(rgyud): bzhag snying khar mthe bo mnyam pa dang // rab tu brkyang ba byug pa'o// lag pa steng du yongs brkyang ba// gzugs kyi phyag rgya nyid du 'gyur// lag gnyis rna ba'i lam du gzhag
289a8(rgyud): sgra yi phyag rgya nyid du bshad// dri ni byug pa'i sbyor ba yis// dri yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// gdong du snyim pa phye ba ni// ro yi phyag rgya zhes su brjod// mkha' la myur ba'i sbyor ba yis// 
289b1(rgyud): reg pa reg pa zhes su bshad// mthe chung gnyis ni yongs sbyar// mdzub mo lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// de nyid zhags pa'i dbyibs dang ni// lu gu rgyud kyi rnam par brtag/ bzhi pa rdo rje
289b2(rgyud): dril bu zhes// rdo rje 'bebs par rnam par brtag/ phyag rgya kun dang nye ba'i rgya// blo gros ldan pa rang gis brtag/ thal mo yongasu sbyar la bsdam// mdzub mo gnyis po bskum nas/ 
289b3(rgyud): ni// rin po che yi rnam par bcing // kun tu bzang po blo ldan gyis// de las rtse mo rtse mo bskum// sems kyis byams pa bsgoms nas ni// mdzub mo sbyar la bcug nas ni// ral gri'i rnam
289b4(rgyud): par brtag pa ste// 'di ni na mkha'i snying po yi// phyag rgyar sa dngas rgyas kun gyis bsngags// de nas ral gri'i ma tshon cha yis// rnam pa ru ni nyer gnas pa// phyag rgya 'di ni
289b5(rgyud): rnam 'gog par// thams cad kyis ni yongasu brjod// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje thal mo rab tu brkyang // pad+ma lta bur rnam par brtag/ pad+ma'i lag pa blo ldan gyis
289b6(rgyud): de nyid me tog zum tshul dang // ut+pal rnam pa ltar mdzes pa// 'di ni pad+ma sgrol ba'i rgya// pad+ma'i mgon po zhesu grags// mche ba gtsigs pa dang ldan pa'i// kha dang 'dra bar legs
289b7(rgyud): par brtag/ 'di ni rta mgrin phyag rgya ste// kha yi phyogasu rab tu brtag/ pad+ma'i thal mo dpral ba yi// khro gnyer du ni nye bar sbyar// rdo rje thal mo 'bebs pa che// dpal gyi snying po rin chen
289b8(rgyud): ldan// yid bzhin nor bu'i rnam pa bzung // thal mo legs par rab tu brkyang // mi zad blo gros phyag rgya che// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen rdo rje snying/ 
290a1(rgyud): khar bzhag/ na mkha' mdzod kyi phyag rgya ste// na mkha'i mdzod nyid ster bar byed// rdo rje chen po legs par brkyang // mthe chung mthe bo nges par bcing // lag pa gnyis ni nges pa
290a2(rgyud): brtag/ blo gros rgya mtsho'i phyag rgyar 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo steng du bgreng // mdzub mo gnyis po sbyar bar bya// 'di ni rdo rje snying po'i rgya// rdo rje snying pos bka' stsal to// khu tshur nang du byas nas/ 
290a3(rgyud): mdzub mo gnyis po rtse mo bya// 'di ni 'jam dpal phyag rgya ste// rdo rje ral gri zhesu brtag/ de nyid shag ti'i rnam pa ni// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni blo ldan gyi'o// gshin rje mthar byed mdung rtser 'gyur// 
290a4(rgyud): mdung rtse chen por rab tu brtag/ mdzub mo bskum par byas nas/ ni// gung mo'i steng du yongasu bzhag/ zhags pa'i rnam par pa ldan pa'i// gshin rje yang ni 'jigs par byed// de nyid
290a5(rgyud): ral gri byas pa ni// skra can ma ru rab tu bshad// khu tshur tham/ sa cad nges bcings te// mdzub mo gcig ni bskum pa ra bya// 'di ni nye ba'i sgra can ma yi rgyar// 'jam pa'i dpyang
290a6(rgyud): kyis bka' stsal to// rdo rje bsdams pa stengs bcings te// dbu ma gnyis ni rnam par spangs// mdzub mo rdo rje'i rnam par bya// mthe chung dang ni mthe bo brkyang // 'di ni rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i// phyag rgya don
290a7(rgyud): kun sgrub byed yin// mdzub mo mthe bong bsdams pa ni// mA ma kir ni yongasu bshad// mdzub mor lcags sgrog rnam pa las// gung mo'i dbu ma rdo rjer bya// 'di ni rdo rje lcags sgrog rgya// rdo rje lha
290a8(rgyud): bur yongasu bshad// rdo rje chen po rtse lnga pa// khro bo gzegs mar rnam par bshad// mchog gi rtse mo rtse gcig bya// rdo rje rtse mo nyid kyir bshad// lag na rin chen phyag rgya ni// lag gnyis
290b1(rgyud): legs par brkyang bar bya// sor mo pad+ma'i dbyibs su bya// bskul byed lha me yongasu bshad// thal mo yongasu sbyar ba las// mdzubya mo dang ni mthe bong dag/ mig gi tshul du sbyar bar bya// 
290b2(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan gyi rnam par bshad// bkra shis kyis ni skyil krung bca'// rnal 'byor rig pas lus bsrungs te// lag gnyis lhung bzed 'dzin 'dra ba// bsam gtan phyag
290b3(rgyud): rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di ni rnam par snang mdzad rgya// sangs rgyas kun gyis don mdzad pa'o// mi bskyod pa yis la reg/ rin chen tog gi mchog sbyin bshad// bsam gtan phyag rgya 'od
290b4(rgyud): dpag med// ngo bo nyid kyi don rtogs byed// don yod gzigs pa'i phyag rgya ni// mi 'jigs 'jigs pa med pa spyi dan// blo ldan rnal 'byor skyil krung gnas// sangs rgyas
290b5(rgyud): kun gyi rang bzhin bdag/ mnyam par gzhag pa phyag rgya kun// 'ching ba 'am ni 'ching du gzhug/ 'jig rte na pa yi phyag rgya la// lag pa gcig ni rab brkyang ste/ 
290b6(rgyud): dbang ldan gyi ni rtse gsum pa// mthe bos mthe chung mnan par bya// lha yi dbang po rdo rjer 'gyur// lag pa g.yas pas brtag par bya// me yi oM yig lag pa dag/ mthe bong gung mo nyid
290b7(rgyud): la gzhag/ gshin rje'i rdo rje dbyug pa ste// mdzub mo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// de nyid khyab 'jug 'khor lo ste// 'khor lo'i yi ge dgod par bya// lag pa cig gis thed pa ni// ma mo
290b8(rgyud): rnams kyir yang dag bshad// sor mo gnyis sgreng ral gri ni// srin po bdag nyid chen po'i 'o// mdzub mo mthe bong sbyar ba ni// chu lha'i zhags pa nyid du bshad// mdzub mo dang ni gung mo
291a1(rgyud): dag/ rgyal mtshan lta bur legs par brkyang // rlung lha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya ni// lag pa gnyis kyis rab tu brtag/ dbu ma gcig pu legs brkyang ba// dbyug to'i phyag/ 
291a2(rgyud): rgya rab tu bshad// gnod sbyin kun gyi dbang phyug ni// lus ngag bdag nyid chen po'o// mchod phyir thogs kyi phyag rgya ni// tshangs pa yi ru legs par bshad// drag po'i gsal shing
291a3(rgyud): zhes bya ste// lha mo'i pa Ta~M sa ru brjod// tshogs bdag gi ni sA ru bshad// zla ba'i bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor ro// nyi ma'i 'od zer stong phrag ni// lag pa nyid kyis bstan par bya// 'od kyi
291a4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// dbang po'i rdo rje mtshon cha ltar// 'di ni lha rnams kun gyi rgya// dpa' bo kun gyisar rab tu gnang // dri za rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// glu len lta bum
291a5(rgyud): rab tu bsgrags// dga' byed dbang phyug phyag rgya che// rdza rnga/ 'i sgra dbyangs rab tu 'bar// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod phyir// lha chen pos ni rab tu brtags// 
291a6(rgyud): ting ting cag 'dzin sbyor ba yis// mi 'am ci rnams kyir brjod bya// pi wang sgreng ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbyangs can gyir ni rnam par bshad// rtag tu dun du b+hi sgrogs pa// rig pa
291a7(rgyud): 'dzin pa rnams kyir brjod// lag gnyis gdengs ka'i tshul byas pa// klu rnams kyis ni legs par bshad// gar ni sdud pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'gyed dang 'du ba'i de bzhin no// la
291a8(rgyud): pa zhags pas nges bcings pas// de ni phyag rgyar rab tu bshad// 'di rnams dam tshig phyag rgya ru// de bzhin gshegs rnams legs par gsungs// las kyi sbyor ba 'bad pa
291b1(rgyud): yi// 'di rnams kyang ni phyag rgyar bshad// phyag rgya dor nas sems kyi ni// rin chen yang dang yang du bsam// rnam par rtog med gdod nas zhi// chos dbyings mnyam zhing mi mnyam pa// stong
291b2(rgyud): pa mkha' 'drar shes nasu// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes shing // rmi lam lta bur rab tu gnas// dri za'i grong khyer lta bur snang // 'tshe ba'i 'jig rten yang
291b3(rgyud): dang yang // mig 'phrul lta bur shin tu ni// 'gro ba thams cad rab tu gsal// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa ru// srid pa thams cad mdor bsdus pa// bdag med pa zhes mthong nas ni// sa
291b4(rgyud): rgyas kun dang dpa' bo yi// sgyu ma smig rgyu brag cha dang // lbu ba/ chu yi chu bur dang // gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten ni// de ltar sangs rgyas rnams kyis dgongs// thams cad
291b5(rgyud): 'gal me'i 'khor lo ltar// zo chun khyud mo ji bzhin du// ga ra gyi gnas kyi tshul 'dra ba// zla ba gnyis dang mtshung sa par blta// rtag tu klog gi phreng ba 'dra// sbrang bu'i sgra
291b6(rgyud): dang mtshungs par gnas// 'khor ba shin tu brlang ba ste// rgod ma'i kha dang 'dra bar gnas// 'di ltar shes shing rtogs nas ni// bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis rang nyid kyis// sems ni legs
291b7(rgyud): sgrub rnal 'byor pa// de la phyag rgya rab tu bshad// stong pa mtshan ma med pa dang // smon pa med pa'i rang bzhin las// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis ni// dam tshig gsum ni btags pa'o// phyag rgya
291b8(rgyud): sngags dang lha nyid dang // de nyid gsum ni rab tu gnas// bdag nyid sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// mtshan nyid gcig tu rnam par gnas// de 'di dam pa'i phyag rgya ru// sangs rgyas rnams kyis bka' stsal te/ 
292a1(rgyud): // phyag rgya yi ge bral ba ste// rnam pa med cing snang ba med// dngos po med pa'i chos rnams la// dngos po'i de nyid du na bshad// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin yin// dngos med nyid kyang / 
292a2(rgyud): dngos po yin// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ye shes mchog tu bde// rtog ge med cing snang ba med// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge med// stong pa na mkha' mtshungs pa'i sems// gang tshe de
292a3(rgyud): ltar nyid gyur pa// de tshe phyag rgya rnams dang sngags// lha nyid du yang rab tu brtag/ sngags las phyag rgya ma mthong zhing // phyag rgya las kyang sngags min cing // rang nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// gnyis
292a4(rgyud): med sngags dang phyag rgyar brtags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal/ po chen po las phyag rgya'i rim par phye ba'o// 
292a5(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams da slar yang 'dus par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po rdo rje rnal
292a6(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de dag gi gsol btab
292a7(rgyud): pa'i tshig nye bar gnas nas/ 'og min gyi gnas nas dga' ldan gyi gnas su bzhugs nas dga' ldan gyi rigs kyi lha'i bu rnams la chos bstan nas zas gtsang gi rigs la mngon par
292a8(rgyud): gzigs te/ mngon par byung bar mdzad nas byang chub kyi snying po dag la nye bar mnan nas 'khod de/ bdud pa ni las rnam par rgyal bar bstan nas byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs par
292b1(rgyud): 'gyur te/ bzhugs nas kyang kun nas 'phro ba'i ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin bye ba brgya stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par zhugs nas kyang de bzhin
292b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje se gol gyi sgras de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing gsang sngags 'di gsungaso// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa mA dza A rak+Sha ya sarba ta thA ga ta na hUM/ 
292b3(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'khor dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po rnams legs par byon te chos kyi dbyingasu spros nas phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams
292b4(rgyud): thams cad rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin rnams khyab ste/ na mkha de'i khams na gnas pa thams cad til gyi gang bu ltar dadzam bu'i gling du 'khod par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan
292b5(rgyud): 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug gis bkug cing bcug te/ bcings nas dbang du mdzad de/ de nyid kyi thugs khar rab tu bzhag par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal
292b6(rgyud): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gnyisu med pa'i sbyor bas byin gyis brlabs te/ sngags 'dis rang gi sems so sor rtogs pa mdzad// oM tsit+ta pra ti be d+ha ka ro mi/ de'i rjes thogs nyid la sangs rgyas
292b7(rgyud): thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs kar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa'i sku las chos kyi sku rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal ba sems rin po che nges par byung ste/ 
292b8(rgyud): spros pa mdzad// de nyid sems 'od gsal ba/ thugs rje chen pos khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rnyog pa spangs pa/ na mkha'
293a1(rgyud): / ltar gdod nas zhi ba/ de las thugs rje chen po la mngon par phyogs par byas nas/ sems can gyi khams thams cad la rnam par gzigs te/ mi shes pas rga ba dang / 'chi bas rnam par
293a2(rgyud): khyab pa'i 'jig rten la gzigs nas slar yang sngags 'dis byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa nye bar bstan pa/ oM bo d+hi tsit+ta ud pA da ya mi/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs nyid la de bzhin gshegs
293a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi thugs khar sems 'od gsal ba de yongasu rdzogs pa'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar byin gyis brlabs te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs khar rnam par bzhago/ legs par rnam
293a4(rgyud): par dag pa'i namakha' ltar dri ma med pa/ spros pa thams cad spangs dpe me long lta bur brtan par byas nas gnas te byang chub kyi sems chen po la sngags 'di brjod do// oM dz+nyA na rasmai bi sr-i dzaH/ 
293a5(rgyud): de ni rjes thogs nyid las 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs pa zla ba dkyil 'khor las rnam par byung ngo // de phyung nas kyang sa kyi dbyings kyi pho brang du zhugs te shes bya'i dkyil 'khor
293a6(rgyud): thams cad gsal bar byas nas sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi ro bo'i rtse brnyil te rab tu rtogs par byas nas gcig tu 'dres te/ rdo rje'i sku chen po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs khar
293a7(rgyud): rje su zhugs nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbusu rab tu gnas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlab so// oM tiSh+Tha badz+ra/ slar yang
293a8(rgyud): sngags 'dis smos pa/ oM s+phar badz+ra/ slar yang sngags 'dis bsdu'o// oM saM ha ra badz+ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ye shes rdo rje'i snying po 'di ched du brjod do// oM dz+nyA na badz+ra/ 
293b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang
293b2(rgyud): thugs mnyam pa nyid brnyes pas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs pa/ oM badz+ra At+ma ko haM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan pa nyid du nye bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam
293b3(rgyud): par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs gzigs nas sngags 'dis byin gyis brlabs par mdzad// oM ya thA sarba ta thA ga ta sta thA a ha ma pi/ de nas
293b4(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'i rgyu// sangs rgyas thamasad cad kyi sku bdag nyid sems can gyi khams thams cad du nges
293b5(rgyud): par bstan to// de nas brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang 'jig rten skyong // ba rnams kyis mthong nas/ lha dang mi rnams kyis mngon par byang chub pa zhes sgra bsgrag so// de nas tshangs pas gsol ba
293b6(rgyud): btab ste/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor nas/ de dang des 'dul ba'i skye bo btul te/ gang gis slar ldog pa med pa nyid la gyur to// 'di rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi byang chub sgom pa'i rim pa'o// 
293b7(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ting 'dzin de las gzhengs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi byang chub bstan te/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa nye bar bsgrubs nas de'i thugs ka
293b8(rgyud): las rdo rje phyung ste/ nyid kyi phyag du bzhag par gyur te/ de nas 'od zer rnam par phyung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
294a1(rgyud): kar zhugs nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur byin gyis brlabs te/ mtshan nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs par can thams cad kyis brdzun
294a2(rgyud): pa dar dang phreng bas dbang bskur ba/ zla ba'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od zer can du byin gyis brlabs te rnam par gnas so// de nas thugs ka nas byung ba'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten te/ 
294a3(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan snga dang / rgyab dang drung du rdo rje sems dpa' dang / rdo rje chos dang / rdo rje rin chen dang / rdo rje las la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' chen
294a4(rgyud): po'i phreng bar rnam par gan so/ de bzhin du na ga mo la sogs nanas dang / dug sogs pa'i lha khyad par du nges par bskyed cing / gzugs la sogs pa rnams dang / lcags kyu la sogs pa'i
294a5(rgyud): lha rnams bskyed de/ 'di dag gi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po ma/ cho ga gyur pa// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// rdo rje
294a6(rgyud): snying po zhesu gsungs// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// sgo khyud dang ni kha khyer dang // rta babs kyis ni so sor spras// de yi dbu su khri chen po// kun nas
294a7(rgyud): yongs su gru bzhi pa// de yi steng du pad chen po// ge sar ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// de yi skye ba'i dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyis ni drung kun
294a8(rgyud): tu/ sangs rgyas thams cad dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi nya 'khor du// 'khor los bsgyur ba la sogs bri// phyi yi gnas ni thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// 
294b1(rgyud): kha dog ser po gzi brjid che// dbang chen dkyil 'khor rab 'bar ba// thams cad rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan// brgyan pa de dag dgod par bya// rdorje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las dbang chen gying
294b2(rgyud): 'khor gyi choga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang chu lha'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad byag// dkyil labar chen po/ 
294b3(rgyud): mchog gyur pa// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bas na// chos kyi 'khor lo zhesu brjod// de yi phyi rol gnyis pa la// zlum po ru ni rtogs par bya// ri mo mang po sna tshogs pas// sgro dang sgo khyud/ 
294b4(rgyud): brtag par bya// rta babs rnam pa sna tshogs pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas rgyan// de yi dbus pad chen po// ges ldan zhing rab mdzes pa// mdad ma brgyad kyi ka ba'i mdun
294b5(rgyud): dkyil 'khor brgyad kyis brgyan pa'o// dkyil 'khor de yidabus ni// rgyal ba thams cad dkar po mchog/ 3ba bzho ltar dkar gsal// shel dang zla ba lta bu'i 'od/ 
294b6(rgyud): kun da zla ba ltar dkar brtan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sangs rgyas sras po rnam par dgod// thams cad zla ba ltar dkar zhing // zla ba'i
294b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// mtshon cha sna tshogs zla ba 'dra// zla ba 'bar mtshungs mnyam med pa// chu yi ming zhes bya ba yi// dkyil 'khor dam pa nyid du 'dod// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi
294b8(rgyud): rgyud chen po las chu lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos ma lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ 
295a1(rgyud): de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje ye shes gzi brjid mtshungs// rdo rje gzi brjid cesu brjod// gru gsum rnam pa nyid du bya/ 
295a2(rgyud): sum mdo'i ris kyi rnam par mtshungs// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs 'jigs pa'o// kha dog dmar po stobs po che// 'jig pa'i dus kyi me 'dra ba// rtag tu pad+ma rA ga mtshungs// da yi dbu su/ 
295a3(rgyud): gzi brjid che// nyi ma'i kha dog stobs po che// rdo rje rtse gsum sna tshogs pa// sum mdo'i snying khar bzhag par bya// bal po'i se'u me tog mtshungs// ya ba'i me tog dag dang 'dra// pad pung
295a4(rgyud): rA ga mtshungs// sangs rgyas dpa' bo yang dga' bar// bza dang po mtshal dang mtshungs 'dra ba// rgya skyegs bcud dang / dadra bar gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// de bzhin
295a5(rgyud): sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras// khro bo dang ni mngag pa dang / mkhas pa yi ni dgod par bya// de dag thams cad kha dog dmar// gzi brjid khams la 'od ldan pa// 'od zer dam
295a6(rgyud): po rab 'phro ba// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus son par// thams cad dmar po'i mtshon cha can// dmar po'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dmar po'i gos kyis bkab pa'i lus// phreng ba dam
295a7(rgyud): po mchog 'dzin pa// 'di ni gzi brjid gter zhes bya// dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba'o// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las me lha zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzog so// 
295a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rlung gi khams
295b1(rgyud): dang 'dra bas na// rlung gi dkyil 'khor zhesu bshad// zla ba phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// dbyar gyi sprin gyi 'od dang mtshungs// A ta si li me tog 'dra// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od dang mtshungs// de
295b2(rgyud): yi dbus pad chen po// baiDUR+Ya 'dra'i 'od dang 'dra// shin tu gnag pa'i smig sman mtshungs// sngon dmar gyi ni rnam par gnas// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni// sangs rgyas dpa' bo rab 'bar ba
295b3(rgyud): rgyal po 'khyil ba 'bar ba'i gzi// mtshan mo nag mo lta bur gnas// ut+pal sngon po 'dab ma'i tshul// stong pa na mkha' lta bur gnas// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// rgyal dang
295b4(rgyud): rgyal ba'i sras rnams bri// khro ba rnams dang mngag pad / de bzhin po nya pho nya mo// thams cad sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// de bzhin nag po'i gos gyon pa/ 
295b5(rgyud): kha dog nag po thams cad du// ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs bsnams// gdugs ni rnam pa du ma'i dbyibs// kha dog sna tshogs legs 'bar ba// blarare rgyas pa mnyam/ 
295b6(rgyud): pa ni// kha dog nag po sna tshogs pa// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyis// mdor bsdus nas ni bsgom par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po 'di lta bu// sangs rgyas kun gyis rjes skyo
295b7(rgyud): pa/ bris nas shes rab can gyis bsgoms// gal te dngos grub rang 'dod na// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las rlung lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'o// / 
295b8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis slar yang bsdu bas byon pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
296a1(rgyud): po la gsol ba btab pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi sgrub pa'i thabs bskyed du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das
296a2(rgyud): rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de rnams kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gnas nas// sgrub pa'i thabs kyi chog mchog tu gsang ba chen po bka' stsal pa/ sgeg mo sogs pas/ 
296a3(rgyud): mchod pa kun// yang dag mdor bsdus byas nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen por// bdag gis rtag tu bsgom par bya// sngags kyis yi ge yang dag ldan// 'dod pa ster ba'i sku
296a4(rgyud): ru bya// sgra dang gzugs dang de bzhin sbyor// yi ge'i phreng ba de bzhin te// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ sngags pas thams cad rnam par bsam// hUM/ sngags
296a5(rgyud): pas snying khar son pa sgom// gsang sngags dge ba brjod/ nas su// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// / dung gi sgra ru rab tu brjod// dril bu'i sgra ni rab gsal ba/ 
296a6(rgyud): pad+mo rnal 'byor dbang phyug go/ dus min sprin gyi hUM gi sgra// tsaT 'i tsa Ta'i sgra 'phro ba// rdo rje rin chen dbang phyug gi/ sgra ru de bzhin gshegs rnams gsung // nor bu las kyi rigs
296a7(rgyud): kyi yang // rnga chen sgra ru rab tu bshad// pi wang gling bu de bzhin glu// gar gyi rgyan gyi sgra dang ni// rdza rnga'i ngar s+tha hUM gi sgra// spyi yi nyid du rab tu bshad// rtog pa kun la rnam par sbyar
296a8(rgyud): sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las rnams dang // de nas gzugs kyi bzlas pa mchog/ go rims ji bzhin rab tu bshad// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // lha rnams dbang du bya ba ste// 
296b1(rgyud): de la rang gi tshul rab sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// rdo rjes rnam pa kun gyi mchog/ rtag tu lus chen bsam bya bsam// lha yi sku gzugs bsgom par bya// lag par
296b2(rgyud): phyag rgya rab nges pa'i// phyag rgya snying khar son zhes bya// rang gi rigs rims cho ga yos// de yi lus ni 'od gsal zhing // sgron ma'i 'od ltar gsol ba'i khyim// de ltar kun nas thams
296b3(rgyud): cad du// kun nas ba spu'i rtsed dganas// 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng dag bas// gzugs kyi bzlas pa zhes bshad// de nas sbyor ba'i bzlas pa ni// gsang sngags sgrub pos brtsam par
296b4(rgyud): bya// mchod dang byin rlabs dbang bskur mchog/ sgo de la sogs rims thams cad du// sbyor ba'i bzlas dpa gtso bo 'di// 'bad pa yis ni rab tu bshad// snying
296b5(rgyud): mgrin pa mchu lde mon// rkan dang spyi bo nyid ma yin// nang min phyi dang gnyis par min// chos ni 'ba' zhig kho na la// bzlas pa'i sgra yang 'byung ma yin// 'di ni bcom
296b6(rgyud): ldan rnal 'byor che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sgom pa'i sngags pa de nyid ni// rnal 'byor pa yi gnas su bshad// de nas stang du mdor bsdus te// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor
296b7(rgyud): rab zlum pa// zla ba gang ba ltar bsam bya// dri ma med cing legs par gnas// de la yi ge rnam par dgod// tshig gi phreng ba ma chad pa// mu tig phreng ba ltar brgyus pa// char sprin
296b8(rgyud): gyi ni ma 'dra'i 'od// de tshe thams cad gsal bar byed// lha yi lus ni snang byed cing // ji lta ji ltar yi ge'i phreng // mchog gi lus la rab 'jug pa// de lta de ltar sngags kyi lus// 
297a1(rgyud): lha yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// mthu stobs lnga dbang thams cad ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug las cher lhag/ bzlas pa de nyid mchog 'di ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis
297a2(rgyud): bsngags pa'o// ji ltar sems ni bsgom pa yos// de ltar dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las// bzlas pa'i de kho na nyid kyi le'u'o// 
297a3(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa rin po che bka' stsal pa/ mnyam med mi g.yo mnyam med mchog gi chos nyid can/ 
297a4(rgyud): thugs rje'i bdag nyid 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel bar mdzad/ yon tan mtha' yas dngos grub thams cad sbyin maHdad pa// dri med mi g.yo mnyam med dam pa'i mchog chos can
297a5(rgyud): yon tan shin tu phra ba'i cha lang chad med de// dpe ni na mkha 'a dang yang snyun du yod ma yin// dngos grub mtha'ayas mnyam med dpa dang bral ba rnams// sems can kham
297a6(rgyud): la dngos grub mchog rnams nges par stsol// rtag tu dri ma med pa thugs rje'i shugs las byung // smon lam grub pa 'gog pa med pa'i chos nyid can// 'gro ba'i don sgrub rab tu brtson pa
297a7(rgyud): mtha' yas pa// thugs rje chen po'i bdag nyid rtag tu rnam par snang // tshad med tshad dang bral ba shin tu rdzogs pa yi// bde bar gshegs pa'i gnasu gshegs kyang a mchos nyid bza
297a8(rgyud): bde bar gshegs pa go 'phang dam pa brnyes gyur kyang // khams gsum rnams la dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad pa yi// thugs rje'i spyod pa mi g.yo 'gag par yong mi 'gyur// e
297b1(rgyud): ma ho shin tu bzang po'i chos nyid mchog dang ldan// mchog sbyin rnams kyi nang na go 'phang mchog brnyes pa// khams gsum kun la rtag tu dngos grub mchog stsol mdzad// mgon
297b2(rgyud): po dus gsum sgrib pa med pa rab mkhyen pas// dam tshig mchog gsum dngos grub dam pa bdag la stsol// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// yang dag yon tan rgyas pa ste/ lan cig/ 
297b3(rgyud): tsam zhig brjod pas kyang // gsang sngogs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bstod pa'i rgyal po 'di yis ni// de bzhin gshegs de kun bstod na// rab yangs dngos grub stsol 'gyur te/ 
297b4(rgyud): bskal par gnas shing bskal par bskul// lus ni g.yo dab med pa ru// bdag nyid brtan par byas pa yis/ mgon po chen po rnam snang mdzad// mi bskyod rin chen 'byung
297b5(rgyud): gnas dang // rgyal ba dag pa 'od dpag med// don grung rgyal po thams cad du// dngul chu bcud len de nyid // mchog kyang rab tu gsol bar byed// dngos grub
297b6(rgyud): yid 'ong ma lus pa// rgyas pa'i don dang phun sum tshogs// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs pa// yid la 'dod pa ster bar byed// ye shes cha dang stobs dang shugs// mchog tu dag pa
297b7(rgyud): ba gsol bar mdzad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
297b8(rgyud): pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med// bsnyung bar gnas pa'i tshichog med// ji ltar bshad pa tshogs bslab
298a1(rgyud): pa'i gnas nye bar bzung ste/ gang yang rung ba'i yid dga' bar ji ltar rung ba'i dkyil 'khor byas te/ me tog sil ma bkram la bdug spos kyis bdugs te/ 
298a2(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la ji ltar nus pa'i me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya ste/ sngags 'dis yid kyis kyang sdig pa bshags te/ oM sarba pA pa ta kA
298a3(rgyud): yi ka bAka tsit+ta ma na sod b+hU tA na ra ga/ dwe Sho mo ha ma da mA na biSh+Ti Na yad kr-i taM tan trai kA li ke hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT sarba pA paM s+pho Ta yA mi swA hA// oM sarba pAn pra ti de sha ya mi swA hA// de'i rjes
298a4(rgyud): thogs la bdag nyid kyi dngos po dbul bar bya ste/ oM sarba/ ta thA ga ta nAn Ad ma b+ha ba nai ra ya ta ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga taHpra ti gr-i h+Nan tu mI swA hA// de bzhin gshegs pa
298a5(rgyud): thams cad kyi bsod nams la rje su yi rang ba ni/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta puN+ya dz+nyA na saM b+ha rAn a nu mo dA ya mi swA hA/ yang dang yang du byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa rang bzhin gyis
298a6(rgyud): grub pa'i sngags kyis bya ste/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man+ta b+ha dra ma hA badz+ra sa ma ya ma hA bo d+hi tsit+ta uta pA da ya mi swA hA// de nas byang chub kyi sems bskyed pa'i rjes thogs la zla ba'i kha dog
298a7(rgyud): can zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongasu rdzogs pa sa bcu'i dbang phyug nor bu rin po che chen po'i pad+ma'i snying po sang+ga ra khri'i steng du bdag nyid bsam par
298a8(rgyud): bya'o// oM bud d+ho ha~M/ sngags 'dis bdag yongasu dag par byas te/ oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba ta thA ga taHswa b+hA ba shud d+ho haM/ sngags 'dis bdag nyid chos kyi dbyings yangs pa/ 'od
298b1(rgyud): gsal ba'i snang ba shin tu gnas par byas te/ oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba At+ma ko haM// de nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis rgyan par bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te 'jig rten thams
298b2(rgyud): cad las shin tu 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi skur bdag nyid sngags 'dis gnas par bya ste/ oM pra b+hA sA ro haM/ de bzhin du rim pa 'dis chos kyi dbyings rgya chen
298b3(rgyud): por spros nas/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas nyid do// zhes nga rgyal bskyed la bdag skye dgu ma lus pa'i dpung gnyen du byas la/ chos kyi dbyings 'od gsal bar lhan cig gnas par bya ste/ 1
298b4(rgyud): bar rgyas par thun mtshams bzhir bzlas pa tsam par bya ste/ thun mtshams gsum du dus ji lta bar yi ge la rjes su gzhol ba'i yid kyis 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas par bya zhing / 
298b5(rgyud): ma re re stong phrag brgyad dam/ stong phrag re bzlas te/ ji srid mtshan ma thob pa de srid du'o// tsan dan dang ga pur dang gur gum la sogs pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bya ste/ nye bar
298b6(rgyud): 'kho ba thams cad kyi mchod pa byas nas tshe 'phrul gyi zla ba 'am sa ga'i nya gang ba la mar gyi mar mi stong phrag brgyad spar la/ rdo rje skyil dkrung gis gnas te/ sna ma'i me tog gam me tog 'dus
298b7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / mchod rten la mchod de ji srid 'brug gi sa sgrogs pa ma thos pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bdag la gsal bar
298b8(rgyud): 'gyur bar shes par bya'o// de nas sreg blugs 'bum phrag gcig dgong bar byas pas mtshan ma thams cad gsal bar 'gyuraro// bye ba phrag bzhi bzlas pas dbang phyug chen po la sog
299a1(rgyud): pa'i sems can thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa chen po byed par 'dod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
299a2(rgyud): rten byas la mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag re re bzlas pa 'am/ yang na dri'i mchod rten gyi drung du 'bum lhag pa'i bye ba phrag bdun bzlas so// bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang ba'i tshad kyis
299a3(rgyud): mchod rten nyi ma re re la re re ji srid bye ba phrag bdun bzlas pa rdzogs pa de srid du bya'o// tha ma yang mchod rten 'bar ba'i 'od des sgrub pa'i lus la zhugs pas brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang / 
299a4(rgyud): 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs nas ji srid dag pa'i gnas kyi dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams me tog gi char 'bebs par 'ong bar 'gyuraro// lha dang klu dang gnod
299a5(rgyud): sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang na mkha' lding dang mi 'am/ ci la sogs pa 'ongs nas kyang bstod par byed cing rdzi/ srid a ba'i ci mnar med pa'i bar gyi sems can dmyal ba
299a6(rgyud): thams cad bsal bar 'gyuraro// yi dgas rnams kyang yi dgas kyi sdug bsngal las rnam par grol bar 'gyuraro// sdug bsngal ba rnams kyis sems can rnams la gdung bar mi 'gyur
299a7(rgyud): de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis mngon par gzigs par 'gyuraro// de'i rjes la lus dang ba gser gyi mdog lta bu dang lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam pa can dang / ting nge 'dzin dang ye
299a8(rgyud): shes thob pa dang / kha dog dang tshe dang stobs dang / shugs dang dbang phyug la sogs pa'i yon tan dang ldan pa dang 'jig rten gyi khamasu rgyu ba dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba ltar che ba
299b1(rgyud): dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod cing steng du 'gro ba dang / rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rig pa 'dzin
299b2(rgyud): pa'i rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor ba dang / lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongasu bskor ba dang / phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khamasu rdzu/ 
299b3(rgyud): 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis legs par mchod cing grub pa thams cad 'od kyis lhung bar 'gyuraro// brgya byin dang tshangs pa dang 'jig
299b4(rgyud): rten skyong ba'i stan phyed ster bar 'gyuraro// gzi brjid dang / gzugs dpa' bas rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa'i sa yang so
299b5(rgyud): sor thob par 'gyuraro// sems can thams cad 'dul ba/ la mkhas par 'gyuraro// phyi ma'i mthar tshe byin gyis brlabs te/ sangs rgyas thams cad bskyed pa mthong bar
299b6(rgyud): 'gyuro// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bya ba nges par ston par 'gyuraro// mchod pa'i sprin thams cad 'byung bar 'gyuraro// byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dang / byams
299b7(rgyud): pa dang 'jam dpal dang mtshungs par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i sgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba ste dang po'o// // sgrub pa'i thabs gnyis pa ni de
299b8(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ste/ gi wang ngam ldong ros pad+ma'i snod du bzhig la/ ji srid dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sems can thams
300a1(rgyud): cad dbang du 'gyur ba dang / mi snang ba dang rig pa thams cad 'dzin pa nyid do// rig pa 'dzin par gyur nas nyi ma stong shar ba'i kha dog dang / lo brgyad gnyis kyis rnam pa
300a2(rgyud): sga li zhing 'khyil ba dang / gdu bu dang ldan zhing lha'i bu mo bye ba phrag du mas yongasu bskor cing / rig pa 'dzin pa'i grub pa thams cad kyis yongasu bskor ba dang / bskal pa chen po'i mthar gnas
300a3(rgyud): pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi dbang phyug tu 'gyuraro// rim pa 'dis rtse gsum bsgrubs na dbang phyug chen por 'gyuraro// mchod phyir thogs bsgrubs na tshangs par 'gyuraro// 'khor los
300a4(rgyud): khyab 'jug tu 'gyuraro// grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa bzung ste sa srung gi bu byas la de la zhon te bzlas na dbang por 'gyur// / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor byas te de'i steng du bsdad na nyi ma dang mtshu
300a5(rgyud): par 'gyuraro// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi zla ba'i ste 'di nyid kyis lha'i bye brag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ des de'i longs spyod la spyod par 'gyuraro// de bzhin du rim pa 'dis dngul
300a6(rgyud): chu'am bcud len gang bsgrubs pa de 'grub par 'gyuraro// gal te ma grub na de'i tshe sgrub pa lan bdun bya'o// bdun byas pas ci nas kyang 'grub par 'gyuraro// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams/ 
300a7(rgyud): cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bas bka' stsal pa/ 'bum phrag gsum bzlas pas ri bo lhun po'i tshad tsam gyi ri bo yang hUM zhes brjod pas ltung ba dang / rgya mtsho skams pa dang ljon pa drung nas
300a8(rgyud): 'byin pa dang / bum pa na mkha' la 'phen pa dang / glang po rengs par byed pa dang / pha rol gyi sde mngon par 'joms par byed pa dang / bar snang na gnas pa thams cad ltung bar byed// 
300b1(rgyud): sems can thams cad 'bebs par byed do// sgrub pa po las gang dang gang sgrub par 'dod pa de dang de thams cad byed do// yang zla ba cig tsam mi smra bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid bsgom
300b2(rgyud): na sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyuraro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba thams cad ston par 'gyuraro// na mkha' la gnas shing 'chag par byed do// me 'bar ba dang glog 'grub la sogs pa ston par byed/ 
300b3(rgyud): gcig tu gyur nas mang por 'gyuraro// 'jig rten gyi khams stong phrag kyang g.yo bar byed do// sgrub pos bye ba bdun bzlas nas 'di dag thams cad bsgrub par bya'o// rim pa 'dis lhung bzed dang / 
300b4(rgyud): chos gos dang snam sbyar dang / mkhar sil las gang yang rung ba bzung nas ji srid rig pa 'dzin par gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro ba/ 
300b5(rgyud): dang sprul pa du mi byed pa dang / 'dod na 'chi ba dang skad cig tu ma gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du 'gro zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis nye bar gnas par byed do// 
300b6(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis sangs rgyas kyi bya ba thams cad kyang byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad kyis mchod rten 'bum phrag gcig blangs te rma med pa'i
300b7(rgyud): ral gri blangs te cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod de/ brgyad pa 'am bcu bzhi pa'am nya gang ba la skyil dkrung bcas te ji srad du ral gri 'bar ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// 
300b8(rgyud): de'i rjes thogs nyid la jo bo che rnams kyi sgra grag go// steng nas me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// lhan cig rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po chen por 'gyuraro// ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin pa chen po
301a1(rgyud): 'khor los bsgyur ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i pa'acha lugs dang rgyan 'chang ba 'dod dgur rgyu ba dang skad cig tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par dpyod pa dang / 
301a2(rgyud): rga shi med pa dang nyi ma re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba mthong ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin thams cad kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad mchod pa'i char 'bebs pa dang / bskal pa chen po
301a3(rgyud): stong phrag du 'tsho bar 'gyuraro// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang 'khor lo 'am pa Ti sa blangs te/ 'bum phrag nyi shu bzlas pa yongasu rdzogs pa dang / dpal gyi sgor song ste/ nim pa'i lo
301a4(rgyud): mtsha ba'i mar khu la btags pa 'bum phrag gcig bsregs blugs bya'o// lha ma yin gyi 'khrul 'khor thams cad 'bye dra bar 'gyur ro// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 
301a5(rgyud): gal te ma grub na 'bum phrag gnyis sam gsum du bsregs blag sa bya'o// lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad bsregs bzhi/ na du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas kyang sgrub pa po la zhu bar
301a6(rgyud): byed de/ kye skyes bu dpa'o 'jug tu gsol zhes sla'o// de nas grogs dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o// ral gri'am 'khor lo de bzung nas lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal por 'gyuraro// 
301a7(rgyud): sa 'og gi rdzas rnams kyi mnga' bdag lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad kyi bdag po gsang sngags grub pa gzhan thams cad dang lha ma yin gyi rig pa 'dzin pa rnams kyi dbang phyug sa 'og thams cad kyi
301a8(rgyud): bdag po// lha ma yin chen po'i sprul pa byed pa po bskal pa chen por gnas pa/ khyab 'jug gi 'khor lo hUM zhes bya ba brjod pa tsam gyis lhag par byed pa/ khyab 'jug kyang hUM zhes brjod
301b1(rgyud): pa tsam gyis brlag par byed na/ gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang bde bar gshegs pa'i mchod rten 'bum phrag sum cu byas te/ mchod rten re re'i mdun du stong phrag
301b2(rgyud): brgyad brgyad bzla bar bya'o// thams cad la nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la tha mar me tog can gyi lcags las byung ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs drug pa mtho gang tsam pa bzung nas tshe 'phrul gyi
301b3(rgyud): zla ba phyed pa skyil mo krung bcings te/ ji srid 'bar ba de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de blangs pas rig pa 'dzin pa'i 'khor los bsgyur bar 'gyur ro// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyal po thams cad kyi
301b4(rgyud): mnga' bdag dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad 'dul bar byed pa bskal pa bye ba stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu de 'tsho ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams stong rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul
301b5(rgyud): ba dang / mchod pa'i sprin brgya stong phrag gis mchod par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas stong phrag mthong bar 'gyuraro// de rna mas la nyi ma re re zhing mchod pa chen po'i sprin gyis mchod par
301b6(rgyud): byed do// sgrub pa'i thabs rgyas pa gzhan yang mchod rten 'bum phrag drug cu byas te/ sngon du bstan pa byas la bye ba bzlas pa'o// de nas mtshan nyid thams cad dang ldan pa'i rol khrus byas
301b7(rgyud): nas/ nye bar 'kho ba thams cad kyis mchod de ji srid ma langs pa ji srid du bzla bar bya'o// langs nas dngul chu dang bcud lan dang / mi snang ba la sogs pa thams cad de la ster bar byed// 
301b8(rgyud): gal te mi ster na ji srid kha las lce ma byung ba de srid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas mtshon rnon pos de bcad par bya'o// de bzung bas nyi ma snying gi gzi brjid can rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad
302a1(rgyud): kyi rgyal po rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba stong phrag drug cu'i 'khor can/ tshe bskal pa bye ba brgya stong ga cu 'tsho ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis 'gro ba dang / ri
302a2(rgyud): lhun po bye ba brgya stong sprul ba dang / gling stong phrag 'phen pa dang / rgya mtsho stong phrag skems pa dang / lha'i 'jig rten brgya stong phrag bsdigs pa dang / tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug dang dbang phyug
302a3(rgyud): chen po la sogs pa rnams lhung ba dang / sga li zhing 'khyil pa dang / lo brgyad gnyis pa'i rnam pa dang / rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa ste/ sreg pa'i bskal pa na 'jig rten gyi khams
302a4(rgyud): gzhan du 'gro ba zhing rga ba dang 'chi ba med par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de skad ces bka' stsal to// de bzhin du yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang dpag
302a5(rgyud): bsam gyi shing dang / bum pa bzang po dang nor gyi char pa dang / na mkha'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po dang rin po che chen po'i lag pa dang / nor rgyun gyi rtog pa chen po dang sems
302a6(rgyud): can gyi re ba thams cad rje su 'gengs pa dang / 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal srid dang / rin po che thams cad kyang bsgrub par bya'o// de la 'di lta ste 'khor lo rin po che dang / glang po rin po che dang
302a7(rgyud): rta rin po che dang / nor bu rin po che dang / bud med rin po che dang / khyim bdag rin po che dang / bsnyen bkur ba rin po che'o// de nas sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang tsan dan dkar po las pad+ma so/ 
302a8(rgyud): drug pa'i tshad byas la pad+ma de lag par bzung nas zla ba drug tu skyil krung bcings te/ nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod nas thun mtshams gsum 'am bzhir grangs mi bzung bar bzlas par
302b1(rgyud): bya'o// zla ba drug yongasu rdzogs pa dang pad+ma 'bum phrag bdun bsregs blugs bya'o// zla ba nya nas sgrub pa brtsam par bya ste nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la skyil krungs bcas nas mtshan thog thag
302b2(rgyud): bzlas par bya'o// tho rangs kyi tshe rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// sgra li zhing 'khyil pa dang lo brgyad gnyis kyi rnam par rgyan gyi tshogs thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ nyi ma stong phrag shar ba'i 'od dang mtshung/ 
302b3(rgyud): pa rig pa 'dzin pa bye ba phrag du ma'i 'khor can/ lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas yongasu bskor ba/ tshangs pa la sogs pa'i lha rnams mngag gzhug par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing
302b4(rgyud): thams cad du skad cig tsam gyis rnam par rgyu ba dang / mcho/ pa'i sprin du mas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par mtsha dad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ut+pa la'i sgrub pa dang / can
302b5(rgyud): dan dmar po'i ma'i sgrub pa yang ngo // sgrub pa gzhan yanga'abyung ste/ shel dang / pad+ma rA ga 'am/ mu tig gi 'bras bu 'am/ rin po che yongasu rtog par byed pa pos yongs
302b6(rgyud): su brtags pa la/ bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam pa'i mchod rten 'bum tsam byas te/ gang yang rung bar grangs mi gzung ba ji srid bdag yongasu dag pa mthong ba de srid du bzlas par
302b7(rgyud): bya'o// de'i rje su mngar gsum gyis spags pa'i pad+ma 'bum dang / sna ma'i me tog 'bum phrag gsum dang / a ka ru'i yam shing 'bum dang / tsan dan gyi yam shing 'bum phrag gsum dang / 
302b8(rgyud): til dang 'bras 'bum phrag bzhi dang / zho zan 'bum dang / mar gyi sreg blugs stong phrag gsum dang / sman thams cad pa'i sregs blags 'bum phrag cig byas la sbyin bsregs yongs su
303a1(rgyud): rdzogs pa dang / dkar po'i tshes bco lnga la bsgrub par bya'o// skyil mo krung bcas te nye bar spyod pa thams cad kyis mchod la/ ji srid nor bu rin po che 'bar ba/ 
303a2(rgyud): de srid du bzlas par bya'o// 'bar nas kyang rig pa 'dzin pa gzhon nu gdang du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// ska li zhing 'khyil ba dang / lo brgyad pa gnyis kyis rnam pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 
303a3(rgyud): phyogs bcu mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gsal bar byed pa/ rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi slar 'khor los bsgyur ba chen por 'gyur ro// yid bzhin nor bu'i dngos grub
303a4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i rig pa 'dzin pa zhes brjod dro// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bar byed do// skad cig tsam la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad
303a5(rgyud): kyi sems can bskor nas/ slar de nyid du 'ong bar 'gyuraro// gal te 'dod na byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mngon/ par rdzogs par byas te/ lus de nyid kyis bla na med pa yang
303a6(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub par mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyuraro// de bzhin du sgrub thabs kyi le'u la bris sku dang / shing lham dang mu tig gi phreng ba yang yid bzhin gyi nor
303a7(rgyud): bu'i tsho gas bsgrub par bya'o// thams cad du 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa'i thabs gzhan yang mchod rten bye ba phrag stong byas te/ 'bum phrag bdun bzla bar bya'o// yongasu rdzogs
303a8(rgyud): ba dang rna me tog can gyi lcags sam/ lcags lnga'i rang bzhin gyi rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa sor bcu'i tshad dam bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho'i tshad tsam cho 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed la mtshan thog thag
303b1(rgyud): lag pas rdo rje de bzung nas mdun du khri'i steng du lag pa bkab la/ ji srid 'bar bar gyur pa de srid du bzlas par bya'o// de nas bzung nas rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po
303b2(rgyud): nyi ma bye ba brgya phrag dang / rje su 'tsham pa rdo rje 'chang ba ltar gzi brjid dang ldan zhing 'od gsal bar 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu zhing / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha
303b3(rgyud): rnams la ci bsgo ba nyan par 'gyur/ lha ma yin rnams skrag pa dang / srin po rnams 'joms pa dang / sems can thams cad de'i ci bsgo ba byed par 'gyur bar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshe/ 
303b4(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo bsgyur ba chen pos de skad ces bka/ 'a stsal to// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las/ de ba bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzas kyi bya ba bsgrub pa zhes
303b5(rgyud): bya ba'i sgrub thabs kyi le'u yongasu rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad slar yang ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzha/ 
303b6(rgyud): ste/ bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po ka
303b7(rgyud): k+Sha sbyar ba ste/ mtha' yas pa kha sbyar ba zhes bya ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba chen po gsang sngags kyi ka
303b8(rgyud): k+Sha pu tra bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rje su skyob// gsang sngags ka kA sbyar zhes bya// gsang chen mchog tu rmad du byung // gru bzhi pa la tshad
304a1(rgyud): mdzes pa// kun nas yongasu bzang zhing dag/ re mig bzhi bcu zhe dgu pa// mdor bsdus nas ni sngags pas bya// dang po phreng bzang gnyis la ni// a sogs blo gros
304a2(rgyud): ldan pas dgos// ka sogs lhag ma'i re mig la// sngags pas mdo ru bsdus te bri// sbyor ba ji bzhin yi ge kun// go rims bzhin du bgod par bya// re mig stong pa dag la ni// k+Sha yig dang / 
304a3(rgyud): ni rdo rje bri// rim pa 'di dag bkod nas ni// rang snga'i 'og tu 'bar ba mchog/ dang po dbyangs la de rje su// yi ge phyag rgya mdor bsdus pa// ka tsa Ta ta pa la ya sha/ dag tsang chu yi dkyil 'khor
304a4(rgyud): ldan// 'di rnams myur du 'grub par byed// pad+ma'i rigs dkyi lha nyid do// don kun grub par yang dag ldan// mau yidakyi la 'khor zhesu bshad// 'bar ba'i me dang mtshungs pa'i 'od/ 
304a5(rgyud): kha cha pra tha pha ra Sha/ dbang chen gyi ni dkyil 'khor ldan// ga dza Da da ba la sa// dngos grub kun byed rlung gzugs lnga na// dbyar gyi sprin ltar shin tu 'jigs// g+ha dz+ha D+ha d+ha b+ha wang ha/ 
304a6(rgyud): steng 'gros dngos grub byed por brjod// slar yang nga nya Na na ma// chos kun dbang du byed pa mchog/ thog ma'i dbyangs yig gang yin pa// de ni de bzhin gshegs stobs bcu// khyad
304a7(rgyud): par yan lag bcu gnyis bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa bcu gnyis// ma ning yi ge bzhi po sbyong // r-i r-I l-i l-I zhes bya ba// dbyangs dang sa bon de bzhin sngags// de dag yi ge
304a8(rgyud): ru yang bshad// dbang du byed pa'i sde tshan kun// thig le sgra gtsug zla phyed ces// rjes dbyangs kyi ni phreng zhes bshad// sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems kyis// yi ger brjod pa de
304b1(rgyud): bzhin zhing // gsal byed ces kyis gsal ba'o// de bzhin ya ra la wang rlung // me dang dbang chen chu dag ste// 'byung ba chen po khams rnamaso// rlung me bdud rtsi'i bcud ces bshad// 
304b2(rgyud): dang mi mnyam cha dbye bas// thams cad nyid kyi lam shes bya// phyag rgya dang ni dkyil 'khor sngags// ting 'dzin mdor bsdus bshad pa'o// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chos rnams
304b3(rgyud): kun gyi sdom bu brjod// stong pa mtshan med smon med pa// rnam par thar pa gsum du bshad// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// da ni sngags kyi kak+Shari
304b4(rgyud): sbyor ba la// rab tu btus pa sbyar ba dang bral ba bshad pa/ bya'o// yi ge rnams kyis byang chub spyod// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mya ngan 'das// lhan cig nyid du sbyar bar bya// dbyangs
304b5(rgyud): rnams yi ge rnams bsdus par bshad// mtshan nyid kya ni rab bshad bya// dbyangs ni byang chub gzugs nyid de// gzhan dang lhan cig sbyar bar bya// de la nges par sangs
304b6(rgyud): rgyas nyid// ster ba nyid du legs par bshad// thog mar sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang sngags dri ma med pa 'byung // thog mar dbyangs ni thig le ldan// rdo rje'i steng du yang dag gnas
304b7(rgyud): 'bar ba'i phreng can rab zhi ba// rnam par 'phro ba nyid du gnas// zla ba'i dbusu bsgom bya ba// kun gyi ye shes 'od chen po// kun tu 'gro ba rab tu thob// thams cad du yang rnyed par dka'// 
304b8(rgyud): de nyid bral ba rtag pa ste// yi ge med cing dbyer med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu bshad// dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ gnyis pa'i sgra dang yang dag ldan// de ni shin tu ring
305a1(rgyud): por shes// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod pa ste// sa dang pha rol phyin pa rnams// dro ba'i bzhi pa sbyar ba ni// mya ngan 'das pa zhesu bsgrags// dbyangs dang yi ge khyad par
305a2(rgyud): can// mtshan nyid rab tu sbyar bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya sogs ldan pas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// da ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sngags kyi de nyid 'dir bshad bya// 
305a3(rgyud): thog mar spyod pa byas nas ni// gnyis pa smra ba po ru bshad// bzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis kun nas mnan// gsum pa me yi ming can no// rgyu med pas te cung zad pa// bzhi pa yis ni gsal
305a4(rgyud): bar byas// drug pa'i sgra dang tha dad med// de yi steng du thig la gnas// chos kun na mkha' dang mtshungs par/ yang dang yang du bshad pa yin// de ni lnga par shes par bya// 
305a5(rgyud): yi ge lnga pa stobs po che// yi ge lnga yi stobs lnga'i bdag nyid las skyes gtso// mthu stobs chen po khyab bdag srid pa'i bdag nyid skyes// mthu stobs chen po srid las
305a6(rgyud): rab tu grol byed pa// yi ge lnga ni 'gro ba drug las grol ba'i bdag/ mngon shes drug kyang rab tu ster byed dri ma med// de nyid bcom ldan spyod pa ste// mi bskyod pa zhes rab tu grags// / 
305a7(rgyud): byang sems rdo rje sems dpa' ste// bstan pa'i sems dpa' rang byung ba// chos kun gyis ni de bzhin nyid// gang bsgrags de nyid thams cad du// 'bar ba mo yi sa bon ldan// spyod
305a8(rgyud): pa yi ni steng du gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// rin chen 'byung ldan zhesu bshad// chos rnams kun gyi byed pa ni// med pa nyid du'ang bshad pa'o// me yis sa bon
305b1(rgyud): yang dag ldan// gzhi pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bo ru// mnan pa rgyal ba 'od dpag med// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// sna tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa kun// drug pa'i dbyangs
305b2(rgyud): dang yang dag ldan// don yod pa yi snying por grags// snga lnga pa yi bzhi pa ni// dngos dang dngos med rab rtogs byed// 'bar ba ma yi sa bon gyi// 'khor lo'i dbus rab tu gnas// / 
305b3(rgyud): drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// thig le sgra yis rnam par spras// 'khor los bsgyur ba ye shes che// rnam par rgyas pa'i nor ster byed// gang zhig sde lnga pa yi mtha'// sgyu ma'i chos
305b4(rgyud): la rab tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor ni// gdug/ sa dkar zhesu bshad pa'o// brgyad pa'i dbyangs dang // yang dag ldan// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// de nyid bcom
305b5(rgyud): ldan rnal 'byor ni// spyi bor thig la mnan pa'o// 'jam pa'i dbyangs dang ye shes che// mA ma ki ru de bsgrags so// lnga pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'jam pa'i dpal
305b6(rgyud): zhes rab tu grags// spyod pa'i gar mkhan rab rtogs ming // sdig pa thams cad rengs byed de// sdig kun rnam par sbyong byed pa// rnam par sel ba rnam shes bya// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsuM
305b7(rgyud): pa ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs chen dang // gshin rje mthar byed khro bo che// yi ge gsum ni stobs chen po// thog mar dgu pa yi ni dbyangs// de yi dbusu spyod pa bzhag/ tha mar sna tshogs// 
305b8(rgyud): zhes bya sbyar// sku gsum du ni rnam par sgom// tha ma'i sde mtshan gsum pa ni// gang yin kun tu bzang por bshad// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// sangs rgyas spyan zhes bya ba'o// de nyid bcom
306a1(rgyud): ldan mgon po ni// nam kha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// rdo rje khro bo stobs po che// de nyid rab tu grags pa'o// 'di kun thams cad stong pa ste// rgyu ni rab tu spangs pa'o// 
306a2(rgyud): dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad do// gang zhig bzhi pa'i sde dang po// ma yis rab tu gsal bar byas// bzhi pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// gzi brjid phung po
306a3(rgyud): stongs po che// de nyid gang dang ma sbyar ba// sgrol ma zhes rab tu grags// bzhi pa yi ni gnyis pa gang // shes rab pha rol phyin par nges// thig le lhan cig yang dag ldan// sgra dang / 
306a4(rgyud): ldan pa'i mchog tu gyur// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa gang // me nyid dang ni yang dag ldan// bzhi pa'i dpya/ ngas kyis yang dag mnan// khams sum rnam par rgyal
306a5(rgyud): ba'i mchog/ de nyid bcom ldan zhes bya ba// spyod pa'i gar mkhan zhes bya'i mtshan// de yi rjes nyid la ni ma// dgu pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// me dang
306a6(rgyud): dbang chen du brjod bya// gsum pa'i dbyangs kyis mnan pa yi// sde tshan dang po'i dang po'i yig/ de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ni// 'jig rten mgon po thub pa che// ye shes rgya che
306a7(rgyud): bsgrub par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sde tshan lnga pa rin chen mchog/ bzhi pa'i sa bon dam pa de// 'og tu me yi yan lag 'bar// khro gnyer can zhes rab tu gra// 
306a8(rgyud): dbang chen yi ge dag pa las// thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan// sangs rgyas spyan zhes rnam grags pa// sdig pa thams cad 'phrog par byed// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// nam/ 
306b1(rgyud): spyan zhes brjod pa'o// sgyu ma'i chos la rab gnas nas// gsod pa'i don du rab gsol byed// mA ma ki zhes bya ba'i ming // rig pa mchog tu gsang ba ste// rgyu mi dmigs pa'i chos
306b2(rgyud): rnams kyi// dri ma med pa stsol bar byed// gnyis pa'i dbyangs dang yang dag ldan// 'phags pa mi g.yo ba zhes bya// dbang chen sa bon yang dag ldan// 'gro ba'i rdo rje rengs byed
306b3(rgyud): na// gdug sems gzhan kun lta ci smos// rlung gi dkyil 'khor sbyar byas pa// rang gi sa bon gnas shing 'phro// 'gro ba thams cad skrod byed na// gdug sems can gzhan smos
306b4(rgyud): ci dgos// de nyid me dang ldan pas ni// dbang dang dgu/ dpa'i las rnams dang // bgegs dang ngag rnams ni ba ni// khyad par mi g.yo ba yis byed// don dam bden
306b5(rgyud): ba'i byin gyis brlabs// rnam snang mdzad bya gnas las byung // gzhan gyi dmag dpung 'joms pa ni// rgyu/ ni me yis gsal byas pa// drug pa'i dbyangs dang yang
306b6(rgyud): dag ldan// thig la sgra yis rnam par rgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis grangs pa'i// ti se na ma da ra la sogs// de yis phye mor rlog par
306b7(rgyud): nges// rdo rje la gnas 'khor lo yi// dbus gnas 'gro kun rengs par byed// gnas nas bskyod par byed pa yis// 'byung po rnams ni dbang du byed// rtag pa'i gzugasu
306b8(rgyud): gnas nas ni// mi g.yo ba yi snying khar son// chos kyi dbyings mtshungs thob nas ni// bdag go bdag nyid bsgom par bya// rlung gis ben rin po che// spyod pa'i steng du lang
307a1(rgyud): dag ldan// me las byung ba me la gnas// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par byed// sde tshan dang po'i dang po gang // sa yi yi ge steng du gnas// sde tshan lnga pa'i tha ma ni/ 
307a2(rgyud): drug pa'i sgra yi steng du gnas// 'og tu me yi sa bon ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbusu te// sa gsum thams cad 'bar bar byed// me yi phyogasu gnas nas ni// phyag rgya'i bdag nyid thams
307a3(rgyud): cad sgom// rlung lha mi lha yang dag sbyor// rgyu ni byed pa mtshungs pa'o// rnam par snang mdzad ye shes che// de nyid kho na bsgrub par bya// dbang chen mo ni sbyor ba las// 'khor los bsgyur
307a4(rgyud): ba'i go 'phang gnas// ye shes rgya chen bsgrub par bya// yang na phun sum tshogs pa'i don// rig pa 'dzin dang sangs rgya sa nyid// rnal 'byor ye shes phun sum tshogs// skye ba 'di la
307a5(rgyud): 'grub 'gyur te// 'di la the tshom mi bya'o// dbyangs dang / yi ge thams cad la// sbyor ba'i dbye bas rnam par dbye// tshig dag ngag gi tshad rnams dang // ting nge 'dzin
307a6(rgyud): dang sngags 'byung ba// slob dpon man ngag las shes bya// gzhan du bya ba ma yin no// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las rdo rje ka kA'i sbyor ba mdor bsdus te bstan pa ste rgyas par
307a7(rgyud): slob dpon gyis mngon par spyad par bya'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams slar yang 'dus par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
307a8(rgyud): po la gsung ngag gi dkyil 'khor gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi rjes nyid la// 'brug gi sgra mtha' yas pa lags pa
307b1(rgyud): bsgrags pa na mkha'i mdzod kun nas rdo rje rgya che ba tshangs pa chen po'i sgra yong su rdzogs pa'i don dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor so sor
307b2(rgyud): su rtogs pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung grub pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil la
307b3(rgyud): che// zlum po kun nas bzang po ste// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gnas// de yi steng du pad chen po// mdab ma brgyad la ga sar can// de yi lte ba'i dbus ni// yi ge mchog gi ga
307b4(rgyud): 'bang nyid// bdag gis dngos grub bsgom par bya// ngaH/ dgi dbang phyug 'od chen po// snying khar zla ba der pad+ma// de yi steng du dung brtag bya// dung gi dbus lha yin te/ 
307b5(rgyud): rje'i rang bzhin dge ba'o// de yi steng du rin chen pad/ yang na sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan yang // 'ab zhing rkan gyi mthar khyab pa// bdud rtsi rgyun ni rab 'bab pa/ 
307b6(rgyud): ba yi yi ge spyi tshugs pa// sangs rgyas kyi ni steng du gnas// bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dzag pa ni// go rims bzhin du bsam par bya// zla ba phyed dang zla ba gsum// zla ba bzhi'am zla
307b7(rgyud): banyid// zla ba brgyad du rab mchog bsgoms// dkyil 'khor bzang po bsgrub par bya// skyil krungs kyis ni nyer gnas te// dang po'i sbyor ba'i dbang phyug skyes// chos kyi dbyings
307b8(rgyud): ni mtha' dag tu// thams cad du ni yongasu gang // sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam po// sangs rgyas kun gyi rjes skyob pa'o// 
308a1(rgyud): ji snyed rig pa thams cad ni// lus dang ngag dang yid rnams kyi// phyag rgya de rnams bdag nyid mchog/ de rnams thams cad bdag nyid kyi// lus kyi dkyil 'khor la 'jug
308a2(rgyud): bsam// dung gi sgra ni gsal ba bsam// pad+ma'i khams la yang dag brten// pad+ma'i ge sar thig le las// sgra yi rang bzhin rdul phran rnams// mgrin par son nas sgra gyur te// sgra ni dbyangs
308a3(rgyud): nyid lhag pa'o// slar yang lce ru son pa dang // yi ge mchog tu dge ba'o// lce yi yi ge cher 'bar ba// gcig nas gcig tu rdo rje'i tshul// kun nas rab tu 'od gsal ba// rdo rje'i ngag ni dam/ 
308a4(rgyud): pa'i don// sgra yis na mkha' kun gang bar// sgrub pos mdo ru bsdus te bzla// de bzhin du ni snying khar sgra 'am// lnga la 'ang zer nges 'phros nas// mchu'am sol
308a5(rgyud): rab bkra ba'i// gal te 'od zer mthong na ni// de tshe grub par rnam par shes// grub pa'i ngag ni dam pa'i don/ yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// ngag gi sgrub thabs chen po
308a6(rgyud): mchog/ rang lce rdo rje'i rang bzhin bsam// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' nga // 'bar ba'i sgron ma dang mtshungs pa// rang gi snying gi dbus kyi cha// yi ge mchog tu phra ba yi// a yi yi
308a7(rgyud): ge mnga' bdag mchog/ rnam par bkra ba nyi ma bzhin// rang gi lte ba'i mthar thug mtshungs// yi ge yi ger yongasu gzhol// phra mo mnyam pa'i mthar thug ni// 'bar zhing thig le/ 
308a8(rgyud): dang mtshungs shing // snying gi dkyil 'khor gsal byed pa// de yi 'bar ba rab phra ba// ji srid rkan gyi bar du son// slar yang yig thams cad ni// yang dang yang du gsal byed cing / 
308b1(rgyud): lcel rdo rje 'bar ba ni// rdul phran lta bur bye bzhin pa'i// rdo rje 'bar ba stong phrag dag/ yang dang yang du rnam par 'don// 'jig rten kun tu de slong ste// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam/ 
308b2(rgyud): pa// yi ge'i rang bzhin rnam bkra ba// rang gis 'gro ba snang byas te// slar yang 'ong nas rang gnasu// 'jug pa ru ni yongasu brtag/ ji srid phyogs kun song ba yi// yi ge kha ru rab tu
308b3(rgyud): 'jug/ lus la lus can gyi gzugs brnyan// sems kyi phyag rgya legs par bsam// de nas sgra dang yi ge ni// lte bar song ste yongasu gnas// lte ba ru ni pad+ma mchog/ pad+mar rdo rje dri med mdze/ 
308b4(rgyud): de yi steng du dung chen po// rab tu 'phro ba nyid du gnas// de// las 'bar ba'i rnam pa'i sgra// brang gi gnas nas yod su byud // slar yang mgrin par son na su// rdo rje lhal
308b5(rgyud): yang dag reg/ 'gram pa sbyar ba'i dbusu ni// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan dri ma med// kha ba bzho ltar dkar 'od// bcud len bdud rtsi'i thigs pa 'dra// rdo rje'i lce ni mtha'
308b6(rgyud): dag rnams// yang dang yang du gsal bar byed// ting nge 'dzin gyi char song te// slar yang snying kha nyid du song // thig le las ni gug skyed gyur// gug skyed ri mo ring po can// cha shas rnam
308b7(rgyud): bzhi 'dus pa las// de ni yi ge rnam par shes// yi ge las ni sgra skye zhing // sgra las nA da de las dbyangs// dbyangs las ngag tu rnam par 'gyur// yi ge las ni cha shas tshogs// 
308b8(rgyud): tshig rkang dang ni ngag tu 'gyur// tshig rkang las ni tshigs bcad dang // de bzhin du ni gAtha dang // grong 'dzin rgyun chags de bzhin te// 'di ltar sngags dang rigs sngags dang / 
309a1(rgyud): rang gi snying por rab 'jug 'gyur// de nas bzlas pa'i rnal 'byor che// blo gros ldan pas brtan byas te// dgug dang gzhug dang btsir ba dang // dbang du bsdu
309a2(rgyud): te bsgrub par bya// bzlas pa 'di yi sbyor ba yis// thams cad du ni bstan par bya// yid bzhin gyi ni ngag 'grub po// rmang byung mchog tu rnyed dka' ba'i// yang na lha ni gzhan pa yi// 
309a3(rgyud): ngag 'grub thams cad skyob rnams kyis// yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po// ngag gi sgrub thabs mchog tu dag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag pasgom/ 
309a4(rgyud): rang nyid zla bar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// de la bstan bcos thams cad ni// nges pa ga dngon pa nyid du bya// ngag grub pa yi ye shes 'dis// thams
309a5(rgyud): cad mkhyen pa thob par byed// bstan bcos thams cad rab 'don cing // de nyid kyang ni 'chad par byed// sa mas can kun gyis thams cad du// dngos po cung zad gang
309a6(rgyud): bsams pa// de dag thams cad rnam shes te// skad cig tsam la smra bar byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba las ngag gi sgrub pa'i thabs rdzog so// / de nas
309a7(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs chen po mchog gi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab
309a8(rgyud): pa// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i sgrub pa'i thabs bka' stsal du gsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad
309b1(rgyud): kyi dbang phyug gis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan nas/ de de bzhin no zhes bka' stsal nas/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kun nas 'khor lo'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po chen pos/ de bzhin
309b2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thabs kyi rim par phye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs// 
309b3(rgyud): 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad 'am yang na// rtsibs bcu drug pa rnam par bri// lte bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgod// 'khor lo'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// mtha' ru rin chen rnam pa bdun// mkhas
309b4(rgyud): pa yis ni spel bar bya// de yi lte bar bdag nyid ni// 'a'o der los bsgyur ba stobs po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku chen po// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ de yi
309b5(rgyud): phyag rgya sgreng las 'das// skad cig ma ni nyid la 'thon// 2 gro ba thams cad snang byas nas// sngags kyi dbang phyug nyid la gzhug/ 'khor lo'i dngos grub gzi brjid che// 'khor
309b6(rgyud): los bsgyur ba bdag nyid 'gyur// chung dang tshe dang dbang phyug dang // rang dbang 'dod dgur spyod pa dang // kun tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// kun gyi dbang phyug phun tshogs 'bras// rga dang 'chi// 
309b7(rgyud): ba med thob cing // nges par 'khor los bsgyur dang mtshungs// gser gyi 'khor lo rin po che// de bzhin dngul dang shel nyid dang // me tog can gyi lcags kyang rung // rang gi lag gis
309b8(rgyud): bzung nasu// dbang chen dkyil 'khor dbus no// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// 'khor los bsgyur ba gzi brjid che// mtshan rnams kyis ni rnam par rgyan// de ltar bdag
310a1(rgyud): / nyid bsgoms nas ni// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du 'gyur// de la de yi sngags kyi tshig tu gyur pa ni// oM sarba ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki ti/ muN+Di tsakra wan+ti dz+wa la dz+wa la d+hu na trA sa ya
310a2(rgyud): mA ra ya/ uts+tshu Ta ya ha na b+hany+dza pro khi ni kuN+Da li ni a pa rA dza tAs+yA d+hA ri Ne hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA// tsa ba'i sngags so// oM au a pa rA dzi tA d+hi ka swA hA snying po'o// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA naM/ a pr-i ta ha
310a3(rgyud): ta shA sa nA nAM a pa rA dzi tA d+ha kaM swA hA// cho ga'i snying po'o// 'khor los bsgyur ba rang grub ste// sangs rgyas nyid kun thob nas ni// ye shes che dang stobs dang shugs// yang na dbang phyug
310a4(rgyud): dam pa kun// dpa' bo thams cad sbyar byed na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'khro los bsgyur ba'i sgrub thab sa so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// na mkha' la ni
310a5(rgyud): yongasu sgom// gzi brjid phung po ye shes che// sangs rgya sa thams cad thob par 'gyur// gnyi su med 'byung sa mas kyi mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu rmad byung ba// de ni
310a6(rgyud): me yir shes par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yang 'khor lo 'dzin rgyal po// 'khor los bsgyur ba legs 'bar ba// de la de bzhin rin chen bdun// 'khor lo'i phreng bas
310a7(rgyud): rnam par rgyun// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// nyi ma re rer bkra shis sgrom// gzi brjid pung po sku chen po// sum bcu rtsa gsum mtshan 'chang ba/ 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrug/ 
310a8(rgyud): dpa' ba ni// snang ba shar blta bur gnas// de yi phyag rgya rtag tu bsam// na mkha'i rnam par legs par gnas// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// 'od zer phreng bas rnam par bye
310b1(rgyud): de dang bdag nyid rdo rjer sgom// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// kun tu kun nas thams cad du// dngos po kun las 'byung bar 'gyur// ye shes tshe dang stobs dang shugs// kun
310b2(rgyud): tu 'gro ba nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas thams cad nyid dag dang // rdo rje can kun nyid dang ni// gzi brjid mchog kun thob gyur nas// gzi brjid phung po 'dra bar 'gyur// de la sngags kyi
310b3(rgyud): tshig tu gyur pa ni// oM ta thA ga toSh+NI Sha a ba lo ki ta mu ta mud+b+hi te dze rA shi dzA la dz+wa la/ d+ha ka d+ha ka/ da ra da ra/ bin+d+ha bin+te/ hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngag so// oM te dze rA si swA hA/ snying ngo / 
310b4(rgyud): oM dz+wal te dze si hU~M phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'o// dag pa'i sngags tshig 'di rnams kyis// nyi ma'i ye shes ra/ tugs la// kun tu 'gro ba bsgrub par bya// rig pa 'dzin
310b5(rgyud): pa nyid thob 'gyur// gzi brjid phung po'i gsang sngags kyisgrub pa'i thab so// kun nas snang ba zhes bya mchog/ yi ge gsum pa stobs po che/ 
310b6(rgyud): gser gyi kha dog legs 'bar zhing // gtsug tor steng son 'od gsal ba// sngags pa rang bdag gis bsgom bya// kun nas snang ba lta bur 'gyur// oM AHhUM/ gsang sngags
