310b7(rgyud): rtse mo dam pa ni// bsgoms pa tsam gyis thams cad du// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yi// 'gro kun kun nas snang bar 'gyur// kun nas snang ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// 
310b8(rgyud): chos kyi 'khor lo phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// sangs rgyas kun nyid kun gyi mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor byed// 'khor lo 'di ni rtsibs bcu gnyis
311a1(rgyud): rtsibs bcu gnyis pa yongasu gnas// rnam gsum gsum ni yongs bskor ba// bya ba'i don du dag pa ste// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// na mkha'i khrugs na
311a2(rgyud): gnas pa ste// chos kyi dbyings ni khyab pa ni// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas skom// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba ni// 'di kun rten cing 'brel 'byung ba// 'di ni chos kyi phyag rgya
311a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// de yi sngagasu gyur pa ni// oM d+hu na pA ta ya tshinA tsakra Na badz+ri Ni hUM/ gsang sngags 'di ni dpal ldan mchog/ chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis med 'char/ 
311a4(rgyud): skad cig tsam gyis thams cad du// dam pa'i chos ni ra bskor byed// chos kyi 'khor lo sgrub pa'i thabs so// / pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// sangs rgyas skugargya
311a5(rgyud): legs 'bar ba// rnal 'byor sbyor ba'i mchog bsgrubs na// nyon mongs rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// snying nas rdza rje gzugs brnyan 'dra// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i
311a6(rgyud): 'od// de yi snying la rdo rje me// dri ma med pa skyes par 'gyur// nyon mongs rtag tu yongs zad cing // dgra rnams kun las rgyal bar byed// bden pa bzhi ni rtogs pas na// bden
311a7(rgyud): pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur// sngags ni oM kle sha a sha ni hUM phaT/ 'di ni nyon mongs rdo rje'i sngags// drag cing drag pos gzhan gnon po'o// sangs rgyas nyid kyang star byed na// dngos
311a8(rgyud): grub gzhan lta smos ci dges// nyon mongs rdo rje sgrub pa'i thab so// / dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas rang bzhin stobs po che// bdud bzhi
311b1(rgyud): las ni rnam rgyal ba// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// bden pa bzhi yi khu tshur che// lus dang ngag dang de bzhin yid// khu chur sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gnyis med skye ba'i mtshan
311b2(rgyud): nyid de// rdo rje'i dbusu bsgom par bya// rang nyid sangs rgyas yin no zhes// brtan dang g.yo ba'i 'gro ba ni// 'di dag thams cad ma skyes pa// rdo rje khu tshur bsgoms na ni// rdo rje khu tshur 'dra bar 'gyur
311b3(rgyud): oM bi dza ye ha/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khu tshur che// shes rab pha rol phyin gsal ba// sngags pas rtag tu bsgoms nas ni// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'thog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
311b4(rgyud): khu tshur gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// / dngos po thams cad gyen 'phags pa// gdod nas zhin nga mtshan nyid med// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sku chen po// dkyil
311b5(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i dbusa'o// rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag nyid sgom/ 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis// 'di yis 'jig tu na thams cad kyi// 'khor los bsgyur ba nyid du ni// 'jig rten
311b6(rgyud): kun gyis thams cad du// kun nas phun sum tshogs pa kun// bkug nas gus par sbyin par bya// sngags ni oM dz+wa la dz+wa la di byA dI pya ut+pa toSh+NI Sha d+hu na d+hu na hUM// stang 'gro'i gtsug tor zhes
311b7(rgyud): bya ba/ sangs rgyas dpa' bo kun gyis gsungs// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// 
311b8(rgyud): sangs rgyas rang bzhin phyag rgya che// legs par mnyam par gzhag pas sgom// chad skyob gdugs dkar chen po ni// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor das
312a1(rgyud): / gnas par// zla ba'i khadag cher 'bar zhing // chu yi dkyil 'khor rnam dgapa// dri me bun da ri kar gnas// ri mo bdun gyis yongasu gang // bcud kyi yin gyi mchogs
312a2(rgyud): bur// sangs rgyas kun bdag bsgom par bya// dngos grub 'di yi sbyor ba yis// sems can rnams la thams cad du// re ba thams cad longs rdzogs pa// 'di ni gtsug tor gdugs dkar che/ 
312a3(rgyud): sngags ni/ oM ma ma ma ma hUM ni/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// ye shes tshe dang stobs mgyogs 'gro// dpa' bo thams cad thob 'gyur zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang rnyed dka' min// gdugs
312a4(rgyud): dkar po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// / zla/ da ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// 'bar ba'i phreng 'khrugs/ ral gri ni// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rang gi
312a5(rgyud): bdag nyid sangs rgyas zhes// sangs rgyas rang bzhin sprin chen pos// na mkha'i mthongs rnams yongs gang ba// bdag nyid gnyis med ngo bo yis// rnal 'byor gcig tu
312a6(rgyud): bsgom par bya// sngags kyi yi ge 'khor lo che// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// sngags pas snying khar bsgom par bya// rgyal ba dam pa nyid du 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM dz+wa la dza
312a7(rgyud): loSh+NI Sha dz+wa la dz+wa la ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da ma da ma/ dru ma dru ma/ da ha da ha na hUM phaT// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor ral gri che// shes rab ya shes dri ma med// sngags pas kun nas bsgom nas ni// rgyal
312a8(rgyud): pa'i gtsug tor 'dra bar 'gyur// rgyal ba'i gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// / sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrugs pa'i 'od// seng+ge'i khri yi stang
312b1(rgyud): du bsam// yang na rdo rje'i gdan la gnas// kun tu gtsug tor che 'bar ba// snying khar yongasu bsgom par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid ni// yi ge dam pa yi ni gnas// thog ma tham/ 
312b2(rgyud): med zhi ba// chos kyi sku ni mchog tu che// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// kun tu gtsug tor stobs po che// skad cig de la 'grub 'gyur te// rdo rje sangs rgyas kun gyi bka' bzhin no// 
312b3(rgyud): sngags ni oM badz+ra ban+d+ha hU~M/ gsang sngags 'di ni dam pa gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang bskur byed// rtag tu rnal 'byor pas bsgoms na// de ni kun gyi dbang bskur ro// kun gyi
312b4(rgyud): gtsug tor gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// / rdo rje snying po rgyan ces bya ba'i rgyud chen po las de bzhin gshe gas pa thams cad kyi gtsug tor gyi sgrub thabs kyi cho ga rgyas
312b5(rgyud): nga'i rim par phye ba yongasu rdzog so// / de na sa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams tham sa cad slar yang 'dus par gyur te// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
312b6(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas par bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bco
312b7(rgyud): ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos/ de dag gi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gsan nas de ma thag pa kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas byang
312b8(rgyud): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi gsang sngags kyi rim par phye ba bka' stsal pa/ shes rab ye shes rdo rje che// snying khar yongasu bsgom na su// ral gri sngon po phyag na bsnams// dbang chen dang
313a1(rgyud): ni me las 'khrungs// ye shes chen po gzi brjid che// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// sangs rgyas kun bdag shes rab mchog/ nyon mongs thams cad zad par byed/ 
313a2(rgyud): rdo rje kun bdag dkod pa po// kun tu 'gro ba'i dam pa'i don// dbyer med mchog tu gsang ba po// rim pa mchog gi bdag nyid 'di// zhal drug pa la phyag drug mchog/ mngon shes drug
313a3(rgyud): ldan yi ge drug/ rjes dran drug gi sbyor ba yis// phyag drug dam pa stobs po che// gzi brjid yang na stobs kyis kyang // kun nas yongasu gsang ba'o// gzugs che lus kyang che ba ste// nama'i
313a4(rgyud): khams na rnam par gnas// yang na phyag gnyis shes pa/ bya// ting 'dzin gnas sdig pa bcom// dpa' bo pad+ma/ la gnas pa// zla ba'i mdog can 'od po che// rnal 'byor pa yi// 
313a5(rgyud): ye shes phra// shes rab pha rol phyin pa 'bar// gdod nas ma skyes pa zhes bsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab gsol byed// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes mchog/ 'jam pa'i dbyang
313a6(rgyud): zhes rab tu grags// de'i sngags ni/ oM bA kye de na maH/ gsang sngags 'di ni mchog tu gsang // gsang chen gyi ni dam par bzhed// rnam thar gsum gyi sgo la gnas// pha rol phyin drug rab
313a7(rgyud): tu gsal// rang nyid shes rab yin no zhes// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom par bya// dbang po drug ni rab bsgyur te// sangs rgyas nyid ni rnal 'byor las// pad+ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ ston zla lta bur
313a8(rgyud): cher gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po gser gyi mdog/ stobs po che ni bsgom par bya// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// bstan bcos thams cad
313b1(rgyud): rab smra zhing // dbang phyug thams cad mdun na gnas// kun gyi rgyal po sngags pa nyid// rang nyid kun gyi rgyal mo mtshungs// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad dang // byang chub kun gyi pha rol son// 
313b2(rgyud): dbang phyug kun dang bde ba che// chos rnams kun gyi yon tan mchog/ rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad dang // yang na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// kun tu 'gro ba thob 'gyur ba// dngos grub gzhan lha
313b3(rgyud): smos ci dgos// dngul chu bcud len de nyid dang // rkang pas spyod pa dri med mchog/ ril bu dang ni mi snang ba// thams cad du ni ster bar 'gyur// dpal ldan 'jam pa'i mchog 'di ni// 
313b4(rgyud): chos kyi gsung gi mchog las 'khrungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshangs pa'i dbyangs// 'jam pa'i dbyangs zhes rab tu grags// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// bsams
313b5(rgyud): pa'i phun sum tshogs kun gyi// sangs rgyas kun tu brtan 'gro na// gzhan pa'i lha lta smos ci dgos// 'jam ba'i dbyangs kyi sgrub zlab so// / snying khar pad+ma
313b6(rgyud): chen po la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yongasu gnas// 'jig rten dbang phyug dpa' bo che// thugs rje chen po'i thugs ldan pa// phyag bzhi po la zhal bzhi pa// dung dang kun da zla ltar dag/ chos
313b7(rgyud): kyi dbyings las yang dag byung // chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po la// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug ches// de la gnas pa dge bsgom// rang bzhin gyis ni 'di dag kun// gdod nas
313b8(rgyud): ma skyes ma byung ba// gsang sngags chen po 'di yis ni// snying khar yongasu bsgom par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug 'khor lo che// kun tu rnam par 'phros pa yis// 'bar ba'i phreng
314a1(rgyud): bas 'khrigs shing zhi// ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po// ral pa'i dbus dpa' bo che// 'od dpag med pa ldan pa'i bdag/ skyon ka'i zla ba lta bur gsal// kun tu
314a2(rgyud): nam mkha' yongs gang ba// gsang sngags sbyor ba dag bsgom par bya// rang nyid 'jig rten gsum rnam rgyal// chos kyi dbyings kyi mthas klas pa// pad+ma'i lus kyis yang dag gang // kun tu pad+ma
314a3(rgyud): rnams la ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i sku// khyad par du bdag dag par bya// 'gro ba brtan dang g.yo ba kun// snang dang mi snang dngos po ni// 
314a4(rgyud): yang dang yang du blta bar bya// gdul bya ma lus sems la ni// / stobs po ches ni dag par bya// kha dog dbyibs ni 'de bzhin du// sna tshogs gzugs la cher 'bar ba// kun
314a5(rgyud): nas yongasu bsdus nas ni// sngags pa'i mdun du bzhag bar bya// de na sngags pas de ma thag/ slar yang rtse gcig sems kyis ni// dgug dang gzhug dang btsang ba
314a6(rgyud): las// dbang du bya ba bsgrub par bya// 'jig rten dbang phyug thub chen po// bcol ldan rnal 'byor can grub na// dpa' bo thams cad stsol 'gyur zhing // rang gi dngos grub mchog rnams
314a7(rgyud): dang / rnal 'byor thams cad 'dzin nyid dang // rnam par rgyas pa'i nor sngar 'gyur// rig pa 'dzin dang 'khor lo can// sa dang pha rol phyin sogs dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyang stsol
314a8(rgyud): 'gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de'i sngags ni/ oM A ro li ka/ gsang sngags dpal ldan mchog 'di ni// rang nyid khams gsum rnam par rgyal// longs spyod thams
314b1(rgyud): cad bkug nas ni// skad cig tsam gyis rna pa ster// pad+ma'i sgrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug sgrub// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid ni// srid par bkug nas rnam par ster
314b2(rgyud): 'jig rten dbang phyug gi sgrub pa'i thab so// / thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin gzugs// mi yi dkyil 'khor dge ba ste// de yi dbus bya ba ni// dkyil 'khor rlung dang rab mtshungs
314b3(rgyud): pa// de yi dbus de 'dra bsam// nyi ma yi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de yi dbusu gzi brjid che// 'char ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// rdo rje'i lag pa gzi brjid che// rgyan rnam kun gyis rnam par brgyan
314b4(rgyud): tshangs pa'i yul sa thams cad du// kun nas yongasu gsal bar byed// hUM gi yi ge sgra zab mo// dbyar gyi sprin dang ma tshungs pI 'od// rgyal po 'khyil ba dang mtshungs pa// zar ma
314b5(rgyud): yi ni me tog 'dra// 'bar ba dmar pos 'khrigs shing 'jin/ sa// bskal pa'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// zhal bzhi pa la mche ba bzhi// 'jigs pa'i dus kyi thal ba 'dra// sprin gyi
314b6(rgyud): sgra dang mtshungs pa yi// hUM gi yi ge bzhi dang ldan// rdo rje hUM mdzad ces bya ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sngags kyi tshig ni/ oM sum+b+ha ni sum+b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ 
314b7(rgyud): An ya ho b+ha ga ban bid+yA rA dza hUM phaT/ rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po 'di// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'jig rten gsum yang 'gugs byed ni// bud med gzhan lta smos ci dgos/ 
314b8(rgyud): tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang chen sogs// chung ma dang bcas phyag rgyar bcas// de dag thams cad 'gugs byed na// sdug bsngal can gzhan smos ci dgos// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gan
315a1(rgyud): par// da rje'i gzugs brnyan snying khar son// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor bas// rdo rje can gyis sngon du sgrug/ bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed pa// bcom ldan rdo can 'grub cu
315a2(rgyud): rgyal po thams cad sbyin gyur na// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni 'dir/ oM Tak+ki hUM dza/ gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// longs spyod ji skad thams
315a3(rgyud): cad rnams// de snyed thams cad rnam par sbyar// rdo rje 'dzin pa sgrub pa'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// byams pa chen po'i bdag nyid sku// snying kar zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'od/ 
315a4(rgyud): rje 'bar ba'i phreng ba ldan// 'jig rten khams ni 'byam klas/ pa// rang bzhin gcig tu byas nas ni// rdo rje yis ni spro ba dang // dbang bskur ba yi rang bzhin dge/ gser gyi kha
315a5(rgyud): dog legs 'bar ba// ral pa'i thor tshugs 'dzin pa po/ ral pa'i dbus su mchod rten che// dung dang kun da zla 'od bzang // bsgoms nas sems can thams cad la// brtan pa'i
315a6(rgyud): don du dbang bskur bya// yang na sems can thams cad la// bu gcig lta bur rnam pa spro// sgom pa'i sbyor bas bsgoms na ni// gnyis med ma rgyal ba las rgyal// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba dang // tham
315a7(rgyud): sogs phyogs dbyes rnam par byed// byams pa kun tu rnam par spro// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// thams cad bdag dang bdag gi bar// 'das shing shin tu dri ma med// ri rab lta bur brtan
315a8(rgyud): pa'i sems// 'khrul pa med cing yi ge bral// de ltar sems ni brtan byas nas// mnyam med sems can kun dang mnyam// bdag nyid byams pa yin no zhes// dga' ldan gnas pa'i tshul 'dzin
315b1(rgyud): ga gzung bad 'i zhing 'khyil pa'i sa// bad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'dang // ran chen sems ni rnam dag pas// rang bdag nyid ni bsgom par bya// 'di gas sngags rang bzhin gyis grub pa na/ oM adza/ 
315b2(rgyud): tany+dza sarba satwa sa ma ya ma nu ga ta swA hA// gsang sngags bdag nyid rgyal po 'di// byams pa zhes ni grags pa ste// chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par khyab// byams pa'i thugs ni yid du 'ong // 
315b3(rgyud): po'i sbyor ba'i rnal 'byor gyi// sgrub pa'i thabs mchog bsgom par bya// oM me tra ya tri/ 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis kyang // dga' ldan du ni gnas par 'gyur// sgrib pa kun dang bral ba'i bdag
315b4(rgyud): rang nyid lha yi bu dang mtshungs// byams pa'i sbyor bas bsgom na ni// 'di ni byams pa lta bur 'gyur// byams pa'i sangs rgyas zhing du ni// rang bzhin gyis ni skye bar 'gyur// de mdun chos
315b5(rgyud): ni legs mnyan nas// sa dang pha rol phyin pa dang // dbang dang / ting 'dzin thob nas ni// de ni byang chub sems dpar 'gyur// / mthar yang sangs rgyas thams cad ni// byams pa'i yid kyis
315b6(rgyud): thob par 'gyur// byams pa'i sgrub pa'i thab so// / rang gi lus ni thams cad ni// na mkha' mtshungs pa nyid du sgom// chos bdag med pa bskyed nas kyang // rang nyid na mkha'i snying
315b7(rgyud): por 'gyur// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// mkha' mtshungs dpe las rnam par 'das// na mkha'i 'od zer gyur pa yis// sems can rang gi sems las spro// thams cad sems las spros nas
315b8(rgyud): ni// slar yang rims kyis bsdu bar bya// namakhar mnyam par 'gro ba blta// rang gi de nyid kyis sbyar bya// rin chen dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rin chen kha dog 'od chen po// rgyan rnams kun gyis
316a1(rgyud): lus brgyan pa// lag na rin chen stobs po che// rin chen sbyor ba bsgoms pa yis// namakha'i dam pa 'grub pa yin// sngags ni/ oM a kA sha gad+hA ya swA hA// na mkhar snying / 
316a2(rgyud): po stobs po che// bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur// rang gi dngos grub thams cad ni// ster bar 'gyur te dpyad mi dgos// dpa' bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// dngos grub ji snyed bka'
316a3(rgyud): stsal pa// namakha'i snying po bsgrubs pa yis// de dag thams cad myur du ser// namakha'i snying po sgrub pa'i thabs// / sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// rgyan rnams kun gyis/ 
316a4(rgyud): brgyan pa yis// kun tu bzang po 'od bzang po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbusu ni// sngags pas rtag tu bsgom pa/ dbya// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// rang gi lus ni ji/ 
316a5(rgyud): snyed pa'i// rang gi phra rab rdul rnams kyis// de dag tham sa cad mtshungs par bya// sangs rgyas sku yi sku nyid du/ yang na ba spu'i khung rnamasu// rang gi 'khor los yongs bskor
316a6(rgyud): nas// sangs rgyas kun dang mtshungs byas te// bdag nyid kun tu bzang po zhes// yi ge lnga pa zhesu bshad// 'di yi sngags chen bzlas par bya// yang na 'dir ni lha gzhan gyi// rtag tu sngags
316a7(rgyud): su gyur pa'o// oM sAM hrIHkA ya swA hA// gsang sngags rgyal po che gsang zhing // gdod nas dag cing rang byung ba// 'di ni bsgrubs pa tsam gyis ni// shes rab dri ma med par 'gyur// de yi ye shes
316a8(rgyud): dri med cing // gzugs mdzes pa ni de dang mtshungs// bstan bcos thams cad rab smra ba// kun bzang mchog tu bdag 'gyur ro// kun tu bzang po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// 
316b1(rgyud): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa yi// slob pa thams cad rnam sel ba// dam pa'i don du bsgom par bya// gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba dang // bcud rtsas
316b2(rgyud): len gyis bde blag tu// ring po nyid du mi thogs par// sgrib pa rnams sel mtshungs par 'gyur// sngags 'byung ba ni/ oM sarba ni war Na baSh+ka m+b+hi swA hA/ oM ni sa rA ya swA hA// gtso bo gsangs
316b3(rgyud): 'di 'dzin la// rnam par sel ba grags pa ste// thams cad sgom pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya kun gyis thams cad du// gdod nas skye med rang bzhin gyis// gdod nas dag cing 'gyur ba med// de ltar
316b4(rgyud): chos 'di shes nas ni// lha nyid dang ni mnyam byas nas/ rnyog pa med cing zag med pa'i// rje su rnal 'byor gyis bsgrub bya// ut+pal sngon po'i mdab ma ltar// gsal ba'i rnam
316b5(rgyud): par gnas pa'o// dbang chen dkyil 'khor las zhugs pa'i// me yis yongasu bskor ba yis// phyag na raHgro gzi brjid che// yang nas yang du sems byed cing // dngos
316b6(rgyud): grub 'di ni gzi brjid che// rnam sel mchog gi dbang phyug ni// mtha' las 'das pa'i dngos grub mchog/ thams cad nas na stsol ba nyid// rnam par sel ba sgrub pa'i thab so// dbang chen
316b7(rgyud): dkyil 'khor steng du ni// rdo rje yi ni dbus na bzhugs// gsar gyi mdog can sku chen po// 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid can// snying khar rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnas// sa snying zhes byar bdag nyid sgom
316b8(rgyud): rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyar bas// rang gi gsang sngags brjod par bya// sa snying zhes byar bdag bsgoms nas// sngags kyi yi ge mchog bde 'di// oM kI haHrA dzaHswA hA// bsam yas sngags
317a1(rgyud): mchog 'di ldani// dngos grub thams cad rab gsol mdzad// sa yi snying po zhes grags pa// dam pa'i don du rnal 'byor bas// sa ri snying po'i sgrub pa'i thab so// 
317a2(rgyud): zad pa med cing 'khrul pa med// zad med mchog gi shes rab can// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// shes rab rdo rje'i bdag nyid dag/ blo gros mi zad rnyed dka' ba// 'bad pa yis ni bsgom par
317a3(rgyud): bya// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus ni// gser gyi mdog dang ldan pa'i gzugs// rgyal po chen po zla ba'i 'od// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor shas la// sngags ni/ oM a kA ya ma ti swA hA// sngags kyi yi/ 
317a4(rgyud): gi gsang ba 'di// thams cad blo gros gsal bar byed// ye shes mi zad 'dod pa yis// 'bad pa yi ni bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub kun gyi mchog shes bya// shes rab ye shes dri
317a5(rgyud): med mdzes// sangs rgyas nyid kyang thob gyur na// dngos grub ga/ zhan lta ci zhig smos// blo gros mi zad pa'i sgrub thab so// // kun nas shes rab chen po can// zla ba'i dkyil
317a6(rgyud): 'khor la brten par// gser gyi kha dog gzi brjid che// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// gzhon nu'i gzugs can rtog pasam bya// raM ba thams cad rdzogs par mdzad// rang gi lcag
317a7(rgyud): pa'i lha sbyor ba// na mkha'i bdag po bdag yin zhes// lus ngag yid kyis thams cad du// thams cad rig pas brtan par bya// shin tu dri mad byang chub sems// rang snying me long lta bur bas// 
317a8(rgyud): de nas yi ge'i tshig bkod de// mkha' mdzod bdag ces bdag nyid kyis// bsgoms nas rdo rje rdo rje'i bdag/ mkha' la rin chen 'byung gnas dang // yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing // de
317b1(rgyud): bzhin bum pa bzang po sogs// 'jig rten kun gyi dbang phyug gis// nye bar mkho ba thams cad 'bab// 'dzag rten kun gyi rdzas thams cad// ji skad yod pa de dag kun// 'dir ni skad / 
317b2(rgyud): tsam nyid la// dngos grub dam pa stsol bar 'gyur// oM ga ga na gan+da gaM swA hA// na mkha' mdzod kyi dngos grub che// nor gyi rgyun gyi rab 'bebs pa// na mkha'i mdzad ni stabs po che// skad/ 
317b3(rgyud): cig tsam gyis byed par 'gyur// na mkha' mdzod kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// / rin chen dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rin chen phung po char rab 'bebs// rin chen gzi
317b4(rgyud): brjid mchog tu rol// lag na rin chen de bsgrub bya// lag/ na rin chen phyag rgya che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ga/ nas par// rdo rje sbyor bas bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rin
317b5(rgyud): chen zhes bya dang // rin chen thams cad stsol bar mdzad// tha mas cad rdo rje bzhin bdag nyid// pri yang gu mdog sngog sangs 'od// dbang chen dang ni me las byung // phyag na rin chen
317b6(rgyud): cher gsal ba// rab tu 'bad de bsgom par bya// oM rat+na pA Ni ra mu swA hA// gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// rab tu 'bad de bsgrubs na ni// 'gro ba kun gyi lag tu ni// rin chen thams
317b7(rgyud): cad rab stsol byed// lag na rin po che'i sgrub pa'i thab so// / chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs pa'i sems// bdud rtsi'i chu yis rab gang ba// stong gsum zhes ni bsam
317b8(rgyud): bar bya// pad+ma gcig gi steng na gnas// de yi steng du gzi brjid che// chu lha yi ni gzugs kyi mchog/ de steng du yang gsang chen po// me yi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// de yi stang du brtson
318a1(rgyud): 'grus che// rtse mo brgya pa'i rdo rje byung // de yi steng du pad chen po// 'dab ma brgya pa 'od gsal ba// de steng rtag tu bsam pa ni// byang chub sems dpa' stobs po che
318a2(rgyud): rgya mtsho'i blo gros zhes grags pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dung dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi lag na phyag rgya che// rdo rje dung du
318a3(rgyud): / rab tu grags// rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bas// rang nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// rgya mtsho'i blo gros shes rab che// slar yang gsang sngags bzla bar bya// sngags ni/ oM sA ga ra ma tai saM/ 
318a4(rgyud): ra swA hA// sngags 'di mchog dang gtso bo ste// shes rab ye shes dri med mdzes// rdo rje'i sbyor bas myangs na ni// shes rab rgya mtsho'i blo gros mtshungs// rang nyid sangs
318a5(rgyud): rgyas 'jam pa'i dbyangs// thugs rje 'jig rten dbang phyu/ ga rgyal// dngos grub gzhan lta smos ci dgos// rgya mtsho'i blo gros kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// / 
318a6(rgyud): dbang chen dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// ut+pal sdong po med ba 'dra'i 'od// rdo rje snying po brtson 'grus che// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// ji snyed so steng mtha' dag tu// khyab la sdug cing
318a7(rgyud): mtho ba yi// sra zhing snying po rnam dag pa'i// mchog gi yi ge 'gyur med pa// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po ni// chos kyi sprin la spyod mdzad pa// bsam yas sa ni yang dag brnyes// oMn+d+ra nA
318a8(rgyud): la mtshungs pa'i 'od// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// yig mchog ni steng du 'bar// thugs kar rdo rje cher gsal ba// rang nyid rnam par 'phro ba bzhin// sngags ni oM badz+ra gar+b+ha hUM/ 'di/ 
318b1(rgyud): ni sngags mchog gtso bo ste// sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub byed// ye shes yangs pa sgrol mdzad cing // rnam pa kun tu phun tshogs kun// sangs rgyas nyid kun stsol mdzad na// dngos grub
318b2(rgyud): gzhan lta smos ci dgos// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // dbang du bya ba sgrub par byed// bdag nyid rdo rje yin no zhes// nga rgyal rab tu bskyed nas ni// rdo rje snying po bzhin du gzhan// bdag gi/ 
318b3(rgyud): rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// thugs kyi rdo rje nyid gyur nas// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa thob// des na rnam pa thams cad kyi// rdo rje snying po yang dag byung // rdo rje snying po mkha' rdo rje// sbyin byed
318b4(rgyud): rtse mo drug pas sgrub// rdo rje snying po sgrub pa'i thab so// / dbang chen me las yang dag byung // nor bu rin chen 'dra ba'i lus// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// 
318b5(rgyud): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin chen 'byung ba sems chen po// 'gro ba snang bar byed de gnas// pad+ma mkha' 'dra'i rnam pa can// phyag rgya de yi snying kar gnas// 
318b6(rgyud): rin chen sbyor bas bsgom par bya// rin chen char pa 'bab par 'gyur// sngags ni/ oM rat+na ka raHhrIHrat+na da da swA hA// rin chen 'byung gnas rgyal po 'di// mchog rnams kyi ni sa'i dbang
318b7(rgyud): phyug/ sbyor ba kun gyis bsgrub par bya// rgya che'i nor rnams stsol bar 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i sgrub pa'i thab so// / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po rdo rje'i
318b8(rgyud): rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i thab so// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus
319a1(rgyud): te gshegs nas// bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis khro bo bcom
319a2(rgyud): ldan 'das bskyed du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das khro bo 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos de skad ces gsol ba btab ma thag kho nar rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba las ches gsang ba bka'/ 
319a3(rgyud): stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// khro ba yi ni dkyil 'khor mchog/ rlung khams rab tu gsal ba la// me yi dbus nas dbu su'o// de yi dbus rdo rje che// 'od zer lnga yi phreng bas mdzes// 
319a4(rgyud): yi mdun du bya ba yang // mdung rtsi 'bar ba chen po yi// de yi g.yas kyi cha ru ni// rdo rje chen po 'bar phreng can// ga yon nyid du ni be con che// rig pa'i phreng bas rnam par spras/ 
319a5(rgyud): rgyab tu ral gri'i phyag rgya ni// rin chen 'bar bas rnam par rgyan phyi ngos rnamasu rnam khros pa'i// khro bo thams cad dag par bya// de yi sngags kyi yi ge gsang // gsang chen mchog
319a6(rgyud): tu 'bar ba'o// gzhal du med cing grangs med mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// yi ge gcig pa gsang chen po// rgyu yi don du rtogs par byed// dbyangs lnga dang ni yang dag ldan
319a7(rgyud): thig le sgra yis rnam par rgyan// de nyid gsang ba'i mgon po ni// dbyangs bdun par ni bshad pa yin// he ru ka dpal rdo rje che// 'jigs pa'i thal ba mchog tu 'bar// sems dpa' sngon pa
319a8(rgyud): 'bar ba'i bdag/ 'bar ba'i me yi dkyil 'khor bzhin// 'jigs pa chen po dus can gyi// char sprin dang ni 'dra ba'i 'od// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam pa 'dra// 'bar ba kun gyis rnam par brgyan// 
319b1(rgyud): dur khrod me bzhin shin tu yang // gsal ba'i sgra ldan stobs po che// rno ba'i rdo rje cher 'bar ba// thod pa'i cod pan steng du 'bar// 'jigs pa chen po dus can gyi// rgod ma kha yi me ltar gnas/ 
319b2(rgyud): smin 'khyog rnam par 'khrug pa can// g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// khro ba la sogs nyams dang ldan// rnam pa sna tshogs 'khrugs pa'i gdong // gar dang sdud par yang dag ldan// 
319b3(rgyud): 'jig rten snang ba gar mdzad pa// phyag ni brgya phrag stong dang ldan// gcig tu 'gyur zhing rnam pa mang // rnam mang zhal ldan de dag gi/ sngo ser la sogs tha dad ldan// zhabs kyang rnam pa du
319b4(rgyud): ma ldan// sna tshogs mdog ldan rnam par 'khrug/ de nyi dad bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che// shin tu gdug cing drag rnams la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba zhes
319b5(rgyud): byar gnas// phyag drug zhal drug spang ba can// zhabs dru ga pa ste gsus po che// char sprin mchog 'dra cher/ gnag pa// dus mtha'i me dang 'dra bar gnas// mdog chen
319b6(rgyud): rgyal po 'khyil ba 'dra// zar ma yaM ni me tog mtshungs// khro bo thod pa'i phreng ba 'chang // gshin rje mthar byed stobs po che// de la sngags kyang // oM AHhUM phaT/ oM ya ma ma tha na hUM phaT/ aM
319b7(rgyud): hrIHSh+T+rIHbikr-i tA na na hUM sarba sha trun nA sha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM phaT// sngags kyi rgyal po bdag nyid 'di// khyab bdag gdul dka' 'dul ba po// gshin rje mthar mdzad khro bo che// sangs rgyas kun
319b8(rgyud): gyi bdag nyid gtso// sangs rgyas thams cad spyan 'dren cing // dbang du yang ni mdzad par 'dul// shin tu gdug pa drag rnams la// zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te// shes rab thabs kyi bdag nyid
320a1(rgyud): kyis// de bzhin gshegs rnams khro bor mdzad// thugs rje khro bo ngang tshul can// 'jig rten gsum kyang nges sreg mdzad// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// shes rab
320a2(rgyud): thabs kyi bdag nyid sku// thugs rjes khro bo ma lus mchog/ gdug pa 'dul bar mdzad pa bskyed// gshin rje mthar mdzad kyi sgrub pa'i thabs so// / de nyid bcom ldan rnal
320a3(rgyud): 'byor te// khro bo gzigs ma zhesu grags// dmar po 'bar ba'i khro bo che// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus dang 'dra// ut+pal sngon po'i mdab ma bzhin// de yi kha dog rnam par bsam// drag
320a4(rgyud): po chen po'i zhal bzhi pa// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mkhrigs pa'i 'od// spyan gsum pa la khro gnyer bsnyer// phyag drug pa la dmachog tu 'bar// me yi khams dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ li
320a5(rgyud): khri'i mdog ltar shin tu 'bar// de yi khro gnyer bsnyer ba yi sa// gdug pa 'dul mdzad 'byin par byed// khro bo'i rgyal po gnyis pa ni// yang dang yang du bsam par bya// 
320a6(rgyud): ma lus sa rnams thams cad du// son pa'i bdag nyid chen po des// 'gugs pa dang ni dbang byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// sngags ni/ oM ka Ni d+hu ni hUM phaT/ khro bo 'di yi
320a7(rgyud): sngags 'dzin pa// 'jig rten gsum mchog stobs po che// sa rnams thams cad sreg byed na// skye bo gzhan lta smos ci dgos// khro ba gzigs me sgrub pa'i thabs so// 
320a8(rgyud): de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug 'gyur// rta mgrin zhesu bshad pa yin// rtag tu 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba/ 
320b1(rgyud): rgya skyegs mdog ltar 'bar ba po// chu dang gzi brjid can reg pa// me yi dkyil 'khor dag dang ldan// 'dod ldan rnams la 'dod pa 'byung // gdug pa can rnams gdug pa 'byung // zhi ba la'ang ni// 
320b2(rgyud): ba 'byung // stobs ldan rnams la stobs kyis sbyor// zhal bzhi pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bsam gtan bzhi dang mnyam par ldan// phyag bzhi pa la brtson 'grus che// sang ga ltar gnas mche ba bzhi// / 
320b3(rgyud): rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ni// dam pa'i dbang phyug bsgrub par bya// skad cig nyid la bslang nas ni// thams cad slong ba bsgrub par bya// sngags ni/ oM a mr-i tod+b+ha bo da b+ha be hUM phaT/ oM a mr-i tod d+ha
320b4(rgyud): ba hUM phaT// g.yas dang g.yon gyi sbyor ba yis// g.yon brkyang ba ni rab tu sbyar// khro bo'i dkyil krung byas nas ni// 'jig rte/ nu thams cad rab nyed bya// pad+ma'i dbang phyug rgyal po ni// kun
320b5(rgyud): mtshogs yi dbang phyug ste// rta yi mgrin pa stobs po che// ste khas kyi sbyor bas bsgrub par bya// dbang phyug chen po la sogs lha// tshogs kyi bdag po gzhan dag dang // 
320b6(rgyud): dang gdug pa'i bsam pa can// sa rnams thams cad dgug par bya// rta mgrin sgrub pa'i thabs so// // de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor de// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// shes
320b7(rgyud): rab thabs kyi bdag nyid gyur// khro bo mchog tu mi 'gyur ba// kun sbyor bdag gi rnal 'byor gyis// thugs rjes khro bo'i dbang du song // de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sna yi rtse mor yid kyis ni// 
320b8(rgyud): g.yo ba med par bsam par bya// slob dpon mi g.yo khro bo che// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad brtan// ral gri zhags pa 'dzin pa gsang // thog ma tha ma med pa'i mchog/ pr-i yang kultar ldang ba'i
321a1(rgyud): gzugs// 'khrigs shing byis pa lta bur gnas// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// khro bo mngag pa bran dang ni// pho nyas kyang ni rnam par brgyan
321a2(rgyud): skye bo kun gyis yongasu gang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngan// bka' lung yang ni yongasu stsol// zad pa'i dus dang 'drar gnaso// sngags ni/ na maHman+ta badz+ra NA tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na s+pho Ta ya hUM/ trakahA mA/ 
321a3(rgyud): ba'i gzi brjid chen po 'di// gzugs mang mnga' ba stobs po che// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par byed// dbang du yang ni mdzad par gnas// rlung dang ma las yang dag byung // 'bar ba lta bu'i gzi brjid
321a4(rgyud): can// sngags dang phyag rgya sogs kun mchog/ lus dang ngag yid de bzhin no// dgug dang gzhug dang bcing ba dang // da dbang du byas nas bsgrub par bya// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mcho
321a5(rgyud): na mkha'i khams kyi mthas klas mchog/ khro bo phyag rgya rang byung ba// drag po thog ma tha ma med// rnam par 'gro ba bzhi na du gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyan
321a6(rgyud): gyi rgyud las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor 'di yongasu rdzogaso// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te// gshegs nas bcom ldan 'das
321a7(rgyud): la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs rnams thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par
321a8(rgyud): mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// gzungs rnams kyi ni dkyil 'khor dge/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs kyis ni rnam
321b1(rgyud): par mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa rab tu bshad// de yi dbusu pad chen po// lo ma kun gyis shin tu mdzes// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i mda' mar ldan// rdo rje rin chen legs par rgyan// de
321b2(rgyud): yi dbusu rtag bri ba// dpag med shes rab pha rol phyin// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// sna tshogs las ni 'bar rnams la// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// shes rab pha rol phyin ma bri// shar gyi mdab ma nas
321b3(rgyud): brtsams ste// thog mtha' nyid kyang brtags par bya// phyag rgya'i yi ge ci rigs par// go rims bzhin du rnam par dgod// phyogs cha'i dbye ba tha dad kyis// kha dog dbye ba thams cad du// rnam dbye mchog tu
321b4(rgyud): sna tshogs pa// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de las 'od zer bsam mi khyab// sngo ser la sogs dbye ba yis// shes rab snang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// 'gro ba thams cad gas
321b5(rgyud): bar bya// 'dus par gyur nas de dag kun// lha nyid kyi ni gzu gas ji bzhin// shes rab chen po gzugs chen po// 2bar bcas mdzes pa'i gzi brjid can// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du
321b6(rgyud): ni// sngags kyi dkyil 'khor kun nas rten// sku ni gser gyi mdog dang 'dra// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// rang gi ting nge 'dzin la zhugs// du ma'i gzugs kyi gzugs ldan pa// shes
321b7(rgyud): rab pha rol phyin ma ni// sems can khams ni rnam sbyong mdzad// kun nas sems can rnams kyi yum// sems can kun gyi thams cad du// thams cad lus la mnyam par khyab// sems kyi rgyun bzhin
321b8(rgyud): legs par zhugs// zag pa med cing bsam mi khyab// dri ma med cing ngang gi stong // na mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// thog ma tha ma med cing zhi// chos rnams
322a1(rgyud): kun gyi dbang phyug sku// sdig pa kun las rnam par grol// bden pa gnyis la rnam par gnas// dam pa dang ni dam pa'i don// chos kyi sku ru de bshad do// dbang po kun kyang rnam par
322a2(rgyud): shes// sems can thams cad thams cad du// yid kyi rnam shes zhesu bshad// shes rab blo dang blo gros dran// lhag mthong dang ni ye shes kun// kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang // rtag dang chad pa'i
322a3(rgyud): mtha' dang ldan// mtha' gnyis po ni rnam par spangs// kun rdzob dang ni dam pa'i don// rnam pa gnyisu da rab brtags// ji ltar bud shing la rten nas// ma yi sa bon gnas pa dang // til la
322a4(rgyud): til mar ji bzhin no// bur shing ro bzhin rab tu brtag/ me tog dri ni ji bzhin nam// zho la mar sar ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis ye shes srub// bdud rtsi lta bu'i snying po
322a5(rgyud): 'byung // gtsub shing dang ni gtsub stan la// ji bzhin gtsu bas pas me 'byung ste// de bzhin ye shes rnal 'byor pas// bsrubs pas yongasu brtag par bya// shes bya'i dkyi
322a6(rgyud): 'khor thams cad la// yang nas yang du bsrubs par byed// mun pa thams cad rnams sel ba'o// nyi ma'i 'od zer ji bzhin bdag/ na mkha' dri ma med brten nas// nyi ma zla ba ji bzhin
322a7(rgyud): gnas// 'char ba yi ni gsal byed pa// 'bar ba stong phrag gi ni snod// mun pa kun 'joms skar ma la// kun nas kyang ni mdzes pa yin// rnal 'byor pas ni ji ltar sems// mkha' bzhin
322a8(rgyud): shin tu dri ma med// gzung 'dzin las ni nges par grol// mnyam dang mi mnyam dngos po kun// de nas rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis// ye shes nyi zla mtshungs pa'i 'od// shes rab pha rol phyin bsgoms
322b1(rgyud): / gsang sngags 'dis ni bsam par bya// rang bzhin gyi ni dag pa'i dngos// rang bzhin med par rnam par gnas// rang bzhin gyis ni 'od gsal kun// gdod nas ma skyes rnyog pa med// yig de
322b2(rgyud): nyid de lta bu// gnas dang mi gnas rnam par spangs// sde tshan bzhi pa'i gnyis pa la// thig le sgra yis rnam par brgyan// de nyid bcom ldan mgon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// oM pra
322b3(rgyud): dz+nyA swA hA/ oM shru ti smr-i ti bi dza ye swA hA// sangs rgyas rnams kyi shes rab 'dis// bsam pa thams cad rdzogs par byed// oM yaM 'di ni sangs rgyas kun gyi yum// 'di ni 'khor lo rnam par bsgyur// 'di
322b4(rgyud): ni dngos grub thams cad dang // grub pa nyid ni byed par gnas// bstan bcos rab tu 'chang byed dang // shes bya thams cad khyad pa du// thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos rnams kun// dbang
322b5(rgyud): phyug dam pas shes par 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// // shes rab pa rol phyin gnyis pa// rdzu 'phrul chen po mkha' dang mnyam/ 
322b6(rgyud): gser gyi mdog can 'bar ba can// zla ba'i gdan la legs par bzhugs// brtson 'grus chen po bsam gtan bya// sngags kyi yi ge rnam par brgyan// mchog tu rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis// sangs rgyas
322b7(rgyud): spyan zhes btags pa yi// de yi gsang sngags rab bshad bya// nyon cigs rnams 'dod pa rnams// sngags ni oM ru ru s+phu ru dz+wa la tiSh+Tha sid+d+ha lo tsa ni sarba ar+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA// 'di de mchog tu gsang ba ni/ 
322b8(rgyud): rnal 'byor ma la mchog tu bshad// dbang chen yi ge'i mthar thugs pa// bsgoms pas dge ba rab tu ster// chos kyi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// sems can thams cad dbang du byed// dpung dang bcas pa/ 
323a1(rgyud): / myur bkug ste// bran du gyur nas nye bar gnas// phyag rgya gcig pa'i lha mo che// rol cing g.yo ba'i zhal mnga' ba// sgeg pa la sogs nyams dang ldan// rol cing snang ba'i gar mdzad pa// 
323a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas spyan ni 'grub par 'gyur// mig gi phyag rgya rab tu sbyar// mig gi phyag rgya 'di shin tu// 'jig rten gsum yang gar byed do// sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya'i sgrub pa'i thab so// / chu yi/ 
323a3(rgyud): dkyil 'khor dgyes pa na// bcud kyis lan dang mtshungs pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas rgyas shing yangs pa yi// dri ma med pa'i mkha' la gnas// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus ni// lha mo mchog tu mdzes pa mo// 
323a4(rgyud): 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// grub ma ral pa'i cod pan 'chang // 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad ma// rtag tu na mkha' bzhin du gnas// sngags ni/ oM ka Te bi ka Te ka Te ka Te swA hA// gos
323a5(rgyud): dkar mo yi phyag rgya che// dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// sngags kyi yi ge'i phreng ba che// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// 'gro ba/ mtha' dag snang mdzad na// sgrub pa pos ni bsgrub par bya// dam
323a6(rgyud): pa'i lha mo 'grub par 'gyur// pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i thabs// zhi ba'i ro dang yang dag ldan// zhi ba'i yi ge mnyam par ldan// zhi ba'i mdzad cing 'jig rten gyi// sa gsum sgrub par byed pa'i thab/ 
323a7(rgyud): gos dkar mo'i sgrub pa'i thab so// / sngo bsangs dkar mo sna tshogs gzugs// rnam pa sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa// sgeg pa'i nyams kyis yongs
323a8(rgyud): gang ga/ 'gro ba mtha' dag skyob mdzad pa// thugs rje'i thugs dang ldan pa can// rab tu 'bad de bsgrub par bya// rol pa yi ni yi ges mchod// sngags ni/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu ra swA hA// chos kyi phyag rgya mtha'
323b1(rgyud): yas mchog/ sgrol mas legs par rab tu gnas// gsang chen legs par rab tu gnas// gsang chen bzhin du thams cad la// bcud kyis len dang 'dra ba'i mchog/ kun tu kun che thams cad du// 
323b2(rgyud): dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzad// sgrol ma'i sgrub pa'i thab so// / dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus ni// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen mo mchog/ phyag pa ni spyan ni gsum pa dang // 
323b3(rgyud): pa'i cod pan dag gis gnas// 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog ltar dkar// dpa' ba la sogs nyams kyis brgyan// brtson 'grus chen mo 'jig sel ma// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rab
323b4(rgyud): tu 'bar ba'i ma bzhin du// shin tu gsal ba'i gzi brjidan// hUM gi yi ge zab mo'i sgra// sa gsum po ni 'khrug pa ma dzad// khro gnyer can zhes legs par grags// sngags kyi phreng bas
323b5(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// sngags ni/ oM b+ha ya nA sa ni trA sa ni tA se/ ku Ti tiDA twe ta ri be ra shwe te shwe ta dza Ti ni/ oM Tak+sha hrAMHswA hA// gsang sngags 'di ni brtson 'grus che// gsang sngags su/ 
323b6(rgyud): gyi bdag nyid mchog/ 'gro ba kun kyang 'gugs byed na// gdug pa'i sems lta smos ci dgos// khro gnyer can gyi sgrub pa'i thab so// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rje
323b7(rgyud): rje can// rdo rje'i phreng ba yongasu bskor// gzi brjid dkyil 'khor kun nas dkris// der gnas rtag tu lha mo ni// stobs chen pri yang ku ltar ljang // phyag bzhi par de bsam par bya// rgyan rnams kun
323b8(rgyud): gyis rnam par brgyan// rnal 'byor ma rnams cher zhi ba// dngos grub thams cad rab stsol ma// sngags kyi yig phreng ba che// rdo rje'i dbus song rab tu gnas// khro bo hUM mdzad gang ba'i mtha'// dpa'
324a1(rgyud): ba'i nyams la sogs par ldan// lha mo 'jig rten gsum rmongs byed// dngos grub chen po rab stsol ma// skad cig tsam gyis 'gro ba kun// nges par dbang du byed par 'gyur// rdo rje/ 
324a2(rgyud): rlung gi phreng ba che// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu gnas// 'jigs pa chen po'i ma ltar drag/ snang ba chen mo stobs mo che// pad+ma rA ga'i rnam par 'dra// rdo rje 'bar bas rnam par brgyan// mtshan ni mA ma kaM
324a3(rgyud): zhes bya// lha mo 'jig rten gsum gyis mchod// sngags ni/ oM ku la d+hA tI ye na mAH/ shaM ka re/ shAn+ti ka re/ g+huT+Ta g+hun+da g+hun+d+re ni/ g+hA ta ya g+hu Ta~M ni swAhA/ oM ku lan d+ha ri/ ban d+ha ban d+ha hUM phanags
324a4(rgyud): sngags 'di ni don gyi mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa yin// sa gsum po ni 'gugs byed cing // tshangs pa sogs lha rnams kun// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed la/ 
324a5(rgyud): rang gi dbang du gnas pa'ang yin// mA ma kI'i sgrub pa'i thab/ so// rlung gi dkyil 'khor drag po la// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyis bskor// de yi dbusu snang ba che// zla ba gzugs kyis
324a6(rgyud): rnam par rgyan// des spros pa las bdag nyid ni// rdo rje lu gu rgyud kyi sku// phyag bzhi ma la lha mo de// rdo rje yi ni rgyan gyis brgyan// dmar po 'bar ba de yis ni// sa gsum po ni 'ching bar mdzad// 
324a7(rgyud): tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// bkug nas dbang du mdzod par gnas// dngos grub thams cad 'dzin pa dang // de yi thugs kar rdo rje che// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// de yi 'bar ba
324a8(rgyud): lcags sgrog gi/ rnam pa rdo rje'i mtshan mas mtshan// nges par phyung nas de dag kun// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten khams ni mtha' dag tu// kun nas rnam par bkang
324b1(rgyud): nas kyang // bsgom bya rdo rje thams cad du// khro bo dang ldan spro ba'i zhal// lto ba 'phyang zhing sku che ba// mche ba bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// 'bar ba yi ni phreng ba gsal// gzugs mdzes drag par
324b2(rgyud): gzugs dang ldan// sngags ni/ oM badz+ra shriM kha lA ya d+hi pa ta ye/ ma hA ba lA ya/ ma hA bo d+ha rarA dzA ya te pradz+wA li ta/ has+t+ra ya na mo ni la kAr+dz+dza la ki rA tra ru ba la m+bo da rA ya/ b+h+r-i ku nI mu khA ya/ mA dza
324b3(rgyud): mu khA yA/ tsa tu daSh+Thaka rA yA ya/ e h+ye hi a s+ya sha rI ra/ ma nu pra bi sh+ya/ shaM ra~M gr-ih+Na gr-I ba gr-ih+Na/ hasta pa da gr-ih+NA bi Sha/ A be sha ya/ ka~M ba ya/ ke pa ya/ b+h+ra ma ya b+hU ma yaye/ maN+Dal ma d+h+ye/ 
324b4(rgyud): kurbabi kurba/ tsur+d+ha tsut+ta kun+da kuT+Ta/ s+phoT ya s+pho Ta ya/ mang+ga Ni/ ni kr-in+ta ya/ hr-i da ya/ ts+tshin+da/ bal ba la/ krin+ti rA ya si/ dwe ga nA ga/ yak+Sha/ rak+Sha sa pi shA n+da na sA d+hA ya/ sa mo la
324b5(rgyud): yam nu s+pha ra/ dzA ti ma nu sma ra hA hA/ ni d+hi ni d+hi/ ni shi ni shaM/ badz+ra shre kha lA/ A dz+nyA pa ya ti swA hA/ oM badz+ra re Nin+d+ra/ phaT/ oM badz+ri NihUM phaT/ oM badz+re kA la~M hUM phaT swA hA/ 
324b6(rgyud): gsang sngags 'di yi sbyor ba yis// bcud kyis lan ni bde ba dang // 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs pa dang // gdug pa rnams ni 'ching ba dang // tshangs pa la sogs lce rnams dang // lha dang
324b7(rgyud): lha min lto 'phye che// 'jig rten skyong dang klu rnams kyang // rang gi gnas nas bskyod nas ni// grub pa kun gyi dngos grub ni// dngos grub 'gugs par 'dod pa yis// tham cad gus pas sbyin par
324b8(rgyud): byed// bud med gzugs kyis bsgrub par bya// rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma'i sgrub pa'i thob so// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma dmar po rab tu gnas// phyag bzhi pa la du ma'i gzugs// 
325a1(rgyud): dung dang kun da zla ba 'dra// thugs kyi rdo rje'i de nyid yin// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus ni// zhi ba la sogs nyams dang ldan// chos rnams kun gyi bdag skyes mchog/ rnal
325a2(rgyud): 'byor pas ni rtag tu sgom// sangs rgyas bye ba yang dag 'byung // der bdag yang dag sgom pa ni// bskul byed ma zhes yongasu grags// sngags kyi phreng ba'i yig ldan// kun nas rnam par 'phro
325a3(rgyud): byed pa// na mkha'i khams ni yongs gang ba// ji srid de yi spyod yul yang // de srid de yi 'od zer bsgoms// rnal 'byor ye shes kyis rab sprul// sngags ni/ oM tsa la tsu la tsun+de swA hA// 'di
325a4(rgyud): yi sngags kyi mchog gtso bo// sangs rgyas kun gyis mtsho/ dad pa po// mtshungs pa med pa'i dngos grub ster// lha dadang lha min bcas pas mchod// 'di yi sdig kun mdzad byed cing
325a5(rgyud): phun sum tshogs kun rab stsol mdzad// pad+ma'i phyag rgya yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas nyid kyang ster byed pa'o// bskul byed ma yi sgrub pa'i thab so// gsang ba mchog gi dgyes pa na/ 
325a6(rgyud): thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun bdag dgyes pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba'i mchog/ 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// sangs rgyas
325a7(rgyud): kun dang mnyam sbyor ba// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba'i sdom// 'dod chags med tsang chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma'i rgya// 'di ni gnyis med theg
325a8(rgyud): pa'i mchog/ sgyu ma dag ni thams cad las// bud med sgyu ma khyad par 'phags// nus pa yi ni rang bzhin gyis// rang bzhin nyid kyis de grub bo// 'jig rten gsum gyi bud med 'dis// bskur
325b1(rgyud): bar bya ba 'os pa yin// ngan spyod rnams kyis kyang 'grub ste// snyed pa kun dang bde dang sgo// thams cad bud med snrums 'grub// rang ging ba yongs bsgyur ba// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i phyag rgya 'dis// 
325b2(rgyud): shes rab pha rol phyin mar bshad// kun la sna tshogs phyag rgya ni// kun la sna tshogs sdom pa yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par sbyor// stong pa nyid kyi de nyid bskul// kun la kun nas thams cad du/ 
325b3(rgyud): rnam kun kun tshe rang nyid kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad bstan dang g.yo// thams cad dngos po rang nyid 'gyur// sems dang sems can ting 'dzin dang // byang chub spyod pa sna tshogs nyid// sa
325b4(rgyud): dang pha rol phyin spyod pa// dbang nyid du yang de bshad do// bdud dang bdud las rgyal ba nyid// sangs rgyas rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// thog ma tha ma med zhi ba// byang chub
325b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan de'o// rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// pad+ma de bzhin pad+ma 'dzin// nor bu nor bu 'dzin pa nyid// sna tshogs de bzhin sna tshogs 'dzin// ral gri ral gri 'dzin
325b6(rgyud): rgyal po// 'khor lo de bzhin 'khor lo 'dzin// 'jig rten gsum rgyal nyid dang ni// 'di rnams kyi yang rigs nyid 'gyur// de nyid chags dang tshigs bral ba// 'dod dang thar pa ru yang
325b7(rgyud): 'gyur// dus gsum dang ni srid gsum mchog/ 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// brtan pa thams cad de nyid de// rnam pa sna tshogs nyid du 'gyur// g.yo ba kun nas sna tshogs pa/ 
325b8(rgyud): thams cad du ni de 'gyur ro// de la sogs pa mchog gi mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// na mkha'i khams kyi mthas klas pa// dngos po kun tu de 'gyur ro// de nyid
326a1(rgyud): bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i lha// na mkha' kun gyi skabs na dpal// rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// dpal ldan sgyum chen mo 'chang // 
326a2(rgyud): rnam snang rtag pa thams cad du// rnal 'byor dbang phyug gtso chen khyab// sangs rgyas 'khor lo can mi bskyod// tshe dang rin chen 'byung stobs che// tshe dpag med pa kun nas mchog/ don
326a3(rgyud): yod sna tshogs mdzad pa dang // rdo rje sems dpa' lta na sdug/ dgug pa mchog gi sbyor ba dang // legs par mdzad pa de nyid yin// rin chen sgron ma de bzhin rtog/ rdo rje gzhad pa sra
326a4(rgyud): ba che// rdo rje chos dang rno ba che// sgyu dang sgra mchog bdud rtsi dang / las dang go tshe gnod sbyin che// khu tshur de bzhin pa shegs pa kun// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor 'di/ 
326a5(rgyud): sems dpa' stobs po che// rdo rje hUM mdzad hUM mdzad dang // rta 'a/ na zhes ni rnam par gragaso// he ru ka dpal rdo rje che/ mchog gi dbang phyug gshin rje gshed// khro bo gzugs
326a6(rgyud): ma snang ba che// rdo rje me ni 'od chen po// gzungs rnams kyi ni mchog gcig pu// ting nge 'dzin las dbang sgyur ma// shes rab pha rol phyin mchog gtso// sa dang pha rol phyin pa stobs// tshangs
326a7(rgyud): pa'i gnas pa chen po bzhi// dbang ni mchog tu 'bar ba dang // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi// dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang // rjes dran drug por gyur pa gang // bsgom par bya bar rab
326a8(rgyud): tu gnas// de nyid bcom ldan gcig du nyid// byang chub yan lag bdun btags pa// mtha' gcig yongasu rdzogs par 'gyur// sum cu rtsa gnyis mchog gi mtshan// 'jig rten 'das pa'i las/ 
326b1(rgyud): po che// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad btags pa// stobs bcu yi ni bcu pa nyid// sangs rgyas chos kyi bdag nyid gnas// byang chub phyogs kyi chos chen po// rnam par dbye ba sum cu bdun// 
326b2(rgyud): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms 'jug ni// dgu la gnas par gyur pa dang // bsdu ba'i dngos po chen po bzhis// sems can bsdu bar bsdus pa dang // so so yang dag rig pa bzhi// de bzhin
326b3(rgyud): srung ba mi mnga' ba// skal pa chen po'i mi 'dzags pa// mchog tu gyur pa nyid dang ni// bsam gtan gzugs med bzhi phrag gnyis// tshad med pa yang de bzhin no// byang chub sems kyi spyod pa
326b4(rgyud): gtso// bden pa bzhi ni ston pa po// kun nas nyon mongs rnam paradabyung // zag bcas zag pa med pa'i mchog/ de nyid ba bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// dbang phyug mchog gi dbang phyug
326b5(rgyud): dang // skye dgu'i bdag po skye dgu'i mgon// mchog gi bdag nyid zhe su brjod// kun rdzob brjod pa thams cad dang // sgra rnams kyi ni spyod yul 'gyur// brjod du med cing spros pa
326b6(rgyud): bral// snying po mkhas mnyam mtshungs pa med// tshig mtha' spa yi rnam dgod pa// 'jog rten tha snyad tshul du rtogs// de tshe lus sogs dbye ba yis// sa rnams kyis ni yongasu brtags// sku ni
326b7(rgyud): sprul pa nyid du 'gyur// longs spyod rdzogs pa yang dgra brnyes// rdo rje'i sku dang de bzhin du// ye shes sku sogs yongasu brtags// mtha' yas sku dang sku chen po// rin chen sku ni 'od byed pa// 
326b8(rgyud): pad+ma'i sku ni snang ba che// thams cad sku ni las bzang byed// rtogs par bya ba las kyi sku// rnam pa gsum du'ang dbye bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rnal 'byor te// byang chub sems ni 'dogs pa/ 
327a1(rgyud): kun tu 'od kyis chen po// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gzi brjid ldan// gnyis pa bdud rtsi'i 'od ces bya// zla ba'i 'od ni 'od gsal ba// gsum pa na mkha'i 'od ces bya// mkha'
327a2(rgyud): bzhin legs par rab tu gnas// rdo rje 'od mtha' gang zhig sa// bzhi pa de ni yid 'ong ba// bsam pa brtan pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje zhes ni yongasu bsgrags// lnga pa rin chen 'od ces bya// dngag
327a3(rgyud): bskur bar ni rab tu gnas// drug pa pad+mo 'chang zhes bya// pa bzhin rab tu rnam par snang // rang bzhin gyis ni chos nyid dag/ bdag po med cing yongs bzung med// bdun pa las kyi 'od
327a4(rgyud): ces bya// sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad pa che// brgyad pa du pe med pa zhes bya// dpe ni de la yod ma yin// dgra/ dab pe dang bral zhes bya// dpe rnams thams cad rab 'jug pa/ 
327a5(rgyud): bcu pa shes rab 'od ces bya// sangs rgyas rnams ni bla na/  med// bcu gcig kun mkhyen nyid ces bya// sa chen po ni 'od gsal ba// bcu gnyis so sor bdag rig pa// rna
327a6(rgyud): 'byor ye shes yongs rdzogs nyid// sa chen po ni 'di dag rnams// sangs rgyas rnams kyis don dam du// sangs rgyas dang ni sangs rgyas chos// rnal 'byor ye shes gang brjod pa// thams
327a7(rgyud): cad nyid ni mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje snying po rgyun gyi rgyud chen po las sngags kyi de kho na nyid do// 
327a8(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor ba rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ 
327b1(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos de dag gi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig gi de ma thag nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba
327b2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas// mnyam par gzhag pa de ma thag tu yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs rdo rje la rje su bcug nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
327b3(rgyud): lus dang ngag dang yid mnyam pa nyid du byin gyis brlabs nas rnam par bzhug so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur bdag nyid rtogs nas
327b4(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal de bzhin/ gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes
327b5(rgyud): bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po yod do zhes gsungs nas cang mi gsuM nga bar bzhugs par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzho nur gyur pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis
327b6(rgyud): stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas btud de 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
327b7(rgyud): bstan du gsol/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang du zhugs pas sems can thams cad thabs chung ngus de bzhin
327b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchog gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ba bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byol gyi dbang phyug chen pos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
328a1(rgyud): la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal legs so legs so// 'jam dpal khyod gang slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyangam tshig la rjes su zhugs pa ni
328a2(rgyud): dpal khyod legs so legs so// de legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po bshad par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
328a3(rgyud): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes byin gyi rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig chen po rdo rje byin gyis rlob pa theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya
328a4(rgyud): ba'i dkyil 'khor 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ga/ dam tshi ngag chen po rdo rje mchog/ snying po chen po'i brgyan ces bya// grub bzhi pa
328a5(rgyud): la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni mnyam par ldan// 'od zer 'bar bas 'khrigs pa 'i 'od// rdo rje snying po yongs bskor ba// byang chub shing gis nye bar
328a6(rgyud): mdzes// rdo rje dkyil 'khor grwa rnams dang // sgo dang sgo khyud 'tshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// rdo rje pad+ma thams cad la// las kyi rdo rje thams cad du// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa'i 'od// dril
328a7(rgyud): bcas sna tshogs mchog dang ldan// rgyal mtshan sgreng ba rlung skyod pa'i// gos dang me tog chun pos spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// ral gri rdo rje ut+pal// lcags kyu la sogs sna tshogs brgyan// chu yis
328a8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor yongs bskor ba// khor yug bzhin du rnam par gnas// desa'ang sgo dang sgo khyud sogs// mkhas pa yis ni spro bar bya// de yi nang du bri bar bya// 'khor lo chen po rab tu gnas// cha brgyad kyis ni yongs
328b1(rgyud): su bskor// rdo rje 'khor lo cher 'bar ba// de yi dbus su snying po che// rdo rje'i snying po zhes su bshad// de yi steng du rdo rje che// rdo rje pad+ma rab tu gnas// pad+ma'i steng du rdo rje che// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor dag gis brgyan/ 
328b2(rgyud): dung dang kun zla ba dkar// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdan du bshad// de yi steng du legs bzhugs bya// khyab bdag rnam par snang mdzad che// zla ba'i mdog ldan 'dzum bcas pa// ting 'dzin ldan gnas
328b3(rgyud): sdig pa bcom// rdo rje'i phreng bas rnam par spras// sna tshogs 'bar bas 'khrigs pa'i 'od// rin chen chen po'i phreng ba ches// spras pa rnam par dgod par bya// de sngags rtag tu shes bya ba/ 
328b4(rgyud): yi ge yi ni mchog gtsobo// sha sa'i sde pa gsal byed ni/ mchog gi dbang phyug rgyu gcig po// drug pa'i dbyangs kyi das legs gsal ba// theg le nA das legs par rgyan// rten cing
328b5(rgyud): 'brel 'byung 'khor lo yi// don can rab tu bskyed pa bya// de ni da bcom ldan rnal 'byor can// gcig pu nyid ni lhag pa'i / chos kyi sku ni ye shes che// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug bshad
328b6(rgyud): de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pa dang / ye shes kyi 'od zer dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug gis rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rnam par gnon
328b7(rgyud): pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje nyid du rang gi bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i phyogs thams cad
328b8(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs bzhir 'khod do// dbang chen dkyil 'khor mi bskyod pa/ me yi dkyil 'khor ye shes 'od/ chu yi dkyil 'khor 'od dpag med// rdo rjes rnams gan/ 
329a1(rgyud): rlung dkyil 'khor// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i dam tshig las 'byung ba sems dpa' byin gyis rlob pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
329a2(rgyud): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po rgyan gyi snying
329a3(rgyud): bo' di nyid kyi thugs ka nas phyung ba'o// oM badz+ra sa twa/ de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje'i 'od zer rnams byung
329a4(rgyud): rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang byas te gsal bar gyur nas/ de nas rdo rje'i 'od zer de rnams kyis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra rab
329a5(rgyud): dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skus 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su gshegs nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ sems
329a6(rgyud): can thams cad kyi don bya bar mngon par rdzogs nas slar yang gcig tu 'dus te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po
329a7(rgyud): rdo rje snying po'i thugs kar gnas te ched du brjod pa 'dis ched du brjod pa// e ma'o rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// snying po ye
329a8(rgyud): shes rnam dag pa// rdo rje dpa' sems dpa' nyid gyur nas// byang chub sems dpa' brtan bskyed de// sangs rgyas ye shes bla na med// gang zhig brtan phyir lus min yang // 
329b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas sku nyid du gyur to// de nas rdo rje'i sku byang chub sems dpa' chen po bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas 'thon te/ bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i nye 'khor thams cad rnam pa bzhis bya ste/ 
329b2(rgyud): dkar po ser po/ dmar po ljang ku'i mdog tu mngon par sprul nas rang gi sngags kyi yi ges zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rten te gnas par gyur to// dgug pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra
329b3(rgyud): rA dzaHrjes su chags pa'i 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rA ga de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs par mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra sA d+hu/ de bzhin du rin chen 'byung ldan gyi
329b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor la dbang skur ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rat+na/ nyi ma dkyil 'khor gyi ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra te dza/ de bzhin gags pa thams cad kyi na mkha' mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra ke
329b5(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bzhad pa chen po'i ting nge 'dzi/ na ni/ oM badz+ra ha sa/ de bzhin du 'od dpag tu med pa'i/ dkyil 'khor yang thugs rje'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra d+harma
329b6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra tIk+Sha/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra he tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' smra ba'i ting nge 'dzin
329b7(rgyud): ni oM badz+ra b+hA Sha/ de bzhin du rdo rje don yod pa'i dkyil 'khor la/ las sna tshogs pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra karma/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ting 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra rak+Sha/ de bzhin
329b8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs khu chur bcings pa'i ting 'dzin ni// oM badz+ra san+d+hi de nas bcom ldan
330a1(rgyud): 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
330a2(rgyud): zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas 'di phyung ngo // oM badz+ra d+hA tu hUM/ rang gi rig pa mchog ni/ oM badz+ra dA tI shwa ri hU~M badz+ri Ni/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin gshegs
330a3(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa'i dam tshig ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di
330a4(rgyud): phyung ba oM ak+Sho b+h+ya oM oM dz+nyA na muSh+NI tsit+ta badz+re d+hi Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig
330a5(rgyud): gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM
330a6(rgyud): rat+na saM b+ha ba tAM/ oM badz+ra dz+nyA na gar+b+ha ti hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag tu med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor
330a7(rgyud): byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas nyid kyi thugs ka nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa oM a mi tA b+ha hrIHoM badz+ra d+ha ri Ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin
330a8(rgyud): gshegs pa rnam par gnon pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs
330b1(rgyud): nas rang gi rig pa mchog 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM a mo g+ha sid+d+hi a oM badz+ra ma hA pa le n+tu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa/ 
330b2(rgyud): thams cad kyi yul la rnam par gzigs shing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid rnam par spros pa'i snying po 'di bka' stsal pa oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra hUM/ de
330b3(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di dag bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong bar gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin
330b4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i bdag nyid rtogs nas rdo rje mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po bka' stsal pa/ oM badz+ras ma tA dz+nyA na bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di bshad pa tsam gyis de bzhin
330b5(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad snying po rnams phyag na rdo rjer mthong ba gyur to// de nas phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kha nas chos tha mas cad mnyam pa nyid spros pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM sa
330b6(rgyud): d+harma sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra / de nas 'di rnam par phyung ba tsam gyis kyang / slar yang phyag na rdo rje'i thugs kar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dkyil 'khor thams cad byin gyis brlabs
330b7(rgyud): ba mdzad nas dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'khod pa mthong ngo // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid s+ho/ 
330b8(rgyud): pa'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // oM sarba sa twa sa ma tA pra pany+tsa bud+d+ha hUM/ de nas 'di phyung ba tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kha nas phyag na rdo rje rnam par phyung te/ slar
331a1(rgyud): yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar gnas nas bka' dod cing 'khod do// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs bkun// bdag gis ji ltar sgrub par bgyi// de bzhin
331a2(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rnams la byin gyis brlabs par byos shig/ de de bzhin no// zhes gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das
331a3(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs te brtan par gyur nas/ rdo rje sgeg mo la sogs pa'i lha rnams phyung ste/ lha mo
331a4(rgyud): de rnams dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi grwa rnamasu de bzhin du rnam par gnas so// sgo rnams su sgo skyong ma rnams dang dmatshams rnams su gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg
331a5(rgyud): rnams bshad do// de dag gi sngags su gyur pa ni/ oM badz+ra/ meg+ne mA~M/ 'khor lo'i 'tshams su gzhag par bya'o// oM swA ha badz+ri Niti/ oM sha rang badz+ra a a~M/ oM badz+ri Ni kI li
331a6(rgyud): oM hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa chen po'i mchod pa/ phyi'i dkyil 'khor gA dang / mtshams rnams su dri rdo rje la sogs pa'i lha mo rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nye bar gnas
331a7(rgyud): par dgod par bya'o// oM badz+ra gan+d+he hUM/ oM ma d+hu badzi// g+hu g+h+ra/ oM mno b+ha ba 'dzi Ni n+d+ra Ni/ oM badz+ra she shi ra tsi \u0f7f/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rol pa chen po'i lha ma sgo'i 'tshams rnams
331a8(rgyud): gzugs la sogs pa'i/ e badzu d+hag/ oM bacha shar+tha/ oM badz+ra sa/ oM 'jas naM/ mnyes par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shin tu dga' ba rdo rje gang ba ni/ oM sa mam
331b1(rgyud): hoHsu ra ta s+t+waM/ dga' bde chen po'i rdo rje snying po 'dis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun nas mnyes pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la brtan par gyur nas/ dngos grub thams cad stsol bar mdzod// 
331b2(rgyud): dgug dang legs par rab gnas dang // ji bzhin gnas su sbyar ba nyid// kun nas dgyes mdzad sangs rgyas kun// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin dge/ sngags kyi tshig rnams kyang / oM e h+ye hi b+ha wan
331b3(rgyud): badz+ra a~M ku sha dza/ oM pra be sha ya hUM/ sarba ta thA ga ta/ oM sa ma ye ban+d+ha tiSh+Tha b+ha ga wan/ 'di dag ni dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi sgo'i phrin las so// de lta bu'i dkyil 'khor 'dri ba la/ byams
331b4(rgyud): pa dang / 'jam dpal dang / kun tu bzang po dang / s+yA na ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i// byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams dgod par bya'o// sngon du bshad
331b5(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi chos/ slob ma bcug ste/ dang bskur ba la sogs pa byas nas slob ma dang ba ces pas thabs cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
331b6(rgyud): bar 'kho ba thams cad kyis mchod par bya'o// de la dang po kho nar re shig dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi slob dpon ni dam tshig thams cad shes pa bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
331b7(rgyud): chen pos dngos grub thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa dbang bskur ba thams cad thob pa rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug lta bu thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs/ 
331b8(rgyud): pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgyal bslab par bya'o// de nas 'dir dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings par gyur pa ni/ skyil krungs bcings nas dril sogs pa rnams kyis lag pa pa gnyis
332a1(rgyud): byugs nas phyag rgyabacings parab tu bsdu par bya'o// lag pa gnyis rdo rje bsdams pabyas te/ sor mo pan tshun bcings nas snrel krung gi dbus su rdo bsdams pa nag/ 
332a2(rgyud): pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa ni gar gyi tshogs kyi sbyor bas so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid rked pa'i phyogs su bzung ba ni rdo rje sems
332a3(rgyud): dpa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa las mdzub mo lcags kyu ltar bzung ban rdo rje rgyal po'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid mnga' 'phen pa lta bu'i sbyor ba ni rdo rje mda'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid la legs so/ 
332a4(rgyud): sbyin pas// rgyab tu 'jog pa ni rdo rje legs pa'i'o// byang chub kyi sems kyi phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje bsdams dpa de nyid dpral bar 'jog pa ni/ rdo rje rin tshan gyi phyag
332a5(rgyud): rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis sbyor ba ni rdo rje nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa spyi bor sbyar ba ni tog gi phyag rgya'o// kha thad du
332a6(rgyud): bskor ba ni rdo rje bzhad pa'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid khar byas pa ni rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar byas pa ni rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid 'khor lo ltar yongs su bskon
332a7(rgyud): ba ni rdo rje rgyu'i phyag rgya'o// de nyid snying khar sgreng ba ni rdo rje smra ba'i phyag rgya'o// chos kyi phyag rgya rnams so// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid gar nyid du ston pa ni las sna tshogs pa'i phyag rgya'o// lag
332a8(rgyud): pa gnyis spyi bo dang snying ka dang mgrin par 'jog pa ni rdo rje srung ba'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa la 'gram pa gnyis su 'jog pa ni rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi phyag rgya'o// rdo rje bsdams pa de nyid snying khar
332b1(rgyud): btsir ba ni/ rdo rje khu tshur gyi phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du skem mo dang / bdug pa ma la sogs pa'i sbyor bas lha mo thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad la rab tu sbyar bar bya'o// rol cing nam 'khor dgod pa
332b2(rgyud): dang sgeg dang snying rje'i bdag nyid dang // dpa' dang khro sogs chos bdag nyid// rang nyid zhi ba'i bdag nyid nyams// phyag rgya thams cad rab tshogs pa// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// rang nyid de// 
332b3(rgyud): rje'i gar byed dam// skyob pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// phyag rgya bcing ba rab tu sbyar// thams cad grub par 'dod sogs kyis// skyil krungs sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// de phyir
332b4(rgyud): gnyis med rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi drang po'i sku/ sgeg pa'i sbyor bas rdo rje can// sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni dba'i spyan// snyems ma rdo rje can gyis dgongs// sangs rgyas
332b5(rgyud): rnams dang rdo rje can// ting 'dzin dbye ba las shes bya/ 'khrugs pa'i lta stangs khro rnams kyis// btsun mo rnams kyis rol pa nyid// 'jig rten pa yi lha rnams dang / 
332b6(rgyud): sdig spyod rnams kyi lta stangs steng // chos rnams kun gyi rjes 'jug pa'i// shugs kyi lta stangs phyag rgya'o// tshegs dang po nya pho nya mo'i// lta stangs rnam pa sna tshogs nyid// chu'i phyag rgya
332b7(rgyud): yongs ldan pa// g.yo ba med cing mi 'gul ba// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// 'tshams sbyor cung zad yang dag ldan// rnam 'gyur med cing
332b8(rgyud): mtshungs med gnas// rol pa'i yig ge yang dag ldan// mchu yi phyag rgya rdo rje can// rnam 'gyur can dang 'khor ba can// khro bas so ni yongs su bsdam// 'di ni khro ba'i phyag rgyar bshad// 
333a1(rgyud): yi phyag rgya gzugs mdzes can// 'jig rten pa rnams mchu'i phyag rgya// rnam 'gyur 'jig cing gzugs dang bral// shin tu gnag dka' 'dod chags dang / 
333a2(rgyud): sdang dang rmongs las thams cad du// rol cing rnam 'khor dang ldan pa// g.yo bcas rab tu 'phro ba yang // mchu yi phyag rgyar shes par bya// lha mo pho nya'i tshogs kyi yang // de la sogs pa mtha' yas
333a3(rgyud): mchog/ lta stangs mchu la sogs pa'i ming // phyag rgya thams cad mdor bsdus pa// skyob pa rnams kyi kun shes bya// ji srid sku yi dbye ba dang // dbang po la sogs rab bye dang // de dag phyag rgya
333a4(rgyud): mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas kun gyis brtags pa nyid// sna tshogs sku ni gzi brjid che// tshad med yon tan 'byung dba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rnams kyi phyag rgya mchog/ sangs
333a5(rgyud): rgyas byang chub rab sbyin byed// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po/ las dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid gsang ba zhes bya ba'i/ dkyil 'khor chen po yongs su rdzog so// 
333a6(rgyud): de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid mngon par dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bka' stsal pa/ de nas dkyil
333a7(rgyud): 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// sna tshogs khams ni bsam yas mchog/ dar dang me tog chun pos brgyan// 
333a8(rgyud): rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// sna tshogs pad+mo de bzhin gzhan// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas sku gzugs yi 'ong ba// mgon po sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// 'bar ba mchog gis brgyan
333b1(rgyud): pa po// de sngags rtags su shes bya ba// dang po'i dbyangs dang gnyis pa'o// de yi nye 'khor thams cad du// 'khor lo can brgyad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yis dbus su ni// 'khor lo kun tu 'bar
333b2(rgyud): ba bzhag/ 'khor lo'i lte ba'i dbus su ni// pad+ma'i rgyal po rab tu gnas// sgeg sogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni// ci ltar sngon bzhin bri bar bya// nye bar mkho ba'i mchod kun gyis// 
333b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa mchod par bya// dgug sogs cho ga'i sbyor ba ni// dkyil 'khor snga ma ji bzhin no// dkyil 'khor nye bar spyod pa kun// cho ga 'dir ni 'byung bar 'gyur// dkyil
333b4(rgyud): 'khor chen po'i rtog pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor chen pomachog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// 'jigan gsum las rnam rgyal zhes// bya ba rdo rje hUM mdzad grags/ 
333b5(rgyud): grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi nang du 'khor lo no// dkyil 'khor brgyad lta bu'o// de yi dbus su khro ba che// 'jig rten gsum la
333b6(rgyud): rnam rgyal yang // khro gnyer ldan zhing smin ma 'khyog/ spyan gsal 'bar ba chen po pa// cung zad mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal// rnam par dgod cing slar khro ba// g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis ni// 
333b7(rgyud): dka' bzlog dbang phyug chen po gnon// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la spyan gsum pa// zhal bzhi pa la thub par dka'// be con dang
333b8(rgyud): zhags par brjod// dang ponan rdo rje ba shad// gnyis bzhags pa bsngags mdzub can// phyag gnyis khu chur dam pa mchog/ khu chur gnyis ni rab tu brtag/ ma'i chung gnyis ni mnyam skyor ba
334a1(rgyud): lu gu rgyud kyis rnam par spel// snying kar phyag rgya legs banag nas// bsdigs mdzub gnyis kyis bsdigs par mdzad// 'jig rten gsum rgyal zhes bya ba'i// phyag rgya
334a2(rgyud): mchog tu thub par dkar// sngags ni ming gi de nyid ldan// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mnyam par 'khrigs// dkyil 'khor de yi gnas rnams su// cha rnams kun tu thams cad nas// phyag rgya thams cad
334a3(rgyud): mnyam par bri// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyam gnas par// ral gri 'khor lo gzhu dang mda'// de bzhin du ni dgra sta nyid// de la sogs pa'i mtha' yas mchog/ mdor bsdus nas ni phyag rgya dgo
334a4(rgyud): de ltar khro bo'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par bkod nas nye bar 'kho ba'i mchod pa bya'o// 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen
334a5(rgyud): po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes su ba/ shad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// dar dang me tog chun pos
334a6(rgyud): rgyan// de dbus dkyil 'khor chen po ni// chu zhes bya ba'i ming can no// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa yi'o ngab// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba
334a7(rgyud): zla ba'i 'od can zla ba'i mdog/ ral pa'i cod pan 'dzin pa can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas spras// sku rnams
334a8(rgyud): thams cad kun nas spro// mtha' yas rab 'byam rgya che ba'i// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam la// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// shaSha'i sde yi mthar dge ba// k+Sha yig don ldan/ 
334b1(rgyud): sngon byung ba// rgyu yi don durabasgrub byed// bani pa'i dbyangs kyis spyi bor mnan// me yis sa bon gsal bar byed// thig le sgra ni mchog tu sbyin// 'jig rten dbang phyug nas bya'i mtshan// de yi phyag tu
334b2(rgyud): yang dag bshad// pad+mo'i thal mo rab tu brkyang // bris pa'i phyag rgyar yang dag bshad// dbyug gu ril ba spyi blugs bri// mdun du bgrang phreng pad+ma yi// rgyal po zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhag/ de la
334b3(rgyud): sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ phyag rgya mchog tu 'bar de dag/ 'gro ba 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ji ltar rigs par dgod par bya// 'gro ba 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal pon
334b4(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po'i mchog/ gzhan ni rab tu bshadapar bya// dpa' bo rin chen snying po yi// rdo rje da rin chen zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa/ 
334b5(rgyud): rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// de yi dbus su rin chen che// yan lag brgyad pa mchog tu 'bar// de dbus rin chen pad+ma ni// rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes// 
334b6(rgyud): de dbus pad+ma rA ga 'dra// rin chen rdo rje cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// rin chen phreng bas rnam par mdzes// mdun gyi kun gyi dbang bskur gtso// rin chen de yi
334b7(rgyud): gtso bo mchog/ g.yas su pad+ma rA ga ste// rgyab du in+d+ra ni la'o// yid bzhin nor bu rin chen g.yon// phyag rgya rnam pa sna tshogs mchog/ sna tshogs rin chen rnam par rgyan/ 
334b8(rgyud): dkyil 'khor kun gyi grwa yi ni// gnas rnams su ni bzhag par bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyi// de yi sngags su yongs grags pa// bzhi pa'i sde yi dang po gang // me
335a1(rgyud): yis thon gyis gas 'byas// dbyangs kyi shes pas kun nas mnan// dbang bskur bani steng du gnas// de sa phyag rgya yang dag pashad// don can gyim pa rgyab bcwa
335a2(rgyud): te/ rin chen rnam pa legs byung ba// de ni rdo rje rin chen no// rdo rje rin po che'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba/ 
335a3(rgyud): grubazhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rdo rje phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su zhal bzhi pa'i// 'khor lo bzhin du
335a4(rgyud): yongs bskor ba'o// de yi dbus su bang chen po// kha dog sna tshogs yongs 'bar ba// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje sna tshogs yongs su bri// rdo rje khu chu
335a5(rgyud): 'dzin mdzes pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che// sangs rgyas phreng bas rna ma par mdzes// de yi sngags ni yang dag bshad// @#
335a6(rgyud): gnyis pa yi dbyangs kyi mtha'// mya ngan 'das don legs gsal byas// sgeg sogs rig ma thams cad kyis// de bzhin rang gi phyag rgya yis// rdo rje'i thig le yongs su ldan// sna
335a7(rgyud): tshogs bkra ba mchog tu 'bar// de yi dbang bskur phyag rgya yis// mchod pa kun gyis thams cad nas// kun nas yongs su bskor ba yis// las kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// las
335a8(rgyud): kyi dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// shes rab ye shes kyi 'khor lo// sngags kyi yigs rnam
335b1(rgyud): bar rgyan// de yi dbus su pad chen po// 'dab ma brgyad pa shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// gzhon nu sna tshogs gzugs ldan pa// sku mdog dmar zhing 'dzum bcas pa// sna tshogs/ 
335b2(rgyud): gzugs can ral gri can// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// ral gri'i phreng bas rnam par rgyan// gsang sngags chen po yig lnga// de yi drung du legs par gnas// dbyangs kyi bcu gnyis
335b3(rgyud): gsang sngags ni// thugs ka ru ni yang dag gnas// phyi rol nyid ni gru bzhi mdzes// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// rta babs bzhi dang mnyam par sbyor// sgo bzhi yis ni shin tu
335b4(rgyud): mdzes// shes rab pha rol phyin pa nyid// de la/ dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sngon du bshad
335b5(rgyud): pa'i cho ga yis// mchod sogs cho ga rgyas pa nyid// bzhugs pa'i cho ga de bzhin du// ji ltar dkyil 'khor 'a ra mthong bzhin// shes rab ye shes dkyil 'khor
335b6(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad ba pa// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang
335b7(rgyud): dag ldan// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// de yi nang du bri bya ba// chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med// rten cing 'brel 'byung phreng ba ni// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo/ 
335b8(rgyud): dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje'i rgyu ni stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// kha dog nag po gzi brjid che// chos kyi 'khor lo rab
