336a1(rgyud): bskor mdzad// de yi sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// rgyu yi don du so sor bskyed// dbyangs drug dang ni yang dag ldan// thig le phyi mos rnam par brgyan// rang gi yi ge phreng ba che// 
336a2(rgyud): 'khor lo gnyis kyis rnam par brgyan// de yi mdun du dung yin la// rgyab tu zhags par brjod par bya// rdo rje'i thal mo phyag rgya che// 'khor lo bzhin du rab tu gnas// mchod pa thams
336a3(rgyud): cad rab tu brtag/ ji ltar dkyil 'khor snga ma bzhin// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// chos kyi dkyil 'khor bla na med// thog mar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// dngos grub thams cad
336a4(rgyud): yang dga' bar// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ro// / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// thog ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor
336a5(rgyud): ba yis// dkyil 'khor kun gyi thig gdab bo// de yi dkyil du snang ba che// mkha' bzhin shin tu 'o/ gsal ba// sems dpa' chen po mkha'i mdzod// dam pa'i
336a6(rgyud): rgyal po rab tu bzhugs// zla ba'i mdog can gzi brjid che// sna tshogs mtshon cha 'dzin pa'i mchog/ gzhon nus rab tu brjod pa'i zhal// nam mkha'i mdzod ces rab tu grags// 
336a7(rgyud): sangs rgyas phreng ba sogs pas sbas// rdo rje dkyil 'khor rgyan par mdzad// 'di yi gsang sngags gzi brjod che// dbangs dgu pa la thig le dang // nAd yis ni rnam par rgyan// 
336a8(rgyud): sde chen dang po'i gsum pa la// thig le na ngas rnam par brgyan// de yang gtso bo ri gsang sngags 'gyur// nam ma pa'i mdzod ni rab bskor mdzad// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas
336b1(rgyud): sngags kyi phreng ba mchog ldan pa// ma lus pa yis rnams kun// thams cad nas ni namakha'i tshul// rtog ni phyag rgya gyur pa de'i// de bzhin du ni nges par bcing // de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas
336b2(rgyud): ni nam mkha' yi ni mdzod de la// gal te bdag ni grub 'dod na// mchod pa kun gyis rnam par mchod// nam mkha'i mdzod kyi dkyil 'khor ro// / 
336b3(rgyud): nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad thig gdab bo// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// 
336b4(rgyud): khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// der yang rdo rje ma yi ma chog/ dkyil 'khor gyi ni mchog tu 'dod// de yid bus su gzi brjid che// rdo rje gnod sbyin bla na med// phyag bzhi
336b5(rgyud): ba la zhal bzhi pa// pad+ma'i rgyal po la rab gnas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i lus// bdudarnams thams cad rab 'joms mdzad// de sngags yi ger
336b6(rgyud): gyur pa ni// shaSha'i sde tshan mthar dge ba// rgyu yi don tu legs gsal bya// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor chen po bskor// sngags kyi yi ge phreng ba che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya/ 
336b7(rgyud): de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje'i gnod sbyin de yis ni// gal te grub pa mchog 'dod na// sgyu ma thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'o// 
336b8(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su 'khor lo tshe// lcags kyu yis ni rnam par
337a1(rgyud): mdzes// dbus su bcom ldan rdo rje rgyal// lcags kyu la ni rab tu bzhugs// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyun rnams thams cad rab tu 'bar// rdo rje lcags kyu wa/ 
337a2(rgyud): tshur che// 'bar ba 'phro bas rnam par brgyan// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs par mdzad// sngags kyi yi ges legs par sbyar// sha Sha'i sde yi drung gnas pa// byed pa'i rgyu ru legs par
337a3(rgyud): gnas// dbyangs drug pa yis legs par phye// zla phyed thig les legs par brgyan// lcags kyu'i phyag rgya legs par sbyar// 'gugs par byed la don yod pa'o// 
337a4(rgyud): de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu mchog/ tu dge/ dgugs pa la sogs thams cad la/ 'gro ba 'dul ba yongs su bsdu// don yod rgyal po'i dkyil
337a5(rgyud): 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ ya nga dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang
337a6(rgyud): dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i rnam pa can// de yi dbus su gru gsum grags// lcags kyu
337a7(rgyud): mchog tu dge ba'o// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rdo rje rgyal po stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// gzi brjid chen po dkar
337a8(rgyud): dang dmar// zhags pa lcags kyu 'dzin dge ba// de yi gsang sngags yang dag bshad// don yod 'bras bu stsol pa po// sde tshan gnyis pa'i gsum pa ni// nyis 'gyur nyid du
337b1(rgyud): rnam par gnas// de yi thig la mya ngan 'das// sngags kyi phreng ba gzhan gyis bskor// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// 'bad pa yis ni bri bar bya// sgo skyong ba dang mchod pa yang // sbyor ba ji bzhin
337b2(rgyud): rnam par dgod// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad yongs su sgrub// rdo rje rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad
337b3(rgyud): bya ba sangs rgyas dpa' thams cad kyi// rdo rje chags pa zhes su bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// chags
337b4(rgyud): pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// thams cad dmar pos rab dregs pa// dbang du byed pa'i dam pa yin// de yid bu sa su pad chen po// mdab ma brgyad pa ge sar bcas// 
337b5(rgyud): de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// rdo rje chags pa bri bar bya// pad+ma rA ga mtshungs pa'i 'od// phyag bzhi pa la zhal ba/ zhi ba// spyan gsum 'od kyi phreng ba can// de yi phyag rgya
337b6(rgyud): mchog tu na// mdzes pa yi ni mda' gzhur 'gyur// rgyan rnams kun gyis mdzes pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun la ches mchog gyur// de yi gsang sngags mdzes gyur pa// rdo rje rjes chags
337b7(rgyud): mchog gi bde// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gyur pa// klu yi yi ge'i sngon du gnas// dbyangs dgu pa dang yang dag ldan// sngags kyi phreng bas yang dag brgyan// me tog mda' ni yongs su
337b8(rgyud): 'phen// re ba thams cad yongs rdzogs mdzad// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod byed// rdo rje chags pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor
338a1(rgyud): chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje lags pa zhes grags pa// gnyis su med pa'i dga' ba'ang 'phel// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni
338a2(rgyud): mdzes par byas// de yi dbus su cher mdzes pa'i// dkyil 'khor dam pa gru bzhi pa// de yis dbus su pad chen po// ze 'bru yis ni nye bar mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// zla ba'i
338a3(rgyud): gzugs brnyan yang dag 'bar// der gnas dpa' bo bsam par bya// rdo rje legs pa stobs po che// dung dang kund zla ba dkar// kha ba bzho'i 'od ltar mdzes// legs so stsol ba tshim
338a4(rgyud): par mdzad// ting nge 'dzin dbang mang po bsgyur// rdo rje sgeg mo sogs mchod pa// de bzhin me tog bdug pa sogs/ sgo yi skyong ba nyid kyang ni// rab tu 'bad de bri bar bya// de yi
338a5(rgyud): sngags gyur mdzes pa ni// gsang ba chen po mchog tu 'ab/ ra// ha yi yig ge sngon gang de// sems can don ni/ rab sgrub byed// thig la gnyis dang yongs su ldan// legs
338a6(rgyud): stsol bas ni rnam par gnas// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab tu bskor// bdag nyid dge pas bzhugs pa sogs// thams cad yongs su spyad par
338a7(rgyud): bya// rdo rje legs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje gzi brjid zhes su grags// rdo rje nyi mas blo gros ldan/ 
338a8(rgyud): gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor dam pa bri bar bya// de yi nang du bri byab// rdo rje nyi ma 'od chen po// rdo rje nyi ma
338b1(rgyud): steng du ni// grub sum rnam pa las byung ba// de yi dbus su gzi brjid che// 'bar ba yi ni me lta bu// pad+ma chen po mad ba brgyad pa// ze 'bru yis ni shin tu mdzes// de yi lte ba'i dkyil du ni// rdo rje gzi
338b2(rgyud): brjid stobs po che// bzang po'i mtshal dang mtshungs pa'i 'od// rgya skyegs khu ba mtshungs pa'i mdog/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// de yi sngags su yongs/ 
338b3(rgyud): grags pa// kun nas sangs rgyas mtshungs pa'o// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa yi mtha'// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sngags kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor// rang gi phyag rgya'i/ 
338b4(rgyud): mtshan ma ldan// de ltar dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje gzi badz+ra dad dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog
338b5(rgyud): yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ming // bdag nyid chen po rdo rje'i tog/ grub ni pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas/ 
338b6(rgyud): thig pazhi dang ni yang dag ldan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// mchog tu 'bar ba yi ni rlung // zlab phyed pa'i rnam pa 'dra// rin chen rgyal mtshan
338b7(rgyud): yongs sgreng ba// de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'o// zhal bzhi pa la gzi brjid che// in+d+ra ni la mtshungs pa'i 'od// rin tshan char pa rab tu 'bebs/ 
338b8(rgyud): phyag bzhi pa la snang ba che// de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sde tshan bzhi pa'i dang po la// me yis rab tu gsal byas pa// tog gi phyag rgya yongs su bskor// sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan/ 
339a1(rgyud): de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje tog gi dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya
339a2(rgyud): ba rdo rje bzhad pa zhes grags pa// rdo rje bzhad pa mtshungs pa'i 'od// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po bri bar
339a3(rgyud): byas dkyil 'khor de dbus zlum po ni// in+d+ra nI la mtshungs pa'i 'od// de bzhin chu ni gzi brjid can// phyag rgya 'khor los rnam par mdzes// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// ston ka'i zla
339a4(rgyud): ba 'dra ba'i 'od// 'gro ba mtha' dag snang mdzad pa//  rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa po// phyag bzhi pa la zhal/ de bzhi pa// dbang phyug thams cad yang dag ldan// de yi gsang
339a5(rgyud): sngags sngags chen po// rgyu yi don du grub par bya// stong pa mngon brjod bsam mi khyab// rang ming rtogs pas mtshan pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// 
339a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya// rdo rje bzhad pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa
339a7(rgyud): rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par byas// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dngos grub dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// de yi steng du'ang pad+ma che// pad+ma me las yang dag byung // gru gsum
339a8(rgyud): mchog tu mdzes pa po// sum mdo'i ris kyi rnam par brgyan// chos dbyings yi ge'i de kho na// thams cad gzi brjid bdag nyid dge/ de yi bdag gi de nyid ni// 'phro ba'i
339b1(rgyud): ma ra ka ta 'dra// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis rgyan pa po// gnyis pa'i mdog tu gyur pa ni// pad+ma rag mtshungs pa'i 'od// ji srid dag gi 'khor lo ni// smra ba'i dbyebs
339b2(rgyud): rab tu gnas// thams cad so sor gsal bar byed/ sprin gyi dkyil 'khor mchog rmad byung // de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod bya/ 
339b3(rgyud): rdo rje smra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// dkyil 'khor snga ma'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// 
339b4(rgyud): de yi dbus su go che che// rin chen kun gyis rnam par brgyan// de yi dbus su brtson chen po// rdo rje srung ba yang dgadabri// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis
339b5(rgyud): brgyan pa'o// kha dog sna tshogs gzi brjid che/ thams cad srung ba mchog tu dge/ phyag rgya sngags da nga yang dag ldan// gsang ba chen po'i go 'phang mchog/ 
339b6(rgyud): de yi gsang sngags gzi brjid che// sha Sha'i sde yi mthar gnas mchog/ mgon po'i rgyur ni mngon par brjod// steng du nA ngas brgyan par bya// kun nas kha dog du ma yis// 
339b7(rgyud): yongasu bskor bar bsgom par bya// sngags kyi phreng bas rnam par brgyan// de lta'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// mchod pa thams cad rab bsgrub bya// rdo rje srung ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// 
339b8(rgyud): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mchog/ yang dag rab tu bshad bya ba// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes par bya// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// khu tshur
340a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor bribar ga/ dkyil 'khor de sa dbus su ni// rdo pa d+ma ya 'ongag/ gzi brjid chen po gas gyi mdog/ mdangam brgyad pa yid 'ong ba// do ma steng drug pa brjid/ 
340a2(rgyud): rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan pa po// kun dung dang zla ba dkar// khu tshur de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung dang / 
340a3(rgyud): thugs khu tshur/ rdo rje nyid du mnyam nyid mchog/ gnyis su med pa mchog gsang ba// khu tshur gyis ni sdud par bshad// de sngags mchog tu dga' ba ni// brjod du med nyid rtsol
340a4(rgyud): mdzad pa// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa ni// 'bar ba'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor can// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rdo rje'i sku// 'di yi sngags la rnam par gnas// de lta'i dkyil 'khor
340a5(rgyud): bris nas ni// rdo rje khu tshur mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gyi dkyil 'khor ro// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'bar ba ni/ 
340a6(rgyud): chos kyi dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub stsol bar mdzad// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// 'jig rten pa yi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de bzhin gru bzhi bris nas ni// sgo
340a7(rgyud): khyud la sogs rnam pa spangs// rtse gsum paT+Ti sa dang ni// dung dang pad+ma sogs pas brgyan// thog mar dbang phyug chen po dgod// rtse gsum pa yi phyag rgyar ldan// khyu mchog la zhon
340a8(rgyud): mig gsum pa// stag gi lpags gyon phyag bzhi pa// thal bas byugs shing mgo bo la// ral pa'i tshogs ni rab 'phyang ba// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
340b1(rgyud): cad la// phyag 'tshal ba ni 'di bya'o// de yi sngags ni oM rjes su thu Ta// gas sngags 'din che ra gsang ba// bdag nyid chen po dbang phyug tse'i// dbang phyug chen po'i dkyil 'khor ro// dkyil 'khor
340b2(rgyud): chen po de nyid la dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su nag po chen po bzhag par bya'o// lag pa stong gis gar byed pa dang ldan pa'i dga' byed dbang phyug dang lhan cig phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum pa'o// 
340b3(rgyud): lag pa stong gis gnas pa'o// rang gi sngags ni/ oM ma hA ka la hUM b+h+yaHoM nan di kaM sho ra hU~M b+h+yo// 'di bzlas na dngos grub thams cad byed do// dga' byed dbang phyug dang nag po chen
340b4(rgyud): po 'dakyil 'khor ro// de nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// dkyil 'kho/ dgru bzhi thig gdab bya// der ni pad+ma yang dag bri/ pad+ma'i dbus su sbrang rtsir byed// la sogs mang po gsum bri'o// 
340b5(rgyud): gzhu ye phyag rgya yongasu 'dzin// skad phyir byed dang rgyal bar // de bzhin nyid du'ang sbub byed do// me tog mad dang yongs su ldan// rang gi mi gtogs mtshan ma can/ 
340b6(rgyud): sngags ni/ ma d+hu kr-ings/ oM swA/ d+ha nas/ gsang sngags 'di ni 'ad gzugs cani// dbang du byed pa thams cad sgrub// snang rtsi rdo rje la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor// dkyil lakham
340b7(rgyud): gru bzhi pa bris nas dbus su thig bzhi gdab po// dbus su t+yem pu ru ro shar gyi mdab mar rgyal ba'o// lho ru rnam par rgyal ba'o// nub tu mi thub pa'o// byang du gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o// de/ 
340b8(rgyud): nga la ma thas na seM sa pa dug nga sdugs dag pa gyug/ sengs pa ru ma mi / mamajas n-i/ mi ma na/  mib yin/ dag
341a1(rgyud): dag lag g.yon du// khu tshur g.yon pas rab grub stsol// 'di yi phyag rgya nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu brtags// lag par dgod pa rab bshad bya// go rims
341a2(rgyud): ji lta ba bzhin du// tum bu ru ni mthe bor dgod// bsdigs mdzub la ni rgyal ba gnas// rnam rgyal gung mo nyid la'o// mi thub de bzhin ming med la// gzhan gyis mi thub mthe chung la// lag pa'i dbus
341a3(rgyud): su yig ge oM// dgod pa de nyid lag pa'i rgyab// rdo rje phreng ba'i mthar thug tu// dgod par bya ba mchog tu bshad// sbyor dang rnam par dbye ba yang // phyag rgya kun spyod yongs su bsdu// so sor brtan
341a4(rgyud): par bya ba nyid// sor mo rnams la khyad par du// dbang dang dgug/ dang rmongs la sogs// rengs byed la sogs go rims de bzhin// las rnams dag ni thams cad du// sngags pas
341a5(rgyud): mnyam par bzhag ste bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhi na gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la/ 
341a6(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mtshan rnams kyis legs par bstod pa mdzad de// bcom ldan 'das mnyes par mdzad pa// byang chub sems ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas de bzhin
341a7(rgyud): gshegs pa kun// dgra bcom 'dod chags bral ba dang // legs pa chos kyi 'byung gnas mchog/ blo gros dag pa ye shes che// thams cad mkhyen pa kun rig mchog/ mchog gi
341a8(rgyud): dbang phyug dpa' ba che// thog ma tha ma med khyab bdag/ ma 'dres ma 'dres pa yi don// shin tu phra ba mchog sbyin rgyal/ rdo rje can chen rnal 'byor che// rdo rje rnal
341b1(rgyud): dbang phyug mchog/ mi bskyod pa dang mi pad mgon// chos dbyings gzhan dang gzhan min pa// rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje mchog/ dbang bskur kun gyi bla ma'i bu// theg chen che ba'i mchog gi
341b2(rgyud): mchog/ dpa' bo mchog tu dpa' bo'i mchog/ zab cing yangs la phra ba dang // thams cad thams cad de bzhin gshegs// 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po che// tshang skyobadag
341b3(rgyud): po stobs po che// gzi brjid phung po gzi brjid che// phul byung phul las phul du byung // rgyu med mchog gi mchog dpa' mchog/ gzi mchog gzi brjid byed mtshungs pa// rgyal
341b4(rgyud): rgyal ba mchog nyid dang // legs par rgyal po bdag/ nyid che// rdo rje sems dpa' sems chen po// rdo rgyal ba lcags kyu che// rdo rje chags pa mdar chen po// dza
341b5(rgyud): legs pa legs grub mdzad// rdo rje rin chen che mchog ma cho ga/ rdo rje gzi brjid legs brjid mdzad// rgyal mtshan chen po rin chen rtog/ rdo rje gnad pa legs
341b6(rgyud): gzhad mdzad// 'jig rten dbang phyug pad+ma che// shes rab ye shes legs rno mdzad// chos kyi 'khor lo chos chen po// sems dpa' smra ba legs gzhad mdzad// 
341b7(rgyud): sna tshogs las ni rgyal po che// rdo rje srung ba legs srung mdzad// khro bo chen po gnod sbyin che// rdo rje 'tshams sbyor 'tsham sbyor sel// phyag 'tshal sangs rgyas
341b8(rgyud): kun khyod la/ dang po'i rnal 'byor dbang phyug mchog/ lags rjer can rnal 'byo / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad da// snying po rgyan zhes can gsam pa// 
342a1(rgyud): dag thams cad lags par gsungs// sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub sems// ye shes snying po shin tu mdzes// gsang ba chen po mchog tu gsang / 
342a2(rgyud): swa bya shin tu rnyed dka' ba// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i mdo// brjod du med cing yig bral// rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud chen po las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dkyil 'khor
342a3(rgyud): 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i rtog pa rgyas pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so// / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slar yang 'dus te gshegs
342a4(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i rdo rje rnal la dbyor gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
342a5(rgyud): pos de dag gi gsol ba btab pa'i tshig nye bar gsan na/ sa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul la 'jug pa ye she sa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 
342a6(rgyud): de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das ma yang snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po 'di skad cig nyid la 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bzhin
342a7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes rdo rje la zhugs par gyur to// zhugs nas kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po shes rab ye shes kyi ting nge 'dzin gsal
342a8(rgyud): bar mdzad cing brtan par gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs de las 'thon te/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yul chos dbyings kyi mthas klas pa ma lus pa lus pa med pa'i
342b1(rgyud): sems can gyi khams thams cad snang bar mdzad nas sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi'ang shes rab dang ye shes rnam par sbyangs te byang chub kyi sems bskyed nas bkug cing rjes su mnyes par byas
342b2(rgyud): nas legs par mdzad nas rnam par gnas te// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin legs par yongs su rdzogs par mdzad nas/ mngon par dbang bskur te gzi brjid dang / tog dang / gnad
342b3(rgyud): pa dang / de dag la nges par sbyar te mchog gi dbang phyug chen po las rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis chos rtogs pa la yang rab tu gnas nas/ rnon po dang / rgyu dang smra ba'i sems dpa'
342b4(rgyud): rnams la'ang thugs brtan par mdzad de yongs su dag nas yang pad+mo'i sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i dbang phyug chos nyid gzhi med pa la sbyar nas sna tshogs pa'i
342b5(rgyud): las kyi bdag po dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed bsrung ba dang / khro bo dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje mtshams sbyor ba rnams
342b6(rgyud): sems can gyi khams mtha' dag yongs su smin pa dang / byin gyis brlabs te slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs kar rjes su zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
342b7(rgyud): kyi shes rab kyi ye shes la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o zag med shes rab bdag/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi// shes rab shin
342b8(rgyud): tu dri med sems// sems dpa'i lus su bdag gyur to// dri me sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ dngos dang dngos med rnam dpyad na/ e ma'o ches ni bsam med nyid/ 
343a1(rgyud): bdag gi dbang du rnam par gnas/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs gnas 'thon nas byang chub sems
343a2(rgyud): dpa' bcu drug gi lus su mngon par sprul te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la yongs su bskor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nye 'khor kun tu nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang 'od kyi dkyil
343a3(rgyud): 'khor dang / byin gyis brlabs pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'khod par gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
343a4(rgyud): 'das rdo rje snying po rgyan gyi rgyud las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin rab mdor bstan pa'i chos kyis tshig bka' stsal du gsol// / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis 'jam
343a5(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don de yongs su zhwa bar sems dpa' ni legs so legs so// legs
343a6(rgyud): par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gi dbang phyug chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs nas
343a7(rgyud): sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni nang gi lus dang phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes
343a8(rgyud): bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal cing rnam par dpyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta ning rnam par dpyod do// 
343b1(rgyud): lus la bad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par dpyod do// lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang / bya'i tshor ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba dang / 
343b2(rgyud): nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems dang / phyi nang gi sems dang / nang gi chos dang / phyi'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ 
343b3(rgyud): dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsapa cing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la zad pa'i rjes
343b4(rgyud): su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas pa'i rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du yang nye bar len pa med do// rtag tu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lus dang ngag dang / sems
343b5(rgyud): dang chos mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas so// oM kAM oM tsa tA ri s+thi t+yA pas+tha nA nA hUM/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi ni sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi bskyed pa'i
343b6(rgyud): phyir de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis 'dun pa bskyed cing stsol lo// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyis rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// sdig tom dge ba'i
343b7(rgyud): chos skyes pa rnams spang ba'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems kyis rab
343b8(rgyud): tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// chos skyes pa rnams spangs pa'i phyir 'dun pa la sogs pa dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams skyed pa'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do// 
344a1(rgyud): 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag par 'debs so// dge ba'i chos skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas pa
344a2(rgyud): bya ba dang / yangs par bya ba'i phyir dang / sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir 'dun pa bskyed do// 'bad do// brtson 'grus rtsom mo// sems rab tu 'dzin to// smon lam yang dag
344a3(rgyud): par 'debs so// chos rnams thams cad don dam par mi spong ba dang / mi spong ba ma yin pa'i ched du rtogs par bya'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen
344a4(rgyud): pos 'di bka' stsal to// oM sa mya ka pra hA na sarba taHdag ta sa ma tA ang+giSh+Ti a ra hUM/ yang dag dpar spong ba brjod pa nas bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
344a5(rgyud): sgo'o / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi ni 'dun pa'i ting / nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bsgom par bya'o// brtson 'grus dang / sems
344a6(rgyud): dang spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang bsgom par byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi sgo chos thams cad sgra/ 
344a7(rgyud): ma sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du 'jug go// zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM ridI bA pA ra mi te la bA ba ra d+ha hUM/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa/ 
344a8(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes nas bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// dbang po lnga ni dang pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi
344b1(rgyud): dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la dbang bskur ba spros pa med pa'i dbang po 'di dag bka' stsal to// oM in+d+ra yA ba bo d+ha padz+nye i She dz+nyA na
344b2(rgyud): nA ma n+ya nA pa ga ta ya aHhUM/ dbang po mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// stobs lnga ni dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i
344b3(rgyud): stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs so// zhes bka' stsal to// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa stobs
344b4(rgyud): thams cad rtogs pa/ spros pa thams cad dang bral ba nga gdod ma nas dag pas 'di bka' stsal pa/ oM sa rba ta thA ga tA ba la aHhUM hUM baHstobs 'phel ba zhes
344b5(rgyud): bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshangs pa/ 'i gnas pa bzhini byams pa dang / snying rje/ dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms so// oM pad+ma 'i hA
344b6(rgyud): rA d+hiSh+Tha ni ka ma drA k+Sha hUM hUM/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bka' stsal to// tshangs pa'i gnas pa byin gyis rlob pa'o// so
344b7(rgyud): so yang dag par rig pa bzhi ni/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so
344b8(rgyud): yang dag par rig pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid du so so yang dag par rig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bka' stsal to// oM pra ti
345a1(rgyud): sam+bi da/ sa hUM/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa nyid do// rjes su dran pa drug gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang
345a2(rgyud): dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa'o// chos thams cad gcig tu rjes su dran pa ni chos thams cad
345a3(rgyud): don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// mtshan nyid dang mtshan nyid med pa rnam par spyod pas mnyam pa nyid kyi sgo zhes bya ba 'di ting nge 'dzin la dbang bsgyur bas bka' stsal to// oM sarba a nu s+thi ti bud+d+haH
345a4(rgyud): pa dA di shihUhUM hUM/ rjes su dran pa drug gi shes rab bo// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'bad pa yang
345a5(rgyud): dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang gabyang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu sbyangs pa yang dag
345a6(rgyud): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dge byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lags byang chub kyi yan lag mnyam pa nyid skye ba med pa'i
345a7(rgyud): mtshan nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bka' stsal to// oM sarba tA b+h+yog sa ma hA su pra tiSh+Thi Ni dru / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad gang zhe na/ yang dag pa'i/ 
345a8(rgyud): bdang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i grol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag
345b1(rgyud): pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// lam zad mi shes pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po la 'jug pa legs par so so rig pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes so// oM Ar+yaSh+TaM ga mAn maT/ 'phags
345b2(rgyud): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// ting nge 'dzin gsum ni/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'o// de la
345b3(rgyud): stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / gsog dang gsob kyi rnam pa dang / rang bzhin med pa'i rnam pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid gcig tu rtogs pa sems
345b4(rgyud): rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ce/ sa brjod do// de la mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang nga zhe na/ gang la mtshan mar mi byed pa dang / 'dod pa med pa
345b5(rgyud): dang shes pa med pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / rna ma par bral ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la smon
345b6(rgyud): pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de la smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// chos thams cad
345b7(rgyud): rtogs nas smon par mi byed de/ lha'am lha las gzhan gang yang rung ba/ don du mi gnyer zhing gsol ba 'debs par yang mi 'dod pa ste/ dngos po thams cad la ting nge 'dzin
345b8(rgyud): thams cad kyi sgo yis kyang ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo gsum nye bar rtogs par bya'o// oM kha sa maHsarba d+harmA/ khaM/ de la stobs bcu ni gnas
346a1(rgyud): dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa ma khyen pa'i stobs dang // khams sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / dbang po mchog dang mchogs
346a2(rgyud): yin pa ma khyen pa'i stobs dang / mos pa sna tshogs mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / sdug bsngal 'gog pa so sor mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba mkhyen
346a3(rgyud): pa'i stobs dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / mngon par shes pa lnga mkhyen pa'i stobs dang / zag pa zad pa mkhyen pa'i stobs so// de bzhin
346a4(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid so sor rtogs pa 'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// oM / ba las ma teH/ stobs bcu mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba
346a5(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgya dgang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams ma thong ba de ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs
346a6(rgyud): med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// gzugs kyi 'du shes
346a7(rgyud): las yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'a du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
346a8(rgyud): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha'
346b1(rgyud): yas so// zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par b.rab lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das
346b2(rgyud): cung bad ma yod do// zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mchod
346b3(rgyud): las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med min skye mchod la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'do ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mchod
346b4(rgyud): las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang /  'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la nye bar bsgrubs teganas pa 'di ni rnam par rabar ba brgyad pa'o// chos
346b5(rgyud): thams cad smos pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa bsam gtan med cing bsam gtan med pa ma yin pa
346b6(rgyud): snyoms par 'jug pa med cing snyoms par 'jug pa ma yin pa 'di bka' stsal to// oM sa man+ta b+ha dre sarba ba bi shud d+he d+hi ShaM khaM gnas dang gnas ma yin pa
346b7(rgyud): dang bral ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na// chos
346b8(rgyud): 'di rnams mngon par rdzogs pa ra sangs ma rgyas so zhes bya bar/ bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye
347a1(rgyud): dgra'i tshigs gzhan cem 'dus 'jig rtenan chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyuyang dag par rjes sum mthong/ 
347a2(rgyud): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag med pa thob pa dang / bag chab med pathob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog brlabs po che
347a3(rgyud): gnas su dam bca'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrags so// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam bram ze'amalha'am bdud dam tshangs pa 'am/ 
347a4(rgyud): gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan pa bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas nas/ de la
347a5(rgyud): zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes bya ba bdag la dge sbyong ngam bram ze'am/ lha' ma/ bdud dam tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs
347a6(rgyud): gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang 'thun par zhes bya ba'i bar du'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na bar chad kyi chos su mi
347a7(rgyud): 'gyur ro zhes bya ba rgyas par sbyar ro// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i nges par 'byung ba'i lam du bshad pa de yis nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur te/ yang dag
347a8(rgyud): par sdug bsngal zad pa dang / yang dag par sdug bsngal mthar bya bar ga la 'gyur/ zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam tshangs pa'am skye dgu'i tshogs su yang
347b1(rgyud): rung ste/ 'jig rtenan chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i sku yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong ba la sogs 'ji ltar gyur pa thams cad yongs su smos te brjod par bya'o// 
347b2(rgyud): 'jigs pa ni chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid dengar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i phyir ro// oM bai shwa ra dwa sa ma tra pra pa tra a AHa a
347b3(rgyud): mthar gyis gnas pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'dod pas dben pa sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dbod pa dang bcas
347b4(rgyud): pa'i dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam ga/ tan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar
347b5(rgyud): zhi nas nang yongs su dngas te sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa sa rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can
347b6(rgyud): bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms su gnas te dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin can lus kyis
347b7(rgyud): bde ba myong la// 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa'i bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs
347b8(rgyud): gnas so// de bde ba yang spangs/ sdug bsngal yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms
348a1(rgyud): pa dang / dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du
348a2(rgyud): shes la sa yang dag par 'das te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas na mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
348a3(rgyud): la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du na mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te rnam par shes pa mtha' ya so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye
348a4(rgyud): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa tham ngas cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang da dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med
348a5(rgyud): ba'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched la sa yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med min
348a6(rgyud): mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes dang / tshor ba 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug la nye bar bsgrubs te
348a7(rgyud): gnaso// rnam par tha ra pa brgyad po dang mnyam pa nyid rjes su thob nas dngos por rtog par mi byed/ dngos po med par rtog par mi byed/ chos thams cad gnyis su med par rtogs so// 'di ni
348a8(rgyud): mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu mnyam pa nyid do// oM a nan+taHbi mo kA mu khe shum/ dngos po thams cad mthar gyis pa'i rnam par thar pa mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol
348b1(rgyud): tu phyin pa'o// de la pha rol tu phyin pa bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi
348b2(rgyud): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 
348b3(rgyud): stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / spros pa
348b4(rgyud): med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yang dag pa'i don gyi/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad kyi de kho na nyid kyi don gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa
348b5(rgyud): dang / rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pad+ma'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / las kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste bstan pa
348b6(rgyud): rjes su rtogs pa'i sbyor bas so// oM sarba pA ra mi tA ar+tha pa ri pu ra Ni/ oM pra hU~M tA/ thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de las
348b7(rgyud): bcu gang zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / sbyang dka' ba zhes bya ba dang / mngon du gyur pa
348b8(rgyud): zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba dang / sa thams cad don cig te 'di ltar ye shes kyi
349a1(rgyud): don to// ye shes kyang ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ yi ge med pa/ don yod pa/ gdod ma nas dag pa/ dri ma med pa/ 'od gsal ba/ brjod pa bral ba zhes
349a2(rgyud): bya ba'i don to// oM b+hu mi bi sho d+ha ni sarbA R+sha pa ri pU ra Ni 'a bruM sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas pa bcu gang zhe na/ 
349a3(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / gzhon nur gyur pa dang / las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba dang / skye bar sbyor ba dang ldan pa dang / bsam pa dang
349a4(rgyud): ldan pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang ba skur pa thob pa dang / skye ba gcig gi thogs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gnas pa dang / mi
349a5(rgyud): gnas pa dor ba ste/ don dam par gnas pa cig yin pa'i phyir 'di ltar gnas pa med pa'o// oM sarba bya/ bas+thA na bi ga te hUM/ rnam par gnas pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
349a6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba
349a7(rgyud): dang smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang ba dang mi dpa
349a8(rgyud): ba rang bzhin gyis rnam par grol ba thams cad la dbang ba/ dbang phyug thams cad la rjes su thob pa/ chos thams cad legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro// oM sarba ba shita tu
349b1(rgyud): hUM thams cad la dbang ba zhes bya ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgya dgang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga'o// com
349b2(rgyud): mnga'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga'o// thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa mi mnga'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga'o// ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga'o// 'dun
349b3(rgyud): pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// shes ra
349b4(rgyud): yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba so/ dngas su nyams pa mi mnga'o// rnam par grol ba'i shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga'o// 'das pa'i
349b5(rgyud): dus la mthogs ma chags pa'i ye shes gzigs pa'adu gago/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags mthogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// da ltar byung ba'i dus
349b6(rgyud): lam chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi phrin las thams
349b7(rgyud): cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'di chos rjes skye ba'i bsgyur
349b8(rgyud): 'phro lags// / rgya dpal gtugs shing slob dponar bzhi bshes gnyen gyi 'grel pa dang yang bstun nas zhu dag byas shing / mi bcos su ma
350a1(rgyud): rung ba re re tsam 'grel pa dang bstun nas bcos shing / nu thug g.yar khral du blangs nas/ bu ston gyis bgyis pa'o// dpal rdo rje sems
350a2(rgyud): dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de las bcu rnams ci zhe na/ rab tu dga' ba zhes bya ba'i sa dang / dri ma mang ba zhes bya ba dang / 'od 'phro ba zhes bya ba dang / thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba
350a3(rgyud): dang mngon du gyur pa zhes bya ba dang / ring du song ba zhes bya ba dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba dang / chos kyi sprin zhes bya ba'o// sa rnams thams
350a4(rgyud): cad don cig pa ste/ 'di lta ste ye shes kyi don no// daye shes kyang don dam par ci yang med pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ 'gyur ba med pa/ don yod pa/ gdodam
350a5(rgyud): nas dag pa dri ma med pa 'od gsal ba brjod du med pa'o zhes pa'i don gang yin pa'o// oM b+hu mi bi sho d+ha ni sarba R+sha pa ri pU ra Ni baM b+hu/ sa yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i
350a6(rgyud): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa bcu rnams ci zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang po bskyed pa dang / byis par gyur pa dang
350a7(rgyud): las dang po pa dang / rnal 'byor spyod pa dang / skye ba bskyed pa dang / sbyor ba phun sum tshogs pa dang / bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / phyir mi ldog pa dang / dbang bskur ba thob pa dang / 
350a8(rgyud): skye ba gcig gis thogs pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rnam par gzhag pa ni don dam par rnam par gzhag pa dang bral ba ste/ rnam par gzhag pa cig nyid kyi phyir na 'di
350b1(rgyud): lnga ste/ rnam par gnag pa med pa'o// oM sarba bya ba sman big te hUM/ rnam par gzhag pa med pa zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dbang bcu rnams
350b2(rgyud): ci zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang / 
350b3(rgyud): stobs la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba'o// dbang rnams thams cad kyang don dam par dbang med pa rang bzhin rnam par dben pa kun rdzob tu dbang phyug
350b4(rgyud): thams cad la dbang rjes su thob pa ste chos legs par so sor rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir ro// oM sarba ba shi te dz+dza/ b+h+rUM hUM/ dbang thams cad zhes bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol
350b5(rgyud): tu phyin pa'o// de la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam si tsi na na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa med pa
350b6(rgyud): dang / ca co med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / thugs mnyam par ma gzhag pa med pa dang / tha dad pa nyid kyi 'du shes meng pa dang / so sor ma brtags pa'i btang
350b7(rgyud): snyoms med pa dang / 'dun pa nyams pa med pa dang / brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa dang / dran pa nyams pa med pa dang / ting nge 'dzin nyams pa med pa dang / shes rab nyams
350b8(rgyud): pa med pa dang / rnam par grol ba nyams pa med cing rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa nyams pa med pa dang / 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs
351a1(rgyud): pa 'jug pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug pa dang / da ltar gyi dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa
351a2(rgyud): 'jug pa dang / sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba
351a3(rgyud): thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro zhing ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni yul thams cad du dus thams cad kyi tshe thams cad mnyam pa
351a4(rgyud): nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa ste/ stong dang nyid la yang dag par rjes su rtogs pa nyid kyi phyir na des rab yongs su dag pa'o// oM a wa Ni ka babyung rmas ma
351a5(rgyud): te aHbI ra hUM khaM/ ma 'dres pa mnyam pa'i da ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis rnams ci zhan
351a6(rgyud): phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil 'khor los mtshan pa nyid de 'di'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil dag la 'khor lo rtsibs stong can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// phyag
351a7(rgyud): dang zhabs kyi mthil legs par gnas pa ste/ zhabs kyi mthil thams cad kyis sa gzhi la reg cing / de yang 'di'i mtho ba ni dma' ba dang dma' ba dang ni
351a8(rgyud): mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ngang pa'i rgyal po lta bu dra bas 'brel ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi phyag dag dang / zhabs de dag gser gyi mdog can gyi
351b1(rgyud): po'i phreng ba rnams kyis rkang pa brgyad pa bzhin du mdzes pa'o// phyag dang zhabs 'jam ning gzhon sha chags pa nyid de/ bcom ldan 'das 'di'i phyag dang zhabs dag ras bal 'jam po bzhin dang / skyes
351b2(rgyud): nas zla ba len pa'i byis pa bzhin du gnon sha can dang / ka tsa lin dA ltar 'jam pa/ reg na bde ba'o// bdun mtho bar gyur te phyag gnyis dag dang zhabs gnyis dag dang / phrag gong dag dang / 
351b3(rgyud): mgrin pa'i phyogs gcig dag gis sor mo ring ba ste/ 'di'i zhabs kyi sor mo rnams rim gyis ring ba nyid do// rting pa yangs pa ste 'di'i rting pa che zhing zhabs kyi rje su mtshams
351b4(rgyud): par yangs par 'gyur ro// sku che zhing drang ba nyid de 'phye'o ma yin zhing zhom pa ma yin/ ma tshang ba ma yin/ 'thas pa ma yin/ legs par skyes pa rnam pa thams
351b5(rgyud): cad pa bdun dang ldan pa'i sku ste/ 'tho ba 'di'i srid dang rjes su 'tsham pa'i zheng du 'gyur ro// zhabs 'bur mi mngon pa nyid de/ 'di'i pus mo dang long bu mtho bar 'gyur
351b6(rgyud): ba spu'i rtse mo gyen du phyogs pa ste/ 'di'i baspu rnams rtse mo gyen du phyogs par 'gyur zhing / ba spu rnams g.yas phyogs su 'khyil la 'khor ba mig sman gyi mdog can rnams te/ de
351b7(rgyud): rnams kyis gser gyi mdog can gyi sku mdog gsal bar byed do// byin pa ri dgas e ne ya'i lta bu ste bcom ldan 'das kyi byin pa dag zlum pa ri dgas e na ya rnams lta bu'o// phyag ring
351b8(rgyud): ning mdzes pa ste rgyas shing ma btud pa nyid du phyag mthil dag gis rang gi pus mo'i lha nga la reg pa'o// 'doms kyi lnga basbubs su nub ste/ sbubs kyis rab tu
352a1(rgyud): g.yogs pa glang po che'i gsang gnas lta bur 'gyur ro// sku mdog gser 'dra ba ste 'di'i kha dog gser lta bur 'gyur ro// lpags pa srab pa ste shin/ 
352a2(rgyud): tu 'jam pa gser shog ltar 'jam pa'i lpags pa can du 'gyur zhing / rdul med pa'i na bza' 'dzin pa'o// spu re re nas skyes pa ste/ 'di'i ba spu'i khung bur spu rnams
352a3(rgyud): re rer 'gyur ro// smin ma'i dbus na mdzod bu can te/ 'di'i smin ma dag gi dbus na ras skud legs pa lta bu dang bcag pa'i kha dog can g.yas su 'khyil bar 'gyur te/ 
352a4(rgyud): mdzod pa nyid kyis zhal gser gyi kha dog lta bu shin tu gas la dbar byed do// sku stod seng ge lta bus+ho/ 'di'i sku steng du yangs pa seng ge lta bur 'gyur ro// 
352a5(rgyud): dpung mgo zlum pa ste yongs su zlum pa'i mgrin pa can du 'bru ra ro// thal gong rgyas par 'gyur zhing gser / ga bzhin du rnam par gsal ba'i mgrin pa can no// yan
352a6(rgyud): lag so so rnams su ro rnams myong bar byed do ces pas na ro bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa nyid rtsa rnams yin pa de rnams kyi mchog tu rlung dang mkhris pa dang
352a7(rgyud): bad kan la sogs pa rnams kyis ma dkrugs pa nyid kyi phyir yang dag par gsal ba'o// shing n+ya grong ltar chu zheng gab pa ste/ skyes bu chen po'i mchu dang zhing dag mnyam pa'o// 
352a8(rgyud): dbu gtsug tor dang ldan pa ste/ dbu zlum par 'gyur zhing gtsug tor gdugs lta bus yas bkab pa gtsug tor yang shin tu mtho ba'o// ljags ring ba ste snyan
352b1(rgyud): gyi mtha'i bar du ljags kyi rtse mos rig par byed cing dbu sgra'irim par thug par yang / dpral ba'i mthar ljags kyis khebs pa'o// tshangs pa'i dbyangs te 'khor stong phrag dumar dbyangs nang du dzi/ 
352b2(rgyud): ba de ltar phyi rol du'ang thos shing bya ka la bing ka'i bzhin du snyan pa nyid 'gyur ro// 'gram pa seng ge'i lte bu ste/ 'gram pa dag seng ge bzhin du zlum por 'gyur ro// tshoms
352b3(rgyud): dkar ba ste dung dang kun dadang / zla ba'i kha dog can gyi tshems rnams so// tshems mnyam pa ste ha cang dma' ba ma yin mtho ba ma yin/ mi mnyam pa ma yin pa'i rtse mo can gyi
352b4(rgyud): tshems rnams su 'gyur ro// tshems thag bzang ba skye tshems rnams par bar med pa'o// tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste/ tshems 'og tu
352b5(rgyud): nyi shu dang / steng du tshems nyi shu'o// spyan 'thon 'bring ste spyan dag go sngon po gang yin pa de shi na tu rnam par dag par 'gyur// rim
352b6(rgyud): dmar po rnams dang ma 'dres pa nyid kyi phyir gang dkar po yin pa de kho na shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// rdzi ma blta bu ste/ spyan gyi rje ma rnams khyu
352b7(rgyud): mchog gi bzhin du 'og ma yin pa de rnams 'og kho na dang gang steng ma yin pa de rnams steng kho nar gnas pa ma 'ardzings pa legs par gnol ba'o// 
352b8(rgyud): sems can 'ga' zhig rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi mdog can du ma thong ba 'ga' zhig rnams kyis shel gyi mdog can du mthong ba 'ga' zhig rnams kyis pad+mar
353a1(rgyud): ga'i mdog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis in+d+ra nI la'i kha dog dang / 'ga' zhig rnams kyis mu tig dmar po'i kha dog can dang / 'ga'
353a2(rgyud): zhig rnams kyis dung dang kun da dang / zla ba ltar dkar ba dang / 'ga' zhig gis kha dog sna tshogs pa dang 'ga' zhig gis na mkha'i kha dog can dang / 'ga' zhig
353a3(rgyud): gis khru byed dang bcu gsum pa'i tshad dang / ji srid du dpag tshad 'bum gyi tshad dam/ dpag tshad bye ba'i tshad dang / ji srid du 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i smin
353a4(rgyud): mtha' yas pa rnam pa snang bar mdzad pa'i 'od kyi dkyil lakhodar can dang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas yongs su rgyas par mdzad pa dang / 
353a5(rgyud): ji srid du me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyun bkod pa'i rgya mtsho rnam par snang bar byed cing chos kyi dbyings kyi mthar thug pa'i bar du ste/ sangs
353a6(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi yul gdul bya'i dbang las thams cad snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dbyangs kyis rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / stong gnyi
353a7(rgyud): dang gsum dang / ji srid na mkha'i mthar thug pa'i bar thams cad 'od dang / dbyangs kyis snang bar byas nas rnam par rig par mdzad pa dang / chos dang zang zing dang / don 'thun
353a8(rgyud): pa dang / don bya ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi rnams kyis sems can rnams la phan 'dogs shing // phani btags nas byang chub chen po la rab tu dgod par mdzad do// skyes bu
353b1(rgyud): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis mnyam pa nyid kyis chos rnams thams cad mnyam pazhing mnyam pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi mtshan mngon par 'grub par blta bar bya/ 
353b2(rgyud): mtshan ma yin pa mngon par 'grub pa ni ma yin no// byang chub mtshan nyid med pa nyid kyi phyir chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med pa ste/ 'di lta ste stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can no// 
353b3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / byang chub dang / chos rnams thams cad kyang mtshan nyid cig
353b4(rgyud): ba ste 'di lta ste/ namakha'i mtshan nyid can stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid can zhi ba'i mtshan nyid can rnams so zhes pa'o// 
353b5(rgyud): oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa ra lak+Sha Na sa ma ta d+harma te oM mtshan thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i shes/ rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// 
353b6(rgyud): dpe byad brgyad cu rnams ci zhe na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sen mo zangs kyi mdog lta bur 'gyur te sen mo snun pa dang sen mo mtho ba dang / 
353b7(rgyud): sen mo rnams zlum par gyur pa dang / sor mo rnams rims kyis phra ba dang / sor mo rnams rgyas pa dang / rtsa mi mngon pa dang / rtsa rnams mdud pa med pa dang / 
353b8(rgyud): long bu mi mngon pa dang / zhabs mi mnyam pa med par mtshungs pa dang / glang po che'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / seng ge'i stabs su gshegs pa dang / g.yas
354a1(rgyud): phyogs su ldog cing gshegs pa dang / drang por gshegs pa dang / mdzes par gshegs pa dang / rims kyis gshegs pa dang / tshe zhing langs
354a2(rgyud): la yongs su gyur pa'i dbus mo'i lhang can dang / mtshan yongs su rdzogs pa dang / gom pa snyoms pa dang / sku rnam par dag pa dang / sku 'jam pa dang / sku rnam par dngas pa
354a3(rgyud): dang sku zhum pa med pa dang sku chub med pa dang / kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba dang / khyu mchog ltar kun nas rab tu dang ba can dang / gzigs pa yongs su dag cing
354a4(rgyud): mngon par 'dod pa la mnyam pa'i 'od can dang / sku zlum da pa dang / sku skabs phyin pa dang / sku ma rnyongs pa dang // sku sked gzhu'i lag bcangs lta bu dang / lte ba
354a5(rgyud): zab pa dang / lte ba mi g.yo ba dang / lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khrel ba dang / lte ba thogs pa med pa dang yan lag dang nying lag shin tu rnam par 'byes pa
354a6(rgyud): dang / lpags pa skyon dang bral ba dang / gnag bag dang sme ba med pa dang / sku bstan pa dang phyag shing bal lta bu dang / phyag yangs pa dang / phyag gi ri mo snum pa dang / 
354a7(rgyud): phyag gi ri mo ma yo ba dang / mchu bim pa lta bu dang / zhal ha cang mi ring ba dang / mnyen zhing srab la dmar ba'i ljags dang / glang po che'i nga ro can dang / snyan cing mnyen pa'i dbyangs
354a8(rgyud): dang / sgra phun sum tshogs pa dang / dbyangs 'jam pa dang / shangs ma tho ba dang / mche ba zlum pa dang / mche ba dkar ba dang / mche ba byin gyis phra ba dang / spyan
354b1(rgyud): gtsang ba dang / spyan yangs pa dang / sman 'thon 'bring dang / rdzi ma gnag pa dang / smin ma stu ga ba dang / smin ma 'jam pa dang / spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i mdab ma lta bu dang
354b2(rgyud): smin tshugs ring ba dang / smin ma'i spu nag pa dang / smin ma'i spu pra ba dang / smin ma rjes su 'thun pa dang / kha dog mnyams pa dang / snyan mi mnyam pa med pa dang / snyan skyon
354b3(rgyud): dang bral ba dang / dbang po thams cad ma nyams shing skyon dang bral ba dang / sku yongs su rdzogs shing mthol mchog tu gnas pa'i zhal gdong dang / dpral ba can dang dbu shin tu rgyas
354b4(rgyud): pa dang / dbu skra gnag pa dang / dbu skra dri zhim pa dang dbu skra mnyam pa dang / dbus snum pa dang // dbu skam 'khums pa dang / dbu sga ma 'khrugs pa dang / 
354b5(rgyud): dpal be'u dang / bkra shis dang / g.yung drung 'khyil pas rgyan pa dang / rgyan mtshan yang dag par gnas pa dang / dpral bdud lta bu dang / dbu mchog tu
354b6(rgyud): mtho ba dang / gtsug tor yar 'phags pa dang / dbu gdugs kyi rnam pa can dang / kun nas mdzes pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni tshad med pa'i dpe byad can mnyam pa nyid la legs pa
354b7(rgyud): rab tu gnas pa gsal byed dang / gsal byed pa yin pa nyid la legs pa rab tu gnas pa/ chos thams cadags la byed med par mnyam pa nyid la legs par rab tu gnas pa mtshan dang dab byang thams cad
354b8(rgyud): chos dang ldan pa la lags par 'juganas pa/ dus gsum gyi dang bya sanyam pa nyid rdorje ma bum nyam panyid pab pa stong pa nyid kyi chos thams cad dang / dngab byad ma nyam pa nyid ngobapa gnyis me da nga 'dod
355a1(rgyud): legs par yang dag par zhugs pa rnams so zhes pa'o// oM a nu bAn+d+ha na sa mahA su rba tISh+ThaH badz+ranAnAmA ya~M/ dpe byad mnyam nyid ces bya ba'i shes rab kyi rol tu na
355a2(rgyud): pa'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rjel 'phror gyi dbang phyug chen po can la lag so nas bya ba rnams kyis mashes pa
355a3(rgyud): mdzad do// oM byang chub sems ched khrod legs so// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid mchog/ sangs rgyas chen po khyod leg so// ting 'dzin dbang du 'jug pa yi// rdo rje ye shes khyod lag so/ 
355a4(rgyud): sems dpa' khyod lags so// tshad med ched du khyod lags so// shes rab dam pa'i ched du yang // mdo sde 'di ni lag sa par ba shad// sangs rgyas sngams ma gsungs pa'o// de ni
355a5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor can gyi dbang phrag chen posade bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad la phyag 'dza ba bzhi'i mngon par dgas par mdzad do// sangs rgyas khyod
355a6(rgyud): blag 'chal// chos kyi sku yi mchag ga mchog/ gdod ma'i sngags kyi na nyid la// rdo rje sa shes sbubs can la// shin tu sgrib med zhi pa la// rdo chos rnams lags gnas pa// theg pa chen po'i gro dang
355a7(rgyud): beb/ blugs rje'i bad ga nyid can gyi lha// gdod nas dag pa dang 'tsho tsho// dbang phyug das pa mchog gi mchog/ dam chos mchog tu 'gyur yameng // deg shegs de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas pa'o// ma
355a8(rgyud): / oM ma n+dan mo stu swA hA/ 'din brjod pa tsam zhig gis// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o zhes pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
355b1(rgyud): cad pos 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad dngos grub thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bskyed par mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ga shes/ 
355b2(rgyud): pa rnams thams cad sa ra yang 'dus pa mdzad nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can gyi dbang phyug chen po la gsol ba btab pa/ bcom ldan 'das khyod nyid kyis rigs thams cad 'khor lor bskyed par mdzad
355b3(rgyud): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen pos gsol ba btab pa'i gsung gis de mthag kho nar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bos te bka' stsal pa/ 
355b4(rgyud): 'jam dpal la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams thams cad kyi bya chub kyi snying po nyon cig ces te/ de nas 'di las yang dag bshad// byang chub dkyil 'khor
355b5(rgyud): bla na med// rdo rje ye shes gsang ba mchog/ sangs rgyas skyob pa thams cad kyi'o// dben pa'i sa gzhi nyams dga' ba// me tog phreng bas rnam rgyan pa// kun tu
355b6(rgyud): sna tshogs cha bzang ba// kun tu sna tshogs sdom par ni// kun nas sna tshogs bya ba rnams// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ri yi mchog gam grong khyer ni// me tog 'bras bus rnam rgyan pa// 
355b7(rgyud): der gan sa sngags pas dngos grub mchog/ gal te 'dod na yang dag bri// gtsug lag khang dang dgon pa'i gnas// ri stengs rnams su kun nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bya ba rnams// dam
355b8(rgyud): pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// ma mo gnas dang zhi ba'i gnas// dur khrod lnga yi gnas su ni// rdo rje 'dzin dpal bya ba rnams// don dam pA ni bsgrub par bya// pad+ma'i skyed mos tshal kun dang // 
356a1(rgyud): chu bo 'dus pa rnams su yang // phyag na bad+ma dpal bya ba// dam pa'i don du bsgrub par bya// rgyal po'i pho brang nyams dga' dang // rgyal po'i bskyed tshal rnams su ni// rdorje/ 
356a2(rgyud): rin chen de yi ni// rin chen bya ba rnams bsgrub bya// rtags cig pa dang b.lang lhas// chu klung 'dus pa rnams su yang // sna tshogs bya ba thams cad rnams// dam pa'i don tu bsgrub par bya/ 
356a3(rgyud): dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' dang // lnga rnams gnas mchog kun tu'o// namakha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// gang du mnyam par gzhag pa der// rtag par rabasod nams
356a4(rgyud): gyur pa/ bya ba thams cad bsgrub par bya// phyogs kun mnyam nyid gnas dkyil 'khor/ shes rab can gyis thig gdang bya// shar lho nub dang byang
356a5(rgyud): rnams kyi// phyogs su dkyil 'khor thig brgyad go/ kha dog lnga pa cher 'bar ba'o// gru bzhi la sgo bzhi pa/ rta babs pa ni yis mdzes
356a6(rgyud): pa ste/ sna tshogs gos dang me tog phreng // rnga yab sogs kyis rnam rgyan pa// dkyil 'khor kun la gnas pa yi// sgo dang sgo khyud mtshams rnams su// rdo rje rin chen
356a7(rgyud): rnams kyis spras// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus su ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan bri bar bya// shar du
356a8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'khor lo can// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag ldan// 'khor lo sgyur ba thams cad ni// sgeg par bcas pa kun brib// lho rug tsug tor dkar po ni// rin chen 'bar ba yang dag ldan/ 
356b1(rgyud): gtsug tor / bo dbus su ni// rdo rje gzi brjid la sogs bri// byang du brtson grus chen pom// gze brji pung ba skabs pom// sna tshogs rdo rje sogs bcas pa// rim pa kun nas bri ba ba/ dzaH
356b2(rgyud): rnal 'byor can gyi ni/ dbang phyug mgon po'i nub phyogs su// gtsug tor rgyal babartson 'grus che// rdo rje chos sogs dam bcas pa// thams cad sngags pas bri ba rabya/ 
356b3(rgyud): gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na'o// dbang ldan phyogs su 'phags pa gnas// me mtshams su ni char 'phags so// bden bral du ni rnam rgyal nyid// rlung du de bzhin rnam 'phro ba'o// 
356b4(rgyud): rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// sems dpa' kun gyi mdun du ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa/ gsal zhing 'bar 'khrigs 'od zer can// mkhas pa dkyil
356b5(rgyud): 'khor rnams su ni// mchod pa rnams ni bzhag byas te// sgeg mo la sogs mchod pa che// de bzhin gzu gas sgra la sogs dang // bdugs pa la sogs gsang chen
356b6(rgyud): no sgo skyong ba ni bzhi yin no// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas rnams su// kun tu bzang po la sogs bri// de ltar dkyil 'khor bri bya ste// mchod pa byas nas snga ma bzhin// de bzhin 'jug pa sogs
356b7(rgyud): byas la// sgrub pa'i thabs ni brtsam par bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug sogs// dkyil 'khor mngon sum mthong ba las// snga ma rtag pa ji bzhin du// phye ma de bzhin bri bar bya// bsod
356b8(rgyud): nams ldan pas dkyil 'khor rnams// thams cad tshon gyis rab brtags pa// rang gi lhag pa'i lha ngo bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar 'gyur// rang lha'i bdag nyid rnal 'byor gyis/ 
357a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu grub// cho ga dman dang lhag pas kyang // 'grub par 'gyur te skyon ma yin// kun tu sna tshogs skal bzang ba// kun nas sna tshogs
357a2(rgyud): 'khor lo can// 'khor los bsgyur ba bdag nyid che// rin chen bdun gyis mchod pa che// yongs su rdzogs pa'i zla ba ltar// dkyil 'khor bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya// sangs rgyas
357a3(rgyud): rdo rje 'dzin sogs kyi// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bshad pa'o// phyag na pad+ma bdag nyid che'i// pad+ma'i rnam par shes par bya// rin po che yi rin chen rnams// dkyil 'khor sna
357a4(rgyud): tshetshogs rnam pa'o// dkyil 'khor dman zhing dam tshig na mas// dor bar byas pa de nyid ni// gsang ba shes pa ma yin na// sgrub pa'i thabs ni 'grub mi 'gyur// de phyir// 
357a5(rgyud): 'bad pa thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad lta ba ni// gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// gdon ma/ za bar rtag tu bya// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// rjes
357a6(rgyud): su rim pas bsgrub par bya// brtan pa'am ni g.yo ba yi// rdzas rnams ji skad thams cad de// rtsa ba me tog 'bras bu sogs// bu mo legs par rgyan byas dang // 'dod pa'i
357a7(rgyud): chung ma phul byas nas// slar yang rin gyis bslu bar bya// grong dang de bzhin gtsug lag khang // kun dga' ra sogs rgyal srid mchog/ gang la sbyin pa cung zad yod// 'tshe ba de ni sbyin par
357a8(rgyud): byas bdag gi dngos po yongs gtong ba// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod pa'o// bla ma la ni yon phul nas// gsang ba dam pa rma dbyung ba// mngon par dbang bskur de nas bya// mdabam brgyad pa yid la/ 
357b1(rgyud): la slob ma bzhag nas yan lag kun// phyag rgya kun nas bcings byas nas// khams kun rang bzhin rtsa ba dang // sa bon 'bras bus dud pa yi// bum pa rnams kyis dbang bskur te// sangs rgyas phreng ba'i dbang
357b2(rgyud): bskur las// spyi bo dang ni dpral ba dang // gzhog dang de bzhin rgyab du yang // sangs rgyas rin chen chen po kun// cod pan mchog tu mi 'gyur ba'o// dpal ldan sangs rgyas gtsug nor bu// gdugs dkar steng na
357b3(rgyud): gnas pa'o// rgyal srid kun gyi dbang bskur gyis// yang dang yang du dbang bskur bya// dpal kun gyis ni mngon ma thob// zhes bya'i dbang bskur bshad pa'o// khams kun rang bzhin glang po dang // rta ni mchog
357b4(rgyud): tu 'bar ba'am// seng ga'i gdan gnas dbang bskur ba/ dpal gyi sngags ni brjod byed cing // dpal gyis mngon ma detho zhes bya'am// dam pa'i don gyis dbang bskur ba// bkra
357b5(rgyud): shis sam ni dpal be'u// gang yang bris nas dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas dpa' bo thams cad kyis// rnam rgyal dbang skur zhes bshad do// tsan dan chu dang bung ba che// gzhan
357b6(rgyud): gyis mi thub sman blugs la// kun nas dbang bskur ched du ni// rtag tu shes rab can gyis btab/ gzhan gyis mi thub dbang bskur mchog/ dkyil 'khor gang gang bris byas nas// phyag
357b7(rgyud): rgya gang dang gang bkod pa// der ni de dang de brtag bya// de rnams phyag rgya dam par bshad// dbang bskur ched du sangs rgyas rnams// lha de rnams ni yid du'ong // sman gyi dam
357b8(rgyud): pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu bshad// tsan dan dang ni rgya spos dang // ga pur de bzhin gur gum dang // a ka ru dang lha yi shing // tsan dan dmar po nyid dang ni// sitwa byA g+h+ri
